42011029	Baa nɩgbokira kha bʋ ki bĩŋin Yesura lɔkɩra ʋ, na u deɗ pi kha: «Fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ nɩpɩra bɩ̃ɩn ma. Pɩ ɓɩɛ wa bamʋŋa mɩɩnɛ wɛtɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ Yekila wɔrɩkɩra, ŋa na bamʋŋa mɩɩna Yekila liin Zonasɩra za, na dɩɛ bʋ kũu waʔ, bamʋŋa mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ sii le hã wɩ waʔ.
42011030	Baa Yekila liin bamʋŋa mɩɩna Zonasɩra za na hãan Ninivu nɩpɩra, mafɩra tɩ̃ Yekila ɓa le bamʋŋa mɩɩna dʋɔ Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira za na ɓɔgɔ Yekila wɔrɩkɩra na hã fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ nɩpɩra tɩ̃.
42011031	Na kiti ɗɩyãgɩra ɓa nannɩ, Saba ɩɩhala ɓa arɩ fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ nɩpɩra za na zarɩgɩ̃n mɩ, naɗɩɛ u kuɗ ɓa sɩrɩlegeŋe za na ɓann kha ʋɔ ɓa nuure Salomɔ̃ wʋɔmɛ sɩɛsɛ. Kɛna wɩɛra kɩ bʋ khaadɩɛ ʋɔ tãra wa Salomɔ̃ra, ɩ̃ɛ fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ nɩpɩra gbũu ɓɩɛ na nuure mi waʔ!
42011032	Na kiti ɗɩyãgɩra ɓa nannɩ, Ninivu gboŋo nɩpɩra ɓa arɩ wa fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ nɩpɩra za na zarɩgɩ̃n mɩ, naɗɩɛ baa Ninivu nɩpɩra nuun Zonasɩra sɩɛsɩra, na pɩ vɩkɩ̃nn ma pɩ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra. Kɛna wɩɛra kɩ bʋ khaadɩɛ, ʋɔ tãra Zonasɩra, pi gbũu ɓɩɛ na vɩkɩ̃n pɩ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra waʔ.»
42011033	«Nɩra sii ɗɩɛrɛ fɩtãnɩ na guure u, warɩma na khɛ gbongboŋo na si u waʔ. Ŋa pi tii u wa mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ thaaga za, sɩɛ le thaaga na nɩpɛ lonn pɩ yã yɛyɛɓɛ.
42011034	Mu yiwiyira kɩ bʋ mʋ gbɔɗa fɩtãna: Na mu yiwiyira bʋ koroŋoron, mʋ gbɔɗa bɩɛ hɩɗan ma yɛyɛɓɛ za. Ŋa na mu yiwiyira bʋ koroŋoron waʔ, mʋ gbɔɗa bɩɛ hɩɗan ma dabirige za.
42011035	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, pɛ̃ɩ na gɔ yɛyɛɓɩra kɩ bʋ mʋ za hã pi le dabirige waʔ.
42011036	Na mʋ gbɔɗa bɩɛ bʋ yɛyɛɓɛ za, kɛna khaarɛ dʋɔ sii bʋ dabirige za waʔ, tɩ bɩɛ ɓa hɩɗan ma yɛyɛɓɛ za kũu mʋ gaga kha baa fɩtãnɩ yɛɗɛ mʋ na ʋ yɛyɛɓɩra ɩra.»
42011037	Baa Yesura sɩɛrɛn zuori, na Farɩzɩ̃ɛ khuo ʋɔ thonn u kha u thiye na yo ɗi ʋɔ khɛrɛ. Na Yesura lonn na hɩɗann ɗikhɛla ʋ.
42011038	Baa Farɩzɩ̃ɛ khuora yãan kha Yesura tɩsɩn u lesira mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ tɩsɩlɔmɩra kɩ tʋ hɩɗann ɗikhɛla ʋ waʔ, na bamʋŋa khonn u.
42011039	Na Adɛyɩra deɗ u kha: «Ken lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ɛ Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɩra bʋ: Ɩ̃ tɩsɩ wa kaŋɔʔɛ na tasawɛ kpɩ̃rawɛ doro, ŋa kpoloŋira ʋ ni, pi hĩin ma na zugbũruse na bɩ̃ɩmɛ thĩnye bɩɛ.
42011040	Ɩ̃ bʋ wa damuruyonse. Yekila liin gbɛ̃ɩgɩra, ʋɔ kpuola liin kpoloŋira tɩ̃ wa ba?
42011041	Mɩyɩra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ kaŋɔʔɩra na ɩ̃ tasaɓiyira za, ɩ̃ hã bʋɔmɛ nɩpɩra ɩ kɩ yɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ ɓa yɛ na hã ɩ̃.»
42011042	«Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ bɛgɛ. Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩn ma ki khon ɩ̃ nanhʋʋsɛ daasɩra bɩɛ yagara harɩ na sɩ mʋmʋsɩra bɩɛ, ŋa na pɩ kha ĩ le mɩtelenyenye kɩ khɔrɩ Yekire, ɩ̃ pha sɩɛ. Sɩɛ ĩ gbũu kha kãn na lʋgʋ le, kɩ tʋ le sʋɔra na sɩɛ.»
42011043	«Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ bɛgɛ. Naɗɩɛ na ɩ̃ nann yɩ̃nthʋʋgɩra ʋ, ĩ kene khon ma wʋɔrɛ hɩɗankhɛkɩ̃nyɩra. Na ɩ̃ hɩɗann nɩpɛ bɩɛ bĩŋinkhɛla za, ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wa kha nɩpɛ gbɩ̃nɛ ɩ̃ɛ na pɩ thɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ.
42011044	Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ bɛgɛ. Ɩ̃ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha luguɗuguse nɩpɛ yã waʔ. Nɩpɛ bɩɛ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ wa sɩ za, kɛɩ tʋ kha luguse i.»
42011045	Na Yekire sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndaa ʋɔ deɗ u kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, na mʋ sɩɛrɛn mɩra, mʋ tʋ kha mʋ kʋsan ma aa tɩ̃!»
42011046	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha: «Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ Yekire sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɩra bɛgɛ tɩ̃. Ĩ gboŋo wa nɩpɛ dagbolonnunuse, ĩ gbũu bɩ arɩga legemire tikpo thĩra na dɛnfɛ wɩ pi gbon si waʔ.»
42011047	«Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ bɛgɛ. Ɩ̃ maɗɛ wa lugudankɩ̃nsɛ kɩ hã Yekire yãdedɛwɩra, bɩɛ yãdedɛwɩra ĩ sekhãgawɩra khʋʋrɩ.
42011048	Sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha ɩ̃ khɔrɩn ma ĩ siiwira lelɔnbɩ̃ɩwɩra. Naɗɩɛ pɩ khʋʋn ma yãdedɛwɩra, na ɩ̃ɛ maɗɛ pi lugudanyɩra.
42011049	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na wʋɔmɛ dɛyɛ Yekila na deɗ kha: “Mɩ ɓa dãa yãdedɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna dãarawɛ na hã ɩ̃. Pɩ ɓa khʋ bʋɔ pɩ za kɩ vɛnɛ bʋɔra.”
42011050	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, yãdedaa tʋɔ yãdedaa pɩ khʋʋrɩ, na khɛ bɛna dunuyara tiiri, Yekila ɓa bʋ̃ ɓa fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ nɩpɩra bɩɛ yãdedaawɩra bɩɛ khʋʋmɩra za.
42011051	Na gɔ kɩ Abɛlɩ huumira za na yo gbɩɛ Zakarɩ bɛwɩra ʋ, ʋɔ phɩlɩyamɔwɩɛ pɩ khʋʋn thɔgɔnsɛ sokhɛla dɩ̃ɩna Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋyɛgɛŋɩra sʋgʋmʋra za ɩra. Tɩ̃yara za, mi de ĩ wa sɩ, fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ nɩpɩra Yekila ɓa bʋ̃.»
42011052	«Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɛ bɛgɛ. Naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ sɔɗ ɓa tʋʋmɛ tʋ̃tʋ̃na ki khonn ti lakile ɓila. Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra lon waʔ. Wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ na lon bʋ, na ɩ̃ barɩn bɩɛ lomira tɩ̃.»
42011053	Baa Yesura kuɗ gɩɛ thʋʋgɩra za, na sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ donn u kɩ bʋ̃kɩ̃n ʋ na gbũu mɩyɩra thĩna bɩɛ za:
42011054	Pɩ kha gɩɗɛ ʋ wa na bʋ̃kɩ̃nsɛ u ɓu sɩɛrɛ ɓilen pɩ gɔ ʋ.
42012001	Dɩɛ bɛna, nɩpɛ na bĩŋinn ma gbaangbo harɩ na pɩ kɩ wɩ̃ɩgɩ̃n ma kamɛ ɗɩɛsɛ. Na Yesura nisĩnn sɩɛrɛn na ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira kha: «Ɩ̃ kɩ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ na Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ thãhɩ̃rɩwɛ̃ra, sɩɛ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha nʋʋnyɛ yɔ̃ yɔ̃ sɩɛrɛdɛwɛ ɩ.
42012002	Mɩyɩra bɩɛ i guureni, ɩ ɓa kure wa kʋwʋga ʋ, dɩ̃ɩna mɩɩnɛ bãa bʋ gũni za, tɩ ɓa kure wa gbɛ̃ɩgɛ za.
42012003	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɩnɛ bãa ĩ de dabirige za, tɩ ɓa nu wa khɩɛga dayɛsɩgɩra za. Dɩ̃ɩna mɩɩnɛ bãa ɩ̃ wɩɛsɩ̃n de numiye za thʋbakaraŋa za, sɩ ɓa kpaasɩ̃n ma zaŋa thaaga ʋ.»
42012004	«Mi de ĩ wa sɩ mɩ yɛsɛwɛ: Hã ɩ̃ ãn wɛpɩɛ kɩ khʋʋrɛ gbɔɗa dola waʔ, sɩ kpɩ̃ra za pɩ wɔrɩ le mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ dʋ̃waʔ.
42012005	Mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ dɛyɩra ɩ̃ kãn na ãn ɩra: Ɩ̃ ãn Yekire, naɗɩɛ huume kpɩ̃ra za, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ na wɔrɩ hĩn ĩ zahanama naagɩra za. Iyo, mi de ĩ wa sɩ, ʋɔ ɩ̃ kãn na ãn!»
42012006	«Pi ɗoŋin wurutɩtɩɩʔɛ ɩwãa tamaʔɛ yɔ̃ wa ba? Ɩ̃ɛ heke ɩ kɩ̃ra foi waʔ. Kɛna Yekila gbũu pha harɩ tikpo waʔ.
42012007	Yekila tʋ wa ĩ thayĩinse bɩɛ nʋʋna. Hã ɩ̃ ãn waʔ: Ɩ̃ɛ bãa ɩɛ wuruʔɩɛ za.»
42012008	«Mi de ĩ wa sɩ: Wɩɛ bãa ki de nɩpɛ kha ʋɔ bʋ wa mɩɛ karɩ̃nɓiye, mɩɛ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira, mɩ ɓa de si wa Yekila mɛlɛgɛwɛ wʋɔla za tɩ̃ kha ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa mɩɛ baa tɩ̃.
42012009	Ŋa wɩɛ bãa kɩ ɓɔgɔ sɩ kha ʋɔ tʋ mɩɛ waʔ, mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ sɩ wa tɩ̃ Yekila mɛlɛgɛwɩra wʋɔla ʋ kha mɩɛ tʋ ʋ waʔ.
42012010	Nɩra wɛ bãa deɗ Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira sɩɛrɛbɩ̃ɩnɛ, tɩ ɓa yafa ʋ za. Ŋa nɩra wɛ bãa kɩ ɓa kʋsa Yekila Nina, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu yafa waʔ.»
42012011	«Na pɩ ɓa yuon ĩ kiti khɛrɛ Yekila yɩ̃nthʋʋsɛ za, warɩma nɩgbʋ̃ɔmɛ heke, hã ɩ̃ dʋ̃nɛ mɩɩna ɩ̃ ɓa de na zɩ̃n ĩ thĩ waʔ,
42012012	naɗɩɛ Yekila Nina ɓa ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ wa mɩɩna ɩ̃ kãn na de dɩɛ bɛna ɩra.»
42012013	Na nɩra ʋɔ deɗ Yesura nɩgbokira za kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, de mɩɛ marɩkhuora kha ʋ yɩɛ a kpɩkɩ̃n a siira ɓudagɩra ʋ yɩɛn hãan a ɩra.»
42012014	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Wɛɩ, ãna yiin mɩɛ kha mɩɛ le ɩ̃ sɩɛrɛɗidaa, warɩma kha mɩɛ ki le ĩ ɓudaga kpɩkɩ̃ndaara?»
42012015	Sɩɛ tann na Yesura deɗ nɩpɩra kha: «Ɩ̃ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ na ɓudaɓɩɛgbʋ̃ɔŋɩra. Naɗɩɛ harɩ ɓudaga gɔn nɩra heke mʋsɛ, sɩɛ wɔrɩ yɩɛ u ɓu thakuogo waʔ.»
42012016	Na ʋ zɩɛn mɩ sɔkɩɛ kha: «Ɓudakhuo ʋɔ kha bʋ na hʋʋsɛ na sɩ kɩ̃ran na u ɓuun ɗiise gbaangbo.
42012017	Na ʋ kɩ gaga kɩ bʋ̃ u thĩ kha: “Bɩra mɩɛ thĩra le ɩra? Yiikhɛyɛ bʋ mi heke na yii mi ɗiisira bɩɛ waʔ.”
42012018	Na u deɗ u thĩ kha: “Ken wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓa le ɩra: Mi kii wa mi gborisira na maɗɛ kpakpasɛ. Fɩra mɩ ɓa yii mi ɗiisira na mɩ daasɛ sʋɔra bɩɛ.
42012019	Sɩɛ liin mi de mi thĩ kha: Wɛɩra, mʋ bʋ wa na ɗɩɩgɔnsɛ ɓudaga gbaangbo. Hɩɗan gbaarɩ na ɗi, na yɔ̃ dɩ̃ɩna na yãgayãga.”
42012020	Ŋa na Yekila deɗ u kha: “Damuruyoŋo! Mʋ ɓa hu wa fɩ̃ɩ dawogɩɛ. Dɩɛ bɛna wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ mu bĩŋinni, ãna kɩ ɓa khɛ sɩ?”»
42012021	Na Yesura deɗ kha: «Nɩra wɛ bãa kɩ ɓɩɛ ɓudaga kɩ hã u thĩ kɩ pha wɛsɩɛ kɩ gbɩ̃ra Yekila wʋɔla ʋ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa bʋɔmɛ nɩra Yekila wʋɔla ʋ. Ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa le wa mʋ gaga kha wɛɩ wɩɛ bɛsɩra siira.»
42012022	Na Yesura deɗ karɩ̃nɓiiwira tɩ̃ kha: «Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mi de ĩ kha hã ɩ̃ dʋ̃nɛ kha bɩra ɩ̃ɛ ɓa ɗi na ko waʔ, warɩma ɩ̃ɛ ɓa ɓu dayiinse na nɩnɛ waʔ.
42012023	Naɗɩɛ thakuogo kɩ bʋ thaaga na tãra ɗimɩɩna, dɩ̃ɩna gbɔɗɛ kɩ bʋ thaaga na tãra dayiinse.
42012024	Ĩ ken gãagãasɩra, sɩ tʋɔgɔ waʔ, sɩ kpɛwɩ waʔ, si gbũu bʋ na gborogo waʔ, ŋa Yekila ki ɓeɗe si. Ɩ̃ɛ bãa bɩɛ wurupira za wa ba?
42012025	Ãna ɩ̃ɛ yãan ɩ̃ za kha dʋ̃nɛsɛ yɩɛn na ʋ sɩɛn dʋɔ ʋ thakuogira za?
42012026	Na ɩ̃ wɔrɩ le dɩɛ mɩtɩtɩɩɗɩɛ waʔ, na bena ɩ̃ hɩɗan kɩ dʋ̃n yʋɔra.
42012027	Ĩ ken gbaŋa wũugo fɩ̃ɩrɛ kɩ̃ra lɔmɩra, kɛna ki liige waʔ. Kɩ lʋɗɛ phuru na le lowire na nɩnɛ waʔ. Kɛna ɩtakhuo Salomɔ̃, ʋɔ na u ɓudagɩra bɩɛ, u ɓuun dayiinkɩ̃rɩsɛ mʋ gaga kha dafɩ̃ɩbɩɛ bʋɔ waʔ.
42012028	Na Yekila bɩ na gbɛkɩ̃n wũugira kɩ bʋ gbaŋɩra ʋ mafɩra, fɩ̃ɩra kɩ bʋ, ŋa dɩ̃ɩ, naaga kɩ ɓa so ki. Dʋ̃nɛsɛ bʋ sɩɛ za waʔ, Yekila ɓa nɩnɛ ɩ̃ wa kɛ, ɩ̃ khãamɩra zen dɛ.
42012029	Hã ɩ̃ kɩ dʋ̃nɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ kɩ asɩ ɩ̃ gagasɛ kha bɩra ɩ̃ɛ ɓa ɗi, warɩma kha bɩra ɩ̃ɛ ɓa yɔ̃.
42012030	Dunuya wɩɛ nɩpɩra kɩ khãa Yekila za waʔ, bɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ ɩɛ mɩyɩra thĩna kɛɩ gbaa. Ŋa ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa na Siye kɩ tʋ mɩyɩra za ɩ̃ vɛn ɩra.
42012031	Ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra zo, sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za Yekila ɓa hã ɩ̃ ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ na sɩɛ.»
42012032	Sɩɛ tann na Yesura deɗ ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira tɩ̃ kha: «Hã ɩ̃ ãn waʔ, mɩ nɩgboɗe, naɗɩɛ sɩ nʋʋn ma ĩ Siira na ʋ hã ɩ̃ ʋ ɩɩgɩra.
42012033	Ĩ ɗoŋin ĩ ɓudamɩyɩra na khɛ i tigiyira na kpɩkɩ̃n hã bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ ɩ. Ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wa ɓudagɩra kɩ bʋ Yekila khɛrɛ zaara. Gɩɛ ɓudagɩɛ tʋ zuome waʔ, ki gbũu asɩ waʔ. Zugbũruwe nan ni waʔ, ɗuruwe gbũu asɩ gɩ waʔ.
42012034	Naɗɩɛ khaala ĩ ɓudagɩra ɓa hɩɗan, fɩra ɩ̃ gagasɩra ɓa hɩɗan kũu.»
42012035	«Ɩ̃ ɔfɔ ĩ thĩ na tiyesĩn miliinsira kãma kɩ ɗɩɛrɛ zɩɛ ɩ̃ lamawɩra.
42012036	Ɩ̃ hɩɗan ma ko na tɩɛgɛ mʋ gaga kha miliinɓiibɛ kɩ tɩɛ pɩ thadɛyɛ kɩ ɓa kure kɔ̃yɔsɛ khaarɛ ʋ na ɓan. Bɛnɛ bãa ʋ ɓa khɩɗɛ tʋ̃tʋ̃na, pɩ ɗɛ phii zɩɛ rɩ.
42012037	Na thadɛyɩra ɓa ɓuun miliinɓiibɛ kɩ bʋ ko, na pɩ hʋ̃nn phaan kũu waʔ, bɩɛ miliinɓiiwira ɓa hɩɗan bãanwuoŋo za. Mi de ĩ wa sɩ naɗɩɛ tɩ̃yara za, thadɛyɩra thĩra ɓa tiyesĩn ma u thĩ na yɩ bɩɛ miliinɓiiwira na tii wi ɗimɩɩnɛ.
42012038	Harɩ na thadɛyɩra ɓann ma bakhãka ba, zĩnkhuo fʋʋbɛnɛ ɩ ba, miliinɓiibɛ ʋ ɓan ɓuun ko, bɩɛ ɓa hɩɗan bãanwuoŋo za.»
42012039	«Ĩ nuure wɛsɩɛ kɩ̃raŋɩra: Na thʋdɛyɩra kha tʋ wa bɛna zugbũrora kha kãn na ɓan, ʋ naa ɓa yɩɛ ʋ u lon thʋʋgɩra ʋ waʔ.
42012040	Mafɩra tɩ̃, ɩ̃ ɔfɔ ĩ thĩ na hɩɗan, naɗɩɛ Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira ɓa ɓan ma bɛnɛ bãa ɩ̃ gaga ʋ waʔ.»
42012041	Na Pɩɛrɩ bʋ̃ɗ kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, aa kpora mʋ hãan gɩɛ sɔkɩɛ baa, warɩma nɩpɩra bɩɛ ɩ?»
42012042	Na Adɛyɩra Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha: «Miliinɓiye ʋ̃na telenn na ʋ bʋ na wʋɔmɛ? Ken ʋɔ, wɩɛ ʋ thadɛyɩra ɓa hã ʋ thʋʋgɩra kha u ki ken ŋi, kɩ yɩɛ ʋ kɩ hã miliinɓiiwe bʋɔra ɗiime bɛnɛ bãa pɩ kãn ɗi ɩra.
42012043	Na ʋ thadɛyɩra ɓa gbũun ɓuur u na u yiwire sɛ̃ɩn miliinsira za, bãanwuoŋo le ʋ bɛgɛ!
42012044	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ tɩ̃yara za kha: Ʋɔ thadɛyɩra ɓa khɛ wa u leke mɩyɩra bɩɛ na yii i u leke za.
42012045	Ŋa na miliinɓiira de ɓa u thĩ za kha: Mɩɛ thadɛyɩra lɛɩn ma kɛɩ ɓan, na ʋ khɩkɩ̃n miliinɓiiwe bʋɔra, na u ɗi na ʋ yɔ̃ na u denderi,
42012046	ʋ thadɛyɩra ɓa ɓan ma na ɓa barɩ ʋ za ɗɩyãgɩra ʋ kha tɩɛ ʋ waʔ ɩra, dɩ̃ɩna bɛnɛ bãa ʋ kha tʋ waʔ. Dɩɛ bɛna ʋ thadɛyɩra ɓa vɛnɛ ʋ wa gbaangbo kɩ dɩkɩ̃n ʋɔ na Yekire kɛɩkhãadɛwɛ kamɛ za.
42012047	Miliinɓiye wɛ kɩ tʋ mɩɩna ʋ thadɛyɩra ɓɩɛ, kɛna ʋ bɩ na le ri waʔ, ʋɔ ɓa ɓu wa gbʋ̃ʋgɔngɔnsɛ.
42012048	Ŋa na miliinɓiye wɛ bãa kɩ tʋ mɩɩnɛ ʋ thadɛyɩra ɓɩɛ waʔ, kɛna u liin mʋ gaga kha ʋɔra, na sɩ ɓa nann gbʋ̃ʋsɛ, ʋɔ ɓa ɓu wa gbʋ̃ʋsɛ kɩrɩ. Pɩ hãan mʋɔ wɩɛ bãa gbaangbo, pɩ ɓa bʋ̃ ɓʋ wa gbaangbo. Pɩ karɩfan mʋɔ wɩɛ mɩɩnɛ gbaangbo, pɩ ɓa bʋ̃ ɓʋ wa gbaangbo tɩ̃.»
42012049	«Mɩɛ ɓan yiin ma naaga fɔlɔŋɩra za. Mi gbũu kha ɓɩɛ wa kha bãnɩ kɩ na ɗɩɛn ma zuori!
42012050	Ŋa mɩɛ kãn ma na vɛn gbaangbo mʋ gaga kha baa pi yĩ nɩra ãmɛ za. Mɩɛ gbũu bʋ wa kpolongbʋ̃ʋga za fɔ si yo le zuo.
42012051	Ɩ̃ gaga wa kha mɩɛ ɓann ma na wɔyĩke fɔlɔŋɩra za ba? Ɩya, mi de ĩ wa sɩ, kpɩkɩ̃nsɛ mɩɛ ɓann sɩ.
42012052	Naɗɩɛ na khɛ ɩra wɩɛ, gorigo kpo nɩpɛ pɩwãa ɓa kpɩkɩ̃n mɩɛ yɩsɩgɩra kãma. Nɩpɛ sãa ɓa arɩ nɩpɛ yɔ̃ za. Nɩpɛ yɔ̃ ɓa arɩ nɩpɛ sãa za.
42012053	Siye ɓa arɩ u ɓikhiye za, ɓikhiira arɩ u siye za. Yaa ɓa arɩ u ɓihɛyɛ za, ɓihɛyɩra arɩ yaara za. Ɗaafɩ̃nhara ɓa arɩ ɗaafɩ̃nɓihɛyɛ za, ɗaafɩ̃nɓihɛyɩra ɓa arɩ ɗaafɩ̃nyaara za.»
42012054	Yesura kha de ɓa nɩgbokira tɩ̃ kha: «Na ɩ yãan na dadʋ̃nɩŋa alɩn adaga nigɛŋɛ, ĩ de ɓa kha adaga ɓa ɓan, mafɩra si gbũu le.
42012055	Na ĩ gbũun yãan na sarɩmɛ vu ki kure dagbʋ̃ʋnɛ sɩrɩgɩra ʋ, ĩ de ɓa kha dagbʋ̃ʋnɛ kɩ ɓa khʋ. Mafɩra si gbũu ɓa le.
42012056	Ɩ̃ɛ yɩsɩɓɩɛdɛrɩwɛ, mɩyɩra kɩ yã zaara na fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ kɩ tʋ ɩɛ kɔla. Na mɩyɩra ki le ɩra wɩɛ, bena ɩ̃ tʋ ɩɛ kɔrɔ wa?»
42012057	«Na bena ɩ̃ɛ thĩra gaga na tʋ lɔntelenyemira ɩ̃ kãn na le waʔ?
42012058	Sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha na mʋɔ na nɩra ɓuun sɩɛsɛ na ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ na yo si kamɛ ʋ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɛ khɛrɛ, mʋ pɛ̃ɩ na bɛn na ʋ dɛyɩra na ʋ nann ni thon waʔ. Sɩɛ le thaaga hã u ɓu yo yii mu kitidaara leke u, u yo yii mu polisiwe leke za bɩɛ yo yii mu kaso za waʔ.
42012059	Mi de ɓu wa sɩ, na mʋ taan mʋ mɩɩgɩra bɩɛ na zuon ŋi kũu waʔ, mʋ ɓa kure kasora za waʔ.»
42013001	Dɩɛ bɛna na nɩpɛ bʋɔ ɓan kpɔrɩn Yesura lɔmɩra za Pilatɩ na yɩɛn na pɩ khʋʋn Galile nɩpɛ bɛna pɩ kha khon thɔgɔnsɛ kɩ hã Yekila ɩra.
42013002	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Ĩ ken ma kha bɩɛ Galile nɩpɩɛ pɩ khʋʋn mɩra, kha sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha bɩɛ kha le mɩbɩ̃ɩkpakpaʔɩra kɩ tãra Galile nɩpɩra bʋɔra ba?
42013003	Ɩya, mi de ĩ wa sɩ, na ɩ̃ zɩɛn ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kɩ vɩkɩ̃nn ĩ kpolonsira kũu waʔ, ɩ̃ bɩɛ ɓa hu wa pere mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ tɩ̃.
42013004	Na u deɗ pi tɩ̃ kha: Silowe saŋabona waan nɩpɛ gbũne na wãnɩsãara za Zeruzalɛmʋra na khʋʋn mɩ, ĩ ken ma kha bɩɛ kha bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɩra na tãra Zeruzalɛmʋra nɩpɩra bɩɛ ba?
42013005	Ɩya, mi de ĩ wa sɩ, na ɩ̃ zɩɛn ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kɩ vɩkɩ̃nn ĩ kpolonsira kũu waʔ, ɩ̃ bɩɛ ɓa hu wa pere mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ tɩ̃.»
42013006	Sɩɛ tann na Yesura zɩɛn mɩ sɔkɔ gʋɔ kha: « Taanhaga kha bʋ wɛɩ ʋɔ duvɛ̃n hʋʋga za. Na u yuon ki ɓise ɓɩɛ khɛrɛ, ŋa u yo ɓuun foi bʋ waʔ.
42013007	Na u deɗ u miliindaara kha: “Ken, sɩ ɗɩɩsɛ sãara sɩɛ na mɩ ɓan kha mɩɛ ɓɩɛ taanhagɩɛ ɓise, mi gbũu ɓu foi bʋ waʔ. Kpii khon ŋi fɩ! Bena kɩ zɩ̃n khaala fɩ kpasa?”
42013008	Ŋa na u miliindaara zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: “Thadɛyɛ, yɩɛ gɩ fɩ̃ɩwɛ ɗɩɩgɩra tɩ̃, mɩ ɓa phene kɩ taana na yii nɔgɔ kɩ za.
42013009	Mʋ fatʋ wa goɗi kɩ ɓa sen ɓise. Na sɩɛ ɓa liin waʔ, mʋ yɩɛ a kpii khon ŋi fɩ.”»
42013010	Yawutuwe gbaarɩyawʋga gʋɔ ɗɩyãga, Yesura kha karɩ̃n ma nɩpɛ Yawutuwe bĩŋinthʋʋga gʋɔ za.
42013011	Haɓoɗo ʋɔ kha bʋ fɩ. Gĩrin ʋɔ na gɔɗ biɗ u, ʋ kha wɔrɩ arɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ na telen waʔ, na ɓuun ɗɩɩsɛ gbũne na wãnɩsãa.
42013012	Baa Yesura yãan ʋɔ hara wɩɛ, na ʋ yɩɗ ʋ na deɗ u kha: «Mʋ vɔrɩn khonn ma mu ɓosira za ɩra.»
42013013	Na ʋ ɗʋkɩ̃nn u lesira ʋ za, khaala za fɩ na ʋ ɗɛ telenn na ʋ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila.
42013014	Ŋa yɩ̃nthʋʋga wʋɔrɛ nɩrara na donn ma, naɗɩɛ baa Yesura na bãarɛn hala Yawutuwe gbaarɩyawʋgɩra za ɩra. Na u deɗ nɩgbokira kha: «Khɩɛwɛ wãnɩkpo kɩ bʋ, bɩɛ za bɩɛ kãn na liige. Ɩ̃ ɓan na ɓɩɛ bãamɩra bɩɛ khɩɛbɩra za, bʋɔtɛ gbaarɩyawʋgɩra ɩ waʔ dɛ.»
42013015	Na Thadɛyɩra zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ na daɓiyɩɛ kha: «Ɩ̃ bʋ wa yɩsɩɓɩɛdɛwɛ. Gbaarɩyawʋgɩra za, ɩ̃ bɩɛ le vɔrɩ ɩ̃ naa, warɩma ɩ̃ kãŋun pɩ hʋ̃nkhɛyɩra za na yo yʋ̃ɔrɛ ʋ waʔ ba?
42013016	Na hara wɩɛ liin Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiye ʋɔ, wɩɛra Sutana na vɔɗ ɗɩɩsɛ gbũne na wãnɩsãa, ʋ kha kãn na vɔrɩkhome gbaarɩyawʋgɩra za waʔ ba?»
42013017	Sɩɛ zɩ̃ŋɩnsɩɛ Yesura hãan mɩ na nɩɩsɛ gɔɗ ʋ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra bɩɛ. Ŋa nɩgbokira bɩɛ kha yãgayãga wa na mɩkpakpaʔɩra Yesura na liin ɩra.
42013018	Na Yesura deɗ kha: «Bɩra Yekila ɩɩgɩra khɩɛgɩ̃nn ŋɩ. Bɩra ʋɔ wɔrɩ makɩ̃n ŋɩ.
42013019	Kɩ khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na ɗitʋɔɓire pɩ kʋ̃n kha mutarɩdɩ. Dɩɛ ɓire wɛɩ ʋɔ khɩɛn na tʋɔn ʋ nanhʋʋga za. Na ti fĩin na khãɗ na liin dahaga na wurupe seken sewuse ki ɗesira za.»
42013020	Na Yesura deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Bɩra mɩɩnɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ makɩ̃n na Yekila ɩɩgɩra?
42013021	Kɩ khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma mʋ gaga kha baa hara khɛ thãhɩ̃rɩwɛ̃ na yii muugɔmɛ za ʋ lʋɔrɛ ɓʋɔgɩra bɩɛ.»
42013022	Yesura kha tãra wa gbonse na gbongbʋ̃ɔnsɛ kɩ karɩ̃n nɩpɛ na u yo Zeruzalɛmʋ gɛŋɛ.
42013023	Na nɩra ʋɔ bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, wɛpɛ kɩ ɓa ɓu zɩ̃mɛ, bɩɛ gɔn waʔ kɛ?» Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha:
42013024	«Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na lon na nʋʋtɩtɩɩɗa, naɗɩɛ mi de ĩ wa sɩ, gɔmɛ ɓa ɓɩɛ na lon Yekila ɩɩgɩra ʋ, pi gbũu ɓa wɔrɩ lon bʋ waʔ.
42013025	Naɗɩɛ bɛna thʋdɛyɩra ɓa arɩ na baka tʋ̃tʋ̃na na sɔɗ tɩ, ɩ̃ ɓa ɓu ĩ thĩ gbɛ̃ɩgɛ za. Ɩ̃ ɓa kɩ kɔkɔ tʋ̃tʋ̃na ki de kha: “Karɩ̃ndaa, phii tʋ̃tʋ̃na a lon”. Dɩɛ bɛna ʋ ɓa zɩ̃ŋɩn ɩ̃ kha: “Mɩ tʋ ĩ kure khɛrɛ waʔ!”
42013026	Dɩɛ bɛna, ɩ̃ ɓa de u kha: “A ɗiin ma na yʋ̃ɔn dɩ̃ɩna mʋɔ kamɛ za, mʋ karɩ̃nn nɩpɛ a gboŋo khɩ̃nyɩra za.”
42013027	Ʋ ɓa gbũu de ĩ tɩ̃ kha: “Mɩ tʋ ĩ kure khɛrɛ waʔ. Ɩ̃ɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛrɩbɩɛ, ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋ kure mɩ lɔkɔ za!”
42013028	Bɛna ɩ̃ ɓa yã Abɩrahamʋra, na Ɩzakɩra, na Zakɔbʋra dɩ̃ɩna Yekila yãdedɛwɩra bɩɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra za kɛna ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa kʋwʋga ʋ, fɩra za ɩ̃ ɓa fʋʋ na ɩ̃ khʋɔ yɩgɩyɩra!
42013029	Nɩpɛ ɓa kure wa khɩɛkurogo na khɩɛwaga dɩ̃ɩna khɩɛbãnabirise yɔ̃ra bɩɛ na khɛ hɩɗankhɛrɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra za na ɗi.
42013030	Dɩɛ bɛna nɩphɩlɩyamɛ bʋɔ ɓa le lʋgʋbɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna lʋgʋbɛwɛ bʋɔ ɓa le nɩphɩlɩyamɛ.»
42013031	Dɩɛ bɛna na Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ bʋɔ zʋ̃ʋn nann Yesura na deɗ u kha: «Kure fɩ na yo gɔgɛŋɛ gʋɔ naɗɩɛ, Erɔdɩra bʋ ɓɩɛ wa na khʋ mʋ.»
42013032	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Ĩ yo de ʋɔ ɓorowɩɛ kha: “Mɩ ɗɛ ɓa gĩrime na mɩ bãarɛ ɓoɗipe fɩ̃ɩra na dɩ̃ɩ, khɩɛwɛ sãa ɗɩyãgɩra mɩ ɓa zuo mi miliinsira.”
42013033	Ŋa mɩ kãn ma ki yo na mɩ sɩrɩyuogira kũu fɩ̃ɩra na dɩ̃ɩ, dɩ̃ɩna godɩ̃ɩsɛ, naɗɩɛ Yekire yãdedaa kãn na khʋ gɔgɛŋɛ na Zeruzalɛmʋra ʋ waʔ.»
42013034	Na u deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Zeruzalɛmʋ nɩpɛ, Zeruzalɛmʋ nɩpɛ, ɩ̃ɛ kɩ khʋ Yekila yãdedɛwɩra na ĩ hĩŋin kɩ khʋ wɛpɩɛ Yekila dãan hãar ɩ̃ na bʋrʋyɛ. Bãnɩ mʋsɛ mɩ kha ɓɩɛ na bĩŋin ĩ mɩɛ thĩ lɔkɩra ʋ mʋ gaga kha baa zĩnyaaga bĩŋin u ɓiiwe na si pi ɩra, ŋa ɩ̃ bɩɩn waʔ.
42013035	Si liin mafɩra Yekila ɓa khon ma leke ĩ gboŋira za. Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, ɩ̃ ɓa yã mɩ dʋ̃waʔ ɓanu kha bɛna dʋɔ ɓa nannɩ, ɩ̃ kʋ̃n kha Adɛyɩra Yekila kɩ̃ra wɩɛra kɩ ɓan ʋ yɩsɩgɩra za mɩra.»
42014001	Yawutuwe gbaarɩyawʋga ɗɩyãga gʋɔ na Yesura yuon Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra ʋɔ heke ɗikhɛrɛ. Wɛpɩɛ kha bʋ fɩ, pɩ kha kɔrɩsɩ̃n ma Yesura.
42014002	Sɩɛ makɩ̃nn ma na wɛɩ ʋɔ bʋ fɩ, ʋ kha bʋ wa na ɓolʋɔgɩ̃ransɛ. Na ʋ ɓa nɩ́ɩrɛ́n Yesura wʋɔla ʋ.
42014003	Na Yesura khɩɛn sɩɛsɩra na bʋ̃ɗ sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɩra na Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɩra kha: «Aa sɩɛrɛdewensira za, sɩ makɩ̃n a bãarɛ ɓoɗipe gbaarɩyawʋga za baa warɩma sɩ makɩ̃n waʔ?»
42014004	Ŋa pɩ kha ɓɩɛ na zɩ̃ŋɩn waʔ. Na Yesura phoɗ ɓoɗora za, na bãarɛn ʋ kɩ yɩɛr ʋ na ʋ tannɩ.
42014005	Sɩɛ tann na u deɗ kɔrɩsɩ̃ndɛwɩra kha: «Na ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ bʋ na ɓikhiye, warɩma naa, na ʋ waan kɔlɔn za, harɩ na gbaarɩyawʋga ɩ, ʋ dɛyɩra ɓa yo yan khon u fɩ wa ba?»
42014006	Pɩ wɔrɩn zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ sɩɛ za waʔ.
42014007	Nɩpɩra pɩ na thonni, Yesura kɔrɩsɩ̃n yãan ma kha pi ken ki khon ma hɩɗankhɛkɩ̃nyɩra. Na ʋ zɩɛn pɩ bɩɛ sɔkɩɛ kha:
42014008	«Na nɩra thonn mu kɔ̃yɔsiɗigboko za, hã mu nisĩn yo hɩɗan kharɩkpakpaɗa ʋ waʔ. Mʋ fatʋ wa pi thonn ma nɩkpakpawa ʋɔ na ʋ tãra mʋɔ,
42014009	dɛyɩra thonn ɩ̃ɛ bɩɛ, ʋɔ ɓa le de ɓu kha: “Arɩ hã wɛɩ wɩɛ hɩɗankhɛdɩɛ.” Dɩɛ bɛna mʋ ɓa arɩ wa na nɩɩsɛ na yo hɩɗan pɩ bɩɛ kpɩ̃rara za.
42014010	Na pi thonn mu, mu yo hɩɗan ma hɩɗankhɛphɩlɩyana za. Dɩɛ bɛna dɛyɩra thonn mu, u ɓu de ɓu kha: “Mɩ yɛsɛ, arɩ ɓan hɩɗan wʋɔla za.” Mafɩra si le wɔzagarɛ mʋ khɛrɛ nɩpɩra bɩɛ wʋɔla ʋ.
42014011	Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ bãa kɩ arɩga u thĩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa sũn ma. Dɩ̃ɩna wɩɛ bãa ki sũne u thĩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa arɩ.»
42014012	Na Yesura deɗ wɛɩra na thonn u kha: «Na mu liin ɗimɩkpakpaɗɛ na thon nɩpɛ, hã mu thon mʋ yɛsɛwɛ, mʋ yaɓiiwe, mu hũndɛwɛ na ɓudanɩpɛ waʔ, naɗɩɛ bɩɛ wɔrɩ thon mu wa tɩ̃. Dɩɛ bɛna wɛsɩɛ mʋ hãan mɩ, sɩɛ taasɩra pɩ hãan mʋ tɩ̃.
42014013	Ŋa na mu liin ɗimɩkpakpaɗɛ kha mu thon nɩpɛ, mu thon ma bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ, nɩdɩ̃ŋarɩmɛ dɩ̃ɩna ɗarɩpɛ.
42014014	Na mu liin sɩɛ, mʋ ɓa hɩɗan ma bãanwuoŋo za, naɗɩɛ pɩ ɓa wɔrɩ gbũure mu sɩ waʔ. Yekila ɓa taa mʋ sɩ bɛna mɩtelenye ledɛwɩra ɓa arɩ huumira za.»
42014015	Nɩpɩra na hɩɗann na Yesura ɗikhɛla ʋ, baa bɩɛ nuun sɩɛ, na ukpo deɗ Yesura kha: «Wɩɛ kɩ ɓa ɗi Yekila ɩɩgɩra za, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɛgɛ!»
42014016	Na Yesura zɩɛr ʋ sɔkɩɛ kha: «Wɛɩ ʋɔ na liin ɗimɩkpakpaɗɛ na thonn nɩgɔmɛ.
42014017	Baa ɗibɛna nannɩ, na ʋ dãan u miliinɓiira kha u yo de nɩthoromira kha: “Ɩ̃ ɓan, naɗɩɛ ɗiimira thuon ma.”
42014018	Na pɩ bɩɛ ɗɛ ki de ɓa kha bɩɛ wɔrɩ ɓu lese na yo waʔ. Lʋgʋbaara deɗ miliinɓiira kha: “Mɩɛ ɗonn ma hʋʋga, mi gbũu kãn ma na yo ken ŋi. Si liin mafɩra, kafara.”
42014019	Na ʋɔ deɗ u tɩ̃ kha: “Mɩɛ ɗonn ma nasʋ̃nɛrɩmɛ hɩɗankhɛyɛ ɩwãa, mi gbũu ɓɩɛ wa na yo sʋ̃nɛ ken mi. Mɩ yɩ̃n mʋ wa, kafara.”
42014020	Na ʋɔ deɗ u tɩ̃ kha: “Mɩɛ yiin ma hafɛ̃nwɛ ɩra mɩra, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ wɔrɩ yo ni waʔ.”
42014021	Na miliinɓiira vɩɗ gbũun ʋ thadɛyɩra khɛrɛ na yo hãar ʋ sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra. Na thadɛyɩra donn ki deɗ u miliinɓiira kha: “Yo vivi na ken gboŋo kpoloŋira hɩɗankhɛyɩra na khɩ̃nyɩra na khɛ bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ na nɩdɩ̃ŋarɩmɛ dɩ̃ɩna ɗarɩpɛ na ɓan mɩ.”
42014022	Dɔbɛnɛ dʋɔ na miliinɓiira vɩɗ ɓan deɗ kha: “Thadɛyɛ, mi liin wɛsɩɛ mu deɗ ɓi, ŋa hɩɗankhɛyɛ yʋɔ yɩɛn ma bere.”
42014023	Na thadɛyɩra deɗ u miliinɓiira kha: “Yo gbaŋa khɩ̃nyɩra ʋ na yo karɩwa nɩpɛ ɓan mɩ pi lon na hĩɗe mɩ thʋʋgɩra.
42014024	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ: Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ mɩ na thonni, ʋ ʋɔ sii ɓu na ɗi mɩ ɗimɩɩdɩɛ za waʔ.”»
42014025	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na Yesura ki yo sɩrɩga na nɩpɛ thuo u. Na ʋ vɩɗ dãan mɩ wʋɔrɛ na deɗ pi kha:
42014026	«Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ ɓɩɛ na thuo mɩɛ, ʋ kãn ma na khɔrɩ mɩɛ na tãra u siira, ʋ yaara, ʋ hala, u ɓiiwira, ʋ marɩkhuowira, ʋ mahapɩra na ʋ khɩ̃rɩwɩra dɩ̃ɩna ʋɔ thĩra. Bʋɔtɛ ʋ wɔrɩ le mɩɛ karɩ̃nɓiye waʔ.
42014027	Na nɩra wɛ bãa bɩɩn na hãan u thĩ, na bɩɩn vɛnsɩra ki ki thuo mi mʋ gaga kha nɩra wɛ bãa gbonn ʋ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra ki yo hukhɛrɛ waʔ, ʋ dɛyɩra wɔrɩ le mɩɛ karɩ̃nɓiye waʔ.
42014028	Ɩ̃ɛ za na wɩɛ bʋ ɓɩɛ na maɗɛ saŋabon, ʋ hɩɗan ma na thʋɗɛ tigiyira nʋʋna kɩ kãn na maɗɛ gɩ waʔ ba?
42014029	Bʋɔtɛ na u tiin kɩ taana, kɛna ʋ ɓa wɔrɩn zuon ŋi waʔ, nɩpɛ bɩɛ kɩ ɓa yã gɩ, pɩ ɓa kɩ man ʋ wa
42014030	ki de kha: “Wɛɩ wɩɛ tiin ʋ thʋʋgɩra, ŋa ʋ wɔrɩn zuon ki miliinsira waʔ!”
42014031	Warɩma, na ɩtakhuo bu yo khɛ̃ɩ na ʋ ɩtakhuo kãnʋʋna, ʋ hɩɗan ma zo na ken na ʋ wɔrɩ yo na khuowe kpɩɛwɛ pɩyɔ̃ na yo khɛ̃ɩ na ʋ ɩtakhuo kãnʋʋnara kɩ kpɩ̃rɩ ʋ na khuowe kpɩɛwɛ piyĩi waʔ baa?
42014032	Na ʋ tʋʋn kha ʋɔ ɓa wɔrɩ ʋ waʔ, ʋ dãa dãarawɛ ʋ ɩtakhuora ʋɔra heke khɔ̃ɩ na yɩ̃n ʋ pɩ gbaarɩ khɛ̃ɩgɩra.
42014033	Na Yesura deɗ kha mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃, na mʋɔ wɩɛ bʋ ɓɩɛ na le mɩɛ karɩ̃nɓiye, fɔ mʋ kɛɩ mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ mu heke bʋɔtɛ, mʋ wɔrɩ le mɩɛ karɩ̃nɓiye waʔ.»
42014034	«Zɔwʋgɔ bʋ wa mɩkɩ̃kɩ̃nɛ, ŋa na kɩ phʋ̃nphʋ̃mɩra zuon kɩ za, bɩra kɩ wɔrɩ phʋ̃nɛ gɩ tɩ̃?
42014035	Kɩ kɩ̃ra foi waʔ, harɩ na le nɔgɔ thĩra waʔ. Gɩɛ ban ma kʋwʋga ʋ. Na ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ na nuure, ĩ nuure kɩ̃raŋɩra!»
42015001	Lãmbo zɩ̃ndɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ na zʋ̃ʋn nann ma Yesura ki nuure u.
42015002	Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ na Yekire sɩɛrɛdewensira karɩ̃ndɛwɛ kha wũugĩn ma ki de Yesura mɩyɛ kha: «Wɛɩ wɩɛ gɔ ɓa mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ kɩ̃ra ki ki ɗi wi kamɛ ʋ.»
42015003	Na Yesura hãan mɩ sɔkɩɛ kha:
42015004	«Ɩ̃ɛ za, na nɩra ʋɔ bʋ na zãrawɛ tiiwãa, na ukpo ɓilenn u heke, ʋ ɓa zɩɛ zãrawɛ tigbeyĩi na gbũne na wãnɩyĩira ki yo mʋʋ ukpora ɓanu kha ʋ yãar ʋ waʔ ba?
42015005	Na u yo yãar ʋ, ʋ bãanɛ wuo, ʋ sakɩ̃n ʋ
42015006	na khũn u. Na ʋ nann gboŋira, ʋ yɩ ʋ yɛsɛwɛ na ʋ lɔkɔ nɩpɩra na de pi kha: “Ɩ̃ yãgayãga dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ naɗɩɛ mɩɛ yãan mɩ zãrana na ɓilen ɩra.”
42015007	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, sɩ bɩɛ kpuore. Na mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa ukpo zɩɛn ʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira na hãan u thĩ na Yekila, Yekila mɛlɛgɛwɛ hɩɗan ma bãanwuonkpakpaka za ʋɔ nɩra wɩɛ kpora kãma, na tãra nɩpɛ tigbeyĩi na gbũne na wãnɩyĩira ki ken pi thĩ nɩkɩ̃rɩwɛ kha bɩɛ hã pi thĩ na Yekila waʔ.»
42015008	Na Yesura deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Na hara ʋɔ bʋ na Deniyeʔe gbũne, na tikpo waan ɓilenn u heke, ʋ ɗɩɛrɛ fɩtanɩ na khɔfɩ thʋʋgɩra na mʋʋga rɩ yɛrɩtɛtɛ ɓanu kha ʋ yãan nɩ waʔ ba?
42015009	Na ʋ ɓa yãan nɩ, ʋ yɩ ɓa ʋ yɛsɛwɛ na ʋ lɔkɔ hapɩra ki de pi kha: “Ɩ̃ yãgayãga dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ naɗɩɛ mɩɛ yãan mɩɛ tigila na ɓilen ɩra.”
42015010	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃ na mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa ukpo zɩɛn ʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira na hãan u thĩ na Yekila, bãanwuoŋo hɩɗan ma Yekila mɛlɛgɛwɩra za.»
42015011	Na Yesura deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Wɛɩ ʋɔ kha bʋ na ɓikhiiwe pɩyɔ̃.
42015012	Na khɩ̃nɩyɛra deɗ u siira kha: “Mɩɛ siye, hã mɩɛ na mɩɛ niina kɩ kãn na nan mɩɛ a ɓudagɩra za ɩra.” Na siira kpɩkɩ̃nn u leke mɩyɩra na u ɓikhiiwe yɔ̃ra.
42015013	Khɩɛwɛ bʋɔ tannɩ, na ɓikhiye tɩtɩyara khɩɛn u ɓudagɩra na ɗoŋinn ŋi kɩ khɩɛn u tigiyira na yuon sɩrɩlegeŋe gʋɔ za. Baa ʋ nann ni na u diin kakarɩlege za na asɩn mɩyɩra bɩɛ kha bʋ u lekira za.
42015014	Baa u ɗiin ɩ bɩɛ zuori, na khʋ̃mʋgbʋ̃ɔŋɔ gʋɔ waan gɩɛ sɩrɩgɩra za, na u leke mɩyɩra bʋ kpɩ kɩ ɓan.
42015015	Na u yo ɓɩɛn miliinse gɩɛ sɩrɩgɩɛ wɛɩ ʋɔ heke. Na ʋɔ yuor u ʋ hʋʋsɛ za, na yo yiir u ʋ dɔrɔbɔ̃nsɛ kaamɛ za.
42015016	Na ʋ na ɓuun ɗiiresira dɔrɔbɔ̃mɩra kha ɗiire, u ɗi si wa. Ŋa nɩra sii kha hã ʋ sɩ waʔ.
42015017	Na ʋ hɩɗann na gagan kenn ʋ hɩɗanlɔmɩra ki deɗ kha: “Mɩɛ siira miliinɓiiwira bɩɛ ɗi wa na kpũn sʋɔra, kɛna mɩɛ bʋ fara ki hu khʋ̃mʋŋa!
42015018	Mɩɛ vɩ gbũu wa mɩɛ siira heke na yo de u kha: Mɩɛ siye, mɩɛ liin ma mɩbɩ̃yɛ Yekila dɩ̃ɩna mʋɔ za,
42015019	mɩɛ kãn thĩra mu ken mɩɛ mʋ gaga kha mu ɓikhiye dʋ̃waʔ, le wa mɩɛ mʋ gaga kha mu miliinɓiiwira ʋɔ.”
42015020	Na ʋ alɩn na vɩɗ gbũun u siira heke. Baa u yo yĩmin gboŋira, na u siira kenn yãar ʋ legelege na ʋ makarɩ gɔɗ ʋ gbaangbo: Na u horon thukĩnn u na kpenn u kɩ̃raŋɩra.
42015021	Na ɓikhiira deɗ u kha: “Bʋba! Mɩɛ liin ma mɩbɩ̃yɛ Yekila dɩ̃ɩna mʋɔ za, mɩɛ kãn thĩra mu ken mɩɛ mʋ gaga kha mu ɓikhiye dʋ̃waʔ.”
42015022	Ŋa na siira deɗ u miliinɓiiwira kha: “Ɩ̃ khʋ̃ɔfɩ̃n yo khɛ gbɔgɔlɔ̃ngbʋ̃ɔkɩ̃rɩgɩra ɓan yii u gɩ. Ɩ̃ ɓan na legemikhɩ̃ɩɓire na sawʋlansɛ na yii u.
42015023	Ĩ ken nakhoɓorikira nʋɗ na gɔ khʋ gɩ, a le ɗiime na yãgayãga,
42015024	naɗɩɛ mɩɛ ɓikhiye wɩɛ na huun ma, u gbũun alɩn ma. Ʋ na ɓilenn ma na mi gbũun yãar ʋ.” Na pɩ gɔɗ yãgayãgamɩra.
42015025	Dɩɛ bɛna na ʋɔ wɛɩ wɩɛ ɓikhiye khãgara kha bʋ wa hʋʋga ʋ. Baa u yĩmin gbɛ̃ɩna ʋ vɩ gbũubɛna, na u nuun khɩɗɛsɛ na hagarɛ na sɩ kʋ̃n.
42015026	Na ʋ yɩɗ miliinɓiye ʋɔ na bʋ̃ɗ ʋ mɩyɩra ki le gbɛ̃ɩna ʋ ɩra.
42015027	Na miliinɓira zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: “Mʋ khɩ̃nɩyɛra ɓannɩ, na mu siira yɩɛn na pɩ gɔɗ khʋʋn nakhoɓorikira, naɗɩɛ ʋ yãan ma u ɓikhiira koroŋoron.”
42015028	Na ɓikhiye khãgara donn kɩ kɛɩn kha ʋɔ lon gbɛ̃ɩna ʋ dʋ̃waʔ. Na siira kuɗ na yuon ʋ yɩ̃nkhɛrɛ kha u lon gbɛ̃ɩna ʋ.
42015029	Ŋa na ɓikhiye khãgara zɩ̃ŋɩnn siira kha: “Ken, sɩ ɗɩɩsɛ sɩ mʋ sɩra na mi liige kɩ hã mʋ. Mɩ kɛɩn mʋ nʋʋga sɩɛsɛ yãan waʔ. Kɛna mʋ hãan mɩ harɩ kpɛɓiɗe thĩra na mɩ khʋʋn na yãgayãgan na mɩ yɛsɛwɛ kũu waʔ.
42015030	Ŋa baa mu ɓikhiye wɩɛ ɓannɩ, ʋɔ wɩɛra asɩn mu ɓudagɩra na zɛrɩhapɛ, ʋɔ kãma za na mʋ yɩɛn na pɩ khʋʋn nakhoɓorikira.”
42015031	Na siira deɗ u kha: “Mi ɓiye, mʋ bʋ wa na mɩɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ leke mɩyɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ bɛyɛ tɩ̃.
42015032	Ŋa a kha kãn ma na yãgayãga naɗɩɛ mʋ khɩ̃nɩyɛra na huun ma, na u gbũun alɩnɩ, ʋ na ɓilenn ma, na u gbũun yãarɩ.”»
42016001	Na Yesura deɗ ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira kha: «Ɓudakhuo ʋɔ kha bʋ na miliinɓiye na u ken u ɓudagɩra. Na nɩpɛ ɓa deɗ u kha u miliinɓiira bʋ asɩ wa u ɓudagɩra.
42016002	Na ʋ thadɛyɩra yɩɗ ʋ na deɗ u kha: “Bɩra mi nu mʋ mɩyɩra za mɩra. Ɓɔgɔ mɩ lɔmɩra za mu liigen yuon ɩra, naɗɩɛ mʋ ɓa wɔrɩ hɩɗan mɩɛ ɓudagɩra za dʋ̃waʔ.”
42016003	Baa miliinɓiira nuun sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra, na u deɗ u thĩ kha: “Mɩɛ thadɛyɩra ɓa khon ma mɩɛ u miliinsira za. Bɩra mɩ ɓa wɔrɩ le ɩra. Mɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ na yo sʋ̃nɛ waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna nɩɩsɛ gbũu bʋ wa mɩɛ za na yo yɩ̃n.
42016004	Ɔ̃hɔ̃ɔ, mɩ tʋʋn mɩɩna mɩ ɓa le ɩra nɩpɛ bɩ mɩ na mɩ thadɛyɩra ɓa ɗɛɗ kusen mi u miliinsira za.”
42016005	Sɩɛ za, nɩpɛ bãa na kpii mɩɩga ʋ thadɛyɩra khɛrɛ, na ʋ yɩɗ pɩ bɩɛ kpo kpo kpo. Na u deɗ lʋgʋbaara kha: “Mʋsɛ mʋ kãn na hã mɩ thadɛyɩra?”
42016006	Na ʋɔ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: “Nʋʋmɛ ɓentasɛ tiiwãa.” Na u deɗ u kha: “Ken mʋ mɩɩgɩra sɛwʋra. Hɩɗan vivi na sɛwɛ tigbeyɔ̃ na gbũne.”
42016007	Na u deɗ ʋɔra tɩ̃ kha: “Na mʋɔ do, mʋsɛ mʋɔ kãn ɓan ʋ?” Na ʋɔ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: “Ɗiibɔtɔsɛ tiiwãa.” Na u deɗ u kha: “Mʋ mɩɩgɩra sɛwʋra wɛ. Sɛwɛ tigbeyĩi.”
42016008	Miliinɓiira na ʋ kɛɩtelenyemira bɩɛ za, na ʋ thadɛyɩra gbɩ̃nɛn ʋ u kewime kãmara za. Tɩ̃yara za, dunuya wɩɛ nɩpɛ le wa kamɛ mɩyɛ na kewime na tãra Yekila tʋdɛwɩra.»
42016009	Na Yesura deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Mɩɛ ʋɔ de ĩ wa sɩ ɩ̃ khɛ ĩ dunuya wɩɛ ɓudagɩra na ɓɩɛ yɛsɛwɛ. Na ɓudagɩra ɓa zuori, Yekila bɩ ɩ̃ ʋ ɩɩgɩra ʋ kũu.
42016010	Nɩra wɛ bãa telenn mɩtɩtɩɩʔɛ za, u telen ma mɩkpakpaʔɛ za tɩ̃. Na nɩra wɛ bãa wãɗ mɩtɩtɩɩʔɛ za, ʋ wã ɓa mɩkpakpaʔɛ za tɩ̃.
42016011	Na ĩ telenn dunuya wɩɛ ɓudagɩra gɔlɔmɩra za waʔ, ãna kɩ ɓa karɩfa ɩ̃ ɓudakɩ̃kɩ̃rɩga.
42016012	Na ĩ liin sʋɔwɛ nɩpɛ bʋɔ ɓudasɛ za waʔ, wɛsɩɛ kɩ ɓa le ɩ̃ɛ thĩra bɛsɩra, ãna kɩ ɓa hã ɩ̃ sɩ.»
42016013	«Miliinɓiye wɔrɩ liige hã thadɛwɛ pɩyɔ̃ waʔ. Ʋ ɓa yãasɩ̃n ma lʋgʋbaara kɩ khɔrɩ yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra, warɩma ʋ maa lʋgʋbaara za kɩ kɛɩ yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra. Ɩ̃ wɔrɩ le Yekire ɗonron, ki gbũu le tigiye ɗonron waʔ.»
42016014	Baa Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ nuun sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra bɩɛ na pɩ kɩ lʋgʋtɩ̃n ma Yesura naɗɩɛ bɩɛ kha khɔrɩ wa tigiye.
42016015	Na Yesura deɗ pi kha: «Ĩ le wa ĩ thĩ nɩtelenyeme nɩpɛ wʋɔyɛ za, kɛna Yekila tʋ wa ĩ thĩminyira. Mɩɩna nɩpɛ ken mɩkpakpaɗa, Yekila yãasɩ̃n ma dɩɛ.»
42016016	«Sɩɛsɩra Yekila hãan Moyizira na ʋ yãdedɛwɩra, sɩɛ ɓɔɗ ɓa nɩpɛ na ɓan gbɩɛn bɛna Zãna kha yĩ nɩpɩra ãmɩra ʋ. Na khɛ dɩɛ bɛna, Yekila ɩɩgɩra sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɛ ɓɔgɔn ma, na nɩpɛ bɩɛ bʋ pɛ̃ɩ wa kha bɩɛ lon bʋ.
42016017	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, zaara na fɔlɔŋɩra tũrimira thɔ na tãra Yekila sɩɛrɛdewense daɓire tikpo tũrime.»
42016018	«Sɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha na khuo wɛ bãa zɩɛn ʋ hara kɩ khɩɛn ʋɔ kpasa na yiiri, ʋɔ dɛyɩra liin ma zɛrɩgɛ. Khuo wɛ bãa gbũun yiin hazɩɛmɔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra liin ma zɛrɩgɛ.»
42016019	Na Yesura deɗ kha: «Ɓudakhuo ʋɔ kha bʋ, ʋ kha yii wa dayiinkɩ̃rɩsɛ bãa ɗorise kha hʋgan. Bãanyɛ bɩɛ ʋ kha ɗi wa kɩ kɩ̃ra.
42016020	Bʋɔmɛ khuo ʋɔ kha bʋ fɩ na pɩ yɩ ʋ kha Lazarɩ, ʋɔ na hʋ̃nn ma u gorigira nʋʋna ʋ fɩ. Ʋ gbɔɗa bɩɛ na liin ma bãʔɛ.
42016021	Ɓudakhuora ɗiimira ʋ kha ɗi na bʋɔra sukĩn fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ, na wɛɩra na ɓuun bɩɛ u ɗi wa, ŋa ʋ kha ɓu wi waʔ. Dɩ̃ɩna ɓɛrɛ̃mɛ kha ɓan ki ɗeri ʋ bãʔɩra.
42016022	Na bʋɔmɛ khuora ɓa huuri, na mɛlɛgɛwɛ khɩɛn nina yuor u Abɩrahamʋra lɔkɩra ʋ. Na ɓudakhuora ɓa huun tɩ̃ na pɩ kasɩn ʋ.
42016023	Na ʋɔ nina yuon lahala naagɩra ʋ ni, na ʋ bʋ kɩ vɛn gbaangbo. Na ʋ arɩgan wʋɔrɛ na kenn yãan Abɩrahamʋra legelege na Lazarɩra hɩɗann ʋ lɔkɩra ʋ.
42016024	Na ʋ dʋɗ na deɗ kha: “A siye Abɩrahamʋ, makarɩ mɩɛ za. Dãa Lazarɩ u yo yĩ u legemithaaɗɛ ãmɛ za na ɓan wuore mɩ ɗɛlɛŋɛ, naɗɩɛ mɩ vɛn ma naagɩɛ za gbaangbo.”
42016025	Ŋa na Abɩrahamʋra deɗ kha: “Mi ɓiye, kʋɔgɩ̃n kha baa mʋ kha bʋ fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ, mʋ na ɓuun ma mʋ kɩ̃rɩgɩra bɩɛ zuori, na Lazarɩ ʋɔ na ɓuun ma vɛnsɛ gbaangbo. Ɩra wɩɛ fara, ʋɔ ɓuun ma dagamu, kɛna mʋɔ ʋɔ bʋ vɛn ma.
42016026	Harɩ na sɩɛ kha bʋ waʔ, dangbeleŋe kɩ bʋ aa na ɩ̃ɛ tɩɛ. Sɩɛ liin ma hã nɩra wɔrɩ kure fara na thiye ni waʔ, nɩra gbũu wɔrɩ kure ni na ɓan fara waʔ.”
42016027	Na ɓudakhuora deɗ kha: “A siye, mɩ yɩ̃n mʋ wa, dãa Lazarɩra mi siira gbɛ̃ɩna ʋ,
42016028	mɩ bʋ na khɩ̃rɩwɛ pɩwãa. U yo sarɩ pɩ za hã pɩ ɓa le ɓan fara naagɩɛ za tɩ̃ waʔ.”
42016029	Na Abɩrahamʋra zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha: “ Moyizi na Yekire yãdedɛwɛ sɩɛsɩra bʋ mʋ khɩ̃rɩwɩra khɛrɛ, pɩ kãn ma na nuure sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra.”
42016030	Na ɓudakhuora deɗ kha: “Ɩya, sɩɛ nan waʔ, siye Abɩrahamʋ, ŋa na nɩra kuɗ hukhãgawɩra za na yo yãan mɩ, pɩ ɓa zɩɛ pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kɩ vɩkɩ̃n pi kpolonsira.”
42016031	Ŋa na Abɩrahamʋra deɗ u kha: “Na pɩ ɓɩɛ na nuure Moyizi na Yekire yãdedɛwɩra sɩɛsɩra waʔ, harɩ na nɩra alɩn huumira za na yo sɩɛrɛn mɩ, pɩ ɓa khãa ʋ sɩɛsɩra za waʔ.”»
42017001	Na Yesura deɗ ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira kha: «Mɩyɩra ki yii nɩpɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za, ɩɛ wɔrɩ yɩɛ kɛɩ ɓan waʔ, ŋa dɛyɩra ki le ɩ thaagɩra, wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛgɛ.
42017002	Sɩ kha bãa ʋɔ dɛyɩra khɛrɛ pɩ vɔ ʋ na bʋrʋgbeleŋe khʋ̃mʋyɩra za na hĩn u lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ ʋ na tãra baa u boin hĩnn ɓiʔɩɛ dʋɔ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za.
42017003	Si liin mafɩra ɩ̃ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ kɩ̃raŋɩra.» «Na mʋ yaɓiye liin mu mɩbɩ̃yɛ, mu de u tɩ̃ya na gbɩ̃ra. Na ʋ yãan u ɓilensira, mʋ yafa ʋ za.
42017004	Na u liin mu wa mɩbɩ̃yɛ bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ khɩɛra kpora za, kɛna bɛnɛ tʋɔ bɛnɛ ʋ ɓan ki de ɓu kha: “Mi ɓilenni”, mʋ ɓa yafa ʋ za.»
42017005	Na Yesura dãarawɩra deɗ u kha: «Sɩɛ dʋɔ aa khãamɩra za.»
42017006	Na Adɛyɩra Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha: «Na ɩ̃ khãamɩra kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha mutarɩdɩ ɓire, ɩ̃ naa wɔrɩ de ɓa dahagɩɛ kha: “Phugi mu thĩ na yo ɓa lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra ʋ ni”, ki gbũu naa le si wa mafɩra.»
42017007	«Ĩ ken wɛsɩɛ: Na ɩ̃ ʋɔ bʋ na miliinɓiye na u le mɩyɛ bɩɛ, gʋɔ za ʋ sʋ̃nɛ, gʋɔ za ʋ kaa daɗuorowe. Na mʋ yãar ʋ na u kuɗ hʋʋga ʋ kɩ ɓan, mu de u wa kha: “Khʋɔfɩ̃n ɓan ɗi ba?”
42017008	Ɩya, ʋ ɓa de u wa kha: “Le mi ɗiime zo, sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra mʋ vɩkɩ̃n mʋ dayiinsira na khon ɗiime na hã mi ɗi na yɔ̃ zo. Na sɩɛ liiri, mʋ tʋ ɗi na yɔ̃.”
42017009	Thadɛyɩra ɓa bɩ na thɩɛ u miliinɓiira wɛsɩɛ u deɗ u na u liin hãar ʋ ba?
42017010	Mafɩra ɩ̃ɛ bɛsɩra bʋ tɩ̃, na ɩ̃ ɓa liin wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ pi deɗ ĩ, ɩ̃ kʋ̃n kha: “Aa bʋ wa miliinɓiiwe doro, aa liin ma wɛsɩɛ aa kha kãn na le ɩra.”»
42017011	Yesura kha bʋ wa kɩ tãra Galile na Samarɩ sɩrɩsɛ sʋgʋmʋra za baa ʋ kha yo Zeruzalɛmʋra.
42017012	Ʋ kha lon ma gbonɓire dʋɔ za, na legbũruwe gbũne ɓan thukĩnn u. Na pɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n legelege
42017013	kɩ sɔŋɔ kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa Yesu, makarɩ aa za.»
42017014	Baa Yesura kenn yãan mɩ na u deɗ pi kha: «Ĩ yo ɓɔgɔ ĩ thĩ na kperekpiidɛwɩra.» Baa pɩ kha bʋ khɩ̃na za ki yo, na pɩ ɗɛ bãarɩ.
42017015	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ za, baa pɩ ʋɔ yãan tʋʋn kha ʋɔ bãan ma, na ʋ vɩɗ gbũun Yesura khɛrɛ na ʋ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila gbaangbo.
42017016	Baa ʋ ɓan nann Yesura lɔkɩra ʋ, na ʋ ɓaɗ huruse Yesura wʋɔla ʋ, kɩ ɓaɗ wʋɔla fɔlɔŋɩra za na thɩɛr ʋ. Ʋɔ wɛɩ wɩɛ kha kure wa Samarɩ sɩrɩga ʋ.
42017017	Na Yesura deɗ kha: «Nɩpɛ gbũnera bɩɛ bãan ma wa ba? Na he gbũnekhona bʋɔra bɩɛ bʋ?
42017018	Pɩ ʋɔ sii ɓuun gagasɛ na vɩɗ ɓan thɩɛ Yekila waʔ, fɔ khɩ̃rɩkhuowɩɛ kpora?»
42017019	Sɩɛ tann na Yesura deɗ u kha: «Arɩ na yo, mʋ khãamɩra zɩ̃nn mʋ.»
42017020	Na Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ bʋ̃ɗ Yesura kha Yekila ɩɩgɩra kãn ɓan ma dʋ̃nɛ bɛnɛ. Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Yekila ɩɩgɩra ɓa ɓan mʋ gaga kha mɩɩnɛ nɩpɛ wɔrɩ ken yã waʔ.
42017021	Pɩ ɓa de kha: “Ken, ʋ bʋ fara”, warɩma “ʋ bʋ wa fuuni” waʔ. Ɩ̃ kãn ma na tʋ kha Yekila ɩɩgɩra bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ thĩra sʋgʋmʋra za.»
42017022	Sɩɛ tann na u deɗ ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira kha: «Bɛnɛ dʋɔ ɓa ɓan, ɩ̃ ɓa khɔrɩ wa na yã Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira harɩ ɗɩyãga kikpo kpeli, ŋa ɩ̃ ɓa yã ʋ waʔ.
42017023	Pɩ ɓa de ĩ wa kha: “Ĩ ken fuuni”. Warɩma “Ĩ ken fara.” Ŋa hã ĩ yo waʔ, hã ĩ gbũu thuo wi waʔ.
42017024	Naɗɩɛ lɔmɩra za adaga barɩ na yɩ̃ga na khɛ gɛŋɛ gʋɔra na yo gbɩɛ gɛŋɛ gʋɔra ʋ, mafɩra Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira ɓanɗɩyãgɩra ɓa le.
42017025	Ŋa ʋ kãn ma na vɛn gbaangbo zo, kɩ yɩɛ ɩra nɩpɩra kɛɩ ʋ.
42017026	Mɩyɩra na liin Nuhũ khɩɛra za, sɩɛ siira kɩ ɓa le Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira ɓankhɩɛra za.
42017027	Nɩpɛ kha ɗi wa na pɩ yɔ̃, na pɩ yanɛ na pi yii kamɛ na yo gbɩɛn ɗɩyãgɩra Nuhũna yo lonn batoŋira za. Na adagagbʋ̃ɔŋɩra ɓann na khʋʋn pɩ bɩɛ pere.
42017028	Sɩ ɓa le wa mʋ gaga kha Lɔtɩ khɩɛra tɩ̃, nɩpɛ kha ɗi wa na pɩ yɔ̃, na pi ɗon na pi ɗoŋin, na pɩ kãwɩ na pɩ maɗɛ.
42017029	Ŋa ɗɩyãgɩra Lɔtɩra kuɗ Sodɔmʋra, na adaga gĩriwi kuɗ zaara na naaga na tuun pɩ za na suon khʋʋn pɩ bɩɛ pere.
42017030	Mafɩra sɩ ɓa barɩ pɩ za ɗɩyãgɩra Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira ɓa ɓan ɩra.»
42017031	«Na gɩɛ ɗiyãgɩra ɓuun mʋɔ wɩɛ mʋ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ za, hã ʋ dɛyɩra ɓa de kha ʋɔ lon khɛ ʋɔ daasɛ thʋʋga ʋ waʔ. Na si ɓuun mu hʋʋga ʋ, hã mu de kha mʋɔ vɩ khũn waʔ.
42017032	Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ na nann Lɔtɩra hala!
42017033	Na wɩɛ bãa kɩ ɓɩɛ na kuore u thĩ thakuogira, ʋ ɓa la kɩ waʔ. Na wɩɛ kɩ ɓa la ʋ thakhuogira, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ ɓa ɓu thakuokɛɩzuoŋira.
42017034	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, gɩɛ ɗɩyãga dawogira, na nɩpɛ pɩyɔ̃ bʋ gbĩnɛ za, pɩ ɓa khɛ ukpora kɩ yɩɛ ukpora.
42017035	Na hapɛ pɩyɔ̃ bʋ nan muume kamɛ ʋ, pɩ ɓa khɛ ukpora kɩ yɩɛ ukpora.
42017036	[Na khuowe pɩyɔ̃ bʋ hʋʋga za: Pɩ ɓa khɛ ukpora kɩ yɩɛ ukpora.]»
42017037	Na karɩ̃nɓiiwira bʋ̃ɗ Yesura kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, he gɛŋɛ sɩɛ ɓa le?» Na ʋ zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Khaala kpɩ̃ɩgɩra ɓa hɩɗan, dɩɛ khaala za kpũmira ɓa bĩŋin.»
42018001	Na Yesura hãan mɩ sɔkɩɛ kha ʋɔ ɓɔgɔ pɩ kha pɩ kãn ma kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila bãanyɛ bɩɛ, hã pɩ yɩɛ pɩ gbɔʔɩra hu wi waʔ.
42018002	Na u deɗ pi kha: «Sɩɛrɛɗidaa ʋɔ kha bʋ gboŋo gʋɔ za, ʋ kha ãn Yekire waʔ, u gbũu nʋʋga kha bʋ nɩra sii za waʔ.
42018003	Hara ʋɔ kha bʋ gɩɛ gbonkpuogira za tɩ̃, u khuora na huun ma. Na gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ nɩra ʋɔ liin ʋɔ hara wɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛ yʋɔ. Hala kha yo wa ki de sɩɛrɛɗidaara kha: “Ken hã mɩɛ tɩ̃ya na mɩɛ kãnʋʋnara sʋgʋmʋra.”
42018004	Sɩ lɛɩn ma, sɩɛrɛɗidaara na kɛɩn ma. Kpɩ̃ra ʋ na ʋ ɓa deɗ u thĩ kha: “Iyo, mɩ ãn Yekire waʔ, mi gbũu nʋʋga bʋ nɩra sii za waʔ.
42018005	Ŋa baa thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃nhara wɩɛ ɓa kɩ vɛnɛ mɩ, mɩ ɓa ken hã ʋ na ʋ tɩ̃yara, bʋɔtɛ mɩ wʋɔrɛ ɓa yĩn waʔ.”»
42018006	Na Adɛyɩra Yesura deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Ĩ nuun wɛsɩɛ sɩɛrɛɗidabɩ̃yara deɗ ɩra waʔ?
42018007	Na Yekila, ʋɔ ɓa ken wɛpɛ u kenn khonn na pɩ fʋʋ ʋ wʋɔla khɩɛga na dawogɩra wa ba? Ʋ ɓa lɛɩ wa pɩ kɛɩdɛnfɛsɩra za ba?
42018008	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ: Yekila ɓa khʋ̃ɔfɩ̃n le hã wɩ wa mɩɩna za pɩ vɛn ɩra. Ŋa na Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira ɓa ɓannɩ, ʋ ɓa ɓu khãamɛ fɔlɔŋɩra za bere ba?»
42018009	Na Yesura zɩɛn sɔkɩɛ na hãan wɛpɩɛ kha ken pi thĩ nɩtelenyeme Yekila wʋɔla ʋ na pɩ bãarɛ pi thĩ bʋɔra za kha:
42018010	«Khuowe yɔ̃ na gann Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋga za kha bɩɛ yɩ̃n Yekire. Ʋɔra kha bʋ wa Farɩzɩ̃ɛ khuo, na ʋɔra bʋ Lãmbo zɩ̃ndaa.
42018011	Na Farɩzɩ̃ɛ khuora alɩn na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n, kɩ yɩ̃nn Yekila na deɗ kha: “Yekire, mɩ thɩɛ mʋ wa, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ bʋ mʋ gaga kha nɩpɛ bʋɔra waʔ, pɩ bʋ wa zugbũruwe, na nɩbɩ̃ɩwɛ na zɛrɩgɛledɛwɛ. Mɩ thɩɛ mʋ wa, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ bʋ mʋ gaga kha Lãmbo zɩ̃ndaa wɩɛ waʔ.
42018012	Mɩɛ yii wa sũn khɩɛwɛ yɔ̃ yawʋyĩna kpora za, ki khon mɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ yagara.”
42018013	Na Lãmbo zɩ̃ndaara ʋɔ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n kharɩlegene, ʋɔ kha ha arɩga ʋ wʋɔla zaa na ken waʔ. Ŋa ʋ na kʋ̃ŋɩnn ma lese ʋ bãanɛ za ki deɗ kha: “Ee, Yekire, makarɩ mɩɛ za, mɩɛ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa.”»
42018014	Na Yesura deɗ kha: «Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, ʋɔ wɛɩ wɩɛ na telenn ma Yekila wʋɔla za zuori, na ʋ vɩɗ khũnn. Ŋa Farɩzɩ̃ɛ khuora, ʋɔ vɩɗ khũnn ma na mɩbɩ̃yɛ. Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ bãa kɩ arɩga u thĩ ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa sũn ma, ŋa dɛyɩra ki sũne u thĩ, pɩ ɓa arɩga wa ʋɔ.»
42018015	Na nɩpɛ ɓann na ɓiiwe Yesura khɛrɛ kha ʋ ɗʋkɩ̃n lese pɩ za. Baa ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira yãan mɩ, na pɩ kpaŋɩ̃nn mɩ.
42018016	Ŋa na Yesura yɩɛn na ɓikɛrɩwɩra zʋ̃ʋn nann ʋ. Na u deɗ pi kha: «Ɩ̃ yɩɛ ɓiiwira ɓan mɩ khɛrɛ. Hã ɩ̃ barɩ pɩ waʔ, naɗɩɛ wɛpɛ kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ, Yekila ɩɩgɩra bʋ wa bɩɛ bɛgɛ.
42018017	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ tɩ̃yara, na wɩɛ bãa bɩɩn Yekila ɩɩgɩra mʋ gaga kha ɓiye lɔmɛ waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa wɔrɩ lon bʋ kũu waʔ.»
42018018	Yawutuwe wʋɔrɛ nɩra bʋ̃ɗ Yesura kha: «Karɩ̃ndakɩ̃ra, bɩra mɩɛ kãn le ki ɓu thakuokɛɩzuoŋira?»
42018019	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Bena mʋ yɩɗ ɓɩ nɩkɩ̃ra? Yekire kpo bʋɔtɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩkɩ̃ra bʋ waʔ.
42018020	Mʋ tʋ Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra: “Hã mu le zɛrɩgɛ waʔ, hã mʋ khʋ nɩra waʔ, hã mu zu waʔ, hã mʋ tɔn hã nɩra waʔ, gbɩ̃nɛ mu sii na mʋ yaa.”»
42018021	Na wɛɩra zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Mɩɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀n na sɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra harɩ mɩɛ ɓikɛrɩsɛ.»
42018022	Baa Yesura nuun sɩɛ na u deɗ u kha: «Mɩɩnɛ kpo kɩ kpɩ ɓʋ tɩ̃. Ɗoŋin mʋ daasɩra bɩɛ na khɛ i tigiyira na kpɩkɩ̃n hã bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ ɩ. Fɩra za mʋ ɓa ɓu ɓudaga zaara ni. Na mu liin sɩɛ, mʋ tʋ ɓan na thuo mi.»
42018023	Baa wɛɩra nuun sɩɛ, na ʋ kpãɗ ʋ wʋɔla naɗɩɛ ʋ kha bʋ wa na ɓudaga gbaangbo.
42018024	Baa Yesura yãan tʋʋn kha ʋ wʋɔla kpãɗ ɓa, na u deɗ u kha: «Sɩ gbɩ̃ra ɓudanɩpɛ heke pi lon Yekila ɩɩgɩra za.
42018025	Yɔ̃gɔ̃ma lon kure mɩsɩ̃nɩn danɛ za, sɩɛ thɔ na tãra baa ɓudanɩra lon Yekila ɩɩgɩra za.»
42018026	Wɛpɩɛ kha nuure u, na bɩɛ deɗ kha: «Na ãna kɩ wɔrɩ ɓu zɩ̃mɛ.»
42018027	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha: «Nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ wɔrɩ kuore pi thĩ waʔ, ŋa Yekire kɩ wɔrɩ kuore wi.»
42018028	Na Pɩɛrɩ deɗ kha: «Nuure, aa ʋɔ zɩɛn ma aa mɩyɩra bɩɛ ki thuo mu.»
42018029	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha: «Mi de ĩ wa sɩ tɩ̃yara za: Na nɩra wɛ bãa zɩɛn ʋ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ, ʋ hara, ʋ marɩkhuowe, ʋ khɩ̃rɩwɛ na u hũndɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna u ɓiiwe, Yekila ɩɩgɩra kãmara za,
42018030	ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu pi siira gbaangbo fara fɔlɔŋɩra za, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ ɓa ɓu thakuokɛɩzuoŋira Yekila heke dɩ̃ɩ.»
42018031	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na Yesura khɩɛn karɩ̃nɓiiwe gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ra na deɗ pi kha: «Ĩ nuure, a yo wa Zeruzalɛmʋra, mɩyɩra bɩɛ Yekila yãdedɛwɩra na deɗ na gbũun Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira gɛŋɩra, ɩra sɩ ɓa le.
42018032	Pɩ ɓa yii u thĩmaanyɛ leke u, bɩɛ ɓa lʋgʋtɩ̃n ʋ, na kʋsa ʋ ki su u sãasɛ.
42018033	Pɩ ɓa khɩ ʋ na dazʋwʋwʋɔyɛ kɩ tʋ khʋ ʋ. Ŋa u huume khɩɛwɛ sãara za, ʋ ɓa gbũu arɩ na kure huumira za.»
42018034	Ŋa karɩ̃nɓiiwira tʋʋn ʋ sɩɛsɩra kɔla waʔ. Pɩ kha tʋ mɩɩna Yesura kha de waʔ. Pɩ na yɛɗ sɩ za waʔ.
42018035	Baa Yesura na ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira yo yĩmin Zeriko gboŋira, ɗarɩkhuo ʋɔ na hɩɗann khɩ̃ngeŋira ʋ fɩ kɩ kɩ yɩ̃n.
42018036	Na u nuun nɩgbokira na kɩ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ kɩ ɓan, na ʋ bʋ̃ɗ kha bɩra ʋ.
42018037	Na pi deɗ u kha Nazarɛtɩ Yesu kɩ tãra.
42018038	Na ʋ dʋɗ na faŋa kha: «Yesu, Davidi kpɩ̃raɓiye, makarɩ mɩɛ za!»
42018039	Nɩpɩra kha bʋ ʋ wʋɔla ʋ, na bɩɛ sɔŋɔn ʋ za kha ʋ baka ʋ nʋʋgɩra. Ŋa na ʋ dʋɗ gbaangbo na tann khɔ̃ɩra kha: «Davidi kpɩ̃raɓiye, makarɩ mɩɛ za!»
42018040	Na Yesura nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ki deɗ kha pɩ ɓan ʋ. Baa ɗarɩkhuora nann ʋ, na Yesura bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha:
42018041	«Bɩra mʋ ɓɩɛ kha mi le hã mʋ?» Na ʋ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, phii zɩɛ mi yiwiyira mi gbũu yã.»
42018042	Na Yesura deɗ u kha: «Gbũu yã tɩ̃! Mʋ khãamɩra bãarɛn mʋ.»
42018043	Dɩɛ khaala za fɩ na ʋ ɗɛ kɩ yã, na ʋ khɩɛn ki thuo Yesura na ʋ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila. Baa nɩgbokira bɩɛ yãan sɩɛ na pɩ ɗɛ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ wa Yekila.
42019001	Baa Yesura lonn Zerikora zuori, na ʋ kɩ tãra gɩɛ gboŋira kpoloŋira ʋ.
42019002	Wɛɩ ʋɔ kha bʋ gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ za, pɩ kha yɩ ʋ wa kha Zase. Lãmbo zɩ̃ndɛwɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra kha bʋ ʋ, u gbũu kha bʋ wa na ɓudaga gbaangbo.
42019003	Zasera kha ɓɩɛ wa na yã dɛyɩra pɩ yɩ kha Yesura ɩra, ŋa baa ʋ kha kpewe, ʋ kha wɔrɩ yã ʋ waʔ, naɗɩɛ nɩgbokira kãma.
42019004	Na u horon yuon wʋɔla ʋ na yo gann dahaga gʋɔ za na ɓu yã Yesura naɗɩɛ ʋ kha kãn ma na tãra fɩ.
42019005	Baa Yesura nann dɩɛ khaala ʋ, na ʋ arɩgan thaaga na deɗ Zasera kha: «Zase, khʋ̃ɔfɩ̃n sũn, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ kãn ma na gĩi mu heke fɩ̃ɩra.»
42019006	Na Zasera phakɩ̃nn sũnn na khɩɛn Yesura yuor u ʋ khaala ʋ na bãanwuoŋo.
42019007	Baa nɩpɛ yãan sɩɛ, na pɩ bɩɛ ki de ɓa Yesura mɩyɛ kha wɛɩ wɩɛ yo gĩin ma mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa khɛrɛ.
42019008	Na Zasera alɩn nɩ́ɩrɛ́n Adɛyɛ Yesura wʋɔla ʋ na deɗ kha: «Nuure Karɩ̃ndaa, mɩɛ kpɩkɩ̃n ma mɩ ɓudagɩra khaayɛ yɔ̃ na hã bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ khaala dʋɔra. Na mɩɛ na zɩ̃nn ma wɩɛ bãa tigiye gbaangbo, mi gbũure u wa i siira khaayɛ iyĩi.»
42019009	Na Yesura deɗ u kha: «Fɩ̃ɩra, zɩ̃mɛ lonn ma thʋʋgɩɛ za, naɗɩɛ mʋ bʋ wa Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiye tɩ̃.
42019010	Naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ ɓilenni, Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira ɓann ma bɩɛ mʋʋga khɛrɛ na ɓu zɩ̃n mɩ.»
42019011	Na Yesura zɩɛn sɔkɔ gʋɔ na hãan wɛpɩɛ na nuun sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra naɗɩɛ baa pɩ kha bʋ Zeruzalɛmʋra lɔkɩra ʋ, na pɩ kɩ gaga kha Yekila ɩɩgɩra kha kãn ma na tii dɩɛ bɛna fɩ.
42019012	Na u deɗ kha: «Nɩgbʋ̃ɔmɔ ʋɔ ɓikhiye na yuon sɩrɩlegeŋe gʋɔ za kha ʋɔ le ɩtakhuo ki gbũu ɓan.
42019013	Khaala ʋ kha ʋɔ yo, na ʋ yɩɗ u miliinɓiiwe gbũne na hãan pɩ bɩɛ sãnɩ deʔe ikpo ikpo ki deɗ pi kha: “Ɩ̃ kɩ wãkɩ̃n na tigiyɩɛ ɓanu kha mi gbũun ɓannɩ”.
42019014	Ŋa ʋ sɩrɩga nɩpɩra na yãasɩ̃nn ʋ wa. Baa u yuon zuori, na pi khonn nɩpɛ bʋɔ na dãan mɩ kha pi yo de gɩɛ sɩrɩlegeŋira ɩtakhuora kha bɩɛ bʋ ɓɩɛ wɛɩ wɩɛ ɓa hɩɗan na le ɩya bɩɛ thaaga za waʔ.
42019015	Ŋa sɩɛ na sɩɛ bɩɛ na pi gbũun liir u wa ɩtakhuo na ʋ ɓann ʋ sɩrɩgɩra ʋ. Na ʋ yɩɗ u miliinɓiiwira ʋ na hãan tigiyira kha ʋɔ ken mɩyɩra pi liigen ɓuun ɩra.
42019016	Na lʋgʋbaara zʋ̃ʋn nann na deɗ kha: “Thadɛyɛ, mɩɛ liigen ɓuun ma sãnɩ deʔe gbũne na sãnɩ deɗa mʋ na hãan mɩ ɩra”.
42019017	Na ɩtakhuora deɗ u kha: “Sɩ kɩ̃ranɩ, mu liin liigedakɩ̃ra. Baa mu telenn mɩtɩtɩɩɗɩra za, mi le mu wa gbonse gbũne thadɛyɛ.”
42019018	Na miliinɓiyʋ̃ɔfɩrana zʋ̃ʋn nann na deɗ kha: “Thadɛyɛ, mɩɛ ɓuun ma sãnɩ deʔe ɩwãa na wɛɗɩɛ mʋ na hãan mɩ ɩra”.
42019019	Na ɩtakhuora deɗ u kha: “Mi liin mu wa gbonse sɩwãa thadɛyɛ”.
42019020	Na miliinɓisãafɩrana zʋ̃ʋn nann na deɗ kha: “Thadɛyɛ, mʋ sãnɩ deɗa dɛ. Mɩɛ na ɓĩnn ni wa lowupheɗe za na kanɛn nɩ.
42019021	Mɩ kha ãn mʋ wa, naɗɩɛ mʋ bʋ wa nɩhʋwa: Mɩɩna mʋ zɩɛn fɩ waʔ, dɩɛ mʋ khɛ, mɩɩna mʋ tʋɔn waʔ, dɩɛ mʋ kpɛwɩ”.
42019022	Na ɩtakhuora deɗ u kha: “Miliinɓithɔkɔ, mɩ ɓa kiti mu wa na makɩ̃n na mʋ sɩɛsɩra. Baa mʋ kha ken kha mɩɛ bʋ wa nɩthɩ̃rɩhʋwa, kha mɩɛ khɛ wa mɩɩna mɩ na zɩɛn fɩ waʔ, kɩ kpɛwɩ mɩɩna mɩ tʋɔn waʔ.
42019023	Bena mʋ na yiin mi tigiyira bãŋɩ za waʔ? Baa mɩ ɓann mɩra mɩ naa ɓa yo ɓu na dʋɔ sɩɛn bʋ mi khon ĩ”.
42019024	Na ɩtakhuora deɗ wɛpɩɛ kha bʋ fɩ kha: “Ɩ̃ zɩ̃n sãnɩ deɗa ʋ khɛrɛ na hã wɩɛra kɩ bʋ na sãnɩ deʔe gbũnera ɩra”.
42019025	Na bɩɛ deɗ u kha: “Thadɛyɛ, ʋ bʋ wa na sãnɩ deʔe gbũne zuori!”
42019026	Na ɩtakhuora zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: “Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, na nɩra wɛ kɩ bʋ na mɩɩnɛ, pɩ ɓa hã ʋ wa dʋɔ ʋ sɩɛ, na wɩɛ bʋ na mɩɩnɛ waʔ, kɩla kɩ bʋ ʋ dɛyɩra khɛrɛ, pɩ ɓa zɩ̃n ma dɩɛ kɩ zɩɛ ʋ.
42019027	Ɩra wɩɛ, mɩɛ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra kha ɓɩɛ kha mɩɛ le bɩɛ ɩtakhuora waʔ, ɩ̃ ɓan mɩ fara na ɓan khʋ wɩ mɩ wʋɔla za.”»
42019028	Baa Yesura deɗ sɩɛ zuori, na ʋ zɩɛn nɩgbokira wʋɔla ʋ na pi yuon Zeruzalɛmʋra.
42019029	Baa u yo yĩmin Bɛtɩfazɩ na Betanɩ, Oliviye ɓɩɛgɛ lɔkɩra ʋ, na ʋ dãan ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwe pɩyɔ̃ ki deɗ pi kha:
42019030	«Ĩ yo gboŋɩɛ kɩ bʋ a wʋɔla mɩra, na ĩ yo nannɩ, ɩ̃ ɓa yã kãŋunɓiye na pɩ vɔɗ ʋ, nɩra gann ʋ za yãan thon waʔ. Ɩ̃ vɔrɩ ɓan ʋ fara.
42019031	Na nɩra bʋ̃ɗ ɩ̃ kha: “Bena ɩ̃ vɔrɩ ʋ?” Ĩ de u kha: “Adɛyɩra kɩ ɓɩɛ ʋ.”»
42019032	Na dãarawɩra yo ɓuun mɩyɩra bɩɛ mafɩra mʋ gaga kha baa Adɛyɩra na deɗ si.
42019033	Baa pɩ kha vɔrɩ kãŋunɓiira, na ʋ dɛrɩwɩra bʋ̃ɗ pɩ kha: «Bena ɩ̃ vɔrɩ kãŋunɓiiwɩɛ?»
42019034	Na pɩ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Adɛyɩra kɩ ɓɩɛ ʋ.»
42019035	Na pɩ khɩɛn kãŋunɓiira na ɓann ʋ Yesura khɛrɛ. Baa pi yo nann Yesura khɛrɛ, na pi khonn pɩ gbɔgɔlɔ̃nsɛ na ɗʋkɩ̃nn sɩ kãŋuna za na Yesura gann ʋ za.
42019036	Baa ʋ kha nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ ki yo na nɩpɛ hʋ̃nɛ wa pɩ gbɔgɔlɔ̃nsɛ khɩ̃na za kha bɩɛ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ, na Yesura gan sɩ za na kãŋuna kɩ tãra.
42019037	Baa pi yo yĩmin Zeruzalɛmʋra, na gbũu khɩ̃na ki sũn Oliviye ɓɩɛgɩra ʋ, na karɩ̃nɓigbokira hĩin na bãanwuoŋo, na pɩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila na yĩdolongbʋ̃ɔmɛ na gbũu ʋ bamʋŋa mɩyɩra pɩ yãarɩ.
42019038	Pɩ kha de ɓa kha: «Adɛyɛ Yekire kɩ̃ra ɩtakhuora kɩ ɓan ʋ yɩsɩgɩra za mɩra. Kpolonwuoŋo hɩɗan zaara dɩ̃ɩna Zaadɛyɛ Yekila yɩsɩgɩra gbɩ̃nɛ.»
42019039	Farɩzɩ̃ɛmɛ bʋɔ kha bʋ nɩgbokira za, na bɩɛ deɗ Yesura kha «Karɩ̃ndaa, kpaŋɩ̃n mʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira kha pi fĩi.»
42019040	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, kha harɩ na pi fĩiri, bʋrʋyɛ ɓa arɩ kɩ sɔŋɔ pi boɗa ʋ!»
42019041	Baa Yesura yĩmin Zeruzalɛmʋra, na kenn yãar ʋ na ʋ fʋʋn hãar ʋ na ʋ nɩpɩra,
42019042	ki deɗ kha: «Zeruzalɛmʋ nɩpɛ, mɩɩna kɩ wɔrɩ hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋira, na ɩ̃ na tʋʋn ma dɩɛ fɩ̃ɩra, sɩ naa kɩ̃ra! Ŋa sɩɛ guuren ma ɩ̃ɛ za, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ yã sɩ waʔ!
42019043	Ŋa ɗɩyãga gʋɔ ɓa ɓan ɩ̃ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra ɓa maɗɛ gbengbũnse na zangbũn ĩ ki vĩimiri ĩ gɛnsɛ bɩɛ.
42019044	Pɩ ɓa khʋ wa ɩ̃ bɩɛ ki kii ɩ̃ thʋʋsɩra, tofaɓire dʋɔ ɓa hɩɗan dʋɔ thaaga ʋ waʔ. Naɗɩɛ bɛna Yekila ɓann kha ʋɔ dɛnfɛ ɩ̃, ɩ̃ bɩɩn dɩɛ bɛna waʔ.»
42019045	Na Yesura lonn Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra gbɛ̃ɩgɩra ʋ kɩ ɗɛ ɗoŋindɛrɩwɩra bʋ.
42019046	Na u deɗ pi kha: «Yekila deɗ ɓa ʋ sɩɛsɩra za kha: “Mɩɛ thʋʋgɩra bʋ wa gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋga”. Ŋa na ɩ̃ɛ vɩkɩ̃nn ŋɩ wa na liin ŋi zugbũruwe guorekhɛrɛ.»
42019047	Yesura kha karɩ̃n ma nɩpɛ ɗɩyãsɛ bɩɛ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra ʋ. Na kperekpiidɛkhãga, na sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna wʋɔrɛ nɩpɛ kha ɓɩɛ wa ʋ khʋʋmɛ.
42019048	Ŋa pɩ kha tʋ baa pi le u waʔ, naɗɩɛ nɩgbokira bɩɛ kha nuure u wa kɩ̃raŋɩra.
42020001	Gɔɗɩyãga gʋɔ, Yesura kha karɩ̃n ma nɩpɛ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra ʋ na u de pi Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra. Na kperekpiidɛkhãgawɩra na sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɩra dɩ̃ɩna Yawutuwe wʋɔrɛ nɩpɛ yuon ʋ khɛrɛ
42020002	na bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha: «Mɩyɩra mu le mɩra, ãna hãan mʋ khɩ̃na, dɩ̃ɩna ãna hãan mʋ kɩ wɔrɩkɩra?»
42020003	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Mɩ ɓa bʋ̃ ɩ̃ wa daɓire tikpo. Ĩ de mi dɩ:
42020004	Ãna dãan Zã kha u yĩ nɩpɩra ãmɩra ʋ? Yekire u baa, warɩma nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ ɩ?»
42020005	Ŋa na bɩɛ dola hɩɗann ki bo ki de kha: «Na a zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: “Yekila na dãar ʋ”, ʋ ɓa bʋ̃ a wa kha: “Na bena ɩ̃ khãan ʋ sɩɛsɩra za waʔ?”
42020006	Ŋa na a gbũun deɗ kha: “Nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ dãar ʋ”, nɩgbokira bɩɛ ɓa arɩ wa na hĩŋin a na bʋrʋyɛ na khʋ a, naɗɩɛ pɩ bɩɛ bɩɩn ma kha Zãna kha bʋ wa Yekire yãdedaa thĩnthĩnwe.»
42020007	Na pɩ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «A tʋ dɛyɩra dãar ʋ kha ʋ ɓan yĩ nɩpɛ ãmɩra ʋ waʔ.»
42020008	Na Yesura deɗ pi kha: «Mɩɛ ɓa ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ tɩ̃ dɛyɩra hãan mɩ khɩ̃na na mɩɛ le ɩɛ mɩyɩra waʔ.»
42020009	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na Yesura zɩɛn nɩgbokira sɔkɩɛ kha: «Wɛɩ ʋɔ na kãwɩn u duvɛ̃nhasɛ hʋʋga, na khɩɛn yiin ŋi sʋ̃nɛdɛwɛ leke u, ki yuon sɩrɩga lɛɩkhɛrɛ.
42020010	Baa duvɛ̃nɓise kpɩɛbɛna ɓa nannɩ, na ʋ dãan u miliinɓiye ʋɔ sʋ̃nɛdɛwɩra khɛrɛ kha pɩ hã ʋɔ na ʋɔ niina. Ŋa na sʋ̃nɛdɛwɩra gɔɗ khɩɗ ʋɔ dãarawɩɛ kɩ zɩɛr ʋ na u khũnn leboliye.
42020011	Na hʋdɛyɩra gbũun dãan miliinɓiye yʋ̃ɔfɩrana tɩ̃. Na sʋ̃nɛdɛwɩra gɔɗ ʋ na khɩɗ ʋ tɩ̃, na kʋsan ʋ, kɩ zɩɛr ʋ na u khũnn kɛɩ hã ʋ mɩɩnɛ.
42020012	Na hʋdɛyɩra gbũun dãan miliinɓiye sãafɩrana ʋɔ tɩ̃. Na pɩ gɔɗ khɩɗ ʋɔ tɩ̃ na nʋgan ʋ kɩ khɩɛn hĩnn u gbɛ̃ɩgɛ ʋ.
42020013	Na hʋdɛyɩra deɗ kha: “Na bɩra mi le ɩra? Mɩ dãa wa mi ɓikhiye kpora kpelila, mi gbũu khɔrɩ ʋ wa gbaangbo. Mʋ fatʋ wa pɩ ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ ʋɔ.”
42020014	Ŋa baa sʋ̃nɛdɛwɩra kenn yãar ʋ na pi ki de ɓa kamɛ kha: “Ken ʋ̃nɩŋɩra khɛdaara. Ɩ̃ yɩɛ a gɔ khʋ ʋ, kɩ yɩɛ hʋʋgɩra le a bɛgɛ.”
42020015	Na pɩ gɔɗ ʋ na kusen u hʋʋgɩra ʋ na khʋʋr ʋ.» Na Yesura bʋ̃ɗ pɩ kha: «Hʋdɛyɩra ɓa le wi wa mʋsɛ?
42020016	Ʋ ɓa ɓan ma na khʋ bɩɛ sʋ̃nɛdɛbɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ bʋɔ na yii hʋʋgɩra za.» Baa nɩpɛ nuun sɩɛ, na pi deɗ kha: «Hã Yekila yɩɛ sɩɛ siira le waʔ.»
42020017	Ŋa na Yesura kenn mi na deɗ kha: «Yekila sɛwʋra sɩɛsɩɛ deɗ ɓa be: “Tofaɓila thʋmaɗɛdɛrɩwɩra na kɛɩrɩ, dɩɛ ɓa liin tofaɓiyira bɩɛ kɩ̃nkɩ̃na.”
42020018	Nɩra wɛ bãa kɩ ɓa wa dɩɛ bʋlɩɛ za, ʋ dɛyɩra ɓa kpɛwɩgɩ̃n ma u thĩ. Na ti gbũun waan nɩra wɛ bãa za, tɩ ɓa tɩɩ wa ʋ dɛyɩra. Sɩɛ kɔla ɓɔgɔ wa be?»
42020019	Dɩɛ bɛna, sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɩra dɩ̃ɩna kperekpiidɛkhãgawɩra kha ɓɩɛ wa na gɔ Yesura, naɗɩɛ pɩ na tʋʋn ma kha u deɗ ɓa sɔkɩɛ na hãan bɩɛ gɩ. Ŋa na pɩ ãnn nɩgbokira.
42020020	Si liin mafɩra na sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɩra dɩ̃ɩna kperekpiidɛkhãgawɩra kɩ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ma Yesura. Na pi khonn nɩpɛ bʋɔ na bɩɛ liin pi thĩ nɩtelenyeme. Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ kha kãn ma na gɩɗɛ Yesura na bʋ̃ɓɛ, na ɓu gɔkhɛrɛ ʋ za na hã ʋ sɩrɩgɩra thadɛrɩyɩra.
42020021	Na pi deɗ Yesura kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, aa tʋ wa wɛsɩɛ mu de na mʋ karɩ̃n nɩpɩra, kha sɩ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya. Mu khon nɩra nɩra za waʔ, lɔmɩra za Yekila khɩ̃na kãn na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀, mafɩra mʋ karɩ̃n nɩra dɩ yewu.
42020022	Aa bʋ̃ ɓʋ wa, a sɩɛrɛdewensira hãan khɩ̃nɛ a taa lãmbo na hã Ɔrɔmʋ ɩtakhuo baa, warɩma a kãn taa ʋ waʔ.»
42020023	Ŋa na Yesura tʋʋn pɩ wʋɔmɩra na u deɗ pi kha:
42020024	«Ɩ̃ ɓan hãn mɩ tigire fara! Na pɩ hãar ʋ dɩ na u deɗ pi kha: Ãna wɔseɗe na ʋ yɩsɩga kɩ bʋ tɩ za?» Na pɩ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Ɔrɔmʋ ɩtakhuora ʋ.»
42020025	Na Yesura deɗ pi kha: «Ɩ̃ taa ɩtakhuora na ʋ bɛyɛ, kɩ hã Yekila na ʋ bɛyɛ.»
42020026	Pɩ wɔrɩn ɓuun ɓilenkhɛrɛ ʋ sɩɛsɩra u deɗ nɩgbokira wʋɔla ʋ waʔ. Ʋ zɩ̃ŋɩnsɩra na khonn mi wa bamʋŋa na pi fĩin gbɛ̃.
42020027	Na Sadusɩ̃ɛmɛ bʋɔ ɓann Yesura lɔkɩra ʋ. Bɩɛ ki de kha na mu huuri, mʋ wɔrɩ arɩ dʋ̃waʔ. Na pɩ bʋ̃ɗ Yesura
42020028	lɔmɩɛ za kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, Moyizi na hãar a sɩɛsɩɛ sɛwɛn kha: “Na khuo yiin hara, kɩ ɓa huun kɩ yɩɛr ʋ kɛɩ ɓu ɓiye ʋ za, ʋ khɩ̃nɩyɛ kha kãn ma na khɛ ʋɔ thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃nhala na ɓu ɓiye u za, ʋ marɩkhuora yɩsɩgɩra ɓu yɩʔ.”
42020029	Kɛna ɓikhiiwe wãnɩyɔ̃ kha bʋ wɛɩ ʋɔ heke. Na lʋgʋbaara yiin hara na ɓa huun kɛɩ ɓu ɓiye ʋ za.
42020030	Na u thuorora khɩɛn yiin ʋɔ thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃nhala,
42020031	Na ʋɔ thuorora khɩɛr ʋ tɩ̃ si kpuosira ɩ. Mafɩra khuowira wãnɩyɔ̃ra bɩɛ liiri, pɩ bɩɛ huun ma kɩ zɩɛr ʋ kɛɩ le ɓiye.
42020032	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na hala thĩra huun tɩ̃.
42020033	Na huomira ɓa gbũun alɩnɩ, ãna baa kɩ ɓa le hala? Naɗɩɛ pɩ bɩɛ liir u wa hara yãarɩ!»
42020034	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Khuowira na hapɩra kamɛ yiimira dii wa fara dunuyara za.
42020035	Ŋa wɛpɛ Yekila kenn yãan kha pɩ ɓa arɩ huumira za na hɩɗan dunuya fɛnwɛ̃ra kɩ ɓan ɩra, bɩɛ ɓa yii kamɛ dʋ̃waʔ.
42020036	Pɩ ɓa wɔrɩ hu dʋ̃waʔ, bɩɛ na mɛlɛgɛwɛ khɩɛŋɩnn ma. Pɩ bʋ wa Yekila ɓikhiiwe, pi kuɗ ɓa huume u na lonn thakuogo za.
42020037	Na Moyizi ɓɔgɔn sɩ wa weli kha nɩhuome ɓa arɩ wa na ɓu thakuogo. Khaala sɩ sɛwɛn ʋ sɛwʋra za kha daɓorikira na ɗɩɛn nabela, fɩ za ʋ sɛwɛn kha Adɛyɛ Yekila yɩɗ u thĩ kha: “ Abɩrahamʋ Yekire, na Ɩzakɩ Yekire, dɩ̃ɩna Zakɔbʋ Yekire.”»
42020038	Na Yesura deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Yekila bʋ wa thakuonɩpɛ Yekire, nɩhuome baa ʋ waʔ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha pɩ bɩɛ bʋ wa thakuogo Yekila khɛrɛ.»
42020039	Na sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɛ bʋɔ khɩɛn sɩɛsɛ na deɗ kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, mʋ sɩɛrɛn kɩ̃ranɩ.»
42020040	Pɩ kha ha bʋ̃ ʋ dʋ̃waʔ.
42020041	Na Yesura deɗ pi kha: «Na mʋsɛ sɩ wɔrɩ de kha Yekire Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora bʋ wa Davidi kpɩ̃raɓiye?
42020042	Kɛna Davidi thĩra deɗ sɩ wa Yekire gbɩ̃nɛtɩ̃nsɩra za kha: “Adɛyɛ Yekila deɗ ɓa mɩɛ Adɛyɩra kha: Ɓan hɩɗan mi leɗĩŋira ʋ,
42020043	ɓanu kha mi yiin mʋ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra mu lekira za.”
42020044	Na Davidira yɩɗ Yekire Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora kha: “Adɛyɛ”. Na mʋsɛ sii Yekire Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora wɔrɩ le ki le Davidira kpɩ̃raɓiye?»
42020045	Baa nɩgbokira bɩɛ kha bʋ ki nuure u, na Yesura deɗ ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira kha:
42020046	«Ɩ̃ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ na sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɩra kɩ khɔrɩ ki min na gbɔgɔlɔ̃ngbʋ̃ɔnsɩra, pɩ khɔrɩ thɩɛkpakpaʔɛ bĩŋinkhɛyɩra za. Na pi lonn Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋga za pɩ khɔrɩ wa na hɩɗan wʋɔrɛ hɩɗankhɛkɩ̃nyɩra za dɩ̃ɩna bĩŋinkhɛyɛ ɗikhɛkpakpaʔɩra za.
42020047	Pɩ zɩ̃n ma thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃nhapɛ leke mɩyɩra bɩɛ, ki gbũu sɛrɩ tɩ̃ gbaangbo nɩpɛ ɓu ken bɩɛ. Pi kitira ɓa bɩ̃ɩ wa na tãra.»
42021001	Baa Yesura kha bʋ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za, na ʋ arɩgan wʋɔrɛ na kenn yãan ɓudadɛwɛ bʋɔ na pi yii pi tigiye gbongbonɓire za kɩ hã kamɛ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra ʋ.
42021002	Na u kenn yãan bʋɔmɛ thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃nhara ʋɔ tɩ̃ na u yii ʋ tamaʔɛ ɩ̃yɔ̃ gbongbonɓila za.
42021003	Na Yesura deɗ kha: «Iyo, mi de ĩ wa sɩ tɩ̃yara: Bʋɔmɛ thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃nhara wɩɛ mɩhãana u yiin mɩra, dɩɛ tann nɩpɛ bʋɔra bɛyɩra bɩɛ.
42021004	Mi de ɓa sɩɛ naɗɩɛ tigiyira nɩpɩra bʋɔra yiiri, pɩ kha vɛn ɩ za waʔ. Ŋa hara wɩɛ, ʋɔ na ʋ bʋɔmɩra bɩɛ na u yiin ma wɛʔɩɛ bɩɛ ʋ kha bʋ ɩ ɩra.»
42021005	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na nɩpɛ bʋɔ hɩɗann ki de Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra bʋrʋyɛ na kɩ kɩ̃ra lɔmɩra dɩ̃ɩna daasɩra hãan Yekila kha pɩ ɔfɔ thʋʋgɩra kɩ̃ra. Ŋa na Yesura deɗ kha:
42021006	«Mɩyɩra ɩ̃ yã mɩra, ɗɩyãsɛ sʋɔ ɓa ɓan, bʋlɛ dʋɔ ɓa hɩɗan dʋɔ thaaga za waʔ. Ɩ bɩɛ ɓa yɩ̃ ɓa.»
42021007	Nɩpɩra kha bʋ fɩ na bɩɛ bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, dʋ̃nɛ bɛnɛ sɩɛ ɓa le? Dʋ̃nɛ mɩɩnɛ kɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ kha dɩɛ bɛna nann ma ɩra?»
42021008	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Ɩ̃ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ nɩra sii kpɛnsɛ ɩ̃ na vɩ ɩ̃ gagasɩra waʔ. Naɗɩɛ nɩgɔmɛ ɓa ɓan ma na khɛ mɩɛ yɩsɩga na ki de kha: “Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekire Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora!” Ɩ̃ ɓan kha mɩɛ bɛna nann ma! Ŋa hã ɩ̃ ɓa thuo wi waʔ.
42021009	Na ɩ̃ ɓa ki nu khɛ̃ɩsɛ na muritĩme mɩyɛ, hã ɩ̃ ãn waʔ. Sɩɛ kãn ma na le zo, ŋa sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ kha dunuyara zuobɛna dɩɛ thonn waʔ.»
42021010	Sɩɛ tann na u deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Thĩne dʋɔ nɩpɛ ɓa arɩ na khɛ̃ɩ na thĩne dʋɔ nɩpɛ. Ɩɩga gʋɔ nɩpɛ ɓa arɩ ɩɩga gʋɔ nɩpɛ za,
42021011	fɔlɔngbanbɩ̃ɩsɛ ɓa le dɩ̃ɩna ɓoɗɩɛgɩ̃ransɛ na khʋ̃mʋbɩ̃ɩsɛ ɓa hɩɗan kharɩgɔnyɛ za. Ãnabirimɩyɛ dɩ̃ɩna bamʋŋa mɩyɛ ɓa ken yã zaara ni.
42021012	Ŋa khaala sɩɛ lebɛna kha dɩɛ nan, pɩ ɓa gɔ ɩ̃ na vɛnɛ ɩ̃, ki yo kiti ĩ Yekila yɩ̃nthʋʋsɩra za, na yii ĩ kaso za. Pɩ ɓa yo ĩ wa mʋ gaga kha nɩzarɩgɩ̃rɩmɛ ɩyawɛ dɩ̃ɩna sɩrɩsɛ thadɛrɩwɛ wʋɔrɛ ʋ, mɩɛ yɩsɩga kãmara za.
42021013	Sɩɛ ɓa le wa thaaga ɩ̃ khɛrɛ ĩ de mɩ sɩɛsɛ nɩpɛ nu mɩ mɩyɛ.
42021014	Sɩɛ kãn na yɩɛ ɩ̃ kɩ dʋ̃nɛ mɩɩna ɩ̃ ɓa de na zɩ̃n ĩ thĩ waʔ.
42021015	Naɗɩɛ mɩɛ thĩra ɓa hã ɩ̃ sɩɛsɛ na wʋɔmɛ, hã ɩ̃ zarɩgɩ̃ndɛwɩra sii ɓu daɓire kpo na de tɩ tãra ɩ̃ bɛla waʔ.
42021016	Harɩ ĩ hũndɛwɛ, na ɩ̃ hakpokãmɛ, na ɩ̃ nɩpɛ, dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ yɛsɛwɛ ɓa yɩɛ pɩ gɔ ɩ̃ kɩ khʋ bʋɔ ɩ̃ tɩɛ.
42021017	Nɩpɛ bɩɛ ɓa yãasɩ̃n ɩ̃ mɩɛ yɩsɩga kãma.
42021018	Ŋa harɩ ɩ̃ thayĩige kikpo ɓa ɓilen waʔ.
42021019	Ɩ̃ gɔ khãamɩra kɩ̃ra: Na sɩɛ liiri, ɩ̃ ɓa kuore ĩ nimira.»
42021020	«Na ɩ̃ ɓa yãan na khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdɛwɛ bʋ kpangbũn Zeruzalɛmʋ bɛndɛ, ɩ̃ kãn ma na tʋ dɩɛ bɛna kha u kiibɛna yĩmin ma.
42021021	Dɩɛ bɛna, wɛpɛ bãa kɩ ɓa hɩɗan Zude sɩrɩgɩra ʋ, pi ki horo ki yo ɓɩɛsɛ gɛŋɛ. Wɛpɛ kɩ ɓa hɩɗan Zeruzalɛmʋra kpoloŋira ʋ, bɩɛ kure na yo legen na gboŋira, dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɛ kɩ ɓa hɩɗan gbonɓiyira ʋ, hã pɩ ɓan gboŋo u waʔ.
42021022	Naɗɩɛ sɩ ɓa le wa mɩbɩ̃yɛ kiti yawʋsɛ. Mɩyɩra bɩɛ na sɛwɛn Yekila sɛwʋra ʋ, sɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa le wa.
42021023	Sɩ ɓa le wa wɔgbʋ̃ʋgbeleŋe halɔwʋrɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna ɓitʋ̃ʋrɛdɛwɛ khɛrɛ. Naɗɩɛ sɩrɩgɩɛ nɩpɩra ɓa vɛn ma gbaangbo dɩ̃ɩna Yekila kitira ɓa wa wa gɩɛ sɩrɩgɩɛ nɩpɩra za.
42021024	Pɩ ɓa khʋ wa bʋɔra na sɔrɔna, kɩ gɔ bʋɔra na le wi kasoɓiiwe na yo wi sɩrɩsɛ bɩɛ za. Sɩrɩsɩra sʋɔra ɓa vɛnɛ wa Zeruzalɛmʋra nɩpɩra kɩ asɩ pɩ mɩyɩra bɩɛ ɓanu kha sɩɛ sɩrɩsɩɛ wɔrɩkɔ bɛna zuori.»
42021025	«Bamʋŋa mɩyɛ yʋɔ ɓa le khɩɛ na ferege na khʋsaɓiye za. Fɔlɔŋɩra za tɩ̃, lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ urimira ɓa zɩɛ nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpolongbʋ̃ʋga za harɩ pɩ tʋ mɩɩna pi le waʔ.
42021026	Pɩ ɓa hɩɗan ma kpolongbʋ̃ʋbɩ̃ɩga za, na mɩyɩra kɩ ɓa le dunuyara sɩrɩsɩra bɩɛ za ɩra. Naɗɩɛ zaa mɩyɩra bɩɛ ɓa zige wa na khon ɩ khaayɩra za.
42021027	Dɩɛ bɛna pɩ ɓa yã Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira na ʋ ɓan dadʋ̃nɩŋa za na wɔrɩkɔ dɩ̃ɩna Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra.
42021028	Na ɩ̃ ɓa yãan na ɩɛ mɩyɩra bu le, ɩ̃ arɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ na gɔ ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ zɩ̃nbɛna yĩmin ma.»
42021029	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na Yesura zɩɛn mɩ sɔkɩɛ kha: «Ĩ ken taanhagɩra na dahasɛ sʋɔra.
42021030	Na ɩ̃ yãan na sɩ bʋ ki muri, ɩ̃ tʋ wa kha kharɩkɩra yĩmin ma.
42021031	Mafɩra tɩ̃, na ɩ̃ ɓa yãan na ɩɛ mɩyɩra ɓa nannɩ, ɩ̃ kãn na tʋ kha Yekila ɩɩgɩra yĩmin ma.
42021032	Iyo mi de ĩ wa sɩ, tɩ̃ya ʋ. Fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ nɩpɩra bɩɛ ɓa hu kɩ tʋ yɩɛ ɩɛ mɩyɩra le waʔ.
42021033	Zaara na fɔlɔŋɩra ɓa tũri, ŋa mɩɛ sɩɛsɩra sɩɛ ʋɔ ɓa arɩ sɩ boɗa ʋ kũu waʔ.»
42021034	«Ɩ̃ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ! Hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ lɔwʋgɔ na thãyɔgɔ dɩ̃ɩna dunuya wɩɛ mɩɓɩɛnyɩra asɩ ɩ̃ gagasɩra waʔ, bʋɔtɛ mɩ ɓanɗɩyãgɩra ɓa barɩ wa ɩ̃ za mʋ gaga kha zaŋa,
42021035	naɗɩɛ kɩ ɓa barɩ wa fɔlɔŋɔ hɩɗandɛrɩwɛ bɩɛ za.
42021036	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, hã ɩ̃ hʋ̃n waʔ, ɩ̃ hɩɗan ko kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila bãanyɛ bɩɛ, mafɩra ɩ̃ ɓa ɓu faŋa na ɓu ko ɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ ɓa ɓan ɩra, kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ thĩra wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira wʋɔla ʋ.»
42021037	Ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga khɩɛga, Yesura kha karɩ̃n ma nɩpɛ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za. Ŋa zʋ̃raŋa, ʋ kha yo kɩ hʋ̃n ma Oliviye ɓɩɛdiɗe thaaga za.
42021038	Dɩ̃ɩna nɩgboko bɩɛ kha ɓan ma buloŋo khɔ̃ɩ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra ʋ ki nuure Yesura.
42022001	Buru kɛɩ le thãhɩ̃rɩwɛ̃ fɛtɩ pi le kʋ̃n kha Pakɩ, ʋɔ kha yĩmi wa.
42022002	Kperekpiidakhãgawɛ dɩ̃ɩna Yekire sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɛ kha ɓɩɛ wa Yesura khʋ lɔmɛ, ŋa pɩ kha tʋ baa pɩ gɔ yo u waʔ, naɗɩɛ pɩ kha ãn ma nɩgbokira.
42022003	Fɩra za na Sutana lonn Yesura karɩ̃nɓiiwe gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ra ukpora za, wɩɛra pɩ kha yɩ kha Ɛsɩkarɩyɔtɩ Zudasɩ.
42022004	Na Zudasɩra alɩn na yo sɩɛrɛn na kperekpiidɛkhãgawɩra dɩ̃ɩna Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra tɩɛgɛdɛwɩra lɔmɩra za ʋɔ naa wɔrɩ yɩɛ pɩ gɔ Yesura na hã wɩ ʋ ɩra.
42022005	Na pɩ bãanyɛ wuori, na pɩ hãar ʋ nʋʋga kha bɩɛ ɓa hã ʋ tigiye.
42022006	Na Zudasɩra bɩɩn sɩɛ. Na ʋ alɩn kɩ ɓɩɛ lɔmɩra za ʋɔ wɔrɩ yɩɛ pɩ gɔ Yesura hã nɩgbokɩra ɓu tʋ waʔ ɩra.
42022007	Bula pɩ khɩ kɛɩ le thãhɩ̃rɩwɛ̃ra, baa ʋɔ fɛtɩra ɗɩyãsɩra ɓa nannɩ, zãraɓiye kha kãn na khʋ gɩɛ lʋgɔɗɩyãgɩra na le Pakɩ fɛtɩra.
42022008	Na Yesura dãan Pɩɛrɩ na Zã ki deɗ pi kha: «Ĩ nisĩn na yo le Pakɩ ɗiimira.»
42022009	Na pɩ bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha: «He mʋ ɓɩɛ kha a yo le wi?»
42022010	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Ĩ nuure: Bɛna ɩ̃ ɓa yo nan gboŋira, ɩ̃ ɓa gbɩ̃ŋɩn na wɛɩ ʋɔ na u gbonn ʋ ãɓene. Ĩ thuo u gbɛ̃ɩna za ʋ ɓa yo lon ɩra,
42022011	kɩ yɩɛ ĩ de gbɛ̃ɩndɛyɩra kha: “Karɩ̃ndaara bʋ bʋ̃ ɓʋ kha gʋ̃na thʋʋga za ʋɔ ɓa ɗi Pakɩ ɗiimira na ʋɔ karɩ̃nɓiiwira?”
42022012	Ʋ ɓa ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ saŋabona, thʋɓikpakpaka gʋɔ bʋ ni, mɩyɩra bɩɛ za ɩ̃ vɛn, ɩ bʋ kɩ za. Fɩra za ĩ le ɗiimira.»
42022013	Baa pi yuori, pi yo ɓuun ma mɩyɩra bɩɛ mʋ gaga kha baa Yesura na deɗ pɩ sɩ ɩra. Na pi liin Pakɩra ɗiimira fɩ.
42022014	Baa ɗibɛna ɓa nannɩ, na Yesura hɩɗann ki ɗi na ʋ dãarawɩra.
42022015	Na u deɗ pi kha: «Mɩɛ kha ɓɩɛ sɩ wa gbaangbo na ɗi Pakɩ ɗiimɩɛ na ɩ̃ɛ kɩ tʋ vɛn!
42022016	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, mɩ ɓa gbũu ɗi Pakɩ ɗiimɩɛ dʋ̃waʔ, ɓanu kha sɩ kɔla liin zuon Yekila ɩɩgɩra ʋ.»
42022017	Kɩ yɩɛn na ʋ khɩɛn kaŋɔɗɛ na thɩɛn Yekila ki deɗ kha: «Ɩ̃ zɩ̃n kaŋɔɗɩɛ na yɔ̃ hã kamɛ.
42022018	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, na khɛ ɩra wɩɛ mɩ ɓa yɔ̃ duvɛ̃n dʋ̃waʔ ɓanu kha Yekila ɩɩgɩra ɓannɩ.»
42022019	Sɩɛ liin na ʋ khɩɛn buru, na thɩɛn Yekila kɩ kpɩkɩ̃nn ʋ na hãan ʋ dãarawɩra na deɗ kha: « Bula bʋ wa mɩɛ gbɔɗɛ, tɩ ɓa hã wa ɩ̃ɛ kãma. Ĩ ki le wa sɩɛ kɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n na mɩɛ.»
42022020	Mafɩra tɩ̃, baa pɩ khʋɔr ʋ zuon na ʋ khɩɛn hãan mɩ duvɛ̃n na deɗ kha: «Duvɛ̃n wɩɛ bʋ wa mɩɛ tarɩmɛ, bɩɛ tarɩmɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa Yekila nʋhãanfɛŋɩra. Pɩ ɓa gbo ɓa ɩ̃ɛ kãma.
42022021	Ŋa ĩ ken: Dɛyɩra kɩ ɓa yɩɛ pɩ gɔ ɓɩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa ki ɗi na mɩɛ.
42022022	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira ɓa hu wa na makɩ̃n na baa Yekila hʋ̃nɛn yuon si. Ŋa dɛyɩra kɩ ɓa yɩɛ pɩ gɔ ʋ, wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɛgɛ!»
42022023	Na karɩ̃nɓiiwira hɩɗann kɩ bʋ̃kɩ̃n kamɛ kha bɩɛ za ʋ̃na kpuo kɩ ɓa bɩ le sɩɛ.
42022024	Na pɩ hɩɗann ki bo na kamɛ gbaangbo kha bɩɛ ɓɩɛ na tʋ dɛyɩra kɩ bʋ nɩgbʋ̃ɔmʋra bɩɛ sʋgʋmʋra za.
42022025	Na Yesura deɗ pi kha: «Dunuyara ɩyawɛ ɗi wa ɩɩga pɩ nɩpɛ za, dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɩra, bɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa kha nɩpɛ yɩ bɩɛ yɩsɩnʋʋga.
42022026	Hã si le mafɩra ɩ̃ɛ heke waʔ. Ŋa wɩɛra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ bɩɛ nɩgbʋ̃ɔmʋra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na le ɩ̃ bɩɛ ɓikɛyɩra, dɩ̃ɩna wɩɛra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ bɩɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩrara, ʋɔ kãn ma na le ɩ̃ bɩɛ miliinɓiye.
42022027	Na wɩɛra ki le ɗiimira dɩ̃ɩna wɩɛra u le hã wɩ, ãna kɩ bʋ nɩgbʋ̃ɔmʋra? Wɩɛra ɗiimira bʋ hã, ʋɔ ʋ waʔ ba? Na mɩɛ ʋɔ bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ sʋgʋmʋra za mʋ gaga kha wɩɛra ki le ɗiimira.
42022028	Ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ bɩɩn ma na hɩɗann dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ mɩ vɛnsɩra bɛna, ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋn kuɗ mɩɛ lɔkɩra za yãan waʔ.
42022029	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, lɔmɩra za mi Siira Yekila hãan mɩɛ ʋ ɩɩgɩra, mafɩra tɩ̃ mɩɛ hã ɩ̃ gɩ.
42022030	Ɩ̃ ɓa ɗi na yɔ̃ na mɩɛ mɩ ɩɩgɩra ʋ ni, dɩ̃ɩna kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ hɩɗan ɩɩkhokira ʋ na kiti Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ thĩnye gbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃ra.»
42022031	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na Yesura yɩɗ Simɔ̃ Pɩɛrɩ kha: «Simɔ̃, Simɔ̃! Nuure: Sutana yɩ̃nn ma khɩ̃nɛ kha ʋɔ zɩɛ ken ɩ̃ za mʋ gaga kha baa pɩ tɛnɛ muume na kpɩkɩ̃n muumira na yɩ̃yɩna kamɛ ʋ ɩra.
42022032	Ŋa na mɩɛ yɩ̃nn Yekila na hãan mʋ, hã mʋ khãamɩra zɩ̃n waʔ. Na mʋ ɓa gbũun ɓann mi heke na liin mɩɛ baa, mʋ dɛnfɛ mʋ kamɩra.»
42022033	Na Pɩɛrɩra deɗ u kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, mɩɛ bɩ wa na yo na mʋɔ kasora za dɩ̃ɩna na hu dɩ̃ɩna mʋɔ kamɛ ʋ.»
42022034	Na Yesura deɗ kha: «Mi de ɓu wa sɩ Pɩɛrɩ, khaala zĩnkhuo kha ʋ fʋʋ fɩ̃ɩra, mʋ ɓa bakɩ̃n ma bãnɩsãa kha mʋɔ tʋ mɩɛ waʔ.»
42022035	Kɩ yɩɛn na u deɗ ʋ dãarawɩra tɩ̃ kha: «Baa mɩ na dãar ɩ̃ ki deɗ ĩ kha hã ɩ̃ khɛ tigiye, na sɩrɩyodaasɛ dɩ̃ɩna sawʋlansɛ waʔ, mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ yo kpɩɗ ɩ̃ wa ba?» Na pɩ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Foi.»
42022036	Na u deɗ pi kha: «Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, na tigiye ɓu wɩɛ khɛrɛ, ʋ khɛ ɩ. Mafɩra tɩ̃ na sɩrɩyodaasɛ bʋ wɩɛ khɛrɛ, ʋ khɛ sɩ. Na wɩɛ gbũu bʋ na sɔrɔna waʔ, u ɗoŋin u wese gbɔgɔlɔ̃ŋɔ na ɗon ʋɔ.
42022037	Naɗɩɛ mi de ĩ wa sɩ, sɩɛsɩra sɛwɛn Yekila sɛwʋra na gbũu mɩɛ mɩyɛ za kha: “Pi kenn u wa mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa ʋɔ”, fɔ sɩɛ gbũu le mi. Iyo, sɩɛ gbũun nann ma.»
42022038	Na karɩ̃nɓiiwira deɗ u kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, ken sɔrɔnamɛ pɩyɔ̃!» Na ʋ zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Ɩ̃ yɩɛ wɩ.»
42022039	Na Yesura kuɗ yuon Oliviye ɓɩɛdiɗa gɛŋɛ mʋ gaga kha baa u le yo kɔkɔla ɩra. Na ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira thuor u.
42022040	Baa pi yo nann dɩɛ khaala na u deɗ pi kha: «Ɩ̃ kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila, na wɔgbʋ̃ʋga ɓa nan ɩ̃, hã ɩ̃ zɩɛ Yekila khɩ̃na waʔ.»
42022041	Kɩ yɩɛn na ʋ zʋ̃ʋn kuɗ pɩ lɔkɩra ʋ na legenn mi kɩrɩ, na ɓaɗ huruse fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ kɩ gɔɗ kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila,
42022042	ki de kha: «Mi Siye Yekire, na mʋ bɩɩrɩ, mʋ naa yɩɛ vɛnsɩɛ khaala legen dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ. Ŋa hã mɩɛ dĩŋo le waʔ, mʋɔ dĩŋora kɩ kãn le.»
42022043	[Na mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ kuɗ zaara na ɓann ʋ khɛrɛ, na hãar ʋ wɔrɩkɔ.
42022044	Kpolongbʋ̃ʋga kha ɓɩɛ khʋ ʋ na ʋ ɔfɔn yɩ̃nn Yekire gbaangbo, harɩ na ʋ sãwãsɩra liin mʋ gaga kha tarɩmɛ ki sukĩn fɔlɔŋɩra za.]
42022045	Baa ʋ yɩ̃nn Yekila zuori, na ʋ alɩn gbũun ɓann karɩ̃nɓiiwira khɛrɛ na ɓuun na wɔkpãka gɔɗ pɩ na tann harɩ na pɩ hʋ̃nn phaarɩ.
42022046	Na u deɗ pi kha: «Be liin na ɩ̃ hʋ̃n? Ɩ̃ arɩ na yɩ̃n Yekila hã wɔgbʋ̃ʋga wa ɩ̃ waʔ.»
42022047	Bɛna ʋ kha bʋ kɩ sɩɛrɛ, na nɩgboko ɓannɩ. Ʋ karɩ̃nɓiiwira gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ ʋɔra pɩ kha yɩ kha Zudasɩ, ʋɔ kha bʋ gɩɛ nɩgbokira wʋɔla ʋ. Na ʋ zʋ̃ʋn nann Yesura kha ʋɔ kpen u.
42022048	Ŋa na Yesura deɗ u kha: «Zudasɩ, mu kpen ma Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira na yɩɛ pɩ gɔ ʋ ba?»
42022049	Karɩ̃nɓiiwira kha bʋ na Yesura, baa bɩɛ yãan kha pɩ ɓann ma ʋ gɔkhɛrɛ, na pɩ bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha: «Karɩ̃ndaa, a khɛ wa a sɔrɔnamɛ na khɛ̃ɩ dɩ̃ɩn mɩ ba?»
42022050	Na karɩ̃nɓiiwira ʋɔ khonn u sɔrɔna na ɗuɗ kpaɗ kperekpiidɛkhãga thadɛyɛ miliinɓiye leɗĩnumila.
42022051	Ŋa na Yesura deɗ kha: «Hã ĩ le waʔ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ wɩ.» Na ʋ khɩɛn wɛɩra numila na maan nɩ na bãarɛn ʋ.
42022052	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra ʋ na Yesura deɗ kperekpiidɛkhãgawɩra na Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra tɩɛgɛdɛwɩra wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra dɩ̃ɩna Yawutuwe wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra na ɓann ʋ gɔkhɛla kha: «Bena ɩ̃ ɓann mɩ za na sɔrɔnamɛ na daɓɔsɛ mʋ gaga kha mɩ bʋ wa zugbũro?
42022053	Mɩɛ kha bʋ wa na ɩ̃ɛ ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra ʋ. Ɩ̃ ɓɩɛn mɩ gɔɓɛ waʔ. Ŋa bɛna Yekila hãan ɩ̃ɛ na Sutana kha ĩ le ɩ̃ bɛgɛ, dɩɛ nannɩ.»
42022054	Na pɩ gɔɗ Yesura na yo lonn u kperekpiidɛkhãga thadɛyɛ thʋʋgɩra ʋ. Na Pɩɛrɩra kɩ fɛkɩ̃n ki thuo wi legelege.
42022055	Pɩ na ɗaan ma naaga gbɛ̃ɩna sʋgʋmʋɗa za. Na Pɩɛrɩra yo hɩɗann na nɩpɛ bʋɔra na hɩɗann ki weɗe fɩ ɩra.
42022056	Na miliinɓihɛyɛ ʋɔ yãar ʋ naɗaagboɗa za na ʋ ɓaɗ yiwiye ʋ za ki ken u wʋɔla za ki deɗ kha: «Mʋɔ bʋ wa ʋ ʋɔ tɩ̃!»
42022057	Ŋa na Pɩɛrɩra bakɩ̃nn sɩ ki deɗ kha: «Hara, mɩɛ tʋ ʋ thĩra waʔ.»
42022058	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za kɩrɩ tɩ̃, na wɛɩ ʋɔ yãar ʋ na deɗ u kha: «Mʋɔ bʋ wa pɩ ʋɔ tɩ̃!» Ŋa na Pɩɛrɩra zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋɔ wɛɩra kha: «Ɩya, mɩɛ bʋ pɩ ʋɔ waʔ.»
42022059	Lɩɛrɩ ukpo tãrɩwɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na nɩra ʋɔ deɗ si na gbɩ̃ran kha: «Sige sige bʋ waʔ, wɛɩ wɩɛ kha bʋ wa na Yesura naɗɩɛ ʋ bʋ wa Galile nɩra.»
42022060	Ŋa na Pɩɛrɩra zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Mɩɛ tʋ mɩɩna mʋɔ ɓɩɛ na de thĩra waʔ.» Bɛna ʋ kha bʋ kɩ sɩɛrɛ, na zĩnkhuo ɗɛ fʋʋrɩ.
42022061	Na Adɛyɩra wãɗ na kenn Pɩɛrɩra. Na Pɩɛrɩra kʋɔgɩ̃nn na sɩɛsɩra Adɛyɩra na deɗ u kha: «Khaala zĩnkhuo kha ʋɔ fʋʋ fɩ̃ɩra, mʋ ɓa bakɩ̃n ma bãnɩsãa kha mʋɔ tʋ mɩɛ kũu waʔ.»
42022062	Na Pɩɛrɩra zʋ̃ʋn kuɗ na fʋʋn gbaangbo.
42022063	Nɩpɩra kha tɩɛgɛ Yesura, pɩ kha lʋgʋtɩ̃n ʋ wa na pɩ khɩkɩ̃n ʋ.
42022064	Pɩ kha baka wa ʋ wʋɔla kɩ bʋ̃ ʋ kha: «Yã de si na ɓɔgɔ mʋ khɩdaara!»
42022065	Na pi ki de u sɩɛrɛgɔnsɛ kɩ bʋ na kʋsaʔɛ.
42022066	Baa ɗɩɩgɩra yɛkɩ̃nnɩ, na Yawutuwe wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra na kperekpiidɛkhãga dɩ̃ɩna sɩɛrɛhãansɛ karɩ̃ndɛwɛ bĩŋinni. Na pɩ khɩɛn Yesura na yuor u pɩ sɩɛrɛ ɗigboɗa ʋ na ɓu kiti u.
42022067	Na pɩ bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha: «Na mʋɔ kɩ bʋ Yekila Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora ba, mu de a sɩ.» Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Na mi deɗ ĩ sɩ, ɩ̃ ɓa khãa mɩ za waʔ,
42022068	na mi gbũun bʋ̃ɗ ɩ̃ mɩɩnɛ, ɩ̃ ɓa bɩ na zɩ̃ŋɩn waʔ.
42022069	Ŋa na khɛ ɩra wɩɛ, Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira ɓa hɩɗan ma wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekila leɗĩŋira ʋ.»
42022070	Na pɩ bɩɛ ɗɛ deɗ ɓa kha: «Mʋɔ kɩ bʋ Yekila Ɓikhiira kɛ?» Na ʋ zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra deɗ kha mɩɛ ʋ.»
42022071	Baa nɩpɩra nuun sɩɛ na pi deɗ kha: «Aa ɓɩɛ sɩɛrɛ ʋɔ dʋ̃waʔ! Aa thĩra nuun ma ʋɔ thĩra sɩɛrɛdewensira ɩra!»
42023001	Na pɩ bɩɛ ɗɛ alɩn na khɩɛn Yesura yuor u Pilatɩ khɛrɛ.
42023002	Baa pɩ nann ni, na pɩ kɩ zarɩgɩ̃n ʋ ki de kha: «A gɔɗ ɓa wɛɩ wɩɛ na ʋ kpɛnsɛ a nɩpɩra ki ɓilen mi: U de pi wa kha hã pɩ taa Ɔrɔmʋ ɩtakhuo na ʋ lãmbora waʔ, ki gbũun deɗ tɩ̃ kha ʋɔ thĩra kɩ bʋ Yekire Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora, dɩ̃ɩna ɩtakhuo.»
42023003	Na Pilatɩra bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha: «Mʋɔ bʋ wa Yawutuwe ɩtakhuo ba?» Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Sɩɛ mu deɗi.»
42023004	Na Pilatɩra wãɗ na sɩɛrɛn na kperekpiidɛkhãga dɩ̃ɩna nɩgbosira bɩɛ kha: «Mɩɛ yãan wɛɩ wɩɛ zaragɩ̃nkhɛla waʔ.»
42023005	Ŋa na nɩpɩra maan ki de kha: «Ʋ karɩ̃nn ma a nɩpɩra na pi muritĩni. Ʋ gɔɗ sɩ wa Galile, na yuon Zude, kɩ ɓann harɩ fara ɩra.»
42023006	Baa Pilatɩra nuun sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra na ʋ bʋ̃ɗ ʋ kha: «Wɛɩ wɩɛ bʋ wa Galile nɩra ba?»
42023007	Na baa ʋ ɓan nuun kha Yesura kuɗ ɓa Galile, gɛŋɛ ɩtakhuora Erɔdɩ liin ɩyara, na ʋ dãan hãar ʋ ʋ naɗɩɛ Erɔdɩra kha bʋ Zeruzalɛmʋra sɩɛ ɗɩyãsɩra za.
42023008	Baa Erɔdɩra yãan Yesura, na ʋ bãanɛ wuon gbaangbo. Naɗɩɛ ʋ na nuun ma ʋ mɩyɛ harɩ khɔ̃ɩ, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ kha ɓɩɛ wa na yã ʋ u ɓu le bamʋŋa mɩyɛ ʋɔ ken.
42023009	Na ʋ bʋ̃kɩ̃nn Yesura na bʋ̃kɩ̃ngɔnsɛ, ŋa Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ harɩ daɓire tikpo za waʔ.
42023010	Kperekpiidakhãgawɛ dɩ̃ɩna Yekire sɩɛrɛdewense karɩ̃ndɛwɛ kha bʋ wa fɩ kɩ kɩ zarɩgɩ̃n ʋ na sɩɛrɛhʋwʋsɛ.
42023011	Na Erɔdɩra na ʋ sʋrasiwe hɩɗann kɩ gɔɗ ʋ gɔbɩ̃ɩwɛ. Na pɩ khɩɛn dayiinkɩ̃rɩga na yiir u ki ɓu kɩ lʋgʋtɩ̃n ʋ, kɩ yɩɛn na Erɔdɩra kha pɩ khɛ gbũu u Pilatɩra khɛrɛ.
42023012	Erɔdɩra dɩ̃ɩna Pilatɩra kha bʋ wa bɩ̃ɩrawɛ khɔ̃ɩra. Ŋa gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra na pi liin ma yɛsɛwɛ.
42023013	Na Pilatɩra bĩŋinn kperekpiidɛkhãgawɩra na wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra dɩ̃ɩna sɩrɩga nɩpɩra,
42023014	ki deɗ pi kha: «Ɩ̃ ɓan hãan mɩ wa wɛɩ wɩɛ ki deɗ kha u ɓilen ma nɩpɛ na ʋ karɩ̃na. Na mɩ bʋ̃kɩ̃nn ʋ ɩ̃ wʋɔla, mi gbũun yãan ɓilenkhɛrɛ sii ʋ za na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ ĩ deɗ na gbũun ʋ gɛŋɩra waʔ.
42023015	Erɔdɩra gbũun yãan ɓilenkhɛrɛ ʋ za tɩ̃ waʔ, naɗɩɛ u gbũun dãan hãar a wa ʋ. Wɛɩ wɩɛ liin mɩbɩ̃ɩnɛ kũu harɩ tɩ nan huume waʔ.
42023016	Mɩ yɩɛ wa pɩ khɩ ʋ na dazʋwʋrɛ kɩ yɩɛ mɩ zɩɛ ʋ.»
42023017	[Pakɩ fɛtɩ tʋɔ Pakɩ fɛtɩ, Pilatɩra kha kãn ma na yɩɛ pɩ vɔrɩ zɩɛ kasoɓiye ukpo.]
42023018	Ŋa na nɩpɩra ɗɛ hɩɗan kɩ dʋ kha: Yɩɛ pɩ khʋ wɛɩ wɩɛ kɩ vɔrɩ zɩɛ Barabasɩ.
42023019	Pɩ na gɔɗ yiin ma Barabasɩra kaso za, naɗɩɛ ʋɔ na nɩpɛ bʋɔ na paragadann gboŋira ʋ na khʋʋn nɩra.
42023020	Baa Pilatɩra kha ɓɩɛ na zɩɛ Yesura, na u gbũun sɩɛrɛn na nɩpɩra tɩ̃.
42023021	Ŋa na pɩ zʋrɩn na deɗ kha: «Ɩ̃ ɓa ʋ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za, ɩ̃ ɓa ʋ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za.»
42023022	Na Pilatɩra khɩɛn sɩɛsɩra bãnɩsãara za na deɗ pi kha: «Bɩra mɩbɩ̃ɩnɛ u liiri? Mɩɛ yãan mɩbɩ̃ɩnɛ sii ʋ za wɛtɩɛ za ʋ makɩ̃n na huumira waʔ. Mɩ yɩɛ wa pɩ khɩ ʋ na dazʋwʋrɛ kɩ yɩɛ mɩ zɩɛ ʋ.»
42023023	Ŋa na pɩ kɩ sɩɛ dʋɔ pɩ zʋrʋmɩra za kha Yesura kãn ma na ɓa nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za. Na pɩ bɛsɩra tiiri.
42023024	Si liin mafɩra na Pilatɩra khonn gagasɛ na hãan mɩ mɩɩna pɩ kha ɓɩɛ ɩra.
42023025	Wɛɩra na paragadann na nɩpɩra ki gbũun khʋʋn nɩrara, na u khonn zɩɛr ʋ kɩ hãan Yesura na sʋrasiwira kha pi le u mɩɩna nʋʋn nɩgbokɩra.
42023026	Bɛna pɩ kha yo na Yesura kha bɩɛ ɓa ʋ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za, na pɩ gbɩ̃ŋɩnn na Sirɛnɩ wɛɩ ʋɔ pɩ kha yɩ kha Simɔ̃, ʋɔ na kuɗ ɓa hʋʋga ʋ kɩ ɓan. Na sʋrasiwira gɔɗ ʋ na gboŋon u na nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra kha u ki thuo Yesura gɩ kpɩ̃rara ʋ.
42023027	Nɩgbokpakpaka kha thuo wa Yesura, dɩ̃ɩna hapɛ kha fʋʋ wa na pɩ vɩlɩ̃n ʋ kãma.
42023028	Na Yesura wãɗ kenn mi na deɗ kha: «Zeruzalɛmʋ hapɛ, hã ɩ̃ fʋʋ hã mɩɛ waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ fʋʋ hã wa ĩ thĩ dɩ̃ɩna ĩ ɓiiwira!
42023029	Naɗɩɛ khɩɛwɛ bʋɔ ɓa ɓan, pɩ ɓa de kha: “Hapɛ kɩ wɔrɩ ɓu ɓiiwe waʔ, pɩ wɔrɩn hũnn yãan waʔ, pi gbũun tʋ̃ʋrɛn ɓiye yãan waʔ, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa bɩɛ bɛgɛ!”
42023030	Na dɩɛ bɛna ɓa nannɩ, nɩpɛ ɓa ki de ɓa ɓɩɛsɛ na ɓɩɛdiʔe kha: “Sɩ kha bãa ɓɩɛsɛ wa a za dɩ̃ɩna ɓɩɛdiʔe guure a!”
42023031	Naɗɩɛ na pi liin ɩɛ mɩyɩra thĩna dahaɓɩkɩra za, bɩra kɩ ɓa nan dahahʋwʋgɩra gɩɛ?»
42023032	Pɩ kha yo wa na mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ khuowe pɩyɔ̃ kha bɩɛ khʋ bɩɛ na Yesura kamɛ ʋ.
42023033	Baa pi yo nann khaala pɩ yɩ kha: «Thahuwugo», na sʋrasiwira ɓaɗ Yesura nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra ʋ, kɩ ɓaɗ mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɩra yɔ̃ra tɩ̃, ʋɔra u leɗĩŋira ʋ, ʋɔra u lemɩŋɩra ʋ.
42023034	Na Yesura deɗ kha: «Mi Siye Yekire, yafa pɩ za, naɗɩɛ pɩ tʋ mɩɩna pi le waʔ.» Na pɩ khɩɛn ʋ dayiinsira na liin tɩ̃ɩtɩ̃ɩ na kpɩkɩ̃nn sɩ thanʋʋga za bɩɛ dola tɩɛ.
42023035	Nɩgbokira kha bʋ wa fɩ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ki ken. Yawutuwe wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra kha bʋ wa fɩ kɩ lʋgʋtɩ̃n Yesura ki de kha: «Ʋ zɩ̃nn nɩpɛ bʋɔra. Na ʋ bʋ wa Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromo tɩ̃ya wɩɛra Yekila khonni, ʋ zɩ̃n u thĩ ɩra!»
42023036	Sʋrasiwira kha lʋgʋtɩ̃n ʋ wa tɩ̃ kɩ zʋ̃ʋn nann ʋ na hãar ʋ dayʋ̃wãn ãmɛ.
42023037	Na deɗ u kha: «Na mʋ bʋ wa Yawutuwe ɩtakhuo, mʋ zɩ̃n mu thĩ!»
42023038	Sɛwʋsɛ sʋɔ kha bʋ daphoko gʋɔ za na ɓaɗ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za Yesura thadona lɔkɩra za kha: «Wɛɩ wɩɛ bʋ wa Yawutuwe ɩtakhuo.»
42023039	Mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɩra pɩyɔ̃ra pɩ na ɓaɗ nɩɓadaɓɔsɩra za, ukpora kha kʋsa wa Yesura kha: «Mʋɔ kɩ bʋ Yekire Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora waʔ ba? Zɩ̃n mu thĩ kɩ zɩ̃n aa!»
42023040	Ŋa na mɩbɩ̃yɛledaara ʋɔra sɔŋɔn ʋ ʋɔra za kha: «Mʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ vɛn sɩɛ vɛnkpuosira, mʋ ãn Yekila waʔ?
42023041	Aa ʋɔ makɩ̃nn ma na huumira za a bʋ mɩra, naɗɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɩra aa liiri, ɩɛ taasɩra aa ɓuuri. Ŋa wɛɩ wɩɛ, ʋɔ liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ sii waʔ.»
42023042	Na u deɗ Yesura kha: «Yesu, na mʋ ɓa khɩɛn mʋ ɩɩgɩra bɛndɛ bãa, mʋ kʋɔgɩ̃n dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ.»
42023043	Na Yesura zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Iyo, mi de ɓu wa sɩ, tɩ̃ya ʋ: Fɩ̃ɩra bɩɛ mʋ ɓa hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ arɩgɩ̃rana ʋ.»
42023044	Bɛna khɩɛra ɓa nann thaagɩra, na dabirige zɩ̃nn sɩrɩgɩra bɩɛ na ɓuun lɩɛrɩwɛ pɩsãa. Lowula na bãnabirin Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za, na dɩɛ hɛɩn sʋgʋmʋɗa ʋ.
42023046	Na Yesura zʋrɩn na kʋ̃nn kha: «Mi Siye Yekire, mi yii wa mi nina mu lese u.» Baa u deɗ sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra zuori, na u huuri.
42023047	Ɔrɔmʋ sʋrasiwe wʋɔrɛ nɩrara kha bʋ fɩ na yãan sɩɛ, na ʋ gbɩ̃nɛn Yekila ki deɗ kha: «Tɩ̃yara za, wɛɩ wɩɛ kha bʋ wa nɩtelenyemo thĩ!»
42023048	Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ pɩ na ɓann gbaangbo kenkhɛla na yãan ɩɛ mɩyɩra, na pɩ vɩɗ ki gbũu na yiin lese thaaga ʋ.
42023049	Yesura tʋdɛwɩra bɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna hapɩra bɩɛ na thuor u na khɛ gɩ Galilera, pɩ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ma legelege ki ken mɩyɩra kha le ɩra.
42023050	Wɛɩ ʋɔ kha bʋ na pɩ yɩ ʋ kha Zozɛfʋ, ʋɔ na kuɗ ɓa Arɩmatɩ. Yawutuwe gboŋo. Ʋɔ wɛɩ wɩɛ kha bʋ wa nɩkɩ̃ra dɩ̃ɩna nɩtelenyemo. Ʋ kha tɩɛ wa Yekila ɩɩgɩra ɓamɩra. Ʋ kha bʋ wa Yawutuwe sɩɛrɛɗidɛwɛ ʋɔ, gagasɩra bʋɔra na khonn kha bɩɛ le, ʋɔ na bɩɩn sɩ waʔ.
42023052	Na u yuon Pilatɩra khɛrɛ na yo yɩ̃nn ʋ kha ʋ hã ʋɔ Yesura kpɩ̃ɩgɩra.
42023053	Baa Zozɛfʋra ɓuun Yesura kpɩ̃ɩgɩra, na u sũnen ŋi nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za. Na u ɓĩnn ŋi na kasɩlowure na yo kasɩn ŋɩ danɛ dʋɔ za pɩ na phenen kɛrɩkɛ za. Pi gbũun na yiin nɩra dɩɛ danɩɛ za yãan waʔ.
42023054	Gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra gbũun na makɩ̃nn ma na Yawutuwe gbaarɩyawʋga labɛmɛ. Bɛna pɩ kasɩn ʋ, gbaarɩyawʋgɩra gɔɓɩra na yɩɛn ma kɩrɩ.
42023055	Hapɩra na thuon Yesura na kuɗ Galilera, pi na thuon ma Zozɛfʋra na yuon lugudana ni. Na pi kenn lɔmɩra za Yesura kpɩ̃ɩgɩra na hʋ̃nɛn yuon bʋ ɩra.
42023056	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na pɩ vɩɗ gbũun gboŋira ʋ na ɔfɔn kpɩ̃ɩgɩra nʋʋmɩra na latɩkɔlɩ. Gbaarɩyawʋgɩra ɗɩyãgɩra na pɩ hɩɗann gbaarɩnɩ, mʋ gaga kha baa sɩ na deɗ Yekila sɩɛrɛdewensɩra za.
42024001	Lɩɛtɩ ɗɩyãga bulonkhɔ̃ɩgɔ, na hapɛ khɩɛn latɩkɔlɩ nʋʋmɩra pɩ na liin na yuon mi lugudana ʋ.
42024002	Baa pi yo nann na pɩ yãan kha bʋla na bakan lugudana nʋʋna, tɩ na zʋ̃ʋn kuɗ ɓa.
42024003	Na pi lonni, ŋa pɩ yãan Adɛyɩra Yesura kpɩ̃ɩgɩra bʋ waʔ.
42024004	Pɩ gagasɛ bɩɛ na yãwɩgɩ̃nn ma sɩɛ za, pɩ kha tʋ mɩɩna pɩ gaga waʔ. Fɩ za na khuowe yɔ̃ ɗɛ kuɗ pɩ za. Pɩ dayiinsira kha yɩ̃ŋa wa.
42024005	Baa ãnabirise na gɔɗ pɩ na tannɩ, na pɩ ɓaɗɛn pɩ wʋɔyɛ fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ. Na bɩɛ khuobɩɛ deɗ pi kha: «Bena ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩkogolĩnko nɩhuome sʋgʋmʋ za?
42024006	Ʋ bʋ fara waʔ, u huun alɩn ma. Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ ʋ na deɗ ĩ baa ʋ kha bʋ Galilera ɩra,
42024007	ʋ kha de ɓa kha: “Fɔ Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiira gɔ yii mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ lese za, pɩ ɓa ʋ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za, kɩ yɩɛ u hu na gbũu arɩ khɩɛwɛ sãara za.”»
42024008	Na hapɩra ɗɛ kʋɔgɩ̃nn na Yesura sɩɛsɩra.
42024009	Na pi kuɗ lugudana ʋ na yo kpɔrɩn sɩ na karɩ̃nɓiiwe gbũne na ukpora dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɛ bʋɔra kha thuo Yesura.
42024010	Bɩɛ hapɩɛ kha bʋ wa Magɩdala Marɩyama, na Zanɩ na Zakɩ yaa Marɩyama na hapɩra bʋɔra kha bʋ dɩ̃ɩn mɩ, bɩɛ kha de Yesura dãarawɩra sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra.
42024011	Baa dãarawɩra nuun sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra na pi kenn si wa sɩɛrɛ kpasɩsɛ, pɩ khãan sɩ za waʔ.
42024012	Ŋa na Pɩɛrɩra alɩn na kpiin laɗɛ na yo nann lugudana ʋ. Baa ʋ nann na u gbisen na yãan ma kasɩlowupheʔe dola. Na bamʋŋa khonn u na mɩyɩra bɩɛ na liin ɩra, na ʋ vɩɗ khũnni.
42024013	Gɩɛ ɗɩyãga kpuogira na karɩ̃nɓiiwe pɩyɔ̃ khɩɛn khɩ̃nɛ ki yo gboŋo gʋɔ za pɩ kha yɩ kha Emayusi. Gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ na Zeruzalɛmʋra kha nan ma lɩɛrɩwɛ pɩyɔ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɛ̀.
42024014	Mɩyɩra bɩɛ na liiri, pɩ kha bʋ wa ki de ɩɛ.
42024015	Bɛna pɩ kha bʋ kɩ sɩɛrɛ na pi bo na kamɛ, na Yesura thĩra zʋ̃ʋn nann mɩ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ dɩ̃ɩn mɩ.
42024016	Pɩ kha yã ʋ, ŋa si na liin ma pɩ khɛrɛ mʋ gaga kha mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ na bakan pi yiwiyira, pɩ wɔrɩn tʋʋr ʋ yãan waʔ.
42024017	Na Yesura bʋ̃ɗ pɩ kha: «Bɩra ĩ bo ki de na ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ mɩra?» Na pɩ bɩɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n na kpãɗ wʋɔyɛ.
42024018	Pɩyɔ̃ra za, wɩɛra pɩ kha yɩ kha Kilowopasɩ, na ʋɔ deɗ u kha: «Zeruzalɛmʋ nɩpɩra bɩɛ za, mʋɔ kpora kɩ bʋ kɛɩ tʋ mɩɩna liin khɩɛbɩɛ za ba?»
42024019	Na ʋ bʋ̃ɗ pɩ kha: «Bɩra liiri?» Na pɩ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Mɩɩna nann Nazarɛtɩ Yesura ɩra! Ʋ kha bʋ wa Yekire yãdedaagbʋ̃ɔmɔ. Ʋ sɩɛsɩra na u liigesira kha bʋ wa na wɔrɩkɔ Yekila dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɩra bɩɛ wʋɔla ʋ.
42024020	A Yekire kperekpiidɛkhãgawɩra na a wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra gɔɗ hãar ʋ wa kha pɩ ɓa ʋ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za na khʋ ʋ.
42024021	A na khãan ma sɩ za kha ʋɔ kɩ ɓa kuore Ɩsɩrayɛlɩra. Ŋa ʋ fɩ̃ɩra kɩ bʋ u huume khɩɛwɛ sãara.
42024022	Ŋa aa nɩgboko hapɛ bʋɔra gbũun khonn a wa bamʋŋa gbaangbo. Pi yuon ma lugudana ʋ buloŋira khɔ̃ɩ,
42024023	ŋa pɩ yãan kpɩ̃ɩgɩra bʋ waʔ. Na pi gbũun ɓan kpɔrɩn a kha mɛlɛgɛwɛ kuɗ bɩɛ za na deɗ bɩɛ kha Yesura bʋ wa thakuogo za.
42024024	Sɩɛ za na a nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀dakamɛ bʋɔ yuon lugudana ʋ na yo ɓuun ma mɩyɩra mʋ gaga kha baa hapɩra na ɓan deɗ si ɩra, ŋa pɩ yãan ʋɔ thĩra waʔ.»
42024025	Dɩɛ bɛna na Yesura deɗ pi kha: «Nɩpɛ kɛɩ le wʋɔmɛ, sɩɛsɩra bɩɛ Yekire yãdedɛwɩra deɗi, ɩ̃ khãamɩra wuo wa sɩ za!
42024026	Yekire Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora kha kãn vɛn mafɩra kɩ tʋ lon ʋ ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɛ za wa ba?»
42024027	Na sɩɛsɩra bɩɛ na sɛwɛn na gbũun ʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ za, na gɔ sɩɛsɩra Yekila hãan Moyizi na yo gbɩɛ ʋ yãdedɛwɛ bɩɛ sɩɛsɩra za, na Yesura ɓɔgɔn mɩ mɩɩna sɩ kha de ɩra.
42024028	Baa pi yo yĩmin gboŋira za pɩ kha yo, na Yesura liin mʋ gaga kha ʋ tãra wa na yo wʋɔrɛ ʋ.
42024029	Ŋa na pɩ maan na yɩ̃nn ʋ na deɗ u kha: «Hɩɗan na aa, naɗɩɛ khɩɛra wa wa, khaala ɓa lɛɩ te waʔ.» Na ʋ bɩɩn na hɩɗann pi heke.
42024030	Baa pɩ ɓa hɩɗann ɗikhɛla za, na ʋ khɩɛn buru, na thɩɛn Yekila ki kpekĩnn u na hãan mɩ ʋ.
42024031	Dɩɛ bɛna na pi yiwiyira ɗɛ phiin zɩɛrɩ, kɩ yɩɛn na pɩ tʋʋr ʋ. Ŋa na ʋ ɗɛ tũrun pɩ wʋɔla ʋ fɩ.
42024032	Na pi deɗ kamɛ kha: «Sɩ kha bʋ wa bãanwuokpakpaka a khɛrɛ bɛna ʋ kha sɩɛrɛ a khɩ̃na ʋ na ʋ ɓɔgɔ a sɛwʋsɩra kɔrɩwɩra, warɩma mʋsɛ?»
42024033	Dɩɛ khaala za fɩ na pɩ ɗɛ alɩn na vɩɗ gbũun Zeruzalɛmʋra na ɓuun karɩ̃nɓiiwe gbũne na ukpora na pi bĩŋinn na pɩ kamɩra.
42024034	Na bɩɛ deɗ karɩ̃nɓiiwira yɔ̃ra kha: «Adɛyɩra gbũun alɩn ma huumira za tɩ̃ya! Ʋ ɓɔgɔn u thĩ na Simɔ̃.»
42024035	Na karɩ̃nɓiiwe pɩyɔ̃ra khɩɛn mɩyɩra na liin bɩɛ khɩ̃na za, na kpɔrɩn ɩ, dɩ̃ɩna lɔmɩra za bɩɛ tʋʋn Yesura bɛna ʋ kha kpekĩn bula ɩra.
42024036	Baa pɩ kha bʋ kɩ sɩɛrɛ mafɩra, na Yesura thĩra ɓan nɩ́ɩrɛ́n pɩ sʋgʋmʋra za na deɗ pi kha: «Yekire hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo!»
42024037	Na ãnabirise gɔɗ pɩ gbaangbo harɩ na pɩ kɩ gban, naɗɩɛ pɩ kha ken ma kha sĩsĩgãrɩga bɩɛ yãarɩ.
42024038	Ŋa na Yesura deɗ pi kha: «Bena ɩ̃ ãnn gbaangbo mɩra? Bena ĩ sige sige ĩ kpolonsira ʋ mɩra?
42024039	Ĩ ken mi lesira na mɩ ɗɩɛsɩra, mɩɛ thĩra ʋ kũu! Ĩ pho mɩ za na ken, naɗɩɛ sĩsĩgãrɩga bʋ na gbɔkhaasɛ na huwure mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ waʔ.»
42024040	Baa ʋ kha de pi sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra na ʋ ɓɔgɔn mɩ u lesira na ʋ ɗɩɛsɩra.
42024041	Baa karɩ̃nɓiiwira bãanyɛ na wuon tannɩ, na si liin bamʋŋa pɩ khɛrɛ. Pɩ kha khãa sɩ za waʔ. Na Yesura bʋ̃ɗ pɩ kha: «Ɩ̃ bʋ na ɗimɩɩnɛ khaadɩɛ na ɗi wa?»
42024042	Na pɩ hãar ʋ ɓurowɩ̃yamɔ gbũŋo.
42024043	Na ʋ zɩ̃nn ŋɩ na khʋɔn ŋɩ pɩ wʋɔla za fɩ.
42024044	Sɩɛ liin na u deɗ pi kha: «Bɛna mɩ kha bʋ ɩ̃, mɩ na deɗ ĩ wa kha: Wɛsɩɛ sɛwɛn na deɗ mɩɛ mɩyɩra Moyizi sɩɛsɩra za, Yekire yãdedɛwɛ sɛwʋsɩra za na tɩ̃nsɛ sɛwʋra za, sɩɛ bɩɛ kãn ma na le.»
42024045	Na u phiin zɩɛn pɩ wʋɔmɩra pi ɓu tʋ Yekila sɛwʋra sɩɛsɩra kɔla.
42024046	Kɩ yɩɛn na u deɗ pi kha: «Ĩ ken wɛsɩɛ sɛwɛn kha Yekila Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora kãn ma na vɛn, ki hu na arɩ ɗɩyãsɛ sãara za,
42024047	kɩ yɩɛ ʋ yɩsɩgɩra kãma za, pi de thĩnyira bɩɛ, na khɛ Zeruzalɛmʋra, kha nɩpɛ vɩkɩ̃n pi kpolonsira pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɩra ɓu yafa pɩ za.
42024048	Ɩ̃ɛ kɩ bʋ ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ sɩɛrɛwɩra na yo kpɔrɩ bʋɔra ɩ.
42024049	Na mɩɛ ʋɔ, mi Siye Yekila Nina ʋ na deɗ kha ʋɔ ɓa hã ɩ̃, mɩɛ thĩra ɓa dãa hã ɩ̃ ʋ. Ŋa ɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ hɩɗan gboŋo kpoloŋira ɓanu kha ĩ hĩi na ʋɔ zaazaa Nina wɔrɩkɩra.»
42024050	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na Yesura khɩɛn karɩ̃nɓiiwira na pi kuɗ gboŋira ʋ na u yuon mi Betanɩ gɛŋɛ. Baa pɩ nann dɩɛ khaala ʋ, na ʋ arɩgan lese na kɩ̃ran mɩ.
42024051	Bɛna ʋ kha bʋ kɩ kɩ̃ra pɩ, na Yekila khonn u pɩ sʋgʋmʋra za na gann ʋ zaara ni.
42024052	Na karɩ̃nɓiiwira bɩɛ, baa bɩɛ gbɩ̃nɛn ʋ zuori, na pɩ vɩɗ gbũun Zeruzalɛmʋra na bãanwuonkpakpaka.
42024053	Pɩ kha yo wa Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra ʋ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila bãanyɛ bɩɛ.
43001001	Mɩyɩra bɩɛ gɔbɛna lʋgʋsɩra za, wɩɛra pɩ kha yɩ kha sɩɛsɩra, ʋ kha bʋ wa bʋ, ʋɔ na Yekila kha bʋ, u gbũu kha bʋ wa Yekire.
43001002	Ʋ kha bʋ wa na Yekila bɛna dunuyara tiin ɩra.
43001003	Ʋɔ Yekila khɩɛn na u liin mɩyɩra bɩɛ; mɩɩnɛ sii liin kɛɩ le ʋɔ waʔ.
43001004	Thakuogira kha bʋ wa ʋɔ heke. Gɩɛ thakuogɩra kha bʋ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ yɛyɛɓɩra.
43001005	Bɩɛ yɛyɛɓɩra kɩ yɛɗɛ dabirigira, ŋa dabirigira bɩɩn mɩ waʔ.
43001006	Na Yekila dãan wɛɩ ʋɔ pɩ kha yɩ kha Zã.
43001007	Ʋɔ ɓann ma mʋ gaga kha sɩɛrɛ, na ɓa ɓɔgɔ yɛyɛɓɩra mɩyɛ si le thaaga nɩpɛ bɩɛ khãan yɛyɛɓɩra za ʋɔ sɩɛsɩra kãmara za.
43001008	Ʋɔ kha bʋ yɛyɛɓɩra waʔ, ŋa ʋ kha kãn ma na le sɩɛrɛ na ɓɔgɔ dɛyɩra kɩ bʋ yɛyɛɓɩra ɩra.
43001009	Bɩɛ yɛyɛɓɩra kpora kha bʋ yɛyɛthĩnthĩmira na ɓann dunuyara za na ɓa yɛɗɛn nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɩɛ.
43001010	Ʋɔ wɩɛra pɩ kha yɩ kha sɩɛsɩra tɩ̃, ʋɔ kha bʋ wa dunuyara za. Ʋɔ liin dunuyara, kɛna dunuyara tʋʋr ʋ waʔ.
43001011	Ʋ ɓann ma ʋɔ thĩra sɩrɩgɩra za, ŋa ʋ sɩrɩgɩra nɩpɩra bɩɩr ʋ waʔ.
