44025011	Na mɩɛ na ɓilenn ma warɩma na mɩɩnɛ mɩɛ liin na tɩ nann khʋʋmɛ mɩɛ kɛɩn huume waʔ. Ŋa na tɩ̃ya kɩ bʋ wɛsɩɛ pi deɗ kha mɩɛ liin waʔ, nɩra wɔrɩ hã mɩɛ pi le mɩɛ lɔmɩra za pɩ khɔrɩ waʔ. Mɩɛ yo wa na mɩ sɩɛsɩra Ɔrɔmʋ ɩtakhuogbʋ̃ŋɩra khɛrɛ.»
44025012	Baa Fɛsɩtusɩra na ʋ ɓɔdɛwɩra yãan kamɛ zuori, na u deɗ kha: «Mu deɗ kha mʋɔ yo wa na mʋɔ sɩɛsɩra ɩtakhuogbʋ̃ŋɩra khɛrɛ waʔ, nineni mʋ ɓa yo.»
44025013	Baa si ɓuun khɩɛwɛ bʋɔ na ɩtakhuo Agiripa na Berenisi ɓann Sezarera kha bɩɛ thɩɛ Fɛsɩtusira.
44025014	Baa pi liin khɩɛ gɔmɛ, na Fɛsɩtusira khɩɛn Polira mɩyɛ na deɗ ɩtakhuora kha: «Wɛɩ ʋɔ bʋ fara na Felikisi bakan zɩɛr ʋ kaso za.
44025015	Baa mɩɛ na yuon Zeruzalɛmʋra, na Yekila kperekpiidɛwɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra na Yawutuwe wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra yɩɗ ʋ mɩɛ khɛrɛ na yɩ̃nn mɩɛ kha mɩɛ zarɩgɩ̃n wɛɩra kɩ yɩɛ pɩ khʋ ʋ.
44025016	Na mɩɛ zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha na ɩ̃ kha nɩra liin mɩɩnɛ, aa Ɔrɔmʋwɩra heke a wɔrɩ hã ʋ mɩra ĩ le u lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ khɔrɩ waʔ. Ŋa aa yɩ ɓa ʋɔ na wɛpɛ pi deɗ kha u liin mɩɩnɛ ɩra, na yii wi fɩ, kɩ yɩɛ ʋ dɛyɩra sɩɛrɛ na ɓu zɩ̃n u thĩ.
44025017	Mɩɛ na bɩɛ ɓann fara kpuore. Baa ɗɩɩgɩra yɛkɩ̃nn mɩɛ tɩɛn dʋɔ dʋ̃waʔ, na mɩɛ yuon ma na yo hɩɗann mɩ sɩɛrɛɗikhɛla za kɩ kha pɩ khɛ wɛɩra ɓan ʋ.
44025018	Baa ʋ ɓann zuori, mɩbɩ̃ɩnyɩra mɩɛ kha ken kha pɩ ɓa de kha u liiri, pi deɗ ɩɛ waʔ.
44025019	Bɩɛ na Polira kha bakɩ̃n kamɛ pi Yekire khɩ̃nɛ doro mɩyɛ za dɩ̃ɩna kha wɛɩ ʋɔ pɩ kha yɩ kha Yesu u huun ma kɛna Polira kha ʋ bʋ wa thakhuogo za.
44025020	Baa mɩɛ kha tʋ mɩɩna mɩɛ le boɓɩra thĩna za waʔ, na mɩɛ bʋ̃ɗ Polira na ɓu tʋ na ʋ ɓɩɛ wa na yo na ʋ sɩɛsɩɛra Zeruzalɛmʋra, pi yo ɗi si ni.
44025021	Na ʋ kha ʋɔ ɓɩɛ kha si yo wa ɩtakhuo Sezare khɛrɛ. Na mɩɛ kha pɩ yɩɛ ʋ kasora ʋ fɔ na nan bɛna mɩɛ ɓa yɩɛ pi yo u ʋ khɛrɛ.»
44025022	Na Agiripa deɗ Fɛsitusira kha: «Mɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa tɩ̃ na nuure wɛɩ wɩɛ sɩɛsɩra.» Na ʋ zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha: «Dɩ̃ɩ mʋ ɓa nuure u.»
44025023	Baa ɗɩɩgɩra yɛkɩ̃nnɩ, na Agiripara na Berenisira ɓann nɩgbʋ̃ɔɓamɛ na ɓa lonn bĩŋinkhɛla za bɩɛ na Ɔrɔmʋ sʋrasiwe wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra na gboŋo wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra. Na Fɛsɩtusira yɩɛn na pɩ ɓann na Polira.
44025024	Baa pɩ ɓann ʋ na Fɛsɩtusira ɗɛ deɗ kha: «Ɩtakhuo Agiripa na nɩpɩra bɩɛ pi bĩŋinn na aa kpuola ɩra, ĩ ken wɛɩra za Yawutuwira bɩɛ ɗɩɛn na ɓann mɩɛ khɛrɛ bɛna mɩɛ kha bʋ Zeruzalɛmʋra na fara thĩra kɩ kɩ dʋ kha ʋ kãn ma na khʋ.
44025025	Na mɩɛ ʋɔ, mɩɛ yãan mɩɩna u liin wɛtɛ nann khʋʋmɛ waʔ. Ŋa baa ʋɔ thĩra kha ʋɔ yo wa na ʋɔ sɩɛsɩra ɩtakhogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra khɛrɛ, na mɩɛ kha mɩɛ yɩɛ wa u yo ʋ khɛrɛ.
44025026	Mɩɛ ʋɔ bʋ na mɩɩnɛ wɛtɛ mɩ wɔrɩ sɛwɛ hã ɩtakhuo gbʋ̃ɔŋira ʋ mɩyɩra za waʔ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ yɩɛn na ʋ ɓann mʋɔ ɩtakhuo Agiripa thĩra wʋɔla ʋ kũu na ɩ̃ bɩɛ wʋɔla ʋ, ɩ̃ ɔfɔ ken ʋ sɩɛsɩra, si le thaaga mɩɛ ɓu dʋɔ na sɛwɛ.
44025027	Mɩɛ kenn ma kha sɩ makɩ̃n mɩɛ yɩɛ pi yo na kasoɓiye mɩra kɛɩ ɓɔgɔ mɩɩna pi deɗ kha u liin waʔ.»
44026001	Agiripa deɗ Polira kha: «Mʋ wɔrɩ sɩɛrɛ na de mʋ tɩ̃yara.» Na Polira arɩgan leke ki deɗ kha:
44026002	«Ɩtakhuo Agiripa, mɩyɩra bɩɛ Yawutuwira deɗ kha mɩɛ liin ɩra, sɩ nʋʋn ma mɩɛ fɩ̃ɩra baa mɩɛ ɓuun kɩ sɩɛrɛ mʋ wʋɔla ʋ mɩ tɩ̃yara za ɩra.
44026003	Naɗɩɛ mʋ tʋ Yawutuwira sini mɩyɛ na bakɩ̃nsɩra kɩ bʋ pɩ za kɩ̃raŋɩra. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ yɩ̃n mʋ wa kha mu ken mu thĩ za na nuure mɩ sɩɛsɩra kɩ̃raŋɩra.»
44026004	«Baa mɩɛ kha bʋ Zeruzalɛmʋra mɩɛ thĩnɩpɩra sʋgʋmʋra za, na gɔ kɩ halɩ mɩɛ nakɔrɩɓonbɛna za ɩra, Yawutuwira bɩɛ tʋ mɩɛ lɔmɩra.
44026005	Pɩ tʋʋn mɩɛ fɩ̃ɩra waʔ, na pɩ ɓɩɛ na de tɩ̃ya, pɩ wɔrɩ le mɩɛ sɩɛrɛwɛ. Naɗɩɛ Yawutuwira Yekire gbɩ̃nɛgɩra za, Farɩzɩ̃mɩra khɩ̃na kɩ hʋgan gbaangbora. Dɩɛ khɩ̃na za mɩɛ gbũu bʋ.
44026006	Ɩra wɩɛ baa mɩɛ khãan nʋʋgɩra za Yekila hãan a sekhãgawɩra, gɩɛ yɩɛn na pi kiti mɩɛ.
44026007	Aa thĩnye gbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃ra kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila kɛɩ gbaa khɩɛgɛ na dawogɩra bɩɛ, bʋ tɩɛ wa ɗɩyãgɩra Yekila ɓa hĩiɗe gɩɛ nʋhãaŋɩra. Ɩtakhuo Agiripa, baa mɩɛ khãan gɩɛ za, sɩɛ za Yawutuwira ɗɩɛn kɩ bagan mɩɛ za.
44026008	Be liin na ɩ̃ɛ Yahutuwira khãa kha Yekila wɔrɩ arɩga wa nɩhuumira waʔ?
44026009	Na mɩɛ ʋɔ, mɩɛ thĩra kha pɛ̃ɩ wa kha fɔ mɩɛ hʋgan na bĩi Nazarɛtɩ Yesura yɩsɩgɩra.
44026010	Na sɩɛ mɩɛ liin Zeruzalɛmʋra. Mɩ na ɓuun ma wɔrɩkɔ Yekila kperekpiidɛwɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra khɛrɛ na gɔɗ Yesura nɩgɔmɛ na bakan mɩ. Na pɩ na kha pɩ khʋ wɩ, mɩɛ bɩ sɩ wa.
44026011	Bɛngɔnyɛ za mɩɛ kha yo wa Yawutuwira Yekila yɩ̃nthʋʋsɩra bɩɛ za na gbʋ̃ʋrɛ pɩ wʋɔrɛ ki le wi legbene pɩ kɛɩ Yesura. Baa mɩɛ doŋira kha hĩi dɩ̃ɩn mɩ kɩ̃raŋɩra, mɩɛ thĩra kha yo wa sɩrɩmaansɛ za kɩ vɛnɛ wɩ.»
44026012	«Mafɩra si ɓuuri, na Yekila kperekpiidɛwɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra hãan mɩɛ khɩ̃na na wɔrɩkɔ, na mɩɛ alɩn ki yo Damasɩra.
44026013	Ɩtakhuo Agiripa, baa mɩɛ kha bʋ yuomira za, na khɩɛra ɓɩɛ nan thaagɩra, na mɩɛ yãan yɛyɛɓɛ na pi kuɗ zaazaara ni na tɩrɩn na vĩin mirin mɩɛ na mɩɛ sɩrɩyodɛkamɩra. Kɩ yɛyɛɓɩra kha so tãra khɩɛra.
44026014	Na aa waan fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ na mɩɛ nuun nʋʋga Eburusira za kha: “Soli, Soli bena mʋ vɛnɛ mɩɛ mɩra? Baa naara kɛɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɛ̀ pɩ khɩ ʋ ʋ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀, mafɩra tɩ̃, na mu nuun mɩ bɛla waʔ, mʋ ɓa wɔrɩ koʔ mɩ gbʋ̃ʋnsɩra waʔ.”
44026015	Na mɩ kha: “Adɛyɛ, ãna kpuo kɩ bʋ mʋ?” Na Adɛyɩra kha: “Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yesura mʋ vɛnɛ mɩra.
44026016	Ŋa arɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́, mɩ ɓɔgɔn ma mi thĩ na mʋɔ na ɓu le mu mi miliindaa, mʋ ɓa le mɩ sɩɛrɛ na de lɔmɩra mʋ yãan mɩ fɩ̃ɩra, ki de mɩyɛ mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ mʋ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃ ɩra.
44026017	Mɩ ɓa zɩ̃n mʋ na Yawutuwira dɩ̃ɩna thĩmaanyɩra nɩpɩra khɛrɛ mɩ ɓa dãan mʋ ɩra.
44026018	Mɩ dãa mʋ wa mu yo phii zɩɛ pi yiwiyira, pɩ vɩ dãa dabirigira kpɩ̃ra kɩ vɩ yɛyɛɓɩra ʋ, na vɩ dãa Sutana wɔrɩkɩra kpɩ̃ra kɩ vɩ Yekila za. Na pɩ khãa mɩɛ za, Yekila ɓa zɩɛ pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɩra kɩ yɩɛ pi le kpuore na wɛpɛ liin ʋ nɩpɩra ɩra.”»
44026019	«Ɩtakhuo Agiripa, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ liin numigbɩka wɛsɩɛ Yekila yɩɛn na mɩɛ yãan mɩra waʔ,
44026020	Ŋa Damasɩra nɩpɩra mɩɛ nisĩnn deɗ kha pɩ vɩkɩ̃n pi kpolonsira kɩ vɩ gbũu Yekila za, ki le mɩyɩra kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha pɩ vɩkɩ̃nn pi kpolonsira na zɩɛn pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira. Baa mɩɛ deɗ Damasɩra nɩpɩra sɩɛ zuori, na mɩɛ yuon na deɗ Zeruzalɛmʋra nɩpɩra na Zude sɩrɩga nɩpɩra bɩɛ si kpuosira, sɩɛ kpɩ̃rara za na mɩɛ yo deɗ thĩmaanɩpɩra si tɩ̃.
44026021	Ɩɛ mɩyɩra za Yawutuwira ɗɩɛn kɩ gɔɗ mɩɛ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za kɩ ɓɩɛ kha pɩ khʋ mɩɛ.
44026022	Na Yekila tɩɛgɛn mɩɛ na yɩɛ mɩ thakuogo za na yo nann fɩ̃ɩra ki de Yekila mɩyɛ nɩgbʋ̃ɔmɩra na nɩpɩra bɩɛ. Mɩɛ deɗ dɔ mɩkpasɩrɛ na wɛsɩɛ Moyizira sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na Yekila yãdedɛwɩra sɛwʋra deɗ kha sɩ ɓa nan waʔ.
44026023	Pi deɗ ɓa kha fɔ Kirisitira vɛn halɩ na hu, na le nɩra wɛ u nisĩnn alɩn huumira za ɩra, ki de yɛyɛɓɩra mɩyɛ liin zɩ̃mɩra mɩyɛ na aa Yawutuwira na thĩmaanyɩra ɩra.»
44026024	Baa Polira kha sɩɛrɛ ki de ʋ tɩ̃yara, na Fɛsɩtusira dʋɗ ʋ za kha: «Poli, mʋ phʋ̃rɩn ma ba? Mʋ tʋʋn ma sɛwɛ na tannɩ, na mʋ thaagɩra tann alɩnɩ?»
44026025	Na Polira deɗ kha: «Nɩgbʋ̃ɔmɔ Fɛsɩtusɩ, mɩ phʋ̃rɩn waʔ, ŋa tɩ̃ya na wʋɔntʋsɩɛsɛ mi de.
44026026	Na ɩtakhuo Agiripa tʋʋmɛ bʋ ɩ mɩyɩra za. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ wɔrɩ kɩ sɩɛrɛ ʋ kɛɩ dʋ̃nɛ. Mɩɛ khãan ma na tʋʋn kha ʋɔ kʋɔ mɩɩnɛ bʋ waʔ, naɗɩɛ si guuren deɗ dalɔkɔ ʋ waʔ.
44026027	Ɩtakhuo Agiripa, mʋ khãan Yekila yãdedɛwɩra sɩɛsɩra za ba? Mɩ tʋ kha mʋ khãan sɩ za.»
44026028	Na Agiripa deɗ Polira kha: «Mʋ yɩɛn ma kɩrɩ, mʋ naa ɓa yɩɛ mi le kiretɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃.»
44026029	Na Polira zɩ̃ŋɩn ʋ kha: «Harɩ na sɩ yɩɛn ma kɩrɩ warɩma gbaangbo mu le kiretɩ̃ɛ, wɛsɩɛ mɩɛ ɓɩɛ ɩra, mʋɔ kpora mɩɛ deɗ dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa mʋɔ na wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ pi nuure mɩɛ sɩɛsɩra fɩ̃ɩra ɩra, Yekila yɩɛ ɩ̃ hɩɗan kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ, ŋa hã pɩ ɓa vɔ ɩ̃ na zɔrɩgɔsɛ waʔ.»
44026030	Baa Polira deɗ sɩɛ, na ɩtakhuora na gʋvɛrɩnɛrɩra na Berenisira na nɩpɩra bɩɛ kha bʋ fɩ, na pɩ ɗɛ alɩnɩ.
44026031	Baa pɩ kha kure, na pi ki de kamɛ kha: «Wɛɩ wɩɛ liin mɩɩna nann khʋʋmɛ warɩma pɩ vɔ ʋ na zɔrɩgɔsɛ waʔ.»
44026032	Na Agiripara deɗ Fɛsitusira kha: «Na wɛɩ wɩɛ na deɗ kha ʋɔ yo wa na ʋ sɩɛsɩra Ɔrɔmʋ ɩtakhogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra khɛrɛ waʔ, m ʋ naa wɔrɩ zɩɛ ʋ.»
44027001	Khɩɛra pɩ na ɓɔgɔn aa kha a ɓa yo Itali sɩrɩgɩra ʋ batona za, baa ʋɔ nannɩ, na pi yiin Polira na kasoɓiiwe bʋɔ Ɔrɔmʋ ɩtakhuo gbʋ̃ɔŋira sʋrasiwe gboko wʋɔrɛ nɩra Zuliyusira leke za.
44027002	Na a khɩɛn baton ʋɔ na kuɗ Adaramiti ki yo gbonsira kɩ bʋ lagagborogengira Azi sɩrɩgɩra ʋ. Aa na Arɩsɩtakɩra na kuɗ Masedʋwanɩ kɩ bʋ Tesalonikira sɩrɩgɩra ʋ, kha bʋ batona ʋ kpuore.
44027003	Kɩ gɔɗɩɛkɩ̃n na a nɩ́ɩrɛ́n Sidɔ̃nɩ. Zuliyusira kha gɔ ɓa Polira kɩ kɩ̃ra. Ʋ kha yɩɛ wa na u yo ʋ yɛsɛwɩra khɛrɛ, pi yo hã ʋ wɛtɛ za ʋ vɛn ɩra.
44027004	Baa a kuɗ dɩɛ khaala ʋ, na a khɩɛn lagagborogeŋira ki yo Sipuru sɩrɩga ʋ naɗɩɛ baa saraŋɩra kha thukĩn a ɩra.
44027005	Na a thuo lagagborola kɩ bʋ Silisi sɩrɩga na Pãfili sɩrɩga lɔkɩra ʋ na nann Miri kɩ bʋ Lisi sɩrɩgɩra ʋ ɩra.
44027006	Dɩɛ khaala Ɔrɔmʋ sʋrasiwe wʋɔrɛ nɩrara yãan baton ʋɔ na u kuɗ Alɛkɩsãdɩrɩ ki yo Itali, na ʋ yɩɛn na a lonn ʋɔ za.
44027007	A liin ma khɩɛ gɔmɛ na a bʋ wa yuomira za yɛrɩtɛtɛ. A vɛnn ma kɩ tʋʋn nann Kinidisi sɩrɩgɩra ʋ. Baa saraŋɩra kha thukĩn a, a kha wɔrɩ yo waʔ, na a thuon Salamone sɩrɩgɩra na maan Kɩrɛtɩ sɩrɩgɩra za na tannɩ.
44027008	Baa a kha fɛkɩ̃n, a vɛnn ma kɩ tʋʋn nann baton nɩ́ɩrɛ́nkhɛrɛla wɛtɛ pɩ yɩ kha Bopɔrɩ. Dɩɛ khaala kha legen na gboŋira pɩ yɩ kha Lazaya waʔ.
44027009	A yuomira lɛɩn ma dɩɛ tana ʋ na ɓuun khɩɛ gɔmɛ na a wɔrɩ yo waʔ. Na sɩrɩyuogira ɔfɔn hɩɗan na anabirise naɗɩɛ Yawutuwe sũna ɗɩyãgara thĩra na tann ma zuori. Na Polira deɗ kha:
44027010	«A nɩpɛ, a kɔrɩsɩ̃n kha na a kha a yo, mɩɛ yãan ma na sɩ ɓa hʋgan, sɩ ɓa ɓan asɩga gbaangbo batona na dagbolonsira na dɩkɩ̃n na a thĩra thakuogira.»
44027011	Ŋa Ɔrɔmʋ sʋrasiwe wʋɔrɛ nɩrara buɗ ʋ sɩɛsɩra waʔ, ʋ kha khãa wa baton horodaara na ʋ dɛyɩra za.
44027012	Baa sɩ kha kɩ̃ra nɩra hɩɗan dɩɛ baton nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛla za wese bɛna waʔ, na nɩgɔngɔmɛ kha a arɩ fɩ ki yo, na a wɔrɩ, a nan Fenisi na hɩɗan fɩ wese bɛna yo zuo. Kɩrɛtɩ baton nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛla dʋɔ ɩ tɩ̃. Dɩɛ baton nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛla wʋɔla na dãan ma khɩɛwaga gbaangbo.
44027013	Baa sarandaaɗɛ alɩn ki vu lemɩgɛŋɩra ɩra, na pi ken ma kha bɩɛ ɓa wɔrɩ tãra wa. Na pɩ arɩgan daagɩra kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ batona ɩra, na a khɩɛn kɩ maan Kɩrɛtɩ gɛŋɛ ki yo.
44027014	Ŋa baa a kha yo, sɩ lɛɩn waʔ na saragbʋ̃ɔŋɩra pɩ yɩ kha Erakilonɩra kuɗ Kɩrɛtɩ zaa gɛŋɩra ki vu.
44027015	Baa saraŋɩra kha bʋ na faŋa gbaangbo ɩra, na kɩ khɩɛn kɩ tãra a, a kha wɔrɩ le mɩɩnɛ dʋ̃waʔ, na a ɗɛ yɩɛn a thĩ na kɩ khɩɛn ki yo a dere.
44027016	Na a thuon sɩrɩga gʋɔ lɔkɔ za ãmɛ na vĩin mirin ŋi, gɩɛ pɩ yɩ kha Koda, na si liin thaaga na gɩɛ barɩn a saraŋɩra. A vɛnn ma kɩ̃raŋɩra kɩ tʋʋn wɔrɩn yann kusen batonɓila ãmɩra za.
44027017	Nɩpɩra kha liige batona za, na bɩɛ ganɛn nɩ na vɔɗ tɩ kɩ vɔɗ batona thĩra na u ɓuun faŋa. Baa pɩ kha dʋ̃nɛ kha bɩɛ ɓa yo dii Libi sɩ̃rɩkpɩbɩ̃ɩgɩra za, na pɩ zɩɛn daaga gʋɔ thĩne, wɛkɛ kha wɔrɩ yɩɛ batona yo yɛrɩtɛtɛ, na saraŋɩra ɗɛ khɩɛn kɩ tãra pɩ.
44027018	Baa sarangbʋ̃ɔŋɩra kha vu gbaangbo ki vĩigin a, kɩ gɔɗɩɛkɩ̃n na pɩ gɔɗ ki khon batona dagbolonsira sʋɔ ki hĩn si lagagborola za.
44027019	Kɩ godɩ̃ɛsɛra tɩ̃, na bɩɛ thĩra khonn batona miliindaasɛ sʋɔ na pi lese na hĩin si ãmɩra za.
44027020	A liin ma khɩɛ gɔmɛ na khɩɛra kure waʔ, kʋsaɓiyira kure waʔ, kɛna sarangbʋ̃ɔŋɩra bʋ wa kɩ bɩ̃ɩ kũu. A kha wɔrɩ khãa a kuomɩra za dʋ̃waʔ.
44027021	Baa a lɛɩn kɛɩ ɗi, na Polira alɩn nɩ́ɩrɛ́n na deɗ kha: «A nɩpɛ, na ɩ̃ na nuun ma mɩɛ bɛsɛ kɩ yɩɛn na a diin Kɩrɛtɩ, asɩgɩra na wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ naa le waʔ.
44027022	Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, ɩ̃ tɩɩrɛ gbɔʔɛ naɗɩɛ nɩra sii ɓa hu ɩ̃ za waʔ, batona kpora kɩ ɓa dii.
44027023	Mɩɛ Yekila mɩɛ liige kɩ hã, ʋ mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ ɓɔgɔn mɩɛ u thĩ dawogira.
44027024	Ki deɗ mɩɛ kha: “Hã mʋ ãn waʔ Poli, fɔ mʋ nan ɩtakhogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra khɛrɛ, mʋɔ lahɔrɔmɔra za Yekila ɗɩɛn ki kuore wɛpɛ kɩ bʋ na mʋɔ batona za mɩra.”
44027025	Mɩ nɩpɛ, gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ tɩɩrɛ gbɔʔɛ kha mɩɛ khãan ma Yekila za. Baa ʋ mɛlɛgɛra deɗ sɩ, mafɩra sɩ ɓa le.
44027026	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za sɩrɩsɩra ãmɛ vĩin mirin ɩra, fɔ a dii gɩɛ gʋɔ za.»
44027027	A liin ma dawose gbũne na siyĩi lagagborola za pɩ yɩ kha Mediterane ɩra, na sarangbʋ̃ɔŋɩra bʋ wa a vĩigimira za bere. Baa bãana ɓa khãɗɩ, nɩpɩra kha liige batona za, na pi kenn ma kha a ɓɩɛ yĩmin wa na fɔlɔŋɔ.
44027028	Na pɩ khɩɛn daagɩra kɩ sʋ̃wa ãmɩra kogomira ɩra, na hĩnn ŋi ãmɩra za na ɓuun mɛtɩrɩwɛ tigbiire na gbũne na wãnɩyɔ̃. Baa a yuon kɩrɩ, na pi hĩnn ŋi tɩ̃ na ɓuun mɛtɩrɩwɛ tigbiire na wãnɩsãa.
44027029	Baa pɩ kha dʋ̃nɛ kha a ɓa gbɩ̃ɩ bʋrʋsɛ za, na pi hĩin daasɩra kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ batona kpɩ̃ra gɛŋɩra ʋ, sɩɛ siyĩi, kɩ kɩ tɩɛ kha ɗɩɩgɩra yɛkɩ̃n vivi.
44027030	Ŋa batona horodɛrɩwɩra kha ɓɩɛ wa horo khɛrɛ, na pɩ khɩɛn batontɩtɩɩɗa na sũnen ni na liin mʋ gaga kha pɩ ɓɩɛ wa na ɓaka daasɛ sʋɔ ʋ wʋɔla ʋ tɩ̃ wɛsɩɛ kɩ yɩɛ batona wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ ɩra.
44027031	Na Polira deɗ Ɔrɔmʋ sʋrasiwira na pɩ wʋɔrɛ nɩrara kha: «Na nɩpɩɛ hɩɗann batona za waʔ, ɩ̃ ɓa wɔrɩ ko waʔ.»
44027032	Na sʋrasiwira ɗɛ kpakɩ̃nn wʋ̃nsɩra pɩ na vɔɗ na batonɓila ɩra, kɩ yɩɛn na ãmɩra khɩɛn tann nɩ.
44027033	Baa a kha tɩɛ kha ɗɩɩgɩra yɛkɩ̃n vivira, na Polira maan nɩpɩra bɩɛ za kha pi ɗi ki de kha: «Khɩɛwɛ gbũne na piyĩira bɩra mɩra na ɩ̃ bʋ wa kpolongbʋ̃ʋga za ĩ ɗiin mɩɩnɛ waʔ.
44027034	Mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa, ĩ ɗi, ɩ̃ ɓa ko. Harɩ nɩra sii thayĩge kpo ɓa dii waʔ.»
44027035	Baa Polira deɗ sɩɛ na ʋ khɩɛn bula na thɩɛn Yekila pɩ bɩɛ wʋɔla ʋ ki kpekĩnn u kɩ gɔɗ kɩ khʋɔ.
44027036	Na pɩ bɩɛ gbɔʔɛ ɗɛ tɩɩrɩ, na pi ɗiiri.
44027037	Aa wɛpɛ bɩɛ kha bʋ batona za, a kha bʋ wa nɩpɛ gbalɩga na tigbesãa na gbũne na wãnɩkpo.
44027038	Baa a bɩɛ ɗiin hĩin zuori, na pɩ ɗɛ khɩɛn bile bɔtɔsɩra na hĩnn si lagagborola za, batona ɓu thɔʔ.
44027039	Baa ɗɩɩgɩra yɛkɩ̃nnɩ, batona horodɛwɩra na tʋʋn khaala waʔ, gɛŋɩra pi thuo ki lon lagagborola ʋ, gɩɛ sɩ̃rɩkpɩkɩra pɩ yãarɩ. Na pɩ kha bɩɛ wã batona yo ni na ken.
44027040	Na pɩ vɔrɩn daasɩra na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n batona ɩra, na zɩɛn sɩ ãmɩra za. Kɩ vɔrɩn zɩɛn daasɩra na yɩɛn na batona horodaara yo u gɛŋɩra ʋ khɔrɩ ɩra. Kɩ ganɛn batona lowukpakpaka gʋɔ wʋɔla ʋ, si le thaaga saraŋɩra boi u, u yo kɩ yɩɛn na pi ki yo lagagborogeŋira ʋ.
44027041	Na batona wʋɔla ʋ yo thuɗ sɩ̃rɩkpɩka za na diin kɩ za, ʋ kha wɔrɩ kure waʔ. Baa ãmɩra kha kure gɛnsɛ sɩyɔ̃ra kɩ ɓa kɩ tʋʔ kpɩ̃rara gɛŋɩra na faŋa ɩra, pɩ kha wɔrɩ kure dʋ̃waʔ. Na batona kpɩ̃rara warɩganɩ.
44027042	Na sʋrasiwira bɛnn sɩ za kha bɩɛ khʋ kasoɓiiwira, si le thaaga hã pɩ ʋɔ sii ɓu wʋ̃n na kure horo tãra waʔ.
44027043	Baa Ɔrɔmʋ sʋrasiwe wʋɔrɛ nɩrara kha ɓɩɛ kha ʋɔ kuore Polira, ʋ bɩɩn sɩɛ waʔ, ki deɗ wɛpɛ bɩɛ kɩ tʋ wʋ̃n ãmɛ za ɩra, kha bɩɛ nisĩn wa ãmɩra za na wʋ̃n na kure.
44027044	Kɩ yɩɛ bʋɔra khɛ daphose warɩma batona daasɩra warɩgan ɩra, na wʋ̃n kure. Mafɩra a liin na a bɩɛ wɔrɩn wʋ̃nn na kuɗ gbɛ̃ɩgɛ za, mɩɩnɛ ɓuun ʋɔ waʔ.
44028001	Baa a kuon zuori, fɩra za a tʋʋn kha pɩ yɩ ɓa gɩɛ sɩrɩgɩra ãmɩra vĩin mirin kha Malɩtɩ.
44028002	Malɩtɩ nɩpɩra gɔɗ a wa gɔɓɛ kɩ̃raŋɩra. Baa adaga gɔɗ kɩ ɓan na wesira khʋ ɩra, na pɩ gbʋɔn naaga na yɩɗ a kha a bɩɛ ɓa weɗe.
44028003	Na Polira yo hoɗ dalɩgɩsɛ na ɓa yiin si naagɩra ʋ, na ki wuroŋira yɩɛn na sʋwʋbɩ̃ɩga gʋɔ kuɗ bʋ na ɗuɗ u lekira ʋ na maan bʋ.
44028004	Baa gɩɛ sɩrɩgɩra nɩpɩra yãan gɩɛ sʋwʋbɩ̃ɩgɩra na kɩ maan Polira lekira za ɩra, na pi deɗ kamɛ kha: «Bakɩ̃nsɛ bʋ waʔ, wɛɩ wɩɛ bʋ wa nɩkhʋdaa. Harɩ na u kuon lagagborola ʋ wɛsɩɛ sɩɛ za ʋɔ, Yekila ɓa yɩɛ u ko sɩɛ za kũu waʔ.»
44028005	Ŋa na Polira tɩɩn u lekira na sʋwʋgɩra waan naagɩra ʋ kɛna mɩɩnɛ liir u waʔ.
44028006	Nɩpɩra kenn ma kha ʋ naa ɓa mʋkɩ̃n ma warɩma ʋ ɓa kpii wa bãnɩkpo na hu. Baa pɩ hɩɗann lɛɩrɩ, pɩ yãan na mɩɩnɛ liir u waʔ, na pɩ vɩkɩ̃nn gagasɛ kha wɛɩ wɩɛ khãɗ dɛ.
44028007	Dɩɛ khaala na sɩrɩga wʋɔrɛ nɩrara khaala kha legen na kamɛ waʔ. Ʋɔ wʋɔrɛ nɩrara pɩ yɩ kha Pibiyusi. Na ʋ gɔɗ a kɩ̃raŋɩra na a liin khɩɛwɛ pɩsãa ʋ khɛrɛ.
44028008	Sɩɛ makɩ̃n ma na gbɔgbʋ̃ʋga na tɔgɔtɔgɔ kha bʋ wa Pibiliyusi siira za, ʋ kha bʋ wa hʋ̃nkhɛrɛ ʋ. Na Polira lonn ʋ thʋʋgɩra ʋ na yo ɗʋkɩ̃n ʋ lese kɩ yɩ̃nn Yekila na ʋ bãarɩ.
44028009	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, gɩɛ sɩrɩgɩra ɓoɗipe bʋɔra kha ɓan ma ki ɓu bãamɛ tɩ̃.
44028010	A liin ma feriwe pɩsãa fɩ, na pɩ gbɩ̃nɛ a kɩ̃raŋɩra. Ɗɩyãgara a kha kãn khɛ batona na tãra ɩra, na pɩ hãar a mɩyɩra za a kha vɛn ɩra. Batona ki kure Alɛkɩsãdɩrɩra, ʋɔ a khɩɛrɩ. U diin ma fɩ na wese bɛna yo zuori. Sɩ̃nphanɓiiwe pɩyɔ̃ wɛpɛ pɩ kha yɩ kha Diyosikuri ɩra, bɩɛ yɩsɩga na sɛwɛn batona za.
44028012	Na a khɩɛn yuon na nann Sirakusi na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n fɩ na liin khɩɛwɛ pɩsãa fɩ.
44028013	Baa a kuɗ dɩɛ khaala, na a maan lagagborogeŋira ʋ na yo nann Eregio. Baa ɗɩɩgɩra yɛkɩ̃nnɩ, na saraŋɩra alɩn Malɩtɩ gɛŋɛ ki vu, na a liin khɩɛwɛ pɩyɔ̃ kɩ tʋʋn nann Puzʋlɩ.
44028014	Gɩɛ gboŋɩra ʋ, a yãan kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ bʋɔ ni, na pɩ yɩ̃nn kha a le khɩɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ fɩ. Dɩɛ khaala a kuɗ na yuon Ɔrɔmʋra.
44028015	Na Ɔrɔmʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra nuun a mɩyɛ na pɩ ɓann harɩ Apiyusi yawʋgbɛ̃ɩgɩra ʋ na khɩ̃rɩwɛ gĩithʋʋsɛ sãara khaala na ɓa thukĩnn a. Baa Polira yãan mɩ, na ʋ thɩɛn Yekila na ʋ gbɔɗɛ tɩɩrɩ.
44028016	Baa a nann Ɔrɔmʋra, [na sʋrasiwe wʋɔrɛ nɩrara Yuliyɔsɩra hãan kasoɓiiwe bʋɔ na sʋrasiwe wʋɔrɛ nɩrara kɩ bʋ Ɔrɔmʋra ɩra.] Na ʋɔ yɩɛn Polira na ʋ khɩɛn thʋʋga na hɩɗann ukpo ʋɔ na sʋrasi wɛɩ ʋɔ, ʋɔ kha tɩɛgɛ ʋ.
44028017	Baa Polira ɓuun khɩɛwɛ pɩsãa, na ʋ yɩɗ Yawutuwe wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra na bĩŋinn mi na deɗ pi kha: «Aa nɩpɛ, mi liin mɩɩnɛ a thĩna za waʔ, mɩ asɩn a sekhãgawɩra sinira waʔ; kɛna pɩ gɔɗ mɩɛ Zeruzalɛmʋra kɩ hãan mɩɛ Ɔrɔmʋwɩra.
44028018	Baa bɩɛ bʋ̃kɩ̃nn mɩɛ mɩyɩra, pɩ yãan na mɩɛ liin mɩɩdɛ tɩ nann khʋʋmɛ waʔ, pɩ kha ɓɩɛ wa na zɩɛ mɩɛ.
44028019	Na Yawutuwira kɛɩrɩ. Mɩɛ kha tʋ wɛtɛ mɩɛ wɔrɩ le dʋ̃waʔ. Na mɩɛ kha mɩɛ yo wa na mɩɛ sɩɛsɩra Ɔrɔmʋ ɩtakhogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra khɛrɛ. Si liin mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa na zarɩ̃ŋɩn mɩɛ thĩnɩpɩra waʔ.
44028020	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ kha ɓɩɛ kha mɩɛ yã ɩ̃ na sɩɛrɛ ɩ̃. Wɛɩra za Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira khãan kɩ tɩɛ ɩra, ʋɔ za pɩ ɗɩɛn kɩ vɔɗ mɩɛ na zɔrɩgɔsɩɛ.»
44028021	Na pɩ zɩ̃ŋɩn ʋ kha: «Aa ɓuun sɛwɛ na u kuɗ Zude sɩrɩgɩra ʋ ni na deɗ mʋ mɩyɛ waʔ. Zude nɩra sii ɓann ɓa deɗ aa mɩɩnɛ warɩma na ɓa deɗ mʋ yɩsɩbɩ̃ɩga waʔ.
44028022	Ŋa aa ɓɩɛ wa na tʋ mɩɩna mʋ gaga ɩra, naɗɩɛ khaayɩra bɩɛ za pɩ khɛ̃ɩ wa khɩ̃ndɩɛ mu thuo ɩra.»
44028023	Baa pi deɗ sɩɛ, na pɩ hãar ʋ ɗɩyãga gʋɔ. Baa gɩɛ ɗɩyãgara nannɩ, na nɩgɔngɔmɛ yuon khaala ʋ kha hʋ̃n ɩra. Na Polira ɓɔgɔnn mɩ Yekila ɩɩgɩra mɩyɛ kɩ khɩɛn Moyizira sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na Yekila yãdedɛwɩra sɛwʋwɩra na hʋgan ki de pi Yesura mɩyɛ, si le thaaga pɩ khãa ʋ za. Ʋ sɩɛrɛn mɩ wa na gɔ kɩ buloŋo na yo nann zʋ̃raŋa.
44028024	Bʋɔra khãan ʋ sɩɛsɩra za ŋa bʋɔra khãan sɩ za waʔ.
44028025	Baa pɩ na bɛnn tikpo za, kɩ tɩwɩgɩ̃n waʔ, na Polira deɗ kha: «Sɩɛsɩra Yekila yãdedaara Ezayira deɗ ĩ sekhãgawɩra Yekila Nina wɔrɩkɩra za, tɩ̃ya ʋ koyi. U deɗ ɓa kha Yekila deɗ ɓa kha:
44028026	“Yo nɩpɩɛ khɛrɛ na de pi kha: Ɩ̃ ɓa nuure kɩ̃raŋɩra ŋa ɩ̃ ɓa tʋ mɩɩnɛ bʋ waʔ. Ɩ̃ ɓa ken kɩ̃raŋɩra ŋa ɩ̃ ɓa yã mɩɩnɛ waʔ.
44028027	Naɗɩɛ, thĩndɩɛ nɩpɩra kpolonsira hʋgan ma. Pɩ fɩ̃ɗ ɓa pi numidanyɩra, kɩ bakan pi yiwiyira, si le thaaga hã pi yiwiyira yã waʔ, hã pi numidanyɩra nu waʔ, hã pɩ tʋ mɩɩnɛ bʋ na vɩ gbũu mɩɛ Yekila za, mɩ bãarɛ wɩ waʔ.”»
44028028	Na Polira deɗ pi kha: «Ɩ̃ tʋ kha Yekila dãan hãan ma thĩmaanyɩra ʋ zɩ̃mɩra sɩɛsɩra, kha bɩɛ ʋɔ ɓa nuure u.» [
44028029	Baa Polira deɗ sɩɛ zuori, na Yawutuwira kɩ bakɩ̃n kamɛ gbaangbo ki ki khũn.]
44028030	Polira liin ma ɗɩɩsɛ yɔ̃ hĩyense thʋʋgɩra za ʋ na khɩɛn ɩra. Nɩpɩra bɩɛ pɩ kha yo ʋ khɛrɛ, ʋ kha kpɔrɩ pɩ wa.
44028031	Ʋ kha de ɓa Yekila ɩɩgɩra mɩyɛ kɩ karɩ̃n nɩpɛ Yesu Kirisitira liin Adɛyɩra ɩra ʋɔ mɩyɛ kɛɩ le ãnabirise, nɩra gbũu kha khʋ̃n ʋ khɩ̃nɛ waʔ.
45001001	Mɩɛ Poli liin Yesu Kirisitira miliinɓiira, mɩɛ kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na hã ɩ̃ ʋ. Yekila yɩɗ ɓa mɩɛ na mi liin ʋ dãara, u khonn mi wa kha mi le ʋɔ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɛ dedaa.
45001002	Yekila thĩra na tann ma ʋ yãdedɛwɛ za harɩ khɔ̃ɩ na hãan nʋʋga sɩɛ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩɛ mɩyɛ za, na bɩɛ sɛwɛn sɩ ʋ sɛwʋra za.
45001003	Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩɛ kha de ɓa u Ɓikhiira mɩyɛ, ʋɔ wɩɛra kuɗ Davidi kpɩ̃raɓiiwira za na makɩ̃nn na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe hũnlɔmɩra.
45001004	Ninyɛgɛmɔra ɓɔgɔn sɩ wa kha a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira bʋ wa Yekire Ɓikhiye, sɩ wɔrɩkɩra gbũun yãan tʋʋn ma baa ʋ alɩn na kuɗ huumira za ɩra.
45001005	Ʋɔ za Yekila tann na fɩ̃ɩn aa za na liir a dãarawɛ, si le thaaga a wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ dunuyara thĩnyɩra bɩɛ nɩpɩra pi ɓu khãamɛ na nu ʋ bɛrɛ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ.
45001006	Ɩ̃ɛ Ɔrɔmʋwɛ tɩ̃, baa Yesu Kirisitira yɩɗ ɩ̃ na liir ĩ ʋ bɛwɛ, ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ bʋɔ.
45001007	Ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ bʋ Ɔrɔmʋra na Yekila khɔrɩ ɩ̃, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ ʋ yɩɗ kha ĩ le ʋɔ bɛwɛ, a Siye Yekila na a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ kɩ hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo!
45001008	Mɩ tãra wa Yesu Kirisitira za na thɩɛ mi Yekila zo ɩ̃ bɩɛ kãmara za, naɗɩɛ nɩpɛ de ɓa ɩ̃ khãamɩra mɩyɛ dunuyara khaayɩra bɩɛ za.
45001009	Yekila mi liige kɩ hã na mɩ gagasɩra bɩɛ, na mi de nɩpɛ u Ɓikhiira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra. Ʋɔ thĩra kɩ bʋ mɩ tɩ̃yadedaara, mɩ yɩ̃n ʋ wa kɩ hã ɩ̃ mi Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra za
45001010	kɛɩ gbaa. Mɩ ɓɩɛ sɩ wa Yekila heke kha na u dĩŋo u, ʋ hã mɩ khɩ̃nɛ mi gbũu thiye ĩ heke tɩ̃.
45001011	Naɗɩɛ, mɩ ɓɩɛ sɩ wa na mɩ gagasɩra bɩɛ kha mɩɛ yã ɩ̃, na ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ Ninyɛgɛmɔra mɩyãagɩranyɛ yʋɔ si le thaaga dʋɔ sɩɛ ɩ̃ faŋɩra za,
45001012	warɩma na mɩ ɓa hɩɗan ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za, khãamɩra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ɛ na mɩɛ za bɩɛ khãamɩra ɓa hã a bɩɛ haɓɛ.
45001013	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, mɩ ɓɩɛ kha ɩ̃ kʋɔmɛ hɩɗan wɛsɩɛ za waʔ. Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha mɩ ɓɩɛn sɩ wa bɛngɔnyɛ kha mɩɛ thiye ĩ heke ni, ŋa mɩ wɔrɩn ɓuun tɩ khɩ̃nɛ waʔ. Mɩ kha ɓɩɛ wa kha mi miliinsira ɓu thaaga mʋ gaga kha baa si ɓuun thaaga sɩrɩsɩra sʋɔra za ɩra.
45001014	Mɩ kãn ma na liige hã nɩpɛ bɩɛ, wɛpɩɛ wʋɔyɛ yɛɗɩ, na wɛpɩɛ wʋɔyɩra yɛɗ waʔ, wɛpɩɛ liin karɩ̃n, na wɛpɩɛ liin karɩ̃n waʔ.
45001015	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ ɓɩɛ sɩ na mɩ gagasɩra bɩɛ na yo de Yekila sɩɛsɩra na ɩ̃ɛ Ɔrɔmʋwɩra tɩ̃.
45001016	Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra deɓira bʋ na nɩɩsɛ mɩɛ heke waʔ, naɗɩɛ sɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila wɔrɩkɩra. Sɩɛ ʋɔ thĩra khɛ na zɩ̃n wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãa ʋ za, Yawutuwira zo, sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za thĩmaanyɩra tʋ thuo bɩɛ.
45001017	Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha wɛpɩɛ doro kɩ khãa Yekila za na yo nan si diikhɛla, u ken ma bɩɛ nɩtelenyeme, mʋ gaga kha baa si deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Nɩtelenyemo ɓa ɓu wa thakuogo ʋ khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.»
45001018	Naɗɩɛ na yɩɛ Yekila zaara ni, ʋ ɓɔgɔn sɩ wa na sɩ yɛɗɩ, kha ʋɔ donn ma na mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira thĩnyira bɩɛ dɩ̃ɩna mɩkɛɩtelenyira nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra le ɩra. Pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãma, pɩ barɩ wa nɩpɛ hã pi ɓu tʋ tɩ̃yara waʔ.
45001019	Naɗɩɛ, wɛsɩɛ nɩra wɔrɩ tʋ Yekila mɩyɩra za, sɩɛ guuren pɩ za waʔ, Yekila thĩra ʋ ɓɔgɔn mɩ ɩɛ mɩyɩra na yɛɗɩ.
45001020	Lɔmɩra za Yekila thĩra bʋ, nɩra sii wɔrɩ yã ʋ na yiwire waʔ, ŋa na khɛ dunuyara lebɛna na ɓa gbɩɛ ɩra za, ʋ wɔrɩkɛɩzuoŋira yã wa na tʋ u miliinyira bɩɛ za kha ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Yekila. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, nɩra sii ɓa wɔrɩ ɓu tɩ̃ya ʋ wʋɔla za waʔ.
45001021	Naɗɩɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ tʋ kha Yekila bʋ, ŋa pɩ bɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ mʋ gaga kha baa Yekire kãn na gbɩ̃nɛ waʔ. Pɩ bɩ na thɩɛ ʋ mʋ gaga kha baa Yekire kãn na thɩɛ waʔ, ŋa pɩ gagabɩ̃ɩsɩra yiin mi wa ɓilense za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na pi hĩin na dabirimɩyɛ doro.
45001022	Pi ken ma pi thĩ wʋɔntʋdɛrɩwɛ kɛna pɩ tʋ foi thĩra waʔ.
45001023	Ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛdɛyɛ Yekila ki hu waʔ, pɩ kɛɩn ma ʋɔ gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra kɩ ɓa hura, wurupe, na daɗuorowe ɗɩɛsɛ yĩi daawɛ, dɩ̃ɩna fɔlɔnɓɛpʋ daawɛ, daasɩra pi seɗe sɩɛ pɩ gbɩ̃nɛ.
45001024	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Yekila yɩɛn mɩ pi yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra za pi ki le mɩtegenye, mafɩra pi diin ki le nɩɩlamɩyɛ na kamɛ.
45001025	Pɩ kɛɩn ma Yekire thĩnthĩnwera ki thuo sɩ̃mɛ. Mɩyɩra Yekila liiri, ɩɛ pɩ hã gbɩ̃nɛsɩra kɩ yɩɛn Ledaa Yekila thĩra kɩ kãn na gbɩ̃nɛsɩra bãanyɛ bɩɛ ɩra. Amiina.
45001026	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Yekila yɩɛn mɩ nɩɩlayekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra za. Pɩ hapɩra yɩɛn ma khuowe kɩ kɩ gɔ pɩ hakamɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ wɩ.
45001027	Si kpuosira ɩ, khuowira ɓɩɛ hapɛ dʋ̃waʔ, fɔ pi khokamɩra pɩ gɔ kɩ ɓɩɛ. Sɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ wɩ. Nɩɩlamɩyɛ doro pi le, mafɩra pi gbũu ɓa ɓu pi ɓilensira taasɩra.
45001028	Baa pɩ kɛɩn kha bɩɛ ɓɩɛ na tʋ Yekila waʔ cɔ, mafɩra Yekila gbũun yɩɛn mɩ pɩ gagabɩ̃ɩsɩra za. Si liin mafɩra, wɛsɩɛ pɩ kha kãn na le waʔ, sɩɛ pi le.
45001029	Mɩkɛɩtelenyenye thĩna bɩɛ liimira bʋ wa pɩ gagasɩra za, pi hĩi mɩɩnɛ za waʔ, pɩ bɩ̃ɩ wa, pi hĩin ma na zone, na nɩkhʋgagasɛ, na khɛ̃ɩɓɩɛgɛ, na nɩfirigĩŋe, na tɔn na zarɩgɩ̃n nɩra.
45001030	Pi de ɓa kamɛ yɩsɩbɩ̃ɩga, pi liin ma Yekire bɩ̃ɩrawɛ, pɩ gbɩ̃nɛ nɩra waʔ, pɩ bʋ wa nʋnʋʋdɛwɛ, yɩsɩɓɩɛdɛwɛ, mɩbɩ̃yɛ fɛnyɛ kpiidɛwɛ, pi nu pi hũndɛwɛ bɛrɛ waʔ.
45001031	Pɩ bʋ wa kɛɩ le wʋɔmɛ, pɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ sɩɛrɛɓire kpo za waʔ, pɩ lɔmɛ gbɩ̃ra, pɩ makarɩ nɩra za waʔ.
45001032	Pɩ tʋʋmɛ bʋ Yekila kitira mɩyɛ za, kha nɩra wɩɛ bãa lɔmɛ kɩ bʋ mafɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na huume. Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za bere, pɩ gbaan ɩɛ mɩyɩra liimira waʔ, pɩ bãanyɛ wuo wa na wɛpɩɛ ki le si siira ɩra.
45002001	Harɩ mu le be nɩthɩ̃rɩthĩne, khɩ̃nɛ bʋ mu heke na zarɩgɩ̃n mʋ kãnʋʋna waʔ, naɗɩɛ mɩɩna za mʋ zarɩgɩ̃n mʋ kãnʋʋnara, mʋɔ thĩra le wa dɩɛ kpuola, mafɩra, mʋ zarɩgɩ̃n ma mu thĩ.
45002002	A gbũun tʋʋn ma kha wɛpɩɛ kɩ zarɩgɩ̃n pɩ kãnʋʋnawɩra, Yekila kiti wa bɩɛ dɛrɩwɩra thĩna na makɩ̃n na ʋ tɩ̃yara.
45002003	Mʋɔ wɩɛra ki kiti ɩɛ mɩyɩra ledɛrɩwɩra, kɛna mʋɔ thĩra le wa ɩɛ mɩyɩra thĩna tɩ̃, mu ken ma kha mʋɔ ɓa ko wa Yekila kitira ba?
45002004	Warɩma mʋɔ nʋʋga bʋ Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra, na ʋ baɓɩra, na u levɔrɩkɩra za waʔ? Mʋ tʋ kha bɩɛ fɩ̃ɩmɩra kɩ yɩɛ mʋ zɩɛ mʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira ki ɓu zɩ̃mɛ waʔ?
45002005	Mʋ bãangbɩ̃rɩgɩra na mʋ kpagayamɩra sɩɛ wa dʋɔ Yekila doŋira za, na u donkpakpakɩra dɩ̃ɩna u kititelenyemora ɗɩyãgɩra nann thonn waʔ.
45002006	Ʋɔ kɩ ɓa taa nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpo kpora na makɩ̃n na pi miliinyira.
45002007	Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ pɛ̃ɩ ki le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra, na gbʋ̃ɔnsɛ na thakuokɩ̃rɩgɩra, bɩɛ Yekila ɓa hã thakuokɛɩzuoŋira.
45002008	Ŋa wɛpɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ bakɩ̃nsɩra, kɩ kɛɩ tɩ̃yara, ki dii mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za, bɩɛ Yekila ɓa ɓɔgɔ u donkpakpakɩra.
45002009	Wɛpɛ bãa ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ, na khɛ Yawutuwe za, na bɩɛ tannɩ, thĩmaanyɩra yʋɔra tʋ ɓan, vɛnsɛ na gagayãgamɩŋa doro kɩ ɓa ɓu bɩɛ.
45002010	Wɛpɛ bãa ki le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ, na khɛ Yawutuwira za, na yo gbɩɛ thĩmaanyɩra za, ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ na gbʋ̃ɔnsɛ na wɔyĩke kɩ ɓa nan bɩɛ.
45002011	Naɗɩɛ Yekila khon nɩra nɩra za waʔ.
45002012	Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ kɛɩ tʋ dʋɔ Moyizi sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za, bɩɛ ɓa hu wa pere. Sɩɛrɛhãansɛ daɓire kpo ɓa bʋ̃ pɩ waʔ, wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ kɛna pɩ tʋ wa sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, pɩ ɓa kiti wi wa na makɩ̃n na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra.
45002013	Si liin mʋ gaga kha wɛpɩɛ ki nuure sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, bɩɛ telen Yekila wʋɔla za waʔ; ŋa wɛpɩɛ gɔɗ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ sɩ, bɩɛ Yekila ken nɩtelenyemira.
45002014	Thĩmaanyɩra kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le na Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, na bɩɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na makɩ̃n na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kɛna pɩ tʋ sɩ waʔ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha pɩ tʋ wa mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ liime.
45002015	Mafɩra pɩ ɓɔgɔ sɩ kha sɩɛrɛhãansɩra sɛwɛn ma bɩɛ thĩra gagasɩra za; pɩ lɔɓidɛwɩra, dɩ̃ɩna pɩ gagasɩra zarɩgɩ̃n mɩ wa, kɩ hã wɩ tɩ̃ya gʋɔ za.
45002016	Na makɩ̃n na sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra mɩɛ de, nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra gagaguorensira ɓa yã wa ɗɩyãgɩra Yekila ɓa kiti wi ɩra.
45002017	Mʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ yɩ ɓʋ thĩ Yawutu, na khɩɛn mʋ laŋɩra na yiin sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za, kɩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ mu thĩ mu Yekila mɩyɛ za,
45002018	mʋ tʋ Yekila dĩŋora, dɩ̃ɩna sɩɛrɛhãansɩra karɩ̃n mʋ wa kha mu ken khon mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ,
45002019	mʋɔ wɩɛra deɗ kha mʋɔ kɩ bʋ ɗarɩpɛ daɓɔɗa gɔdaara, kha wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ dabirigira za, mʋɔ kɩ bʋ pɩ yɛyɛɓɩra,
45002020	kha wʋɔnlaɗpɛ na wɛpɩɛ kɩ tʋ foi waʔ, mʋɔ kɩ bʋ bɩɛ karɩ̃ndaara, kha naɗɩɛ tʋʋnkpakpapɛ dɩ̃ɩna tɩ̃ya thĩnthĩnwera ki kure sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za, mʋɔ bʋ wa na bɩɛ.
45002021	Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra, mʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ karɩ̃n bʋɔra, bena mu nisĩn karɩ̃n mu thĩ zo waʔ? Mʋɔ ki de kha hã pi zu waʔ, kɛna mʋɔ thĩra zu wa.
45002022	Mʋɔ kɩ barɩ bʋɔra kha hã pi le zɛrɩgɛ waʔ, kɛna mʋɔ thĩra le wa zɛrɩgɛ! Mʋɔ kha mʋɔ yãasɩ̃nn ma sɩ̃mɩyɛ, kɛna mu lon ki zu wa sɩ̃nthʋʋga daasɛ!
45002023	Mʋ ɓɩɛ wa yɩsɩga (kha mʋɔ tʋ wa sɩɛrɛhãansɛ), kɛna mʋ gbɩ̃nɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra waʔ, kɩ asɩ Yekila yɩsɩgɩra!
45002024	Naɗɩɛ si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Yekila yɩsɩgɩra asɩn ma thĩmaanyɛ sʋgʋmʋra za ɩ̃ɛ (Yawutuwe) kãma za.»
45002025	Huurese kɩ̃ra, sɩɛ ɓu wa na mʋ gbɩ̃nɛ wa sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, ŋa na mʋ gbɩ̃nɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra waʔ, mu huuresira bʋ na thaaga waʔ, mʋ hɩɗan ma mʋ gaga kha wɩɛ huuren waʔ.
45002026	Na nɩkɛɩhuuremo nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ kɩ makɩ̃n na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, pɩ ɓa thʋ ʋ na yii u nɩhuuremira sʋgʋmʋ za waʔ ba?
45002027	Nɩkɛɩhuuremo wɩɛ kɩ gɔ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, ʋɔ wɔrɩ zarɩgɩ̃n ma mʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ asɩ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, kɛna sɩɛrɛhãansɩra sɛwʋgɩra bʋ mu lekira za, dɩ̃ɩna mu huuren ma tɩ̃.
45002028	Naɗɩɛ Yawututhĩnthĩnwera yã na tʋ wʋɔrɛ doro za waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna huurethĩnthĩnsira bʋ gbɔɗɛ khaarɛ dʋɔ kpiime doro waʔ.
45002029	Ŋa Yawututhĩnthĩnwera yã tʋ wa kpoloŋo za, huuresɛ liin gagasɛ za, kɛna si liin gbɔɗɛ za waʔ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ huurethĩnthĩnsira. Wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ mafɩra, ʋɔ gbɩ̃nɛsɩra kure nɩpɛ za waʔ, ŋa ʋɔ gbɩ̃nɛsɩra kure wa Yekila heke.
45003001	Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra, na le Yawutu sɩ tɔ̃nɩra bʋ wa he? Huurese thaagɩra kɩ bʋ sʋna?
45003002	Sɩyɔ̃ra bɩɛ bʋ wa na tɔ̃nɩ. Yekila sɩɛsɩra nisĩnn hãan ma Yawutuwira.
45003003	Na bʋɔ kɛɩn teleme, bɩra kɩ wɔrɩ de sɩɛ za? Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ kɛɩtelemira wɔrɩ barɩ wa Yekila telemira ba?
45003004	Ɩya! Harɩ na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira liin ma tɔndɛwɛ, Yekila ʋɔ de ɓa tɩ̃ya, mʋ gaga kha baa si deɗ ʋ sɛwʋra za kha: «Nɩpɛ bɩɛ kãn ma na tʋ sɩ mʋ sɩɛsɩra za kha mu de ɓa tɩ̃ya, na pɩ kha bɩɛ kiti mu, mu ɓu wɔzagarɛ»
45003005	Ŋa mɩbɩ̃yɩra aa le, na ɩɛ le wa thaaga nɩpɛ tʋ kha Yekila telenn ma, bɩra a de sɩɛ za? Yekila bʋ wa kɛɩtelenyemo naɗɩɛ baa u kori a ba? (Mɩ sɩɛrɛ wa khaadɩɛ na makɩ̃n na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe sɩɛrɛlɔmɩra.)
45003006	Ɩya, mafɩra sɩ bʋ waʔ! Na sɩ kha bʋ wa mafɩra, mʋsɛ Yekila naa ɓa kiti dunuyara nɩpɩra na yo?
45003007	Na mɩɛ tɔŋɩra ki le thaagɩra Yekila tɩ̃yara tʋ kɩ̃raŋɩra, kɩ yɩɛ u ɓu gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, na be kɩ yɩɛ kiti wa mɩɛ za mʋ gaga kha mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa kɩ bʋ mɩ?
45003008	Bʋɔ asɩ wa mɩɛ yɩsɩga kha mɩɛ de ɓa kha: «Ɩ̃ yɩɛ a le mɩbɩ̃yɛ si le thaaga mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ kure a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za.» Yekila kitira ɓa wa wa bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ za, sɩɛ gbũu kɩ makɩ̃n mɩ.
45003009	Ŋa, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha aa Yawutuwira kɩ bãa thĩnyira yʋɔra za ba? Ɩya, naɗɩɛ mi deɗ ɓa sɩɛ zuori kha Yawutuwira na thĩnyira yʋɔra bɩɛ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛ wɔrɩkɔ za.
45003010	Mʋ gaga kha baa si deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Nɩthɩ̃rɩtelenyemo sii bʋ waʔ, harɩ ukpo thĩra, ʋɔ bʋ waʔ.
45003011	Wʋɔmɛ bʋ pɩ ʋɔ sii za waʔ, pɩ ʋɔ sii ɓɩɛ Yekire waʔ.
45003012	Pɩ bɩɛ zɩɛn ma Yekila khɩ̃na, pɩ bɩɛ liin ma nɩbɩ̃ɩwɛ doro. Pɩ ʋɔ sii le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ waʔ, harɩ nɩra ukpo thĩra.
45003013	Pɩ yɔgɔnsɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha lugudanpiinzɩɛnɛ, pi durimin ma nɩpɛ na pɩ ɗɛlɛnsɩra, pɩ nʋgbɛsɩra waŋɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha gbikhiɗiye waŋa.
45003014	Nɩdaŋa sɩɛsɛ na sɩɛrɛbɩ̃ɩsɛ doro hĩin pɩ nʋʋsɩra za.
45003015	Pɩ ɗɩɛsɛ thɔ nɩkhʋʋga za.
45003016	Khaarɛ bãa za pɩ tãra, asɩga na wɔgbʋ̃ʋga doro pɩ zɩɛ fɩ.
45003017	Khɩ̃na kɩ hã wɔyĩkira, pɩ tʋ dɩɛ khɩ̃na waʔ.
45003018	Pɩ ãn Yekila harɩ kɩrɩ ʋ thĩra waʔ.»
45003019	Kɛna a tʋ wa kha wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra de, si deɗ hãan ma wɛpɩɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, si le thaaga hã nɩra sii wɔrɩ ɓu dʋɔ na de waʔ, kɩ yɩɛ nɩpɛ bɩɛ laʔ tɩ̃ya Yekila wʋɔla za.
45003020	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na nɩra sii wɔrɩ le nɩtelenyemo Yekila wʋɔla za sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɓɩra za waʔ, sɩɛrɛhãansɩra yɩɛ wa a tʋ doro kha a liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ.
45003021	Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, Yekila ɓɔgɔn ma lɔmɩra za ʋɔ ken a nɩtelenyeme kɛɩ yii sɩɛrɛhãansɩra niin bʋ. Ɩɛ mɩyɩra sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na Yekila yãdedɛwɛ deɗi.
45003022	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ ɓa khãa Yesu Kirisitira za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra Yekila ken nɩtelenyemora, kpɩkɩ̃ŋa bʋ sɩɛ za waʔ.
45003023	Naɗɩɛ nɩpɛ bɩɛ liin ma mɩbɩ̃yɛ na laɗ Yekila ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra.
45003024	Ŋa Yekila fɩ̃ɩn ma pɩ za na kenn mi nɩtelenyeme Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za, ʋɔ wɩɛra zɩ̃nn mɩ pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za ɩra.
45003025	Yesura Yekila khɩɛn na khonn thɔgɔnsɛ na ɓu yafa nɩpɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za, wɛpɛ bãa kɩ ɓa khãa ʋ za kɔnɩ, si le thaaga Yekila thĩra ɓɔgɔ ʋɔ thĩ telemira. Naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ na liin mɩbɩ̃yɩra khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra ni, u kitin bɩɛ
45003026	ʋ baɓɩra bɛna waʔ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na ʋ ɓɔgɔ u telemira ɩra wɩɛ. Wɛpɩɛ khãan Yesu Kirisitira za, u liin ma bɩɛ nɩtelenyeme, si le thaaga u telemira ɓu yã.
45003027	Bɩra za nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye wɔrɩ gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ bere? Ɩya, dɩɛ mɩɩnɛ bʋ dʋ̃waʔ. Bɩra ɓann na sɩɛ? Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɓɩra ɩ ba? Ɩya, khãamɩra dorola ɩ.
45003028	Naɗɩɛ a tʋ wa kha nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye le wa nɩtelenyemo Yekila wʋɔla za ʋ khãamɩra kãmara za. Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɓɩra kɩ yɩɛ u telen waʔ.
45003029	Warɩma Yekila bʋ wa Yawutuwe doro Yekire ba? Thĩmaanyɛ Yekire u tɩ̃ waʔ ba? Iyo thĩmaanyɛ Yekire u tɩ̃.
45003030	Naɗɩɛ Yekire ukpo kɩ bʋ, ʋɔ kɩ ɓa le Yawutuwira nɩtelenyeme pɩ khãamɩra kãmara za, ʋɔ kɩ ɓa le thĩmaanyɩra nɩtelenyeme tɩ̃ pɩ khãamɩra kãmara za.
45003031	Sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha khãamɩra le wa thaaga a khʋ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra ba? Ɩya! A ɓɩɛ wa na ɓɔgɔ kha sɩɛrɛhãansɩra bʋ wa na thaaga.
45004001	Bɩra a wɔrɩ de a sekhãga Abɩrahamʋ mɩyɩra za? Bɩra u ɓuun nɩthɩ̃rɩɓisira za?
45004002	Na Yekila kenn ma Abɩrahamʋra nɩtelenyemo u milewenyira kãma, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha Abɩrahamʋra wɔrɩ gbɩ̃nɛ wa u thĩ, ŋa ʋ wɔrɩ gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ Yekila wʋɔla za waʔ.
45004003	Tɩ̃yara za, si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Abɩrahamʋ khãan ma Yekila za, na Yekila kenn u nɩtelenyemo.»
45004004	Nɩra wɩɛ liigeni, taasɩra u ɓu, sɩɛ bʋ kha pɩ gbɩ̃nɛn ʋ wa sɩ waʔ, ŋa ʋ kãn ma na sɩɛ taasɩra.
45004005	Ŋa nɩra wɩɛ liin miliinse sʋɔ waʔ, ŋa kɩ khãan ma Yekila za doro, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bɩ na ken mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa nɩkɩ̃ra, ʋ ɓa bɩ wa na ken ʋɔ dɛyɩra nɩtelenyemo ʋ khãamɩra kãmara za.
45004006	Nɩra wɩɛ Yekila ken nɩtelenyemo kɛɩ bu u milewenyira, ɩtakhuo Davidi sɩɛrɛn ma na gbũun ʋɔ dɛyɛ wɩɛ siira bãanwuoŋo mɩyɛ za kha:
45004007	«Wɛpɩɛ ɓilense yafan pɩ za, kɛna pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira bʋ pɩ za dʋ̃waʔ, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa bɩɛ bɛgɛ.
45004008	Wɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige Yekila bu dʋ̃waʔ, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɛgɛ.»
45004009	Bãanwuoŋira mɩyɛ deɗ khaadɩɛ mɩra, gɩɛ bãanwuoŋɩra diin huurenime doro za waʔ, kɛɩhuurenime niin bʋ wa bʋ tɩ̃. Iyo, a deɗ ɓa kha Abɩrahamʋ khãan ma Yekila za, na si liin thaaga na Yekila kenn u nɩtelenyemo.
45004010	Ŋa dʋ̃nɛ bɛnɛ Yekila kenn Abɩrahamʋra nɩtelenyemo? Bɛna ʋ ɓa huuren baa, warɩma bɛna ʋ kha bʋ kɛɩ huure? Bɛna ʋ ɓa huuren dɩɛ bɛna ɩ waʔ, ŋa sɩɛ liin na u huuren thonn waʔ.
45004011	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za Yekila tʋʋn ɓa hãar ʋ huuresira kpiisira. Sɩɛ kpiisira kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha Yekila kenn u wa nɩtelenyemo ʋ khãamɩra kãmara za, na u huuren thĩra thonn waʔ. Si kpuosira ɩ tɩ̃, Abɩrahamʋ kɩ bʋ kɛɩhuurenimira bɩɛ sekhãgara, kɛna pɩ khãa wa Yekila za, na ʋɔ kenn mi nɩtelenyeme.
45004012	Ʋɔ kɩ bʋ nɩhuuremira siira tɩ̃, wɛpɩɛ huuren gbɔɗɛ za, bɩɛ doro mi de waʔ, ŋa bɩɛ na wɛpɩɛ ki thuo a sekhãga Abɩrahamʋra khãamɩra vɔnsɩra ɩra. Ʋɔ khãan ma Yekila za zuori kɩ tʋʋn huureni.
45004013	Yekila hãan ma Abɩrahamʋra na ʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwira nʋʋga kha ʋɔ ɓa hã wɩ dunuyara u le pɩ baa. Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɓɩra liin thaagɩra na Yekila hãan nʋʋgɩra waʔ dɛ, ŋa baa Yekila kenn u nɩtelenyemo ʋ khãamɩra kãmara za, sɩɛ liin thaagɩra.
45004014	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ gɔ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, na bɩɛ doro kha ɓu nʋhãaŋɩra kɩ̃rɩgɩra, khãamɩra naa hɩɗan na tɔ̃nɩ dʋ̃waʔ, Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra naa hɩɗan na thaaga dʋ̃waʔ.
45004015	Naɗɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra hĩɗe wa Yekila doŋo; ŋa khaarɛ bãa za sɩɛrɛhãansɛ bʋ waʔ, sɩɛrɛhãansɛ asɩmɛ mɩyɛ de dɩɛ khaala za waʔ.
45004016	Mafɩra, khãamɛ kɩ yɩɛ a ɓu nʋhãaŋɩra kɩ̃rɩgɩra, Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɛ bɩɛ. Wɛpɛ bãa kɩ bʋ Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwe, gɩɛ nʋʋgɩra hãan ma bɩɛ. Wɛpɩɛ kɩ gɔ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, bɩɛ dola nʋʋgɩra hãan waʔ, ŋa wɛpɛ bãa kɩ khãa mʋ gaga kha a bɩɛ siye Abɩrahamʋra, nʋʋgɩra hãan ma bɩɛ tɩ̃.
45004017	Sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Mi liin mʋ wa thĩngɔnyɛ siye.» Yekila wʋɔla za, Abɩrahamʋra bʋ wa a bɩɛ siye, ʋɔ Yekire wɩɛ za ʋ khãan ɩra. Yekila kɩ arɩga nɩhuomira, mɩyɩra kha bʋ waʔ, ʋɔ kɩ yɩɛ ɩ hɩɗan bʋ.
45004018	Wɛsɩɛ za nɩra kha wɔrɩ lan na khãa waʔ, Abɩrahamʋra khãan ma sɩɛ za. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na u liin thĩngɔnyɛ siye na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ Yekila deɗ u kha: «Mafɩra mʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwira ɓa gɔn.»
45004019	Ʋ na khãɗ ɓa gbaangbo, ʋ ɗɩɩsɩra kha nan ma ɗɩɩsɛ tiiwãa (100) siira, ʋ hala Sarara na tann ma ɓihũŋo. Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, Abɩrahamʋra kha khãa wa Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra za bere, kɛna ʋ na yĩmin ma huume zuori.
45004020	Ʋ yɩɛn kɛɩ khãan Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra za kũu waʔ. Ʋ khãamɩra sɩɛn ma faŋa gʋɔ ʋ za, na si liin thaaga na ʋ gbɩ̃nɛn Yekila.
45004021	Ʋ na khãan ma sɩ za gbaangbo kha mɩyɩra za Yekila na hãan ʋɔ nʋʋgɩra, wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa u heke na hĩɗe gɩɛ nʋʋgɩra.
45004022	Sɩɛ yɩɛn na u liin nɩtelenyemo ʋ khãamɩra kãmara za.
45004023	Ŋa Yekila sɛwʋra sɩɛsɩɛ ki de kha: «Yekila kenn u wa nɩtelenyemo», sɩɛ sɩɛsɩɛ deɗ hãan ʋɔ kpora waʔ.
45004024	Sɩ sɛwɛn ma na hãan aa wɛpɩɛ Yekila ɓa ken nɩtelenyemira tɩ̃, naɗɩɛ aa khãa wa Yekila za, ʋɔ wɩɛra arɩgan a Adɛyɛ Yesura na kusen u huumira za ɩra.
45004025	Yekila yɩɛn ma na huumira nann Yesura aa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kãma. U gbũun arɩgan ʋ wa na kusen u huumira za na hãar ʋ thakuogo si le thaaga a le nɩtelenyeme ʋɔ Yekila wʋɔla za.
45005001	Iyo, baa khãamɩra liin thaagɩra na Yekila kenn a nɩtelenyeme, a bʋ wa wɔyĩke za na Yekila a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kãma.
45005002	A khãamɩra kãmara za, ʋɔ Yesu wɩɛ liin thaagɩra na a ɓuun niin Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra za a nɩ́ɩrɛ́n kɩ̃ran ɩra. A bãanyɩra wuon ma naɗɩɛ a lan ma na a khãa sɩ za kha aa niin ɓa hɩɗan ma Yekila ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra za.
45005003	Sɩɛ dola ɩ waʔ, aa bãanyɩra wuon ma na aa vɛnsɩra, naɗɩɛ vɛnsɩra yɩɛ wa a ɓu pɛ̃ɩmɛ.
45005004	Pɛ̃ɩmɛ yɩɛ wa a ɓu wɔrɩkɔ gbɩ̃rɩsɛ za, na a ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ, a hɩɗan ma na laŋa tɩ̃.
45005005	Kɛna gɩɛ laŋɩɛ gbũu kpɛnsɛ a waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila yiin ma ʋ khɔrɩmɩra a gagasɩra za Ninyɛgɛmɔra ʋ hãar a, ʋɔ wɔrɩkɩra za.
45005006	Iyo, bɛna a kha bʋ kɛɩ le faŋɩra, dɩɛ bɛna Kirisitira huun mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛrɩwɩra kãma za, na makɩ̃nn na bɛna Yekila kenn khonn ɩra.
45005007	Sɩ gbɩ̃ra nɩra bɩ na hu nɩtelenyemo boɗe za, ŋa sɩ wɔrɩ le kha nɩra ʋɔ bɩ na hu mɩkɩ̃rɩnledaa ʋɔ boɗe za.
45005008	Ŋa Yekila ɓɔgɔn a wa lɔmɩra za ʋɔ khɔrɩ a ki yo ɩra. Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha Kirisitira huun ma aa kãma za bɛna a kha bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za.
45005009	Ɩra baa a bʋ wa nɩtelenyeme Kirisitira huumira tarangboko kãmara za, dʋ̃nɛsɛ bʋ sɩɛ za dʋ̃waʔ, mafɩra tɩ̃ a ɓa ko Yekila doŋira ʋɔ Yesura kpuora wɔrɩkɩra za.
45005010	Naɗɩɛ bɛna a kha bʋ Yekila bɩ̃ɩrawɩra, na ʋ bɩɩn ma kha a ɓu bɛmɛ na ʋɔ u Ɓikhiira huumira kãmara za. Baa bɩɛ bɛmɩra ɓuun zuori, dʋ̃nɛsɛ bʋ sɩ za dʋ̃waʔ, a ɓa ɓu wa thakuogo tɩ̃ u Ɓikhiira kãmara za naɗɩɛ ʋ bʋ wa thakuogo za.
45005011	Sɩɛ dola ɩ waʔ, a bãanyɩra wuon ma Yekila wʋɔla za a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za, ʋɔ wɩɛra liin thaagɩra na aa na Yekila bɛnn ɩra.
45005012	Nɩra kpo liin thaagɩra na mɩbɩ̃yɛliige lonn dunuyara za, mɩbɩ̃yɛliige liin thaagɩra na huume nann nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɩɛ dunuyara za, naɗɩɛ pɩ bɩɛ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ.
45005013	Khaala Yekila kha ʋɔ hã sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na Moyizira, sɩɛ liin ma na mɩbɩ̃yɛliige bʋ wa dunuyara za zuori, ŋa baa sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kha bʋ dɩɛ bɛna thonn waʔ, Yekila kha kiti nɩra ʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kãma za waʔ.
45005014	Kɛna na khɛ Adamara bɛna na ɓa gbɩɛ Moyizira bɛna za, huume kha khɛ wa nɩpɛ, harɩ wɛpɩɛ thĩra liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ mʋ gaga kha Adamara waʔ, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɛɩn Yekila sɩɛsɩra ʋ na hãar ʋ ɩra. Dɛyɩra kha kãn na ɓan, Adamara kha bʋ ʋɔ dɛyɩra donduora.
45005015	Ŋa Adamara ɓilensira na Yekila kpasa mɩɩna ʋ fɩ̃ɩn nɩpɩra za wɔrɩ makɩ̃n waʔ; naɗɩɛ, na nɩra kpo ɓilense liin thaagɩra na huume nann nɩgɔmɛ, Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra gbɩ̃n ma gbaangbo thĩ, ʋ kpasa mɩɩna ʋ hãan nɩgɔmɩra nɩra kpo kãmara za na ʋɔ liin Yesu Kirisitira, dɩɛ gbɩ̃n ma thĩ.
45005016	Lɔmɛ za Yekila yãagɩ̃n nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ dɩ̃ɩna lɔmɛ za nɩra kpo le mɩbɩ̃yɛ, bʋ wa kpo kpo. Naɗɩɛ nɩra kpo mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kãma za Yekila yɩɛn na kitira waan nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɩɛ za. Ŋa mɩbɩ̃ɩgɔnyɛ liime kpɩ̃ra za, na Yekila makarɩn nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra za na hãan mɩ lɔmɛ pɩ wɔrɩ le nɩtelenyeme tɩ̃.
45005017	Na nɩra kpo mɩbɩ̃yɛ liin thaaga na huume ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ za, mafɩra tɩ̃, wɛpɛ bɩɩn Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra na u kenn mi nɩtelenyeme, bɩɛ ɓa hɩɗan ma thakuogo za ki ɓu wɔrɩkɔ Yesu Kirisitira kpora kãmara za.
45005018	Mafɩra, nɩra kpo mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kãma, na kiti waan nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɩɛ za. Mafɩra tɩ̃, nɩra kpo mɩkɩ̃rɩliige kãma, nɩgɔmɛ liin nɩtelenyeme na ɓuun thakuogo.
45005019	Nɩpɛ bɩɛ liin ma mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ nɩra kpo kpagayamɛ kãma, mafɩra tɩ̃, baa nɩra kpo liin Yekila dĩŋo, nɩgɔmɛ ɓa le wa nɩtelenyeme.
45005020	Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra tiin ma na si liin thaaga na dʋɔ sɩɛn mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za, ŋa khaarɛ bãa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige gɔn, Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra gbɩ̃n ma dɩɛ khaala za gbaangbo harɩ na tãra.
45005021	Lɔmɩra za mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira na ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra za kɩ khʋ wɩ, mafɩra tɩ̃, teleme wɔrɩkɩra za, Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra ɓu wa faŋa kɩ hã nɩpɛ thakuokɛɩzuoŋo a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za.
45006001	Bɩra a ɓa de ɩra? A kãn ma na dii mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za si le thaaga Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra gbɩ̃n na yo wʋɔrɛ ba?
45006002	Ɩya! Aa wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha a huun ma mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira gɛŋɛ na kuon mɩbɩ̃yɛliige faŋɩra za, mʋsɛ a le ki gbũu hɩɗan mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za tɩ̃?
45006003	Ɩ̃ tʋ kha aa wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ yĩɗ ãmɩra za Yesu Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za, a bɩɛ liin ma kpuore Kirisitira za, ki huun dɩ̃ɩn ʋ kpuore waʔ?
45006004	Baa a yĩɗ ãmɩra za, si liin ma mʋ gaga kha pɩ kasɩn a wa dɩ̃ɩna Kirisitira kpuore, si le thaaga, lɔmɩra za Kirisitira alɩn na kuɗ huumira za Siye Yekila wɔrɩkpakpakɩra kãmara za, aa lɔmɩra wɔrɩ vɩkɩ̃n na le lɔnfɛmɛ mafɩra tɩ̃.
45006005	Naɗɩɛ na a dɩɛr ʋ wa kpuore na huuri, aa na ʋɔ ɓa arɩ wa na kure huumira za kpuore tɩ̃.
45006006	A tʋ wɛsɩɛ na kɩ̃ra, a lɔnɗuguwira ɓaɗ ɓa na Yesura kpuore nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za, si le thaaga a mɩbɩ̃yɛlegbɔɗɩɛ asɩ kɩ yɩɛ a kure mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ɗonsira za.
45006007	Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ bãa huuri, ʋɔ niin bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za dʋ̃waʔ.
45006008	Na aa na Kirisitira dɩɛn ma na huun kpuore, a khãa wa sɩ za tɩ̃ kha a ɓa hɩɗan ma thakuogo za dɩ̃ɩn ʋ kpuore tɩ̃.
45006009	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, a tʋʋn ma kha Kirisitira alɩn ma na kuɗ huumira za, u gbũu ɓa hu dʋ̃waʔ, huume wɔrɩ ʋ dʋ̃waʔ.
45006010	Naɗɩɛ huumira Kirisitira huuri, u huun ma bãnɩkpo kpeli na asɩn huumira faŋɩra. Ɩra wɩɛ ʋ bʋ wa thakuogo za, ʋ thakuogira gbũu bʋ wa Yekila bɛgɛ.
45006011	Mafɩra tɩ̃, ɩ̃ɛ ken ĩ thĩ mʋ gaga kha nɩhuome mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira gɛŋɛ, ki le nɩkogolinkowe na hã Yekila Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za.
45006012	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra kɩ bʋ huonyira, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ɓu wɔrɩkɔ ɩɛ za dʋ̃waʔ, ɩ̃ kãn na bɩ gbɔʔɩra yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra dʋ̃waʔ.
45006013	Hã ɩ̃ khɛ ɩ̃ gbɔɗɛ khaarɛ sii na le ri mɩbɩ̃yɛ lemɩɩnɛ waʔ. Ŋa ɩ̃ hã ĩ thĩ na Yekila. Ĩ le mʋ gaga kha nɩpɛ bãa huun kɩ alɩn ɩra, kɩ khɛ ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra khayɩra bɩɛ ki ki le mɩtelenyenye.
45006014	Iyo, mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kãn ɓu wɔrɩkɔ ɩ̃ za dʋ̃waʔ. Naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ wa Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra wɔrɩkɩra za ɩra.
45006015	Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kɩ zɩɛ aa wʋɔla dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa Yekila khɔrɩmɩra kɩ bʋ a za. Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha a kãn ma ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ ba? Ɩya mafɩra ʋ waʔ!
45006016	Ɩ̃ tʋʋn kha na ɩ̃ khɩɛn ĩ thĩ na hãan nɩra wɩɛ bãa, na liin mʋ gaga kha ɩ̃ bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɗonron, ki ki nuure ʋ za, ĩ le wa u ɗonron waʔ? Na si gbũun liin ma mɩbɩ̃yɛ, sɩ ɓa phɩla wa asɩga za. Ŋa na Yekire bɛrɛ ĩ nu, ʋ ɓa yɩɛ ĩ telen.
45006017	A thɩɛ Yekila, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ na liin ma mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ɗome, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ karɩ̃na ĩ ɓuuri, ɩ̃ bɩɩn ma ʋɔ na ɩ̃ gagasɩra bɩɛ,
45006018	ĩ ɓuun ma ĩ thĩ na kuɗ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige leke za, ki liin teleme ɗome.
45006019	Mɩ sɩɛrɛ ɩ̃ wa mafɩra na makɩ̃n na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe lɔmɩra, naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ tʋ mɩyɛ kɔrɩwɛ vivi waʔ ɩra. Ɩ̃ na liin ma ĩ thĩ mɩtegenye na bɩ̃ɩmɛ ɗome, ki liin nɩkpagayamɛ Yekila za. Ɩra wɩɛ ĩ le mɩtelenyenye ɗome, kɩ hã ĩ thĩ pere na Yekila.
45006020	Naɗɩɛ bɛna ɩ̃ kha bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ɗonsira za, ɩ̃ nʋʋga kha bʋ mɩtelenyenye za waʔ.
45006021	Ŋa bɩra tɔ̃nɩ ĩ ɓuun sɩɛ za na nɩɩsɛ doro i wa? Naɗɩɛ sɩ phɩlamɩra ɓan ma na huume.
45006022	Ŋa fɩ̃ɩra ʋɔ, ĩ ɓuun ma ĩ thĩ na kuɗ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za na liin Yekila ɗome. Tɔ̃nɩra ɩ̃ɛ ɓu sɩɛ za ʋɔ kɩ bʋ gagayɛgɛnsɛ. Sɩ phɩlɩyansɩra za ɩ̃ ɓa ɓu wa thakuokɛɩzuoŋo.
45006023	Naɗɩɛ, mɩbɩ̃yɛliige taasɛ kɩ bʋ huume, ŋa mɩɩna Yekila yãagɩ̃n a dɩ, dɩɛ kɩ bʋ thakuokɛɩzuoŋo a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira za.
45007001	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓa de ĩ cɔ, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ tʋ wa sɩɛrɛhãansɩra. Ɩ̃ tʋ kha bɛna nɩthɩ̃rɩga bʋ thakuogo za, dɩɛ bɛna ʋ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra.
45007002	Mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃, hara wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ yaŋa za, na makɩ̃n na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, ʋɔ kãn ma na hɩɗan na u khuora bɛna khuora bʋ thakuogo za, ŋa na khuora huuri, hala wɔrɩ ɓu u thĩ na kure sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kha dɩɛ wɩ.
45007003	Ŋa na yɩɛ u khuora thakuogo za, ki kure na yo yii khokpasa ʋɔ, pɩ yɩ ɓa ʋɔ hara wɩɛ kha zɛrɩhara. Ŋa na u khuora huun ma, khɩ̃nɛ bʋ wa u heke na yo khɛ khokpasa na yan, dɩɛ bɛna ʋ asɩn sɩɛrɛhãansɩra dʋ̃waʔ, u gbũun liin zɛrɩgɛ tɩ̃ waʔ.
45007004	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa mafɩra tɩ̃, ĩ ɓuun ma ĩ thĩ na kuɗ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra vɔnsɩra za naɗɩɛ baa ĩ liin Kirisitira gbɔɗɛ khaarɛ dʋɔ ɩra. Ʋɔ wɩɛra alɩn na kuɗ huumira za, ĩ liin ma ʋɔ bɛwɛ ɩra, si le thaaga a wɔrɩ le miliinkɩ̃nsɛ na hã Yekila.
45007005	Aa tɩ̃, bɛna a kha bʋ a thĩ za, a yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra na ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ a za, mɩbɩ̃yɛliige yeke kha gɔ a wa sɩɛrɛhãansɛ kãma za. A liin mɩkarɩyɛ wɛʔɛ kha yo a huume za.
45007006	Ŋa sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na liir a ɗomira, a ɓuun ma a thĩ na kuɗ sɩɛ za. Ɩra wɩɛ, a wɔrɩ liige hã wa Yekila na lɔnfɛmɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔ wɔrɩkɩra za, a liige na makɩ̃n na lɔnɗugowira mʋ gaga kha baa Moyizi sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kha ɓa a sɩ faŋɩra waʔ.
45007007	Bɩra a ɓa de ɩra? Sɩrɛhãansɩra bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ba? Ɩya! Ŋa sɩɛrɛhãansɛ liin thaagɩra na mɩɛ tʋʋn mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kɔrɔla. Na si na deɗ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za waʔ kha: «Hã mʋ yɩɛ mʋ wʋɔrɛ kure mʋ kãnʋɔna mɩɩnɛ za waʔ.» Mɩɛ naa tʋ kha na mʋ wʋɔrɛ kuɗ mʋ kãnʋɔna mɩɩnɛ za, sɩɛ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige waʔ.
45007008	Baa si liin mafɩra na mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ɓuun ma lonkhɛrɛ na yiin mɩthĩnyira bɩɛ yebɩ̃ɩgɩra mɩɛ gagasɩra za. Naɗɩɛ na sɩɛrɛdewense bʋ waʔ, mɩbɩ̃yɛliige bʋ tɩ̃ waʔ.
45007009	Khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra, bɛna sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kha bʋ waʔ, mɩɛ kha bʋ wa thakuogo, ŋa baa sɩɛrɛdewensira ɓa tiiri, na mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ,
45007010	na mɩɛ huuri. Si liin mafɩra, sɩɛrɛdewensira kha kãn hã mɩ thakuogira, sɩɛ ɓa yann yuon na mɩɛ huume za.
45007011	Naɗɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ɓuun ma lonkhɛrɛ sɩɛrɛdewensira wɔrɩkɔ za, harɩ na liin thaaga na ɓilenn mɩɛ na mi huuri.
45007012	Mafɩra, sɩɛrɛhãansɩra bʋ wa mɩyɛgɛnɛ, dɩ̃ɩna sɩɛrɛdewensira bʋ wa mɩyɛgɛnɛ tɩ̃, si telen ma, sɩ kɩ̃ra wa.
45007013	Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra, mɩɩna kɩ kɩ̃ra, dɩɛ vɩɗ na liin mɩɛ khʋthagala ba? Ɩya! Mɩbɩ̃yɛliige fɛɗ ɓa mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ za na yiin mɩɛ huume za, si le thaaga sɩɛrɛdewensira ɓɔgɔ sɩ na yɛsɩ̃n kha mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira bɩ̃ɩn wa, dɩ̃ɩna ki yo wa na nɩra huume za.
45007014	Iyo, a tʋʋn ma kha sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kuɗ ɓa Yekila heke, ŋa mɩɛ bʋ wa kɛɩ le wɔrɩkɔ, mɩ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige leke za mʋ gaga kha ɗonron.
45007015	Tɩ̃yara za ʋɔ, wɛsɩɛ mɩɛ bu le, mi khon ɓire sɩ za waʔ. Wɛsɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ mɩ, mi le sɩɛ waʔ, ŋa wɛsɩɛ mɩ yãasɩ̃nnɩ, sɩɛ mi le.
45007016	Mɩyɩra kɩ nʋʋ mɩɛ waʔ, na ɩɛ mɩɛ le, sɩɛ kɩ yɩɛ mɩɛ bɩ kha sɩɛrɛhãansɩra bʋ wa mɩkɩ̃nɛ.
45007017	Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra mɩyɩra ki le, ɩɛ bʋ mɩɛ miliinye dʋ̃waʔ, mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kɩ bʋ mɩɛ gagasɩra za, gɩɛ ki le sɩɛ.
45007018	Naɗɩɛ mɩ tʋʋn ma kha mɩyɩra kɩ bʋ mɩ gbɔɗa za, ɩ kɩ̃ra waʔ. Mɩkɩ̃rɩliige bʋ mɩ gagasɩra za, ŋa mɩ wɔrɩ le i waʔ.
45007019	Mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɩra mɩ ɓɩɛ na le, mi le ɩɛ waʔ, fɔ mɩbɩ̃yɛ doro, mi gbũu ɓɩɛ ɩɛ waʔ.
45007020	Mɩyɩra kɩ nʋʋ mɩ waʔ, na ɩɛ mi le, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha i liimira kure mɩɛ thĩra za waʔ, ŋa mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kɩ bʋ mɩ gagasɩra za gɩɛ ki le sɩɛ.
45007021	Mi kenn yãan sɩ wa kha bɛna mɩ ɓɩɛ na le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɩra, mɩ wɔrɩ le i waʔ, fɔ mɩbɩ̃yɛ.
45007022	Mɩ gagasɩra sɩɛ ʋɔ za, Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra mɩyɛ nʋʋ wa mɩɛ.
45007023	Ŋa mɩ yãan ma kha wɛsɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ mɩ, na mɩ kha mi le sɩɛ, wɔrɩkɔ gʋɔ barɩ wa mɩɛ si liimira za. Gɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra kɩ yɩɛ na mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira ɓu faŋa mɩɛ za.
45007024	Mɩ wɔgbʋ̃ʋga ɩ! Gbɔɗa kɩ yan ki yo mi huumira za, ãna kɩ ɓa zɩ̃n mɩ kɩ za?
45007025	Mɩ gbɩ̃nɛ wa Yekila ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ zɩ̃n mɩ gɩɛ wɔgbʋ̃ʋgɩra za a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za ɩra! Mi kpolongagasɩra za, mɩ bɩɩn ma kha mɩɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, gbɔɗa kpũŋinsira liin mi mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ɗonrona.
45008001	Ɩra wɩɛ ʋɔ, nɩra wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ na Yesu Kirisitira, kiti ɓa wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za kũu waʔ.
45008002	Naɗɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kɩ hã a thakuogira Yesu Kirisitira za, ʋɔ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra liin thaagɩra na zɩ̃nn mɩɛ na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kɩ hã mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira na huumira ɩra.
45008003	Mɩɩna Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kpũnn liimira naɗɩɛ baa gbɔɗɛ bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ waʔ, Yekila liin ma dɩɛ. Ʋ dãan ma ʋɔ thĩ ɓikhiira na ʋ ɓann mʋ gaga kha mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa, kɩ hãan u thĩ na ɓu taa a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira. Mafɩra ʋ asɩn mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira faŋɩra,
45008004	si le thaaga, telemira sɩɛrɛhãansɩra ɓɩɛ kha aa wɛpɩɛ kɛɩn nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe nɩ́ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra kɩ kɩ nɩ́ɩɩrɛ̀ kɩ makɩ̃n na Ninyɛgɛmɔra dĩŋora, a wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na makɩ̃n na bɩɛ telemira.
45008005	Tɩ̃yara za ʋɔ, wɛpɩɛ ki thuo gbɔkhaasɛ yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra, bɩɛ dɛrɩwɩra le wa gbɔɗɛ dĩŋo doro, ŋa wɛpɩɛ ki thuo Ninyɛgɛmɔra dĩŋora, bɩɛ dɛrɩwɩra le wa Ninyɛgɛmɔra dĩŋo.
45008006	Na bɩ na thuo gbɔkhaasɛ yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra, sɩ ɓan ma na huume, ŋa na bɩ na thuo Ninyɛgɛmɔra dĩŋora, sɩ ɓan ma na thakuogo na wɔyĩke.
45008007	Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiibɛ bãa yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩga gɔ na ɓu wɔrɩkɔ pɩ za, bɩɛ dɛrɩwɩra bʋ wa Yekire bɩ̃ɩrawɛ. Pɩ bɩ Yekila dĩŋora waʔ, bɩɛ thĩra wɔrɩ le si waʔ.
45008008	Naɗɩɛ, na nɩra le mɩyɩra kɩ nʋʋ ʋɔ thĩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra mɩyɛ wɔrɩ nʋʋ Yekila kũu waʔ.
45008009	Ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, ĩ le ɩ̃ɛ thĩ dĩŋo mɩyɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Mɩyɩra kɩ nʋʋ Ninyɛgɛmɔra, ɩɛ ĩ le, naɗɩɛ Yekila Nina bʋ wa ɩ̃ za. Na Kirisitira Nina bʋ wɩɛ bãa za waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ Kirisitira baa waʔ.
45008010	Kɛna Kirisitira bʋ ɩ̃ gagasɩra za. Tɩ̃ya ʋ, ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra bʋ wa huonye mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãmara za. Ŋa baa Yekila kenn ĩ nɩtelenyeme, Ninyɛgɛmɔra le wa thaaga ĩ ɓu thakuogo.
45008011	Yekila arɩgan Yesu Kirisitira na kusen u huumira za. Na Yekila Nina bʋ ɩ̃ za, ʋɔ kpuola kɩ ɓa hã ɩ̃ gbɔhuonyira thakuogo u Nina wɔrɩkɩra za, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ za ɩra.
45008012	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, mɩɩna a kãn na le kũu, dɩɛ bʋ gbɔɗɛ miliinse na ki le gbɔɗɛ dĩŋo waʔ.
45008013	Naɗɩɛ, na ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ wa kɩ makɩ̃n na gbɔɗɛ dĩŋo mɩyɛ, ɩ̃ ɓa hu wa, ŋa na ɩ̃ vɩkɩ̃nn ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛlɔmɩra Ninyɛgɛmɔ wɔrɩkɩra za, ɩ̃ ɓa ɓu thakuogo.
45008014	Naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ kɩ makɩ̃n na Yekila Nina dĩŋora, bɩɛ bʋ wa Yekila ɓiiwe.
45008015	Nina kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ za, ʋɔ yii ĩ ɗonse na ãnabirise za waʔ, Ninyɛgɛmɔ kɩ bʋ ʋɔ. Ʋɔ liin thaagɩra na ɩ̃ɛ liin Yekila ɓiiwira, Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɔ za a yɩ Yekila kha: «Abba», gɩɛ yɩsɩgɩɛ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha Bʋba.
45008016	Ʋɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kɩ ɓɔgɔ a sɩ kha a bʋ wa Yekila ɓiiwe.
45008017	Na a liin ma Yekila ɓiiwe, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa tɩ̃ kha a ɓa ɓu wa niin Yekila heke, aa na Kirisitira kɩ ɓa ɓu ʋɔ niina kpuore, naɗɩɛ na aa ɓuun ma Kirisitira vɛnsɩra siira, a ɓa ɓu wa ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra siira tɩ̃.
45008018	Mɩɛ gagasɩra za, Yekire ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra a ɓa ɓu dɩ̃ɩra, bɩɛ wɔrɩ makɩ̃n na fɩ̃ɩ vɛnsɩra waʔ.
45008019	Naɗɩɛ, dunuyara Yekila liiri, ʋɔ tɩɛ wa ɗɩyãgɩra Yekila ɓa yii u ɓiiwira ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra za ki kpũ.
45008020	Dunuya wɩɛ Yekila liiri, ʋ waan ma mɩkpasɩyɛ leke za. Dunuyara dĩŋo ʋɔ waʔ, ŋa dɛyɩra liin dunuyara ʋɔ dĩŋo u. Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, laŋa khaarɛ bʋ wa bʋ.
45008021	Yekila thĩra kɩ ɓa zɩ̃n dunuyara na asɩgɩra na liir u ɗonrona, kɩ yɩɛ u ɓu u thĩ mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila ɓiiwira ɓa ɓu pi thĩ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ za ɩra.
45008022	A tʋʋn ma kha na ɓa gbɩɛ fɩ̃ɩ za, dunuyara bɩɛ Yekila liiri, u bʋ wa ki usi mʋ gaga kha halɔwɔrɔ hũme.
45008023	Dunuyara Yekila liiri, ʋɔ doro u waʔ, ŋa aa wɛpɩɛ Yekila hãan u Ninyɛgɛmɔra mʋ gaga kha lʋgʋ mɩɩnɛ, aa usi wa kɩ tɩɛ a ɗɩyãgɩra Yekila ɓa le a u ɓiiwe, kɩ zɩ̃n a pere.
45008024	Naɗɩɛ a ɓuun ma zɩ̃mɛ, ŋa bɩɛ zɩ̃mɩra bʋ wa laŋa mɩyɛ. Na a yiwire khɩɗ mɩɩnɛ za zuori, dɩɛ bʋ laŋa mɩyɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Mɩɩdɛ za mu yiwire khɩɗ zuori, mʋsɛ mʋ wɔrɩ le ki de kha laŋa mɩnɛ dɩɛ bere?
45008025	Ŋa mɩyɩra za a yiwiyira khɩɗ thonn waʔ, na a yiin laŋa ɩɛ mɩyɩra za, a ɓa pɛ̃ɩ wa na tɩɛ ɩɛ mɩyɩra.
45008026	Mafɩra, Ninyɛgɛmɔra dɛnfɛ a wa khaayɩra za a thɔ ɩra. Naɗɩɛ a tʋ yɩ̃nlɔmɛ waʔ, ŋa Ninyɛgɛmɔra kɩ khɛ a boɗa na yɩ̃n zaanɩ zaanɩ thĩ, bɩɛ yɩ̃mɩra thĩra tʋ na ɓɔgɔ na nʋʋga waʔ.
45008027	Yekila kɩ tʋ nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira gagasɩra, ʋɔ tʋ wa mɩɩna Ninyɛgɛmɔra bʋ yɩ̃n ɩra, naɗɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra yɩ̃n ma Yekila kɩ hã Yekila nɩpɩra na makɩ̃n na Yekila thĩra dĩŋora.
45008028	A tʋʋn ma kha Yekire khɔrɩdɛrɩwɩra Yekila thĩra yɩɗ na makɩ̃nn na baa ʋ ɔfɔn sɩ, mɩyɩra bɩɛ ki le, Yekila yɩɛ wa pi ɓu dagamu sɩ za.
45008029	Wɛpɩɛ Yekila nisĩnn kenn khonn harɩ khɔ̃ɩ, u nisĩnn khonn ma gagasɛ harɩ khɔ̃ɩ tɩ̃ kha pɩ lɔmɩra hɩɗan mʋ gaga kha u Ɓikhiira, si le thaaga u Ɓikhiira le yaɓigɔmɛ marikokhãga.
45008030	Wɛpɩɛ mɩyɩra ʋ na nisĩnn kenn harɩ khɔ̃ɩra, bɩɛ u yɩɗɩ. Wɛpɩɛ ʋ yɩɗɩ, u kenn ma bɩɛ nɩtelenyeme. Wɛpɩɛ u kenn nɩtelenyemira, u yiin ma bɩɛ ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra za tɩ̃.
45008031	Bɩra a de tɩ̃ bere? Na Yekila bʋ a za, ãna kɩ wɔrɩ arɩ a za bere?
45008032	Yekila thĩra kɛɩn ʋɔ thĩra Ɓikhiira kuoremira na vɛnsɩra, ki khonn u thɔgɔnsɛ kha u hu a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãmara za. Na mʋsɛ si le na ʋ ɓa hã a mɩyɩra bɩɛ na u Ɓikhiira kpuore waʔ?
45008033	Wɛpɩɛ Yekila kenn khonni, ãna kɩ ɓa zarɩgɩ̃n bɩɛ kha pi ɓilenni? Yekila thĩra kenn mi nɩtelenyeme.
45008034	Ãna kɩ ɓa yɩɛ kiti wa pɩ za? Nɩra sii, naɗɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira huun ma, sɩɛ dola ɩ waʔ, ʋ alɩn kuɗ ɓa huumira za, ʋ hɩɗann ma Yekila leɗĩngɛŋɩra ʋ, kɩ kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila kɩ hã a.
45008035	Khɔrɩmɩra Kirisitira khɔrɩn a, bɩra mɩthĩne kɩ wɔrɩ kpɩkɩ̃n a na khon a bɩɛ khɔrɩmɩra za? Vɛnbɩ̃ɩsɛ ɩ ba? Warɩma gagayãgamɩŋa ɩ ba? Warɩma nɩpɛ gbɩ̃ɩmɛ ɩ ba? Warɩma khʋ̃mʋŋa ɩ ba? Warɩma bʋɔmɛ ɩ ba? Warɩma na hɩɗan bɩ̃ɩnsɛ nʋʋnɛ za ba? Warɩma huume i ba?
45008036	Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa kha: «Mʋɔ kãma za, a bʋ wa huume nʋʋnɛ za ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga, pi le wa aa mʋ gaga kha zãrabɛ pɩ kãn na khʋ.»
45008037	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, Kirisitira khɔrɩn a, a liin ma wɔrɩkɔ nɩpɛ kɩ̃raŋɩra ʋɔ wɔrɩkɩra za.
45008038	Naɗɩɛ mɩɛ khãan ma sɩ za kha harɩ huume i ba, warɩma thakuogo i ba, warɩma mɛlɛgɛwɛ ɩ ba, warɩma gĩrime i ba, warɩma mɩyɩra kɩ bʋ ɩra wɩɛ ba, warɩma mɩyɩra kɩ bʋ thonn waʔ ba, warɩma wɔrɩkɔdɛrɩwɛ ɩ ba,
45008039	harɩ faŋa dɛrɩwɩra kɩ bʋ zaara ni ba, warɩma wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ fɔlɔŋɩra za na fɔlɔŋɩra theɗera ʋ ba, warɩma mɩyɩra Yekila liin ba, mɩɩnɛ sii wɔrɩ khon a khɔrɩmɩra Yekila khɔrɩn a waʔ, bɩɛ khɔrɩmɩra ɓɔgɔn ma pi thĩ a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za.
45009001	Wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓa de mɩra, sɩ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya. Mɩ tɔn waʔ, naɗɩɛ mɩ bʋ wa Kirisitira baa. Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za, mɩ lɔɓidaara de ɓa kha wɛsɩɛ mi de, sɩ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya.
45009002	Mɩ gagasɛ asɩn ma gbaangbo, na yiin mi vɛnkɛɩzuonse za.
45009003	Mɩ ɓɩɛ wa thĩ kha Yekila daŋa mɩ na kpɩkɩ̃n mɩ na Kirisitira, mɩ yaɓiiwira kɩ bʋ mi thĩnɩpɩra, bɩɛ kɩ̃ramɛ kãmara za.
45009004	Bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra. Bɩɛ Yekila khɩɛn na liin u ɓiiwe, kɩ ɓɔgɔn mɩ ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra, ki yiin bɛmɛ dɩ̃ɩn mɩ, na tiin sɩɛrɛhãansɛ na hãan mɩ, kɩ ɓɔgɔn mɩ lɔmɩra za pɩ kãn kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋɔ, kɩ hãan mɩ nʋʋga.
45009005	Pi sekhãgawɩra yɩsɩsɛ na kuɗ ɓa. Kirisitira na bɩɛ bʋ wa thĩne tikpo. Kirisitira kɩ bʋ Yekila, na ʋ bʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ thaagɩra za, gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ, Amiina.
45009006	Kɛna sɩɛ bɩɛ za, Yekila sɩɛsɩra yɩɛn kɛɩ hĩin waʔ, wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira, pɩ bɩɛ bʋ Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɛ waʔ.
45009007	Abɩrahamʋra kpɩ̃raɓiiwira bɩɛ pɩ yɩ kha ʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwe waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila na deɗ u wa kha: «Ɩzakɩra ɓiiwe kɩ ɓa yɩ kha mʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwe.»
45009008	Sɩ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha ɓiiwira hũnn na makɩ̃nn na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira lɔmɩra, bɩɛ bʋ Yekire ɓiiwe waʔ. Wɛpɩɛ hũnn na makɩ̃nn na Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra, bɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila ɓiiwira.
45009009	Naɗɩɛ Yekila na hãan ma nʋʋga na deɗ kha: «Goɗi mɩ ɓa vɩ ɓan bɛnkpuodɩɛ za, na ɓa ɓu ɓikhoyiɗe Saara leke za.»
45009010	Sɩɛ dola ɩ waʔ, Erebeka ɓuun ma ɓikhoyipe pɩyɔ̃ u khuora Ɩzakɩra heke ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ a sekhãgara ɩra.
45009011	Yekila na deɗ u wa kha Marɩkhuora kɩ ɓa le khɩ̃nɩyɛra ɗonrona. Bɛna Yekila na deɗ sɩɛ, bɩɛ ɓiibɩɛ na hũnn thonn waʔ, pɩ na tʋʋn mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ warɩma mɩbɩ̃yɛ thonn waʔ. Yekila liin ma sɩɛ na ɓu ɓɔgɔ kha ʋɔ ken khon nɩra na makɩ̃n na ʋ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra waʔ, fɔ ʋɔ le si wa na makɩ̃n na ʋɔ thĩ dĩŋora.
45009013	Mʋ gaga kha baa si deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Zakɔbʋra mɩyɛ nʋʋn mɩɛ, Ezawura mɩyɛ nʋʋn mɩɛ waʔ.»
45009014	Bɩra a de sɩɛ za ɩra sã? Kha Yekila telenn waʔ ba? Ɩya, sɩɛ ɩ kũu waʔ!
45009015	U deɗ ɓa Moyizira sɩ kha: «Wɩɛ za mɩ ɓɩɛ na makarɩ, ʋɔ za mɩ ɓa makarɩ, wɩɛ bãa mɩ ɓɩɛ na kɩ̃ra, mɩ ɓa kɩ̃ra ʋɔ dɛyɩra.»
45009016	Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra, Yekila kɩ̃rɩgɩra kure nɩthɩ̃rɩga dĩŋo za waʔ, warɩma nɩthɩ̃rɩga pɛ̃ɩmɛ za waʔ, ŋa Yekila kɩ̃rɩgɩra ɓu wa ʋ makarɩla za.
45009017	Yekila na deɗ ɓa Farawɔ̃ mɩyɛ za tɩ̃ kha: «Mi yiin mu wa ɩɩgɩra za, si le thaaga mi ɓu ɓɔgɔ mɩ wɔrɩkɔ, kɩ yɩɛ mɩ yɩsɩga yɩ dunuyara sɩrɩsɩra khaayɩra bɩɛ za.»
45009018	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na Yekila bʋ ɓɩɛ na makarɩ wɩɛ bãa za, ʋ makarɩ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za, na u gbũu ɓɩɛ na le wɩɛ bãa numigbɩdaa, u le u wa numigbɩdaa.
45009019	Nɩra ʋɔ wɔrɩ de mɩɛ kha: «Na be liin na Yekila zarɩgɩ̃n a tɩ̃? Naɗɩɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩga wɔrɩ kɛɩ wa Yekila bɛrɛ ba?»
45009020	Mʋɔ nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye, mʋɔ nan ma be thĩra, kɩ ha kɩ bakɩ̃n na Yekila? Tɛwʋgɛ ɓene wɔrɩ de tɩ maɗɛdaara wɛsɩɛ ba kha: «Be liin na mʋ maɗɛn mɩ mɩra?»
45009021	Ɓenyira maɗɛ tɛwʋgɩra bʋ wa ɓenye ledaara lekira za waʔ ba? Khɩ̃nɛ bʋ wa u heke na khɛ gɩɛ tɛwʋgɩra na maɗɛ ɓenkɩ̃nɩnyɛ. Khɩ̃nɛ bʋ wa u heke na khɛ gɩɛ tɛwʋgɩra na maɗɛ ɓenye yʋɔ wɛʔɛ kɩ̃ramɛ kɩ nan yʋɔra waʔ.
45009022	Yekila kha ɓɩɛ wa na ɓɔgɔ u doŋira na ʋ wɔrɩkɩra. Kɛna ʋ baɗ u doŋira na fĩin gbaangbo na yɩɛn wɛpɩɛ za ʋ kha kãn na sũne u doŋira na asɩ wɩ ɩra.
45009023	Ŋa ʋ ɓɔgɔn ma bʋɔra ʋ makarɩla. Ʋ kha ɓɩɛ wa na ɓɔgɔ ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛkpakpapɩra. Ʋ ɔfɔn mɩ wa pi ɓu ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra.
45009024	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ kɩ bʋ aa wɛpɩɛ ʋ yɩɗ ɩra. U kenn khonn a Yawutuwe doro sʋgʋmʋ za waʔ, ŋa u kenn khonn ma bʋɔ thĩmaanyɛ sʋgʋmʋ za tɩ̃.
45009025	Yekila deɗ si wa ʋ yãdedaa Oze sɛwʋra za kha: «Wɛpɩɛ kha bʋ mɩɛ Yekila bɛwɛ waʔ, mɩ ɓa khɛ wa bɩɛ bɩɛ na le wi mɩ nɩpɛ wɛpɩɛ mɩyɛ kha nʋʋ mɩ waʔ, mɩ ɓa yɩɛ wa bɩɛ mɩyɛ nʋʋ mɩ.
45009026	Khaala za nɩpɛ na deɗ pi kha: “Ɩ̃ɛ bʋ mɩɛ nɩpɛ waʔ”, dɩɛ kharɩkpuola za pɩ ɓa yɩ pɩ kha Thakuo Yekire ɓiiwe.»
45009027	Yekire yãdedaa Ezayi na deɗ ɓa Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira mɩyɛ za tɩ̃ kha: «Harɩ na Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira gɔnn mʋ gaga kha lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ geŋe sɩ̃rɩkpɩka, pi kpokpope doro kɩ ɓa ko.
45009028	Naɗɩɛ sɩɛsɩra Adɛyɩra deɗi, ʋ ɓa le wa sɩɛ bɩɛ na hĩɗe si fɔlɔŋɩra za khaala za fɩ.»
45009029	Yekire yãdedaa Ezayi na nisĩnn deɗ si wa kha: «Na wɔrɩkɔ Adɛyɛ na yɩɛn kpɩ̃raɓiiwe bʋɔ kɩrɩ ʋ waʔ, a naa hu wa pere mʋ gaga kha Sodɔmʋ nɩpɩra tɩ̃, a naa ɓa zuo wa pere mʋ gaga kha Gɔmɔrɩ nɩpɩra tɩ̃.»
45009030	Bɩra a ɓa de ɩra? Thĩmaanyɩra kha ɓɩɛ telemira waʔ, baa ɩ nɩpɩra khãan Yekila za, na pi liin ma nɩtelenyeme.
45009031	Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra kha ɓɩɛ wa Yekila ɓu ken bɩɛ nɩtelenyeme naɗɩɛ baa bɩɛ gɔ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra ɩra, ŋa pɩ wɔrɩn ɓuun sɩɛ waʔ.
45009032	Bɩra yɩɛn na sɩɛ liin mafɩra? Naɗɩɛ, baa pɩ naa yii pɩ laŋɩra bɩɛ Yekila za kɩ kɩ ɓɩɛ telemira, na pɩ kɛɩn ma sɩɛ, kɩ pɛ̃ɩn ma milewenye za Yekila ɓu ken bɩɛ nɩtelenyeme. Sɩɛ liin pɩ waamɩra ɗɛtʋbʋla.
45009033	Si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Mi tiin ma waamɛ ɗɛtʋbʋlɛ gboŋira za pɩ yɩ Siyɔ̃ ɩra, bʋla kɩ yɩɛ nɩpɛ wa, dɩɛ mi yiin ni. Na wɩɛ ɓakan dɩɛ bʋla za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa nɩɩ kũu waʔ.»
45010001	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓɩɛ na mɩ gagasɩra bɩɛ Yekila heke, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra ɓu zɩ̃mɛ.
45010002	Naɗɩɛ mɩ wɔrɩ de ɓa kha pɩ pɛ̃ɩn ma Yekila ɓɩɛmɩra za thĩ, ŋa pɩ pɛ̃ɩmɩra bʋ na Yekila tʋʋmɩra waʔ.
45010003	Khɩ̃na Yekila hãan nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira pi ɓu telen ʋ wʋɔla za, pɩ tʋʋn dɩɛ waʔ, pɩ kha ɓɩɛ wa telemira na bɩɛ thĩ faŋa. Mafɩra, telemira ki ɓu Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za, pɩ wɔrɩn sũnen pi thĩ na hãan Yekila na telen waʔ.
45010004	Tɩ̃yara za ʋɔ, Kirisitira ɓa hĩɗen ma Moyizira sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, si le thaaga na wɩɛ bãa khãa Kirisitira za, Yekila ken ʋɔ dɛyɩra nɩtelenyemo.
45010005	Ken wɛsɩɛ Moyizira sɛwɛn na gbũun mɩyɩra kɩ yɩɛ nɩra telen sɩɛrɛhãansɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za ɩra; ʋ na deɗ ɓa kha: «Wɩɛ bãa kɩ gɔ Yekila sɩɛrɛdewensira kɩ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ sɩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu thakuogo sɩɛrɛhãansɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.»
45010006	Ŋa ken wɛsɩɛ u deɗ na gbũun telemira ki ɓu khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za ɩra: «Hã mʋ ɓa de mu thĩ za waʔ kha: Ãna kɩ ɓa gan zaazaara ni?» (Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha na sũne Kirisitira).
45010007	Hã mʋ ɓa de tɩ̃ waʔ kha: «Ãna kɩ ɓa sũn harɩ fɔlɔŋɩra theɗera ni?» (Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha na kuse Kirisitira huumira za).
45010008	Ken mɩyɩra Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ na gbũun telemira za: «Sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra bʋ wa mu numila lɔkɩra ʋ, sɩ bʋ wa mʋ nʋʋgɩra dɩ̃ɩna mʋ gagasɩra za». Sɩɛsɩra a de mɩra, sɩɛ bʋ wa khãamɛ sɩɛsɛ.
45010009	Na mʋ bɩɩn na deɗ si kha Yesura kɩ bʋ Adɛyɩra, na mʋ lan sɩ za na mʋ gagasɩra bɩɛ kha Yekila arɩgan ʋ wa na kusen u huumira za, mʋ ɓa ko.
45010010	Iyo na mʋ khãan Yekila za na mʋ gagasɩra bɩɛ, u ken mu wa nɩtelenyemo; na mʋ bɩɩn na deɗ si, u kuore mu wa.
45010011	Naɗɩɛ si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Wɩɛ bãa khãan Yekila za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa nɩɩ kũu waʔ.»
45010012	Na sɩ mafɩra, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha kpɩkɩ̃nsɛ bʋ Yawutuwe na thĩmaanyɛ za dʋ̃waʔ, Adɛyɛ kpuo kɩ bʋ pɩ bɩɛ heke, ʋ hã wa ʋ kɩ̃rɩgɩra na wɛpɛ bɩɛ kɩ yɩ ʋ.
45010013	Naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Wɩɛ bãa kɩ yɩ Adɛyɩra yɩsɩgɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ko.»
45010014	Ŋa mʋsɛ pɩ wɔrɩ yɩ Adɛyɩra yɩsɩgɩra kɛna pɩ khãa ʋ za waʔ? Na mʋsɛ pɩ wɔrɩ le kɩ khãa ʋ za, kɛna pi nuun ʋ mɩyɛ yãan waʔ? Warɩma mʋsɛ pɩ wɔrɩ le ki nu ʋ mɩyɛ kɛna nɩra sii deɗ pi ʋ mɩyɛ waʔ?
45010015	Warɩma mʋsɛ sii nɩra wɔrɩ le ki yo de pi ʋ mɩyɛ, kɛna pɩ dãan ʋɔ dɛyɩra waʔ? Gɩɛ yɩɛn na si deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Sɩ bʋ wa bãanwuoŋo thĩ na yã sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɛ dedɛwɛ na pɩ ɓan!»
45010016	Ŋa nɩpɛ bɩɛ bɩɩn Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra waʔ, gɩɛ yɩɛn na Ezayi na deɗ kha: «Adɛyɛ, ãna khãan a sɩɛsɩra za?»
45010017	Mafɩra, khãamɩra kure wa Yekire sɩɛrɛnuuregira za, sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra kɩ bʋ Kirisitira sɩɛsɩra.
45010018	Mɩ bʋ̃ ɓa mi thĩ kha Yawutuwira nuun sɩɛ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra waʔ baa? Iyo, pi nuun si. Naɗɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa kha: «Yekire sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɛ dedɛrɩwɛ sɩɛsɛ bu nu fɔlɔŋɩra khaayɛ bɩɛ, pɩ sɩɛsɩra nann ma dunuyara khaayɩra bɩɛ.»
45010019	Mɩ bʋ̃ ɓa mi thĩ tɩ̃ kha: «Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra na tʋʋn wɛsɩɛ kɔla waʔ baa?» Moyizi na nisĩnn deɗ Yekila sɩɛsɩra kha: «Thĩna nɩra bu waʔ, dɩɛ mɩ ɓa khɛ na yɩɛ zone gɔ ɩ̃. Thĩndɛ wʋɔmɛ kpɩʔ, dɩɛ mɩ ɓa khɛ na yii ĩ doŋo»
45010020	Ezayira na haɗ deɗ ɓa thĩra kũu kha Yekila deɗ ɓa kha: «Wɛpɩɛ kha mʋʋ mɩɛ waʔ, bɩɛ yãan mɩ. Wɛpɩɛ kha ɓɩɛ mɩɩnɛ mi heke waʔ, bɩɛ mɩ ɓɔgɔn mi thĩra.»
45010021	Ŋa na gbũu Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra mɩyɛ za, Yekila deɗ ɓa kha: «Mɩ narɩn ma mi lekira khɩɛra bɩɛ za, na hãan thĩnkpagayanɛ, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ numiyira gbɩɗ ɩra.»
45011001	Mɩ bʋ̃ ɓa mi thĩ kha, Yekila kɛɩn ma ʋ nɩpɩra baa? Ɩya sɩɛ ɩ waʔ dɛ! Mɩɛ bʋ wa pɩ ʋɔ thĩra tɩ̃, mɩɛ bʋ wa Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwe ʋɔ na kure Bɛ̃zamɛ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ za.
45011002	Nɩpɩra Yekila nisĩnn kenn khonn harɩ lʋgʋsɩra za, ʋ kɛɩn mɩ waʔ, na ɩ̃ karɩ̃n sɩ Yekila sɛwʋra za, ɩ̃ ɓa yã kha Eli yɩ̃nn ma Yekila na hãan Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra na deɗ kha:
45011003	«Adɛyɛ, pɩ khʋʋn ma mʋ yãdedɛrɩwɩra bɩɛ, ki kiin thɔgɔnsɛ khonkhɛyɩra bɩɛ, mɩɛ kpora kpeli yɩɛrɩ, pɩ ɓɩɛ wa mɩɛ khʋkhɛrɛ tɩ̃.»
45011004	Ŋa, bɩra Yekila zɩ̃ŋɩnn Elira na deɗi? Ʋ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ wa kha: «Mi guuren ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ (7,000), bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ ʋɔ sii bɩɩn ɓaɗ huruse na hãan sɩ̃ŋɩra pɩ yɩ kha Balɩ waʔ.»
45011005	Mafɩra tɩ̃, fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ wɩɛ za, nɩpɛ bʋɔ yɩɛn kɩrɩ ʋ tɩ̃, wɛpɛ Yekila kenn khonn ʋ kɩ̃rɩgɩra za.
45011006	Ŋa, Yekila kenn khonn mi wa ʋ kɩ̃rɩgɩra kãma, pi lelɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra yɩɛn waʔ, bʋɔtɛ Yekila kɩ̃rɩgɩra naa ɓa le kɩ̃rɩga waʔ.
45011007	Bɩra a de wɛsɩɛ za? Mɩɩna Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra kha ɓɩɛ, pi ɓuun dɩɛ waʔ, ŋa wɛpɩɛ Yekila kenn khonni, bɩɛ ʋɔ ɓuun ni. Bʋɔra bɩɛ ʋɔ, bɩɛ liin ma numigbɩka,
45011008	mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ si ɩra kha: «Yekila liin mi wa wʋɔnlaɗɩpɛ, na hãan mɩ yiwiye, pi gbũu yã waʔ, na hãan mɩ numiye, pi gbũu nu waʔ; sɩ bʋ wa mafɩra harɩ na ɓa gbɩɛ fɩ̃ɩ za.»
45011009	Ɩtakhuo Davidi na deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Pi ɗiimira vɩkɩ̃n na le zaŋa pɩ za, pi ɗiimira kɩ ɓa le zʋɔra na gɔ pɩ. Pi ɗiimira kɩ ɓa le thaagɩra pi khon wa, miliinbɩ̃ɩsɩra pi liiri, pi ɓu sɩ taasɩra!
45011010	Pɩ ɗarɩ, hã pi yiwiyira yã waʔ. Kɩ yɩɛ pɩ hɩɗan gbisereme bãanyɛ bɩɛ.»
45011011	Mɩɛ bʋ̃ ɓa mɩɛ thĩ tɩ̃ kha: Baa Yawutuwira tʋɗ pɩ ɗɩɛsɩra na khonn warɩ, pɩ ɓa dii wa wakhɛla kũu ba? Ɩya! Ŋa pi ɓilensira liin thaagɩra na thĩmaanyɩra ɓuun zɩ̃mɩra, sɩɛ gbũun liin ma thaaga na yiin zone Yawutuwira gagasɩra za.
45011012	Baa pi ɓilensira liin ma thaaga na hãan dunuyara nɩpɩra dagamu, dɩ̃ɩna pi kpũnsira liin ma tɔ̃nɩ thĩmaanyɩra heke, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha na pɩ bɩɛ pere ɓa vɩɗ ɓann Yekila heke, sɩɛ ɓa le wa mɩkɩ̃rɩkpakpaʔɛ gbaangbo.
45011013	Ɩra wɩɛ, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ thĩmaanyɩra, mi liin ma Yekire dãara na ɓa liige ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za, mɩ bãanɛ wuon ma na sɩɛ liigesira.
45011014	Mɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha gɩɛ bãanwuoŋira le thaaga na yii zone mɩɛ thĩnɩpɩra za, si le thaaga bʋɔ wɔrɩ ɓu zɩ̃mɛ pɩ sʋgʋmʋra za.
45011015	Baa Yekila yiin Yawutuwira gɛnɛ ʋ, na sɩɛ liin ma thaaga na dunuyara nɩpɩra ɓuun bɛmɛ na Yekila, na Yawutuwira ɓa vɩɗ ɓann ʋ za bɛndɛ, mʋsɛ sɩɛ ɓa hɩɗan? Sɩ ɓa le wa mʋ gaga kha pɩ na huun ma ki gbũun alɩnɩ.
45011016	Lʋgʋ ɗiisira ki nisĩn nan, na pi khonn sʋɔ sɩɛ za na hãan Yekila, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha ɗiigbusira sʋɔra bɩɛ bʋ wa Yekila bɛsɛ. Na dahaga nĩnsira hãan ma Yekila, ki ɗesira bʋ wa ʋ bɛsɛ tɩ̃.
45011017	Yawutuwe bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha dahagɛ bãa pɩ kãwɩn hʋʋga za, ɩ̃ɛ thĩmaanyɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha gbaŋa dahasɛ. Na pi kpiin hʋʋga dahaga ɗese na bann sɩ, kɩ kpiin ɓa maan gbaŋa bɛgɛ ɗese hʋʋga bɛgɩra za, si le thaaga gbaŋa dahaga ɗesira fɛ hʋʋga dahagɩra huomira za na sen ɓikɩ̃rɩsɛ,
45011018	hã mʋ gbɩ̃nɛ mu thĩ daɗekpiinbaransɩra za waʔ, naɗɩɛ mʋɔ thĩra liin dahatãanɛ waʔ, mʋ bʋ wa ɗeke.
45011019	Mʋ wɔrɩ de kha: «Ɗaɗesira sʋɔra kpiin bann ma si le thaaga mɩɛ wɔrɩ ɓu maakhɛrɛ.»
45011020	Tɩ̃ya ʋɔ. Daɗesira sʋɔra kpiin bann ma naɗɩɛ, sɩ kha khãa waʔ, mʋɔ ɓuun ma fɛkhɛrɛ naɗɩɛ baa khãamɛ bʋ mʋɔ za ɩra. Si liin mafɩra, hã mʋ lʋɔrɛ mu thĩ waʔ, ŋa mʋ kãn ma na tʋ gɔ mu thĩ.
45011021	Naɗɩɛ na Yekila makarɩn hʋʋga dahagɩra ɗesira za waʔ, gbaŋa dahagɩra ɗesira maan hʋʋga bɛgɩra za, sɩɛ za ʋ ɓa makarɩ ba?
45011022	Ĩ ken baa Yekila kɩ̃ra na ʋ lɔmɩra hʋgan tɩ̃ ɩra, ʋ lɔmɩra hʋgan ma Yawutuwira za bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ waan ɩra, kɩ kɩ̃ran mʋɔ za, ŋa mʋ kãn ma na hɩɗan gɩɛ kɩ̃rɩgɩra za. Na mʋ kɛɩn sɩɛ, mʋ ɓa lawɩ wa na kpɩsɩ zɩɛ mʋ gaga kha bʋɔra tɩ̃.
45011023	Ŋa gɔɗɩyãga gʋɔ, na Yawutuwira ɓa bɩɩn na khãarɩ, wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa Yekila heke na ɔfɔ maa wɩ pɩ kharɩɗugula za.
45011024	Naɗɩɛ, mʋɔ kha bʋ wa gbaŋa dahakpasɩga gʋɔ ɗeke, na pi kpiin mu na ɓa maan mʋ hʋʋga dahaga gʋɔ za, kɛna mʋɔ na bʋɔra bʋ kpuore waʔ. Yawutuwira kha bʋ mʋ gaga kha hʋʋga dahaga ɗesira, bɩɛ maalɔmɩra pɩ kharɩɗugula ʋ thɔ Yekila heke.
45011025	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, mɩɛ ɓɩɛ kha ɩ̃ kʋɔmɛ hɩɗan Yekila gũnira za ki ki ken ĩ thĩ kha ɩ̃ɛ tʋ wa dʋɔ waʔ. Ʋɔ gũnira kɩ bʋ kha Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra bʋɔ ɓa dii wa numigbɩka doro za ɓanu kha thĩmaanyɩra bɩɛ ɓuun zɩ̃mɛ.
45011026	Mafɩra Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra bɩɛ ɓa ɓu zɩ̃mɛ, mʋ gaga kha baa si deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Wɩɛra kɩ ɓa zɩ̃n nɩpɩra, ʋ ɓa kure wa gboŋira pɩ yɩ kha Siyɔ̃, ʋɔ kɩ ɓa yɩɛ Zakɔbʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwira ãn Yekila.
45011027	Na mɩ ɓa yafan pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za bɛndɛ, sɩɛ kɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ bɛmɩra mɩ ɓa yii mɩɛ na bɩɛ tɩɛ.»
45011028	Na a kenn baa pɩ kɛɩn Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, pɩ bʋ wa Yekila bɩ̃ɩrawɛ, si le thaaga ɩ̃ɛ thĩmaanyɩra dagamu. Ŋa baa Yekila kenn khonn mi, pɩ mɩyɛ nʋʋ ʋ wa pi sekhãgawɩra kãma,
45011029	naɗɩɛ, na Yekila hãan mɩɩdɛ bãa, u gbũu zɩ̃n dɩɛ mɩɩna dʋ̃waʔ, na ʋ yɩɗɩ, ʋ vɩkɩ̃n dɩɛ yɩɗa dʋ̃waʔ.
45011030	Lʋgʋsɩra za ɩ̃ kha nu Yekila bɛrɛ waʔ. Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, Yekila makarɩn ma ɩ̃ za naɗɩɛ baa Yawutuwira nuun ʋ bɛla waʔ ɩra.
45011031	Mafɩra tɩ̃, ɩra wɩɛ pɩ kɛɩn ma Yekila bɛla, si le thaaga ʋ makarɩ ɩ̃ɛ za. Mafɩra tɩ̃ Yekila wɔrɩ makarɩ bɩɛ za.
45011032	Naɗɩɛ Yekila yɩɛn ma nɩpɛ bɩɛ pi numigbɩkɩra za, si le thaaga ʋ ɓɔgɔ ʋ makarɩla na nɩpɛ bɩɛ.
45011033	Yekila mɩyɛ bɩɛ kɩ̃ra wa thĩ. Ʋ hĩin ma na wʋɔmɛ na tʋʋmɛ! Nɩra sii wɔrɩ tʋ ʋ gagasɩra waʔ. Nɩra sii wɔrɩ tʋ ʋ mɩyɛ makɩ̃n lɔmɛ waʔ.
45011034	Sɩ sɛwɛn ma na deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Ãna kɩ tʋ Adɛyɩra gagasɩra? Ãna kɩ wɔrɩ le ʋ ɓɔdaara?
45011035	Ãna nisĩnn hãan Yekila mɩɩnɛ yãarɩ, na Yekila ɓa gbũuren u dɩ?»
45011036	Naɗɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ kure wa ʋɔ heke, ʋɔ liin mɩyɩra bɩɛ, mɩyɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛyɛ. Gbɩ̃nɛsɩra bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ! Amiina.
45012001	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa Yekila makarɩla kãmara za, kha ɩ̃ hã ĩ thĩ gbɔɗa bɩɛ pere mʋ gaga kha baa pɩ thɔgɩ̃n daɗuoro wɩɛ kɩ bʋ ko na hã Yekila. Ɩ̃ hã ĩ thĩ pere, sɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ Yekila. Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekire gbɩ̃nɛlɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra.
45012002	Hã ɩ̃ makɩ̃n ĩ thĩ na fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ lɔmɩra waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ yɩɛ Yekire vɩkɩ̃n ɩ̃ lɔmɩra na makɩ̃n na wʋɔnfɛmɩra ʋ hãar ɩ̃, si le thaaga ɩ̃ tʋ u dĩŋora. Yekila dĩŋora kɩ bʋ mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ wɛʔɛ hĩin na kɩ̃ran na ɩ nʋʋ ʋ.
45012003	Fɩ̃ɩmɩra Yekila fɩ̃ɩn mɩɛ za, bɩɛ yɩɛn na mi de ɩ̃ bɩɛ kha hã ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ ĩ thĩ na tãra waʔ. Ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na makɩ̃n na khãamɩra gbɩ̃mɩra Yekila hãar ɩ̃ ɩra.
45012004	Nɩthɩ̃rɩga gbɔɗɛ khaayɩra gɔn ma, ŋa ɩ bɩɛ liigesira bʋ kpuore waʔ.
45012005	Mafɩra tɩ̃, aa wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãa Kirisitira za, aa na a gɔmɩra bɩɛ, kɛna a bɩɛ dɩɛn ma na liin gbɔɗɛ tikpo.
45012006	Mɩyɩra Yekila yãagɩ̃nn a ɩ, a bɩɛ bɛyɩra bʋ kpuore waʔ. Yekila liin ma nɩra ʋɔ ʋ yãdedaa ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra le sɩɛ na makɩ̃n na khãamɩra.
45012007	Yekila yãagɩ̃nn ma ʋɔ na liigese ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ na ki le sɩɛ. Ʋ yãagɩ̃nn ma ʋɔ, ʋɔ kɩ karɩ̃n nɩpɛ ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ kɩ kɩ karɩ̃n nɩpɛ.
45012008	Ʋ yãagɩ̃nn ma ʋɔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ ɓɔ nɩpɛ ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra ki le sɩɛ. Ʋ yãagɩ̃nn ma ʋɔ kha ʋ kɩ dɛnfɛ nɩpɛ na u leke mɩyɛ ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ na kɩ dɛnfɛ nɩpɛ na kpolonwuoŋo. Ʋ yãagɩ̃nn ma ʋɔ kha u le wʋɔrɛ nɩra ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ sɩɛ za. Ʋ yãagɩ̃nn ma ʋɔ kha ʋ kɩ makarɩ nɩpɛ za ba, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ki le si na bãanwuoŋo.
45012009	Ɩ̃ yɩɛ khɔrɩthĩnthĩme hɩɗan ɩ̃ gagasɩra za. Ɩ̃ zɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɩra, ki le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ.
45012010	Ɩ̃ khɔrɩ kamɛ gbaangbo mʋ gaga kha kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, kɩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ kamɛ.
45012011	Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ, hã ĩ le woyɩ̃mɛ waʔ. Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na liige hã Adɛyɩra na ɩ̃ gagasɩra bɩɛ.
45012012	Laŋɩra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ za, ɩ̃ hɩɗan na bãanwuoŋo gɩɛ kãmara za. Vɛnsɛ bɛna, ɩ̃ ba, na pɛ̃ɩ kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila.
45012013	Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na dɛnfɛ ĩ kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe na mɩyɩra za pɩ vɛn ɩra, kɩ gɔ khɩ̃rɩwɛ na kɩ̃ra.
45012014	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ vɛnɛ ɩ̃, ɩ̃ kɩ̃ra bɩɛ, ɩ̃ kɩ̃ra nɩpɛ, hã ɩ̃ daŋa nɩra sii waʔ.
45012015	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ bãanwuoŋo za, ɩ̃ hɩɗan bãanwuoŋo za na bɩɛ kpuore, wɛpɩɛ kɩ fʋʋ, ɩ̃ fʋʋ dɩ̃ɩna bɩɛ kpuore tɩ̃.
45012016	Ɩ̃ hɩɗan nʋkpuore na kamɛ. Hã ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ gbʋ̃ɔnsɛ ĩ thĩ za faŋa za waʔ, ŋa ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na ɓɩɛ mɩthɔthɔʔɛ. Hã ĩ ken ĩ thĩ kha ɩ̃ɛ kɩ tʋ mɩyɩra na tãra bʋɔra waʔ.
45012017	Hã ɩ̃ ɓa taa nɩra sii mɩbɩ̃yɛ na mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ. Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ ki le mɩyɛ wɛʔɛ telenn nɩpɛ bɩɛ heke.
45012018	Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na le lɔmɩra thĩna bɩɛ na hɩɗan wɔyĩke za na nɩpɛ bɩɛ, na sɩ wɔrɩ le.
45012019	Mɩ yɛsɛwɛ, hã ĩ khon ĩ doŋo ĩ thĩ waʔ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ Yekila thĩra khon ĩ doŋira, naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma na deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Donkhoŋira bʋ wa mɩɛ bɛgɛ, mɩɛ kɩ taa mɩɩgɩra.» Adɛyɩra deɗ sɩɛ.
45012020	Ŋa si deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Na khʋ̃mʋŋa bʋ mʋ bɩ̃ɩra za, hã ʋ ɗimɩɩnɛ u ɗi. Na yʋ̃ɔsɛ bʋ ʋ za, mʋ hã ʋ ãmɛ ʋ yɔ̃. Na mu liin sɩɛ, sɩ ɓa le wa mʋ gaga kha nantɩgɩyɛ mu hoɗ na yiin ʋ thaagɩra za.»
45012021	Hã mʋ yɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛ ɓu wɔrɩkɔ mʋ za waʔ, ŋa mʋɔ kɩ kãn na ɓu wɔrɩkɔ mɩbɩ̃yɩra za mʋ mɩkɩ̃rɩliigira kãmara za.
45013001	Nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpo kpo kãn ma na sũne pi thĩ na hã sɩrɩgɩra thadɛrɩwɩra, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ a thaasɩra za ɩra, naɗɩɛ Yekila hãan mɩ sɩɛ thadɛrɩsɩra, Yekila yiin pɩ bɩɛ na pɩ hɩɗankhɛyɛ.
45013002	Mafɩra, na wɩɛ bãa kɛɩn sɩrɩgɩra thadɛyɛ sɩɛsɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɛɩn ma Yekila sɩɛsɛ, kɩ yan kiti ki yii u thĩ za.
45013003	Nɩra wɩɛ ki le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn na ãn thadɛrɩwɛ kitira waʔ, wɩɛ ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ ãn pi kitira. Mʋ ɓɩɛ na ãn sɩrɩga thadɛrɩwɩra waʔ ba? Pɛ̃ɩ na ki le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ, thadɛrɩwɛ ɓa yɩ mʋ yɩsɩnʋʋga.
45013004	Naɗɩɛ pɩ bʋ wa Yekila miliinsira kãma za, si le thaaga pɩ wɔrɩ yii mu khɩ̃ntelenyene za, ŋa na mu liin ma bɩ̃ɩsɛ mʋ kãn ma na ãn, naɗɩɛ khɩ̃nɛ hãan mɩ wa na koro nɩpɛ, tɩ hãan mɩ wa pi ɓu koro mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛrɩwɩra. Bɛna pi koro mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛrɩwɩra, Yekila miliinse pi le kɩ ɓɔgɔ Yekila doŋira na mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛrɩwɩra.
45013005	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na sɩ bʋ wa faŋa nɩpɛ bɩɛ sũne pi thĩ na hã sɩrɩgɩra thadɛrɩwɩra, ŋa hã si le naɗɩɛ baa pɩ ɓa kiti mu waʔ, ŋa mʋ kãn ma na le si na lɔɓidakɩ̃ra.
45013006	Gɩɛ yɩɛn tɩ̃ na ɩ̃ taa lãmbora, naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ zɩ̃n lãmbora, bɩɛ bʋ wa Yekila miliindɛwɛ.
45013007	Mɩɩdɛ bãa kɩ kãn na hã na wɩɛ, ɩ̃ hã ʋɔ dɛyɩra dɩɛ. Ɩ̃ taa lãmbo zɩ̃ndɛwɛ thaaga tʋɔ thaaga lãmbora dɩ̃ɩna daasɛ lãmbora. Wɛpɩɛ ɩ̃ kãn na ãn ɩ̃ ãn bɩɛ, wɛpɩɛ ɩ̃ kãn kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ, ɩ̃ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ bɩɛ.
45013008	Hã mɩɩnɛ sii ɓu mʋɔ na mʋ kãnʋɔna tɩɛ za waʔ, fɔ khɔrɩmɛ doro, naɗɩɛ wɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ kãnʋɔna, ʋɔ dɛyɩra hĩɗenn ma sɩɛrɛhãansɩra.
45013009	Naɗɩɛ sɩɛrɛdewensira kɩ ɓɔgɔ sɩ kha: «Hã mu le zɛrɩgɛ waʔ, hã mʋ khʋ nɩra waʔ, hã mu zu waʔ, hã mʋ yɩɛ mʋ wʋɔrɛ kure nɩra sii mɩɩnɛ za waʔ.» Sɩɛrɛdewensira bɩɛ kuɗ ɓa sɩɛrɛɓɩdɩɛ za kha: «Khɔrɩ mʋ kãnʋɔna mʋ gaga kha mʋɔ thĩra.»
45013010	Na khɔrɩmɛ bʋ wɩɛ bãa gagasɛ za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɩ na le mɩbɩ̃yɛ ʋ kãnʋɔna za waʔ, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha khɔrɩmɩra ki hĩɗe sɩɛrɛhãansɩra bɩɛ.
45013011	Ɩ̃ tʋ bɛnthĩna za a bʋ ɩra. Ɩ̃ɛ ɗɔhʋ̃ndɛwɛ, ɩ̃ arɩ na pɛ̃ɩ, naɗɩɛ, zɩ̃mɩra khaala yĩmin a wa na tann bɛna a khãan Kirisitira za fɛnsɩra ɩra.
45013012	Bãana khãɗ ɓuun ma zuori, ɗɩɩga bʋ ɓɩɛ wa yɛkɩ̃mɛ. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a gbaa dabirimɩyɩra, kɩ khɛ yɛyɛɓɛ khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdaasɛ.
45013013	Ɩ̃ yɩɛ a nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ teleme za mʋ gaga kha baa nɩra nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ khɩɛga ɩra, hã a le lɔwʋdamɛ warɩma thãyɔdɛwɛ waʔ. A tʋ gɔ a thĩ na kakarɩliige thĩnyira bɩɛ, hã a le khɛ̃ɩkpiidɛwɛ waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna hã zone hɩɗan a za waʔ.
45013014	Ŋa ɩ̃ yɩɛ Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira mɩyɛ hɩɗan ɩ̃ gagasɩra za, hã ɩ̃ gaga gbɔɗɛ mɩyɛ na tãra waʔ, si le thaaga hã yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩga ɓu wɔrɩkɔ ɩ̃ za waʔ.
45014001	Wɩɛ bãa khãamɛ ki zen kiretɩ̃ɛsɩra za, ɩ̃ gɔ ʋɔ na kɩ̃ra, hã ĩ ki de ʋ mɩyɛ waʔ.
45014002	Na nɩra ʋɔ khãamɛ gbɩ̃n na ʋ yã kha ʋɔ wɔrɩ ɗi ɗimɩɩnyɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ, kɛna ʋɔ khãamɛ zen kiretɩ̃ɛsɩra za, na ʋɔ ɗi wa nanwasɛ doro,
45014003	wɩɛra ki ɗi ɗimɩyɩra thĩnyɩra bɩɛ, ʋɔ kãn na zene ʋɔra waʔ, mafɩra tɩ̃, wɩɛra ki ɗi nanwakɩra dola, hã ʋɔ ɓa yãasɩ̃n ʋɔra waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila khɔrɩ ʋ wa lɔmɩra za ʋ bʋ.
45014004	Ãnakpuo kɩ bʋ mʋɔ harɩ na mʋ zarɩgɩ̃n ʋɔ miliinɓiye? Miliinɓiira liige kɩ kɩ̃ra ba, u liige kɩ kɩ̃ra waʔ ba, mʋɔ nʋʋga bʋ sɩɛ za waʔ, sɩɛ bʋ wa ʋ thadɛyɩra bɛsɛ. Ŋa, sɩɛ bɩɛ za ʋ ɓa le miliinkɩ̃rɩsɛ, naɗɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra bʋ wa Adɛyɩra heke na le si.
45014005	Nɩpɛ bʋɔ heke, ɗɩyãsɛ sʋɔ bãa sʋɔra za, bʋɔ heke tɩ̃ ɗɩyãsɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa kpuore. Pɩ bɩɛ kpo kpora kãn ma na bɩ wɛsɩɛ pɩ lɔɓidaara hãan mɩ.
45014006	Wɩɛ ki khoŋĩn yawʋsɛ, u le si wa Adɛyɩra kãma. Wɩɛ ki ɗi ɗimɩɩnyɛ thĩnyɩra bɩɛ tɩ̃, ʋɔ dɛyɩra le si wa Adɛyɩra kãma naɗɩɛ ʋ gbɩ̃nɛ wa Yekila. Wɩɛ kɩ kɛɩ mɩthĩnyira yʋɔra ɗiime, ʋɔ dɛyɩra le wa sɩɛ Adɛyɩra kãma, ʋ gbɩ̃nɛ wa Yekila tɩ̃.
45014007	Tɩ̃yara za, a ʋɔ sii bʋ thakuogo za ʋɔ thĩ kãma za waʔ, na a huun tɩ̃, a huun aa thĩ kãma za waʔ.
45014008	Naɗɩɛ na a bʋ thakuogo za, a bʋ wa thakuogo za Adɛyɩra kãma. Na a huun tɩ̃, a huun ma Adɛyɩra kãma. Mafɩra, na hɩɗan thakuogo za warɩma na hu, a bʋ wa Adɛyɩra bɛwɛ.
45014009	Iyo, Kirisitira huun ma kɩ alɩnɩ, si le thaaga u le nɩkogolinkowe na nɩhuome Adɛyɛ.
45014010	Ŋa mʋɔ, be liin na mʋ zarɩgɩ̃n mʋ kãnʋɔna? Bena mu zene u? A bɩɛ ɓa nɩ́ɩrɛ́ wa Adɛyɩra kitigboɗa za.
45014011	Naɗɩɛ si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Mɩɛ Adɛyɩra bʋ wa thakuogo za, mɩɛ ki de wɛsɩɛ kha: Nɩpɛ bɩɛ ɓa ɓa ɓa huruse mɩ wʋɔla za, dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɛ bɩɛ ɓa phii zɩɛ wa pɩ nʋʋsɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ mɩ.»
45014012	Mafɩra a bɩɛ kpo kpora ɓa thʋɗɛ a thĩ milewenyira Yekila wʋɔla za.
45014013	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, hã a zarɩgɩ̃n kamɛ dʋ̃waʔ sã; Ŋa ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpo kpo yii si ɩ̃ gagasɩra za kha ɩ̃ ɓa le mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ wɛtɛ ki le thaaga na yii ĩ kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiye mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za waʔ.
45014014	Mɩ tʋʋmɛ bʋ wa sɩ za gbaangbo Adɛyɛ Yesura wɔrɩkɩra za kha mɩɩnɛ sii te ti thĩ za waʔ. Ŋa na wɩɛ kenn mɩɩdɛ bãa kha ti te ɓa, ti teɗ ɓa ʋɔ dɛyɩra heke.
45014015	Ɗimɩɩna mu ɗira, na dɩɛ kpãɗɛ wa mʋ yaɓiira wʋɔrɛ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha mu le mʋ mɩyɩra na khɔrɩmɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra, tʋ gɔ mu thĩ, baa Kirisitira huun ma mʋ yaɓiira kãmara za tĩ, hã ɗimɩɩnɛ ɓa le thaaga na asɩ mʋ yaɓiira waʔ.
45014016	Mɩɩdɛ bãa ĩ ken kha tɩ kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ɛ heke, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ dɩɛ le thaaga ɩ̃ yɩsɩga asɩ waʔ.
45014017	Naɗɩɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra mɩyɛ bʋ ɗiime na yʋ̃ɔmɛ mɩyɛ waʔ, ŋa teleme, na wɔyĩke, na bãanwuoŋo mɩyɛ ɩ Ninyɛgɛmɔ wɔrɩkɩra za.
45014018	Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ ki liige mafɩra kɩ hã Kirisitira, ʋɔ dɛyɩra mɩyɛ kɩ nʋʋ Yekila, dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɛ yɩ ɓa ʋɔ dɛyɩra yɩsɩnʋʋga.
45014019	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a pɛ̃ɩ na hɩɗan na kamɛ wɔyĩke za kɩ dɛnfɛ kamɛ na ɓu faŋa kiretɩ̃ɛsɩra za.
45014020	Hã mʋ asɩ Yekila miliinsira ɗiime doro kãma za waʔ. Tɩ̃ya ʋ, ɗimɩyɩra thĩnyɩra bɩɛ kɩ̃ra, ŋa ɗimɩɩna ki le thaaga mʋ yaɓiira lon mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za, dɩɛ ɗimɩɩna thĩna kɩ̃ra waʔ.
45014021	Wɛsɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ mʋ kɛɩ khaasɛ khʋɔmɛ, na kɛɩ thãamɛ yʋ̃ɔmɛ, na sɩɛ wɔrɩ le wa thaaga na yii mu yaɓiye mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za.
45014022	Khãamɩra mʋ bʋ wɩ, yɩɛ bɩɛ khãamɩra hɩɗan mʋɔ na Yekila doro tɩɛ. Wɩɛ bãa lɔɓidaa kɩ zarɩgɩ̃n ʋ u milewenyira za waʔ, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɛgɛ.
45014023	Ŋa wɩɛ bãa lɔɓidaa bʋ zarɩgɩ̃n ʋ mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ ɗiime za, kɛna ʋ dɛyɩra kɛɩn na ɗiin ni, Yekila ɓa kiti wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra naɗɩɛ ʋɔ dɛyɩra milewenyira makɩ̃nn na khãamɩra waʔ, kɛna mɩɩdɛ bãa ki le na makɩ̃n na khãamɩra waʔ, dɩɛ mɩɩna bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige.
45015001	Aa wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ na faŋa Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za, a kãn ma kɩ dɛnfɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ na faŋɩra waʔ ɩra. Hã a le wɛsɩɛ doro kɩ nʋʋ a waʔ.
45015002	A bɩɛ kpo kpora kãn ki le wa wɛsɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ a kãnʋɔnawɛ pɩ kɩ̃ramɛ kãma, si le thaaga a wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ wɩ pi yo wʋɔrɛ khãamɩra za.
45015003	Naɗɩɛ Kirisitira liin mɩyɩra kha nʋʋ ʋɔ thĩra waʔ, ŋa si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Mʋ kʋsadɛrɩwɩra kʋsaʔɩra gbũun ma mɩɛ za.»
45015004	Naɗɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ na nisĩnn sɛwɛn Yekila sɛwʋra za harɩ khɔ̃ɩra, ɩɛ na sɛwɛn ma na ɓu hã a karɩ̃n, na haɓɛ, na baɓɛ si le thaaga a hɩɗan na laŋa.
45015005	Yekila kɩ hã nɩra baɓɛ na haɓɛ, ʋɔ yɩɛ ɩ̃ bɛn mʋ gaga kha baa Yesu Kirisitira bʋ ɓɩɛ sɩ ɩra,
45015006	si le thaaga ɩ̃ hɩɗan na gagasɛ kpo, na nʋʋnɛ kpo ki bĩn kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira Siira.
45015007	Ɩ̃ gɔ kamɛ na kɩ̃ra mʋ gaga kha baa Kirisitira gɔɗ ɩ̃ na kɩ̃ran ɩra, si le thaaga Yekila ɓu gbɩ̃nɛsɛ.
45015008	Mi de si wa, tɩ̃yara za, Kirisitira liin ma Yawutuwe miliinɓiye na ɓu ɓɔgɔ lɔmɩra za Yekila bʋ nʋʋnɛ kpo Yekire ɩra, si le thaaga, nʋʋgɩra Yekila na hãan pi sekhãgawɩra, gɩɛ nʋhãaŋɩra ɓu ɓaka na kɩ̃ra,
45015009	kɩ yɩɛ thĩmaanyɩra ɓu gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila ʋ makarɩla kãma, mʋ gaga kha baa sɩ sɛwɛn Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ mʋ thĩnye nɩpɛ sʋgʋmʋ za. Mɩ ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ wa mʋ yɩsɩgɩra na tɩ̃ŋa.»
45015010	Si deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Thĩmaanyɛ, ɩ̃ yãgayãga na Adɛyɩra nɩpɩra kpuore.»
45015011	Ki deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Thĩmaanɩpɛ, ɩ̃ bɩɛ gbɩ̃nɛ Adɛyɩra. Nɩpɛ bɩɛ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ yɩsɩgɩra.»
45015012	Yekire yãdedaa Ezayi na deɗ ɓa kha: «Zese kpɩ̃raɓiye ʋɔ ɓa arɩ, ʋɔ ɓa le thĩmaanyɛ thadɛyɛ. Thĩmaanɩpɛ ɓa khɛ pɩ laŋa na yii gi ʋɔ za.»
45015013	Yekila za a lan, ʋɔ hã ɩ̃ bãanwuoŋo na wɔyĩke khãamɩra za, si le thaaga ɩ̃ laŋɩra gbɩ̃n gbaangbo Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za.
45015014	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, na gbũu ɩ̃ɛ gɛŋɩra gɩɛ ʋɔ, mɩɛ lann ma sɩ za kha ɩ̃ bʋ wa nɩkɩ̃rɩwɛ, ɩ̃ bʋ wa na tʋʋmɛ gbaangbo, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ ɓɔ ɓa kamɛ.
45015015	Ŋa lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ mɩ bʋ dãa hã ɩ̃ mɩra, mɩ sɛwɛn ma ʋ khaayɛ yʋɔ na haɓɛ mɩyɛ yʋɔ kãma si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n ɩ̃ na mɩɗuguye yʋɔ naɗɩɛ baa Yekila fɩ̃ɩn mɩɛ za ɩra.
45015016	Naɗɩɛ u liin ma mɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira miliinɓiye thĩmaanyɛ sʋgʋmʋ za. Mi de pi wa Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, si le thaaga pɩ wɔrɩ hã pi thĩ sɩ nʋʋ Yekila, ki le wɛpɛ khonn pi doro na hãan Yekila na u Ninyɛgɛmɔra yɛɗɛn mɩ ɩra.
45015017	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩɛ wɔrɩ gbɩ̃nɛ wa mi thĩ Yekila miliinsira za Yesu Kiristira wɔrɩkɩra za.
45015018	Naɗɩɛ lɔmɩra za Kirisitira dɛnfɛn mɩɛ na mi liigen na dɛnfɛn thĩmaanyɩra na i nuun Yekila bɛla, mi de sʋɔ na sɩɛ sɩɛ za waʔ. Ʋ tann ma mɩ sɩɛsɛ na mi miliinyira za na liin sɩɛ,
45015019	na bamʋŋa mɩthĩngɔnyɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔ wɔrɩkɩra za. Mafɩra mi deɗ Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra na khɛ Zeruzalɛmʋ na yo gbɩɛ Iliri sɩrɩgɩra za.
45015020	Ŋa wɛsɩɛ mɩ kha ɓɩɛ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ na de Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra khaayɛ ʋ yɩsɩgɩra yɩɗ yãan waʔ, si le thaaga hã mɩ ɓa le mi miliinsira na sɩɛ ʋɔ bɛɗuguse za waʔ.
45015021	Baa si liin mafɩra, mɩɛ miliinsira makɩ̃nn ma na Yekila sɩɛsɩra ki de kha: «Wɛpɛ ʋ mɩyɛ deɗ yãan waʔ, bɩɛ ɓa yã ʋ. Wɛpɩɛ nuun ʋ mɩyɛ yãan waʔ, bɩɛ ɓa tʋ ʋ mɩyɩra.»
45015022	Sɩɛ barɩn mɩɛ bɛngɔnyɛ za na mɩ wɔrɩn thiyen ĩ heke waʔ.
45015023	Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, mi zuon ma mi miliinsira sɩɛ sɩrɩsɩɛ za. Sɩ ɗɩɩgɔnsɛ sɩɛ mɩra, mɩ kha ɓɩɛ sɩ wa na yo kure ĩ heke.
45015024	Na mɩ kha mi yo Ɛsɩpanyɩ bɛndɛ, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa na nɩ́ɩrɛ́ ĩ heke na ken ĩ ki le bɛnɛ dʋɔ kɩ̃rɩ ʋ ĩ heke, na mɩ kha mɩ tãra ɩ̃ dɛnfɛ mɩ.
45015025	Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa na yo Zeruzalɛmʋ na dɛnfɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kɩ bʋ gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ za.
45015026	Naɗɩɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kɩ bʋ Masedʋwanɩ na Akayɩ sɩrɩsɩra za, bɩɛ khonn ma pi leke mɩyɛ yʋɔ na ɓu dɛnfɛ Zeruzalɛmʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kɩ bʋ bʋɔmɩra za ɩra.
45015027	Bɩɛ thĩ khonn sɩɛ gagasɩra, si gbũu kha kãn ma pi le si. Naɗɩɛ bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ thĩmaanyɩra, na bɩɛ ɓa ɓuun niin Yawutuwe Yekila kɩ̃rɩgɩra za, sɩ kãn ma tɩ̃ thĩmaanɩpɩra dɛnfɛ wɩ na pi leke mɩyɛ yʋɔ.
45015028	Na mɩ ɓa zuon sɩɛ za bɛndɛ, ki yo hãan sɩɛ dɛnfɛsɩra zuori, mɩ ɓa tãra ĩ heke ki tʋ yo Ɛsɩpanyɩ sɩrɩgɩra za.
45015029	Mɩ lann ma sɩ za kha bɛna mɩ ɓa nan ĩ heke, mɩ ɓa nan ma na Kirisitira kɩ̃rɩgɩra.
