45015030	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa, a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za, dɩ̃ɩna Ninyɛgɛmɔra khɔrɩmɩra kãmara za, kha ɩ̃ dɛnfɛ mɩ khɛ̃ɩgɩɛ za kɩ kɩ yɩ̃n Yekire kɩ hã mɩ.
45015031	Si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ ko Zude sɩrɩgɩra Yekire kʋɔdɛwɩra, dɩ̃ɩna dɛnfɛsɩra mi bu yo si Zeruzalɛmʋra, sɩɛ wɔrɩ yo hĩi bɩɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra.
45015032	Na sɩɛ liiri, mɩ ɓa wɔrɩ nan ĩ heke ni na bãanwuoŋo Yekila dĩŋora za, na wɔrɩ ɓu wuore kɩrɩ ʋ ĩ heke ni.
45015033	Wɔyĩke Yekila hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ bɩɛ! Amiina.
45016001	Mɩ karɩfa ɩ̃ wa a khɩ̃nhɛrɩyɛ Febe, u liige wa kɩ hã Sankere egilizi Kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra.
45016002	Ɩ̃ gɔ ʋ na kɩ̃ra mʋ gaga kha baa kiretɩ̃ɛ kãn gɔ nɩpɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra ɩra, na ʋ ɓa kɩ vɛn ɩ̃ dɛnfɛsɛ za mɩɩdɛ bãa za, ɩ̃ dɛnfɛ ʋ sɩ za. Naɗɩɛ ʋ dɛnfɛn ma nɩgɔmɛ gbaangbo, harɩ mɩɛ thĩra.
45016003	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Pirisili na Akilasɩ, bɩɛ bʋ wa mi liigedɛkamɛ Yesu Kirisitira miliinsira za.
45016004	Bɩɛ na yiin ma pi thĩ bɩ̃ɩsɛ nʋʋnɛ za si le thaaga mɩɛ ɓu ko na huume. Mɩɛ kpo kɩ thɩɛ wɩ waʔ, kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ thĩmaanyɩra sʋgʋmʋra za, bɩɛ bʋ thɩɛ wɩ tɩ̃.
45016005	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ ki bĩŋin pɩ gbɛ̃ɩna za tɩ̃. Ɩ̃ thɩɛ mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɔ Epayɩnɛtɩ, ʋɔ nisĩnn khãan Kirisitira za Azi sɩrɩgɩra za.
45016006	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Marɩyama, ʋ na liigen hãar ɩ̃ wa gbaangbo.
45016007	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Ãduronikusi na Zuniyasɩ, bɩɛ bʋ wa mɩɛ nɩpɛ, mɩɛ na bɩɛ bɩɛ liin ma kaso kpuore. Pɩ bʋ wa Yekire dãarawɛ, pi yiin ma wʋɔrɛ pi liigesira za thĩ, bɩɛ nisĩnn tʋʋn Kirisitira na yɩɛn mɩɛ.
45016008	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɔ Ãpiliyasɩ, Adɛyɩra za.
45016009	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Urubɛ̃n, ʋɔ bʋ wa mi liigedɛkãran Kirisitira miliinsira za, dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ thɩɛ mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɔ Sɩtakisi.
45016010	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Apelɛsɩ, ʋɔ bɩɩn ma vɛnsɛ Kirisitira kãma. Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Arisitobuli gbɛ̃ɩna nɩpɩra.
45016011	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ mɩ nɩra Erodiyɔ̃nɩ, dɩ̃ɩna kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kɩ bʋ Narɩsisi gbɛ̃ɩna za ɩra.
45016012	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Tirifɛnɩ na Tirifɔsɩ, bɩɛ hapɩɛ yɔ̃ra liigen hãan ma Adɛyɩra gbaangbo thĩ. Ɩ̃ thɩɛ mɩ khɩ̃hɛyɛ khɔrɩyɔmɔ Pɛrɩsidi, ʋɔ hãan ma u thĩ tɩ̃ na liigen hãan Adɛyɩra.
45016013	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Urufusi, ʋɔ bʋ wa Adɛyɩra miliindakɩ̃ra, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ yaara kɩ bʋ mɩɛ yaa tɩ̃.
45016014	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Asɛ̃kiriti, na Filegɔ̃, na Ɛrɩmɛsɩ, na Patorobasɩ, na Ɛrɩmasɩ, dɩ̃ɩna kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwira kɩ bʋ wɩ kpuola ɩra.
45016015	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ Filologi na Zuli, na Nerɛ na ʋ yaɓikãrana, na Olɛnɩpasɩ dɩ̃ɩna kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ pi heke ni ɩra.
45016016	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ kamɛ na kpen kamɛ na kpolonvɩrɩga. Kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃.
45016017	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, wɛpɩɛ ki yii kpɩkɩ̃ŋɩra dɩ̃ɩna pɩ kɛɩ karɩ̃na aa hã ɩ̃, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa kha ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ na bɩɛ. Hã ɩ̃ dɩɛ wɩ mɩɩnɛ sii za waʔ.
45016018	Naɗɩɛ bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ thĩna liige kɩ hã Kirisitira a Adɛyɩra waʔ, ŋa pɩ ɓɩɛ wa pi kpolonse ɓu hĩi doro. Wɛpɩɛ gagasɩra kɩ thɔ, pɩ kpɛnsɛ wa bɩɛ na pɩ nʋnʋʋsɩɛsɩra dɩ̃ɩna nɩkpɛnsɛsɩɛsɛ.
45016019	Ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, baa ĩ nu Yekila bɛla, nɩpɛ bɩɛ tʋʋmɛ bʋ wa sɩɛ za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ bãanɛ wuon na ɩ̃ɛ. Mɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha ĩ ɓu wʋɔmɛ tɩ̃ na le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ, kɩ yɩɛ, ɩ̃ yɛ hã ĩ le mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ.
45016020	Yekila kɩ bʋ wɔyĩke dɛyɩra, ʋ ɓa pɛwʋ wa Sutana ɩ̃ wʋɔla za fɩ khaadɩɛ na kɩrɩ ʋ. A Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira hɩɗan na ɩ̃ bɩɛ.
45016021	Mi liigedɛkãran Timote, dɩ̃ɩna Lusiyusi, na Zazɔn, na Sosipatɔrɔsɩ bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃, bɩɛ sãara bʋ wa mɩ nɩpɛ.
45016022	Adɛyɩra yɩsɩgɩra za, mɩɛ Tɛrɩtiyusi bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃, mɩɛ wɩɛra Poli khɩɛn na sɛwɛn lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ.
45016023	Mɩ khɩ̃nɛrɩkhuo Gayusi bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃, ʋɔ wɩɛra heke kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ le bĩŋin ɩra. Erasiti bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ gboŋira ɓudagɩra kendaara ɩra, na a yaɓiye Karitusi tɩ̃. [
45016024	A Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira fɩ̃ɩmɩra hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃, amiina.]
45016025	Ɩ̃ yɩɛ a gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ wɔrɩ yii wɔrɩkɔ ɩ̃ za na makɩ̃n na Yesu Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra mi de ĩ ɩra. Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra za Yekila ɓɔgɔ khɔ̃ɩ gũni mɩyɩra.
45016026	Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, ʋɔ gũnira kuɗ ɓa kʋwʋga ʋ, harɩ na thĩmaanyɛ thĩra tʋʋr ʋ Yekila yãdedɛwɛ sɛwʋwɩra kãmara za. Bãanyɛ bɩɛ Yekila hãan sɩɛ sɩɛsɩɛ, si le thaaga thĩnyɩra bɩɛ khãa ʋ za ki ki nu ʋ bɛrɛ.
45016027	Yekila, ʋɔ wɩɛra kpora kɩ bʋ wʋɔmɛ dɛyɩra, ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra bʋ wa ʋɔ kpo bɛwɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira za. Amiina.
46001001	Mɩɛ Poli, Yekila khɔrɩn na yɩɗ na mi liin Yesu Kirisiti dãara, mɩɛ na a yaɓiye Sɔsɩtɛnɩ kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãan hã ɩ̃ ʋ.
46001002	A thɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ Korɛ̃tɩ Yekila egilizi nɩpɩra bɩɛ ɩ̃ yɛɗ na khonn ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɩra za, naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ khãa a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira za, na hãan ĩ thĩ u miliinsira za dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɛ bãa kɩ bʋ khaarɛ bãa kɩ yɩ Yesu Kirisitira pɩ Adɛyɩra ɩra.
46001003	A Siye Yekila na a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira fɩ̃ɩmɩra na ʋ wɔyĩnkira hɩɗan ɩ̃ za.
46001004	Mɩ thɩɛ wa Yekila bãanyɛ bɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ kãma naɗɩɛ baa ʋ fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ za Yesu Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za.
46001005	Naɗɩɛ baa ĩ liin kpuola Kirisitira za, ĩ hĩin ma na Yekila mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ, ʋ hãar ɩ̃ wa sɩɛrɛtʋʋga na wʋɔmɛ.
46001006	Yesura sɩɛsɩra na deɗ i, ĩ nuuren si wa na yiin si ɩ̃ gagasɩra za kɩ̃raŋɩra,
46001007	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ Yekila hãarɩ, ɩɛ dʋɔ sii kpɩɗ ɩ̃ waʔ, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ tɩɛ Adɛyɩra Yesu Kirisitira ɓanɗɩyãgɩra dola ɩra.
46001008	Ʋɔ Yekila kɩ ɓa le ĩ kendaara bãanyɛ bɩɛ, si le thaaga hã nɩra sii wɔrɩ ɓu ɓilenkhɛrɛ ɩ̃ za Adɛyɩra Yesu Kirisitira ɓanɗiyãgɩra za waʔ.
46001009	Naɗɩɛ Yekila bʋ wa nʋʋnɛ kpo nɩra; ʋɔ wɩɛra yɩɗ ɩ̃ kha ɩ̃ hɩɗan kpuore na ʋɔ ɓikhiye Yesu Kirisitira kɩ bʋ a Adɛyɩra.
46001010	Ŋa mɩ yaɓiiwe, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira Yɩsɩgɩra za. Ĩ le kpuore, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ kpɩkɩ̃ŋa lon ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za waʔ. Ɩ̃ dɩɛ na le kpoloŋo kpo na hɩɗan na gagasɛ kpo.
46001011	Naɗɩɛ mɩ yaɓiiwe, Kulowe gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɛ bʋɔ deɗ ɓa mɩɛ kha kpɩkɩ̃ŋa lon ma ɩ̃ za.
46001012	Wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓɩɛ na de ĩ sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha: Ɩ̃ɛ za, ʋɔ de ɓa kha: «Mɩɛ bʋ wa Poli baa», ʋɔ kha: «Mɩɛ bʋ wa Apolɔsɩ baa», ʋɔ kha: «Mɩɛ bʋ wa Pɩɛrɩ baa», ʋɔ kha: «Mɩɛ bʋ wa Kirisiti baa.»
46001013	Ĩ ken ma kha Kirisitira wɔrɩ kpɩkɩ̃n ma ba? Polira huun nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɩra kãmara za ba? Warɩma pi yĩɗ ĩ wa ãmɩra za na polira yɩsɩgɩra ba?
46001014	Yekila bɛrɛ kɩ bʋ thɩɛɗa naɗɩɛ baa mɩɛ yĩɗ ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ sii ãmɛ za na si liin Kirisipisi na Gayusi u waʔ.
46001015	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, nɩɩra sii wɔrɩ de kha ʋɔ yĩɗ ɓa ãmɛ za na mɩɛ yɩsɩga waʔ.
46001016	Iyo, tɩ̃ya ʋ. Mi yĩɗ Sitefanasɩ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɛ tɩ̃. Na si kuɗ bɩɛ za, mɩɛ khãa kha mɩɛ yĩɗ nɩra sii ãmɛ za dʋ̃waʔ.
46001017	Kirisitira dãan mɩɛ kha mɩɛ yĩ nɩpɛ ãmɛ za waʔ. Ŋa ʋ dãan ma mɩɛ kha mɩɛ de sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɛ. Mɩɛ kãn na de si na nɩthɩ̃rɩga wʋɔmɛ waʔ, hã Kirisitira huumira nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za le mɩkpasɩyɛ waʔ.
46001018	Na de Yekila sɩɛsɩra kha Kirisitira huun ma nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za, wɛpɩɛ ki dii, bɩɛ ken ma sɩɛ thaʔarɩmɩyɛ; ŋa aa wɛpɛ kɩ bʋ zɩ̃mɛ khɩ̃na za, aa heke, Yekila wɔrɩkɩra gɩɛ.
46001019	Ken wɛsɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɩra: «Mɩ ɓa asɩ wa wʋɔmɛdɛrɩwɛ wʋɔmɩra, kɩ kɛɩ mɩtʋdɛrɩwɩra mɩtʋʋyɩra.»
46001020	Dɩɛ bɛna bɩra wʋɔntʋdɛrɩwɩra ɓa wɔrɩ de? Warɩma wɛpɩɛ karɩ̃n ɩra? Warɩma dunuya wɩɛ sɩɛrɛtʋdɛrɩwɩra? Yekila ɓɔgɔn sɩ wa kha dunuya wɩɛ wʋɔmɩra bʋ wa thaʔarɩmɩyɛ.
46001021	Naɗɩɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira bɩɛ na pɩ wʋɔmɩra bɩɛ, kɛna pɩ wɔrɩn tʋʋn Yekila lɔmɩra za ʋ ɓɔgɔn ʋ wʋɔmɩra waʔ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Yekila sɩɛsɩra dunuyara nɩpɩra ken kha thaʔarɩmɩyɛ ɩ, Yekila khon ma gagasɛ kha ʋɔ zɩ̃n wɛpɩɛ bãa kɩ khãa sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra za ɩra.
46001022	Yawutuwe bɩɛ, bɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa bamʋŋa mɩyɛ, na Gɩrɛkɩwɩra bɩɛ, bɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa wʋɔmɛ.
46001023	Ŋa aa ʋɔ, Kirisitira huun nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za, ʋɔ mɩyɩɛ aa de. Sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra liin ma zaŋa Yawutuwira heke. Wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yawutuwe waʔ, si liin ma thaʔarɩmɩyɛ bɩɛ heke;
46001024	Ŋa wɛpɛ Yekila yɩɗɩ, Yawutu nɩra ʋ ba, ʋ bʋ Yawutu nɩra waʔ ba, Kirisitira kɩ bʋ Yekila Wɔrɩkɩra na ʋ wʋɔmɩra.
46001025	Naɗɩɛ Yekila mɩyɩra nɩpɩra ken thaʔarɩmɩyɩra, wʋɔmɛ bʋ wa ɩɛ za na tãra nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira wʋɔmɩra bɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna Yekila mɩyɩra nɩpɩra ken kha wɔrɩkɔ bʋ ɩ za waʔ, wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa ɩɛ za na tãra nɩthɩ̃riɓiiwira wɔrɩkɩra bɩɛ.
46001026	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ Yekila yɩɗ na hãar ɩ̃ zɩ̃mɩra, na ɩ̃ kha ĩ ken ɩ̃ɛ thĩra lɔmɩra, dunuya wɩɛ nɩpɛ kenlɔmɩra za, wʋɔntʋdɛgɔmɛ bʋ ɩ̃ za waʔ, wɔrɩkɔdɛwɛ bʋ ɩ̃ za waʔ, nɩgbʋɔmɛ bʋ ɩ̃ za waʔ.
46001027	Ŋa mɩɩna nɩpɛ ken thaʔarɩmɩyɛ, dɩɛ Yekila khɩɛn na yiin nɩɩsɛ dunuyara wʋɔntʋdɛrɩwɩra za. Mɩɩna nɩpɛ ken kha wɔrɩkɔ bʋ tɩ za waʔ, dɩɛ Yekila khɩɛn na yiin nɩɩsɛ dunuyara wɔrɩkɔdɛwɩra za.
46001028	Mɩɩna kɩ bʋ foi dunuyara nɩpɩra wʋɔla ʋ waʔ, mɩɩna pɩ yãasɩ̃nnɩ, kha tɩ bʋ foi waʔ, dɩɛ Yekila khɩɛn na asɩn wɛtɛ dunuya nɩpɩra ken mɩsɩwɩla.
46001029	U liin ma sɩɛ, si le thaaga hã nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye sii gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ Yekila wʋɔla ʋ waʔ.
46001030	Yekila yɩɛn na ɩ̃ bɩɛ liin kpuore Yesu Kirisitira za, ki liir u a wʋɔmɩra. Kirisitira liin thaaga na Yekila liir a nɩtelenyeme. Ʋɔ liin thaagɩra na Yekila yɛɗɛn a a mɩbɩ̃yɩra za.
46001031	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na sɩ sɛwɛn Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Na wɩɛ bʋ ɓɩɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ, ʋ gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ Adɛyɩra liin hãar ʋ.»
46002001	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, baa mi thiyen ĩ heke kha mɩɛ yo ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ Yekila mɩguurenyira, mɩ sɩɛrɛ lɔmɩra ɓɔgɔn ma kha mɩɛ kɩ tʋ sɩɛsɛ, warɩma kha mɩɛ kɩ bʋ na wʋɔmɛ na tãra bʋɔra waʔ.
46002002	Naɗɩɛ baa mɩ kha bʋ ĩ heke ni, mi khon ma gagasɛ kha mɩɛ de i mɩɩnɛ sii na Yesu kirisitira na ʋ ɓaɓɩra nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra mɩyɩra ɩ waʔ.
46002003	Baa mi yo nann ĩ heke ni, faŋa kha bʋ mɩ gbɔɗa za waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ kha ãn ma na mɩ gban.
46002004	Mɩ karɩ̃na na mi Yekire sɩɛsɩra mɩ kha de, sɩ kha ɓɔgɔ kha wʋɔmɛ dɛyɛ sɩɛsɛ ɩ waʔ, ŋa Yekila Nina wɔrɩkɩra za mɩ kha ɓɔgɔ sɩ.
46002005	Si le thaaga hã ĩ yii ɩ̃ khãamɩra nɩthɩ̃rɩga wʋɔmɛ za waʔ, ŋa ĩ yii ɩ̃ khãamɩra Yekila wɔrɩkɩra za.
46002006	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, wɛpɩɛ pɩ lɛɩn khãamɩra za na ɓuun faŋa pɩ za, aa karɩ̃na bʋ wa wʋɔmɛ bɩɛ heke. Bɩɛ wʋɔmɩra na dunuya wɩɛ wʋɔmɩra bʋ kpuore waʔ. Bɩɛ wʋɔmɩra na dunuya wɩɛ thadɛwɩra wʋɔmɩra bʋ kpuore tɩ̃ waʔ. Dunuya wɩɛ thadɛrɩwɩra ɓa tãra wa.
46002007	Yekila wʋɔmɛ sɩɛsɛ aa bu de; sɩɛ bʋ wa mɩgurenye. Dunuya wɩɛ nɩpɩra tʋ sɩɛ waʔ. Ŋa khaala dunuyara na kha ʋɔ le, Yekila na nisĩn liin ma sɩɛ si le thaaga a ɓu gbɩ̃nɛsɛ.
46002008	Dunuya wɩɛ thadɛyɛ sii wɔrɩn tʋʋn bɩɛ wʋɔmɩra waʔ. Na pɩ na tʋʋn ma bɩɛ wʋɔmɩra, pɩ kha bɩ na ɓa ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ dɛyɛ Adɛyɩra nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za na khʋ ʋ waʔ.
46002009	Ŋa mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ si kha: «Wɛsɩɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩga yiwure yãan waʔ, na mɩɩdɛ numire nuun yãan waʔ, mɩɩdɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩga gagan yãan waʔ, Yekila ɔfɔn ma dɩɛ mɩɩna na hãan wɛpɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ ɩra.»
46002010	Kɛna aa Yekila ɓɔgɔn dɩɛ migurena Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za. Naɗɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra hegelin ma mɩyɛ bɩɛ na tʋ ɩ, harɩ Yekila thĩra migurenyira bɩɛ.
46002011	Nɩra sii wɔrɩ tʋ nɩthɩ̃rɩga gagasɩra kɩ bʋ u kpoloŋira u waʔ, fɔ ʋɔ thĩra Nina kɩ bʋ u kpoloŋira u bʋɔtɛ. Mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃, Yekila Nina kpora kɩ tʋ Yekila gagasɩra.
46002012	Kɛna aa ʋɔ, aa ɓuun dunuya wɩɛ nina waʔ, fɔ Nina kuɗ Yekila heke, ʋɔ aa ɓuuri, na ɓu tʋ mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɩra Yekila liin hãar a ʋ fɩ̃ɩmɩra za ɩra.
46002013	Sɩɛ Yekire sɩɛsɩra a gbũun de. Aa sɩɛrɛ na makɩ̃n na nɩthɩ̃rɩga wʋɔmɛ waʔ, wɛsɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra ɓɔgɔ aa, sɩɛ a de. Kɩ karɩ̃n nɩpɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra mɩyɛ na makɩ̃n na Ninyɛgɛmɔra kɩ bʋ pi kpoloŋira u.
46002014	Nɩra wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ na Yekila Nina waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra wɔrɩ gɔ wɛsɩɛ Yekila Nina de u waʔ. Yekila Nina bɛsɩra bʋ wa thaʔarɩmɩyɛ ʋɔ dɛyɩra heke, naɗɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kha wɔrɩ yɩɛ nɩra tʋ ɩ kɔla waʔ.
46002015	Ŋa dɛyɩra za Yekila Nina bʋ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ wɔrɩ tʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ na kpɩkɩ̃n ɩ kamɛ za. Ŋa nɩra sii wɔrɩ tʋ kpɩkɩ̃n ʋɔ bɛyɩra waʔ.
46002016	Naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Ãna kɩ wɔrɩ tʋ Adɛyɩra gagasɩra, na ɓa tãra de kha ʋɔ hã ʋ ɓɔgɔrɛ?» Ŋa aa ʋɔ, Kirisitira gagasɩra bʋ wa aa za.
46003001	Tɩ̃yara za mɩ yaɓiiwe, na mɩɛ ʋɔ, baa mɩ kha bʋ ĩ heke, mɩ wɔrɩn sɩɛrɛn ɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha nɩpɛ bãa kɩ bʋ na Yekila Nina waʔ. Mɩ sɩɛrɛn ɩ̃ wa mʋ gaga kha dunuya wɩɛ nɩpɛ kɩ bʋ ɩ̃, warɩma ɓikɛrɩbɛ pɩ khãa Adɛyɩra za fɛnsɛ.
46003002	Mɩ hãar ɩ wa nʋnʋ, ɗiire hʋwʋsɛ ɩ waʔ, naɗɩɛ na ɗiire hʋwʋsɛ kha bʋ sɩ, ɩ̃ naa ɓa wɔrɩ ɗi sɩ waʔ. Harɩ na ɓa gbɩɛ ɩra za, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ ɗi si harɩ bere waʔ.
46003003	Naɗɩɛ ĩ lelɔmɩra bʋ wa bere mʋ gaga kha dunuya wɩɛ nɩpɩra kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le na Yekila Nina ɩra; naɗɩɛ zone na kpɩkɩ̃nsɛ bʋ wa ɩ̃ za, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha ɩ̃ nɩɩrɛlɔmɩra dɩ̃ɩna dunuya wɩɛ nɩpɩra bʋ wa kpuore wa?
46003004	Baa ĩ de kha: «Mɩɛ bʋ wa Poli baa», ɔ kpasa de kha: «Mɩɛ bʋ wa Apolɔsɩ baa», bɩɛ lelɔmɩra na dunuya nɩpɩra bɛwɩra bʋ wa kpuore wa?
46003005	Apolɔsɩra bʋ wa ãnakpuo? Na Polira bʋ wa ãnakpuo? Yekila miliindɛwɛ kɩ bʋ a, aa Yekila sɩɛsɩra kãmara za ɩ̃ khãarɩ. Aa bɩɛ gbũu liigen ma na makɩ̃nn na mɩyãangɩ̃rana Yekila hãan a bɩɛ kpo kpora ɩra.
46003006	Mɩɛ liin kãwɩdaara, na Apolɔsɩra liin hʋ̃ʋgɩndaara, ŋa Yekila liin thaagɩra na kɩ khãɗɩ.
46003007	Na mafɩra ʋ, kãwɩdaara na hʋ̃ʋgɩ̃ndaara bʋ foi waʔ. Yekila kpora kɩ bʋ thaagɩra, naɗɩɛ ʋɔ kɩ wɔrɩ yɩɛ dahaɓikãwɩyana khã.
46003008	Dahakãwɩdaara na dahahʋ̃ʋgɩdaara bɩɛ bʋ wa kpuore. Yekila kɩ ɓa taa pɩ bɩɛ na makɩ̃n na pi liigesira.
46003009	Naɗɩɛ Yekila ɗʋkɩ̃nn ma u lekira a za na a liige kɩ hã ʋ, na ɩ̃ɛ liin Yekila hʋʋgɩra. Ɩ̃ɛ kpuowira kɩ bʋ Yekila thʋʋgɩra ʋ maɗɛ ɩra.
46003010	Na makɩ̃n na Yekila mɩyãangɩ̃rana ʋ hãan mɩɛ, mɩɛ maɗɛn ma mʋ gaga kha thʋmaɗɛdakɩ̃ra, na tiin thʋʋgɩra taana. Ɩra wɩɛ, ɔ kpasa kɩ maɗɛ gɩ. Ŋa a bɩɛ kãn ma na kɔrɩsɩ̃n a maɗɛlɔmɩra.
46003011	Naɗɩɛ thʋʋgɩra taana tiiri, gɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yesu Kirisitira, nɩra ʋɔ sii wɔrɩ tii gʋɔ dʋ̃waʔ.
46003012	Kɛna Thʋʋgɩra taana tiiri, bʋɔ wɔrɩ maɗɛ wa kɩ za na sãnɩ, warɩma na warɩvɩra, warɩma na bʋrɩyɩra ɗorisira kɩ hʋga, warɩma dahakɩ̃nɩsɛ, warɩma na kpewige, warɩma na wũugo.
46003013	Ŋa kitiɗɩyãgɩra pɩ bɩɛ kpo kpo miliinlɔmɩra ɓa tʋ. Naaga kɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ sɩ bɩɛ, naɗɩɛ nɩpɛ liigesira ɓa yii wa naaga za na tʋ sɩ lɔmɩra.
46003014	Na naagɩra wɔrɩn suon wɩɛ miliinlɔmɩra na yelenn mi waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu taasɛ.
46003015	Ŋa na wɩɛ bãa miliinlɔmɩra suon na yelenni, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu taasɛ waʔ. Ʋ ɓa koʔ, ŋa ʋ ɓa hɩɗan ma mʋ gaga kha baa nɩra horonn na kuɗ naaga za na kuon ɩra.
46003016	Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ kha ɩ̃ɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra, dɩ̃ɩna Yekila Nina bʋ wa ɩ̃ za wa?
46003017	Na nɩra asɩn Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra, Yekila ɓa asɩ wa ʋ dɛyɩra tɩ̃. Naɗɩɛ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra bʋ wa kharɩyɛgɛnɛ. Ɩ̃ɛ gbũun kɩ bʋ gɩɛ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra.
46003018	Hã nɩra sii ɓa kpɛnsɛ u thĩ waʔ, na wɩɛ kha ken u thĩ wʋɔmɛ nɩra ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra dunuyara za, ʋ dɛyɩra vɩkɩ̃n na le u thĩ mʋ gaga kha thaʔarɩnɩra. Si le thaaga ʋ vɩkɩ̃n na le wʋɔmɛ nɩra kɩ̃raŋɩra.
46003019	Naɗɩɛ dunuya wɩɛ wʋɔmɩra bʋ wa thaʔarɩmɩyɛ Yekila wʋɔla za. Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa kha: «Yekila gɔ ɓa nɩkewuyeme pi kewumira za.»
46003020	Na gbũun deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Adɛyɩra tʋ wa wʋɔmɛdɛrɩwɩra wʋɔmɩra; ʋ tʋ wa kha pɩ nan foi waʔ.»
46003021	Na mafɩra ʋ, nɩra sii kãn na gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiye kãma za waʔ. Naɗɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa ɩ̃ bɛyɛ.
46003022	Poli u ba, Apolɔsɩ ʋ ba, Pɩɛrɩ ʋ ba, dunuya wɩɛ ʋ ba, thakuogo i ba, huume i ba, ɩra wɩɛ mɩyɛ ɩ ba, bɛna kɩ ɓa ɓan dɩɛ mɩyɛ ɩ ba, ɩɛ bɩɛ bʋ wa ɩ̃ bɛyɛ,
46003023	ŋa ɩ̃ bʋ wa Kirisitira bɛwɛ, na Kirisitira liin Yekila baa.
46004001	Ɩ̃ kãn ma na ken aa mʋ gaga kha Kirisiti miliinɓiibɛ u yiin kha pi ken Yekila gũni mɩyɩra.
46004002	Wɛsɩɛ pɩ ɓɩɛ miliinɓiwira ki ken Yekila gũni mɩyɩra, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha pi le nɩtelenyeme.
46004003	Mɩɛ ʋɔ heke, harɩ na ɩ̃ zarɩgɩ̃nn mɩɛ, warɩma na sɩɛrɛɗidɛrɩwɛ zarɩgɩ̃nn mɩɛ, sɩɛ bʋ foi mɩɛ heke waʔ. Mɩɛ lɔɓidaara zarɩgɩ̃nn mɩɛ waʔ.
46004004	Baa mɩɛ lɔɓidaara zarɩgɩ̃n mɩɛ mɩɩnɛ sii za waʔ, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha mɩɛ telen ma waʔ. Wɩɛra kɩ kãn na kiti mɩɛ, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Adɛyɩra.
46004005	Hã ĩ kiti nɩra na u kiti bɛna nan thonn waʔ. Ɩ̃ kɩ tɩɛ Adɛyɩra gbũuɓamɩra. Mɩyɩra bɩɛ i guureni dabirigira za, ʋɔ kɩ ɓa yii ɩ bɩɛ yɛyɛɓɛ za, ki kuse nɩpɛ gagaguorensira bɩɛ gbɛ̃ɩgɛ za. Dɩɛ bɛna, nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpo kpo ɓa ɓu pɩ gbɩ̃nɛsɛ Yekila heke na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ kha kãn na nan mɩ.
46004006	Ɩra wɩɛ, mɩ yaɓiiwe mɩ khɩɛn ma Apolɔsɩra na mɩɛ thĩra mɩyɛ na karɩ̃n ɩ̃, si le thaaga ɩ̃ gɔ wɛsɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ kha: «Hã nɩra ɓa le mɩɩnɛ na tãra wɛsɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ waʔ.» Sɩɛ le thaaga hã nɩra sii lʋɔrɛ u thĩ na yɩsɩɓɩɛgɛ kha ʋɔ ɓɩɛ wa nɩra wɩɛ kɩ kɛɩ ʋɔra waʔ.
46004007	Naɗɩɛ bɩra za mu ken kha mʋɔ bãa wa bʋɔra za. Mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ mu heke, Yekila ʋ hãan mʋ ɩ wa? Na mafɩra sii u, be liin na mʋ gbɩ̃nɛ mu thĩ na mɩyɩra mʋ bʋ ɩ mʋ gaga kha mu ɓuur i wa na mʋɔ thĩ wɔrɩkɔ?
46004008	Ŋa ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, mɩɩnɛ sii kpɩɗ ɩ̃ waʔ. Ĩ liin ma ɓudadɛrɩwɛ Yekila khɩ̃na za zuori. Ĩ ken ma kha ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa ɩɩwɛ. Kɛna aa nii bʋ sɩɛ za waʔ. Mafɩra mi gbũu kha ɓɩɛ kha ĩ le ɩɩwɛ thĩnthĩnse za, sɩɛ le thaaga a ɓu ɗi ɩɩgɩra dɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃.
46004009	Ŋa mɩ yãan sɩ mʋ gaga kha Yekila yiin ma aa dãarawɩra hɩɗankhɛphɩlayana za. Aa bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha nɩpɛ pi yiin huume kãma. Aa liin ma mɩkerenye dunuyara bɩɛ heke: Nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɩɛ na mɛlɛgɛwɩra heke.
46004010	Aa bʋ wa nɩpɛ wʋɔrɛ za mʋ gaga kha thaʔarɩdɛrɩwɛ Kirisitira kãmara za, ŋa ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ bʋ wa wʋɔmɛ dɛrɩwɛ Kirisitira za! Aa bʋ wa kɛɩ le faŋa, kɛna ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa na faŋa! Ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa gbɩ̃nɛsɛ za, ŋa aa bʋ wa nɩ́ɩsɛ́ za.
46004011	Harɩ bere khʋ̃mʋŋa na yʋ̃ɔsɛ kɩ khʋ aa, aa bʋ wa kɛɩ le dayiinse, a gbɔʔɩra gbʋ̃ʋ wa khɩkɩ̃nsɛ kãma, aa bʋ na khaarɛ kpo hɩɗansɛ waʔ.
46004012	Aa vɛn ma na liige kɩ tʋ ɓu ɗiime. Na pɩ kʋsann a, aa gbɩ̃nɛ wa pɩ dɛrɩwɩra; na pɩ vɛnɛn aa, a ba ɓa sɩɛ.
46004013	Na pi deɗ aa sɩɛrɛbɩ̃ɩsɛ, a zɩ̃ŋɩn ma na sɩɛrɛkɩ̃nsɛ. Ɩra wɩɛ pi ken ma aa mʋ gaga kha fũugo dunuyara nɩpɛ wʋɔla za, pi ken ma aa mʋ gaga kha dadãgansɛ dunuyara za.
46004014	Mɩɛ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na yii ĩ nɩɩsɛ waʔ, ŋa mɩ ɓɩɛ wa na ɓɔ ɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ thĩ ɓihũnrome kɩ bʋ ɩ̃.
46004015	Harɩ na ɩ̃ bʋ wa na karɩ̃ndɛwɛ na pɩ nan kpɩɛwɛ gbũne Yesu Kirisitira za, ɩ̃ kãn na tʋ kha Siye ukpo kɩ bʋ ĩ heke; mɩɛ kɩ bʋ ʋɔ Siira. Naɗɩɛ mɩɛ deɗ ĩ Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, na ĩ liin Yekila ɓiiwira, na ɓuun thakuogo Yesu Kirisitira za.
46004016	Si liin mafɩra mɩɛ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa, ĩ ken mɩɛ lelɔmɩra na ki le mafɩra.
46004017	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ dãan mi ɓikhiye khɔrɩyɔmɔ Timotera, na hãar ɩ̃ ʋ. Ʋ bʋ wa sʋɔwɛ nɩra Adɛyɩra khɩ̃na nɩɩrɛsɩra za. Ʋɔ kɩ ɓa kʋɔgɩ̃n ɩ̃ na mɩɛ nɩɩrɛlɔmɩra Yesura khɩ̃na za. Sɩɛ mi gbũu min kɩ karɩ̃n egiliziwira bɩɛ za.
46004018	Ɩ̃ɛ za bʋɔ kha ken ma kha mɩ ɓa vɩ gbũu ĩ heke dʋ̃waʔ, gɩɛ yɩɛn na pɩ gɔɗ kɩ kɩ lʋɔrɛ pi thĩ na yɩsɩɓɩɛgɛ.
46004019	Ŋa na Yekila bɩɩrɩ, khaadɩɛ na kɩrɩ ʋ, mɩ ɓa yo ĩ heke. Dɩɛ bɛna, bɩɛ thĩ yɩsɩɓɩɛgɛ dola mɩ ɓanu dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa mɩ ɓa yã mɩɩna bɩɛ thĩra wɔrɩ le ɩra!
46004020	Naɗɩɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra dii sɩɛrɛgbʋ̃ɔdeke doro za waʔ, ŋa nɩpɛ kãn ma na yã Yekila wɔrɩkɩra a nɩɩrɛlɔmɩra za.
46004021	Ɩra wɩɛ bɩra ɩ̃ khɔrɩ? Ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ kha na mɩ kha mi thiye ĩ heke mi thiye na dazʋwʋrɛ na ɓa khɩ ɩ̃ baa? Warɩma ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wa kha mi thiye na khɔrɩmɛ na wɔyĩke ĩ heke?
46005001	A nu wa na pi de si khaayɛ bɩɛ za kha ʋɔ liin thalamɩyɛ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za, thalamɩyɩra thĩna thĩra kɛɩkhãadɛwɛ bɩ le waʔ ɩra. A nuun ma kha ɩ̃ɛ za, ʋɔ bʋ wa na u siye hara!
46005002	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za bere, kɛna ɩ̃ lʋɔrɛ wa ĩ thĩ na yɩsɩɓɩɛgɛ! Sɩ kha kãn le wa wɔkpãka ɩ̃ za, kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ ɗɛ kuse si ledaara ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za.
46005003	Mɩɛ ʋɔ, harɩ na mɩɛ bʋ ɩ̃ lɔkɔ za waʔ, mɩ gagasɛ bʋ ɩ̃ za; dɛyɩra liin sɩɛ, Adɛyɩra Yesu yɩsɩgɩra za, mɩɛ zarɩgɩ̃nn ʋ wa zʋori, mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ bʋ wa ĩ heke ni zuori. Na ɩ̃ ɓa bĩŋinn si ɗiimira za, mɩ gagasɩra ɓa hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃, kɩ yɩɛ Adɛyɩra wɔrɩkɩra hɩɗan bʋ tɩ̃;
46005005	Dɛyɩra liin sɩɛ, ĩ yii u Sutana leke za, si le thaaga ʋ gbɔkhaasɩra asɩ kɩ yɩɛ u nina ko Adɛyɩra Yesura ɓanɗɩyãgara za.
46005006	Ɩ̃ kha kãn na gbɩ̃nɛ ĩ thĩ mɩyɩɛ thĩna za waʔ. Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ sɩɛ kha: «Na nɩra yiin thãhɩ̃rɩwɛ̃ kɩrɩ ʋ ɓʋɔgɔ za pɩ lʋɔrɛ wa ɓʋɔgɩra bɩɛ.»
46005007	Ɩ̃ yɛɗɛ ĩ thĩ! Na khon ban thãhɩ̃rɩkhãgara kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ za, si le thaaga ɩ̃ khɩɛgɩ̃n na ɓɔfɛŋɩra kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le thãhɩ̃rɩwɛ̃ ɩra. Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra bʋ wa nɩfɛmɛ zuori kɛɩ le thãhɩ̃rɩwɛ̃, naɗɩɛ zãraɓiira pi khonn thɔgɔnsɩra a zɩ̃mɩra kãma, ʋɔ liin Kirisitira.
46005008	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, a ɗi fɛtɩra kɛɩ le mɩbɩ̃yɛ thãhɩ̃rɩkhãgara dɩ̃ɩna thalamɩyɩra. Ŋa a ɗi fɛtɩra dɩ̃ɩna buru kɛɩ le thãhɩ̃rɩkhãgara, sɩɛ kɔla kɩ bʋ gagayɛgɛnsɛ na tɩ̃yara.
46005009	Mɩ lɛtɩrɩra mɩ na nisĩnn sɛwɛn, mɩ na deɗ ĩ wa kha hã ɩ̃ ɓa dɩɛ na wɛpɛ ki le thalamɩyɛ waʔ.
46005010	Dunuya wɩɛ kɛɩkhãadɛwɩra ki le thalamɩyɩra, bɩɛ mi deɗ kha hã ɩ̃ dɩɛ na bɩɛ waʔ dɛʔ, warɩma nɩra wɩɛ ki hĩin mɩɩnɛ za waʔ, warɩma zugbũro waʔ, warɩma sɩ̃nthɔgɩ̃ndaa waʔ, bʋɔtɛ na si liin mafɩra, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha ɩ̃ɛ thĩra kãn hɩɗan dunuyara za waʔ!
46005011	Mɩ kha ɓɩɛ wa na de kha hã ɩ̃ dɩɛ na nɩra wɛ bãa ki de kha ʋɔ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛ kɛna u le thalamɩyɛ, warɩma nɩra wɛ ki hĩin mɩɩnɛ za waʔ, warɩma sɩ̃nthɔgɩ̃ndaa, warɩma tɔndaa, warɩma thãyɔdaa, warɩma zugbũro waʔ. Ʋɔ dɛrɩyɩra siira, ɩ̃ɛ thĩra kãn na ɗi dɩ̃ɩn ʋ thĩra waʔ.
46005012	Khɩ̃nɛ bʋ mɩɛ heke na kiti kɛɩkhãadɛwɛ waʔ. Yekila kɩ ɓa kiti bɩɛ. Ŋa khãarawɩra ki bĩŋin khaala tikpora ʋ, ɩ̃ɛ kɩ kãn na kiti pɩ mɩyɩra waʔ? Sɩ sɛwɛn ma kha: «Ɩ̃ ɗɛ kuse mɩbɩ̃yɛledaara ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za.»
46006001	Be kɩ ɓan na khɛ̃ɩgɛ lonn ɩ̃ɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ tɩɛ za, khaala ɩ̃ kha ɩ̃ɛ yo na sɩ sɩɛsɩra ĩ kiretɩ̃ɛkamɛ khɛrɛ na yo ɔfɔ sɩ, ɩ̃ haʔ na yo si sɩɛrɛɗidɛwɛ kɩ khãa Yekila za waʔ, kha pɩ ɔfɔ sɩ na hã ɩ̃ɛ sɩ?
46006002	Ɩ̃ tʋ kha Yekila khãadɛwɩra kɩ ɓa kiti dunuyara nɩpɩra wa? Na ɩ̃ɛ kɩ kãn na kiti dunuyara nɩpɩra, mʋsɛ si liin kɛna ɩ̃ɛ thĩra wɔrɩ ɗi kamɛ sɩɛsɛ kɩ nan foira waʔ?
46006003	Ɩ̃ tʋ kha aa kɩ ɓa kiti mɛlɛgɛwɩra wa? Ɓa tãra de kha dunuya wɩɛ mɩyɛ.
46006004	Na ɩɛ dunuya wɩɛ mɩyɛ yʋɔ yãwɩgɩ̃n ɩ̃ɛ dola sʋgʋmʋra za, be kɩ ɓa yɩɛ ĩ yo khɛ nɩpɩra kɩ bʋ egilizira za waʔ, kha pi yo ɔfɔ ɩ̃ɛ mɩyɩra?
46006005	Mi de si wa ɩ̃ɛ thĩra yã sɩ na tʋ kha sɩ bʋ wa nɩɩsɛ. Ɩ̃ɛ bɩɛ za, nɩɩra ukpo bʋ kũu na wʋɔmɛ, wɩɛ kɩ wɔrɩ ɔfɔ mɩyɛ na yãwɩgɩ̃nsɛ lonn ɩ̃ɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ dola sʋgʋmʋra za waʔ?
46006006	Fɔ ɩ̃ yan kamɛ sɩɛrɛɗidɛwɛ heke, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ bere kɩ tʋ Yekila waʔ ɩra?
46006007	Baa ɩ̃ɛ dola sɩɛsɩra la kamɛ, ɩ̃ yan kamɛ sɩɛrɛɗidɛwɛ heke, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha ɩ̃ɛ thĩra zarɩgɩ̃nn ma. Be liin na mɩbɩ̃yɛ kũn ɩ̃ za waʔ? Be liin na ɩ̃ khɔrɩ kha nɩra waʔ ɩ̃ɛ za waʔ?
46006008	Kɛna ɩ̃ɛ thĩra ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ na ɩ̃ waʔ nɩpɛ za. Ɩ̃ɛ gbũu ki le sɩɛ ɩ̃ yaɓiiwira za.
46006009	Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ sɩ kha hɩɗankhɛrɛ bʋ nɩwagamɛ heke Yekila ɩɩgɩra za waʔ. Hã ɩ̃ ɓa kpɛnsɛ ĩ thĩ waʔ, thalamɩyɛ ledɛwɛ na sɩ̃nthɔgɩ̃ndɛwɛ, na zɛrɩgɛledɛwɛ, na khuobɛ warɩma hapɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ kamɛ hara na khuo ɓɩɛlɔmɩra za ɩra,
46006010	na zugbũruwe, na nɩra wɩɛ ki hĩin mɩɩnɛ za waʔ, na thayɔ̃dɛbɩ̃ɩwɛ, na tɔndɛrɩwɛ, na wɛpɩɛ kɩ waʔ nɩpɛ za ɩra, bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ sii wɔrɩ ɓu hɩɗankhɛrɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra za waʔ.
46006011	Mafɩra ɩ̃ bʋɔra kha bʋ khɔ̃ɩra. Ŋa ɩ̃ yɛɗɛn ma na khon sɩɛ za na hɩɗann Yekila hɩɗansɛ za ɩra, ĩ telen ma Yekila wʋɔla za ɩra, na Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za, na a Yekila Nina za.
46006012	Ɩ̃ bʋɔra de ɓa kha: «Mɩɛ wɔrɩ le wa mɩyɩra bɩɛ.» Iyo, mi de ĩ wa sɩ kha tɔ̃nɩ bʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ za waʔ. Mɩ wɔrɩ de kha: «Mɩɛ wɔrɩ le wa mɩyɛ bɩɛ», ŋa mɩ ɓa bɩ na yii mi thĩ mɩbɩ̃yɛ sii za na le i ɗonron waʔ.
46006013	Ĩ le de ɓa tɩ̃ kha ɗiise bʋ wa kpoloŋo bɛsɛ dɩ̃ɩna kpoloŋo zɩɛn ma ɗiise kãma za. Iyo tɩ̃ya ʋ, kɛna Yekila ɓa asɩ wa sɩɛ bɩɛ. Ŋa gbɔɗa dɩɛ, dɩɛ liin kakarɩliige kãma za waʔ. Gbɔɗa bʋ wa Adɛyɛ bɛrɛ, na Adɛyɩra liin gbɔɗa baa.
46006014	Baa Yekila arɩgan Adɛyɩra huumira za na ɓann ʋ thakuogira za, mafɩra u ɓa khon a huumira za na ɓan a thakuogira za ʋ wɔrɩkɩra kãmara za.
46006015	Ɩ̃ kãn tʋ wa kha ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra bʋ wa kirisitira gbɔɗɛ khaarɛ dʋɔ. Na sɩ mafɩra, mɩ kãn khɛ wa kirisitira gbɔɗɛ khaarɛ dʋɔ na yiir i zɛrɩgɛ za ba? Sɩɛ kãn le waʔ!
46006016	Warɩma ɩ̃ tʋʋn kha khuo wɩɛ bãa ki le zɛrɩgɛ na hara, ʋɔ dɛyɩra gbɔɗa na zɛrɩhala bɛla dɩɛ wa na le gbɔɗɛ kpo wa ba? Naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma na deɗ kha: «Pɩyɔ̃ra bɩɛ gbɔʔɩra liin ma tikpo.»
46006017	Ŋa dɛyɩra kɩ dɩɛ na Adɛyɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra na Adɛyɩra bʋ wa nɩra kpo Nina za.
46006018	Ĩ horo hã zɛrɩgɩra liimira! Na nɩra liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ yʋɔ, ɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɩra dii ʋ gbɔɗa za waʔ. Ŋa wɩɛ bãa ki le zɛrɩgɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra le wa mɩbɩ̃yɛ ʋɔ thĩ gbɔɗa za.
46006019	Ɩ̃ tʋ kha Ninyɛgɛmɔra Yekila yiin ɩ̃ za, ʋɔ gbɩ̃nɛkhɛrɛ kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ɛ gbɔʔɩra waʔ? Nina kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ za mɩra, Yekila yiir u ɩ̃ za. Ɩra wɩɛ, ɩ̃ bʋ ĩ thĩ za dʋ̃waʔ.
46006020	Yekila ɗonn ĩ wa ɗonron hʋwʋsɛ. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila na ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra.
46007001	Sɛwʋra ɩ̃ sɛwɛn na dãa hãan mɩ, ʋɔ zɩ̃ŋɩnsɛ mɩ hã ɩ̃. Na khuo yiin hara waʔ, sɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra.
46007002	Ŋa baa kakarɩliigira gbɩ̃nn na yo tannɩ, sɩ makɩ̃n khuo tʋɔ khuo yii hara, hara tʋɔ hara yii khuo.
46007003	Wɛsɩɛ khuora kãn na le hã ʋ hala dahʋ̃raŋɩra gɛŋɩra, hã ʋ yɩɛ sɩɛ kpɩ ʋ waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna wɛsɩɛ hala kãn na le hã u khuora dahʋ̃raŋɩra gɛŋɩra, hã ʋɔ gbũu yɩɛ sɩɛ kpɩ ʋɔ tɩ̃ waʔ.
46007004	Hara kãn na khɛ ʋ gbɔɗa na le ri wɛsɛ bãa nʋʋr ʋ waʔ, naɗɩɛ ʋ gbɔɗa bʋ wa u khuora bɛrɛ; mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃ khuora kãn na khɛ ʋ gbɔɗa na le ri na mɩɩdɛ bãa nʋʋr ʋ waʔ, naɗɩɛ ʋ gbɔɗa bʋ wa ʋ hala bɛrɛ.
46007005	Khuo na hara kãn na khʋ̃n kamɛ dahʋ̃raŋa waʔ, fɔ na pɩ bɛnn ma sɩ za na zɩɛn bɛnɛ dʋɔ kɩrɩ kha bɩɛ yii pi thĩ Yekila yɩ̃mɛ za bʋɔtɛ; na dɩɛ bɛna gbũ tannɩ, pi gbũu khɛ kamɛ bʋɔtɛ pɩ ɓa wɔrɩ gɔ pi thĩ waʔ, hã Sutana ɓa kpɛnsɛ wɩ na yii wi zɛrɩgɛ za waʔ.
46007006	Wɛsɩɛ mi de ĩ mɩra, sɩɛ bʋ kha faŋa ʋ waʔ, ŋa ɓɔɓɛ mɩ hã ɩ̃.
46007007	Tɩ̃yara za ʋɔ, mɩ kha khɔrɩ wa kha nɩpɛ bɩɛ le mʋ gaga kha baa mɩɛ bʋ khogbãransɩra za ɩra. Ŋa Yekila hãan ma a bɩɛ kpo kpora mɩyãangɩ̃ranɛ, kha ʋɔra yii hara warɩma khuo, ʋɔra hɩɗan kɛgbãransɛ warɩma hagbãransɛ za.
46007008	Wɛsɩɛ mi de khogbãramɩra dɩ̃ɩna thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃nhapɩra: Sɩ makɩ̃n ma ɩ̃ hɩɗan khogbãransɩra ʋ mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ.
46007009	Ŋa na pɩ tʋ kha pɩ wɔrɩ gɔ pi thĩ waʔ, pi yii: Na wɩɛ tʋʋn kha ʋɔ wɔrɩ ba u yeke waʔ, u yii.
46007010	Wɛpɩɛ yiin zuori, bɩɛ mi de hã wɛsɩɛ. (Sɩɛ kuɗ mɩɛ thĩra za waʔ, sɩɛ kuɗ ɓa Adɛyɩra heke): Hara kãn na kpɩkɩ̃n na u khuora waʔ.
46007011	Na si gbũun ɓa nann ma kha fɔ ʋ kpɩkɩ̃n na u khuora, hã ʋɔ hala gbũu yii khokpasa ʋɔ dʋ̃waʔ, warɩma ʋ yɩ̃n u khoɗugora na vɩ gbũu u heke. Ŋa Khuora ʋɔ, ʋɔ kãn na zɩɛ ʋ hara waʔ.
46007012	Wɛsɩɛ mi de bʋɔra ɩra (sɩɛ kuɗ Adɛyɩra heke waʔ, mɩɛ thĩra ki de sɩɛ): Na kiretɩ̃ɛ khuo bʋ na hara wɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛ waʔ, kɛna ʋɔ hara wɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa na hɩɗan na kiretɩ̃ɛ khuora, ʋ kãn na zɩɛ ʋ waʔ.
46007013	Mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃, na kiretɩ̃ɛ hara bʋ na khuo wɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛ waʔ, na ʋɔ khuora bɩɩn kha ʋɔ hɩɗan ma na kiretɩ̃ɛ hala, ʋ kãn na zɩɛ ʋɔ khuowɩɛ waʔ.
46007014	Naɗɩɛ khuora kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛra waʔ, ʋ khaarɛ yĩmi wa na Yekila naɗɩɛ baa ʋɔ na hala bʋ na kamɩra ɩra. Mafɩra sɩ bʋ na hala kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛra waʔ, ʋɔ yĩmin wa na Yekila tɩ̃. Naɗɩɛ baa ʋɔ na ʋ ɓala kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛra dɩɛn na liin nɩra kpora ɩra. Bʋɔtɛ na pɩ kpɩkɩ̃nnɩ, pi ɓiiwira ɓa le wa mʋ gaga kha pɩ kpɩkɩ̃n ma na Yekila, kɛna pɩ khaarɛ yĩmin ma na Yekila.
46007015	Ŋa na hara warɩma khuo wɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛ waʔ, na bɩɛ ʋɔ khon gagasɛ kha bɩɛ kpɩkɩ̃n ma na ʋɔ kiretɩ̃ɛ khuora, warɩma na ʋ kiretɩ̃ɛ hala, pɩ yɩɛ ʋ kpɩkɩ̃n. Dɩɛ bɛna, sɩ bʋ faŋa mɩyɛ kha ʋ hɩɗan na khãara waʔ. Yekila yɩɗ ɩ̃ wa kha ɩ̃ bɩɛ hɩɗan wɔyĩke za.
46007016	Naɗɩɛ mʋɔ hara, bãanɩ mʋ wɔrɩ yɩɛ mu khuora ɓu zɩ̃mɛ, ŋa mʋsɛ mu le kɩ wɔrɩ tʋ sɩɛ? Mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃, mʋɔ khuora, bãanɩ mʋ wɔrɩ yɩɛ mʋ hala ɓu zɩ̃mɛ, ŋa mʋsɛ mu le kɩ wɔrɩ tʋ sɩɛ?
46007017	Na kuɗ sɩɛ za, wɛsɩɛ Adɛyɩra liin hãa ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpo kpora, na lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpo kpora kha bʋ na ʋ yɩɗ ɩ̃ bɩɛ ɓann ɩ̃ ʋ za na yuori, mafɩra ɩ̃ kãn na hɩɗan. Sɩɛ mɩ ɓɩɛ egiliziwira bɩɛ heke.
46007018	Na Yekila yɩɗ wɩɛ bãa kɛna ʋɔ dɛyɩra na huuren ma zuori, hã ʋ dɛyɩra guure u huuresira waʔ. Na Yekila yɩɗ wɩɛ bãa, kɛna ʋɔ huuren waʔ, hã ʋ dɛyɩra ɓɩɛ kha ʋɔ huure dʋ̃waʔ.
46007019	Huurese dɩ̃ɩna kɛɩhuurese bʋ foi waʔ. Wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ thaagɩra, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ na le wɛsɩɛ Yekila deɗ ʋ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za ɩra.
46007020	Sɩ makɩ̃n ma ɩ̃ bɩɛ hɩɗan mʋ gaga kha lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ kha bʋ na Yekila yɩɗ ɩ̃ ɩra.
46007021	Na wɩɛ kha bʋ ɗonron na Yekila ɓa yɩɗ ʋ, hã si le kpolongbʋ̃ʋmɩyɛ ʋ dɛyɩra heke waʔ. Ŋa na ʋ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓuun ma lɔmɛ bʋɔ wɛpɛ kɩ wɔrɩ khon u ɗonsira za, ʋ dɛyɩra wɔrɩ khɛ bɩɛ lɔmɩra.
46007022	Naɗɩɛ na Adɛyɩra yɩɗ ɗonron, ʋɔ ɗonrona liin ma hɔɔrɔmɔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa Adɛyɩra baa. Mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃, wɩɛ kha bʋ ɗonron waʔ, na Kirisitira ɓa yɩɗ ʋ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra liin ma Kirisitira ɗonron.
46007023	Yekila ɗonn ĩ wa ɗorohʋwʋsɛ; hã ĩ gbũu le nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ ɗome dʋ̃waʔ.
46007024	Iyo, mɩ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpo kpora kãn ma na hɩɗan mʋ gaga kha lɔmɩra za ʋ dɛyɩra kha bʋ na Yekila yɩɗ ʋ ɩra.
46007025	Wɛpɛ pi yiin thon waʔ, Adɛyɛ nʋʋga sɩɛsɛ mɩ bu de waʔ, ŋa mɩɛ thĩra gagasɛ sɩɛ, Adɛyɛ fɩ̃ɩmɩra na ʋ kɩ̃rɩgɩra wɔrɩkɩra kɩ bʋ mɩ za, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ khãa mɩ sɩɛsɩra za.
46007026	Ɩra wɩɛ baa bɛna hʋgannɩ, wɛsɩɛ mɩɛ yãan na sɩ bãa, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha nɩpɛ bɩɛ hɩɗan pɩ lɔmɩra za.
46007027	Na wɩɛ bãa bʋ na hara, hã ʋ ɓɩɛ kha ʋɔ zɩɛ ʋ waʔ, wɩɛ yiin thon waʔ, hã ʋ ɓɩɛ hara kha ʋɔ yii waʔ.
46007028	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za na wɩɛ bãa yiiri, ʋ dɛyɩra liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ. Na ɓihɛyɛ yiin khuo tɩ̃, mɩbɩ̃yɛ u liin waʔ. Ŋa vɛnsɩra kɩ ɓa nan mɩ yaŋɩra kpoloŋira za, sɩɛ vɛnsɩra mɩ ɓɩɛ kha sɩ nan ɩ̃ waʔ.
46007029	Ĩ ken wɛsɛ mɩ ɓɩɛ na de ɩra mɩ yaɓiiwe: A bʋ dalɛɩmɛ fɔlɔŋɩra za fara waʔ. Ɩra wɩɛ, khuobɛ bãa pi yiin hapɛ, pɩ kãn ma na le mʋ gaga kha pi yiin yãan waʔ,
46007030	wɛpɩɛ kɩ fʋʋ, bɩɛ le mʋ gaga kha pɩ fʋʋ waʔ. Wɛpɩɛ kɩ yãgayãga, pi le pi thĩ mʋ gaga kha pɩ yãgayãga waʔ. Wɛpɛ ki ɗon daasɛ, bɩɛ le pi thĩ mʋ gaga kha pi ɗonn foi waʔ,
46007031	wɛpɩɛ ki ɗi dunuya wɩɛ ɓudagara, bɩɛ le pi thĩ mʋ gaga kha pi ɗi foi waʔ. Naɗɩɛ lɔmɩra za dunuyara bʋ mɩra, lɛɩmɔ ʋ dʋ̃waʔ.
46007032	Mɩ kha khɔrɩ wa ɩ̃ hɩɗan lafori za kɛɩ le wukĩnse. Wɩɛ bãa u yiin thon waʔ, ʋ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ wa Adɛyɩra miliinsira za, na yɩɛ ʋ mɩyɛ nʋʋ Adɛyɩra.
46007033	Ŋa wɩɛ bãa u yiin zuori, ʋɔ pɛ̃ɩ wa na dunuya wɩɛ mɩyɩra, wɛsɩɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ le na wuore ʋ hala bãana, sɩɛ u le,
46007034	sɩ khɩɛn ma mʋ gaga kha ʋ dɛyɩra kpɩkɩ̃nn ma khaayɛ ɩ̃yɔ̃ za. Mafɩra sɩ bʋ tɩ̃ na hara wɩɛ kɩ bʋ na khuo waʔ. Warɩma ɓihɛyɛ wɩɛ u yiin yãan waʔ, bɩɛ pɛ̃ɩ wa Adɛyɩra miliinse za, naɗɩɛ pɩ gbɔʔɩra dɩ̃ɩna pɩ gagasɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa Adɛyɩra za pi miliinyira bɩɛ za. Ŋa hara wɩɛ u yiiri, ʋɔ pɛ̃ɩ wa kɩ ɓɩɛ dunuya wɩɛ mɩyɛ na wɔrɩ wuore u khuora bãana.
46007035	Wɛsɩɛ mi de mɩra, mi de ĩ wa sɩɛ ɩ̃ kɩ̃rawɛ kãma. Mi de si ɩ̃ bɩ̃ɩsɛ za waʔ; mɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha ĩ le wɛsɩɛ kɩ ɓa dɛnfɛn ɩ, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ Adɛyɩra miliinsira za.
46007036	Ɩra wɩɛ na ɓikhoyo wɩɛ yãan kha ʋɔ wɔrɩ gɔ u thĩ na ʋ hãnɩɓiye waʔ, ʋ dɛyɩra le wɛsɩɛ ʋ khɔrɩ. Ʋ gagasɩra bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ, u yiin u.
46007037	Ŋa na ɓikhoyo wɩɛ khɔrɩn na khon gagasɛ na tʋ kha ʋɔ wɔrɩ gɔ ʋɔ thĩ, kha ʋɔ yii hara waʔ; nɩra sii gbũun yiin si ʋ za waʔ; sɩɛ bʋ wa mɩkɩ̃nɛ.
46007038	Si kpuosira i tɩ̃, wɩɛ bãa yiin u hãnɩɓiye, sɩ bʋ wa mɩkɩ̃nɛ. Ŋa wɩɛ bãa lɛɩgɩ̃nn u yiimira za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra gagasɩra kɩ̃ran tɩ̃ gbaangbo.
46007039	Na yɩɛ hara khuo thakhuogo za, hala kãn hɩɗan ma khuora heke. Ŋa na khuora ɓa huun kɩ zɩɛr ʋ; ʋ wɔrɩ yii u khokɔrɩyɔmɔ wɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛ.
46007040	Na makɩ̃n na mɩɛ gagasɩra, na ʋ hɩɗan ma kɛɩ yii khuo, sɩɛ kha bãa ʋ za. Mɩ gaga wa kha wɛsɩɛ mi de, Yekila Nina kɩ ɓɔgɔ mɩ sɩ.
46008001	Mɩ ɓɩɛ wa na zɩ̃ŋɩn ɩ̃ ɩra na gbũu bʋ̃ɓɩra ɩ̃ bʋ̃ɗ ɓɩ sɩ̃nkhaasɩra mɩyɩra za ɩra: Tɩ̃ya ʋ, «a bɩɛ bʋ wa na tʋʋmɛ», ŋa tʋʋmɛ lɛɩ yii nɩra yɩsɩɓɩɛgɛ za waʔ, kɛna khɔrɩmɛ yɩɛ wa nɩra yo wʋɔrɛ khãamɩra za.
46008002	Wɩɛ ki ken u thĩ kha ʋɔ tʋ wa mɩɩnɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra tʋ mʋ gaga kha baa ʋ kha kãn tʋ waʔ.
46008003	Ŋa wɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ Yekila, Yekila tʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra.
46008004	Ɩ̃ bʋ̃ɓɩra kɩ bʋ wɛpɩɛ: Kha ɩ̃ɛ wɔrɩ khʋɔ sɩ̃nthɔgɩ̃nkhaasɛ ba? A bɩɛ tʋʋn ma kha sʋ̃wa bʋ tɩ̃ya mɩɩnɛ dunuyara za waʔ, Yekire kpo kɩ bʋ.
46008005	Halɩ na mɩgɔnyɛ bʋ zaara na fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ, wɛʔɛ nɩpɛ khɩɛn liin mʋ gaga kha pɩ sɩ̃mɩra na pɩ dɛwɩra kɩ bʋ ɩɛ,
46008006	ŋa aa ʋɔ tʋʋn ma kha Yekire ukpo kɩ bʋ. Ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Siira, ʋɔ heke mɩyɩra bɩɛ kure, ʋɔ za a ɓu thakuogira. Adɛyɛ ukpo kɩ bʋ, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Yesu Kirisitira, mɩyɩra bɩɛ liin ma ʋɔ wɔrɩkɩra za; a ɓu wa thakuogira ʋɔ za.
46008007	Ŋa nɩpɛ bɩɛ tʋ ʋɔ tɩ̃yara waʔ. Bʋɔ bʋ, baa pɩ dɛrɩn sɩ̃nkhakhʋɔgɩra za na tannɩ, harɩ ɩra wɩɛ na pɩ kha pɩ khʋɔ khaasɛ, pɩ khʋɔ sɩ wa mʋ gaga kha sɩ̃nkhaasɩra pɩ khʋɔ bere. Baa pi lɔɓidaara thɔɗɩ, pi ken ma pi thĩ kha bɩɛ teɗ ɓa zuori, gɩɛ khakhʋɔgɩra kãmara za.
46008008	Ɗimɩɩnɛ wɔrɩ zʋ̃ʋ nan na aa Yekila wʋɔla za waʔ. Na kɛɩ ɗiime, sɩɛ wɔrɩ khon mɩɩnɛ a za waʔ, na ɗi si tɩ̃, sɩɛ wɔrɩ yɩɛ mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ sɩɛ a za waʔ.
46008009	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, ɩ̃ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ. Ɩ̃ wɔrɩ ɗi mɩyɛ thĩnye bɩɛ mʋ gaga kha baa ɩ̃ khɔrɩ ɩra, ŋa hã ɩ̃ mɩɗiwenyira ɓa le thaaga na yiin wɛpɩɛ khãamɩra ki zen mɩbɩ̃ɩliige za waʔ.
46008010	Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ khãamɛ ki zen, na ʋɔ yãan mʋɔ wɩɛra khãamɩra kɩ gbɩ̃n na mʋ bʋ ki ɗiire sɩ̃nthʋʋga za, sɩ khɩɛn ma mʋ gaga kha mʋ hãan ma khɩ̃nɛ wɩɛra khãamɩra ki zen kha u yo wʋɔrɛ sɩ̃nkhakhʋɔgɩra za wa?
46008011	Na si liin mafɩra, wɩɛra khãamɩra ki zen, kɛna Kirisitira huun ma ʋɔ kãmara za tɩ̃, mʋɔ wɩɛra khãamɩra kɩ gbɩ̃n, mʋ tʋʋmɩra ɓa yii wa mʋ yaɓiira wɩɛra khãmɩra ki zen ɓilense za.
46008012	Na ĩ liin ɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɩra siira ɩ̃ yaɓiiwira za, ɩ̃ nʋga wa pɩ lɔɓidaara; sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha Kirisitira thĩra ĩ liin ɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɩra.
46008013	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na ɗimɩɩnɛ wɔrɩ yɩɛ wa mi yii mɩ yaɓiye ɓilense za, mɩɛ kɛɩ khakhʋɔgɩra pere, si le thaaga hã mɩ ɓa le yɩɛ mɩ yaɓiye ɓilen waʔ.
46009001	Mɩɛ bʋ hɔrɔmɔ waʔ? Mɩɛ bʋ Yesu dãara waʔ? Mɩɛ yãan Yesura kɩ bʋ a Adɛyɩra waʔ? Miliinsira mi liin hãan Adɛyɩra, ɩ̃ɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ sɩɛ miliinsira tɔ̃nɩra waʔ?
46009002	Harɩ na bʋɔ kɛɩ kha mɩɛ bʋ Yesura dãara waʔ, ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ wa sɩɛ kha mɩɛ bʋ wa Yesura dãara. Baa ɩ̃ɛ ĩ liin nʋkpuola khãamɩra ʋ Adɛyɩra za, dɩɛ nʋkpuola kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha mɩɛ bʋ wa Yesura dãara.
46009003	Wɛpɩɛ ki de mɩɛ mɩyɩra, ken wɛsɩɛ mi de pi na ɓu zɩ̃n mi thĩ:
46009004	Miliinsira aa le mɩra, aa kãn ɓu a ɗiime na a yʋ̃ɔsɛ taasɛ sɩ za wa ba?
46009005	Khɩ̃nɛ bʋ mɩɛ heke na yii hara ki min u mʋ gaga kha baa mɩɛ dãarawɛ kamɩra bʋɔra kɩ bʋ, Adɛyɛ khɩ̃rɩwɩra na Pɩɛrɩra bʋ wa ba?
46009006	Warɩma ĩ ken ma kha mɩɛ na Barɩnabasɩra kpora ki kãn liige na ɓɩɛ a thakuogira ba?
46009007	Ɩ̃ dɛrɩn nuun yãan kha sʋrasikhuo le wa u sʋrasisira na ʋɔ thĩ tigiye ba? Warɩma khuo wɩɛ ʋ tʋɔn u duvɛ̃n haga, ʋ na khɩ̃nɛ na kpɩɛ duvɛ̃nɓise sʋɔ na ɗi wa ba? Warɩma daɗuoro kaadaa ha phisi ʋ daɗuorowira yɩ̃rɩwɛ na yɔ̃ wa ba?
46009008	Sɩɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira dedi, ŋa Moyizi Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra deɗ ɓa si kpuosira waʔ?
46009009	Si gbũu sɛwɛn ma sɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãankpuosira za kha: «Na mu liige na naa mʋ hʋʋgɩra ʋ, hã mʋ vʋ ʋ nʋʋgɩra waʔ.» Ĩ ken ma kha Yekila deɗ ɓa sɩɛ naawɛ kpo kãma za ba?
46009010	Tɩ̃yara za, Moyizira deɗ ɓa sɩɛ aa kpora kãmara za waʔ? Iyo, sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra sɛwɛn ma aa kãma za. Naɗɩɛ wɩɛra kɩ sʋ̃nɛ na wɩɛra kɩ phũu ɗiisira, pɩ bɩɛ kãn ma na khãa kha bɩɛ ɓa ɓu pi niin sɩɛ liigesira za.
46009011	A deɗ ĩ wa Yekila sɩɛsɩra mʋ gaga kha baa nɩra tʋɔgɔ ɗiise hʋʋga za: Na a kha a ɓɩɛ ĩ leke mɩyɛ yʋɔ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha a liin tannɩ ba?
46009012	Na nɩpɛ bʋɔ bʋ na khɩ̃nɛ na ɓu ĩ leke mɩyɛ yʋɔ na ɗi i, aa bʋ na khɩ̃nɛ na tãra bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ wa ba? Ŋa aa ɓɩɛn sɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ za waʔ. Aa bɩɩn ma sɩɛ bɩɛ si le thaaga hã a ɓa barɩ Yesu Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra waʔ.
46009013	Kɛna ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ sɩ wa kha wɛpɩɛ ki le Yekila miliinsira Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za, fɩ pi ɗiimira kure. Wɛpɩɛ kɩ thɔgɩ̃n dakhoronse sokhɛla za, bɩɛ ɓu wa pi niin na kure pɩ thɔgɩ̃nsɩra za.
46009014	Si kpuosira ɩ tɩ̃ na wɛpɩɛ ki de Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, Adɛyɩra hãan ma sɩɛsɛ na deɗ kha: Wɛpɩɛ ki de sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, pɩ kãn ma na ɓu pi ɗinʋʋna sɩɛ za tɩ̃.
46009015	Ŋa mɩɛ, mɩɛ ɓuun foi na kuɗ ɩ̃ɛ heke waʔ, mɩɛ gbũu sɛwɛ ɩ̃ na yɩ̃n ɩ̃ sɩɛ sʋɔ waʔ. Mɩɛ hu, sɩɛ bãa mɩɛ za. Nɩra sii ɓa wɔrɩ zɩ̃n gɩɛ bãanwuoŋira kɩ bʋ mɩɛ heke waʔ.
46009016	Na de sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, sɩɛ bʋ yɩsɩɓɩɛgɛ mɩɛ heke waʔ, mi lonn ma sɩ za faŋa za, ŋa na mi gbũu kɛɩn sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra deɓira, wʋɔgbʋ̃ʋga ɓu wa mɩɛ.
46009017	Na mɩɛ thĩra na ken khon sɩɛ miliinsira, mɩ kha kãn ma na taasɛ sɩ za; ŋa baa faŋa yiin mɩɛ sɩ za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ hʋgan na wɛsɩɛ hãan mɩ kha mi le ɩra.
46009018	Mɩɛ taasɩra kɩ bʋ sʋ̃nɛ kpuose? Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ na de nɩpɛ Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kpasa na bãanwuoŋo, kɛɩ zɩ̃n mɩɩna mɩ kha kãn na zɩ̃n sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra deɓira za.
46009019	Mɩɛ bʋ wa mi thĩ za, ŋa mi liin ma mi thĩ nɩpɛ bɩɛ ɗonron si le thaaga mi ɓu ɓu nɩpɛ gbaangbo na hã Kirisitira.
46009020	Na mɩ nann Yawutuwe khɛrɛ, mi le mi thĩ Yawutu nɩra, si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ ɓu wi; wɛpɛ pi sũnen pi thĩ Moyizi Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za, na mɩ nann bɩɛ heke mi le wa mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ, si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ ɓu wi; kɛna mɩɛ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na Moyizi Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra waʔ.
46009021	Mafɩra tɩ̃, na mɩ nann wɛpɩɛ kɩ tʋ Moyizira Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra waʔ, mi le mi thĩ mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ, si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ ɓu wi. Sɩɛ gbũu ɓɔgɔ kha mɩɛ khon ma mɩɛ kpo na Yekila Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra waʔ, naɗɩɛ mi sũnen ma mi thĩ na makɩ̃n na Kirisitira Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra.
46009022	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ na faŋa khãamɩra za waʔ, na mɩ nann bɩɛ heke mi le wa mi thĩ mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ bʋ na faŋa waʔ; si le thaaga mi ɓu wi. Mafɩra mi bʋ nɩthĩmira bɩɛ heke si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ ɓu bʋɔ pɩ za.
46009023	Mi le wa sɩ bɩɛ Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kãma, si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ ɓu sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kɩ̃rɩgɩra.
46009024	Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ sɩ kha na pi yiin nɩpɛ kha pi horo, bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ za ukpo ki yo le wʋɔrɛ nɩrara na khɛ taasɩra. Laɗa ɩ̃ wɔrɩ horo na ɓu sɩɛ taasɩra, ĩ horo dɩɛ laɗa.
46009025	Lahorodɛrɩwɩra bɩɛ pɛ̃ɩ wa na khɛ vɛnsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ na yiin pi thĩ za. Ŋa taasɩra pɩ ɓa ɓu sɩɛ za, sɩɛ bʋ wa zuonse, ŋa aa horo wa na ɓu taakɛɩzuonse.
46009026	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ horo, mi horo ɗarɩsɛ za waʔ, na mi biɗ lekpuru kha mɩɛ khɩ, mɩ khɩ sarɩmɛ doro waʔ.
46009027	Mɩɛ vɛnɛ wa mɩɛ gbɔɗa, wɛsɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ mɩɛ gbɔɗa sɩɛ doro mɩɛ le waʔ, si le thaaga hã pɩ ɓa le khon zɩɛ mɩɛ kpasa, kɛna mɩɛ deɗ Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra na bʋɔra.
46010001	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, mɩ ɓɩɛ kha ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ sɩ na nann a sekhãgawɩra Moyizira khɩɛra bɛna ɩra. Dadʋ̃raŋa na zɩɛn pɩ bɩɛ wʋɔla ʋ na pɩ bɩɛ sagan lagagborogbʋ̃ɔmamʋŋɩra.
46010002	Si liin ma mʋ gaga kha pɩ bɩɛ na yĩɗ ɓa gɩɛ dadʋ̃raŋɩra na lagagborola za, na hɩɗann nʋʋnɛ kpo na Moyizira.
46010003	Pɩ bɩɛ na ɗiin ma dɩɛ ɗimɩɩkpuola Yekila na hãan mɩ ɩra.
46010004	Pɩ bɩɛ na yʋ̃ɔn ma bɩɛ ãkpuowira Yekila na hãan mɩ ɩra. Bɩɛ ãmɩra kha kure wa bʋrʋgɩra kha thuo wi, Yekila wɔrɩkɩra kãmara za. Gɩɛ bʋrʋgɩra kha bʋ Kirisitira.
46010005	Kɛna gɔmɛ mɩyɛ kha nʋʋ Yekila waʔ, gɩɛ yɩɛn na pɩ waan na huun gbãngbĩriŋira za.
46010006	Ɩɛ mɩyɩra liin ma na hã a ɓɔɓɛ, si le thaaga hã a hɩɗan na gagabɩ̃ɩsɛ mʋ gaga kha pɩ bɛsɩra waʔ.
46010007	Hã ɩ̃ vɩgbũu kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ sɩ̃mɛ mʋ gaga kha baa a sekhãgawɩra bʋɔra liin waʔ. Sɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ kha: «Nɩpɩra hɩɗann ma na ɗiin na yʋ̃ɔrɩ, kɩ arɩn na yãgayãganɩ»
46010008	Hã a yii a thĩ kakarɩliige za mʋ gaga kha baa pɩ bʋɔ liin si, na nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ tigbiire na pɩsãa waan na huun ɗɩyãga kpora za waʔ.
46010009	Hã a zɩɛ ken Kirisitira za waʔ, mʋ gaga kha baa pɩ bʋɔ na liin si na sʋwʋsɛ ɗukĩn mi na khʋʋn mɩ waʔ.
46010010	Hã ĩ ki wũugĩn mʋ gaga kha baa pɩ bʋɔ na liin si na Yekila yɩɛn na ʋ nɩkhʋmɛlɛgɛra ɓa khʋʋn mɩ waʔ.
46010011	Sɩɛ wʋɔgbʋ̃ʋsɩɛ bɩɛ nann mɩ wa na le ɓɔɓɛ a heke; pɩ sɛwɛn ma sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ na ɓu sarɩ a za, naɗɩɛ a yĩmin ma na dunuya zuobɛna.
46010012	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na wɩɛ tʋʋn kha ʋɔ ɓakalɔmɩra kɩ̃ran ma, ʋ dɛyɩra kɔrɩsɩ̃n u thĩ hã ʋ ɓa le khon wa waʔ.
46010013	Zɩɛkemira ĩ ɓuuri, bɩɛ zɩɛkemira thĩna le nan ma nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɩɛ. Yekila bʋ wa nʋʋnɛ kpo nɩra ʋ sɩɛsɩra bɩɛ za. Ʋ ɓa bɩ yɩɛ zɩɛkemira ɓu ĩ na tãra ɩ̃ faŋɩra waʔ; ŋa na zɩɛkemira ɓanbɛna nannɩ, ʋ ɓa hã ɩ̃ faŋa zɩɛkemira wɔrɩ kũn ɩ̃ za, dɩ̃ɩna lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ ɓa wɔrɩ kure pɩ za ɩra.
46010014	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ yɛsɛwɛ, ɩ̃ gɔ ĩ thĩ hã ĩ lon sɩ̃nthɔgɔŋɔ za waʔ.
46010015	Mɩ sɩɛrɛ wa ĩ heke mʋ gaga kha nɩpɛ bãa kɩ tʋ mɩyɛ kɔrɔ; wɛsɩɛ mi de mɩra, ɩ̃ khɛ sɩ na makɩ̃n sɩ na ĩ thĩ.
46010016	Na a kha a yɔ̃ Adɛyɩra mɩyʋ̃ɔna, na thɩɛ Yekila, dɩɛ mɩyʋɔna kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha aa na Kirisitira bʋ wa nʋʋnɛ kpo ʋ tarɩmɩra za waʔ? Bula a kpɩkɩ̃n mɩra, ʋɔ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha aa na Kirisitira bʋ wa nʋʋnɛ kpo ʋ gbɔkhaasɛ za wa?
46010017	Buru ukpo kɩ bʋ; aa na a gɔnlɔmɩra bɩɛ kɛna a bʋ wa gbɔkhaasɛ kpo, naɗɩɛ a bɩɛ bĩnn ma buru ukpo za.
46010018	Ĩ ken Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira lɔmɩra: Wɛpɩɛ kɩ khʋɔ daɗuorowe daɗuorothɔgɔyɔmɛ sokhɛla za, bɩɛ kɩ bʋ nʋʋnɛ kpo na Yekila waʔ? Ʋɔ wɩra bɛrɛ kɩ bʋ daɗuorothɔgɔyɔmɛ sokhɛla.
46010019	Wɛsɩɛ mi deɗ mɩra, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ kha sɩ̃khaasɛ warɩma sɩ̃mɩra thĩra bʋ wa mɩkɩ̃nɛ ba?
46010020	Ɩya, ŋa sɩɛsɩɛ mɩ bʋ ɓɔgɔ mɩra, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha wɛpɛ kɩ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ waʔ, pɩ mɩthɔgɔnyɩra hã Yekila heke waʔ, ŋa gĩrime khɛrɛ pɩ hã ɩ. Mi gbũu kha khɔrɩ kha ɩ̃ hɩɗan na nʋʋkpuore na gĩrimira waʔ.
46010021	Ɩ̃ wɔrɩ yɔ̃ Adɛyɩra (duvɛ̃na) za ki gbũu yɔ̃ gĩrime (duvɛ̃na) za waʔ, ĩ gbũu wɔrɩ ɗi na Adɛyɩra ki gbũu ɗi na gĩrime tɩ̃ waʔ.
46010022	Warɩma a ɓɩɛ wa na arɩga Adɛyɩra zone ba? Ĩ ken ma kha aa wɔrɩkɩra kɩ tãra ʋ bɛgɩra ba?
46010023	Ĩ de ɓa kha: «Mɩɩdɛ bãa nʋʋn wɩɛ ʋ wɔrɩ le ri.» Tɩ̃ya ʋ, ŋa miliinyira bɩɛ bʋ na tɔ̃nɩ waʔ. «Mɩɩdɛ bãa nʋʋn wɩɛ ʋ wɔrɩ le ri», ŋa mɩyɩra bɩɛ wɔrɩ yɩɛ ĩ yo wʋɔrɛ khãamɩra za waʔ.
46010024	Hã nɩra sii ɓɩɛ ʋɔ thĩ tɔ̃nɩ waʔ, ŋa ʋ ɓɩɛ ʋ kãnʋʋnawɛ tɔ̃nɩ.
46010025	Khɩ̃nɛ bʋ ĩ heke na ɗon khaasɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ ki ɗoŋi yawʋgɩra na khʋɔ; hã ɩ̃ bʋ̃ si kurekhɛla waʔ hã sɩ ɓa nʋga ɩ̃ lɔɓidaara waʔ.
46010026	Naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma kha: «Fɔlɔŋɩra na mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ ki kpoloŋira za, ɩ bɩɛ bʋ wa Adɛyɩra bɛyɛ.»
46010027	Na nɩra yɩɗ ɩ̃ ɗikhɛrɛ za, kɛna ʋ dɛyɩra bʋ khãadaa waʔ, na ɩ̃ bɩɩn ʋ yɩɗa, ɗimɩɩnɛ bãa u yo hãan ɩ̃, ĩ ɗɩ ri kɛɩ bʋ̃ ti kurekhɛla, hã sɩ ɓa nʋga ɩ̃ lɔɓidaara waʔ.
46010028	Ŋa na nɩra deɗ ĩ kha: «Khaasɩɛ bʋ wa sɩ̃nkhaasɛ», dɩɛ bɛna hã ɩ̃ khʋɔ sɩ waʔ, naɗɩɛ na ɩ̃ khʋɔn sɩ ɩ̃ ɓa asɩ wa ʋ dɛyɩra gagasɩra.
46010029	Mi de si ɩ̃ lɔɓidaara kãma waʔ dɛ, ŋa wɩɛra deɗ si, ʋɔ lɔɓidaara kãma za. «Ŋa bena nɩkpasa kɩ ɓa zarɩgɩ̃n mɩɛ mi ɗimɩɩna za kɛna wɛsɛ bãa nʋʋn mɩɛ, mɩ wɔrɩ le si wa?
46010030	Mɩɩdɛ za mɩ thɩɛ Yekire, bena nɩra zarɩgɩ̃n mɩ dɩɛ ɗimɩɩna kãmara za mɩ thɩɛ Yekila ki ɗi ri?»
46010031	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, na ĩ ɗi wa mɩɩnɛ ba, warɩma na yɔ̃ ba, warɩma mɩɩdɛ bãa ĩ le, ĩ le si Yekila gbɩ̃nɛsɛ kãma.
46010032	Yawutuwe ɩ ba, Gɩrɛkɩwɛ ɩ ba, warɩma kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ ɩ ba, hã ĩ le na lon nɩra sii za waʔ.
46010033	Ĩ ken mɩɛ lelɔmɩra na thuo bɩɛ, mɩ pɛ̃ɩn ma ki le mɩ mɩyɛ nʋʋ nɩpɛ bɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ za; mɩ ɓɩɛ mi thĩ kɩ̃rɩga waʔ, ŋa nɩgɔmɛ dagamu mɩ ɓɩɛ, si le thaaga pi ɓu zɩ̃mɛ.
46011001	Ĩ thuo mɩɛ lelɔmɩra mʋ gaga baa mi thuon Kirisitira lelɔmɩra ɩra.
46011002	Mɩ thɩɛ ɩ̃ naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na mɩɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna mɩyɩra bɩɛ mɩ karɩ̃n ɩ̃, ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀n ma na ɩ bɩɛ mʋ gaga kha baa mɩ ɓɔgɔn ɩ ɩra.
46011003	Ŋa mɩɩnɛ tikpo bʋ mɩ ɓɩɛ kha ɩ̃ tʋ dɩɛ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha khuowe bɩɛ thadɛyɩra kɩ bʋ Kirisitira, hara thadɛyɩra kɩ bʋ u khuora, na Kirisitira thadɛyɩra liin Yekila.
46011004	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na khuo wɩɛ bãa kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila, warɩma na Yekila yiin sɩɛsɛ wɩɛ bãa nʋʋga za kha u de nɩpɛ sɩ, na u le si kɛna gbãfɩla bʋ ʋ thaagɩra za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra gbɩ̃nɛn ʋ thadɛyɩra waʔ.
46011005	Ŋa na hara zɩɛn ʋ thaaga kɛɩ baka bɛna ʋ yɩ̃n Yekila, warɩma na Yekila yiin sɩɛsɛ ʋ nʋʋga za kha u de nɩpɛ sɩ, u gbɩ̃nɛn u khuora kɩ bʋ ʋ thadɛyɩra waʔ; ʋɔ hala khɩɛgɩ̃n ma na hara wɩɛ u nunn ʋ thaagɩra ɩra.
46011006	Na hara wɩɛ bãa baka ʋ thaagɩra waʔ, ʋ kãn ma na khuu u thayĩnsira! Ŋa baa na hara khuun u thayĩnse warɩma na u nunn ʋ thaaga, sɩ bʋ wa nɩɩsɛ, gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ʋ kãn ma kɩ baka ʋ thaagɩra.
46011007	Khuo ʋɔ, ʋ kãn na baka ʋ thaagɩra bɛna ʋ yɩ̃n Yekila waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila liir u wa na ʋ khɩɛgɩ̃n na ʋɔ thĩra, ʋɔ kɩ ɓɔgɔ Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra. Ŋa hala ʋɔ, ʋɔ ɓɔgɔ wa khuora ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra.
46011008	Naɗɩɛ baa Yekila kha le khuo na hara, khuora kuɗ hala za waʔ, ŋa hala kuɗ khuora za.
46011009	Khuo liin hara kãma waʔ, ŋa hara liin khuo kãma.
46011010	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɛlɛgɛwɛ kãma hara kãn ma na kɩ baka ʋ thaagɩra na ɓɔgɔ u khuora thadɛrɩsɩra.
46011011	Kɛna sɩɛ bɩɛ za, aa wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ nʋkpuola Adɛyɩra za, a kãn ma na tʋ kha na khuo bʋ waʔ, hara wɔrɩ le foi waʔ, khuo wɔrɩ le foi tɩ̃ na hara bʋ waʔ.
46011012	Naɗɩɛ khuora na hala lebɛna, hara kuɗ ɓa khuo za; ɩra wɩɛ, khuora kuɗ ɓa hara za. Yekila u liin sɩɛ bɩɛ.
46011013	Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra ken si, sɩ makɩ̃n hara zɩɛ ʋ thaaga kɛɩ baka bɛna ʋ yɩ̃n Yekila egilizira za ba?
46011014	Na makɩ̃n na lɔmɩra za khuora liiri, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha na khuo zɩɛn ʋ thayĩnsira na sɩ sʋ̃ranɩ, sɩ bʋ wa nɩ́ɩsɛ́ ʋ za.
46011015	Kɛna hara heke, sɩɛ bʋ wa wɔzagarɛ. Yekila hãan ma hara thayĩnsʋ̃rʋsɛ, sɩɛ le ʋ thasikira.
46011016	Ŋa na wɩɛ bʋ ɓɩɛ na bakɩ̃n ɩɛ mɩyɩra, ʋ kãn na tʋ kha nɩɩrɛlɔmɛ bʋɔ bʋ aa na egilizi ɓiiwe sʋgʋmʋra za na tãra wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ ɓɔgɔn mɩra dʋ̃waʔ.
46011017	Ɩra wɩɛ, wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓɩɛ na de ĩ ɩra, sɩɛ bʋ ɩ̃ yɩsɩnʋʋmɩyɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha na ĩ bĩŋinn kamɛ, ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wɔyuogo waʔ, fɔ na gbũu kpɩ̃ra.
46011018	Lʋgʋ bɛsɩra kɩ bʋ kha mi nuun ma kha na ĩ bĩŋinn kamɛ, ɩ̃ bɛn tikpo za waʔ, fɔ ɩ̃ kpɩkɩ̃n ma, mɩɛ gbũu khãa ma sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra za kha sɩ wɔrɩ le wa tɩ̃ya.
46011019	Fɔ kpɩkɩ̃ŋa naa lon ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za sɩɛ le thaaga wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ khãadɛkɩ̃rɩwɩra bɩɛ tʋ na khoŋĩn na bʋɔra.
46011020	Na ĩ bĩŋinn kamɛ, Adɛyɩra kʋɔgɩ̃mɛ ɗiimira ĩ ɗi waʔ.
46011021	Naɗɩɛ na ĩ bĩŋinn kamɛ zuori kha ĩ ɗi, ɩ̃ bɩɛ kɩ phaŋĩn ma ki ɗi ĩ thĩ ɗiise, bʋɔra hɩɗan khʋ̃mʋŋa kɛna bʋɔra yʋ̃ɔn ma na hĩiri.
46011022	Ɩ̃ gbɛ̃ɩnyɩra bʋ ĩ heke, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ ɗi na yɔ̃ ni wa ba? Warɩma ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wa na zene Yekila egilizira ba? Warɩma na zene wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ na foira wa ba? Bɩra ɩ̃ tɩɛ kha mɩɛ ɓa de ĩ? Ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wa kha mɩ yɩ ɩ̃ yɩsɩnʋʋga ba? Ɩya, mɩɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ yɩ ɩ̃ yɩsɩnʋʋga kũu waʔ!
46011023	Ɩra wɩɛ karɩ̃na mi ɓuun Adɛyɩra heke, na hãr ɩ̃, ʋɔ wɩra: Ɗɩyãga dawogira pi yiin Adɛyɛ Yesu ʋ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra lesira za, na ʋ khɩɛn buru
46011024	Baa ʋ thɩɛn Yekila zuori, na u kpekĩn u ki deɗ kha: «Mɩɛ gbɔɗɛ dɩɛ, tɩ hãan ma ɩ̃ɛ. Ĩ le sɩɛ na kɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n na mɩɛ.»
46011025	Mafɩra ʋ khɩɛn mɩyʋ̃ɔnɛ duvɛ̃na ɗiime kpɩ̃rara za na deɗ kha: «Mɩyʋ̃ɔdɛ kɩ bʋ nʋhãafɛŋɩra Yekila bʋ khɛ na nɩpɩra mɩ tarɩmɩra wɔrɩkɩra za. Na ɩ̃ kha ɩ̃ yɔ̃ dɩɛ mɩyʋ̃ɔna bɛndɛ bãa, ĩ le sɩɛ na kʋɔgɩ̃n dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ.»
46011026	Naɗɩɛ bãanɛ tʋɔ bãanɛ na ɩ̃ khʋɔn ʋɔ buru wɩɛ na yʋ̃ɔ dɩɛ mɩyʋ̃ɔndɩɛ za, ĩ ki de ɓa Adɛyɩra huumira ɓanu kha u gbũun ɓannɩ.
46011027	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na wɩɛ bãa khʋɔn buru wɩɛ, na yʋ̃ɔn ʋ mɩyʋ̃ɔna za kɛna ʋ kha kãn sɩ waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra liin ma Adɛyɩra gbɔɗa na ʋ tarɩmɩra sɩ̃mɩsɛ.
46011028	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ bɩɛ kãn ma na bʋ̃ ĩ thĩ zo, kɩ tʋ khʋɔ ʋɔ bula kɩ tʋ yɔ̃ ʋɔ duvɛ̃na za.
46011029	Bʋɔtɛ na wɩɛ bãa khʋɔn ʋɔ burula kɩ yʋ̃ɔn mɩyʋ̃ɔna kɛɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n na Adɛyɩra, ʋ dɛyɩra bʋ yan ma kiti na yiin u thĩ za.
46011030	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na gɔmɛ liin ɓoɗipe na bʋɔra liin nɩdɩ̃ŋaramɛ, na gɔmɛ huugini.
46011031	Na a nisĩnn bʋ̃ɗ a thĩ, Yekila kitira waʔ a za dʋ̃waʔ.
46011032	Ŋa Adɛyɩra kiti a wa na kori a si le thaaga hã a lon kitira za na dunuya nɩpɩra kpuore dʋ̃waʔ.
46011033	Na si liin mafɩra mɩ yaɓiiwe, na ɩ̃ ɓa bĩŋinn kha ɩ̃ɛ ɗi Adɛyɩra ɗiimira, ɩ̃ tɩɛ kamɛ.
46011034	Na khʋ̃mʋŋa khʋ wɩɛ bãa u nisĩn ɗi ʋ gbɛ̃ɩna ni zo, si le thaaga na ĩ bĩŋeni, hã ɩ̃ ɓa yan Yekila kitira na yii u ĩ thĩ za waʔ. Ɩ̃ bʋ̃kɩ̃nsɩra sʋɔra, na mɩ ɓa nann ɩ̃ khɛrɛ ni mɩ ɓa ɔfɔ si gbusira.
46012001	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã nɩpɩra pi le Yekila miliinsira, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha ɩ̃ tʋ ɩɛ mɩyɩra na yɛsɩ̃n ɩ za.
46012002	Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ kha bɛna ɩ̃ kha bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ waʔ, sɩ̃mɩyɛ kha yan yan ɩ̃, kɛna sɩ̃mɩra wɔrɩ sɩɛrɛ thĩra waʔ.
46012003	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mi de ĩ si kha: Na nɩra bʋ na Yekila Nina, ʋ bɩ de kha: « Yesura daŋan ma waʔ», dɩ̃ɩna nɩra sii wɔrɩ de tɩ̃ kha: «Yesura kɩ bʋ Adɛyɩra», kɛna Ninyɛgɛmɔra bʋ ʋ za waʔ.
46012004	Mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã nɩthɩ̃rɩgara ʋ wɔrɩ le Yekila miliinsira, ɩɛ mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra thĩnyira gɔn ma, ŋa i kure wa Ninyɛgɛmɔra kpuola heke.
46012005	Miliinsira ʋ hã, si thĩnyira gɔn ma, ŋa si liigesira bɩɛ le wa na hã ʋɔ Adɛyɛ kpuola.
46012006	Miliinlɔmɩra thĩnyira gɔn, ŋa Yekila kpuola kɩ hã ɩ mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra na nɩpɩra bɩɛ.
46012007	Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã wa mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra yʋɔ na kiretɩ̃ɛmɛ kpo kpora bɩɛ, si le thaaga sɩ dɛnfɛ kiretɩ̃ɛmɩra bʋɔra bɩɛ.
46012008	Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã ʋɔ wʋɔmɛ sɩɛsɛ, kɩ hã ʋɔra tʋʋmɛ sɩɛsɛ. Ʋɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kpuola kɩ hã sɩɛ bɩɛ.
46012009	Ʋɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kpuola hã ʋɔ khãamɛ pɩ gbɩ̃, kɩ hã ʋɔ mɩyãangɩ̃ranɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ kɩ bãarɛ ɓoɗipe.
46012010	Ʋɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kpuola hã ʋɔ mɩyãangɩ̃ranɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ ki le bamʋŋa mɩyɛ, kɩ hã ʋɔra mɩyãangɩ̃ranɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ ki de nɩpɛ sɩɛsɩra Yekila yiin ʋ nʋʋgɩra za kha u de si, kɩ hã ʋɔ mɩyãangɩ̃ranɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ kɩ tʋ kɩ kpɩkɩ̃n Ninkɩ̃rɩwɛ na Ninbɩ̃ɩwɛ. Kɩ hã ʋɔ mɩyãangɩ̃ranɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ kɩ sɩɛrɛ thĩnkpasɩyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, kɩ hã ʋɔ mɩyãangɩ̃ranɛ ʋɔ wɔrɩ tʋ sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra kɔla na vɩkɩ̃n sɩ.
46012011	Ʋɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kpokpuora ki le sɩɛ bɩɛ na si miliinlɔmɩra thĩnye thĩnyira na nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpo kpora mʋ gaga kha baa ʋ khɔrɩ.
46012012	Nɩthɩ̃rɩga gbɔɗa bʋ wa tikpo, ŋa khaayɩra gɔn ma. Gbɔɗa na tɩ khaayɩra gɔmɩra bɩɛ; ɩ bɩɛ bʋ wa gbɔɗɛ tikpo, aa wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Kirisitira nɩpɩra mafɩra a bʋ tɩ̃.
46012013	Aa wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yawutuwe warɩma Yawutuwe waʔ, ɗome warɩma hɔrɔmɛ, a bɩɛ yĩɗ ɓa ʋɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kpuola za na liin gbɔɗɛ tikpo; a bɩɛ gbũun ɓuun ma ʋɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kpuola.
46012014	Gbɔɗɛ bʋ khaarɛ kpo waʔ, tɩ khaayɩra gɔn ma.
46012015	Na ɗɩɛgɛ kha de ɓa kha: «Baa mɩɛ liin leke waʔ, mɩɛ bʋ gbɔɗa khaarɛ dʋɔ waʔ», sɩɛ wɔrɩ yɩɛ ɗɩɛgɛ yɩɛ kɛɩ hɩɗan gbɔɗa khaarɛ dʋɔ ba?
46012016	Na numire kha de ɓa kha: «Baa mɩɛ liin yiwure waʔ, mɩɛ niin bʋ gbɔɗa za waʔ», sɩɛ wɔrɩ yɩɛ numire yɩɛ kɛɩ hɩɗan gbɔɗa khaarɛ dʋɔ ba?
46012017	Na nɩthɩ̃rɩga gbɔɗa bɩɛ kha bʋ wa yiwure doro, mʋsɛ sii tɩ kha wɔrɩ le ki nu? Warɩma na nɩthɩ̃rɩga gbɔɗa bɩɛ kha bʋ wa numire doro, mʋsɛ sii tɩ kha wɔrɩ le ki nu nuugo?
46012018	Tɩ̃yara za, Yekila yiin ma gbɔɗa khaayɩra bɩɛ mʋ gaga kha baa ʋɔ thĩra khɔrɩ.
46012019	Na gbɔɗa bɩɛ na liin ma khaarɛ tikpo, mʋsɛ sii tɩ naa wɔrɩ le gbɔɗɛ na yo?
46012020	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na gbɔɗɛ khaayɩra gɔnnɩ, ŋa gbɔɗɛ tikpo i.
46012021	Mʋsɛ yiwure wɔrɩ le ki de leke kha: «Mɩɛ nʋʋga bʋ mʋ za waʔ!» Mʋsɛ thaaga wɔrɩ le ki de ɗɩɛsɛ kha: «Mɩɛ nʋʋga bʋ ɩ̃ɛ za waʔ!»
46012022	Gbɔɗa khaayɩra kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le faŋɩra, ɩɛ za a vɛn gbaangbora.
46012023	Gbɔɗa khaayɩra a ken kha ɩ bãa yʋɔra ʋ waʔ, ɩɛ a kɔrɩsɩ̃n gbaangbora kɩ tãra yʋɔra. Gbɔɗa khaayɩra a guure, ɩɛ a bãarɛ yʋɔra za.
46012024	Gbɔɗa khaayɩra a guure waʔ, a kʋɔgɩ̃n dɩ̃ɩna ɩɛ waʔ. Gbɔɗa khaayɩra yʋɔra a ken kha ɩɛ bãa yʋɔra za waʔ, ɩɛ Yekila liiri kharɩkpakpaʔɩra.
46012025	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na kpɩkɩ̃ŋa bʋ gbɔɗa ʋ waʔ, ŋa gbɔɗa khaayɩra bɩɛ dɛnfɛ wa kamɛ.
46012026	Gbɔɗɛ khaayɩra za, na khaarɛ nʋn dʋɔ, khaayɛ yʋɔra bɩɛ vɛn ma dʋɔra kãma, na khaarɛ dʋɔ ɓuun gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, khaayɛ yʋɔra bɩɛ kɩ yãgayãga wa na dɩɛ.
46012027	Kɛna ɩ̃ bʋ wa Kirisitira gbɔɗa, ɩ̃ bɩɛ gbũu bʋ wa dɩɛ gbɔɗɩɛ khaayɛ yʋɔ.
46012028	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Yekila nisĩnn yiin Yesura dãarawɛ egilizira za, na Yekire Yãdedɛwɛ thuon bɩɛ, na bãnɩsãa bɛwɩra liin karɩ̃ndɛwɛ, na bamʋŋa ledɛwɛ thuon bɩɛ, na wɛpɩɛ kɩ wɔrɩ bãarɛ ɓoɗipe na bɩɛ thuori, na wɛpɩɛ ɓuun mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɛ na wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ bʋɔra, warɩma wɔzɩɛdɛwɛ, warɩma na sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za.
46012029	Pɩ bɩɛ kɩ wɔrɩ le dãarawɛ warɩma yãdedɛwɛ waʔ, warɩma karɩ̃ndɛwɛ waʔ. Wɔrɩkɔ gbũun hãan pɩ bɩɛ kha pi le bamʋŋa mɩyɛ waʔ,
46012030	warɩma na bãarɛ ɓoɗipe, warɩma na sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ waʔ, warɩma na vɩkɩ̃n sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra kɔrɩwɩra waʔ.
46012031	Mɩyɩra Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã, wɛʔɛ kɩ bʋ mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra, ɩ̃ khɔrɩ ɩɛ na tãra yʋɔra. Wɛɗɛ kɩ tãra yʋɔra bɩɛ, mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ dɩɛ.
46013001	Harɩ na mɩɛ kha de ɓa dunuya nɩpɩra bɩɛ sɩɛsɩra na mɛlɛgɛwɛ sɩɛsɩra, kɛna khɔrɩmɛ bʋ mɩ za waʔ, mɩɛ bʋ foi waʔ, mɩ hɩɗan ma dɩɛ bɛna mʋ gaga kha baa pɩ khɩ khɩ̃ɩga warɩma mʋ gaga kha baa nɩra khɩ bɔɩ ɩra.
46013002	Harɩ na mɩɛ ɓuun ma Yekila mɩyãangɩ̃ranɛ kɩ khɛ ʋ sɩɛsɩra ki de nɩpɛ sɩ, harɩ na mi ɓuun ma tʋʋmɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ na tʋʋn miguorenyira bɩɛ, harɩ na khãamɛ bʋ mɩɛ heke na wɔrɩ phugi ɓɩɛsɛ, kɛna mɩ bʋ na khɔrɩmɛ waʔ, mɩɛ bʋ foi waʔ.
46013003	Harɩ na mɩ khɩɛn mi leke mɩyɩra bɩɛ na hãan bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ ɩ, kɩ hãan mɩ gbɔɗa kha ti so, kɛna khɔrɩmɛ bʋ mɩ za waʔ, sɩ kɩ̃ra mɩ foi waʔ.
46013004	Wɩɛ kɩ bʋ na khɔrɩmɛ, sɔmɩra na mɩkɩ̃rɩliige bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za, zone bʋ ʋ dɛyɩra za waʔ, ʋ dɛyɩra ɓɔgɔ u thĩ waʔ, yɩsɩɓɩɛgɛ bʋ ʋ dɛyɩra za waʔ,
46013005	wɩɛ kɩ bʋ na khɔrɩmɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra le nɩɩlamɩyɛ waʔ, ʋ dɛyɩra ɓɩɛ u thĩ tɔ̃nɩ waʔ, u don vivi waʔ, na nɩra liir u mɩbɩ̃yɛ u ken sɩɛ sʋɔ waʔ;
46013006	na khɔrɩmɛ bʋ wɩɛ bãa za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra nu mɩkɛɩtelenyenye na yãgayãga ɩɛ za waʔ. Na mɩtelenyenye i, ʋ yãgayãga ɩɛ za.
46013007	Na khɔrɩmɛ bʋ wɩɛ bãa za, ʋ yafa wa mɩyɛ za, khãamɛ bʋ u heke mɩyɛ bɩɛ za, ʋ khãagɩ̃n ma mɩyɛ bɩɛ za, ʋ bɩ mɩyɩra bɩɛ kũn ʋ za.
46013008	Khɔrɩmɛ zuo kũu waʔ, Yekila mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra ʋ hãan kha pɩ khɛ ʋ sɩɛsɩra ki de nɩpɛ sɩ, ɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa zuo gɔɗɩyãga gʋɔ. Na sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, sɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa zuo. Tʋʋmɩra ɓa zuo tɩ̃.
46013009	Naɗɩɛ a ɓuun tʋʋmɩra bɩɛ waʔ. Sɩɛsɩra a ɓu Yekila heke na hã nɩpɩra sɩ, a tʋʋn sɩɛ bɩɛ thon waʔ.
46013010	Ŋa a ɓa ɓu si hĩinsira, wɛsɩɛ sɩ na hĩin waʔ, gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra sɩɛ ɓa tũri.
46013011	Baa mɩɛ kha bʋ ɓikɛyɛ, mɩ kha sɩɛrɛ wa mʋ gaga kha ɓikɛyɛ, mɩ kha gaga wa mʋ gaga kha ɓikɛyɛ, mɩ kha ken ma mɩyɩra mʋ gaga kha ɓikɛyɛ. Ŋa baa mɩ ɓa khãɗ zuori, na mɩ zɩɛn ɩɛ ɓikɛrɩmɩyɩra bɩɛ.
46013012	Ɩra wɩɛ a wɔrɩ yã wa kɩrɩ thĩ Yekila mɩyɩra na tʋ ɩ kɔrɩwɩra, sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha baa nɩra ken mɩɩnɛ dʋgalen za, ʋ wɔrɩ yã tɩ bɩɛ na kɩ̃ra waʔ. Ŋa gɔdɩyãga gʋɔ ɓa nan, mɩ ɓa tʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ na yɛsɩ̃n ɩ za mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila tʋʋn mɩ ɩra.
46013013	Mɩyɛ ɩsãa kɩ bʋ, ɩɛ wɔrɩ tãra kũu waʔ: Ɩɛ kɩ bʋ khãamɛ, na laŋa, na khɔrɩmɛ; ŋa ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ sãara bɩɛ kpakpaɗa kɩ bʋ khɔrɩmɩra.
46014001	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na ɓɩɛ khɔrɩmɛ zo. Mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã, ɩ̃ khɔrɩ ɩɛ tɩ̃, wɛtɩɛ thĩra Yekila hã ɩ̃ kũura, ɩ̃ khɛ ʋ sɩɛsɩra na de nɩpɛ sɩ ɩra.
46014002	Wɩɛ kɩ sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra sɩɛrɛ na nɩpɛ waʔ, ŋa ʋ sɩɛrɛ wa na Yekila, naɗɩɛ nɩra wɔrɩ tʋ mɩɩna u de waʔ. Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za u de Yekila tɩ̃ya gũni mɩyɛ.
46014003	Ŋa wɩɛ ki ɓu sɩɛsɛ Yekila heke na khɛ de si, ʋɔ dɛyɩra sɩɛrɛ wa nɩpɛ heke pɩ khãamɩra wɔrɩ yo wʋɔrɛ, na hã wɩ haɓɛ, ki wuore pɩ bãanyɩra.
46014004	Ŋa wɩɛra kɩ sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɩra za, sɩɛ dɛnfɛ wa ʋɔ kpora, kɛna wɩɛra ki ɓu sɩɛsɛ Yekila khɛrɛ na khɛ de nɩpɛ sɩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra yɩɛ wa egilizi nɩpɩra bɩɛ yo wʋɔrɛ khãamɩra za.
46014005	Mɩ khɔrɩ wa kha ɩ̃ bɩɛ sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, ŋa wɛsɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ mɩɛ gbaangbora, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ bɩɛ wɔrɩ ɓu sɩɛsɛ Yekila heke na khɛ de si. Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ ki ɓu sɩɛsɛ Yekila heke na khɛ de si, ʋɔ bɛsɛ tãra wɩɛ kɩ sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɩra za. Fɔ na sɩɛrɛ thaasɩra vɩkɩ̃ndaa bʋ wa bʋ na vɩkɩ̃n sɩ, sɩ wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ egilizi nɩpɩra bɩɛ.
46014006	Ɩra wɩɛ mɩ yaɓiiwe, na mi yuon ĩ heke na yo kɩ sɩɛrɛ ɩ̃ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, bɩra tɔ̃nɩ sɩ hã ɩ̃ɛ? Fɔ na Yekila ɓɔgɔn mɩ sɩɛsɛ na mi deɗ ĩ si, warɩma na mɩ sɩɛrɛn ɩ̃ khɛrɛ na makɩ̃nn na tʋʋmɩra Yekila hãan mɩ, warɩma na Yekila yiin sɩɛsɛ mɩ nʋʋga na mi de nɩpɛ sɩ, warɩma na karɩ̃n nɩpɛ.
46014007	Harɩ hagazandaasɛ mʋ gaga kha tɩɩrɛ, warɩma koronzo, na sɩ kʋ̃mɩra yɛɗ waʔ, ãna kɩ wɔrɩ tʋ mɩɩna si de?
46014008	Si kpuosira i na datʋ̃na pi le tɩɩrɛ khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdɛwɩra kure, na tɩ tɩɩrɛ daara tɩɩrɛ rɩ kɩ kɩ̃ra waʔ, khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdaa ʋ̃na kɩ ɓa arɩ na ɔfɔ u thĩ kha ʋɔ yo wa khɛ̃ɩgɛ za?
46014009	Mafɩra sɩ bʋ tɩ̃ na ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za; na sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra yɛɗ waʔ, mʋsɛ nɩra le kɩ wɔrɩ tʋ sɩ kɔla? Na sɩ yɛɗ waʔ, sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha ɩ̃ bʋ sɩɛrɛ wa na sarɩmɛ doro!
46014010	Sɩɛrɛ thĩnse gɔn dunuyara za, ŋa sɩ bɩɛ za sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ laɗ kɔrɔ yãan waʔ.
46014011	Na nɩra ʋɔ bu de thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ kɛna mɩ tʋ sɩ kɔrɩwɩra waʔ, dɛyɩra ki de si, ʋ ɓa hɩɗan ma mi heke mʋ gaga kha khɩ̃ra, mɩɛ le si dedaara heke mʋ gaga kha khɩ̃ra tɩ̃.
46014012	Baa ɩ̃ khɔrɩ Ninyɛgɛmɔra mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra na ɩ̃ gagasɩra bɩɛ, ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ ɩ gbaangbo wɛʔɩɛ kɩ wɔrɩ yɩɛ egilizira wɔrɩ yo wʋɔrɛ kũura.
46014013	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, wɩɛ kɩ sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na yɩ̃n Yekila ʋ hã ʋ sɩ vɩkɩ̃mɛ wɔrɩkɩra.
46014014	Na mɩɛ yɩ̃n ma Yekila thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, mi nina bʋ wa yɩ̃mɩra za, ŋa mɩɛ thĩra tʋ mɩɩna mi bu de waʔ.
46014015	Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra bɩra mɩ wɔrɩ le? Mɩ wɔrɩ yɩ̃n Yekila na thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ, ŋa mɩ kãn ma na yɩ̃n ʋ tɩ̃ na sɩɛsɩra bʋɔra nu ɩra. Mɩ wɔrɩ tɩ̃nɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila na thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ, ŋa mɩ kãn ma na tɩ̃nɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila na sɩɛsɩra nɩpɩra bʋɔra nu tɩ̃ ɩra.
46014016	Naɗɩɛ na mʋ thɩɛ Yekila thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ doro za Ninyɛgɛmʋra wɔrɩkɩra za, wɩɛra hɩɗan ki nuure nɩgbokira za, mʋsɛ sii ʋ ɓa wɔrɩ le ki de kha « Amiina» kɛna ʋ tʋʋn mɩɩna mʋ thɩɛn Yekila na deɗ waʔ?
46014017	Harɩ na mu Yekire thɩɛkɩra kɩ̃ran ma mʋsɛ, wɩɛra ki nuure mu ʋɔ ɓuun foi bʋ waʔ.
46014018	Mɩ thɩɛ wa Yekila naɗɩɛ baa mɩɛ sɩɛrɛ wa thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za kɩ tãra ɩ̃ bɩɛ ɩra.
46014019	Ŋa na mɩ bʋ bĩŋinkhɛrɛ za egilizi za, harɩ na daɓiye ɩwãa mi deɗ na hã nɩpɛ ɓɔɓɛ, sɩɛ nʋʋ mɩɛ na tãra baa mi de daɓiye kpɩɛwɛ gbũne thĩmaansɩɛsɛ za nɩpɛ tʋ waʔ ɩra.
46014020	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, hã ɩ̃ kɩ gaga mʋ gaga kha ɓikɛrɩwɛ waʔ; na mɩbɩ̃yɛ ɩ, ɩ̃ kɩ sɩɛrɛ mʋ gaga kha ɓikɛrɩwɛ. Ŋa wʋɔmɩra gɛŋɩra gɩɛ, ĩ le mʋ gaga kha nɩkhãgawɛ.
46014021	Yekila deɗ ɓa ʋ sɛwʋra za kha: «Mɩ ɓa sɩɛrɛ wa nɩpɩɛ heke thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, mɩ ɓa sɩɛrɛ wɩ wa na khɩ̃ra nʋʋga. Sɩɛ bɩɛ za bere kɛna pɩ ɓa ɓɩɛ kha bɩɛ nuure mi waʔ.»
46014022	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na nɩra bʋ sɩɛrɛ thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ za, wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ waʔ, sɩɛ bʋ wa bamʋŋa mɩyɛ pi heke; ŋa sɩ bʋ bamʋŋa mɩyɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ heke waʔ. Na nɩra ɓuun sɩɛsɛ Yekila heke ki de si, sɩɛ bʋ wa bamʋŋa mɩyɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ heke, ŋa sɩ bʋ bamʋŋa mɩyɛ kɛɩkhãadɛwɛ heke waʔ.
46014023	Na si liin mʋ gaga kha egilizi nɩpɛ bɩɛ biŋinn ki ki de thĩmaanyɛ sɩɛsɛ doro: Wɛpɩɛ ki nuure warɩma wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra waʔ na bɩɛ lonn dɩɛ biŋinkhɛla za, pɩ ɓa de ɓa kha: «Ɩ̃ bʋ wa phʋ̃rʋwɛ.»
46014024	Ŋa na pɩ bɩɛ liin ma nɩpɛ Yekila hãan sɩɛsɛ kha pi de nɩpɛ sɩ, na nɩkpasa lonn warɩma na wɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛra waʔ, na ʋɔ lonni, ʋ ɓa tʋ kha ʋɔ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa, naɗɩɛ wɛsɩɛ u nuun na pi de mɩra ɩra. Wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ u nuuri, sɩɛ kɩ ɓa kiti u.
46014025	Gagasɩra guren u kpoloŋira za, sɩɛ ɓa kure wa gbɛ̃ɩgɛ za. Dɩɛ bɛna ʋ ɓa ɓa ɓa huruse na ɓaɗɛ wʋɔla fɔlɔŋɔ za na gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila na de kha: «Tɩ̃yara za Yekila bʋ wa na ɩ̃ɛ!»
46014026	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, bɩra a kãn le? Wɛsɩɛ ɩ̃ kãn na le bɛna ĩ bĩŋinn kamɛ, na Yekila gbɩ̃nɛ tɩ̃ŋa bʋ ʋɔ heke, ʋɔ dɛyɩra tɩ̃nɛ gɩɛ, na sɩɛsɛ bʋ ʋɔ heke na karɩ̃n bʋɔra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra de sɩɛ, na Yekila ɓɔgɔn ʋɔ mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓɔgɔ bʋɔra dɩɛ, na Yekila hãan ʋɔ wɔrɩkɔ kha u de thĩmaansɩɛsɛ, u de si, na ʋɔ wɔrɩ vɩkɩ̃n sɩɛ thĩmaansɩɛsɩra ʋ vɩkɩ̃n sɩ. Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ kãn ma na le na dɛnfɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra pɩ wɔrɩ yo wʋɔrɛ.
46014027	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ sɩɛrɛ thĩmaansɩɛsɩra za, hã pɩ tãra nɩpɛ pɩyɔ̃ warɩma pɩsãa waʔ. Na pɩ kha pɩ sɩɛrɛ tɩ̃, pɩ sɩɛrɛ kɩ hã kamɛ, kɩ yɩɛ sɩ vɩkɩ̃ndaa ɓu na vɩkɩ̃n sɩ na ɓɔgɔ sɩ kɔla.
46014028	Na nɩra gbũu ɓuun sɩ za na vɩkɩ̃nn sɩ waʔ, si dedɛyɩra gbaa si deɓira nɩpɛ sʋgʋmʋra ʋ. Ʋ dɛyɩra de si u thĩ za, ʋɔ na Yekila doro tɩɛ.
46014029	Wɛpɩɛ ki ɓu sɩɛsɩra Yekila heke na de nɩpɩra sɩ, pɩ kãn tãra nɩpɛ pɩyɔ̃ warɩma nɩpɛ pɩsãa waʔ, kɩ yɩɛ bʋɔra kɩ kɔrɩsɩ̃n wɛsɩɛ pi de ɩra.
46014030	Ŋa, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ biŋinni, na Yekila hãan ʋɔ mɩɓɔgɔyɔnɛ, wɩɛra kha sɩɛrɛ, ʋɔ kãn ma na fĩi.
46014031	Na Yekila yiin sɩɛsɛ ɩ̃ bɩɛ nʋʋsɛ za kha ĩ de si, ɩ̃ bɩɛ wɔrɩ de si kpo kpo na hã kamɛ si le thaaga na ɓɔ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ pi yo wʋɔrɛ.
46014032	Wɛpɩɛ ki de sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra, mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra hãan mɩ, pɩ kãn ma na hɩɗan ɩɛ mɩyãangɩ̃ranyɩra thadɛrɩwɛ.
46014033	Naɗɩɛ Yekila bʋ mɩyɛ buruguburugu ledaa waʔ, ŋa ʋ bʋ wa Yekire wɩɛ ki le wɔyĩmɩyɛ, mʋ gaga kha baa si le kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ egiliziwe bɩɛ za ɩra.
46014034	Na hapɛ bʋ bĩŋinkhɛla za, pɩ kãn ma na fĩi. Khɩ̃nɛ bʋ pi heke na sɩɛrɛ waʔ. Mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra deɗ si, kha pɩ kãn ma na sũne pi thĩ.
46014035	Na pɩ ɓɩɛ na tʋ mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ kɔrɔ, pɩ bʋ̃ pi khuowira pɩ gbɛ̃ɩnyɩra za ni. Bʋɔtɛ sɩ makɩ̃n hara sɩɛrɛ bĩŋinkhɛla za waʔ.
46014036	Warɩma ĩ ken ma kha Yekila sɩɛsɩra gɔɗ ɓa ɩ̃ɛ heke ba? Warɩma kha si ɓa dii wa ɩ̃ɛ doro heke ba?
46014037	Na ɩ̃ ʋɔ ken ma kha Yekila hãan ma ʋɔ sɩɛsɛ kha ʋɔ de nɩpɛ sɩ, warɩma kha Yekila Nina hãan ma ʋɔ wɔrɩkɔ kha ʋɔ sɩɛrɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na tʋ kha wɛsɩɛ mɩɛ sɛwɛnɩ, Adɛyɩra sɩɛrɛhãansɛ ɩ.
46014038	Na nɩra wɩɛ bãa bɩɩn sɩɛ waʔ, Yekila bɩ ʋ dɛyɩra tɩ̃ waʔ.
46014039	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, mɩɩna ɩ̃ kãn na kɔrɩ, dɩɛ kɩ bʋ na ɓu sɩɛsɛ Yekila heke na khɛ de nɩpɛ sɩ. Na nɩra ʋɔ kha u de thĩmaansɩɛsɛ, hã ɩ̃ barɩ ʋ waʔ.
46014040	Ŋa ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ mɩyɩra bɩɛ le na kɩ̃ra na makɩ̃n na i lelɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra.
46015001	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa na kʋɔgɩ̃n ɩ̃ na Yesura sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra mɩ na deɗ ĩ na ɩ̃ bɩ̃ɩ sɩ na gɔɗ sɩ na kɩ̃ran ɩra.
46015002	Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kɩ ɓa yɩɛ ĩ ɓu zɩ̃mɩra. Fɔ na ɩ̃ wɔrɩn gɔɗ sɩ mʋ gaga kha baa mi deɗ ĩ si; bʋɔtɛ ɩ̃ khãamɩra ɓa le wa kpasa.
46015003	Karɩ̃na mɩɛ thĩra ɓuuri, ʋɔ mɩ lʋgʋn karɩ̃n ɩ̃ zuori. Ʋɔ kɩ bʋ kha Kirisitira huun ma a mɩbɩ̃yɛ kãma mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila sɛwʋra na deɗ si ɩra.
46015004	U huun ma na pɩ kasɩn ʋ, khɩɛwɛ pɩsãa ɗɩyãgɩra za na ʋ alɩn kuɗ huumira za, mʋ gaga baa Yekila sɛwʋra na deɗ si ɩra.
46015005	Na ʋ ɓɔgɔn u thĩ dɩ̃ɩna Pɩɛrɩ, dɩ̃ɩna dãarawɩra gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ra.
46015006	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na ʋ ɓɔgɔn u thĩ na khãadɛrɩwɛ bʋɔ bɛna pɩ na bĩŋinn ɩra, pɩ kha tãra nɩpɛ gbaasɩyɔ̃ na tiiwãa. Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ, gɔmɛ bʋɔ bʋ thakuogo za bere, ŋa bʋɔ huun ma.
46015007	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃ na ʋ ɓɔgɔn u thĩ na Zakɩ, kɩ ɓɔgɔn u thĩ na dãarawɩra bʋɔra bɩɛ.
46015008	Sɩɛ bɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na ʋ tʋʋn ɓɔgɔn u thĩ dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ mʋ gaga kha ɓiiwɛ kpoloŋo kɩ khãɗ yãan waʔ na pi hũn u ɩra.
46015009	Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ dãarawɩra bɩɛ tɩtɩyara, tɩ̃yara za ʋɔ, mɩɛ kãn thĩra pɩ yɩ mɩɛ dãara waʔ, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ vɛnɛn ma Yekila nɩpɩra yãarɩ.
46015010	Ŋa Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra yɩɛn na mɩɛ liin dɛyɩra mɩ bʋ mɩra, fɩ̃ɩmɩra ʋ fɩ̃ɩn mɩɛ za, pi liin kpasa waʔ. Na mʋ kha mu ken si, mɩɛ liigen tann dãarawɩra bʋɔra bɩɛ, sɩɛ liin mɩɛ thĩ wɔrɩkɔ waʔ, ŋa Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra wɔrɩkɩra yɩɛn na mɩɛ liin sɩɛ.
46015011	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, si liin mɩɛ ba, si liin ma bɩɛ ba, a bɩɛ bu de ɓa Yesura sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kpora, sɩɛ za ĩ gbũun khãarɩ.
46015012	Na a de ɓa kha Kirisitira huun ma kɩ alɩn na kuɗ huumira za: Na mʋsɛ sii ɩ̃ bʋɔra liin ki deɗ kha hu arɩmɛ bʋ waʔ.
46015013	Na hu arɩmɛ bʋ waʔ, Kirisitira thĩra alɩn na kuɗ huumira za waʔ.
46015014	Na Kirisitira alɩn yãan waʔ, aa Yekire sɩɛrɛdekira bʋ wa kpasa, ɩ̃ khãamɩra Yekila za bʋ wa kpasa tɩ̃.
46015015	Na sɩ bʋ mafɩra, a Yekire sɩɛrɛdekira bʋ wa kpasa, sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha tɔŋɔ a kpii kɩ maan Yekila. Naɗɩɛ a de ɓa kha Yekila arɩgan ma Kirisitira huumira za. Na nɩhuome ɓa arɩ na kure huumira za phɩlɩyanɗɩyãgara za waʔ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha Yekila arɩgan Kirisitira thĩra huumira za waʔ.
46015016	Na nɩhuome ɓa arɩ phɩlɩyanɗɩyãgara za waʔ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha Kirisitira thĩra alɩn yãan tɩ̃ waʔ!
46015017	Na Kirisiti gbũun alɩn waʔ, ɩ̃ khãamɩra bʋ wa kpasa; dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɩra bʋ wa ɩ̃ thaasɩra za bere.
46015018	Sɩɛ gbũu ɓɔgɔ wa tɩ̃ kha wɛpɩɛ khãan Kirisitira za ki huuri, pi diin ma pere.
46015019	Na a khɩɛn ma a laŋa na yiin ŋi Kirisitira za kha ʋ dɛnfɛ a fara dunuyara za doro, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha aa kɩ ɓa fʋʋ na tãra dunuyara nɩpɩra bɩɛ.
46015020	Ŋa, tɩ̃yara za ʋɔ, Kirisitira nisĩnn alɩn na kuɗ huumira za, na ɓɔgɔn kha wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ pi huuri, pɩ ɓa arɩ wa na kure huumira za tɩ̃.
46015021	Naɗɩɛ baa huumira nann ma nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra nɩra kpo kãmara za, mafɩra tɩ̃ nɩra kpo ɓa le thaaga nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra wɔrɩ arɩ na kure huumira za.
46015022	Nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ bɩɛ hu wa, naɗɩɛ baa pɩ bɩɛ kuɗ ɓa Adama za ɩra; mafɩra tɩ̃, nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɩɛ ɓa ɓu thakuogo baa pɩ bɩɛ kuɗ Kirisitira za.
46015023	Ŋa sɩ bɩɛ ɓa le wa na makɩ̃n na nɩpɩra bɩɛ kpo kpo nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛyɩra: Kirisitira kɩ bʋ thaagɩra za, sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ ʋ nɩpɩra, na ʋ ɓa ɓann bɛndɛ, bɩɛ kɩ ɓa arɩ.
46015024	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za dunuyara zuobɛna tʋ nan. Kirisitira ɓa asɩ wa Sutana na u gĩrime ɩɩgɩra bɩɛ, na dunuya wɩɛ thadɛrɩwɩra wɔrɩkɩra na pɩ faŋɩra bɩɛ, kɩ hã Siira Yekila ɩɩgɩra.
46015025	Naɗɩɛ, fɔ Kirisitira hɩɗan ɩɩgɩra za ɓanu kha Yekila yiin ʋ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra u lekira za.
46015026	Bɩ̃ɩra phɩlɩyamɔra Yekila ɓa asɩ, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ huume.
46015027	Sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Yekila yiin ma mɩyɛ bɩɛ u leke za.» Na Yekila yiin ma mɩyɛ bɩɛ u leke za, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ kha ʋ hãar ʋ wɔrɩkɔ Yekila thĩra za waʔ.
46015028	Na mɩyɩra bɩɛ ɓa yiin Yesura lekira za bɛndɛ, dɩɛ bɛna ʋ ɓa yiin u thĩ Yekila lekira za; si le thaaga Yekila hɩɗan mɩyɩra bɩɛ thaagɩra za.
46015029	Na nɩhuomira kha arɩ waʔ, wɛpɩɛ kɩ yɩɛ na pi yĩ pi ãmɩra za nɩhuomira kãmara za, bɩra za pɩ khãa bere? Na nɩhuomira ɓa arɩ dʋ̃waʔ, be liin na pɩ yɩɛ na pi yĩ pi ãmɩra za, nɩhuomira kãmara za.
46015030	Na mafɩra ʋ, be kɩ yɩɛ na a yii a thĩ bãanyɛ bɩɛ huume khɩ̃nɛ za?
46015031	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, ɗɩyãsɛ bɩɛ mɩɛ bʋ wa huume nʋʋnɛ za. Tɩ̃ya ʋ, mi de ĩ wa sɩɛ naɗɩɛ mɩ bãana wuon ma na ɩ̃ɛ baa a bʋ nʋkpuola za a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za ɩra.
46015032	Mɩ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra kha bʋ Efɛzɩra mʋ gaga kha gbaŋa zarawɛ, lewula mi leɗen mi, na mi liin ma sɩɛ nɩpɛ wʋɔrɛ doro za pɩ yã mɩ, bɩra sɩ kɩ̃ra mɩ? Na nɩhuome kãn na arɩ waʔ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a le mʋ gaga kha baa nɩpɛ le de si kha, «ɩ̃ yɩɛ a ɗi na a yɔ̃, naɗɩɛ na a huun zuori si zuon ma.»
46015033	Ɩ̃ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ kha: «Yɛsɛ bɩ̃ɩwɩra boi wa nɩpɛ ki yii wi mɩbɩ̃yɛ za.»
46015034	Ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wʋɔmɛ kɩ kɛɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira. Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ fɩ. Bʋɔ bʋ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za bɩɛ tʋ Yekila waʔ, mi de ɓa sɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ kha ɩ̃ nɩɩsɛ ɩ.
46015035	Ŋa nɩra ʋɔ wɔrɩ bʋ̃ kha: «Mʋsɛ sii nɩhuomira ɓa arɩ yo? Be gbɔthĩnye pɩ ɓa hɩɗan ɩ̃?»
46015036	Ɩ̃ɛ wʋɔnlaɗɩpɩɛ, ɩ̃ gaga na ken baa nɩra tʋɔ daɓire, tɩ kãn ma na hu zo kɩ tʋ fĩi.
46015037	Ɗiiɓire doro ɩ̃ tʋɔgɔ, tɩ wɔrɩ le damʋsʋɓire, warɩma sʋɓire, ŋa kɩ ɓɔkɩra ɩ̃ kãwɩ waʔ.
46015038	Na ɩ̃ tʋɔn nɩ zuori, Yekila yɩɛ ti fĩi lɔmɩra za ʋɔ thĩra ɓɩɛ; kɩ yɩɛ tɩ tʋ le mɩɩna ɩ̃ tʋɔgɔn ɩra.
46015039	Baa gbɔʔɩra thĩnyira gɔn, ɩ bɩɛ bʋ kpuore waʔ, nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye gbɔɗɛ bʋ tikpo, daɗuoro bɛrɛ bʋ tikpo, wurupe bɛrɛ bʋ tikpo, ɓuruwe bɛrɛ bʋ tikpo.
46015040	Zaazaa gbɔʔɛ bʋ i kpo, fɔlɔŋɔ gbɔʔɛ bʋ i kpo. Ŋa zaazaa gbɔʔɛ kɩ̃ra lɔmɩra na fɔlɔŋɔ gbɔʔɛ kɩ̃ra lɔmɩra bʋ wa kpo kpo.
46015041	Khɩɛ soɓe bʋ pikpo, ferege yɛɓɛ bʋ pikpo, khʋsaɓiye yɩ̃ŋawɛ bʋ pikpo, harɩ khʋsaɓiye yɩ̃ŋa kɩ tãra kamɛ bere.
46015042	Na nɩhuomira ɓa alɩnɩ, mafɩra pɩ gbɔʔɩra ɓa hɩɗan. Na gbɔɗɛ ɓɛɗɩ fɔlɔŋɔ za, tɩ bʋ wa huone; na ti gbũu alɩnɩ, tɩ wɔrɩ hu dʋ̃waʔ.
46015043	Na gbɔɗɛ ɓɛɗɩ tɩ bɩ̃bɩ̃ɩnɛ, tɩ arɩbɛna, tɩ hɩɗan ma ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra za. Tɩ ɓɛbɛna, faŋa bʋ tɩ za waʔ; ŋa tɩ arɩbɛna, tɩ hɩɗan ma na faŋa.
46015044	Tɩ ɓɛbɛna, nɩthɩ̃rɩga gbɔɗɛ ɩ, ŋa ti gbũu arɩmɛ bɛna, Yekila Nina gbɔɗɛ ɩ. Na nɩthɩ̃rɩga gbɔɗɛ bʋ, Yekila Nina gbɔhãanɛ bʋ tɩ̃.
46015045	Naɗɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa kha: «Lʋgʋ nɩrara Yekila liiri, Adamara, Yekila yiin Nin ʋ za na u liin nɩthɩ̃rɩga.» Ŋa Adama yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra ɓannɩ, na ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Kirisitira, ʋɔ liin ma Nin, ʋɔ Nina kɩ hã nɩpɛ thakuogira.
46015046	Wɩɛra kɩ bʋ Nina, ʋɔ ki nisĩn ɓan waʔ, ŋa wɩɛra kɩ bʋ nɩthɩ̃rɩgara, ʋɔ ki nisĩn ɓan. Kɩ tʋ yɩɛ Nin baara tʋ ɓan.
46015047	Adamara liin lʋgʋ baara, Yekila liin ma ʋɔ na fɔlɔŋɔ tɛwʋgɛ, ʋɔ liin ma fɔlɔnbaa, na Adama yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra kuɗ zaara ni na ɓannɩ.
46015048	Fɔlɔŋɔ nɩpɩra khɩɛgɩ̃n ma na wɩɛra liin na fɔlɔŋɔ tɛwʋgɛ ɩra. Na zaazaa bɛwɩra khɩɛgɩ̃n na wɩɛra kuɗ zaara ni ɩra.
46015049	Baa a khɩɛgɩ̃n na wɩɛra na liin na fɔlɔŋɔ tɛwʋgɩra, mafɩra tɩ̃ a ɓa khɩɛgɩ̃n na wɩɛra kɩ bʋ zaara ni ɩra.
46015050	Wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓɩɛ na de ĩ, mɩ yaɓiiwe, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha mɩɩdɛ ti liin gbɔkhaasɛ na tarɩmɛ, dɩɛ wɔrɩ ɓu lon Yekila ɩɩgɩra za waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna mɩɩdɛ bãa kɩ wɔrɩ hu, dɩɛ wɔrɩ dɩɛ na mɩkɛɩhuone waʔ.
46015051	Mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ Yekila gũni mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ. A bɩɛ ɓa hu pere waʔ, ŋa Yekila ɓa vɩkɩ̃n ma a bɩɛ
46015052	bãnɩkpo, yiwubakaga na yiwuphiizɩɛgɛ za, na pɩ ɓa tɩɩrɛn phɩlɩyãndatʋ̃na ɩra. Naɗɩɛ na tɩ ɓa tɩɩrɛnɩ, nɩhuomira ɓa arɩ, pɩ ɓa hu dʋ̃waʔ, kɩ yɩɛ Yekila vɩkɩ̃n a bɩɛ khaala za fɩ.
46015053	Fɔ Yekila vɩkɩ̃n a gbɔdãgana na le ri kɛɩdãganɛ, kɩ vɩkɩ̃n a gbɔhuona na le ri kɛɩhuone.
46015054	Dɩɛ bɛna na gbɔdãgana vɩkɩ̃n liin gbɔkɛɩdãganɛ, na gbɔhuona vɩkɩ̃n na liin kɛɩhuone, sɩɛsɩra na sɛwɛn Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Yekila wɔrɩkɔ ɗiin huumira», sɩɛ hĩiri.
46015055	«Huume, he mʋ wɔrɩkɩra bʋ? Huume, he mʋ nɩkhʋwaŋɩra bʋ?»
46015056	Huume nɩkhʋwaŋɩra kɩ bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɩra. Mɩbɩ̃yɩra wɔrɩkɩra kuɗ ɓa Yekila Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za.
46015057	Ŋa a thɩɛ wa Yekila, naɗɩɛ ʋɔ kɩ hã a wɔrɩkɩra a Adɛyɩra Yesu Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za.
46015058	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na yii wɔrɩkɔ ĩ thĩ za; hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ mɩɩnɛ sii le thaaga ĩ gbũu kpɩ̃ra waʔ. Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ ki yo wʋɔrɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ Adɛyɩra miliinsira za, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋʋn kha vɛnsɩra ĩ le Adɛyɩra miliinsira za mɩra, si ɓa yo kpasa kũu waʔ.
46016001	Ɩra wɩɛ, na gbũu leke mɩhãanyɩra mɩyɩra za ɩ̃ kãn na khon na dɛnfɛ Zeruzalɛmʋ khãadɛrɩwɩra, ĩ le si mʋ gaga kha baa mɩ hãan Galasɩ egilizi nɩpɩra sɩ ɩra.
46016002	Gbaarɩyawʋga tʋɔ Gbaarɩyawʋga, ɩ̃ bɩɛ kãn ma na khon tigiye yʋɔ na yii i gɛnɛ za na makɩ̃n na ɩ̃ wɔrɩkɩra, si le thaaga hã ɩ̃ ɓa tɩɛ kha mɩɛ ki thiye zo na yo bĩŋin i waʔ.
46016003	Na mɩ ɓa ɓann ĩ heke, mɩ ɓa dãa wɛpɩɛ ĩ kenn khonn na sɛwɛ pi yo na ĩ leke mɩhãanyɩra zeruzalɛmʋra.
46016004	Na mɩ ɓa ken si kha sɩ makɩ̃n mɩɛ thĩra yo tɩ̃ ba, mɩɛ na bɩɛ ɓa dɩkɩ̃n.
46016005	Mɩ ɓa thuo wa Masedʋwanɩ sɩrɩga za zo kɩ tʋ thiye ĩ heke naɗɩɛ baa mɩ ɓa tãra na gɩɛ gɛŋɩra ɩra.
46016006	Mɩ ɓa hɩɗan ĩ heke na lɛɩ kɩrɩ ʋ, bãanɩ mɩ ɓa le wese bɛnɛ thĩra ĩ heke; dɩɛ bɛna ɩ̃ ɓa wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ mɩ, mɩ sɩrɩyuogira za, khaarɛ bãa ɩ dɛnfɛsɩra wɔrɩn nann mɩ ɩra.
46016007	Mɩ kha khɔrɩ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́ thɩɛ ɩ̃ doro kɩ tãra waʔ, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ kha ɓɩɛ na lɛɩ ĩ heke kɩrɩ, na Adɛyɩra hãan mɩ sɩ khɩ̃na kɔnɩ.
46016008	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za mɩ gaga wa kha mɩ ɓa hɩɗan ma Efɛzɩ na yo nan Pãtɩkɔtɩ ɗɩyãgara.
46016009	Naɗɩɛ khɩ̃nɛ phiin zɩɛn hãan mɩ kha mi le miliinse sʋɔ ni, kɛna mɩ tʋ kha mɩ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra gɔn ma ni.
46016010	Na Timotera ɓa nann ĩ heke ni, ɩ̃ gɔ ʋ na kɩ̃ra; hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ ʋ gbɔɗa hu u waʔ, naɗɩɛ u le wa Adɛyɩra miliinsira mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ.
46016011	Hã nɩra sii ɓa zene u waʔ. Ɩ̃ dɛnfɛ ʋ u le u miŋinsira bɩɛ wɔyĩke za, si le thaaga u ɓa nan mi heke fara, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ na khãarawɩra bʋɔra bʋ tɩɛ ʋ wa.
46016012	Mɩ na deɗ Apolɔsɩ kha ʋ pɛ̃ɩ ki thiye ĩ heke na khãarawɩra bʋɔra, ŋa ʋ bɩɩn thiyemira ɩra waʔ. Bɛndɛ bãa ɓa nʋʋr ʋ, ʋ ɓa thiye ĩ heke.
46016013	Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ, ɩ̃ gɔ khãamɩra na lese sɩyɔ̃, ɩ̃ hɩɗan na haɓɛ, ɩ̃ hɩɗan na faŋa.
46016014	Ĩ le mɩyɩra bɩɛ na khɔrɩmɛ.
46016015	Ɩ̃ tʋ Sitefanasɩ na ʋ gbɛ̃ɩna nɩpɩra: Bɩɛ pi nisĩnn liin lʋgʋ khãarawɩra Akayɩ sɩrɩgɩra ʋ kɩ hã pi thĩ kɩ dɛnfɛ khãarawɩra bʋɔra. Mɩ ɓɩɛ wa ĩ heke ɩra kha
46016016	ɩ̃ yɩɛ bɩɛ nɩpɩra thĩna zɩɛ ɩ̃ wʋɔla dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ ki liige na pɩ vɛn dɩ̃ɩn mɩ.
46016017	Mɩ bãana wuon na Sitefanasɩra, na Fɔrɩtinatusi, na Akayusi ɓamɩra; pɩ dɛnfɛn mɩ wa na mɩyɩra kha kpɩ ɓɩ bɛna ɩ̃ kha bʋ mɩ lɔkɩra ʋ wa ɩra;
46016018	ki wuoren mɩ bãana mʋ gaga kha baa pi liin si ĩ heke ni ɩra. Ɩ̃ yɩ bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ thĩna yɩsɩnʋʋga kɩ̃raŋɩra.
46016019	Azi sɩrɩga gɛŋɩra egilizi nɩpɩra bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃ bɩɛ. Akilasɩ, na pirisili, na egiliziwe nɩpɩra bʋɔra ki bĩŋin pɩ khɛrɛ, bʋ dãa kɩ hã ɩ̃ thɩɛ kpakpaɗɛ Adɛyɛ yɩsɩgɩra za.
46016020	Khãrawɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ a heke fara bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃ bɩɛ. Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra pɛ̃ɩ kɩ thɩɛ kamɛ na khɔrɩmɛ thɩɛɗɛ.
46016021	Mɩɛ Poli kɩ sɛwɛ sɩɛrɛkpɩ̃ʔɩɛ ɩra na mi leke na thɩɛ ɩ̃.
46016022	Wɩɛ bãa kɩ khɔrɩ Adɛyɩra Yesura waʔ, Yekila daŋa ʋɔ dɛyɩra! Maranata (gɩɛ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha a Adɛyɩra bʋ ɓan!)
46016023	Adɛyɩra Yesura fɩ̃ɩmɩra hɩɗan ɩ̃ za.
46016024	Yesu Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za, mɩ khɔrɩ ɩ̃ bɩɛ.
47001001	Mɩɛ Poli kɩ bʋ Yesu Kirisiti dãara na makɩ̃n na Yekila dĩŋora, mɩɛ na a yaɓiye Timote kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã Yekila egilizi nɩpɩra kɩ bʋ Korɛ̃tɩra, dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila bɛwɩra Akayɩ sɩrɩgɩra bɩɛra za ɩra.
47001002	A Siye Yekila na Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ kɩ hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo.
47001003	Gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bʋ wa Yekila bɛsɛ, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira Siira, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Siira hĩin na nʋwansɛ, dɩ̃ɩna ʋɔ kɩ hã a haɓɛ bãanyɩra bɩɛ.
47001004	Ʋɔ kɩ hã a haɓɩra a vɛnsɩra bɩɛ za si le thaaga, wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ bʋ vɛnsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ za, a wɔrɩ hã bɩɛ haɓɛ na makɩ̃n na haɓɩra a ɓu ki kure Yekila heke.
47001005	Naɗɩɛ lɔmɩra za a ɓu Kirisitira vɛnsɩra thĩna gbaangbo, mafɩra tɩ̃ a ɓu haɓɛ gbaangbo na kure Kirisitira heke.
47001006	Na vɛnsɛ nan a, sɩɛ le wa na hã ɩ̃ haɓɛ kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ wɔrɩ ɓu zɩ̃mɛ. Na aa bʋ na haɓɛ, sɩɛ le wa ɩ̃ɛ ɓu haɓɛ na wɔrɩ ɓu faŋa na ba vɛnsɩra siira aa vɛnn ɩra.
47001007	Aa lann ma ɩ̃ za gbaangbo, naɗɩɛ aa tʋʋn ma kha na ĩ ɓuun vɛnsɛ, mafɩra ɩ̃ ɓa ɓu haɓɛ na aa kpuore tɩ̃.
47001008	Naɗɩɛ a yaɓiiwe, bɛna a kha bʋ Azi sɩrɩgɩra ʋ ni, vɛnsɩra thĩna nan a ni, a ɓɩɛ kha ɩ̃ kʋɔmɛ hɩɗan sɩɛ za waʔ. Sɩɛ vɛnsɩra na nugon ma a za harɩ kɩ ɓɩɛ tãra a faŋɩra, na si liin thaaga harɩ na a deɗ kha a ɓa wɔrɩ ko waʔ.
47001009	Tɩ̃yara za ʋɔ, aa na tʋʋn ma kha aa kha wɔrɩ ko huumira waʔ. Gɩɛ na yɩɛn na aa kha lan aa thĩ za dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa a na yiin ma a laŋɩra Yekila za ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ wɔrɩ arɩga nɩhuomira ɩra.
47001010	Ʋɔ kuoren a na bɩɛ huunbɩɛ thĩna, ʋɔ kpuora kɩ ɓa kuore a tɩ̃; ʋɔ za a lann kha ʋ ɓa kuore a bere.
47001011	Ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃, baa ɩ̃ hã ĩ thĩ kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila kɩ hã aa, mafɩra a ɓa ɓu Yekila kɩ̃rɩgɩra na kure nɩgɔmɛ Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra za, kɩ yɩɛ nɩgɔmɛ thɩɛ Yekila aa mɩyɛ za.
47001012	Ken, mɩɩna za aa wɔrɩ gbɩ̃nɛ aa thĩra dɩ̃ɩna a lɔɓidaara liin a sɩɛrɛ ɩra. A lɔɓidaara ɓɔgɔ sɩ wa kha a liin nɩtelenyeme dunuyara za, dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ɛ wʋɔla za thĩra kũu. Sɩ liin ma na gagayɛgɛnsɛ dɩ̃ɩna sʋɔwɛsɛ na kuɗ Yekila heke. Sɩ liin na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye wʋɔmɛ waʔ, ŋa si liin ma Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.
47001013	Aa bɩ sɛwɛ foi na hã ɩ̃ waʔ, fɔ wɛsɩɛ ɩ̃ wɔrɩ karɩ̃n na tʋ sɩ kɔrɩwɩra bʋɔtɛ. Mɩɛ gbũu khãa wa sɩ za kha ɩ̃ ɓa wɔrɩ tʋ wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ kɔrɩwɩra,
47001014	mʋ gaga kha baa ɩ̃ gɔɗ kɩ tʋ sɩ kɔrɩwɩra kɩrɩ kɩrɩ kha Adɛyɩra ɓanɗɩyãgɩra za, aa ɓa le wa thaaga ĩ ɓu yɩsɩgbɩ̃nɛgɛ kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ le thaaga aa ɓu yɩsɩgbɩ̃nɛgɛ tɩ̃.
47001015	Baa mɩ lann sɩɛ za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mi gbũun khonn gagasɛ kha mɩɛ nisĩn thĩnye ĩ heke ni zo, si le thaaga ɩ̃ ɔfɔ ɓu bãanwuoŋo gʋɔ tɩ̃ na sɩɛ.
47001016	Na mɩ na kuɗ ĩ heke ni, mɩ tʋ yo Masedʋwanɩ sɩrɩgɩra ʋ, mɩ vɩ gbũubɛna mɩ naa thuo ĩ heke ɩ̃ dɛnfɛ mɩ mi yo Zude sɩrɩgɩra ʋ.
47001017	Baa mɩ na khonn sɩɛ gagasɩra, mɩ kha bʋ sʋɔwɛsɛ za waʔ ba? Warɩma kha mi khonn ma sɩɛ gagasɩra na makɩ̃nn na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye gagasɛ doro na liin nɩrawɩɛ ki de kha iyo na ɩya mɩɩnɛ kpo za ba?
47001018	Yekila kɩ bʋ mɩ sɩɛrɛra, wɛsɩɛ a de ĩ, a dɩɛn iyo na ɩya kamɛ za waʔ.
47001019	Naɗɩɛ Yekila Ɓikhiira Yesu Kirisitira mɩyɩra mɩɛ na Sɩlasɩ dɩ̃ɩna Timotera deɗ ĩ, u de iyo dɩ̃ɩna ɩya daɓire kpo za waʔ, ŋa ʋɔ sɩɛsɩra bʋ wa iyo bãanyɛ bɩɛ.
47001020	Yekila nʋhãansɩɛsɩra bɩɛ liin ma «iyo» Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, a de ɓa kha Amiina na gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra.
47001021	Wɩɛra hãan aa dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ɛ faŋɩra Yesu Kirisitira za, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Yekila. Ʋɔ kenn khonn a,
47001022	na yiin ʋ dɩ̃ŋasɛ a za kɩ hãar a Ninyɛgɛmɔra a nisĩn ɗɩɛ ken kɩ̃rɩgɩra a ɓa ɓu ɩra.
47001023	Na mɩɛ ʋɔ, Yekila kɩ bʋ mɩ sɩɛrɛra kha mi de ɓa tɩ̃ya. Na mɩ bʋ tɔn ma ʋ yɩɛ mi hu. Mɩ kha ɓɩɛ na yii ĩ vɛnsɛ za waʔ, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ vɩɗ thiyen Korɛ̃tɩra dʋ̃waʔ.
47001024	Aa gagasɛ bʋ na le thadɛrɩsɛ ɩ̃ khãamɩra za waʔ, ŋa a ɓɩɛ wa na dɛnfɛ ɩ̃ ĩ ɓu bãanwuoŋo, naɗɩɛ ĩ yuon ma wʋɔrɛ khãamɩra za.
47002001	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na mɩɛ khonn gagasɛ kha mɩɛ ɓa vɩ gbũu ĩ heke ni na kpãɗɛ ʋɔ wʋɔrɛ dʋ̃waʔ.
47002002	Naɗɩɛ na mɩ kpãɗɛn ɩ̃ɛ wʋɔyɩra, ãna kɩ ɓa hã mɩɛ bãanwuoŋira? Fɔ ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ wʋɔyɩɛ mɩɛ kpãɗɛn bʋɔtɛ.
47002003	Mɩ lɛtɩrɩla mɩ na nisĩn sɛwɛn na hãar ɩ̃, ʋ thaagɩra kha bʋ kha na mɩ nann ni, wɛpɩɛ kha wɔrɩ hã mɩ bãanwuoŋira, hã pɩ ɓa yii mi wɔkpãka za waʔ. Wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ na gbũu ɩ̃ɛ gɛŋɩra, mɩ khãan ma sɩɛ za kha mɩ bãanwuoŋira kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ɛ bɩɛ bɛgɩra tɩ̃.
47002004	Mɩ sɛwɛn ma lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na wɔkpãka, na gaga asɩga, na yĩmithĩnse. Mɩ sɛwɛ ʋ na yii ĩ wɔkpãka za waʔ, ŋa mɩ sɛwɛ ʋ wa si le thaaga ɩ̃ tʋ lɔmɩra za mɩ khɔrɩ ɩ̃ kɩ tãra ɩra.
47002005	Na nɩra ʋɔ liin wɔkpãmɩyɛ, mɩɛ za u liin si waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ bɩɛ za u liin si, warɩma u liin si wa ɩ̃ nɩkpokpope bʋɔ za, mi de ɓa sɩɛ hã mɩɛ ɓa le hʋgan sɩ na tãra waʔ.
47002006	Kpaŋɩ̃nsɩra ɩ̃ gɔmɩra kpaŋɩ̃nn ʋɔ dɛyɩra, sɩɛ nan ʋ.
47002007	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩra wɩɛ, ɩ̃ kãn yafa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za kɩ hã ʋ haɓɛ, si le thaaga hã gagaʔasɩga ɓa le gbɩ̃n ʋ za na khʋ ʋ gbɔɗa pere waʔ.
47002008	Mafɩra, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa kha ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na ɓɔgɔ ʋ kha ɩ̃ɛ khɔrɩ ʋ.
47002009	Naɗɩɛ mɩ sɛwɛn ma lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na ɓu zɩɛ ɩ̃ za na ken na ĩ nu mɩ bɛrɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ za.
47002010	Na ɩ̃ yafan wɩɛ bãa za, mɩ ɓa yafa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za tɩ̃. (Na mɩ kãn ma na yafa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za), mɩ yafan ma ʋɔ dɛyɩra za ɩ̃ɛ kãma za Kirisitira wʋɔla za,
47002011	si le thaaga hã Sutana ɓa le kpɛnsɛ a waʔ, naɗɩɛ a kʋɔmɛ bʋ ʋ gagasɩra za waʔ.
47002012	Baa mɩ nann Torowasɩ kha mɩɛ de Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, mɩ na tʋʋn ma kha Adɛyɩra na phiin zɩɛn ma khɩ̃nɛ na hãan mɩ,
47002013	kɛna sɩɛ bɩɛ za, mɩ gagasɩra na hʋ̃nn khaarɛ kpo waʔ, naɗɩɛ mɩ na yãan mɩ yaɓiye Titi thonn waʔ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ sarɩn kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra za ki kuɗ ni na yuon Masedʋwanɩ sɩrɩgɩra ʋ.
47002014	Thɩɛɗɛ bʋ wa Yekire bɛrɛ, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ hã a wɔrɩkɔ bãanyɛ bɩɛ naɗɩɛ baa aa na Kirisitira liin kpuola, naɗɩɛ baa ʋ khɛ a kɩ tɩɩ Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra khaayɛ bɩɛ za mʋ gaga kha baa wusuna nunʋwã nuugo tɩɩ gɛnsɛ bɩɛ ɩra.
47002015	Naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ diime khɩ̃na na wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ zɩ̃mɛ khɩ̃na za, aa bʋ wa na Kirisitira nuugo pɩ sʋgʋmʋra za mʋ gaga kha wusuna nunʋwã.
47002016	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ zɩ̃mɛ khɩ̃na za, a nuugira hã wɩ wa thakuogo. Ŋa wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ diime khɩ̃na, a nuugira bʋ wa huume nuugo pi heke. Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, ãna kɩ wɔrɩ le ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ bɩɛ na hĩɗe i?
47002017	Nɩgɔmɛ khɛ wa Yekila sɩɛsɩra na le si tigiɓɩɛkhɩ̃nɛ, aa bʋ mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ waʔ; ŋa Yekila dãan aa, a de ɓa ʋ sɩɛsɩra na kpolonvɩrɩga Yekila wʋɔla za Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za.
47003001	Sɩɛsɩra mi deɗ mɩra, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha a ɓɩɛ wa na ɔfɔ ɓɔgɔ a thĩ ba? Warɩma kha a ɓɩɛ wa na hã ɩ̃ lɛtɩrɩwɛ na ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ dɛrɩwɩra a bʋ ba? Warɩma na ɓu bɩɛ lɛtɩrɩwɛ siira na kure ĩ heke ba?
47003002	Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra kɩ bʋ a lɛtɩrɩla, ʋɔ lɛtɩrɩla sɛwɛn ma aa gagasɩra za, nɩpɛ bɩɛ wɔrɩ yã ʋ na karɩ̃n ʋ.
47003003	Iyo, sɩ yɛɗ ɓa kha ɩ̃ɛ kɩ bʋ lɛtɩrɩla Kirisitira sɛwɛnɩ, aa ʋ dãan na ʋɔ lɛtɩrɩla. U gbũun sɛwɛn na biki waʔ, ŋa ʋ sɛwɛn ma na Thakuo Yekila Nina wɔrɩkɩra. Ʋ sɛwɛn bʋrʋheʔe za waʔ, ŋa ʋ sɛwɛn ma nɩthɩ̃rɩga gagasɛ za.
47003004	A sɩɛrɛ wa mafɩra na makɩ̃n na laŋɩra Kirisitira hã a Yekila wʋɔla za.
47003005	Sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ kha a khãa a thĩ za na wɔrɩ le sɩɛ miliinsira waʔ, ŋa a wɔrɩkɩra kure wa Yekila heke.
47003006	Ʋɔ hãar a wɔrɩkɩra tɩ̃ na a liin nʋhãanfɛŋɩra miliindɛwɛ. Sɩɛ bʋ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra mɩyɛ waʔ, ŋa Yekila Nina mɩyɛ ɩ. Naɗɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra hã wa huume kɩ yɩɛ Yekila Nina hã thakuogira.
47003007	Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra daɓiyira sɛwɛn bʋrʋheʔira za tɩ bɛna ni, ɩɛ ɓan ma na huume. Kɛna sɩɛ za Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra sũnn ma, harɩ Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra kha wɔrɩ ken Moyizira ʋ wʋɔla za waʔ, naɗɩɛ baa Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra kha yɩ̃ŋa ʋ wʋɔla ɩra, ŋa sɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kha bʋ wa tãrayansɛ,
47003008	Yekila Nina miliinsira ɓa ɓɔgɔ Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra na tãra sɩɛrɛhãansɩra waʔ ba?
47003009	Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra miliinsira kɩ phɩla asɩgɩra za, na sɩɛ ɓuun Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra, miliinsira kɩ yɩɛ nɩpɛ telen, sɩɛ Yekire ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra ɓa tãra sʋɔra waʔ ba?
47003010	Na makɩ̃n na sɩɛ, a wɔrɩ de ɓa thĩra kha ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra kha yɩ̃ŋa khɔ̃ɩra, bɩɛ bʋ foi ɩra bɛkpakpapɩra wʋɔla za dʋ̃waʔ.
47003011	Naɗɩɛ, mɩyɩra kha bʋ tãrayanyɩra, na Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra ɓuun ɩɛ za, mɩkɛɩzuonyira ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra tãra ɩɛ mɩtãrayanyɩra ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra waʔ ba?
47003012	Baa gɩɛ lankɩ̃rɩgɩra thĩna bʋ a heke, gɩɛ yɩɛn na a gagasɩra hʋ̃nn khaarɛ kpo.
47003013	Aa le mʋ gaga kha baa Moyizira kha le waʔ. Ʋ kha khɛ wa lowupheɗe na baka ʋ wʋɔla, hã Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra ɓu yã u Yekire ɩɩga yɛyɛtãrayamɩra zuobɛna waʔ.
47003014	Ŋa pɩ wʋɔmɩra gbelenn ma. Harɩ na nann fɩ̃ɩ za, na pɩ karɩ̃n nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀nɗugusira sɩɛsɩra, dɩɛ lowupheɗa bʋ wa bʋ bere. Ti khonn waʔ, Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za tɩ wɔrɩ khon.
47003015	Iyo, harɩ fɩ̃ɩ, na pɩ karɩ̃n Moyizira sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, lowupheɗe si ɓa pɩ wʋɔmɩra.
47003016	Ŋa sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Wɩɛ bãa vɩkɩ̃nn ʋ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra na thuon Adɛyɩra, dɩɛ bɛna dɩɛ lowupheɗa khon ʋ wʋɔla za na wa.»
47003017	Kɛna Adɛyɩra mɩyɩra deɗ khaadɩɛ, Ninyɛgɛmɔra ʋ. Na khaarɛ bãa Adɛyɩra Ninyɛgɛmɔra bʋ, hɔrɔnsɛ kɩ bʋ dɩɛ khaala za.
47003018	Dɩɛ bɛna, aa wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ wʋɔyɩra za dɩɛ lowupheɗa khonni, Adɛyɩra ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra yɩ̃ŋa wa aa za mʋ gaga kha dʋgalen. Sɩɛ za aa vɩkɩ̃n na le mʋ gaga kha Adɛyɩra, a kuɗ ɓa ɩɩgayɛyɛɓɛ bʋɔ za na lonn ɩɩyɛyɛkpakpapɛ bʋɔ za, Adɛyɩra kɩ bʋ Nina, ʋ wɔrɩkɩra za.
47004001	Yekila ɗɩɛn ma ʋ kɩ̃rɩgɩra za na yiin aa u miliinsira za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na sɩ bʋ gbɔhugo aa za waʔ.
47004002	A kɛɩn ma mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ na nɩɩsɩra na i le guorese za. Aa liin a thĩ nɩkewuyeme waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna a wã Yekila sɩɛsɩra waʔ. Ŋa aa de ɓa tɩ̃ya na yɛsɩ̃n, si le thaaga nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpo kpo lan a za Yekila wʋɔla za.
47004003	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra aa de, na sɩɛ yɛɗ bʋɔ heke waʔ, wɛpɩɛ ki yo diikhɛla, bɩɛ heke sɩ yɛɗ waʔ,
47004004	dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãa waʔ. Dunuya wɩɛ thadɛyɩra kɩ bʋ Sutana, u gbelenn ma pɩ wʋɔmɩra si le thaaga Kirisitira kɩ bʋ Yekila donduora, hã pɩ yã ʋ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra waʔ.
47004005	Ɩya, sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra aa bu de, a de aa thĩra mɩyɛ waʔ, ŋa Yesu Kirisitira a Adɛyɩra mɩyɛ a bu de. Aa ʋɔ bʋ wa ĩ miliinɓiiwe Yesura kãmara za.
