47004006	Naɗɩɛ Yekila deɗ kha: «Yɛyɛɓɛ kure dabirigira za na yɛɗɛ gɛŋɩra.» Ʋɔ kpuola yiin yɛyɛɓɛ aa kpolonsira za si le thaaga nɩpɛ yã ʋ ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra kɩ yɩ̃ŋa Kirisitira wɔseɗa za.
47004007	Ŋa a wɛpɩɛ gbonn gɩɛ ɓudagɩra, a bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha khɛrɩsɛ, si le thaaga nɩpɛ tʋ kha gɩɛ wɔrɩkpakpakɩɛ kuɗ aa za waʔ, ŋa Yekila za ki kuɗi.
47004008	Vɛnsɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ nan a wa, ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, sɩ khʋʋr a waʔ; a gagasɛ yãgamɩn ma, ŋa a gbɔʔɛ hu a waʔ.
47004009	Pɩ gbɩ̃ɩ a wa, ŋa Yekila zɩɛ a kũu waʔ; pɩ yɩ̃ a wa, ŋa sɩɛ khʋ a waʔ.
47004010	Bãanyɛ bɩɛ Yesura huume vɛnsɩra bʋ wa aa za si le thaaga nɩpɛ yã sɩ aa za kha Yesura thakuogira liige wa a za.
47004011	A bʋ wa thakuogo za ŋa bãanyɛ bɩɛ a bʋ wa huume nʋʋnɛ za Yesura kãmara za, si le thaaga ʋ thakuogira yã a gbɔʔɩra za, ɩɛ wɛʔɩɛ kɩ bʋ huonyira.
47004012	Mafɩra huumira bʋ ki liige aa za si le thaaga thakuogo liige ɩ̃ɛ za.
47004013	Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa kha: «Mɩ khãan ma sɩ za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ sɩɛrɛnɩ.» Baa aa bʋ na sɩɛ gagakpuosira tɩ̃ kɩ khãa, gɩɛ yɩɛn na a sɩɛrɛ.
47004014	Naɗɩɛ a tʋʋn ma kha wɩɛra arɩgan Adɛyɛ Yesura, ʋɔ kɩ ɓa arɩga aa tɩ̃, mʋ gaga kha baa ʋ arɩgan Yesura ɩra, ki bĩŋin aa dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ɛ kpuore ʋ wʋɔla za.
47004015	Wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ nan aa, sɩ nan a wa ɩ̃ɛ kãma, Yekila ɓu fɩ̃ɩ nɩgɔmɛ za, si le thaaga nɩgɔmɛ thɩɛ Yekila kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ.
47004016	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na aa khʋ a gbɔʔɩra waʔ, harɩ na a gbɔʔɩra bʋ wa kɩ asɩ ki yo, sɩɛ ɓu wa kha dʋɔ sɩɛ wa a nimira faŋɩra za ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga.
47004017	Naɗɩɛ vɛnsɩra kɩ nan a mɩra, sɩɛ thɔ ɓa dɩ̃ɩna sɩ bʋ wa tãrayansɛ. Kɛna sɩ ɔfɔ wa Yekire ɩɩkɛɩzuoŋɩra yɛyɛɓɩra kɩ san a.
47004018	Naɗɩɛ mɩyɩra kɩ yã, aa ɓaɗ a yiwiye ɩɛ za waʔ, mɩkɛɩyãanyɩra kɩ ɓan, ɩɛ za aa ɓaɗ a yiwiyira. Mɩyɩra kɩ yã ɩra, ɩɛ bʋ wa tãrayanyɛ, ŋa mɩkɛɩyãanyɩra kɩ ɓan, ɩɛ bʋ wa kɛɩzuonye.
47005001	A tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha a gbɔʔɩra kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha thʋʋsɛ na a nimira hʋ̃n ɩ za fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ fara, na ɩɛ gbɔʔɩra ɓa asɩnɩ, Yekila ɔfɔn ma thʋʋga gʋɔ na sann a zaara ni, nɩthɩ̃rɩga leke maɗ gɩɛ thʋʋgɩra waʔ, gɩɛ thʋʋgɩra bʋ wa kɛɩasɩraŋa.
47005002	Ɩra wɩɛ a bʋ wa kɩ fʋʋ gɩɛ zaazaa thʋʋgɩɛ mɩyɛ za na a tɩɛ gɩ, naɗɩɛ a ɓɩɛ wa thĩ na lon kɩ za,
47005003	Na a ɓuun ɩɛ gbɔʔɩra, a hɩɗan gbɔwereye dʋ̃waʔ.
47005004	Baa a bʋ gbɔʔɩra za dunuyara za fara, a usi wa mʋ gaga kha a gboŋonn ma, a ɓɩɛ kha fɔlɔŋɩɛ gbɔʔɩra khon a za waʔ, ŋa a ɓɩɛ wa na yii zaazaa gbɔɗa ɩ za na sɩɛ si le thaaga thakuogo baka gbɔhuona.
47005005	Yekila thĩra ɔfɔn a, a ɓu gɩɛ thakuogira. Ʋɔ hãar a u Nina a ɓu ɗɩɛ ken ɩɛ dɩ̃ɩn mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɩɛ za.
47005006	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na aa bʋ na haɓɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ. Na yɩɛ a a gbɔʔɩra za fɔlɔŋɩra za fara ʋɔ, a khaarɛ legen ma na Adɛyɛ hɩɗankhɛla,
47005007	(naɗɩɛ ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ, a yãar ɩ̃ na yiwire waʔ, ŋa a nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ wa mafɩra naɗɩɛ baa a khãa ʋ za.)
47005008	Iyo, haɓɛ bʋ a za gbaangbo. A khɔrɩ wa na kure gbɔɗɩɛ za na yo hɩɗan Adɛyɩra heke.
47005009	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, na hɩɗan gbɔɗa za ba, warɩma na kure tɩ za na yo Adɛyɩra heke ba, wɛsɩɛ a ɓɩɛ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha a mɩyɛ nʋʋ ʋ.
47005010	Naɗɩɛ a bɩɛ kãn ma na nɩ́ɩrɛ́ Kirisitira wʋɔla za u kiti a, si le thaaga, a bɩɛ kpo kpora ɓu a taasɛ na makɩ̃n na mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɩra warɩma mɩbɩ̃ɩnyɩra a liin bɛna a kha bʋ dunuyara za ɩra.
47005011	Baa a tʋ lɔmɩra za nɩra kãn ãn Adɛyɩra, gɩɛ yɩɛn na a pɛ̃ɩ kɩ dɛnfɛ nɩpɛ pi ɓu tʋ ʋ. Yekila tʋ a wa kɩ̃raŋɩra, mɩɛ gbũu khãa wa sɩ za kha mafɩra ɩ̃ɛ tʋ aa tɩ̃ kɩ̃raŋɩra na ɩ̃ gagasɩra bɩɛ.
47005012	Aa ɓɩɛ na ɔfɔ de aa thĩ mɩyɛ dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa a ɓɩɛ wa na hã ɩ̃ lɔmɛ ɩ̃ bãanɛ wuo dɩ̃ɩna aa, si le thaaga ɩ̃ wɔrɩ ɓu dʋɔ na zɩ̃ŋɩn yɩsɩɓɩɛdɛwɩra kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ pi thĩ gbɔʔɛ mɩyɛ za kɩ zɩɛ nin mɩyɩra ɩra.
47005013	Na si ɓuun ma kha aa mɩlewenyɩra bʋ wa thaʔarɩ mɩyɛ, a liin ma sɩɛ Yekila kãma. Ŋa si gbũun ɓuun ma kha thaʔarɩ mɩyɛ ɩ waʔ, a liin ma sɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ kãma.
47005014	Naɗɩɛ Kirisitira khɔrɩmɩra zɩ̃nn ma a gagasɩra bɩɛ, a lann ma sɩ za kha nɩra kpo huun nɩpɛ bɩɛ kãma, sɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ gaga nɩpɩra bɩɛ huun Yekila wʋɔla za.
47005015	Ʋɔ gbũun huun ma nɩpɛ bɩɛ boɗa za si le thaaga hã nɩkogolinkowira hɩɗan ko pi thĩ za dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa wɩɛra huun na gbũun alɩn pi boɗa za, pi le ʋɔ bɛwɛ.
47005016	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, a ɓa ken nɩra sii nɩthɩ̃rɩga kenlɔmɛ za dʋ̃waʔ. Harɩ na a na tʋʋn ma Kirisitira nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ tʋlɔmɩra za khɔ̃ɩra, ɩra wɩɛ a tʋ Kirisitira bɩɛ tʋlɔnkpuowira za dʋ̃waʔ.
47005017	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na nɩra bʋ Kirisitira za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra liin ma nɩfɛnwɛ̃. Mɩɗuguyira bɩɛ tan ma, kɩ yɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ ɔfɔ le fɛnyɛ.
47005018	Ɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ kuɗ ɓa Yekila za, ʋɔ yiin nʋkpuola aa na ʋɔ tɩɛ Kirisitira kãmara za, ki gbũun hãar a miliinse kha a yii nʋkpuore ʋɔ na nɩpɛ tɩɛ.
47005019	Naɗɩɛ Yekila kha liige wa na Kirisitira ki yii nʋkpuore ʋɔ na dunuyara nɩpɛ tɩɛ. U ken pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira foi dʋ̃waʔ. Ŋa ʋ hãar a wa sɩɛsɛ sɩɛ miliinsira za a wɔrɩ ki yii nʋkpuore ʋɔ na nɩpɛ tɩɛ.
47005020	Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za a liin dãarawɛ dunuyara za kɩ sɩɛrɛ u boɗa za. Sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha Yekila khɛ wa aa kɩ yɩ ɩ̃. A yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za kha ɩ̃ yɩɛ nʋkpuore hɩɗan ɩ̃ɛ na Yekila tɩɛ.
47005021	Kirisitira liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ yãan waʔ, ŋa Yekila gboŋon u wa mɩbɩ̃yɩra aa liiri, si le thaaga a le nɩtelenyeme ʋ wʋɔla za Kirisitira kãmara za.
47006001	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, aa wɛpɩɛ ki liige na Yekila kpuore, a yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa zaanɩ kha fɩ̃ɩmɩra Yekila fɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃ za, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ bɩɛ le kpasa waʔ.
47006002	Naɗɩɛ Yekila deɗ ɓa ʋ sɩɛsɩra za kha: «Mi nuun mʋ yɩ̃mɩra na makɩ̃nn na mɩ bɛnkhɔrɩyɔna, mɩ ɓann ma na dɛnfɛn mʋ zɩ̃mɛ ɗɩyãgɩra.» Ken, Yekila bɛnkhɔrɩyɔna dɩɛ mɩra. Ken, ɩra kɩ bʋ bɛnkɩ̃na, fɩ̃ɩra kɩ bʋ nɩpɛ bɩɛ zɩ̃mɛ ɗɩyãgɩra,
47006003	A ɓɩɛ kha nɩra sii de a miliinse yɩsɩbɩ̃ɩga waʔ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na a ɓɩɛ na barɩ nɩɩra sii u Yekire khɩ̃nɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɛ̀ za waʔ.
47006004	Ŋa a ɓɔgɔ sɩ wa lɔmɩra bɩɛ za kha aa bʋ wa Yekila liigedɛwɛ. A ba ɓa vɛngɔnsɛ na gagaʔasɩga, na wɔkpãka gbaangbo na a sɔmɩra.
47006005	Pɩ khɩ ɓa aa, na yii a kaso za, pi suu yii wa nɩpɛ aa za, a le wa miliinhʋwʋsɛ, ɗʋɔmɛ kpɩ ɓa aa, aa hɩɗan ma khʋ̃mʋŋa za,
47006006	a le wa Yekila miliinsira na teleme, na Yekire tʋʋmɛ, na baɓɛ, na lɔnkɩ̃rɩwɛ, na Yekila Nina wɔrɩkɩra, na khɔrɩthĩnthĩme,
47006007	na tɩ̃ya sɩɛsɛ, na Yekila wɔrɩkɩra, a khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdaasɩra a khɛ kɩ khɛ̃ɩ na a tɩɛgɛ a thĩ dɩ̃ɩn sɩ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ na le mɩtelenyenye Yekila wʋɔla za.
47006008	Nɩpɛ gbɩ̃nɛ a, na bʋɔ gbũu zene a, nɩpɛ maa a wa yɩsɩbɩ̃ɩga, na bʋɔ hã a yɩsɩnʋʋga, nɩpɛ ken a wa tɔndɛwɛ, kɛna aa ki de tɩ̃yara,
47006009	aa bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha nɩra tʋ a waʔ, kɛna nɩpɛ tʋ a wa kɩ̃raŋɩra thĩ, pi ken ma kha aa bu yo wa hukhɛrɛ, kɛna a bʋ wa thakuogo za, pɩ gbɩ̃ɩ wa aa, kɛna a hu waʔ,
47006010	pi le wa aa wɔkpãmɩyɛ, kɛna aa bãanyɩra wuo wa bɛnyɛ bɩɛ, Pi ken a wa mʋ gaga kha a bʋ wa bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ, kɛna aa kɩ yɩɛ bʋɔra le ɓudanɩpɩra, a bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha mɩɩnɛ bʋ a heke waʔ, kɛna mɩyɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa aa heke!
47006011	Ɩ̃ɛ Korɛ̃tɩ nɩpɩra kɩ bʋ aa yɛsɛwɩra, a sɩɛrɛn ɩ̃ wa kɛɩ guure mɩɩnɛ ɩ̃ za, aa phiin zɩɛn ma a kpolonsira na hãar ɩ̃.
47006012	Aa ʋɔ ɓɩɛn kha aa bi ĩ a kpolonsira za waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ɛ thĩra biɗ ĩ kpolonsira aa za.
47006013	Ɩra wɩɛ mɩɛ sɩɛrɛ ɩ̃ wa mʋ gaga kha mi ɓihũnrome kɩ bʋ ɩ̃, lɔmɩra za a phiin zɩɛn a kpolonsira na hãar ɩ̃, ĩ phii zɩɛ ĩ kpolonsira mafɩra tɩ̃ na hã a.
47006014	Hã ɩ̃ ɓa dɩɛ mɩɩnɛ sii za na wɛpɛ kɛɩn khãamɛ Kirisitira za waʔ. Naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ wɔrɩ hɩɗan kpuore waʔ. Mʋsɛ sii mɩtelenyenye wɔrɩ dɩɛ na mɩkɛɩtelenyenye? Mʋsɛ sii yɛyɛɓɛ le kɩ wɔrɩ dɩɛ na dabirige?
47006015	Nʋkpuore dʋ̃nɛ kɩ bʋ Kirisiti na Sutana tɩɛ? Nʋkpuore dʋ̃nɛ kɩ bʋ wɩɛ kɩ khãa Kirisitira za na wɩɛ kɩ khãa ʋ za waʔ?
47006016	Nʋkpuore dʋ̃nɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra na sɩ̃mɛ tɩɛ? Naɗɩɛ aa kɩ bʋ Thakuo Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra, mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila thĩra deɗ si ʋ sɩɛsɩra za kha: «Mɩ ɓa hɩɗan ma pɩ sʋgʋmʋra za kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ dɩ̃ɩn mɩ, mɩɛ kɩ ɓa le pi Yekila, kɩ yɩɛ pi le mɩ nɩpɛ.»
47006017	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Adɛyɩra deɗ kha: «Ĩ kure bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ sʋgʋmʋra za, na hɩɗan ĩ doro; hã ɩ̃ ɓa pho mɩtegene sii za waʔ. Na ĩ liin mafɩra, mɩ ɓa bɩ ɩ̃»
47006018	Wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Adɛyɩra deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Mɩɛ kɩ ɓa le ĩ Siira, kɩ yɩɛ ĩ le mi ɓikhiiwe na mɩ ɓihɛrɩpɛ.»
47007001	Mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ baa gɩɛ nʋʋgɩra hãar aa, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a yɛɗɛ a thĩ na khon mɩyɩra ki teɗe a gbɔʔɩra na a zusuwira Yekila wʋɔla za, kɩ pɛ̃ɩ na le nɩyɛgɛmɛ kɩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ.
47007002	Ĩ phii zɩɛ ĩ kpolonsira hã a. Aa liin nɩra sii mɩbɩ̃yɛ yãan waʔ, a asɩn nɩra mɩyɛ waʔ, a gbũun waan nɩra sii za yãan waʔ.
47007003	Mi de sɩɛ na ɓu zarɩgɩ̃n nɩra kha u liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ. Mi nisĩnn deɗ ĩ si zuori kha ɩ̃ mɩyɛ gbɩ̃ra wa a za tĩ, a bʋ wa thakuogo za ba, a huun ma ba, aa na ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa kuopre.
47007004	Mɩ lann ma ɩ̃ za gbaangbo, dɩ̃ɩna mɩ gbɩ̃nɛ wa mi thĩ ɩ̃ɛ mɩyɩra za. Na yɩɛ a a vɛnsɩra za mɩ hɩɗann ma na haɓɛ na bãanwuoŋo gbaangbo.
47007005	Naɗɩɛ, baa a nann Masedʋwanɩ sɩrɩgɩra ʋ, a ɓuun wuorese harɩ kɩrɩ waʔ, fɔ vɛnsɛ doro. Pi kpii a wa khɛ̃ɩsɛ doro gbɛ̃ɩgɩra ʋ, dɩ̃ɩna ãnabirise kha bʋ wa a za tɩ̃.
47007006	Ŋa baa Yekila hã wa haɓɛ na wɛpɩɛ gbɔʔɛ huun mi, ʋɔ hãar a haɓɛ a yaɓiye Titi ɓamɩra za,
47007007	ʋ ɓamɩra dola hãan aa haɓɩra waʔ, lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ hãar ʋ haɓɩra, sɩɛ yɩɛn tɩ̃. Ʋ ɓa kpɔrɩn a sɩ kha ɩ̃ kha fʋʋ wa mɩɛ mɩyɛ za, kha ɩ̃ wʋɔyɩra kpãɗ ɓa, dɩ̃ɩna lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ vɛn mɩ za, sɩɛ liin thaagɩra na dʋɔ sɩɛn mɩ bãanwuoŋira za.
47007008	Iyo, mɩ tʋʋn ma kha mɩ lʋgʋ sɛwʋra na kpãɗɛn ma ɩ̃ wʋɔyɩra, ŋa mɩ hɩɗan na de kha na mɩ na tʋʋn waʔ. Harɩ na mɩ na deɗ kha na mɩ na tʋʋrɩ, (sɩɛ bʋ wa baa mɩ kpãɗɛn ma ɩ̃ wʋɔyɩra bɛndaaɗɛ dʋɔ za doro.)
47007009	Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ mɩ bʋ wa bãanwuoŋo za. Ɩ̃ wɔkpãkɩra kãmara ʋ waʔ, ŋa baa gɩɛ wɔkpãkɩra liin thaagɩra na ɩ̃ vɩkɩ̃nn ĩ kpolonsira sɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ bʋ bãanwuoŋira za. Ɩ̃ wɔkpãkɩra liin ma Yekire dĩŋo. Sɩɛ za, a liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ nɩra sii za waʔ.
47007010	Naɗɩɛ wɔkpãkɩra kɩ makɩ̃n na Yekila dĩŋora, gɩɛ kɩ yɩɛ nɩra wɔrɩ vɩkɩ̃n u kpoloŋira na ɓu zɩ̃mɛ. Mɩnatʋʋrɩ bʋ bɩɛ zɩ̃mɩra za waʔ, ŋa wɔkpãkɩra kɩ vɩkɩ̃n nɩra gagasɛ waʔ, gɩɛ ɓan ma na huume.
47007011	Wɔkpãkɩra nann ɩ̃ na makɩ̃nn na Yekila dĩŋora, ken mɩyɩra thĩna kɩ hãar ɩ̃. Gɩɛ wɔkpãkɩɛ yɩɛn na ɩ̃ ãnn Yekila, kɩ ɗɛ khɩɛn mɩyɩra na sʋɔwɛsɛ, kɩ ɓɔgɔn kha mɩbɩ̃yɛliige nʋʋ ɩ̃ waʔ, harɩ na ĩ donni. Mɩ wɔbirige gɔɗ ɩ̃ wa thĩ, kɩ yɩɛn na ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩn na kpaŋɩ̃nn mɩbɩ̃yɛledaara kɩ̃raŋɩra. Ɩ̃ ɓɔgɔn sɩ wa lɔmɛ bɩɛ za kha ɩ̃ɛ nii kha bʋ ʋɔ mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa wɩɛ mɩyɩɛ za waʔ.
47007012	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, na ɩ̃ yãan na mɩɛ dãan hãar ɩ̃ sɛwʋwɩɛ, wɩɛra liin mɩbɩ̃yɩra, warɩma wɩɛra za u liin si, bɩɛ kãma yɩɛn waʔ, ŋa mɩ dãar ʋ wa si le thaaga, lɔmira za ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩn aa mɩyɩra za, sɩɛ bɩɛ yã Yekila wʋɔla za.
47007013	Ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ hãan aa haɓɩra. Na sɩɛ sɩɛ za, Titira kpolonwuoŋira wuoren ma a bãanyɩra gbaangbo tɩ̃, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ bɩɛ wuoren ma ʋ gagasɩra.
47007014	Mɩ gbɩ̃nɛn ma mi thĩ ɩ̃ɛ mɩyɛ za ʋ wʋɔla ʋ, sɩɛ liin nɩɩsɛ mɩɛ heke waʔ. Ŋa lɔmɩra za a le dɛrɩ ki de ĩ tɩ̃yara, mafɩra a kpɔrɩn ɩ̃ mɩyɩra na Titira; mafɩra tɩ̃ u gbũun yo ɓuun si.
47007015	Na ʋ kʋɔgɩ̃nn na lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpo kpora nuun ʋ bɛla, dɩ̃ɩna baa ĩ sũnen ĩ thĩ na gɔɗ ʋ na kɩ̃ran na gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, dʋɔ sɩɛ wa ʋ khɔrɩmɩra za na gbũu ɩ̃ mɩyɩra za.
47007016	Mɩ bãanɛ wuon ma gbaangbo, naɗɩɛ mɩ tʋʋn ma kha mɩ wɔrɩ lan ɩ̃ za mɩyɛ bɩɛ za.
47008001	A yaɓiiwe, fɩ̃ɩmɩra Yekila fɩ̃ɩn Masedʋwanɩ egiliziwe nɩpɩra za, a ɓɩɛ kha ɩ̃ kʋɔmɛ hɩɗan sɩɛ za waʔ.
47008002	Na yɩɛ wɩ vɛnkpakpasɛ gbɩ̃rɩsɩra za, pɩ bãanyɩra na wuon ma gbaangbo, dɩ̃ɩna baa pɩ kha bʋ bʋɔmɩra za, pɩ vɔrɩn ma leke na hãan pi leke mɩyɩra na kpoloŋo kpo.
47008003	Mɩɛ bʋ pɩ sɩɛrɛ kha pɩ hãan ma pi leke mɩyɩra na bãanwuoŋo na makɩ̃nn na pɩ wɔrɩkɩra, harɩ na tann pɩ wɔrɩkɩra thĩra.
47008004	Pɩ yɩ̃nn a wa zaanɩ thĩ kha dɛnfɛsɩra ki khon kɩ dãa kɩ hã Zeruzalɛmʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra, kha a yɩɛ bɩɛ yii bɩɛ nii bʋ.
47008005	Pi nisĩnn hãan ma pi thĩ na Adɛyɩra, sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na pɩ hãan pi thĩ na aa na makɩ̃nn na Yekila dĩŋora harɩ na tann wɛsɩɛ aa kha gaga ɩra.
47008006	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na aa yɩ̃nn Titira kha sɩɛ fɩ̃ɩmɛ liigesira ʋ gɔɗ ki le mɩra, ʋ pɛ̃ɩ sɩ za na yo si wʋɔrɛ na yo nan si diikhɛla ĩ heke ni.
47008007	Ĩ liin ma ɓudanɩpɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ za. Ɩ̃ bʋ wa na khãamɛ, ɩ̃ tʋ wa sɩɛsɛ, ɩ̃ tʋ wa Yekire mɩyɛ, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ wa gbaangbo, dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ khɔrɩ wa aa. Mafɩra, aa ɓɩɛ sɩ wa ĩ heke kha ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na fɩ̃ɩn kpoloŋo na sɩɛ tɩ̃.
47008008	Mɩ hã ɩ̃ sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra kha ĩ le si faŋa za waʔ dɛ, ŋa lɔmɩra za egiliziwira bʋɔra pɛ̃ɩrɩ, sɩɛ mi bu de ĩ na zɩɛ ɩ̃ za na ken na ɓu tʋ na khɔrɩthĩnthĩme bʋ ɩ̃ za.
47008009	Naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ tʋ a Adɛyɩra Yesu Kirisitira fɩ̃ɩmɩra, ɓudanɩra kha bʋ ʋ, kɛna ʋ bɩɩn ma na liin u thĩ bʋɔmɛ nɩra ɩ̃ɛ kãmara za, si le thaaga ĩ le ɓudanɩpɛ ʋɔ bʋɔmɩra za.
47008010	Na gbũu ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ za, mɩɛ gagasɛ kɩ bʋ kha sɩ kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ sɩɛ miliinsɩɛ za, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ ɩ̃ gɔɗ goɗa. Ɩ̃ɛ ĩ liin lʋgʋ nɩpɩra na khonn gagasɛ na gbũun tigibĩŋiŋira za, dɩ̃ɩna si liimira za.
47008011	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ sɩɛ miliinsira za na hĩɗe si, si le thaaga, nʋnʋʋmɩra kha bʋ ɩ̃ za sɩ gɔbɛna, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na phɩla sɩ na bɩɛ nʋnʋʋkpuowira tɩ̃ na makɩ̃n na ɩ̃ wɔrɩkɩra.
47008012	Na mʋ hãan mu leke mɩɩnɛ na gagakɩ̃rɩsɛ, Yekila bɩ wa dɩɛ leke mɩhãana na makɩ̃n na mʋ wɔrɩkɩra, ŋa khaarɛ mʋ wɔrɩkɩra nann waʔ, Yekila ken sɩɛ waʔ.
47008013	Sɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha a ɓɩɛ wa na le ĩ bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ kɩ yɩɛ bʋɔra le ɓudanɩpɛ waʔ, ŋa si le thaaga ɩ̃ bɩɛ ɓuumira hɩɗan kpuore.
47008014	Ɩra wɩɛ ʋɔ, mɩyɩra kɩ gɔn ĩ heke, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ khon ma ɩɛ za na dɛnfɛ bʋɔmɛ nɩpɩra. Mafɩra tɩ̃, na mɩyɛ ɓa kpɩɗ ɩ̃ɛ ɗɩyãgɛ bãa kɛna bɩɛ bʋ na leke mɩyɛ, bɩɛ wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃, si le thaaga ɩ̃ bɩɛ ɓuumira le kpuore,
47008015	mʋ gaga kha baa sɩ sɛwɛn Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Wɛpɩɛ na hoɗ ( manɩra) gbaangbora, ʋ ʋɔ yɩɛn pi heke waʔ. Wɛpɩɛ na hoɗ u kɩrɩ ʋ, bɩɛ baara kpɩɗ pɩ yãan tɩ̃ waʔ.»
47008016	Thɩɛɗa bʋ wa Yekila bɛrɛ, naɗɩɛ baa ʋ yɩɛn na ɩ̃ mɩyɛ gbɩ̃ra Titira za mʋ gaga kha baa ɩ̃ mɩyɛ gbɩ̃ra aa za tɩ̃ ɩra.
47008017	Titira bɩɩn ma aa yɩ̃mɩra, ŋa sɩ na nʋʋn ma ʋɔ thĩra na u khonn gagasɛ kha ʋɔ thĩnye ĩ heke.
47008018	Yaɓiira egiliziwe nɩpɩra bɩɛ fʋʋ na ʋ yɩsɩnʋʋgɩra Yekire sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra deɓira za, ʋɔ a khonn sɩɛn Titira za na dãan mɩ ĩ heke.
47008019	Sɩɛ dola ɩ waʔ, egiliziwe nɩpɩra kenn khonn u wa na liir u a nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀dakãra na yo kpɩkɩ̃n tigiyira bĩŋinn ɩra. Sɩɛ miliinsɩɛ a le si wa na gbɩ̃nɛ a Adɛyɛ, kɩ yɩɛ a wɔrɩ ɓɔgɔ nɩpɛ lɔmɩra za a hãan a thĩ sɩɛ miliinsɩɛ za.
47008020	Ɩɛ tigigɔngɔnyɩra pi yiin a lesira za kha a kpɩkɩ̃n ɩ, a le wa lɔmɩra bɩɛ hã nɩra sii ɓa ɓu asɩ a yɩsɩga ɩɛ tigiyɩɛ mɩyɛ za waʔ.
47008021	Aa ɓɩɛ na ɓɔgɔ a telemira na Yekila kpora waʔ, ŋa a ɓɩɛ wa na ɓɔgɔ a telemira dɩ̃ɩna nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra tɩ̃.
47008022	Nɩpɩra a kenn khonn kɩ dãa, a sɩɛn ma a yaɓiiwɩɛ pɩ za. A zɩɛn ma ʋ za na kenn bɛngɔnyɛ. Ʋ bʋ wa nɩra wɛ kɩ hã u thĩ miliinsira bɩɛ za, u gbũu ɔfɔn ɓɔgɔn a wa sɩ ɩra wɩɛ tɩ̃, naɗɩɛ ʋ khãa wa ɩ̃ za gbaangbo kɩ ɓɩɛ na hã u thĩ na tãra khɔ̃ɩra.
47008023	Titira ʋɔ bʋ wa mɩ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀dakãran na mɩ liigedakãran ɩ̃ɛ kãmara za; ŋa a yaɓiiwira bʋɔra bɩɛ, egiliziwe nɩpɩra kenn khonn bɩɛ kɩ dãa wɩ sɩɛ liigesira za na gbɩ̃nɛ Kirisitira.
47008024	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ ɓɔgɔ pɩ kha ɩ̃ɛ khɔrɩ pɩ, si le thaaga egiliziwira bʋɔra nɩpɩra yã sɩɛ na tʋ sɩ kha baa a yɩ ɩ̃ yɩsɩnʋʋgɩra, tɩ̃ya bʋ wa a heke.
47009001	Leke mɩyɩra kɩ kãn khon na dɛnfɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra Zeruzalɛmʋra, thaaga bʋ sɩ za mɩ ɔfɔ hã ɩ̃ sɛwɛ na gbũu gɩɛ gɛŋɩra za dʋ̃waʔ.
47009002	Mɩ tʋʋn ma kha ɩ̃ɛ bɩɩn ma sɩɛ na ɩ̃ gagasɩra bɩɛ zuori, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ gbɩ̃nɛ mɩ thĩ Masedʋwanɩ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra sʋgʋmʋra za ɩ̃ɛ kãma. Mɩ deɗ pi wa si zuori kha ɩ̃ɛ Akayɩ sɩrɩgɩra kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra hɩɗann ma sɩɛ hɩɗansɛ na gɔɗ harɩ goɗa, baa ɩ̃ gbʋ̃ʋn tigiyira khomira za, sɩɛ liin ma thaaga na egilizi gɔmɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ khɩɛn bɩɛ lɔmɩra tɩ̃.
47009003	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, mɩ dãa wa a yaɓiiwira ĩ heke si le thaaga ɩ̃ ɔfɔ ĩ thĩ na zɩɛ mʋ gaga kha baa mɩ na deɗ si ɩra. Mafɩra, baa aa gbɩ̃nɛ aa thĩ ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra kãmara za ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ kpoloŋira za, hã sɩɛ ɓa le kpasa waʔ.
47009004	Naɗɩɛ mɩ bʋ dʋ̃nɛ wa kha na mɩɛ na Masedʋwanɩ nɩpɛ bʋɔ ɓa thiyen ĩ heke, a ɓa yo ɓu na ɩ̃ yɩɛn kɛɩ ɔfɔn ĩ thĩ na zɩɛrɩ, bʋɔtɛ baa a lan ɩ̃ za, sɩ ɓa le wa nɩɩsɛ a heke, ɓa tãra de kha ɩ̃ɛ dʋ̃waʔ.
47009005	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mi kenn si kha sɩ kɩ̃ra mi nisĩn dãa a yaɓiiwira pi nisĩn na yo ki bĩŋin ĩ leke mɩhãanyira ɩ̃ na hãan nʋʋgɩra ɩra, na mi thiye. Sɩɛ kɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ kha ɩ̃ hãar ɩ̃ wa na kpoloŋo kpo, hã si le mʋ gaga kha nɩra u yiir ĩ i khome za faŋa waʔ.
47009006	Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ kha: Wɩɛ kɩ tʋɔgɔ kɩ̃rɩ ʋ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa kpɛwʋ wa kɩrɩ tɩ̃. Wɩɛ kɩ tʋɔgɔ gbaangbo, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa kpɛwʋ wa gbaangbo tɩ̃.
47009007	Nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpo kpora kãn ma na hã na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ pi khonn pɩ gagasɩra za ɩra, kɛɩ le wɔkpãka, hã si gbũu le faŋa mɩyɛ ʋ dɛyɩra za waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila khɔrɩ wa wɩɛ kɩ hã na bãanwuoŋo ɩra.
47009008	Naɗɩɛ wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa Yekila heke na kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ gbaangbo lɔnthĩmira bɩɛ za, si le thaaga, mɩyɩra bɩɛ za ɩ̃ vɛn, hã ɩɛ yʋɔ sii kpɩ ɩ̃ bɛna za ɩ̃ vɛn ɩ za waʔ. Kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ bãanwuoŋo za na le miliinkɩ̃rɩsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ.
47009009	Si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Ʋ vɔrɩn ma u lekira na dɛnfɛn bʋɔmɛ nɩpɩra, ʋ kɩ̃rɩgɩra ɓa zuo kũu waʔ.»
47009010	Yekila kɩ hã sʋ̃nɛdaara ɗiitʋɔla, ki gbũu hã ʋ ɗimɩɩna tɩ̃, ʋɔ kpuora kɩ ɓa hã ɩ̃ ɗiitʋɔla kɩ gɔnɛ rɩ, kɩ yɩɛ ĩ levɔrɩkɩra tɔ̃nɩra gbɩ̃.
47009011	Ʋɔ kɩ ɓa le ĩ ɓudanɩpɛ mɩyɛ bɩɛ za, ɩ̃ kɩ vɔrɩ leke bãanyɛ bɩɛ, sɩɛ le thaaga, nɩgɔmɛ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila na gbũu ĩ leke mɩhãanyɩra a hã wɩ ɩra.
47009012	Naɗɩɛ ĩ leke mɩhãanyɩra ĩ khon mɩra, Yekila nɩpɩra dɛnfɛmɛ dola za si dii waʔ, ŋa ɩ yɩɛ wa nɩgɔmɛ thɩɛ Yekila.
47009013	Na pɩ ɓa yãan ɩ̃ dɛnfɛsɩra tɔ̃nɩra, pɩ ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ wa Yekila, naɗɩɛ ĩ mɩlewenyira makɩ̃nn ma na Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra ɩ̃ bɩɩn ɩra. Dɩ̃ɩna naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ vɔrɩn ĩ lesira kɩ dɛnfɛ bɩɛ dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɩra bɩɛ ɩra.
47009014	Lɔmɩra za Yekila fɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃ za gbaangbora, sɩɛ ɓa yɩɛ pɩ yɩ̃n Yekila na hã ɩ̃, na ɓɔgɔ kha bɩɛ khɔrɩ ɩ̃.
47009015	Yekila bɛrɛ kɩ bʋ thɩɛɗa na dɛnfɛkɛɩzuonsira ʋ dɛnfɛn a ɩra.
47010001	Mɩɛ Poli, pi de ɓa kha mɩɛ bʋ wa nɩwuomo bɛna mɩ bʋ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋ za, ŋa na mɩ kuɗ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za mi le wa nɩhʋwa ɩ̃ za. Mɩɛ thĩra kɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ zaanɩ Kirisitira makarɩla na ʋ fɩ̃ɩmɩra kãmara za,
47010002	mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ mɩ ɓa le nɩhʋwa bɛna mɩ ɓa hɩɗan ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za waʔ, naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ ki ken kha aa liige wa na makɩ̃n na nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ dĩŋora, bɩɛ za mɩ ɓa hʋgan mɩ lɔmɩra.
47010003	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, a bʋ wa nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe, ŋa a khɛ̃ɩ nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe lɔmɛ za waʔ.
47010004	A khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdaasɩra bʋ mʋ gaga kha nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira bɛsɩra waʔ, si kuɗ ɓa Yekila heke. Sɩ bʋ wa na wɔrɩkpakpaka na asɩ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra faŋɩra, na gagabɩ̃ɩsɩra bɩɛ;
47010005	dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ pi thĩ kɩ kɛɩ Yekila tʋʋmɩra, aa vɩ ɓa bɩɛ gagasɩra pi sũne pi thĩ ki nu Kirisitira bɛrɛ.
47010006	Na ɩ̃ɛ bɩɩn na ki nu Kirisitira bɛrɛ kɩ̃raŋɩra, dɩɛ bɛna aa tʋ arɩ na khɛ̃ɩ na numigbɩdɛrɩwɩra bɩɛ.
47010007	Ĩ ken mɩyɩra ɩ lɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra za. Na nɩra wɩɛ khãan sɩ za kha ʋɔ bʋ wa Kirisitira baa, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na tʋ sɩ kha aa bʋ wa Kirisitira bɛwɛ tɩ̃.
47010008	Naɗɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra Adɛyɩra hãan aa, kɩ hãan kha a asɩ ɩ̃ waʔ, ŋa kɩ hãan ma, a ɓu dɛnfɛ ɩ̃, ɩ̃ khãa Yekila khɩ̃na nɩɩrɛsɩra za. Harɩ na mɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa na gbɩ̃nɛ mi thĩ na tãra kɩrɩ ʋ gɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra ɓuumira kãma, mɩ ɓa nɩɩ sɩɛ za waʔ.
47010009	Mɩ ɓɩɛ si le mʋ gaga kha mɩ bʋ ãnɛ ɩ̃ wa na mɩ lɛtɩrɩwɩra waʔ.
47010010	Naɗɩɛ bʋɔ de ɓa kha mɩ lɛtɩrɩwɩra za, mi de ɓa sɩɛrɛbɩ̃ɩhʋwʋsɛ bʋ kɩ tãra, kha kɛna na mi thiyen ĩ heke ni, mɩ wɔrɩ le foi waʔ, mɩ wɔrɩ de sɩɛrɛkpaasɛ thĩra waʔ.
47010011	Nɩra wɩɛ ki de sɩɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na tʋ kha lɔmɩra za aa sɩɛrɛ a sɛwʋwɩra za na yɩɛ a kharɩlegene u, na a ɓa nann ni ĩ heke, mafɩra a ɓa hɩɗan lelɔmɩra za tɩ̃.
47010012	Iyo wɛpɩɛ kɩ yɩ pi thĩ yɩsɩnʋʋgɩra, aa ha de kha aa na bɩɛ bʋ kpuore waʔ, aa bɩ na makɩ̃n a thĩ dɩ̃ɩna bɩɛ thĩra waʔ. Pi bo ɓa na kamɛ kɩ makɩ̃n pi thĩ na kamɛ, pɩ bʋ wa wʋɔnlaɗɩpɛ.
47010013	Aa ʋɔ, aa ɓa bɩ na gbɩ̃nɛ aa thĩ na tãra a diikhɛla waʔ, ŋa diikhɛla Yekila ɓɔgɔn aa u miliinsira za, ki liin thaagɩra na aa nann harɩ ĩ heke ni, a ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ wa a thĩ na makɩ̃n na dɩɛ diikhɛdɩɛ.
47010014	Baa aa lʋgʋn nann ĩ heke ni na Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, a tann diikhɛla Yekila ɓɔgɔn a waʔ.
47010015	Mafɩra, aa bɩ na tãra aa diikhɛla waʔ, naɗɩɛ a bɩ na gbɩ̃nɛ aa thĩ nɩkpasa ʋɔ miliinse za waʔ, ŋa a ɓɩɛ wa kha ĩ yo wʋɔrɛ Kirisitira mɩyɩra za, si le thaaga aa wɔrɩ le miliingɔnsɛ sʋɔ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za tɩ̃, na makɩ̃n na diikhɛla hãan aa ɩra.
47010016	Sɩɛ le thaaga aa wɔrɩ de Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra na sɩrɩsɩra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ sɩrɩgɩra kpɩ̃rara ni ɩra. Liigesira bʋɔra liin zuon na tann khaayɛ yʋɔ za, aa ɓa bɩ na gbɩ̃nɛ aa thĩ na pi liigisira ɩɛ khaayɩra za dʋ̃waʔ.
47010017	Sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Wɩɛ bãa bʋ ɓɩɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ Adɛyɩra liiri.»
47010018	Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ kɩ yɩ u thĩ yɩsɩnʋʋga, ʋ dɛyɩra bʋ foi waʔ, fɔ wɩɛ bãa yɩsɩnʋʋga Adɛyɩra yɩʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ bʋ fɩ.
47011001	Ee! Ɩ̃ yɩɛ mi de mɩ wʋɔnkpɩsɩɛsɩra. Iyo ɩ̃ yɩɛ mi de si.
47011002	Mɩɛ khɛ̃ɩ wa zone ɩ̃ mɩyɛ za, Yekila yiin dɩɛ zona mɩɛ za. Naɗɩɛ sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha mɩ yanɛn ɩ̃ wa khuo kpo kpeli heke, ʋɔ liin Kirisitira. Mafɩra, mɩ ɓa yo ĩ ʋ wʋɔla za mʋ gaga kha ɓihɛyɛ wɩɛ tʋʋn khomɩyɛ yãan waʔ.
47011003	Ŋa mɩ ãn ma kha lɔmɩra za sʋwʋgɩra kpɛnsɛn Hawara na kɩ tɔŋɩra, hã nɩpɛ ɓa vɩkɩ̃n ɩ̃ gagasɩra mafɩra tɩ̃ na khon ɩ̃ khãamɩra Kirisitira za waʔ.
47011004	Naɗɩɛ na nɩkpasa ʋɔ ɓann na ɓa deɗ ĩ Yesu ʋɔ mɩyɛ wɩɛ liin kpuore na wɩɛra mɩyɛ aa deɗ ĩ waʔ, ɩ̃ bɩ wa ʋɔ bɛsɩra. Na ĩ ɓuun nin kpasa ʋɔ wɩɛ kɩ bʋ kpuore na wɩɛra ɩ̃ na ɓuuri, warɩma sɩɛrɛnʋʋkpasɩsɛ sʋɔ na wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ sɩɛ kpo na wɛsɩɛ ɩ̃ na lʋgʋn bɩɩrɩ, ɩ̃ khãa wa sɩ za.
47011005	Mɩ gagasɩra za, ɩ̃ dãaragbʋ̃ɔngbʋ̃ɔnbɩɛ bãa mɩɛ za mɩɩnɛ sii za waʔ.
47011006	Sɩ wɔrɩ le kha mɩ tʋ sɩɛrɛ waʔ, ŋa na gbũu Yekila tʋʋmɛ za ʋɔ, bakɩ̃nsɛ bʋ sɩɛ za waʔ. A ɓɔgɔn ɩ̃ wa sɩɛ, mɩyɩra bɩɛ za, dɩ̃ɩna lɔmɩra bɩɛ za na yɛɗɩ.
47011007	Baa mi deɗ ĩ Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kpasara, mi sũnen ma mi thĩ na ɓu arɩga ɩ̃ɛ zaa. Baa mi liin sɩɛ, mi ɓilenn ma sɩɛ za ba?
47011008	Baa mɩ kha liige ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za, egiliziwe bʋɔ nɩpɛ kha taa mɩɛ. Sɩ kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha mɩ kha vʋ̃ʋ wɩ wa.
47011009	Bɛna mɩ hɩɗansɛ kha bʋ ĩ heke ni, tigimɩyɛ kha bʋ wa mɩ za, kɛna mɩ yɩ̃nn mɩɩnɛ nɩra sii heke waʔ. Naɗɩɛ Masedʋwanɩ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kha hã mɩ wa mɩyɩra bɩɛ kha kpɩ ɓɩ ɩra. Mɩ gɔɗ ɓa mi thĩ hã mɩ ɓa le le dagbolonse mɩɩnɛ sii za nɩra sii heke waʔ, mi gbũu ɓa gɔ ɓa mi thĩ mafɩra tɩ̃ kũu.
47011010	Kirisitira tɩ̃yara kɩ bʋ mɩ za, ʋɔ tɩ̃yara wɔrɩkɩra za mi de kha nɩra sii wɔrɩ yɩɛ mi guore gɩɛ yɩsɩgbɩ̃nɛgɩra Akayɩ sɩrɩgɩra khaarɛ sii za waʔ.
47011011	Be liin na mɩɛ de sɩɛ? Mɩ yãasɩ̃nn ɩ̃ wa ba? Ɩya, Yekila thĩra tʋ lɔmɩra za mɩ khɔrɩ ɩ̃!
47011012	Ŋa wɛsɩɛ mi le mɩra, mɩ ɓa arɩ sɩɛ za kũu waʔ, si le thaaga a barɩ wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ lɔmɛ kha bɩɛ gbɩ̃nɛ bɩɛ thĩ na ɓɔgɔ kha aa na bɩɛ bʋ wa kpuore.
47011013	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ bʋ Yesu dãarathĩnthĩme waʔ, tɔngɔyãdedɛwɛ ɩ, bɩɛ wɛpɛ ki le pi thĩ mʋ gaga kha pɩ bʋ wa Kirisitira dãarawɛ bʋɔ. Nɩɓilendɛwɛ ɩ.
47011014	Sɩ bʋ bamʋŋa mɩɩnɛ waʔ, naɗɩɛ Sutana thĩra le le wa u thĩ mʋ gaga kha yɛyɛɓɛ mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ.
47011015	Mafɩra na ɩ̃ yã na ʋ liigedɛrɩwɛ bʋɔ le pi thĩ mʋ gaga kha Yekire telenyemora miliindɛwɛ, sɩɛ kãn na khon nɩra bamʋŋa waʔ. Ŋa Yekila ɓa taa wɩ wa na makɩ̃n na pi miliinyira.
47011016	Mi gbũu de si wa tɩ̃, hã nɩra sii ɓa ken kha mɩ bʋ wa phʋ̃ʋra waʔ. Warɩma ĩ ken mi phʋ̃ʋra, si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ gbɩ̃nɛ mi thĩ kɩrɩ ʋ.
47011017	Wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓɩɛ na de mɩra, mɩ ɓa de si na makɩ̃n na lɔmɩra za Adɛyɩra ɓɩɛ kha mɩ sɩɛrɛ waʔ, ŋa mɩ ɓa sɩɛrɛ wa mʋ gaga kha mɩ bʋ wa phʋ̃ʋra naɗɩɛ khɩ̃nɛ bʋ wa mi heke na gbɩ̃nɛ mi thĩ.
47011018	Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓisira za, nɩgɔmɛ gbɩ̃nɛ wa pi thĩ na makɩ̃n. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ wa mi thĩ tɩ̃.
47011019	Ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ wʋɔmɛ dɛrɩwɩra, ɩ̃ bɩ wa na ba wʋɔnkpɩdɛrɩwɩra phʋ̃rʋmɩyɩra!
47011020	Ɩ̃ bɩ wa pi le ĩ mʋ gaga kha ɗome, ĩ ki liige kɩ hã wɩ, pɩ kɩ zɩ̃n ĩ leke mɩyɩra bɩɛ, ki zene ĩ, kɩ ba ɩ̃ wʋɔla za, ĩ gbũu ba ɓa sɩɛ bɩɛ.
47011021	Mɩ nɩ̃ɩ wa na de ĩ sɩ kha a ɓɔgɔn ma a thĩ ɩɛ mɩyɩra za mʋ gaga kha wɔrɩkɔ bʋ a za waʔ. Kɛna sɩɛ bɩɛ za, na nɩpɛ bʋɔ ha kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ wa pi thĩ mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ kãma, mɩ ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ wa mi thĩ mafɩra tɩ̃, (harɩ na mɩ sɩɛrɛ wa mʋ gaga kha phʋ̃ʋra.)
47011022	Na pɩ bʋ wa Eburuwe, mɩɛ bʋ wa Eburu tɩ̃. Na pɩ bʋ wa Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɛ, mɩɛ bʋ wa Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ nɩra tɩ̃. Na pɩ bʋ wa Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwe, mɩɛ bʋ wa Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiye ʋɔ tɩ̃.
47011023	Na pɩ bʋ wa Kirisitira miliinɓiiwe, mɩɛ bʋ wa Kirisitira miliinɓiye na tãra bɩɛ. (Ba mɩ sɩɛrɛ mɩra, mɩ sɩɛrɛ wa mʋ gaga kha phʋ̃ʋra!) Mɩɛ liigen tann bɩɛ, pi yiin mi kaso za bɛngɔnyɛ na tann bɩɛ, mɩ khʋɔn gbʋ̃ʋsɛ na tann bɩɛ, mɩ yãan huume mɩ lɔkɔ za bɛngɔnyɛ za na tann bɩɛ.
47011024	Yawutuwira khɩɗ ɓa mɩɛ na thĩnwʋɔyɛ tigbiire na gbũne na wãnɩyĩi (39), na nan bãnɩwãa.
47011025	Ɔrɔmʋwɛ khɩɗ ɓa mɩɛ na thĩne na nan bãnɩsãa, Yawutuwe hĩŋinn mɩɛ na bʋrʋsɛ bãnɩkpo, gbuose asɩn na mɩɛ na diin lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ za na nan bãnɩsãa, mɩɛ liin khɩɛ ukpo na dawogo kikpo lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ kpoloŋo za.
47011026	Mɩ sɩrɩyogɔnsɛ liin ma ɗɩɛsɛ za. Mi ɓuun gbɩ̃rɩbɩ̃ɩsɛ baa lagagborowe na kpɩɛrɩ. Mi lonn sɩrɩgɔnsɛ khaayɛ za na ɓuun gbɩ̃rɩsɛ na yaɓiiwira ki telen wa ɩra. Mi thĩnɩpɩra Yawutuwe na thĩmaanyɛ kãma, mi lonn gbɩ̃rɩgɔnsɛ za. Mi ɓuun gbɩ̃rɩsɛ gbongbʋ̃ɔngɔnsɛ za, na gbansɛ za, na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔnsɛ za. Mi ɓuun gbɩ̃rɩsɛ tɔndɛyaɓiiwira kãma za.
47011027	Mi liin ma liige hʋwʋsɛ na vɛnn gbaangbo. Mi liin dawogɔnsɛ kɛɩ hʋ̃n, gʋɔ za khʋ̃mʋŋa na yʋ̃ɔsɛ za, gʋɔ za kɛɩ ɓu ɗimɩɩnɛ; gʋɔ za wese za kɛɩ le dayiinse.
47011028	Na sɩɛ sɩɛ bɩɛ za, mi wukĩn ma ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga egiliziwira bɩɛ mɩyɛ za.
47011029	Na nɩra kpũŋinni, mɩɛ kpũŋinni. Na nɩra waan mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za, sɩ nʋn ma mɩɛ.
47011030	Na mɩ kãn ma na gbɩ̃nɛ mi thĩ, mɩ ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ wa mi thĩ mi kpũnsira kãmara za.
47011031	Mɩ tɔn waʔ, Yekila tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ Adɛyɛ Yesu Siira (Gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bʋ wa Yekila bɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ).
47011032	Baa mɩ kha bʋ Damasɩ gboŋo kpoloŋira ʋ, ɩtakhuo Arɩtasɩ gʋvɛrɩnɛrɩra na yɩɛn ma na pɩ kɩ kɔrɩsɩ̃n gboŋira lonkhɛyɩra na ɓu gɔ ɓɩ.
47011033	Ŋa mɩ yaɓiiwira yiin ma mɩɛ galɩgɔlɩgɔ za na kusen mi tokoro za ki sũnen mi gbenkpɩ̃ra za na wʋ̃nyɛ. Mafɩra mɩ wɔrɩn kuoren mi thĩ dɩ̃ɩn ʋ.
47012001	Mɩ kãn ma na gbɩ̃nɛ mi thĩ sɩɛ za ba? Sɩɛ kɩ̃ra mi foi waʔ. Ŋa mɩyɩra Adɛyɩra yɩɛn na mɩ yãan na wɛʔɩɛ ʋ yɩɛn na mɩ tʋʋrɩ, mɩ ɓa de ɩɛ mɩyɩra ɩra.
47012002	Mɩ tʋ kiretɩ̃ɛ khuo ʋɔ, Yekila yɩɛn ma na ʋ gann harɩ zaazaa diikhɛla za ni sɩ ɗɩɩsɛ gbũne na siyĩira sɩɛ mɩra. (Yekila yɩɛn na ʋ gann na ʋ gbɔɗa bɩɛ ni ba, u nina dola na gann ba, mɩ tʋ waʔ, Yekila kpora kɩ tʋ sɩɛ.)
47012003	Iyo, mɩ tʋʋn ma kha ʋɔ wɛɩwɩɛ na khɩɛn ganɛn ma arɩgɩ̃rana za, (Yekila yɩɛn na ʋ gann na ʋ gbɔɗa bɩɛ ni ba, u nina dola na gann ba, mɩ tʋ waʔ, Yekila kpora kɩ tʋ sɩɛ.)
47012004	Ʋɔ wɛɩ wɩɛ, baa ʋ gann ni, na u nuun sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ ninenina, wɛsɛ kɩ tʋ na de na nʋʋga waʔ, si deɓe khɩ̃nɛ hãan nɩra thĩra kha ʋ kpɔrɩ sɩ waʔ.
47012005	Mɩ wɔrɩ gbɩ̃nɛ wa mi thĩ ʋɔ dɛyɛwɩɛ síirá mɩyɛ za, (ŋa mɩɛ ʋɔ, mɩ gbɩ̃nɛ mi thĩ mi milewenyira za waʔ, fɔ mi kpũŋikhɛyɩra za bɔɔtɛ.)
47012006	Na mɩ kha ɓɩɛ wa na gbɩ̃nɛ mi thĩ, nɩra naa ɓa ken mi phʋ̃ʋra waʔ, naɗɩɛ tɩ̃ya doro mɩ naa ɓa ki de. Ŋa mɩɩna yɩɛn na mɩ kɛɩn sɩɛ liimira, mɩ ɓɩɛ kha nɩra gbɩ̃nɛ mɩ mɩɩnɛ sii za waʔ, fɔ mɩ sɩɛsɩra na mi lelɔmɩra za bʋɔtɛ.
47012007	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, mɩ kha wɔrɩ le wa yɩsɩɓɩɛdagbʋ̃ɔmɔ na makɩ̃n na bamʋŋa mɩyɩra Yekila ɓɔgɔn mɩ ɩra, ŋa Yekila zɩɛ mɩ wa ɓose sʋɔ mʋ gaga kha huoŋo gbʋ̃ʋn mɩ si le thaaga hã mi le yɩsɩɓɩɛdaa waʔ. Sɩɛ ɓosɩɛ bʋ wa mɩ za mʋ gaga kha Sutana mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ kɩ khɩ ɓɩ.
47012008	Na mɩ yɩ̃nn Adɛyɩra bãnɩsãa bɩɛ kha u khon ɓobɩ̃ɩsɩɛ thĩna mɩ gbɔɗa za.
47012009	Ŋa na Adɛyɩra zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Baa mɩ khɔrɩ mʋ, sɩɛ nan mʋ. Bɛna nɩthɩ̃rɩga kpũŋin, fɩ za mɩ wɔrɩkɩra ɓɔgɔ kɩ faŋɩra gbaangbora». Na mafɩra ʋ, bɛna mi kpũŋin, dɩɛ bɛna mɩ gbɩ̃nɛ mi thĩ si le thaaga Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra hɩɗan mɩ za.
47012010	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ bʋ bãanwuoŋo za mi kpũŋinsira za, harɩ na pɩ kʋsa mɩ wa, kɩ vɛnɛ mɩ, kɩ gbɩ̃ɩ mɩ, kɩ kpãɗɛ mɩ wʋɔla ba, mɩ bɩ wa sɩɛ bɩɛ Kirisitira kãmara za! Naɗɩɛ bɛna mi kpũŋini, dɩɛ bɛna wɔrɩkɔ bʋ mɩ za.
47012011	Ĩ ken, mɩ sɩɛrɛ wa mʋ gaga kha phʋ̃ʋra, sɩɛ gbũu kuɗ ɓa ɩ̃ɛ za. Kɛna ɩ̃ɛ kha kãn na yɩ mɩ yɩsɩnʋʋgɩra. Harɩ na mɩɛ bʋ foi waʔ, ĩ Yesu dãaragbʋ̃ɔgbʋ̃ɔmɩra bãa mɩɛ za mɩɩnɛ sii za waʔ.
47012012	Bamʋŋa mɩyɩra kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha mɩ bʋ wa Yesu dãara, mɩ baɗ ɓa na liin ɩɛ bɩɛ na ɩ̃ yãar ɩ. Mi liin ma bamʋŋa na tagamasi mɩyɛ dɩ̃ɩna mɩɓɔgɔyɔnyɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ.
47012013	Bɩra egiliziwira bʋɔra nɩpɩra ɓuun kɛna ɩ̃ɛ ɓuun ni waʔ? Fɔ baa mɩ kɛɩn kha mɩɛ le dagbolonse ɩ̃ za waʔ, ɩ̃ yafa mɩ za, sɩɛ kɩ̃ran waʔ.
47012014	Ĩ ken, mɩ ɔfɔn ma mi thĩ kɩ ɓɩɛ kha mɩɛ le mɩ bãnɩsãa nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀sɩra ĩ heke ni, mi gbũu ɓɩɛ na le dagbolonse ĩ heke tɩ̃ waʔ, naɗɩɛ ĩ leke mɩyɩra mɩ bʋ ɓɩɛ waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ɛ thĩra mɩ bʋ ɓɩɛ. Ɓikɛrɩwɛ kɩ kãn bĩŋin ɓudaga na hã hũndɛwɛ waʔ, ŋa hũndɛwɛ ki kãn ɓɩɛ gɩ na hã ɓikɛrɩwɩra gɩ.
47012015	Mɩɛ ʋɔ, sɩ nʋʋ mɩ wa na hã ɩ̃ mi leke mɩyɩra bɩɛ, ki gbũu hã mi thĩ tɩ̃ na sɩɛ. Baa mɩ khɔrɩ ɩ̃ gbaangbora sɩɛ yɩɛn na ɩ̃ khɔrɩ mɩ gbaangbo waʔ ba?
47012016	Ɩ̃ bɩɛ bɛnn ma sɩɛ za kha mi liin dagbolonse nɩra sii heke waʔ. Ŋa bʋɔ de ɓa kha mɩ khɩɛn ma wʋɔmɛ ɩ̃ za na ɓuur ĩ.
47012017	Wɛpɩɛ mɩ dãan ĩ heke ni, mɩ kpɛnsɛn ɓuun ma mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ bɩɛ ʋɔ heke kha ti kuɗ ɓa ɩ̃ɛ heke ba?
47012018	Mɩ yɩ̃nn ma Titira kha u thiye ĩ heke. Kɩ yɩ̃nn yaɓiira ʋɔra ɩ̃ tʋ ɩra na sɩɛn ʋɔ bʋ. Titira kpɛnsɛn ɩ̃ wa na zɩ̃nn mɩɩnɛ ĩ heke ba? Mɩɛ na Titira milewenyira na a gagasɩra bɩɛ bʋ kpuore waʔ ba?
47012019	Na gɔ kɩ harɩ khɔ̃ɩ, ĩ ken ma kha aa ɓɩɛ wa tɩ̃ya ɩ̃ɛ wʋɔrɛ za ba? Ɩya, sɩɛ ɩ waʔ. A yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, aa ɓɩɛ wa kha ĩ ɓu wɔrɩkɔ Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na a sɩɛrɛ Yekila wʋɔla za Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za.
47012020	Mɩ ãn ma kha na mɩ ɓa thiyen ĩ heke ni, lɔmɩra za mɩ kha khɔrɩ kha mi yo ɓu ĩ waʔ, hã mɩ ɓa le yo ɓu ĩ bɩɛ lɔmɩra za waʔ. Dɩ̃ɩna lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ɛ gbũu kha khɔrɩ na yã mɩ waʔ, hã ɩ̃ ɓa le yã mɩ bɩɛ lɔmɩra za waʔ. Mɩ ãn ma kha hã mɩ ɓa le yo ɓu ĩ khɛ̃ɩgɛ, na zone, na doŋo, na bĩgbogose, na nɩkʋsaga, na sɩɛrɛkpasɩsɛ, na yɩsɩɓɩɛgɛ, na yãgamɩŋa ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za waʔ.
47012021	Mɩ ãn ma tɩ̃ kha na mɩ ɓa gbũun ɔfɔn thiyen ĩ heke, hã mi Yekila ɓa yɩɛ nɩɩsɛ ɓu mi ɩ̃ wʋɔla za, mɩ fʋʋ naɗɩɛ baa gɔmɛ liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ kɩ kɛɩn yafamɛ ɓɩɛmɛ pɩ kakarɩsɛ na pɩ nɩthɩ̃rɩkpasɩsɛ, na pɩ nɩɩlamɩyɩra za waʔ.
47013001	Mi yuonbɩɛ kɩ ɓa le mɩɛ bãnɩsãa yuomira ɩ̃ɛ heke. Sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Na sɩɛsɛ kha si ɗi, sɩ kãn ma na ɗi na makɩ̃n na sɩɛrɛwɛ pɩyɔ̃ warɩma pɩsãa nʋʋga sɩɛsɛ.»
47013002	Baa mɩ na thiyen ĩ heke ni sɩ bãnɩyɔ̃ra za, mɩ na deɗ ĩ si zuori. Ɩra wɩɛ tɩ̃, mɩ bʋ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za waʔ, ŋa mi nisĩn sarɩ wa wɛpɩɛ liin mɩbɩ̃yɩra khɔ̃ɩra, dɩ̃ɩna bʋɔra bɩɛ za kha na mɩ ɓa gbũun ɔfɔn thiyen ĩ heke, mɩ ɓa yɩɛ nɩra sii waʔ.
47013003	Baa ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wa na tʋ mɩɩna kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za mɩɛ sɩɛrɛ, ɩ̃ ɓa tʋ rɩ. Kirisitira liige wɔrɩkɩra zen ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra waʔ, ŋa Kirisitira ɓɔgɔ wa ʋ wɔrɩkɩra ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za.
47013004	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, Kirisitira huun ma nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za kpũnse za, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ ʋ bʋ wa thakuogo za Yekila wɔrɩkɩra za. Aa tɩ̃ a bʋ wa na kpũnse naɗɩɛ baa a bʋ na Kirisitira kpuore. Ŋa Yekila wɔrɩkɩra za, Yekila ɓa yɩɛ wa a hɩɗan thakuogo za dɩ̃ɩna Kirisitira ɩ̃ɛ kãma.
47013005	Mi de ĩ wa sɩ, ɩ̃ gaga na ken ĩ thĩ lɔmɩra kɩ̃raŋɩra, na tʋ na ɩ̃ bʋ khãamɛ khɩ̃na za bere. Ɩ̃ tʋ kha Kirisitira bʋ wa ɩ̃ za waʔ? Fɔ na ɩ̃ yãan tʋʋn ma kha ɩ̃ɛ thĩra bʋ wa ɓilense za bʋɔtɛ.
47013006	Ŋa aa ʋɔ, mɩ khãa wa sɩ za kha ɩ̃ ɓa yã na tʋ sɩ kha aa lɔmɩra ɓɔgɔ wa kha a bʋ wa Yesu dãarathĩnthĩme.
47013007	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, a bʋ wa kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila kha hã ɩ̃ ɓa le mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ. A ɓɩɛ na ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ kha aa bʋ wa na tɩ̃ya waʔ. Ŋa a ɓɩɛ wa kha ĩ ki le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ doro, harɩ na sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha a ɓilenn ma.
47013008	Naɗɩɛ a wɔrɩ barɩ tɩ̃ya waʔ, ŋa a wɔrɩ liige na hã tɩ̃ya.
47013009	Bɛna a kpũŋin kɛna ɩ̃ɛ bʋ na faŋa, dɩɛ bɛna za aa bãanyɩra wuo. Mafɩra, a Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra thaagɩra thĩra kɩ bʋ kha ĩ yo wʋɔrɛ na le nɩhĩyeme.
47013010	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na yɩɛ mɩ kharɩlegene u, mɩ sɛwɛ wa lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã ɩ̃ ʋ, si le thaaga na mɩ ɓa nann ĩ heke ni bɛnɛ bãa, hã mɩ ɓa khɛ wɔrɩkɩra Yekila hãan mɩ na hʋgan sɩ ɩ̃ za na tãra waʔ. Naɗɩɛ Yekila hãan mɩ wa gɩ kha mɩ dɛnfɛ ɩ̃ ĩ yo wʋɔrɛ, ŋa ʋ hãan ŋɩ kha mɩ asɩ ɩ̃ waʔ.
47013011	Ɩra wɩɛ mɩ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ hɩɗan bãanwuoŋo za, ĩ yo wʋɔrɛ na le nɩhĩyeme, ɩ̃ hã kamɛ haɓɛ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ nʋkpuore hɩɗan ɩ̃ tɩɛ, kɩ hɩɗan wɔyĩke za, na sɩɛ liiri, khɔrɩmɛ na wɔyĩke Yekila ɓa hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃ kpuore.
47013012	Ĩ kpen kamɛ na thɩɛ kamɛ na kpolonvɩrɩga. Kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃.
47013013	Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kɩ̃rɩgɩra, na Yekila khɔrɩmɩra, dɩ̃ɩna Ninyɛgɛmɔra kɩ dɩɛ a na le a kpuola, hɩɗan ɩ̃ bɩɛ za.
48001001	Mɩɛ Poli kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã Galasɩ sɩrɩga egiliziwe nɩpɛ. Mɩɛ wɩɛra liin Yesu Kirisiti dãara, nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ dãan mɩɛ sɩɛ miliinsira za waʔ. Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye u gbũun liin thaaga na mɩɛ liin Yesu Kirisitira dãara waʔ, ŋa sɩɛ kuɗ ɓa Yesu Kirisitira, dɩ̃ɩna a Siye Yekila arɩgan ʋ na kusen u huumira za ɩra.
48001002	Mɩɛ dɩ̃ɩna yaɓiiwira kɩ bʋ Kirisitira za, aa kɩ dãa hã ɩ̃ ʋɔ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na thɩɛ ɩ̃.
48001003	A Siye Yekila na Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kɩ̃ra ɩ̃, kɩ hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo.
48001004	Kirisitira hãan ma ʋ thakuogira na ɓu kuore a na a mɩbɩ̃ɩliigira, na ɓu khon a fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ bɩ̃ɩsɩra za, mafɩra u liin na hĩɗen a Siye Yekila dĩŋora.
48001005	Ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra bʋ wa Yekila bɛgɛ kũu! Amiina.
48001006	Yekila ʋ yɩɗ ɩ̃ Yesu Kirisiti fɩ̃ɩmɩra wɔrɩkɩra za, kɛna ɩ̃ vɩɗ dãan ma ʋɔ kpɩ̃ra vivi kɩ dãan wʋɔrɛ sɩɛrɛfɛnsɛ sʋɔ gɛŋɛ, sɩɛ khonn mɩɛ bamʋŋɩra kũura.
48001007	Si gbũu bʋ mʋ gaga kha sɩɛrɛnʋʋfɛnsɛ sʋɔ kɩ bʋ gɔgɛŋɛ waʔ; ŋa nɩpɛ bʋɔ kɩ bʋ ki firigĩn ĩ kɩ ɓɩɛ kha bɩɛ vɩ si Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra.
48001008	Sɩɛ za na nɩra ʋɔ, harɩ na aa ʋɔ, warɩma na zaazaa mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ, ɓa deɗ ĩ sɩɛrɛfɛnsɛ sʋɔ wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ si kpo na wɛsɩɛ aa deɗ ĩ, Yekire daŋa ʋ!
48001009	A na nisĩnn deɗ ĩ wɛsɩɛ, mi gbũu ɔfɔ ki de si wa ɩra wɩɛ tɩ̃ kha na nɩra ʋɔ ɓann na ɓa deɗ ĩ sɩɛrɛfɛnsɛ sʋɔ, wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ si kpo na aa bɛsɩra ɩ̃ bɩɩrɩ, Yekire daŋa ʋɔ dɛyɩra!
48001010	Bɩra ɩ̃ɛ thĩra bʋ gaga ɩra wɩɛ, mɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa kha mɩɛ mɩyɛ nʋʋ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ baa, warɩma Yekire? Mɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa kha mɩɛ le nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ dĩŋo ba? Na mɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa kha mɩɛ mɩyɛ nʋʋ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ ʋɔ, mɩɛ kha wɔrɩ le Kirisitira miliindaa waʔ.
48001011	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha ɩ̃ tʋ kha Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra mi yo deɗ ĩ, si kuɗ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ za waʔ.
48001012	Naɗɩɛ mɩɛ ɓuun si nɩra heke waʔ, nɩra sii gbũun karɩ̃nn mɩɛ sɩ waʔ; ŋa Yesu Kirisitira thĩra karɩ̃nn mɩɛ sɩ.
48001013	Bɛna mɩɛ kha bʋ Yawutuwe khɩ̃na za, ĩ nuun lɔmɩra za mɩɛ kha bʋ ki yo ɩra. Ɩ̃ tʋʋn lɔmɩra za mɩɛ kha gbɩ̃ɩ Yekila egilizi nɩpɩra kɛɩ gbaa, kɩ ɓɩɛ kha mɩɛ khʋ khon mi fɩ pere.
48001014	Dɩɛ bɛna, mɩɛ kha pɛ̃ɩ wa Yawutuwe sɛrɩ khɩ̃na nɩɩrɛsɩra za kɩ tãra mɩɛ sɛtɛwɩra thĩra pi liin Yawutuwira ɩra. Mɩɛ kha gɔ ɓa a sekhãgawɩra sini mɩyɩra na kpoloŋo kpo kɩ tãra Yawutuwira bʋɔra.
48001015	Ŋa Yekila na nisĩnn khonn ma mɩɛ na mɩɛ bʋ wa mɩ yaara kpoloŋira za, kɩ tʋʋn ɓa yɩɗ ɓɩɛ na yiin mi u miliinsira za ʋ fɩ̃ɩmɩra kãmara za.
48001016	Dɩ̃ɩna tɩ̃, baa sɩ ɓa nʋʋr ʋ na ʋ ɓɔgɔn mɩ u Ɓikhiira mi ɓu yo de ʋ mɩyɛ na thĩmaanyɛ, mɩɛ ɓɩɛn ɓɔgɔrɛ nɩra sii heke waʔ.
48001017	Mɩɛ thĩra ɓɩɛn kha mɩɛ yo Zeruzalɛmʋra zo na yo yã wɛpɩɛ pi nisĩnn liin Kirisiti dãarawɩra mɩɛ wʋɔla ʋ zo waʔ, ŋa na mɩɛ ɗɛ telenn ma na yuon Arabu sɩrɩga za zuori. Baa mi kuɗ ni na mɩ vɩɗ gbũun gboŋɩra ʋ pɩ kha yɩ kha Damasɩ.
48001018	Ɗɩɩsɛ sɩ sãa tãrawɛ kpɩ̃ra za mɩ tʋʋn yuon Zeruzalɛmʋra kha mɩɛ tʋ Pɩɛrɩ, mɩ hɩɗann ma ʋɔ heke na liin khɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩwãa.
48001019	Mɩɛ yiwire khɩɗ Yekire dãara ʋɔ sii za dʋ̃waʔ fɔ Adɛyɩra khɩ̃rɩyɛ Zakɩ.
48001020	Yekila bʋ mɩɛ sɩɛrɛ na tʋ kha wɛsɩɛ mɩɛ bʋ sɛwɛ ki de ĩ mɩra, mɩ tɔn waʔ.
48001021	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mi yuon Siri na Silisi sɩrɩsɩra ʋ.
48001022	Ŋa Zude sɩrɩgɩra egiliziwe kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kha tʋ mɩɛ waʔ.
48001023	Pi na nuun ma na pi de mɩɛ mɩyɛ doro kha: «Wɛɩ wɩɛ kha gbɩ̃ɩ a khɔ̃ɩra, ʋɔ ki de Yekila sɩɛsɩra kɩ hã zɩ̃mɩra, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ ʋ kha ɓɩɛ kha ʋɔ asɩ ɩra.»
48001024	Na pɩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila na gbũu mɩɛ mɩyɩra za.
48002001	Ɗɩɩsɛ gbũne na siyĩi tãrawɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na mɩɛ na Barɩnabasɩ vɩɗ yuon Zeruzalɛmʋra. Mɩ na khɩɛn ma Titi na sɩɛn mɩ thĩ za.
48002002	Mi yuon ma ni naɗɩɛ, Yekila thĩra na deɗ kha mi yo. Baa mɩ nann ni, sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra mɩɛ le de thĩmaanyɩra, na mɩ yɩɗ ɓa kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra na bĩŋinn mi pi doro na ɓɔgɔn mɩ sɩ. Naɗɩɛ mɩɛ kha ɓɩɛ kha miliinsira mɩɛ na liiri, na wɛsɩɛ mi le ɩra wɩɛ, hã sɩɛ ɓa le miliinkpasɩsɛ waʔ.
48002003	Kɛna Titira mɩɛ na khɩɛn na sɩɛn mi thĩra za, ʋɔ kha bʋ wa Gɩrɛkɩ. Ŋa pɩ hʋgann sɩ ʋ za kha ʋ kãn ma na huure faŋa za waʔ.
48002004	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, nɩpɛ bʋɔ na liin ma pi thĩ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ na ɓa sɩɛn a za, pɩ kha ɓɩɛ wa kha u huure. Pɩ ɓa sɩɛn ma a za na ɓu hegelin a na tʋ lɔmɩra za Yesu Kirisitira zɩ̃nn a na liir a hɔrɔmɛ ɩra. Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ kha ɓɩɛ wa kha a vɩ gbũu sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za na le si ɗome.
48002005	Ŋa aa bɩɩn na sũnen a thĩ na nuuren mi harɩ kɩrɩ ʋ thĩra waʔ, si le thaaga sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra tɩ̃yara hɩɗan ĩ heke.
48002006	Harɩ wɛpɩɛ pɩ kha ken kha bɩɛ kɩ bʋ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra, (bɩɛ na pɩ wʋɔrɛ nɩsɩra bɩɛ, sɩ sʋɔ ken mɩɛ waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila khon nɩra nɩra za waʔ), baa mɩɛ de Yekila sɩɛsɩra, bɩɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩɛ ɓuun dʋɔ na sɩɛn sɩ za waʔ.
48002007	Ŋa bɩɛ thĩra yãan ma kha Yekila yiin ma mɩɛ kha mɩɛ de thĩmaanyɛ ʋ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, mʋ gaga kha baa u yiin Pɩɛrɩra kha u de Yawutuwira na ʋɔ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra ɩra.
48002008	Naɗɩɛ lɔmɩra za Yekila khɩɛn Pɩɛrɩra na liir u dãara na hãan Yawutuwira, mafɩra ʋ khɩɛn mɩɛ na liin mi dãara tɩ̃ na hãan thĩmaanyɩra.
48002009	Zakɩ na Pɩɛrɩ na Zãna kha bʋ egilizira wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra, baa bɩɛ yãan na tʋʋn kha Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra za ʋ hãan mɩɛ sɩɛ miliinsira, na bɩɛ yiin lese mɩɛ na Barɩnabasɩra lesira za na thɩɛr a, na ɓu ɓɔgɔ kha a bɩɛ bʋ wa miliindɛkamɛ; na a bɩɛ bɛnn sɩ za kha aa yo liige thĩmaanyɩra heke, bɩɛ yo liige Yawutuwira heke.
48002010	Wɛsɩɛ dola pi deɗ a, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha a kɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n na kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kɩ bʋ bʋɔmɩra za Zeruzalɛmʋ egilizira za ɩra, sɩɛ gbũun mɩɛ pɛ̃ɩn na liiri.
48002011	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na Pɩɛrɩra ɓa ɓann Ãtɩɔsɩra na mɩɛ kpaŋɩ̃nn ʋ nɩpɩra bɩɛ wʋɔla ʋ, baa u liin ɓilensira.
48002012	Naɗɩɛ khaala Zakɩra dãarawɩra kha bɩɛ kure u heke na ɓan, Pɩɛrɩra kha ɗi wa na thĩmaanyɛ. Ŋa baa pɩ wɔrɩn ɓann zuori, na ʋ kɛɩn ɗiime dɩ̃ɩn mɩ kɩ kpɩsɩn khon pɩ za, naɗɩɛ ʋ na ãnn ma Yawutuwira.
48002013	Na si liin thaaga na Yawutu kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bʋɔra tuosin u, harɩ na yann luuren Barɩnabasɩra pɩ yɩsɩɓɩɛgɩra za.
48002014	Baa mɩɛ yãan kha pɩ kha nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra tɩ̃yara waʔ, na mɩɛ deɗ Pɩɛrɩra nɩpɩra bɩɛ wʋɔla za kha: «Mʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ Yawutura na mʋɔ bɩ kɩ khɛ thĩmaanyɛ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra kɩ zɩɛ Yawutuwira bɛwɩra, mʋsɛ sii mʋ ɓa le kɩ wɔrɩ karɩwa wɩ pɩ vɩkɩ̃n na khɛ Yawutuwira nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra?»
48002015	Aa bʋ wa Yawututhĩnthĩme, a bʋ thĩmaanyɩra kɩ kʋɔ Moyizira sɩɛrɛhãansɩra waʔ.
48002016	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, a tʋʋn ma kha nɩra sii wɔrɩ ɓu tɩ̃ya Yekila wʋɔla za naɗɩɛ baa ʋ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na Moyizira sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na kɩ̃ra waʔ, fɔ na ʋ khãa Yesu Kirisitira za bʋɔtɛ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na aa ʋɔ khãa tɩ̃ Yesu Kirisitira za si le thaaga aa wɔrɩ ɓu tɩ̃ya Yekila heke Kirisitira khãamɩra za, hã sɩɛ le sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɓɩra wɔrɩkɔ za waʔ, naɗɩɛ nɩra sii wɔrɩ ɓu tɩ̃ya Moyizira sɩɛrɛhãansɩra nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀sɩra za waʔ.
48002017	Ŋa, aa Yawutuwe ɓɩɛ wa kha Yekila ken a nɩtelenyeme naɗɩɛ baa aa khãa Kirisitira za, na yɩɛ a sɩɛ liimira za, na nɩpɛ ken a wa mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ tɩ̃, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha Kirisitira thĩra ki yii a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za ba? Kũu waʔ.
48002018	Naɗɩɛ na mɩ vɩɗ gbũun sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ mɩ na kɛɩrɩ, mi miliinyira kɩ̃ra waʔ.
48002019	Na sɩɛrɛhãansɛ gɛŋɩra ɩ gɩɛ ʋɔ, mɩɛ huun ma. Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gbũun liin thaagɩra na mɩɛ huuri na ɓu hɩɗan thakuogo za na Yekila. Si liin ma mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ na Kirisitira huun ma kpuore nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za,
48002020	mɩɛ thĩra kɩ bʋ thakuogira za dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa Kirisitira thakuogira kɩ bʋ mɩɛ za ɩra. Thakuogira mɩ bʋ gɩ dunuyara za ɩra wɩɛ, mi ɓuun ma gɩɛ thakuogira naɗɩɛ baa mɩ khãa Yekila Ɓikhiira Kirisitira za. Ʋɔ wɩɛra khɔrɩn mɩɛ na hãan mɩ u thĩ thakuogira.
48002021	Fɩ̃ɩmɩra Yekila fɩ̃ɩn mɩɛ za, mɩɛ kɛɩ bɩɛ waʔ; naɗɩɛ, na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra le wa thaaga a telen, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha Kirisitira huumira liin ma kpasa.
48003001	Ee! Ɩ̃ɛ Galasɩ wʋɔnlaɗɩpɩɛ, ãna wɔrɩn liin taliwirise na bakan ĩ yiwiyira mafɩra? Kɛna Yesu Kirisitira ɓalɔmɩra nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za ɓɔgɔn ɩ̃ wa na yɛsɩ̃nɩ.
48003002	Mɩɩnɛ tikpo mɩɛ ɓɩɛ ĩ heke kha ɩ̃ yɛsɩ̃n mɩ tɩ za. Ĩ ɓuun ma Ninyɛgɛmɔra naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ gɔɗ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na kɩ̃ran baa, warɩma baa ĩ nuuren sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra na khãan sɩ za ɩra?
48003003	Na mʋsɛ sii si ɓuun yuon na ɩ̃ laɗ wʋɔmɛ mɩra? Ɩ̃ na nisĩnn gɔɗ ɓa kɩ nɩ́rɛ̀ Ninyɛgɛmɔ wɔrɩkɩra za, ɩra wɩɛ ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wa na phɩla sɩ na ɩ̃ɛ thĩ wɔrɩkɔ ba?
48003004	Vɛnkpakpasɩɛ bɩɛ ĩ ɓuun mɩra, sɩɛ bɩɛ liin ma kpasa ba? Ɩya sɩɛ wɔrɩ le kpasa kũu waʔ.
48003005	Baa Yekila hãar ɩ̃ u Nina ki liin bamʋŋa mɩyɛ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za, u liin ma sɩɛ bɩɛ naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ gɔɗ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na kɩ̃ran baa, warɩma u liin ma sɩɛ naɗɩɛ baa ĩ nuun sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra na khãan sɩ za ɩra?
48003006	Mafɩra sɩ sɛwɛnɩ Yekila sɛwɛra za na deɗ Abɩrahamʋra mɩyɩra za kha: «Ʋ khãan ma Yekila za, na bɩɛ khãamɩra liin thaaga na Yekila kenn u nɩtelenyemo.»
48003007	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ kãn ma na tʋ kha wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãa Yekila za, bɩɛ kɩ bʋ Abɩrahamʋra kpɩ̃raɓiiwira.
48003008	Dɩ̃ɩna Yekila sɛwʋra na nisĩnn deɗ ɓa kha Yekila ɓa ken ma thĩmaanyɩra nɩtelenyeme khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na u nisĩnn deɗ Abɩrahamʋra sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩɛ kha: «Mʋɔ za mɩ ɓa tãra na kɩ̃ra thĩnyira bɩɛ nɩpɩra.»
48003009	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ khãa Kirisitira za, bɩɛ ɓu wa kɩ̃rɩga mʋ gaga kha baa Abɩrahamʋra ɓuun kɩ̃rɩgɩra ʋ khãamɩra za ɩra.
48003010	Ŋa wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, daŋa ɓa gɔ ɓa bɩɛ, naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Wɩɛ bãa kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ sɛwɛn sɩɛrɛhãansɩra sɛwʋra za waʔ, Yekila daŋa ʋɔ dɛyɩra.»
48003011	Sɩɛ thĩra yɛsɩ̃nn ma kha Yekila ken nɩra nɩtelenyemo sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɓɩra kãmara za waʔ, naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma na deɗ kha: «Nɩtelenyemo ɓa ɓu wa thakuogo khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.»
48003012	Kɛna sɩɛrɛhãansɩra bʋ khãamɛ mɩyɛ waʔ, naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma na deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Wɩɛ bãa kɩ gɔ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra sɩɛsɩra na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ sɩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu wa thakuogo sɩɛ za.»
48003013	Yesu Kirisitira zɩ̃nn a wa na daŋara sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kha ɗʋ a za, ki gbonn ʋɔ daŋa wɩɛ aa boɗa za. Naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Nɩra wɩɛ bãa pi tũn daɓɔkɔ za, ʋɔ daŋann ma.»
48003014	Sɩɛ bɩɛ liin ma mafɩra, si le thaaga Abɩrahamʋra kɩ̃rɩgɩra nʋhãagɩra nan thĩmaanyɩra bɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za, kɩ yɩɛ si le thaaga tɩ̃, nʋʋgɩra na hãan na gbũun Ninyɛgɛmɔra mɩyɩra za, a wɔrɩ ɓu Ninyɛgɛmɔra khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.
48003015	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, ɩra wɩɛ mɩ sɩɛrɛ ɩ̃ wa na makɩ̃n na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira lɔmɩra. Na nɩra ʋɔ deɗ sɩɛsɛ na yɩɛn na pɩ sɛwɛn sɩ na kanɛn sɩ, nɩkpasa ʋɔ wɔrɩ asɩ sɩ waʔ, warɩma na sɩɛ sʋɔ sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra za kũu dʋ̃waʔ.
48003016	Yekila na hãan ma nʋʋga na Abɩrahamʋra na ʋ kpɩ̃raɓiira. Ʋɔ kpɩ̃raɓiiwɩɛ kɩ bʋ Kirisitira. Sɩɛ za, sɩ na deɗ ɓa kha: «Mʋɔ na mʋ kpɩ̃raɓiira.» Sɩ na deɗ kha Abɩrahamʋra na ʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwe waʔ, mʋ gaga kha ʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwira kha gɔn ma.
48003017	Ken, wɛsɩɛ mɩɛ ɓɩɛ na de, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha Yekila na deɗ ɓa sɩɛsɛ na zɩɛrɩ mʋ gaga kha baa sɩ kãn. Ɗɩɩsɛ gbaasɩyɔ̃ na tigbiire na gbũne (430) kpɩ̃ra za sɩɛrɛhãansɩra tiiri, sɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gbũu wɔrɩ vɩkɩ̃n sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra na le si sɩɛrɛkpasɩsɛ waʔ.
48003018	Naɗɩɛ, na Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra ɓu wa sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɓɩra za, dɩɛ bɛna nʋhãaŋa gɩɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Kɛna nʋhãaŋɩra liin thaagɩra na Yekila fɩ̃ɩn Abɩrahamʋra za.
48003019	Na mafɩra ʋ, sɩɛrɛhãansɩra tii thaagɩra kɩ gʋ̃na? Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra tiin ma si le thaaga mɩbɩ̃yɛ ɓu yã tʋ ɓanu kha Abɩrahamʋra kpɩ̃raɓiira tʋ ɓan. Mɛlɛgɛwɛ tann ma soronadaa za na hãar ʋ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra.
48003020	Khaarɛ bãa soronadaa mɩyɛ de, sɩɛ bʋ nɩra kpo mɩyɛ dʋ̃waʔ, kɛna Yekila bʋ wa ukpo.
48003021	Warɩma sɩɛrɛhãansɩra bakɩ̃n ma Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra ba? Ɩya sɩɛ ɩ waʔ. Na Sɩɛrɛhãansɛ kha wɔrɩ yɩɛ wa nɩra ɓu thakuogo, dɩɛ bɛna, nɩpɛ naa le wa nɩtelenyeme sɩɛrɛhãansɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.
48003022	Ŋa Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa kha nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira bɩɛ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛ wɔrɩkɔ za, si le thaaga wɩɛ bãa khãan Yesu Kirisitira za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓu fɩ̃ɩmɩra Yekila na hãan nʋʋgɩra ɩra.
48003023	Khaala Yesu Kirisitira kha ʋɔ ɓan, a kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha kasoɓiiwe sɩɛrɛhãansɩra nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za kɩ kɩ tɩɛ kha khãamɩra ɓɔgɔ pi thĩ.
48003024	Mafɩra sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na liin a koridaara ɓanu kha Kirisitira ɓannɩ, si le thaaga a le nɩtelenyeme khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.
48003025	Ŋa baa Kirisitira ɓann zuori, a ɓɩɛ kha sɩɛrɛhãansɛ kori a dʋ̃waʔ.
48003026	Naɗɩɛ, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ khãan Yesu Kirisitira za, ɩ̃ bɩɛ liin ma Yekila ɓiiwe khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.
48003027	Ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ yĩɗ ãmɩra ʋ ĩ liin ma kpuore Kirisitira za, ɩ̃ khɩɛn ma Kirisitira lɔmɩra na yiin mi ɩ̃ za mʋ gaga kha gbɔgɔlɔ̃ŋɔ.
48003028	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, kpɩkɩ̃nsɛ bʋ Yawutuwe dɩ̃ɩna thĩmaanyɩra za dʋ̃waʔ; kpɩkɩ̃nsɛ bʋ ɗonron na hɔrɔn za dʋ̃waʔ; kpɩkɩ̃nsɛ bʋ khuo na hara za dʋ̃waʔ; naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ bɩɛ dɩkɩ̃nn ma na liin nɩra kpo Yesu Kirisitira za.
48003029	Na ɩ̃ bʋ wa Kirisitira bɛwɛ, ɩ̃ bʋ wa Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwe, dɩ̃ɩna ĩ nii ɓa hɩɗan ma Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra za.
48004001	Ken wɛsɩɛ mɩɛ gaga ɩra. Ɓiye wɩɛ bãa kãn khɛ u siira ʋ̃nɩŋɩra, na yɩɛ ʋɔ ɓiira ɓikɛrɩsɩra za, ʋɔ na ɗonron bɩɛ bʋ wa kpuore, kɛna mɩyɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛyɛ.
48004002	Na yɩɛ ʋ ɓikɛrɩsɩra za, bʋɔ ki ken u, dɩ̃ɩna bʋɔ kɩ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ ɓanu kha u siira bɛnɓɔgɔyɔna yo nannɩ ʋ khɛ ʋ̃nɩŋɩra.
48004003	Si kpuosira ɩ tɩ̃ na aa. Bɛna aa kha bʋ mʋ gaga kha ɓikɛrɩwɛ, a kha thuo wa dunuyara mɩyɩra, na liin i ɗome.
48004004	Ŋa baa Yekila bɛnɓɔgɔyɔna ɓa nannɩ, na ʋ dãan u ɓikhiira na ʋ ɓannɩ. Hara hũnn u, ʋ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀n ma na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra,
48004005	si le thaaga u ɓu kuore sɩɛrɛhãansɩra nɩ́ɩrɛ̀dɛwɩra, ki le a Yekila ɓiiwe.
48004006	Baa ĩ liin Yekila ɓiiwira thĩnthĩnse za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na ʋ dãan u ɓikhiira Nina na yiir u a za, ʋɔ Nina kɩ yɩɛ na a kʋ̃n kha: «Abba» gɩɛ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha bʋba.
48004007	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mʋ bʋ ɗonron dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa mu liin ma Yekila ɓiye ɩra. Baa mu liin ma Yekila ɓiira, mu niin ɓa hɩɗan ma Yekila ɓudagɩra za mʋ gaga kha u ɓiiwira bʋɔra.
48004008	Khɔ̃ɩra, ɩ̃ kha tʋ Yekila waʔ, sɩ̃mɛ ɗonse za ɩ̃ kha bʋ, bɩɛ gbũu kha bʋ Yekila thĩnthĩse za waʔ.
48004009	Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ baa ɩ̃ tʋʋn Yekila, warɩma baa ʋɔ tʋʋn ɩ̃ɛ, mʋsɛ sii si ɓuun yuon kɛna ɩ̃ vɩ ki gbũu ɩɛ mɩkpasɩyɩra kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le wɔrɩkɩra tɩ̃? Ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ wa na vɩ lon i ɗonsira za tɩ̃ ba?
48004010	Tɩ̃, ĩ kenn khonn ma ɗɩyãsɛ, na Ferese, na ɗɩɩga miliinbɛnyɛ, dɩ̃ɩna ɗɩɩsɛ; kɩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ sɩ.
48004011	Ĩ kpolongbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa mɩɛ za gbaangbo kha miliinsɩra bɩɛ mɩɛ vɛnɛn mɩɛ thĩ na liin hãar ɩ̃ hã sɩ ɓa le kpasa waʔ.
48004012	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa zaanɩ thĩ, ɩ̃ khɛ mɩɛ lelɔmɩra, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha ɩ̃ɛ. Na mɩ sɩɛrɛ mafɩra sɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha ĩ liin mi wa mɩbɩ̃ɩnɛ waʔ.
48004013	Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ kha mi ɓosira liin thaagɩra na mi ɓuun deɗ ĩ Yekila sɩɛsɩra lʋgʋsɩra za.
48004014	Ɩ̃ɛ thĩra na ɓuun ma gbɩ̃rɩsɛ mɩɛ ɓosira kãmara za, sɩɛ bɩɛ za ĩ zenen mɩɛ yãan waʔ, warɩma na yɔ̃gɔn mɩɛ za mi ɓosira kãmara za waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ gɔɗ ɓa mɩɛ mʋ gaga kha Yekila mɛlɛgɛ kha bʋ mɩ, warɩma mʋ gaga kha Yesu Kirisitira thĩra.
48004015	Ɩ̃ bãanyɩra na wuon ma na mɩɛ gbaangbo, ŋa he gɩɛ bãanwuoŋira yuon ɩra? Mɩɛ bɩ na le ɩ̃ sɩɛrɛ kha na sɩ kha wɔrɩ le wa, bãa ɩ̃ naa kʋgʋlɩ̃n khon ĩ yiwiyira na hã mɩɛ ɩ!
48004016	Baa mɩɛ deɗ ĩ tɩ̃yara sɩɛ liin thaagɩra na mɩɛ liin ɩ̃ bɩ̃rara ɩra ba?
48004017	Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ maan ɩ̃ za ki le ĩ mʋ gaga kha pɩ khɔrɩ ɩ̃ wa, pɩ gagasɩra kɩ̃ra waʔ. Pɩ ɓɩɛ wa na kpɛnsɛ khon ĩ mɩɛ za ĩ ɓu le bɩɛ bɛwɛ.
48004018	Na ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ ki le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ, sɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra, hã si le mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ wʋɔrɛ doro za ĩ le i waʔ.
48004019	Mi ɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, mɩ vɛn ma ɩ̃ɛ mɩyɛ za tɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha baa hara vɛn ʋ lɔwʋrɛ hũme za ɩra, ɓanu kha Kirisitira ɓuun hɩɗankhɛrɛ ɩ̃ gagasɩra za.
48004020	Ɗyii! Mɩ kha khɔrɩ sɩ wa kha mɩɛ thĩra ɓu ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra ni bɛndɩɛ za na ɓu vɩkɩ̃n mɩɛ sɩɛrɛlɔmɩra, naɗɩɛ ĩ kpolongbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa mɩ za gbaangbo.
48004021	Ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, ɩ̃ zɩ̃ŋɩn mɩ wɛsɩɛ na yɛsɩ̃n. Ĩ nuuren wɛsɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra deɗ waʔ?
48004022	Sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra ʋ na deɗ kha: «Ɓikhiiwe pɩyɔ̃ kha bʋ Abɩrahamʋ heke, ʋ na hũnn ma ukpora u ɗonhara Agarɩ za, ki hũnn ʋɔra ʋ hahɔrɔmɔra Sara za.»
48004023	Ŋa ɗonhala baara hũnn ma na makɩ̃nn na nɩthɩ̃rɩga dĩŋo. Kɛna hahɔrɔmɔra baara ʋɔ hũn ma na makɩ̃nn na Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra.
48004024	Ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ yɔ̃ra kɔrɩwɩra nugon ma, naɗɩɛ bɩɛ hapɩɛ pɩyɔ̃ra ɓɔgɔ wa nʋhãansɛ yɔ̃ mɩyɛ. Wɩɛra kɩ bʋ Agarɩra, ʋɔ mɩyɛ ɓɔgɔ wa nʋhãaŋɩra ɓuun Sinayi ɓɩɛgɩra za. Gɩɛ nʋhãaŋɩra ɓɔgɔ wa Agarɩ na ɓiiwira u hũun ɗonsira za.
48004025	Agarɩra ʋɔ ɓɔgɔ wa Sinayi ɓɩɛgɩra kɩ bʋ Arabu sɩrɩga za. Agarɩra ɓɔgɔ wa tɩ̃ Zeruzalɛmʋ gboŋira kɩ bʋ fɩ̃ɩra mɩra ɩra, naɗɩɛ gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ na kɩ nɩpɩra bʋ wa sɩɛrɛhãansɩra ɗome.
48004026	Ŋa Zeruzalɛmʋra kɩ bʋ zaazara ni, ʋɔ bʋ wa hɔrɔmɔ. Gɩɛ kɩ bʋ a yaara.
48004027	Naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Mʋɔ Hakɛɩhũromo, hɩɗan bãanwuoŋo za. Mʋɔ wɩɛra tʋʋn ɓihũŋo nʋnʋmɩra yãan waʔ ɩra, yãgayãga na kɩ̃ra; naɗɩɛ, hala khuora khʋ̃n dahʋ̃raŋɩra, ʋɔ ɓiiwira kɩ ɓa gɔn na tãra hala khuora ken ɩra.»
48004028	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ bʋ wa nʋhãaŋɩra ɓiiwe mʋ gaga kha Ɩzakɩra.
48004029	Ŋa khɔ̃ɩra, wɩɛra na hũnn na makɩ̃n na nɩthɩ̃rɩga dĩŋora, ʋɔ kha vɛnɛ wa wɩɛra na hũnn Yekila Nina wɔrɩkɩra za, mafɩra sɩ bʋ fɩ̃ɩra bere.
48004030	Ŋa bɩra Yekila sɛwʋra deɗi? U deɗ ɓa kha: «Ɗɛ ɗonhala na u ɓikhiira, naɗɩɛ ɗonhala ɓikhiira na hahɔrɔmɔra ɓikhiira kãn na khɛ ʋ̃nɩŋɩra kpuore waʔ.»
48004031	A yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, mafɩra sɩ bʋ, a bʋ ɗonhala ɓiiwe waʔ, ŋa a liin ma hahɔrɔmɔra ɓiiwe.
48005001	Kirisitira kuoren a wa na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra ɗonsira, a ɓu le hɔrɔmɛ thĩnthĩse za. Na si liin mafɩra, ɩ̃ gɔ ĩ thĩ na kɩ̃ra hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ pi gbũu ɗʋ ɗonsira dagbolonsira ɩ̃ za dʋ̃waʔ.
48005002	Mɩɛ Poli ki de ĩ wɛsɩɛ kha na ɩ̃ yɩɛn na pi huuren ĩ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kãmara za, Kirisitira bʋ foi ĩ heke dʋ̃waʔ.
48005003	Mi gbũu de ĩ wa tɩ̃ kha na wɩɛ bãa yɩɛn na pi huuren u, sɩɛrɛhãansɩra daɓiyira bɩɛ gɔɓɩra bʋ wa faŋa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za.
48005004	Ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ kha Yekila ken ɩ̃ɛ nɩtelenyeme sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɓɩra kãmara za, ɩ̃ kpɩkɩ̃nn ma na Kirisitira; kɩ laɗ Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra.
48005005	Na aa ʋɔ lan ma sɩ za Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za, kha Yekila ɓa yo ken ma aa nɩtelenyeme. Sɩɛ aa bʋ tɩɛ.
48005006	Naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛsɩra za, pi huuren ma ba, pi huuren waʔ ba, sɩɛ sʋɔ sii bʋ thaaga waʔ, wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ thaagɩra sɩɛ kɩ bʋ khãamɛ, bɩɛ yã tʋ wa kamɛ khɔrɩmɛ za.
48005007	Khɔ̃ɩra ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra kha kɩ̃ra. Na ãna ɓa wãɗ khonn ĩ tɩ̃ya khɩ̃na za?
48005008	Mɩɩna pi deɗ ĩ na wãɗ khonn ĩ tɩ̃ya khɩ̃na za, sɩɛ kuɗ Yekila ɩ̃ yɩdaara heke waʔ.
48005009	Si deɗ ɓa kha: «Na mu yiin thãhɩ̃rɩwɛ̃ ɓʋɔgɔ za kɩrɩ, pɩ lʋɔrɛ wa ɓʋɔgɩra bɩɛ.»
48005010	Na mɩɛ ʋɔ, mɩɛ lan ma Adɛyɩra za na gbũu ɩ̃ mɩyɩra za kha harɩ si le mʋsɛ, ɩ̃ ɓa khɛ gagasɛ sʋɔ wɛsɛ kɩ bʋ si kpo na mɩɛ bɛsɩra waʔ. Ŋa wɩɛ tʋɔ wɩɛ ki firigĩn ɩ̃ gagasɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu vɛnsɛ gbaangbo.
48005011	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, na mɩɛ za ʋ ʋɔ, na mɩɛ kha bʋ wa ki de nɩpɛ kha pi huuresira bʋ wa mɩkɩ̃nɛ, na bena nɩpɛ bʋ kɩ vɛnɛ mɩɛ harɩ fɩ̃ɩ? Yekila sɩɛsɩra mɩɛ bu de kha Kirisitira ɓaɗ ɓa nɩɓadaɓɔkɔ za, sɩɛ kha wɔrɩ le bɩ̃ɩsɛ nɩra sii heke waʔ.
48005012	Wɛpɩɛ ki firigĩn ɩ̃ gagasɩra, hã pi dii huuresira dola za waʔ, pi kpii khon pi khuosira thĩra pere.
48005013	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, ɩ̃ɛ yɩɗ ɓa na liin hɔrɔmɛ, ŋa hã ɩ̃ fɛ sɩɛ hɔrɔnsɩra za ki ki le wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ nʋʋr ɩ̃ waʔ. Ŋa ɩ̃ kãn ma na khɔrɩ kamɛ kɩ dɛnfɛ kamɛ.
48005014	Naɗɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra bɩɛ ɓu wa sɩɛrɛdaɓirɩɛ kpora za kha: «Mʋ kãn ma na khɔrɩ mʋ kãnʋɔna mʋ gaga kha mʋɔ thĩra.»
48005015	Ŋa na ɩ̃ɛ yɩɛn ma ɩ̃ɛ bɛsɩra bɩɛ kɩ kɩ nʋn kɩ vaga kamɛ na ɩ̃ khʋɔ kamɛ, ɩ̃ kɩ kɔrɩsɩ̃n kha ɩ̃ ɓa zuo kamɛ.
48005016	Ĩ nuure mi kɩ̃raŋɩra. Ɩ̃ yɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra zɩɛ ɩ̃ wʋɔla ʋ, na sɩɛ liiri, ɩ̃ ɓa le gbɔɗɛ dĩŋo dʋ̃waʔ.
48005017	Naɗɩɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ Ninyɛgɛmɔra waʔ, sɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ gbɔɗa; wɛsɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ gbɔɗa tɩ̃, sɩɛ nʋʋ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kũu waʔ. Pɩ bʋ wa khɛɩ̃gɛ za, si le thaaga hã ĩ ɓu le ɩ̃ɛ thĩ dĩŋo waʔ.
48005018	Ŋa na ɩ̃ yɩɛn na Ninyɛgɛmɔra zɩɛn ɩ̃ wʋɔla ʋ, ɩ̃ ɓa nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra dʋ̃waʔ.
48005019	Ken gbɔɗɛ yekemɩyɩra: Zɛrɩgɛ, dɔrɔkpɔrɩsɛ, kakarɩliige,
48005020	sɩ̃mɩyɛ, taliwirise, yãasɩ̃nsɛ, khɛɩ̃gɛ na zone, doŋo na bakɩ̃nsɛ, kpɩkɩ̃nsɛ, dɩ̃ɩna na kpɩkɩ̃n kamɛ gboʔegboʔe,
48005021	na wɩɛ ki hĩin mɩɩnɛ za waʔ, na thãyʋ̃ɔgɔ, na lɔwʋgɔ, na ɩɛ mɩyɩra thĩna bɩɛ. Mɩɛ ʋɔ bu nisĩn de ĩ wa sɩ mʋ gaga kha baa mɩ na deɗ ĩ sɩ kha wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ ɩɛ mɩyɩra thĩna ledaa, ʋɔ wɔrɩ lon Yekila ɩɩgɩra za kũu waʔ.
48005022	Ŋa mɩyɩra Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã, ken ɩɛ: Kɔrɩmɛ, bãanwuoŋo, kpolonwuoŋo, sɔmɩra, kɩ̃rɩga, laŋa, teleme.
48005023	Na bɩ na sũne mu thĩ, dɩ̃ɩna na tʋ gɔ mu thĩ. Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra khɛ̃ɩ sɩɛ sʋɔ sii waʔ.
48005024	Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yesu Kirisitira za, bɩɛ ɓaɗ ɓa gbɔɗa na ti yekemɩyɩra bɩɛ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za na khʋʋn ɩ bɩɛ.
48005025	Baa a ɓuun ma thakuogira Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za, a kãn ma na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na makɩ̃n na Ninyɛgɛmɔra dĩŋora.
48005026	Hã a gbɩ̃nɛ a thĩ waʔ. Hã a lon kamɛ ɓɛmɛ za waʔ. Hã a khɛ zone na kamɛ waʔ.
48006001	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, na nɩra ʋɔ liin ɓilense na pɩ gɔɗ ʋ, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ na Yekila Nina, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na pɛ̃ɩ na dɛnfɛ ʋ dɛyɩra ʋ vɩ ɓan khɩ̃ntelenyena za. Kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ thĩra kɔrɩsɩ̃n ĩ thĩ hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ mɩɩnɛ sii kpɛnsɛ ɩ̃ na yɩ̃ ɩ̃ tɩ̃ waʔ.
48006002	Ɩ̃ dɛnfɛ kamɛ na gbon kamɛ dagbolonse, ĩ le sɩɛ na hĩɗe sɩɛsɩra Kirisitira hãan ɩra.
48006003	Naɗɩɛ, na wɩɛ ken u thĩ kha ʋɔ bãa wa bʋɔra za, kɛna ʋ bʋ foi waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ kpɛnsɛ wa u thĩ.
48006004	Ŋa, nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kãn ma na kɔrɩsɩ̃n u thĩ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra. Na ʋ yãan kha ʋɔ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra kɩ̃ra, ʋ wɔrɩ yãgayãga na bɩɛ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra, ŋa hã ʋ yãgayãga naɗɩɛ baa ʋɔ tãra ʋɔ waʔ.
48006005	Naɗɩɛ nɩra tʋɔ nɩra ɓa gbon ma u thĩ dagbolonse.
48006006	Nɩra wɩɛ bãa ki ɓu karɩ̃n Yekila sɩɛsɩra za na kure nɩra ʋɔ heke, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na khon dʋɔ u leke mɩyɩra bɩɛ za na hã dɛyɩra kɩ karɩ̃n ʋ ɩra.
48006007	Hã ɩ̃ ɓa kpɛnsɛ ĩ thĩ waʔ, nɩra lʋgʋtɩ̃n Yekire waʔ, naɗɩɛ mɩɩdɛ bãa nɩra tʋɔgɔ, dɩɛ ʋ ɓa kpɛwʋ.
48006008	Wɩɛ bãa kɩ tʋɔgɔ na hã ʋ gbɔɗa doro, huume doro ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa kpɛwʋ. Wɩɛ kɩ tʋɔgɔ na hã Ninyɛgɛmɔra, thakuokɛɩzuoŋira Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã, gɩɛ ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa kpɛwʋ.
48006009	Hã a gbaa mɩkɩ̃nliige waʔ. Naɗɩɛ na a gbaan mɩkɩ̃nliigira waʔ, a ɓa kpɛwʋ ɗiise sɩ kpɛwʋbɛna za.
48006010	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na lɔmɛ bʋ a heke a le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ, a le i na hã nɩpɛ bɩɛ, ɓa tãra de kha a yaɓiiwira thĩra kɩ bʋ khãamɩra za dʋ̃waʔ.
48006011	Ĩ ken sɛwʋɓiyɩɛ gbɩ̃nlɔmɩra: Mɩɛ thĩra leke sɛwɛn ɩɛ kɩ hã ɩ̃ ɩ.
48006012	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ na yɩɛ pɩ mɩyɩra nʋʋn nɩpɛ gbɔkhaasɛ za, bɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ kha ĩ huure faŋɩra za. Wɛsɩɛ pɩ ɓɩɛ, hã pɩ ɓa gbɩ̃ɩ bɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira huumira nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra ʋ kãmara za waʔ.
48006013	Naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ thĩra huureni, pɩ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra waʔ; ŋa pɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha ɩ̃ɛ huure, si le thaaga bɩɛ fɛ sɩɛ za na ɓu yɩsɩgbɩ̃nɛgɛ.
48006014	Mɩɛ ʋɔ ɓa bɩ na gbɩ̃nɛ mɩɛ thĩ mɩɩnɛ sii za na a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra ɩ waʔ. Dunuyara nɩpɩra bʋ wa mɩɛ heke mʋ gaga pi huun ma nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za, mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃ mɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha nɩhuomo nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za dunuyara nɩpɛ heke.
48006015	Naɗɩɛ, mu huuren ba, mʋ yɩɛn kɛɩ huuren ba, sɩɛ bʋ foi waʔ. Wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ thaagɩra, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ na vɩkɩ̃n na le nɩfɛnwɛ̃.
48006016	Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ kɩ makɩ̃n na karɩ̃n wɩɛ, Yekila kɩ̃ra pɩ na makarɩ pɩ za dɩ̃ɩna ʋ nɩpɩra bɩɛ.
48006017	Na khɛ ɩra wɩɛ, hã nɩra sii vɛnɛ mɩɛ dʋ̃waʔ, naɗɩɛ bãdiʔira kɩ bʋ mɩɛ gbɔɗa za, ɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha mɩɛ bʋ wa Yesura miliinɓiye.
48006018	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kɩ̃ra ɩ̃. Amiina.
49001001	Mɩɛ Poli, mɩɛ wɩɛra liin Yesu Kirisiti dãara na makɩ̃nn na Yekila dĩŋora, mɩɛ kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã ɩ̃ɛ Yekire nɩyɛgɛmɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ Efɛzɩ ki liin nɩtelenyeme Yesu Kirisitira za, mɩ thɩɛ ɩ̃.
49001002	A Siye Yekila na Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ bɩɛ kɩ hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo.
49001003	Gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bʋ wa a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira Siye Yekila bɛsɛ, naɗɩɛ ʋ kɩ̃ran a wa Kirisitira kãmara za na kɩ̃rɩgɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ kɩ bʋ zaazaara ni ɩra.
49001004	Yekila nisĩnn kenn khonn a wa na liir a Kirisitira bɛwɛ na dunuyara tiin thonn waʔ, si le thaaga a le nɩyɛgɛmɛ kɛɩ le zarɩgɩ̃nkhɛrɛ ʋɔ wʋɔla za. Baa Yekila khɔrɩn a,
49001005	na u nisĩnn tiin si wa kha a le ʋɔ ɓiiwe Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za, na makɩ̃nn na Yekila thĩra dĩŋora,
49001006	si le thaaga a gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ, ʋ mɩkɩ̃nkpakpaʔɩra kãmara za. Ʋ hãar a wa ɩ kpasa u Ɓikhiye khɔrɩyɔmɔra kãmara za.
49001007	A ɓuun ma zɩ̃mɛ Yesura tarɩmɛ wɔrɩkɩra za, ʋɔ za a ɓuun a mɩbɩ̃yɛ yafamɩra na makɩ̃n na baa ʋ fɩ̃ɩmɩra gbɩ̃n ɩra.
49001008	Yekila liin hãar a wa sɩɛ gbaangbo a ɓu ɓu wʋɔmɛ dɩ̃ɩna tʋʋmɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ.
49001009	Ʋ yɩɛn ma na a tʋʋn u dĩŋora gũnira, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ gagasɩra ʋ na konn ʋ kɩ̃ramɩra za harɩ khɔ̃ɩra kha ʋɔ ɓa tãra Kirisitira za na le ɩra.
49001010	Ɩɛ miliinyɩɛ, Yekila kha ɓɩɛ wa na le i bɛna i lebɛna ɓa nan ʋɔ heke, ʋɔ tʋ bĩŋin zaazaa mɩyɩra bɩɛ na fɔlɔŋɩra mɩyɩra bɩɛ i le thadɛyɛ ukpo bɛyɛ, ʋɔ thadɛyɩwɩɛ kɩ bʋ Kirisitira.
49001011	Ʋɔ Kirisiti wɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra za a ɓuun zɩ̃mɛ Yekila heke. Yekila nisĩnn liin ma sɩɛ harɩ khɔ̃ɩ. U liin ma sɩɛ na makɩ̃n na ʋɔ thĩ dĩŋora. U kenn khonn a wa,
49001012	si le thaaga, aa wɛpɩɛ nisĩnn yiin a khãamɩra Kirisitira za, aa gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ yɩsɩgbʋ̃ɔŋɩra!
49001013	Ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃, baa ĩ nuuren tɩ̃ya sɩɛsɩra zuori, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra hãar ɩ̃ zɩ̃mɩra, na ɩ̃ khãan ma Kirisitira za; na Yekila yiin ʋɔ thĩ dɩ̃ŋasɛ ɩ̃ za, sɩɛ dɩ̃ŋasɩra kɩ bʋ Ninyɛgɛmɔra ʋɔ wɩɛra nʋʋgɩra ʋ na hãar ɩ̃.
49001014	Ʋɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha mɩyɩra Yekila sann ʋ nɩpɩra, a ɓa ɓu i wa ɗɩyãgɩra ʋ ɓa kuore a pere ɩra, si le thaaga a gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ yɩsɩgbʋ̃ɔŋɩra.
49001015	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, khãamɩra ɩ̃ bʋ wɩ Adɛyɛ Yesura za, dɩ̃ɩna baa ɩ̃ khɔrɩ Yekila Nɩpɩra bɩɛ, baa mɩɛ nuun sɩɛ,
49001016	mɩɛ gbaan Yekila thɩɛmɩra kũu ɩ̃ mɩyɩra za waʔ. Mɩɛ kʋɔgɩ̃n ma dɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃ mɩɛ Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra za.
49001017	Mɩ yɩ̃n ma a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira Yekila, kɩ bʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ Siira, ʋ hã ɩ̃ Ninyɛgɛmɔra, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ ɓa hã ɩ̃ wʋɔmɛ, kɩ ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ Yekila lɔmɩra ɩ̃ yɛsɩ̃n ʋ za, na tʋ ʋ kɩ̃raŋɩra.
49001018	Mɩɛ yɩ̃n ʋ wa kha ʋ yɛsɩ̃n ɩ̃ wʋɔmɩra, si le thaaga ɩ̃ wɔrɩ tʋ laŋɩra kãmara za ʋ yɩɗ ɩ̃. Kɩ yɩɛ mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɩra ʋ ɔfɔn zɩɛn sann ɩ̃ɛ na ʋ nɩpɩra bʋɔra, ɩ̃ tʋ ɓuumira kɩ bʋ ɩ za.
49001019	Mɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa tɩ̃ kha ɩ̃ tʋ ʋ wɔrɩkpakpakɩra, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ kɩ tãra mɩyɩra bɩɛ ɩra, na kɩ dɛnfɛ aa wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãa ʋ za.
49001020	U yiin ma gɩɛ wɔrɩkpakpakpuogɩra Yesu Kirisitira za na arɩgan kusen u huumira za, na yɩɛn na ʋ hɩɗann u leɗĩngɛŋɩra zaazaara ni.
49001021	Mafɩra Yekila tiin Kirisitira zaazaara ni na ʋ hɩɗan mɛlɛgɛwɛ, na thadɛrɩwɛ dɩ̃ɩna mɩyɩra kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ, na faŋadɛwɩra na yɩsɩsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ hãan dunuya wɩɛ za, dɩ̃ɩna dunuyara kɩ ɓa ɓan ɩra.
49001022	Yekila yiin ma mɩyɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ u leke za, ki liir u egilizi nɩpɩra bɩɛ thadɛyɛ.
49001023	Egilizi nɩpɩra kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha Kirisitira gbɔɗa. Kirisitira lɔmɛ bɩɛ ɓu wa egilizi nɩpɩra za bãanyɛ bɩɛ. Na Kirisitira ʋɔ, Yekila lɔmɛ bɩɛ ɓu wa ʋɔ za bãanyɛ bɩɛ.
49002001	Khɔ̃ɩra, ɩ̃ kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha ĩ huun ma Yekila wʋɔla za ĩ ɓilensira na ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãma.
49002002	Ɩ̃ kha nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ wa mʋ gaga kha dunuya wɩɛ nɩpɩra. Ɩ̃ kha thuo wa gĩrime thadɛyɩra kɩ bʋ zaazaara na u liige na nɩkpagayamɩra ɩra.
49002003	A bɩɛ kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ nɩkpagayamɩra tɩ̃, a kha nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ wa na makɩ̃n na a yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra, ki ki le a gbɔɗɛ mɩkhɔrɩyɔnyɛ na a dĩŋo mɩyɛ. Na makɩ̃n na bɩɛ lɔmɩra, Yekila kha don a wa tɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha bɩɛ.
49002004	Ŋa Yekila hĩin ma na makarɩ, naɗɩɛ ʋ khɔrɩn a wa na khɔrɩkpakpapɛ,
49002005	gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, aa wɛpɩɛ kha bʋ mʋ gaga kha nɩhuomira a ɓilensira kãmara za, ʋ hãan ma aa thakuogo na Yesura kpuore. Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɛ wɔrɩkɔ za ĩ ɓuun zɩ̃mɩra.
49002006	Baa a bʋ kpuola Kirisitira za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na a bʋ mʋ gaga kha Yekila arɩgan a wa huumira za kpuore na ʋɔ na aa ɗi ɩɩgɩra zaazaara ni dɩ̃ɩn ʋ kpuore.
49002007	Mafɩra ʋ tann Yesu Kirisitira za na kɩ̃ran a na ɓu ɓɔgɔ ʋ fɩ̃ɩkpakpapɩra na kpɩ̃ra nɩpɩra tɩ̃.
49002008	Naɗɩɛ fɩ̃ɩmɩra wɔrɩkɩra za ĩ ɓuun zɩ̃mɩra, khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za. Bɩɛ zɩ̃mɩra ɓuumira bʋ ɩ̃ɛ thĩra wɔrɩkɔ waʔ, ŋa Yekila yãagɩ̃n ɩ̃ na gɩɛ thakuogira.
49002009	Si kuɗ ɩ̃ɛ mɩkɩ̃nliigira za waʔ, si le thaaga hã nɩra sii ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ u thĩ waʔ.
49002010	Yekila liir a. Ʋ tann ma Yesu Kirisitira za na liir a, si le thaaga a thakuogira hĩi na lelɔnkɩ̃rɩwɛ. Bɩɛ lelɔnkɩ̃rɩbɩɛ, Yekila nisĩnn tiin mi a ɓu ki le wi.
49002011	Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ kha bʋ khɔ̃ɩra. Ɩ̃ bʋ Yawutuwe waʔ. Yawutuwira yɩ ɩ̃ wa kha kɛɩ huurenime, kɩ yɩ pi thĩ kha huurenime kɛna pi huuresira ɓɔgɔ wa gbɔɗɛ kpiise doro.
49002012	Dɩɛ bɛna ɩ̃ kha bʋ wa kɛɩ le Kirisitira, khɩ̃nɛ kha bʋ ĩ heke na wɔrɩ le ĩ thĩ Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ thĩne nɩpɛ bʋɔ waʔ, ɩ̃ kha bʋ wa khɩ̃rɩwɛ, na gbũu Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra mɩyɩra za. Ɩ̃ kha bʋ wa kɛɩ le laŋa, ɩ̃ kha bʋ wa dunuyara za kɛɩ le Yekire.
49002013	Ŋa, baa ɩ̃ dɩɛn na liin kpuola na Yesu Kirisitira, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ khaarɛ kha lege dɩ̃ɩn ʋ khɔɩ̃ra, ɩra wɩɛ, ɩ̃ khaarɛ yĩmin ma dɩ̃ɩn ʋ naɗɩɛ baa Kirisitira hãan u thĩ na liin thɔgɔnsɛ na ʋ tarɩmɩra gboɗ ɩ̃ kãmara za ɩra.
49002014	Naɗɩɛ Kirisitira thĩra hãar a wɔyĩkira, ʋɔ dɩɛn Yawutuwira na thĩmaanyɩra, na pi liin kpuore. Ʋ hãan ma ʋɔ thĩ thakhuogira nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za na kiin gbeŋira kha kpɩkɩ̃n mɩ na liin mi bɩɩ̃rawɩra,
49002015	u zuoren ma Moyizi sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na Yekila sɩɛrɛdewensira dɩ̃ɩna sɩ sɩɛrɛvɔnsɩra ʋɔ thĩ huumira za, si le thaaga ʋ wɔrɩ dɩɛ ɩɛ thĩnyɩɛ yɔ̃ra bɩɛ i le thĩne tikpo na hɩɗan ʋɔ za, mafɩra u yiin wɔyĩkira ɩ tɩɛra za.
49002016	U huumira nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za liin ma thaaga na dɩɛn Yawutuwe na thĩmaanyɛ na liin mi kpuore ki yiin nʋkpuore bɩɛ na Yekire tɩɛ. U khonn ma sɩɛ yãansɩ̃sɩra pɩ tɩɛ ʋɔ thĩ huumira nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za.
49002017	Mafɩra Kirisitira ɓann na ɓa deɗ wɔyĩke sɩɛrɛnʋʋnsɛ mɩyɛ na ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ khaarɛ kha lege, dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ khaarɛ kha yĩmi dɩ̃ɩn ʋ.
49002018	Naɗɩɛ Kirisitira liin thaagɩra na Yawutuwe dɩ̃ɩna thĩmaanyɛ bɩɛ wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ Siye Yekila wʋɔla ʋ, Ninyɛgɛmɔra kpo kpelila wɔrɩkɩra za.
49002019	Na si liin mafɩra, ɩ̃ bʋ khɩ̃rɩwɛ warɩma nɩpɛ bãa kuɗ gɔgɛŋɛ dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, ĩ liin ma Yekila nɩpɛ dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ bʋ wa Yekila gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɛ.
49002020	Ɩ̃ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha Yekila thʋʋga tofaɓiye. Gɩɛ thʋʋgɩra taana tofaɓiyira kɩ bʋ Yekila dãarawɩra dɩ̃ɩna Yekila yãdedɛrɩwɩra, Yesu Kirisitira thĩra kɩ bʋ thʋʋgɩra lɔŋɔɗa tofaɓila kɩ hã thʋʋgɩra faŋɩra ɩra.
49002021	Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za gbenwura bɩɛ wɔrɩ maɗɛ na kɩ̃ra, na wɔrɩ khã na le Adɛyɛ gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋga.
49002022	Baa ɩ̃ bʋ nʋkpuola Kirisitira za, ɩ̃ɛ na bʋɔra liin ma mʋ gaga kha Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za u nina bʋ ɩra.
49003001	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩɛ Poli yɩ̃n ma Yekire kɩ hã ɩ̃. Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za mɩɛ Polira bʋ mʋ gaga kha mɩ bʋ wa kaso za ɩ̃ɛ thĩmaanyɩra khɔrɩmɛ kãma.
49003002	Mɩ khãan ma sɩ za kha ɩ̃ tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha Yekila yiin ma mɩɛ u miliinsira za ɩ̃ɛ kɩ̃rɩgɩra kãma.
49003003	Yekila ɓɔgɔn ma mɩɛ u gũnira. Mɩ lʋgʋn deɗ ĩ ʋ mɩyɛ kɩrɩ zuori mɩ lɛtɩrɩla za.
49003004	Na ɩ̃ kha ɩ̃ karɩ̃n mɩɛ lɛtɩrɩla bɛndɛ, fɩra za ɩ̃ ɓa yã kha mɩɛ tʋ wa Kirisitira gũni mɩyɩra.
49003005	Ɩɛ gũni mɩyɩɛ, Yekila yɩɛn na khɔ̃ɩ nɩra ʋɔ sii tʋʋr ɩ yãan waʔ. Ŋa ʋ ɓɔgɔn ɩ wa ɩra wɩɛ u Nina wɔrɩkɩra za na ʋ dãarayɛgɛmɩra dɩ̃ɩna ʋ yãdedɛyɛgɛmɩra.
49003006	Ken, ɩɛ gũni mɩyɩɛ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha thĩmaanyɩra nii bʋ wa Yekila kɩ̃rɩgɩra ʋ zɩɛn sanɩ ʋ nɩpɩra, dɩ̃ɩna bɩɛ na Yawutuwira dɩɛn ma na liin kpuore, thĩmaanyɩra tɩ̃ ɓa ɓu mɩyɩra Yekila hãan nʋʋgɩra Yesu Kirisitira za ʋ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kãmara za.
49003007	Yekila fɩ̃ɩn ma mɩɛ za ʋ kɩ̃rɩgɩra wɔrɩkɩra za, na liin mɩɛ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra dedaa ʋ wɔrɩkɩra kãma.
49003008	Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ kpɩ̃ra nɩrara kɛna mɩɛ za Yekila fɩ̃ɩrɩ, kha mɩɛ de kɩ̃rɩgɩra ki ɓu Kirisitira za na thĩmaanyɩra.
49003009	Yekila kɩ bʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ ledaara, gũnira u guuren harɩ khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra ni, ʋ yãagɩ̃nn ma mɩɛ kha mɩɛ ɓɔgɔ ɩɛ gũni mɩyɩra na yɛ.
49003010	Na sɩɛ liiri, thadɛrɩwɛ dɩ̃ɩna mɩyɩra kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ zaazaara ni, bɩɛ ɓa yã tʋ Yekila wʋɔmɛ thĩnye thĩnyira bɩɛ egilizi nɩpɩra kãmara za,
49003011	na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ ʋ na nisĩnn khonn harɩ khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra ni, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ ʋ tann a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira za na hĩɗen ɩra.
49003012	Baa a khãan Kirisitira za na liin kpuola dɩ̃ɩn ʋ, khɩ̃nɛ bʋ wa a heke na zʋ̃ʋ nan Yekila na haɓɛ kɛɩ le ãnabirise.
49003013	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa kha hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra hu ĩ vɛnsɩra mɩɛ vɛn ɩ̃ kãmara za waʔ; naɗɩɛ mɩɛ vɛnsɩra hã wa ɩ̃ɛ wɔzagarɛ.
49003014	Sɩɛ liin thaaga na mɩɛ ɓa huruse Siye Yekila wʋɔla za,
49003015	zaazaa mɩyɩra yɩsɩsɩra na fɔlɔŋɩra mɩyɩra yɩsɩsɩra bɩɛ kuɗ ɓa ʋɔ heke.
49003016	Mɩyɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa ʋɔ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ dɛyɩwɩɛ bɛyɛ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩɛ yɩ̃n ʋ kha ʋ hã ɩ̃ faŋa na haɓɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za,
49003017	si le thaaga ʋ yɩɛ Kirisitira mɩyɩra hɩɗan ɩ̃ gagasɩra za khãamɛ wɔrɩkɩra za; kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ khɔrɩ kamɛ na kɩ̃ra.
49003018	Na sɩɛ liiri, ɩ̃ɛ na Yekila nɩpɩra bʋɔra bɩɛ ɓa ɓu faŋa na tʋ lɔmɩra za Kirisitira khɔrɩ a. Ʋ khɔrɩmɩra phɛrɩ, pɩ sʋ̃ra, pi gon, dɩ̃ɩna pi kogo.
49003019	Ɩ̃ ɓa tʋ Kirisitira khɔrɩmɩra kɩ tãra tʋʋmɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ, kɩ yɩɛ ĩ hĩi na Yekila wɔrɩkɩra na kɩ̃ra.
49003020	Yekila, ʋɔ wɩɛra wɔrɩkɩra ki liige aa za, wɛsɩɛ a yɩ̃ ʋ, warɩma wɛsɩɛ a gaga, ʋɔ kɩ wɔrɩ hã a sɩ ʋ wɔrɩkpakpakɩra za, harɩ na tãra lɔmɩra za a kha ɓɩɛ sɩ.
49003021	Ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛgɛ egilizi nɩpɩra sʋgʋmʋra za, Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za bãanyɛ bɩɛ kɛɩ gbaa. Amiina.
49004001	Mɩɛ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ kasora za Adɛyɩra kãmara za, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa kha ɩ̃ yɩɛ ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra makɩ̃n na Yekila yɩɗa ĩ ɓuun ɩra,
49004002	ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ, na le nɩwɔyĩgeme kɩ hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩna sɔmɩra, na bɩ kamɛ ɓilense na khɔrɩmɛ.
49004003	Nʋkpuola Ninyɛgɛmɔra hãar ɩ̃, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na gɔ dɩɛ na kɩ̃ra kɩ hɩɗan wɔyĩke za na kamɛ.
49004004	Ɩ̃ɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha nɩra kpo gbɔɗɛ khaayɛ, Yekila yiin ma Nin kpo ɩ̃ za. Mafɩra tɩ̃ Yekila yɩɗ ɩ̃ ĩ ɓu hɩɗan na laŋa kpo.
49004005	Adɛyɛ ukpo kpeli kɩ bʋ, khãamɛ thĩne kpo kpeli kɩ bʋ, Yekire ãyike kpo kpeli kɩ bʋ.
49004006	Yekire ukpo kɩ bʋ, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ nɩpɛ bɩɛ Siira, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ nɩpɛ bɩɛ thaagɩra za, ʋɔ ki liige nɩpɛ bɩɛ za, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ bʋ wa na nɩpɛ bɩɛ.
49004007	Ŋa Yekila yãagɩ̃nn ma a bɩɛ na miliinse thĩnye thĩnye na makɩ̃nn na wɔrɩkɩra Kirisitira hãan a bɩɛ ɩra.
49004008	Sɩɛ liin thaagɩra na si deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za Kirisitira mɩyɩra za kha: «Baa ʋ kha gan zaara, na ʋ gɔɗ yuon ma na kasoɓiiwe bʋɔ, kɩ yãagɩ̃n bʋɔ.»
49004009	Na de kha ʋ gann ma harɩ zaara ni, sɩɛ kɔla ɓɔgɔ wa be? Sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha ʋ na sũnn ma harɩ fɔlɔŋɩra za.
49004010	Ʋɔ wɩɛra sũnn harɩ fɔlɔŋɩra za, ʋɔ kpuora gann harɩ zaazaara diikhɛla ni, si le thaaga ʋ hɩɗan khaayɛ bɩɛ.
49004011	Mɩyɩra ʋ na yãagɩ̃nn nɩpɩra ɩ, ɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha bʋɔ le Kirisiti dãarawɛ, bʋɔ le Kirisiti yãdedɛwɛ, bʋɔ le Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra dedɛwɛ, bʋɔ le pasɩtɛrɩwɛ kɩ karɩ̃n nɩpɛ.
49004012	U liin ma sɩɛ, si le thaaga kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra wɔrɩ ki le pi milinsira, egilizira kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha Kirisitira gbɔɗa, ʋɔ wɔrɩ ki yo wʋɔrɛ.
49004013	Mafɩra a bɩɛ wɔrɩ dɩɛ na le kpuore khãamɩra za, kɩ hɩɗan na Yekila Ɓikhiira Kirisitira tʋʋmɩra. Dɩɛ bɛna a hĩi khuose na hasɛ khãamɛ khɩ̃na za na hɩɗan mʋ gaga kha Kirisitira.
49004014	Na sɩɛ liiri, a ɓa le mʋ gaga kha ɓikɛrɩwɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Nɩkpɛnsɛ dɛrɩwɩra kɩ kpɛnsɛ nɩpɩra na pɩ tɔŋɔ karɩ̃na, bɩɛ ɓa wɔrɩ vɩ a gagasɩra na yɩɛ a zɩɛ khɩ̃na mʋ gaga kha baa sarɩmɛ na ãmɛ vĩigĩn gbuogo dʋ̃waʔ.
49004015	Ŋa na a de tɩ̃ya na a khɔrɩ kamɛ, sɩɛ yɩɛ wa a yo wʋɔrɛ mɩyɛ bɩɛ za na le kpuore na Kirisitira kɩ bʋ a thaagɩra za ɩra.
49004016	Ʋɔ wɔrɩkɩra za gbɔɗɛ khaayɩra bɩɛ gɔ kamɛ na kɩ̃ra, na le tikpo. Gbɔɗa khaayɩra kpo kpora bɩɛ bʋ wa na i liigese. Na ɩ bɩɛ kpo kpora liige, dɩɛ bɛna gbɔɗa wɔrɩ khã na khɔrɩmɛ.
49004017	Ken wɛsɩɛ mɩɛ de ĩ na gbɩ̃ra Adɛyɩra yɩsɩgɩra kãmara za, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha hã ɩ̃ɛ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ mʋ gaga kha baa Yekire kʋɔdɛwɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ dʋ̃waʔ, pɩ gagasɩra yo wa mɩkpasɩyɛ doro za.
49004018	Pɩ bʋ wa dabirige za, pɩ wɔrɩ tʋ Yekila mɩyɛ na yɛsɩ̃n ɩ za waʔ. Thakuofɛŋɩra Yekila hã, pɩ bʋ na gɩɛ waʔ naɗɩɛ baa pi numiyira gbɩɗ ɩra.
49004019	Pɩ laɗ ɓa nɩɩsɛ harɩ na hãan pi thĩ zɛrɩgɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ za na pi le mɩthĩnkarɩyɩra bɩɛ.
49004020	Ŋa ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, bɩɛ lɔmɩɛ siira pɩ karɩ̃n ɩ̃ɛ Kirisitira mɩyɩra waʔ.
49004021	Ĩ nuun ma ʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ, ĩ ɓuun ma karɩ̃n na gbũu ʋ tɩ̃yara za.
49004022	Na mafɩra ʋ, ɩ̃ kãn ma na zɩɛ ɩ̃ zogo ɗugora, ʋɔ zogora kha boi ki yii ĩ yebɩ̃ɩgɩra za, sɩɛ kha le thaagɩra na ĩ ɓilen.
49004023	Ɩ̃ kãn ma na yɩɛ Yekila Nina vɩkɩ̃n ɩ̃ gagalɔmɩra ĩ ɓu gagafɛnsɛ.
49004024	Ɩ̃ khɛ zogo fɛnwɛ̃, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ makɩ̃n na Yekila dĩŋora ɩra, ki le nɩtelenyeme na nɩyɛgɛmɛ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ tɩ̃yara.
49004025	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na sɩ bʋ mafɩra, ɩ̃ zɩɛ tɔnsɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ. Ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpo kpo le de tɩ̃ya na kamɛ, naɗɩɛ a bɩɛ dɩɛn ma na liin gbɔɗɛ tikpo.
49004026	Na ĩ donni, hã ĩ le mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ; hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ khɩɛra waʔ ɓu ĩ doŋira bʋ waʔ.
49004027	Hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ Sutana ɓu wɔrɩkɔ ɩ̃ za waʔ.
49004028	Wɩɛ bãa ki zu, ʋɔ dɛyɩra gbaa zugbũrusira, ki liige na kɩ̃ra, si le thaaga ʋ wɔrɩ ɓu dagamu u miliinsira za, na wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ.
49004029	Sɩɛrɛbɩ̃ɩsɛ sii kãn na kure ɩ̃ nʋʋsɩra za waʔ, fɔ sɩɛrɛkɩ̃rɩsɛ wɛsɛ kɩ dɛnfɛ nɩpɛ Yekire khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za dɩ̃ɩna wɛsɛ kɩ wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ si nuuredɛrɩwɩra.
49004030	Yekila yiin ma ʋɔ thĩ Nina ɩ̃ za mʋ gaga kha dɩ̃gasɛ, hã ɩ̃ asɩ ʋɔ Nina gagasɩra waʔ. Ʋɔ Nina Yekila hãar ɩ̃ na ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ kha gɔdɩyãga gʋɔ, ʋɔ ɓa kuore ĩ na ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira pere.
49004031	Ɩ̃ zɩɛ gagabɩ̃ɩsɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ, na donsira, na donbɩ̃ɩsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ, na sɔŋɔbɩ̃ɩsɩra, na kʋsaʔɛ, dɩ̃ɩna bɩ̃ɩsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ.
49004032	Ɩ̃ makarɩ kamɛ za, ki le kamɛ mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ, kɩ yafa kamɛ za tɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila yafan ɩ̃ɛ za Kirisitira za ɩra.
49005001	Ɩ̃ khɛ Yekila lɔmɩra, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ bʋ wa u ɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ.
49005002	Ɩ̃ hɩɗan na khɔrɩmɛ mʋ gaga kha baa Kirisitira khɔrɩn a na hãan u thĩ na pɩ khʋʋr ʋ a kãma mʋ gaga kha thɔgɔnsɛ wɛsɛ kɩ nʋʋ Yekila.
49005003	Ɩ̃ bʋ wa Yekila bɛwɛ, hã ĩ le zɛrɩgɛ waʔ, hã ĩ le dɔrɩkpɔrɩsɛ waʔ, hã i le nɩpɛ bãa ki hĩi mɩɩnɛ za waʔ, hã ɩɛ mɩyɩra siira kʋ̃ra nu ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za waʔ naɗɩɛ Yekila nɩpɩra kãn na le sɩɛ siira waʔ.
49005004	Hã nɩɩlasɩɛsɛ, na sɩɛrɛkpasɩsɛ, na sɩɛrɛkarɩsɛ kure ɩ̃ za waʔ, sɩɛ kɩ̃ra waʔ. Ŋa ɩ̃ yɩɛ Yekire gbɩ̃nɛ sɩɛsɛ doro ki kure ɩ̃ nʋʋsɩra za.
49005005	Naɗɩɛ, ɩ̃ kãn tʋ kha zɛrɩgɛ na dɔrɩkpɔrɩsɛ ledɛwɛ, na wɛpɩɛ ki hĩi mɩɩnɛ za waʔ (bɩɛ na sɩ̃nthɔgɩ̃ndɛrɩwɛ bɩɛ bʋ wa kpuore.) Bɩɛ ʋɔ sii ɓa lon Kirisitira na Yekila ɩɩgɩra za waʔ.
49005006	Hã ɩ̃ ɓa yɩɛ nɩra sii firigĩn ĩ na sɩɛrɛkpasɩsɛ sʋɔ kũu waʔ, naɗɩɛ sɩɛ kɩ yɩɛ na Yekila doŋira hĩi na nɩkpagayamɩra.
49005007	Hã ɩ̃ ɓa dɩɛ na bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ siira waʔ.
49005008	Khɔ̃ɩra ɩ̃ kha bʋ wa dabirinɩpɛ; ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, ĩ liin ma yɛyɛɓɛ nɩpɛ Adɛyɩra khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ mʋ gaga kha yɛyɛɓɛ nɩpɛ.
49005009	Naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ yɛyɛɓɩra za, bɩɛ mɩliinyira kɩ bʋ mɩkɩ̃rɩliige, teleme, dɩ̃ɩna tɩ̃ya mɩyɛ.
49005010	Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na tʋ mɩyɩra kɩ nʋʋ Adɛyɩra.
49005011	Hã ɩ̃ ɓa yii ĩ nii dabirimɩkpasɩyɩra za waʔ; ŋa ɩ̃ kãn ma thĩra na kuse ɩɛ dabirimɩyɩra kʋwʋga ʋ.
49005012	Mɩyɩra bɩɛ dabirinɩpɩɛ le guurese za, si deɓira thĩra bʋ wa nɩɩsɛ.
49005013	Ŋa mɩɩnɛ bãa kuɗ yɛyɛɓɛ za, dɩɛ bʋ dabirige za dʋ̃waʔ,
49005014	naɗɩɛ ti kuɗ ɓa yɛyɛɓɛ za kɩ yã tʋ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na si deɗ Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Mʋɔ ɗɔhʋ̃ndaawɩɛ, arɩ, arɩ na kure huumira za, kɩ yɩɛ Kirisitira yɛyɛɓɩra hɩɗan mʋ za.»
49005015	Ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ gbaangbo, hã ĩ le wʋɔlaɗɩpɛ waʔ, ŋa ĩ le wʋɔmɛ dɛrɩwɛ.
49005016	Bɛndɩɛ kɩ bʋ ĩ heke mɩra, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ, naɗɩɛ fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛra hĩin ma na bɩ̃ɩsɛ doro.
49005017	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, hã ɩ̃ hɩɗan kɛɩ le wʋɔmɛ waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ Adɛyɩra dĩŋora na tʋ ʋ.
49005018	Hã ɩ̃ yɔ̃ duvɛ̃n na hĩi waʔ, naɗɩɛ thãyɔbɩ̃ɩgɩra yii wa nɩra kakarɩliige za; ŋa ĩ kãn ma na hĩi na Ninyɛgɛmɔ.
49005019	Ɩ̃ hã kamɛ haɓɛ na Yekire gbɩ̃nɛtɩ̃nsɛ ki kure Yekila sɛwʋra za ɩra, ɩ̃ tɩ̃nɛ Yekire gbɩ̃nɛtɩ̃nsɛ sʋɔra, dɩ̃ɩna tɩ̃nsɛ wɛsɛ u Nina yiin ɩ̃ gagasɩra za. Ɩ̃ tɩ̃nɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ Adɛyɩra na ɩ̃ gagasɩra bɩɛ.
49005020	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ a Siye Yekila bãanyɛ bɩɛ na mɩyɩra bɩɛ za, a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za.
49005021	Ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ ãn Kirisitira, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã kamɛ.
49005022	Hapɛ, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã ĩ khuowira mʋ gaga kha baa ĩ sũnen ĩ thĩ na hãan Adɛyɩra ɩra.
49005023	Naɗɩɛ khuora kɩ bʋ hala thadɛyɩra, mʋ gaga kha baa Kirisitira bʋ egilizi thadɛyɩra ɩra. Kirisitira kɩ bʋ egilizira zɩ̃ndaara dɩ̃ɩna egilizira bʋ wa Kirisitira gbɔɗa.
49005024	Ŋa, lɔmɩra za egilizira sũnen u thĩ na hãan Kirisitira, mafɩra tɩ̃ hapɩra kãn na sũne pi thĩ na hã pi khuowira.
49005025	Khuo, khɔrɩ mʋ hala mʋ gaga kha baa Kirisitira khɔrɩn egilizira harɩ na hãan u thĩ nina egilizira kãma ɩra;
49005026	si le thaaga ʋ yɛɗɛ egilizi nɩpɩra Yekila wʋɔla za. Ʋ yɛɗɛn mɩ wa dɩ̃ɩna ãmɛ na Yekila sɩɛsɩra.
49005027	Ʋ nɩpɩra wɔrɩ hĩi na Yekire ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ ʋ wʋɔla za, kɛɩ le nirige, kɛɩ le yʋ̃rɩgɩnkhɛrɛ na asɩkhɛrɛ. Ʋ ɓɩɛ wa kha u egilizi nɩpɩra le nɩyɛgɛmɛ kɛɩ le zarɩgɩ̃nkhɛrɛ.
49005028	Mafɩra tɩ̃, khuora kãn ma na khɔrɩ ʋ hala mʋ gaga kha ʋɔ thĩ gbɔɗa. Wɩɛ bãa kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ hala, ʋɔ dɛyɩra khɔrɩ wa u thĩ.
49005029	Naɗɩɛ nɩra sii bɩ yãasɩ̃n u thĩ waʔ, ŋa ʋ dɛyɩra ɓeɗe wa u thĩ ki ken u thĩ mʋ gaga kha baa Kirisitira ken egilizira nɩpɩra ɩra.
49005030	Aa bɩɛ kpo kpora bʋ wa Kirisitira gbɔɗɛ khaarɛ dʋɔ.
49005031	Sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, khuora ɓa kure u siye na ʋ yaa leke za, ki yo maa ʋ hala za, pɩyɔ̃ra bɩɛ dɩɛ na le nɩra tikpo.»
49005032	Ʋɔ gũnira kɔla gbɩ̃n ma, na mi de ĩ wa sɩ kha sɩɛ sɩɛsɩɛ gbũun ma Kirisitira na u egilizira nɩpɩra za.
49005033	Ŋa sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra deɗ ɓa na hãa ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃. Khuo tʋɔ khuo kãn ma na khɔrɩ ʋ hala mʋ gaga kha ʋɔ thĩra, hara tʋɔ hara kãn ma na gbɩ̃nɛ u khuora.
49006001	Ɓiiwe, ĩ ki nu ĩ hũndɛwɛ bɛrɛ Adɛyɩra kãmara za, naɗɩɛ sɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra.
49006002	«Gbɩ̃nɛ mu siira na mʋ yaara», Ken sɩɛrɛdewensira daɓila za Yekila lʋgʋn sɩɛn nʋhãaŋa bʋ.
49006003	Gɩɛ nʋhãaŋɩra kɩ bʋ kha: «Mu ɓu bãanwuoŋo na thakuosʋ̃rʋga fɔlɔŋɩra za fara.»
49006004	Ɩ̃ɛ hũndɛwɛ, hã ɩ̃ bɩ̃ɩ ĩ ɓiiwira za waʔ, ŋa ĩ koro pi kɩ ɓɔ pɩ, kɩ karɩ̃n mɩ na makɩ̃n na Adɛyɩra dĩŋora.
49006005	Ɗome, ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ ɩ̃ thadɛrɩwɩra kɩ bʋ fara dunuyara za gbaangbo na kpolonvɩrɩga, na ãnabirise, ki sũne ĩ thĩ mʋ gaga kha baa ĩ le si na Kirisitira ɩra.
49006006	Hã ĩ le si pɩ wʋɔla doro za ɩ̃ mɩyɛ ɓu nʋʋ wɩ waʔ, ŋa ĩ le mɩyɛ bɩɛ na kpoloŋo kpo na makɩ̃n na Yekila dĩŋora, mʋ gaga kha Kirisitira miliinɓiiwe.
49006007	Ĩ liige hã ɩ̃ thadɛrɩwɩra na kpoloŋo kpo mʋ gaga kha ĩ liige wa kɩ hã Adɛyɩra, hã ĩ le si mʋ gaga kha nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ ĩ le hã sɩ waʔ.
49006008	Naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ tʋ wa kha nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpo kpora, ɗome i ba, hɔrɔmɛ ɩ ba, pɩ bɩɛ kpo kpora ɓa ɓu wa pi miliinkɩ̃rɩsɛ tɔ̃nɩra Adɛyɩra heke.
49006009	Ɩ̃ɛ thadɛrɩwɛ, ĩ le si kpuosira na hã ɗomira. Hã ɩ̃ gbɩ̃ɩ wɩ waʔ, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ tʋ kha ɩ̃ɛ na bɩɛ bʋ wa na thadɛyɛ kpo zaara ni, u gbũu khon nɩra nɩra za waʔ.
49006010	Sɩ phɩlɩyãnsɩra kɩ bʋ kha ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na ɓu faŋa Adɛyɩra heke ʋ wɔrɩkpakpakɩra za.
49006011	Ɩ̃ khɛ Yekila khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdaasɩra bɩɛ si le thaaga ɩ̃ wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ na kɩ̃ra na tɩɛ Sutana na asɩ ʋ zansɩra bɩɛ.
49006012	Naɗɩɛ a khɛ̃ɩ na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe waʔ, ŋa a khɛ̃ɩ wa dɩ̃ɩna ninbɩ̃ɩwɛ thadɛrɩwɩra kɩ bʋ dunuyara dabirige ɩɩgɩra za ɩra, dɩ̃ɩna faŋadɛwɩra, dɩ̃ɩna wɔrɩkɔdɛwɩra kɩ bʋ dabirigira za, dɩ̃ɩna ninbɩ̃ɩwɩra kɩ bʋ zaazaara ni ɩra.
49006013	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ khɛ Yekila khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdaasɩra bɩɛ si le thaaga, na ɗɩyãga bɩ̃ɩgɩra ɓa nannɩ, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ tikpo za ɓanu kha ĩ yo nann khɛ̃ɩgɩra zuokhɛla.
49006014	Ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ tikpo za na khɛ̃ɩ Sutanara. Yekila tɩ̃yara bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha kagara. Ɩ̃ vɔ ʋɔ kagarara ɩ̃ hagayɛ za. Teleme bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha khɩ̃ɩgbɔgɔlɔ̃n, ĩ yii ʋɔ gbɔgɔlɔ̃na.
49006015	Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na ki de Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra na nʋnʋʋmɛ, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ hã kpolonwuoŋira. Sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha sawʋlansɛ ĩ yiin ɩ̃ ɗɩɛsɩra na wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ Yekila khɩ̃na za na kɩ̃ra.
49006016	Hã ɩ̃ ɓa pha khãamɩra kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha sʋɔyɛ tɩɛgɛ khɩ̃ɩgɩra waʔ, bɩɛ kɩ ɓa dɛnfɛ ɩ̃, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ bĩi bɩ̃ɩra Sutana sʋɔbɩ̃ɩnyɩra bɩɛ.
49006017	Ĩ si zɩ̃mɛ khɩ̃ɩgbãnfɩlara kɩ khɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra sɔrɔnara sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila sɩɛsɩra.
49006018	Ɩ̃ kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila bãanyɛ bɩɛ gbaangbo Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za, na yɩ̃n ʋ na yɩ̃mɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ. Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ bɩɛ yɩ̃mɩra za gbaangbo kɩ yɩ̃n kɩ hã kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ kɛɩ gbaa.
49006019	Ɩ̃ kɩ yɩ̃n kɩ hã mɩɛ tɩ̃, si le thaaga na mɩɛ kha mɩɛ de Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra gũnira bɛnɛ bãa, mɩɛ wɔrɩ ɓu phĩne na de si sɩ yɛ.
49006020	Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra kãmara za mɩɛ bʋ kasora za. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ yɩ̃n Yekila na hã mɩɛ, mɩ wɔrɩ sɩɛrɛ na haɓɛ mʋ gaga kha baa mɩ kãn na le si ɩra.
49006021	Mɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa kha ɩ̃ tʋ mɩɛ hɩɗanlɔmɩra dɩ̃ɩna mɩɩna mɩɛ le. A yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɔ Tisiki, kɩ bʋ Yekire miliindakɩ̃ra ɓa kpɔrɩ ɩ̃ mɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ.
49006022	Mɩ kɩɛsɩ̃n sɩ wa kɩ dãa ʋ ĩ heke ĩ ɓu nu a kʋ̃ra, kɩ hã ɩ̃ haɓɛ.
49006023	Siye Yekila na a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira hã kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kpolonwuoŋo na khɔrɩmɛ, na khãamɛ.
49006024	Yekire kɩ̃ra wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ a Adɛyɩra Yesu Kirisitira na khɔrɩkɛɩzuome.
50001001	Mɩɛ Poli na Timote liin Yesu Kirisiti miliinɓiiwe, a thɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Filipura na liin Yekila bɛwɛ naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ bʋ nʋʋnɛ kpo na Yesu Kirisitira ɩra. A thɩɛ egilizi wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra dɩ̃ɩna pɩ dɛnfɛdɛrɩwɩra.
50001002	A Siye Yekila na Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira fɩ̃ɩ ɩ̃ za kɩ hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo.
50001003	Bɛnɛ tʋɔ bɛna mɩ gagasɛ wa ɩ̃ za, mɩ thɩɛ wa a Yekila.
50001004	Bɛnyɛ bɩɛ na mɩ kha mɩ yɩ̃n Yekire na hã ɩ̃ bɩɛ, mi le si wa na bãanwuoŋo.
50001005	Naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ dɛnfɛn mɩɛ Yekire sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra deɓira za na gɔ bɛna ɩ̃ khãarɩ na ɓa gbɩɛ fɩ̃ɩra za.
50001006	Mɩ khãa wa sɩ za kha Yekila gɔɗ sɩɛ miliinkɩ̃nsɩɛ ɩ̃ za, ʋɔ ɓa yɩɛ wa si le na hĩi na yo gbɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira vɩ ɓamɩra za.
50001007	Sɩ makɩ̃n ma mi yii ɩ̃ bɩɛ mɩyɛ mɩ gagasɩra za mafɩra, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ mɩyɛ gbɩ̃ra wa mɩ za gbaangbo. Baa mɩɛ bʋ kasora za, dɩ̃ɩna bɛna mɩ kha de Yekire sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra na mɩ yɛsɩ̃n sɩ nɩpɛ heke, ĩ ɓuun ma niin fɩ̃ɩmɩra Yekila fɩ̃ɩn mɩɛ za ɩra.
50001008	Iyo Yekila kɩ bʋ mɩ sɩɛrɛra, na tʋ kha mi de ɓa tɩ̃ya, mɩ khɔrɩ wa ɩ̃ bɩɛ thĩ na makɩ̃n na Yesu Kirisitira khɔrɩlɔmɩra.
50001009	Mɩ yɩ̃n ma Yekila kha ʋ yɩɛ ɩ̃ khɔrɩmɩra kɩ gbɩ̃n, sɩɛ le na Yekila tʋʋnthĩnthĩme, dɩ̃ɩna wʋɔmɛ,
50001010	si le thaaga ɩ̃ tʋ khoŋĩn mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ. Mafɩra ɩ̃ ɓa le nɩyɛgɛmɛ, kɛɩ le zarɩgɩ̃nkhɛyɛ Kirisitira gbũu ɓanɗɩyãgɩra za,
50001011	kɩ yɩɛ ĩ hĩi na mɩkɩ̃rɩliige Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za, nɩpɛ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila kɩ fʋʋ na ʋ yɩsɩgɩra.
50001012	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha ɩ̃ tʋ wɛsɩɛ. Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha gbɩ̃rɩsɩra nann mɩɛ, sɩɛ yɩɛn ma na Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra ɓuun thaaga.
50001013	Naɗɩɛ sʋrasiwira kɩ bʋ gʋvɛrɩnɛrɩra gbɛɩ̃na za, na bʋɔra bɩɛ tʋʋn ma ɩra kha mɩ bʋ wa kaso za naɗɩɛ baa mi liige kɩ hã Kirisitira ɩra.
50001014	Dʋɔ sɩɛn ma kiretɩ̃ɛgɔmɛ khãamɛ za, naɗɩɛ baa pɩ yãan kha mɩɛ bʋ wa kaso za ɩra. Mafɩra, pi ɓuun ma haɓɛ bʋɔ na sɩɛrɩ, ki de Yekila sɩɛsɩra kɛɩ le ãnabirise.
50001015	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, pɩ bʋɔ ɓɔgɔ wa Kirisitira mɩyɛ, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ zone bʋ wa pɩ za, dɩ̃ɩna pi bo ɓa na kamɛ naɗɩɛ pɩ ɓɩɛ wa na tãra mɩɛ, ŋa bʋɔ le si wa na gagakɩ̃rɩsɛ.
50001016	Bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ le si wa mɩɛ khɔrɩmɛ kãma, naɗɩɛ pɩ tʋʋn ma kha mɩɛ bʋ wa fara kɩ khɛ̃ɩ kɩ hã Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra.
50001017	Ŋa wɛpɩɛ kɩ khɛ̃ɩ zone na mɩɛ, bɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa Kirisitira mɩyɛ na bogore, dɩ̃ɩna gagabɩ̃ɩsɛ. Pɩ ɓɩɛ wa mɩ gagasɩra ɓu asɩ na sɩɛ kasora za.
50001018	Sɩ sʋɔ sii bʋ thaaga waʔ, si liin na gagakɩ̃nsɛ ba, si liin ma na gagabɩ̃ɩsɛ ba, Kirisitira mɩyɛ bʋ wa ki de, mɩ yãgayãga wa sɩɛ za. Mi gbũu ɓa ki yo wa wʋɔrɛ kɩ yãgayãga.
50001019	Naɗɩɛ mɩ khãan ma kha ĩ Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra wɔrɩkɩra za dɩ̃ɩna Yesu Kirisitira Nina dɛnfɛsɩra za, gbɩ̃rɩsɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa yo phɩla wa mɩɛ kuome za.
50001020	Naɗɩɛ wɛsɩɛ mɩ tɩɛ thĩra na mɩ khãa sɩ za, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha nɩɩsɛ ɓa gɔ mɩɛ mɩɩnɛ sii za waʔ, ŋa, haɓɛ bʋ wa mɩɛ za na gɔ ɩra wɩɛ na yo kũu, thakuogo i ba, huume i ba, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa na khɛ mɩ gbɔɗa na gbɩ̃nɛ Kirisitira.
50001021	Mɩɛ heke, na liige na hã Kirisitira, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ thakuogira, na mi huuri, mi ɓuume bʋ wa bʋ.
50001022	Ŋa na mɩ kãn hɩɗan ma thakuogo za, mɩ ɓa wɔrɩ le wa miliinkɩ̃rɩsɛ, mafɩra, mɩ tʋ wɛsɩɛ mi ken khon waʔ.
50001023	Mɩ gagasɛ bʋ wa sɩyɔ̃ yɔ̃: Ŋa, wɛsɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra gbaangbora, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha mɩ khɔrɩ wa na kure dunuyawɩɛ za na yo hɩɗan na Kirisitira.
50001024	Ŋa sɩ bãa mɩɛ hɩɗan thakuogo za ɩ̃ɛ kãmara za.
50001025	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ baa mɩ khãan ma sɩ za, mɩ tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha mɩ ɓa hɩɗan ma thakuogo za. Mɩ ɓa hɩɗan ma ɩ̃ bɩɛ lɔkɔ za na ɓu dɛnfɛ ɩ̃ ĩ yo wʋɔrɛ kɩ hɩɗan bãanwuoŋo za khãamɩra za.
50001026	Mafɩra, na mɩ vɩɗ thiyen ĩ heke, sɩ ɓa le wa thaaga ɩ̃ bãanɛ wuo gbaangbo na Kirisitira mɩɛ kãma.
50001027	Wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ thaagɩra, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra kãn ma na hɩɗan mʋ gaga kha baa Kirisitira sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra ɓɩɛ sɩ ɩra. Mafɩra, na mɩ ɓa wɔrɩn thiyeri, mɩ yã ɩ̃, na mɩ ɓa wɔrɩn thiyen tɩ̃ waʔ ba, mi nu ɩ̃ kʋ̃ra kha ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n kɩ̃ran ma ki liin nʋkpuore na kamɛ, dɩ̃ɩna kha ĩ leɗe wa kpuore na gagakpuose, kɩ gɔ khãamɩra, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ ɓakan sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra za ɩra.
50001028	Hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra ãnɛ ɩ̃ mɩɩnɛ sii za waʔ. Sɩɛ kɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ sɩ kha bɩɛ thĩra ɓa dii wa. Ɩ̃ɛ heke, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha ɩ̃ɛ ɓa ɓu wa zɩ̃mɛ; sɩɛ gbũun kuɗ ɓa Yekila za.
50001029	Naɗɩɛ, ʋɔ fɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃ za na yɩɛn na ɩ̃ khãan Kirisitira za, sɩɛ dola ɩ waʔ, ʋ yɩɛn ma na ĩ ɓuun vɛnsɛ Kirisitira za.
50001030	Ɩra wɩɛ, ĩ niin bʋ wa khɛ̃ɩgɩra za. Gɩɛ khɛ̃ɩkpuogira ɩ̃ yãan na mɩ kha khɛ̃ɩ khɔ̃ɩra, ɩ̃ tʋʋmɛ gbũu bʋ wa sɩ za tɩ̃, kha mɩ bʋ wa ki yo wʋɔrɛ na gɩɛ khɛ̃ɩkpuogɩɛ.
50002001	Kirisitira hã ɩ̃ wa faŋa, naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ bʋ kpuore dɩ̃ɩn ʋ ɩra. Ʋ khɔrɩ ɩ̃, sɩɛ hã ɩ̃ wa haɓɛ, u Nina liin thaagɩra na ɩ̃ hɩɗan nʋkpuore, ĩ hĩin ma na nʋwansɛ, dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ makarɩ wa kamɛ za.
50002002	Si liin mafɩra, ɩ̃ hɩɗan nʋkpuore na kamɛ, ɩ̃ hɩɗan na khɔrɩlɔnkpuowe, ɩ̃ hɩɗan na gagakpuose, ki yii ɩ̃ gagasɩra mɩɩnɛ kpo za. Mafɩra mɩ bãana ɓa wuo gbaangbo.
