58001003	Yekila ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra bɩɛ yɩ̃ŋa wa Ɓikhiira za, Yekila khɩɛgɩ̃nsɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa ʋ za. Dunuyara bʋ wa ʋɔ sɩɛsɩra wɔrɩkɩra za. Ʋ tɩsɩn khonn ma nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira ki yo hɩɗann zaazaara ni wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekila leɗĩngɛŋɩra ʋ.
58001004	Yekila Ɓikhiira nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛla gbɩ̃n tãra mɛlɛgɛwɛ bɛla, harɩ na Yekila hãar ʋ yɩsɩga wɛkɛ kɩ gbɩ̃n tãra mɛlɛgɛwɩra bɛgɩra phewu.
58001005	Ʋ̃na mɛlɛgɛ Yekila dɛrɩn deɗ yãarɩ kha: «Mʋɔ kɩ bʋ mi Ɓikhiira, Na gɔ kɩ fɩ̃ɩra mɩɛ kɩ bʋ mu Siira.» Yekila dɛrɩn deɗ mɛlɛgɛ sii wɛsɩɛ yãan waʔ, kha: «Mɩɛ kɩ ɓa le mu Siira, kɩ yɩɛ mʋɔ le mi Ɓikhiye.»
58001006	Ŋa Yekila Ɓikhiira lʋgʋn dunuyara mɩyɩra bɩɛ za, bɛna ʋɔ ɓann dunuyara za, Yekila deɗ ɓa kha: «Yekila mɛlɛgɛwɩra bɩɛ kãn ma na ɓa huruse na gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ.»
58001007	Ken wɛsɩɛ Yekila deɗ na gbũu mɛlɛgɛwɩra za ɩra: «Mɩ khɛ wa mɛlɛgɛwɩra ki liige wi mʋ gaga kha sarɩmɛ, mi miliinɓiiwira liige wa kɩ hã mɩ mʋ gaga kha naɗewure.»
58001008	Ŋa na gbũu Ɓikhiira mɩyɩra za, Yekila deɗ ɓa ʋ sɛwʋra za kha: «Yekire, mʋ ɩɩgɩra ɓa hɩɗan ma bʋ kũu kɛɩ gbaa. Mu ɗi wa mʋ ɩɩgɩra na teleme.
58001009	Mʋ khɔrɩ wa mɩtelenyenye kɩ yãasɩ̃n mɩbɩ̃yɛ, gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, Yekire, mu Yekila kenn khonn mu wa na liin mu ʋ baa na tuun nʋʋmɛ mʋ thaagɩra za na liin mu ɩya. Ʋ yɩɛn ma na mʋ bãana wuori. Mʋɔ ʋ khɔrɩn na kenn khonn kɩ yɩɛn mʋ kamɩra.»
58001010	U deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Adɛyɛ, lʋgʋsɩra za mʋɔ liin fɔlɔŋɩra, mʋɔ lese liin zaazaara.
58001011	Sɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa tũri wa, ŋa mʋɔ ʋɔ bʋ wa bʋ kũu. Zaazaara na fɔlɔŋɩra ɓa khã ɓa mʋ gaga kha dayiinse,
58001012	kɩ yɩɛ mʋ kpɩɛ kpɩɛ sɩ mʋ gaga kha gbɔgɔlɔ̃ngbʋ̃ɔŋɔ, sɩ ɓa bɛŋɩn ma mʋ gaga kha dayiinse, ŋa mʋɔ ʋɔ hɩɗan ma mʋ lɔmɛ za, dɩ̃ɩna mʋ thakuogira zuo waʔ.»
58001013	Ʋ̃na mɛlɛgɛ Yekila dɛrɩn deɗ wɛsɩɛ yãarɩ kha: «Ɓan hɩɗan mi leɗĩngɛŋɩra, mɩ ɓa yii wa mʋ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra mu leke za.»
58001014	Na mɛlɛgɛwɩra bɩɛ ʋɔ, pɩ bʋ wa nime wɛpɛ ki liige kɩ hã Yekila na ʋɔ dãa wɩ pɩ kɩ dɛnfɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra kɩ ɓa ɓu zɩ̃mɩra ɩra.
58002001	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, sɩɛsɩra a nuuri, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a yii wʋɔrɛ sɩ za bere bʋɔtɛ a ɓa ɓilen ma Yekila khɩ̃na za.
58002002	Sɩɛsɩra Yekila khɩɛn mɛlɛgɛwɩra na deɗi, sɩ tʋʋn ma kha sɩ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya. Wɛpɩɛ na asɩn sɩɛ sɩɛrɛhãansɩɛ kɩ kɛɩn sɩ gɔɓɩra, wɛsɩɛ kha kãn na nan mɩ, sɩɛ nann mɩ.
58002003	Na a yiin wʋɔrɛ bɩɛ zɩ̃mɩɛ za waʔ, mʋsɛ a ɓa le ki ko? Adɛyɩra lʋgʋn deɗ ɓa bɩɛ zɩ̃mɩɛ mɩyɛ. Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na u nuuredɛrɩwɩra ɓa deɗ a pɩ mɩyɛ na yɛɗɩ.
58002004	Yekila thĩra tann ma mɩɓɔgɔyɔnyɛ na tagamasi mɩyɛ, dɩ̃ɩna bamʋŋa mɩthĩngɔnyɛ dɩɛ bɛnkpuola za na ɓɔgɔn sɩ kha pɩ sɩɛsɩra bʋ wa tɩ̃ya. Dɩ̃ɩna ʋ hãan ma nɩpɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra mɩyãagɩ̃ranyɛ tɩ̃ na makɩ̃nn na ʋɔ thĩra dĩŋora.
58002005	Dɩ̃ɩ mɩyɩra a bu de mɩra, Yekila hãan ɩ thadɛrɩsɩra na mɛlɛgɛwɛ waʔ.
58002006	Ŋa si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɩɛsɩra khaarɛ dʋɔ za kha: «Ee Yekire, nɩthɩ̃rɩga bʋ wa be harɩ mʋ kʋɔgɩ̃n dɩ̃ɩn ʋ? Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye bʋ wa be harɩ mu ki ken ʋ mɩyɛ?
58002007	Mʋ yɩɛn ma na mɛlɛgɛwɩra hɩɗann nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiira wʋɔrɛ ʋ bɛndaaɗɛ dʋɔ za, Mu yiin ma nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiira ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ za thĩ, kɩ yɩɛn na u ɓuun gbɩ̃nɛsɛ,
58002008	mʋ yɩɛn ma na u ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ mɩyɛ bɩɛ za.» Yekila hãan ma nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiye wɔrɩkɔ mɩyɩra bɩɛ za. Ʋ yɩɛn kɛɩ sũnen mɩɩnɛ sii na hãar ʋ waʔ. Kɛna fɩ̃ɩra, a yã thon kha nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiira bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ mɩyɩra bɩɛ za waʔ.
58002009	Ŋa a yã wa tɩ̃ kha Yekila na sũnen ma Yesura na hãan mɛlɛgɛwɛ bɛnɛ dʋɔ za kɩrɩ ʋ. Ʋ bɩɩn ma vɛnsɩra na huun nɩpɩra bɩɛ kãmara za, Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra kãma za? Ɩra wɩɛ u hĩin ma na ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ dɩ̃ɩna gbɩ̃nɛsɛ.
58002010	Iyo, Yekila liin dunuyara, dunuyara bʋ wa bʋ ʋɔ kãma. Ʋ kha ɓɩɛ wa kha u ɓigɔmɛ niin hɩɗan ʋɔ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra za. Baa Yesura ki kuore wi, sɩ kha kãn ma Yekila yɩɛ ʋ khʋɔ vɛnsɛ na le nɩhĩyemo.
58002011	Yesura yɛɗɛ wa nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira na khon mi pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za. Wɩɛra kɩ yɛɗɛ dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ ʋ yɛɗɛ, pɩ bɩɛ bʋ wa Siye kpo. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na sɩ bʋ nɩɩsɛ u heke na yɩ pɩ kha ʋɔ yaɓiiwe waʔ.
58002012	Naɗɩɛ, Yesura deɗ ɓa Yekila tɩ̃ kha: «Mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ wa mʋ yɩsɩgɩra na mɩ yaɓiiwira. Mɩ ɓa tɩ̃nɛ wa mʋ yɩsɩgbɩ̃nɛtɩ̃nsɛ nɩgboko sʋgʋmʋ za.»
58002013	Yesura deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Mɩɛ ʋɔ ɓa yii wa mɩ laŋɩra bɩɛ pere Yekila za.» U deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Ken a, mɩɛ na ɓiiwira Yekila hãan mɩ ɩra.»
58002014	Bɩɛ ɓiibɩɛ bʋ wa na mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ kpuore, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha pɩ bɩɛ bʋ wa nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe. Sutana kha bʋ wa na wɔrɩkɔ na yɩɛ pi hu. Mafɩra tɩ̃ Yesura ɓann na liin nɩthɩ̃rɩga na huun na ɓuun asɩn Sutana wɔrɩkɩra.
58002015	Nɩpɛ kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha ɗome pɩ thakuogira bɩɛ za naɗɩɛ baa pɩ kha ãn huume ɩra, baa Yesura huuri na pi ɓuun ma pi thĩ.
58002016	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, mɛlɛgɛwɛ ʋ ɓa dɛnfɛ kũu waʔ, ŋa Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwira ʋ ɓa dɛnfɛ.
58002017	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na ʋ kha kãn ma na khɩɛgɩ̃n na ʋ yaɓiiwira mɩyɛ bɩɛ za, si le thaaga u le Yekire kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra wɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra na u telenn Yekila miliinsira za, kɩ yɩɛ nɩpɛ ɓu yafamɛ pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za.
58002018	Iyo, Yesura thĩra ɓuun ma vɛnsɛ na Sutana zɩɛn kenn ʋ za. Si liin mafɩra, ʋ wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ wa wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ gbɩ̃rɩsɛ za ɩra.
58003001	A kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ Yekila yɩɗɩ, ĩ ken Yesura, ʋɔ wɩɛra a tʋ kha ʋ bʋ wa Yekire dãara na kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra khãamɩra za, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ a kpaasɩ̃n kha a bʋ wɩ ɩra.
58003002	Iyo, Yekila tiin ma Yesura na liir u kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra. Yesura liin ma nʋʋnɛ kpo nɩra Yekila wʋɔla za u millinsira bɩɛ za, mʋ gaga kha baa Moyizira liin nʋʋnɛ kpo nɩra u miliinsira bɩɛ za Yekila thʋʋgɩra za ɩra.
58003003	Ŋa, Yesura ɓu wa gbɩ̃nɛsɛ na tãra Moyizira, naɗɩɛ thʋmaɗɛdaa ɓu wa gbɩ̃nɛsɛ na tãra thʋʋgɩra ʋ maɗɛ ɩra.
58003004	Thʋʋga tʋɔ thʋʋga na kɩ maɗɛdaa, ŋa dɛyɩra ki le mɩyɩra bɩɛ, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Yekila.
58003005	Moyizi ʋɔ kɔnɩ liin ma nɩtelenyemo Yekila thʋʋgɩra miliinsira za. Ʋ kha bʋ wa miliinɓiye wɩɛ Yekila kha hã ʋ sɩɛsɩra kha u yo ɓɔgɔ nɩpɛ sɩ.
58003006	Ŋa Kirisitira ʋɔ bʋ wa nɩtelenyemo, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Yekila thʋʋgɩra thadɛrɩsɩra za. Na a bʋ na laŋa, na bãanwuoŋo na gbũu mɩɩna za a lannɩ, dɩɛ bɛna a le wa Yekila thʋʋgɩra ɓiiwe.
58003007	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na makɩ̃n na baa Ninyɛgɛmɔra de si kha: «Fɩ̃ɩwɩɛ, na ĩ nuun Yekila nʋʋgɩra,
58003008	hã ɩ̃ hʋgan ĩ phĩnyira waʔ, mʋ gaga kha harɩ khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra bɛna ɩ̃ na pãragandãn ʋ za ɩra. Dɩɛ bɛna gbangbĩriŋira za, ɩ̃ zɩɛn ma ʋ za na kenni.
58003009	Na Yekila deɗ tɩ̃ kha: Gɩɛ gbangbĩriŋira za, ĩ sekhãgawɩra ɓɩɛn ma mɩɛ Yekila nʋʋga kɩ zɩɛn mɩ za na kenni. Kɛna pɩ na yãan ma wɛsɩɛ mɩ na liin
58003010	ɗɩɩsɛ tigbeyɔ̃ (40) kpoloŋira za. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mi donn gbaangbo na bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ ki deɗ kha: Pɩ bʋ wa ɓilense za kɛɩ gbaa. Pɩ tʋʋn mɩ khɩ̃na waʔ.
58003011	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mi deɗ mɩ donbɩ̃ɩgɩra za kha: Sɩrɩgɩra mɩ ɔfɔn sann mɩ pi ɓu wuore, pɩ ɓa lon kɩ za kũu waʔ!»
58003012	Mi kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ. Hã ɩ̃ ʋɔ sii ɓa le hɩɗan na gagabɩ̃ɩsɛ na yɩɛ kɛɩ khãa Thakuo Yekila za ki legen dɩ̃ɩn ʋ waʔ.
58003013	Ŋa ɩ̃ kɩ hã kamɛ haɓɛ ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga na makɩ̃n na bɛndɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra yɩ kha «fɩ̃ɩwɩɛ» si le thaaga, hã ɩ̃ ʋɔ sii le numigbɩka na yɩɛ Sutana kpɛnsɛ ɩ̃ na yii ĩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za waʔ.
58003014	Naɗɩɛ laŋɩra a nisĩnn gɔɗɩ, na a hɩɗann na gɩɛ laŋɩra na kɩ̃ran na yo nann diikhɛla, dɩɛ bɛna a ɓa le wa Kirisitira miliindɛkamɛ.
58003015	Si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Fɩ̃ɩra, na ĩ nuun Yekila nʋʋgɩra, hã ɩ̃ hʋgan ĩ phĩnyira waʔ, mʋ gaga kha harɩ khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra bɛna ɩ̃ na pãragadãnn ʋ za ɩra!»
58003016	Bʋnɛwɛ nuun Yekila nʋʋgɩra ki liin numigbɩkɩra ʋ za? Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ Moyizira kusen Eziwitira, bɩɛ ɩ.
58003017	Yekila donn ma ɗɩɩsɛ tigbeyɔ̃ (40) kpoloŋo za. U donn ma na ãna? U donn ma na wɛpɩɛ liin mɩbɩ̃yɩra ɩra, bɩɛ kpuowira gbũun huun gbangbĩriŋira za.
58003018	Yekila na khɩɛn ma nʋʋga na deɗ kha: «Sɩrɩgɩra mɩ ɔfɔn sann mɩ pi ɓu wuore, pɩ ɓa lon kɩ za kũu waʔ.» Be liin na ʋ khɩɛn gɩɛ nʋʋgɩra? Wɛpɩɛ liin numigbɩkɩra ʋ za bɩɛ kãmara yɩɛrɩ.
58003019	Mafɩra, a yãan kha pɩ wɔrɩn lonn Yekila wuoresira za waʔ, naɗɩɛ baa pɩ khãan waʔ ɩra.
58004001	Mafɩra, Yekila hãar a wa nʋʋga kha a ɓa lon ma ʋɔ wuoresira za. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a kɔrɩsɩ̃n a thĩ, hã ɩ̃ ʋɔ sii ɓa ken kha ʋɔ ɓann ma kpɩ̃ra za waʔ.
58004002	Naɗɩɛ a ɓuun ma Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra mʋ gaga kha a sekhãgawɩra. Ŋa sɩɛsɩra bɩɛ na nuuri, sɩ kɩ̃ran bɩɛ dʋɔ waʔ, naɗɩɛ pɩ gɔɗ sɩ na khãamɛ waʔ.
58004003	Aa ʋɔ, aa khãan ma, a ɓa lon ma Yekila wuoresira za mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila deɗ si kha: «Mi doŋira za, mɩ khɩɛn ma nʋʋga na deɗ kha sɩrɩgɩra mɩ ɔfɔn sann mɩ pi ɓu wuore, pɩ ɓa lon kɩ za kũu waʔ!» Kɛna Yekila na zuon ma u liigesira bɛna u liin dunuyara ɩra.
58004004	Naɗɩɛ, sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ deɗ ɓa na gbũu khɩɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra mɩyɛ za kha: «Na Yekila zuon u miliinsira bɩɛ kɩ hɩɗan wuoren khɩɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ ɗɩyãgɩra.»
58004005	Yekila deɗ ɓa sɩ mɩyɛ tɩ̃ kha: «Sɩrɩgɩra mɩ ɔfɔn sann mɩ pi ɓu wuore, pɩ ɓa lon kɩ za kũu waʔ.»
58004006	Wɛpɩɛ lʋgʋn nuun Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, bɩɛ lonn sɩɛ wuoresira za waʔ, naɗɩɛ pi numigbɩkɩra kãma, kɛna bʋɔ wɔrɩ lon bʋ.
58004007	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Yekila khonn yawʋga gʋɔ kɩ yɩɗ kɩ kha «fɩ̃ɩra». Ʋ tann ma Davidi za khɔ̃ɩ na sɩɛrɛn na gbũun gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩɛ mɩyɛ za, khaala mɩyɛ deɗ na tann ɩra kha: «Fɩ̃ɩra, na ĩ nuun Yekila nʋʋgɩra, hã ɩ̃ hʋgan ĩ phĩnyira waʔ.»
58004008	Na Zozuwe na wɔrɩn hãan ma Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira wuorese, Yekila naa ɓa sɩɛrɛ na gbũu ɗɩyãga gʋɔ mɩyɛ za dʋ̃waʔ.
58004009	Sɩɛ kɔrɔ kɩ bʋ kha wuorese bʋ wa bʋ bere kɩ tɩɛ Yekila nɩpɩra. Sɩ khɩɛgɩ̃nsɛ kɩ bʋ yawʋyĩɗe khɩɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ ɗɩyãgɩra.
58004010	Naɗɩɛ, wɩɛ ki lon Yekila wuoresira za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra wuore wa u miliinsira kpɩ̃ra za mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila wuoren ʋɔ thĩ bɛsɩra kpɩ̃rara za tɩ̃ ɩra.
58004011	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a pɛ̃ɩ na lon Yekila wuoresira za. Mafɩra, nɩra sii ɓa thuo numigbɩdɛrɩwɩra lɔmɩra na wa waʔ.
58004012	Yekila sɩɛsɩra hã wa thakuogo, sɩ bʋ wa na faŋa. Si ɗu ɓa na tãra kpere wɩɛ kɩ bʋ na nʋʋnyɛ yɔ̃. Yekila sɩɛsɩra lon ma a za thĩ. Si lon ma harɩ thĩmine za, na gbuguyira za, dɩ̃ɩna sɛmɩra za. Si lukin ma nɩthɩ̃rɩga kpolongagasɛ bɩɛ na tʋ sɩ lɔmɩra.
58004013	Mɩɩnɛ sii guoren Yekila za waʔ. Mɩyɩra bɩɛ u liiri, ɩ bɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa i thĩ ʋ wʋɔla za. U yiwiyira bʋ wa mɩyɛ bɩɛ za, ʋɔ a bɩɛ kãn na thuo a mɩyɩra bɩɛ.
58004014	Khãamɩra mɩyɛ a kpaasɩ̃n, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a gɔ bɩɛ na kɩ̃ra. A bʋ na kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ thadɛyɩra, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ Yesura, Yekila Ɓikhiira gann zaazaara ni na nann Yekila wʋɔla ʋ ɩra.
58004015	A kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ thadɛyɩra bʋ nɩra wɩɛ kɩ ba kpũn a kpũŋinsira waʔ. Naɗɩɛ u ɓuun ma gbɩ̃rɩthĩnsira bɩɛ mʋ gaga kha aa, ŋa u liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ.
58004016	Na si liin mafɩra, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a zʋ̃ʋ nan Yekila kɩ̃rɩgɩra ɩɩkhokira na laŋa, si le thaaga ʋ yafa a za, na fɩ̃ɩ a za, kɩ kɩ dɛnfɛ a a kpũŋinsira bɛna.
58005001	Pi ken khon ma Yekire kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra, nɩpɛ sʋgʋmʋ za si le thaaga ʋ kɩ ɔfɔ nɩpɩra mɩyɛ na Yekila tɩɛ. U khon ma thɔgɔnsɛ na ʋ hã pi leke mɩhãanyɩra na Yekila pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãma.
58005002	Kperekpiidakhãgara thĩra bʋ wa na kpũŋinse gbaangbo. Si liin mafɩra, wɛpɩɛ kɩ tʋ foi waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ ki le ɓilense, ʋ wɔrɩ dɛnfɛ wa bɩɛ.
58005003	Baa ʋ bʋ wa na kpũŋinse tɩ̃, ʋ kãn ma na khon thɔgɔnsɛ nɩpɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kãma, ŋa u khon si wa ʋɔ thĩra mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kãma za tɩ̃.
58005004	Nɩra sii wɔrɩ tii u thĩ na le kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra waʔ. Yekila ki yii nɩra sɩ za mʋ gaga kha baa u yiin Aarɔ̃ sɩ za ɩra.
58005005	Kirisitira bɛsɩra bʋ wa mafɩra tɩ̃. Ʋɔ thĩra hãan u thĩ sɩɛ gbɩ̃nɛsɩra na liin kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra waʔ. U ɓuun si wa Yekila heke. Yekila deɗ ɓa kha: «Mʋ bʋ wa mi Ɓikhiye, na gɔ kɩ fɩ̃ɩra mi liin ma mu Siye.»
58005006	Yekila deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Mʋ bʋ wa kperekpiidaa kũu kɛɩ gbaa, mʋ gaga kha Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ lɔmɛ.»
58005007	Bɛna Yesura kha bʋ dunuyara za, ʋ yɩ̃nn ma Yekila zaanɩ, na arɩgan yĩndolon na kusen yĩmithĩnse kha ʋ zɩ̃n ʋɔ na huumira. Yekila nuuren ma ʋ yɩ̃mɩra naɗɩɛ baa ʋ na sũnen u thĩ ɩra.
58005008	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, Kirisitira bʋ wa Yekila Ɓikhiye, ŋa ʋ khʋɔn ma vɛnsɛ na mamarɩn na ki nu Yekila bɛrɛ.
58005009	Baa Kirisitira mɩyɩra bɩɛ ɓa hĩiri, wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ ki nu ʋ bɛrɛ, ʋ yɩɛ wa bɩɛ ɓu zɩ̃nkɛɩzuome.
58005010	Iyo, Yekila tiin ma Yesura na liir u kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra mʋ gaga kha Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ lɔmɛ.
58005011	Mɩgɔnyɛ bʋ wa a heke na de na gbũu kperekpiidɛkhãgawɩra thadɛyɩwɩɛ mɩyɩra za, ŋa sɩ yɛsɩ̃mɛ hʋgan ma. Naɗɩɛ, ɩ̃ tʋ mɩyɛ kɔrɩwɛ vivi waʔ.
58005012	Ɩra wɩɛ, bãnɩ ɩ̃ na liin ma karɩ̃ndɛwɛ zuori! Ŋa harɩ bere, ɩ̃ vɛn ma pɩ karɩ̃n ɩ̃ Yekila mɩthɔthɔʔɩra tɩ̃. Ɩ̃ bʋ na faŋa na wɔrɩ ɗi ɗimɩyɩra ki nugo dʋ̃waʔ, ɩ̃ vɛn ma nʋnʋ za.
58005013	Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ yɔ̃ nʋnʋ doro, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa ɓiɓone. Ʋ bʋ na tʋʋmɛ na khoŋĩn mɩkɩ̃nɛ na mɩbɩ̃ɩnɛ waʔ.
58005014	Ŋa ɗimɩyɩra ki nugo, ɩɛ bʋ wa nɩkhãgawɛ bɛyɛ. Baa pɩ bʋ na tʋʋmɛ, pɩ lɔɓidɛwɩra tʋ khoŋĩn ma mɩkɩ̃nɛ na mɩbɩ̃ɩnɛ .
58006001	Mafɩra do, Kirisitira mɩthɔthɔʔɩra tʋʋmɩra, hã ɩ yɩɛ a dii ɩɛ ɓɩɛmɛ za harɩ fɩ̃ɩ waʔ, ŋa a pɛ̃ɩ na yo wʋɔrɛ. Karɩ̃n ɗuguwira ki de kha: Vɩkɩ̃n mu kpoloŋira kɩ zɩɛ mʋ mɩbɩ̃ɩliigira, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra nɩra dʋɔ waʔ, ki yii mʋ laŋɩra Yekila za, na ãnyĩke mɩyɛ, na ɗʋkɩ̃n lese nɩra za na yɩ̃n Yekire na hã ʋ, na nɩhuome arɩgamɛ mɩyɛ, dɩ̃ɩna kiti phɩlayamɔra mɩyɛ, hã a vɩ gbũu ɩɛ mɩyɩra za dʋ̃waʔ.
58006003	Na Yekila bɩɩrɩ, a ɓa kɩ hã wa karɩ̃n wɩɛ kɩ bʋ nɩkhãgawɛ baa ɩra.
58006004	Naɗɩɛ, nɩpɛ wɛpɛ zɩɛn khãamɩra, bɩɛ wɔrɩ vɩ pɩ gagasɩra na vɩ ɓan dʋ̃waʔ. Pɩ kha bʋ wa na Yekila yɛyɛɓɩra, na ɗɩɛn kenn zaazaa mɩyãagɩranyɩra za, dɩ̃ɩna pi niin kha bʋ wa Ninyɛgɛmɔra za.
58006005	Pɩ tʋʋn ma kha Yekila sɩɛsɩra bʋ wa mɩkɩ̃nɛ, kɩ ɗɩɛn kenn dunuya ɓaramɔra wɔrɩkɔ mɩyɩra za.
58006006	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, na pɩ vɩɗ gbũun ma pɩ thakuoɗugugira za. Nɩra sii wɔrɩ le thaaga bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ vɩkɩ̃n pɩ lɔmɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Naɗɩɛ, pɩ bʋ wa kɩ kɩ ɓa Yekila Ɓikhiira nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za na pi yii u nɩɩsɛ nɩpɛ bɩɛ wʋɔla za.
58006007	A khɛ sɩ khɩɛgɩ̃nsɛ hʋʋga za. Hʋʋga fɔlɔŋɩra yɔ̃ wa adaga ãmɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ. Mafɩra, dathukɩ̃nsɛ fĩi wa kɩ za na hã kɩ sʋ̃nɛdɛwɩra. Sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha Yekila kɩ̃ra wa gɩɛ fɔlɔŋɩra.
58006008	Ŋa na huonthuse na wũubɩ̃ɩga ki fĩi gɩɛ hʋʋgɩɛ za, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha kɩ kɩ̃ra mɩɩnɛ waʔ. Yekila ɓa daŋa gɩ wa, kɩ yɩɛ pi yii naaga kɩ za.
58006009	Iyo, harɩ na a sɩɛrɛ mɩra a kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, a lann ma sɩ za kha ɩ̃ɛ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ wa khɩ̃nkɩ̃na za, dɩɛ wɛtɩɛ ki yo na nɩpɛ zɩ̃mɩra za ɩra.
58006010	Yekila bʋ kɛɩtelenyemo waʔ. Ĩ milewenyira dɩ̃ɩna khɔrɩmɩra ɩ̃ ɓɔgɔn ʋ mɩyɩra za baa ɩ̃ dɛnfɛn kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra khɔ̃ɩra na baa ĩ le si harɩ fɩ̃ɩra, ʋ ɓa pha sɩ waʔ.
58006011	Wɛsɩɛ a ɓɩɛ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha ɩ̃ bɩɛ hɩɗan na nʋnʋʋmɛ na yo gbɩɛ phɩlabɛna za, mafɩra, ɩ̃ laŋɩra ɓa le thĩnthĩŋe.
58006012	Hã ĩ le woyɩ̃mɛ waʔ, ĩ thuosĩn wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãan na pɛ̃ɩ kɩ ba na ɓu mɩɩna Yekila hãan nʋʋgɩra.
58006013	Baa Yekila hãan Abɩrahamʋ nʋʋgɩra, na Yekila karɩ̃nn ma na ʋɔ thĩra, naɗɩɛ nɩra sii bʋ na tãra ʋ wɩɛ yɩsɩga za ʋ wɔrɩ karɩ̃n waʔ.
58006014	U deɗ ɓa kha: «Iyo, mɩ ɓa kɩ̃ra mʋ, kɩ gɔnɛ mʋ kpɩ̃ra nɩpɩra gbaangbo.»
58006015	Abɩrahamʋra baɗ ɓa, ki ɓuun mɩɩna Yekila na hãan nʋʋgɩra ɩra.
58006016	Na nɩra kha ʋ khɛ nʋʋga, ʋ karɩ̃n ma na nɩra wɩɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛla kɩ tãra ʋɔ thĩra bɛla ɩra. Nʋkhɛgɩra le wa thaaga na hã sɩɛsɩra faŋa, mafɩra, bakɩ̃nsɛ hɩɗan bʋ dʋ̃waʔ.
58006017	Mafɩra, Yekila kha ɓɩɛ wa na ɓɔgɔ sɩ na yɛ na wɛpɩɛ kha kãn na ɓu mɩkɩ̃rɩyɩra nʋʋgɩra na hãan mɩ ɩra, kha ʋɔ ɓa vɩ ʋɔ gagasɩra waʔ; gɩɛ yɩɛn na ʋ khɩɛn nʋʋgɩra na sɩɛn nʋhãaŋɩra za.
58006018	Na gbũu ɩɛ mɩyɛ yɔ̃ra za, ɩ wɔrɩ vɩkɩ̃n waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna Yekila wɔrɩ tɔn ɩɛ mɩyɩra za waʔ. Ɩ hã wa aa hakpakpapɛ, mafɩra, aa wɛpɩɛ zɩɛn mɩyɩra bɩɛ, a ɓa gɔɗ ɓa laŋɩra mɩyɩra kɩ̃raŋɩra Yekila na hãar a nʋʋgɩra ɩra.
58006019	Gɩɛ laŋɩra nugo ma, kɩ ɓakan kɩ̃ran a za mʋ gaga kha khɩ̃ɩgɩra pɩ vɔ batoŋo za na yɩɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ ɩra. Dɩ̃ɩna gɩɛ laŋɩra kpɛ̃ɩ wa thʋkpekĩn lowula kɩ bʋ Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za,
58006020	fɩra za Yesura nisĩnn a na lonn aa kãma. U liin ma kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra kũu kɛɩ gbaa mʋ gaga kha Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩ .
58007001	Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩ kha bʋ wa Salɛmʋ ɩtakhuo dɩ̃ɩna zaazaa Yekila kperekpiidaa. Bɛna Abɩramʋ na yo khɛ̃ɩn ɩɩgɔmɛ na ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ pɩ za na vɩɗ kɩ ɓan, na Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩ thukĩnn u na kɩ̃ran ʋ.
58007002	Daasɩra bɩɛ Abɩrahamʋra kuɗ si khɛ̃ɩgɩra ʋ na ɓann sɩ, na ʋ kpɩkɩ̃nn sɩ khaayɛ gbũne na khonn hãan Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩ khaala tikpora. Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩ yɩsɩgɩra kɔla kɩ bʋ kha «teleme ɩtakhuo». Na sɩɛ sɩɛ za tɩ̃, Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra bʋ wa Salɛmʋ ɩtakhuo, sɩɛ kɔrɔ kɩ bʋ kha wɔyĩke ɩtakhuo.
58007003	Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra siye mɩyɛ deɗ waʔ, ʋ yaa mɩyɛ deɗ waʔ, u sekhãgawɛ mɩyɛ deɗ waʔ, u hũme mɩyɛ deɗ waʔ, u huume mɩyɛ deɗ tɩ̃ waʔ. Ʋ khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na Yekila Ɓikhiira, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ bʋ wa kperekpiidaa bãanyɛ bɩɛ kɛɩ gbaa.
58007004	Ken, Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra bʋ wa nɩkpakpawa. Harɩ Abɩrahamʋra kɩ bʋ a sekhãgara thĩra, mɩyɩra ʋɔ ɓuun khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩkhɛla za, ʋ hãan ma Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra daasɩra gbũnera bɩɛ za tikpora.
58007005	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, sɩɛrɛhãansɩra hãan ma khɩ̃nɛ na Levi kpɩ̃raɓiiwira liin kperekpiidɛwɩra kha pɩ kɩ zɩ̃n Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra heke daasɩra gbũnera bɩɛ za tikpo, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ pi seɓiiwira ɩra. Kɛna pɩ bɩɛ bʋ wa Abɩrahamʋ kpɩ̃raɓiiwe.
58007006	Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra bʋ Levi kpɩ̃raɓiye waʔ, kɛna mɩyɩra Abɩrahamʋra na ɓuuri, u khonn ma daasɩra gbũnera bɩɛ za tikpo na hãar ʋ. Na Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra kɩ̃ran Abɩrahamʋra, ʋɔ wɩɛra Yekila na hãan nʋʋgɩra ɩra.
58007007	Sigesige bʋ sɩ za waʔ, nɩra wɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra ʋ kãnʋʋna, ʋɔ nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛla tãra wɩɛra ʋ kɩ̃ra ɩra.
58007008	Levi kpɩ̃raɓiiwira kɩ zɩ̃n daasɩra gbũnera bɩɛ za tikpora, bɩɛ bʋ wa nɩpɛ ki hu. Ŋa na gbũu Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra gɛŋɩra, Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa kha ʋ bʋ wa thakuogo za.
58007009	A wɔrɩ de ɓa kha bɛna Abɩrahamʋra khonn daasɩra gbũnera bɩɛ za tikpora, Levira khonn ma si sira tɩ̃. Ʋɔ wɩɛra kpɩ̃raɓiiwira kɩ zɩ̃n nɩpɛ daasɩra gbũnera bɩɛ za tikpora ɩra.
58007010	Naɗɩɛ Abɩrahamʋra kɩ bʋ Levi sekhãgara. Sɩ lɔmɩra za, Levi kha bʋ wa Abɩrahamʋra gbɔɗa za bɛna Abɩrahamʋra gbɩ̃ŋɩn na Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra.
58007011	Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za, Levi gbɛ̃ɩna nɩpɛ kɩ kãn ken khon na le kperekpiidɛwɩra. Pɩ bʋ wa kperekpiidɛwɛ mʋ gaga kha Aarɔ̃, ŋa pi kperekpiidɛliigesira na hĩin waʔ, bʋɔtɛ tɔ̃nɩ kha bʋ sɩ za kperekpiidaa ʋɔ hɩɗan bʋ Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩ lɔmɛ za waʔ.
58007012	Mafɩra, baa vɩkɩ̃nsɛ liin ma kperekpiidɛwɛ miliinsira za, vɩkɩ̃nsɛ kãn ma na ɓu tɩ̃ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za.
58007013	Sɩɛsɩɛ deɗ ɓa na gbũu a Adɛyɛ mɩyɛ za. Ʋ bʋ wa gbɛ̃ɩnɛ dʋɔ nɩra, dɩɛ gbɛ̃ɩna nɩpɩra liin kperekpiidɛliigese yãan waʔ.
58007014	Nɩpɛ bɩɛ tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za, a Adɛyɩra hũnn ma na kuɗ Zuda gbɛ̃ɩna za. Moyizi sɛwʋwɩra sii ɓɔgɔ sɩ kha dɩɛ gbɛ̃ɩndɩɛ nɩra ʋɔ niin hɩɗann kperekpiidɛliigesira za yãan waʔ.
58007015	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩyɩra yɛɗ ɓa, baa si deɗ kha kperekpiida ʋɔ ɓann ma wɩɛ khɩɛgɩ̃nn na Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩra.
58007016	U liin kperekpiidaa na makɩ̃nn na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe sɩɛrɛvɔnsɛ na pɩ sɩɛrɛdewensira waʔ. Ʋ thakuogira ki zuo waʔ, gɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra za u liin kperekpiidaara.
58007017	Tɩ̃ya ʋ, si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za, na gbũu ʋ mɩyɩra za kha: «Mʋ bʋ wa kperekpiidaa kũu kɛɩ gbaa mʋ gaga kha Mɛlɩkɩsedɛkɩ lɔmɛ.»
58007018	Sɩɛrɛvɔnsɩra kha bʋ khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra, sɩɛ khʋʋn ma, naɗɩɛ sɩ na hĩin waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna sɩ kha kɩ̃ra mɩɩnɛ waʔ.
58007019	Moyizi sɩɛrɛhãansɩra wɔrɩn liin thaaga na a liin nɩhĩyeme waʔ. Ŋa lankɩ̃kɩ̃rɩga hãar a, gɩɛ le wa thaaga a zʋ̃ʋ nan Yekila.
58007020	Na sɩɛ sɩɛ za tɩ̃, Yekila khɩɛn ma nʋʋga. Ŋa bʋɔra bɩɛ liin ma kperekpiidɛwɛ kɛɩ khɛ nʋʋga.
58007021	Ŋa Yesu bɛsɩra za, Yekila khɩɛn ma nʋʋga bɛna u deɗ kha: «Mɩɛ Adɛyɩra, mɩɛ khɩɛn gɩɛ nʋʋgɩra, mi gbũu ɓa vɩ mɩ sɩɛsɩra za waʔ, mʋ bʋ wa kperekpiida bɛnyɛ bɩɛ kɛɩ gbaa.»
58007022	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, nʋhãaŋɩra Yesura tiin aa na Yekila tɩɛ, gɩɛ bʋ fɩ khɔ̃ɩ bɛgɩra za.
58007023	Kpɩkɩ̃nsɛ sʋɔ bʋ tɩ̃. Kperekpiidɛgɔmɛ tannɩ, naɗɩɛ baa pɩ kha hu ɩra.
58007024	Ŋa Yesura ʋɔ bʋ wa thakuogo za kũu kɛɩ gbaa dɩ̃ɩna u kperekpiidɛliigesira zuo kũu waʔ.
58007025	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na ʋ wɔrɩ kuore wɛpɩɛ kɩ tãra ʋɔ za na zʋ̃ʋ nan Yekila ɩra. Naɗɩɛ ʋ bʋ wa thakuogo za kũu kɛɩ gbaa na kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila kɩ hã wɩ.
58007026	Yesura kɩ bʋ kperekpiidɛkhãgara. Ʋɔ kɩ makɩ̃n a. Ʋ yɛɗ ɓa na hɩɗan kɛɩ le ɓilenkhɛrɛ, u le mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ. Ʋ lɔmɩra na khonn ma pi kpo na mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛrɩwɩra, kɩ yɩɛn na Yekila khɩɛn ganɛn ʋ harɩ zaazaara ni.
58007027	Ʋ bʋ mʋ gaga kha kperekpiidɛkhãwɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra bʋɔra waʔ. Thɔgɔnsɩra ki khon khɩɛ tʋɔ khɩɛra, ʋɔ nʋʋga bʋ na lʋgʋn khon si ʋɔ thĩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kãma za zo kɩ tʋ khon si nɩpɩra mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãma za waʔ. U khonn ma thɔgɔnsɛ bãnɩkpo nɩpɛ kãma, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ baa ʋ hãan u thĩ ɩra.
58007028	Moyizi sɩɛrɛhãansɩra tii wa nɩpɛ wɛpɛ kɩ bʋ na ɓilense na le wi kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ. Ŋa nʋʋgɩra Yekila khɩɛn sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kpɩ̃rara za, gɩɛ tiin ma Ɓikhiira kɩ bʋ nɩhĩyemora kũu kɛɩ gbaa ɩra, na liir u kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩ ra.
58008001	Iyo, wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ a deɗ na tann mɩra, sɩ bɩɛ kharɩkpakpaɗa kɩ bʋ kha a bʋ wa na ʋɔ kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩrawɩɛ thĩna. Ʋ bʋ wa na hɩɗann wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekire leɗĩngɛŋɩra ʋ zaazaara ni.
58008002	U le wa u kperekpiidɛliigesira kharɩyɛyɛgɛna za, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha ɗɔthʋthĩnthĩŋira Adɛyɩra liin ɩra, nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ liin gɩɛ waʔ.
58008003	Kperekpiidakhãga tʋɔ kperekpiidɛkhãga tiin ma si le thaaga u ki khon thɔgɔnsɛ dɩ̃ɩna ʋ hã leke mɩyɩra Yekila nɩpɩra ɓan ɩ ɩra. Mafɩra tɩ̃, sɩ kãn ma Yesura ɓu leke mɩhãanɛ na hã Yekila.
58008004	Na Kirisitira kha bʋ wa dunuyara za, ʋ naa wɔrɩ le kperekpiidaa thĩra waʔ. Naɗɩɛ kperekpiidɛwɛ bʋ wa bʋ zuori kɩ kɩ hã leke mɩhãanyɛ mʋ gaga kha baa Moyizi sɩɛrɛhãansɩra ɓɩɛ sɩ ɩra.
58008005	Bɩɛ kperekpiidɛbɩɛ liige wa Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za. Miliinsira pi le, sɩɛ bʋ wa zaazaara bɛsɩra khɩɛgɩ̃nsɛ na si donduon. Naɗɩɛ, baa Moyizira kha gɔ ɗɔthʋʋgɩra liimira, na Yekila deɗ u wa kha: «Ken, mʋ ɓa le gi wa mʋ gaga kha baa mɩ ɓɔgɔn mʋ kɩ khɩɛgɩ̃nsɩra ɓɩɛgɩra za ɩra.»
58008006	Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, miliinsira hãan Yesura, sɩɛ gbɩ̃n ma thĩ na tãra kperekpiidɛwɩra bʋɔra bɛsɩra. Naɗɩɛ ʋɔ kɩ bʋ soronadaara Yekila na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira tɩɛ gɩɛ nʋhãaŋɩra za, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ kɩ tãra khɔ̃ɩ bɛgɩra.
58008007	Lʋgʋ nʋhãaŋɩra kha bʋ Yekila na ʋ nɩpɩra tɩɛ, na gɩɛ na hĩin ma, Yekila naa ɓa ɔfɔ tii nʋhãaŋa gʋɔ khɔ̃ɩ bɛgɩra boɗa za dʋ̃waʔ.
58008008	Ŋa Yekila na zarɩgɩ̃nn ma ʋ nɩpɩra na deɗ kha: «Gʋɔ dɩyãga gʋɔ ɓa ɓan, mɩɛ Adɛyɛ ki de si, mɩ ɓa tii wa nʋhãanfɛŋɛ na Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ sɩrɩga nɩpɩra dɩ̃ɩna Zude sɩrɩga nɩpɩra.
58008009	Gɩɛ nʋhãanfɛtiyengɩɛ ɓa le kpuore na ɗuugira waʔ, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ mi tiin mɩɛ na pi sekhãgawɩra tɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra mɩ gɔɗ kusen mi Eziwiti sɩrɩgɩra za ɩra. Ŋa baa pi liin nɩtelenyeme mɩ nʋhãaŋɩra za waʔ, si liin mafɩra, mɩɛ Adɛyɩra thĩra ki de si, kha mɩ ɓa zɩɛ wɩ wa.
58008010	Ɩra wɩɛ ken nʋhãaŋɩra thĩna mɩ ɓa tii mɩɛ na Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra tɩɛ bɩɛ khɩɛwɩra kpɩ̃ra za ɩra, mɩɛ Adɛyɛ ki de si. Mɩ ɓa hã wɩ wa wʋɔmɛ pɩ tʋ mɩ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, mɩ ɓa sɛwɛ sɩ wa pɩ thĩmiyĩra za. Mɩɛ kɩ ɓa le pi Yekila kɩ yɩɛ pi le mɩ nɩpɛ.
58008011	Nɩra sii ɓa karɩ̃n ʋ sɩrɩga nɩra warɩma ʋ yaɓiye kha ʋ tʋ mɩɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Naɗɩɛ pɩ bɩɛ ɓa tʋ mɩ wa, na gɔ nɩtɩtɩɩpɩra za na yo gbɩɛ nɩkpakpapɩra za.
58008012	Iyo mɩ ɓa yafa wa pi ɓilensira za, mɩ ɓa kʋɔgɩ̃n na pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira dʋ̃waʔ.»
58008013	Na Yekila bʋ sɩɛrɛ na gbũu nʋhãanfɛntiiŋe mɩyɛ za, ʋ yɩɛn ma na lʋgʋ bɛgɩra ɗugoni; kɛna mɩɩndɛ bãa kɩ bʋ ɗugure na tɩ khãɗɩ, dɩɛ tũrime bɛna nan n ma.
58009001	Lʋgʋ nʋhãaŋɩra kha bʋ wa na kɩ sɩɛrɛvɔnsɛ na gbũu Yekire gbɩ̃nɛ lɔmɩra za, dɩ̃ɩna khaarɩyɛgɛnɛ dʋɔ na zɩɛn hãan ma Yekila fɔlɔŋɩra za.
58009002	Sɩɛ za, ɗɔthʋʋga na ɓaɗ ɓa. Kɩ na kpekĩnn ma, lʋgʋ khaala kha bʋ «kharɩyɛgɛna». Fɩra za fɩtanɩ tiikhɛla kha bʋ, na tapalɩra dɩ̃ɩna burusira zɩɛn hãan Yekila ɩra.
58009003	Thʋkpekĩn lowuyʋɔ̃fɩ̃rana kpɩ̃rara kha bʋ ɗɔthʋʋgɩra gɛnɛ dʋɔra. Dɩɛ khaala pɩ kha yɩ kha «kharɩyɛyɛgɛnɛ».
58009004	Fɩra za nʋhãaŋɩra kɛsura kha bʋ, ʋ ɓʋrʋn fɩ̃ɗ ɓa pere na sãnɩ. Ʋɔ kɛsuwɩɛ kpoloŋira ʋ, sãnɩ dagoɗe kha bʋ, tɩ na hĩɗen ma na manɩ, na Aarɔ̃ daɓɔɗa na murin ɩra, na bʋrʋseɗerenye za sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na sɛwɛn ɩra. Sãnɩ wusuna sokhɛla kha bʋ wa nʋhãaŋɩra kɛsura wʋɔla ʋ.
58009005	Sãnɩ mɛlɛgɛwɛ kha bʋ nʋhãaŋɩra kɛsura thaagɩra za na ɓɔgɔ kha Yekila bʋ wa fɩ. Mɛlɛgɛwɩra mɩsɩra donduowira kha baka wa kɛsura phiigira kɩ bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛ yafamɛ khaala. Ŋa, sɩɛsɩɛ kpɔrɩ bɛna dɩɛ waʔ.
58009006	Iyo, sɩɛ daasɩɛ bɩɛ makɩ̃mɛ kpɩ̃ra za mafɩra, khɩɛ tʋɔ khɩɛ kperekpiidɛwɩra kha lon ma ɗɔthʋʋgɩra kharɩyɛgɛna za na le pi liigesira.
58009007	Ŋa, kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩrara kpora ki lon ɗɔthʋʋgɩra kharɩyɛyɛgɛna za, bãnɩkpo ɗɩɩgɩra za. Fɩra za, u yo wa na daɗuorowe tarɩmɛ na hã Yekila bɩ ʋɔ thĩra ɓilense dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɩra ɓilensira yafamɛ kãma za.
58009008	Mafɩra, Ninyɛgɛmɔra ɓɔgɔ wa kha na ɗɔthʋʋgɩra kharɩyɛyɛgɛna bʋ, khɩ̃nɛ phiin zɩɛn hãan nɩra na yo dɩɛ khaala za waʔ.
58009009	Sɩɛ bʋ wa fɩ̃ɩ mɩyɛ khɩɛgɩ̃nsɛ. Sɩ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha leke mɩyɩra na thɔgɔnsɩra ki khon kɩ hã Yekila, dɛyɩra kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila mafɩra, sɩɛ wɔrɩ yɩɛ u kpoloŋira yɛ waʔ.
58009010	Ɗiime, na yʋ̃ɔmɛ mɩyɩra, na ãwʋrɩkɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ ki le na yɛɗɛ mʋ, sɩɛ bɩɛ bʋ wa nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ sɩɛrɛvɔnsɛ doro. Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛvɔnsɩɛ kha bʋ wa na thaaga na yo gbɩɛn bɛna Yekila naa ɓa vɩkɩ̃n mɩyɩra ɩra.
58009011	Ŋa Kirisitira ʋɔ ɓann ma na liin kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra na ɓu hã a ɓudaga wɛkɛ kha bʋ bʋ zuori. Ɗɔthʋʋgɩra za ʋ tannɩ, gɩɛ gbɩ̃n tãra gʋɔra, dɩ̃ɩna kɩ kɩ̃ra tãra gʋɔra phewu. Nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ lese liin ŋi waʔ, sɩɛ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha a dunuyawɩɛ bɛgɛ ɩ waʔ.
58009012	Kirisitira lonn kharɩyɛyɛgɛna za na hãan Yekila kpɛkhuo warɩma naɓige tarɩmɛ waʔ. Ŋa ʋɔ thĩra tarɩmɛ ʋ hãan Yekila bãnɩkpo kpeli na zɩ̃nn zɩɛr a na a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira pere.
58009013	Na makɩ̃n na sinira, kpɛkhuowe, na nakhuowe dɩ̃ɩna nayasuomo mɩrɩwɛ kɩ khɛ na yɛɗɛ wɛpɩɛ teɗ ɩra. Kɩ yɩɛ pɩ yɛ.
58009014	Baa sɩ bʋ mafɩra, Kirisitira tarɩmɩra bʋ wa na wɔrɩkɔ gbaangbo. Ninkɛɩhuomora wɔrɩkɩra za, ʋ hãan ma u thĩ na Yekila mʋ gaga kha thɔgɔnsɛ wɛsɛ kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le dɩ̃ŋakhɛrɛ. Ʋ ɓa yɛɗɛ wa a lɔɓɩdɛwɩra na khon a mɩkarɩyɩra ki yo na nɩpɛ huume za ɩra, si le thaaga a liige kɩ hã Thakuo Yekila.
58009015	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Kirisitira liin nʋhãanfɛŋɛ soronadaara. U huun ma na ɓuun khonn nɩpɛ pi ɓilensira pɩ kha le bɛna pɩ kha thuo nʋhãanɗuugira ɩra. Mafɩra, wɛpɩɛ Yekila yɩɗɩ, bɩɛ wɔrɩ ɓu mɩkɩ̃nkɛɩzuonyira ʋ hãan nʋʋgɩra ɩra.
58009016	Na ʋ̃nɩkhɛsɛwɛ bʋ bʋ, sɩ kãn ma na yɛ zo kha ʋ sɛwɛdaara huun ma,
58009017	naɗɩɛ ʋɔ ʋ̃nɩkhɛsɛwʋwɩɛ ɓu wa thaaga ʋ sɛwɛdaara huume kpɩ̃ra za. Na ʋ̃nɩkhɛsɛwʋra sɛwɛdaa bʋ thakuogo za, ʋ̃nɩkhɛsɛwʋra bʋ na thaaga waʔ.
58009018	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, harɩ lʋgʋ nʋhãaŋɩra thĩra, tarɩmɛ gboɗi kɩ tʋʋn yɩɛn na ki tiiri.
58009019	Moyizira lʋgʋn karɩ̃nn ma sɩɛrɛdewensira nɩpɩra bɩɛ wʋɔla ʋ mʋ gaga kha baa si deɗ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za ɩra. Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na ʋ khɩɛn nakhoɓorise na kpɛkuowe tarɩmɛ, dɩ̃ɩna ãmɛ, kɩ tʋʋn khɩɛn zãra ɗuomamʋsɛ na vɔɗ sɩ ɩsɔpʋ ɗeke za na yĩɗ kɩ tarɩmɛ za na gboɗ gboɗ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra sɛwʋra za dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɩra bɩɛ za.
58009020	Na Moyizira deɗ kha: «Nʋhãantiiŋira tarɩmɛ bɩra, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ Yekila ɓɩɛ kha ɩ̃ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ɩra»
58009021	Bɩɛ lɔmɩra za tɩ̃, na ʋ tɩɩn tarɩmɛ bʋɔ ɗɔthʋʋgɩra za dɩ̃ɩna dagosira bɩɛ kha khɛ ki le Yekila miliinsira ɩra.
58009022	Na makɩ̃n na sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, tarɩmɛ ki le thaaga mɩgɔnyɛ bɩɛ yɛ. Ŋa na tarɩmɛ gboɗ waʔ, mɩbɩ̃yɛliige wɔrɩ yafa waʔ.
58009023	Na zaazaa mɩyɩra khɩɛgɩ̃nsɩra kãn ma na kɩ yɛɗɛ bɩɛ lɔmɩra za, mafɩra wɛʔɩɛ kɩ bʋ zaazaara ni, ɩɛ kãn ma na thɔgɔnsɛ, wɛsɛ kɩ bãa khɔ̃ɩ bɛsɩra za.
58009024	Iyo, Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋga wɛkɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ lese liin na kɩ khɩɛgɩ̃nn na zaazaa bɛgɩra, gɩɛ za Kirisitira lonn waʔ dɛ! Ʋ gann ma zaazaara ni na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n Yekila wʋɔla ʋ aa kɩ̃ramɛ kãma.
58009025	Ɗɩɩga tʋɔ ɗɩɩga, Yawutuwe kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩrara lon ma bãnɩkpo kharɩyɛyɛgɛna za na daawɛ tarɩmɛ. Ŋa Kirisitira ʋɔ, ʋɔ gann ma zaazaara ni na hãan u thĩ na pi khonn u thɔgɔnsɛ bɛngɔnyɛ za waʔ,
58009026	bʋɔtɛ, bãnɩ ʋ naa vɛn ma bɛngɔnyɛ na gɔ bɛna dunuyara liin ɩra. Iyo, ɩra wɩɛ bɛnphɩlɩyandɩɛ za, Kirisitira ɓɔgɔn ma u thĩ bãnɩkpo kpeli, si gbũun zuon ma. Mafɩra ʋ asɩn mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira baa ʋ hãan u thĩ na liin thɔgɔnsɛ ɩra.
58009027	Sɩ hãan ma nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye kha u hu bãnɩkpo, sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za Yekila kiti u.
58009028	Mafɩra tɩ̃, Kirisitira hãan ma u thĩ na liin thɔgɔnsɛ bãnɩkpo kpeli, na khonn nɩgɔmɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige. Sɩ bãnɩyɔ̃ra za, ʋ ɓa ɓɔgɔ wa u thĩ, sɩ ɓa le mɩbɩ̃yɛliige khome dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa na kuore wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ kɩ tɩɛ ʋ ɩra.
58010001	Moyizi sɩɛrɛhãansɩra kha ɓɔgɔ wa ɓudaɓaraŋa mɩyɛ, ŋa sɩ ɓɔgɔ ɓudaɓaraŋɩra lɔmɩra na kɩ̃ra waʔ. Sɩɛrɛhãansɩra ɓɩɛ sɩ wa kha sɩɛ thɔgɔnkpuosira kãn ma na ki khon ɗɩɩga tʋɔ ɗɩɩga kɛɩ gbaa. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, wɛpɩɛ kɩ tãra sɩɛ za na zʋ̃ʋ nan Yekila, sɩɛ wɔrɩ le thaaga pi le nɩthɩ̃rɩhĩyeme waʔ.
58010002	Bʋɔtɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila mafɩra, bãnɩ bɩɛ na tɩsɩn khonn ma pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za bãnɩkpo kɩ yɩɛ si zuo. Pɩ naa ken pi thĩ kha bɩɛ bʋ wa na ɓilense dʋ̃waʔ, thɔgɔnsɛ naa ki khon dʋ̃waʔ.
58010003	Ŋa sɩɛ thɔgɔnsɩɛ thĩra le wa thaaga na kɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n nɩpɛ pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira ɗɩɩga tʋɔ ɗɩɩga,
58010004	naɗɩɛ nakhuowe na kpɛkhuowe tarɩmɩra wɔrɩ khon mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira waʔ.
58010005	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Kirisitira sɩɛrɛn ʋ ɓanbɛna dunuyara za na deɗ Yekila kha: «Mʋ khɔrɩn thɔgɔnsɛ na leke mɩhãanyɛ waʔ, ŋa mʋ hãan ma mɩɛ gbɔɗɛ.
58010006	Na khʋ daɗuorowe na so pi thɔgɔnsɛ sokhɛrɛ za, warɩma mɩbɩ̃yɛliige yafamɛ thɔgɔnsɛ, sɩɛ sʋɔ sii hĩɗen mʋ wʋɔrɛ waʔ.
58010007	Mafɩra na mi deɗ ɓu kha: “Mɩ wɛ Yekire, mɩ ɓa le wa wɛsɩɛ mʋ ɓɩɛ ɩra. Sɩɛ sɛwɛn mɩ mɩyɩra za sɛwʋyɛgɛmɔra za.”»
58010008	Kirisitira lʋgʋn deɗ ɓa kha: «Mʋ khɔrɩn thɔgɔnsɛ waʔ, warɩma leke mɩhãanyɛ waʔ, warɩma daɗuorowe pi so thɔgɔnsɛ sokhɛla za, warɩma thɔgɔnsɩra ki khon mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira waʔ. Sɩ sʋɔ sii nʋʋ mʋ waʔ.» Kɛna sɩɛrɛhãansɩra ɓɩɛ wa kha nɩpɛ ki khon sɩɛ thɔgɔnsɩɛ.
58010009	Kirisitira deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Mɩ wɛ, mɩ ɓa le wa wɛsɩɛ mʋ ɓɩɛ.» Kirisitira khʋʋn ma khɔ̃ɩ thɔgɔnsɩra, kɩ hãan u thĩ si boɗa za.
58010010	Yesu Kirisitira liin ma wɛsɩɛ Yekila kha ɓɩɛ kha u le ɩra. Ʋ hãan ma ʋ gbɔɗa bãnɩkpo kpeli. A ɓu wa yɛɗɛsɛ ʋɔ kãmara za.
58010011	Kperekpiidaa tʋɔ kperekpiidaa nɩ́ɩrɛ́ wa ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga na ki le Yekila miliinsira. Bɛngɔnyɛ za, u khon ma thɔgɔnkpuose. Sɩɛ thɔgɔnsɩɛ wɔrɩ khon nɩra mɩbɩ̃yɛliige kũu waʔ.
58010012	Ŋa Kirisitira khonn ma thɔgɔnsɛ kpo kpeli mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãma, ki yo hɩɗann Yekila leɗĩngɛŋɩra ʋ kũu.
58010013	Ɩra wɩɛ, ʋ bʋ wa kɩ tɩɛ kha Yekila yii ʋ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra u lekira za.
58010014	U khonn ma leke mɩhãanɛ kpo; wɛpɩɛ yɛɗ na khonn mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za, dɩɛ leke mɩhãandɩɛ yɩɛn ma na bɩɛ liin nɩhĩyeme bãanyɛ bɩɛ kɛɩ gbaa.
58010015	Ninyɛgɛmɔra yɛsɩ̃n a wa sɩ tɩ̃. Naɗɩɛ u de ɓa zo kha:
58010016	«Mɩɛ Adɛyɛ ki de kha ĩ ken nʋhãaŋɩra mi tii dɩ̃ɩn mɩ bɩɛ khɩɛbɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za ɩra. Mɩ ɓa yii wa mɩ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra pi kpolonsira za, kɩ sɛwɛ sɩ pɩ gagasɩra za.»
58010017	U deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ na sɩɛrɩ kha: «Mɩ ɓa kʋɔgɩ̃n na pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira na pi ɓilensira dʋ̃waʔ.»
58010018	Na mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira yafan zuori, a vɛn kha aa khon leke mɩhãanyɛ na ɓu khon mɩbɩ̃yɛliige dʋ̃waʔ.
58010019	Kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, a bʋ wa na khɩ̃nɛ na lon kharɩyɛyɛgɛna za, naɗɩɛ Yesura gboɗ ɓa u thĩ tarɩmɩra.
58010020	U hãar a wa thakuokhɩ̃nfɛnɛ baa u phiin zɩɛn Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra thʋkpekĩn lowula. Dɩɛ thʋkpekĩn lowula kɩ bʋ ʋɔ thĩra gbɔɗa.
58010021	A bʋ wa na kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩra wɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila thʋʋgɩra thaagɩra za.
58010022	A kpolonsira yɛɗɛn ma na mɩyɩra bɩɛ kha yii a lɔɓidaara ɓilensira za, a gbɔʔɩra wʋrɩn ma na ãnkɩ̃rɩwɛ. Mafɩra, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a zʋ̃ʋ nan Yekila na gagayɛgɛnsɛ dɩ̃ɩna khãakɩ̃rɩwɛ.
58010023	Laŋɩra a kpaasɩ̃n kha aa bʋ gɩ, a gɔ kɩ na kɩ̃ra, naɗɩɛ Yekila bʋ wa nʋʋnɛ kpo Yekire ʋ nʋhãaŋɩra za.
58010024	A kɩ gɔ kamɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra, na kɩ dɛnfɛ kamɛ na ɓɔgɔ kamɛ khɔrɩmɛ dɩ̃ɩna na ki le kamɛ mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ.
58010025	Hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ a zɩɛ a bĩŋingboʔira mʋ gaga kha baa bʋɔ dɛrɩ ki le si waʔ. Ŋa a yo wʋɔrɛ na kɩ hã kamɛ haɓɛ, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha Adɛyɩra ɗɩyãgara yĩmin ma.
58010026	Naɗɩɛ na a yo wa wʋɔrɛ kɩ kɩɛnsɩ̃n ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ tɩ̃yara tʋʋmɛ kpɩ̃rara za, thɔgɔnsɛ sʋɔ bʋ wɛsɛ kɩ wɔrɩ khon a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira dʋ̃waʔ.
58010027	Dɩɛ bɛna foi bʋ na le waʔ, fɔ na hɩɗan phĩnkhonkpakpaka za kɩ kɩ tɩɛ Yekila kitira dɩ̃ɩna ʋ nakpakpakɩra kɩ ɓa so zuo ʋ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra.
58010028	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra ki le numigbɩka Moyizi sɩɛrɛhãansɩra za, na nɩpɛ pɩyɔ̃ warɩma pɩsãa hãan sɩɛrɛwɛ kha u ɓilenn ma, pɩ khʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɛɩ makarɩ ʋ za.
58010029	Nɩra wɩɛ ki zene Yekila Ɓikhiira, ki ken Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra tarɩmɩra mɩkpasɩrɛ, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ za ʋ na ɓuun yɛɗɛsɩra, kɩ lʋgʋtɩ̃nn Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɛ Nina, ɩ̃ɛ gagasɩra za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn na vɛnkpakpasɛ na tãra bʋɔra bɛsɩra waʔ ba?
58010030	Iyo, a tʋ wa dɛyɩra deɗ wɛsɩɛ kha: «Donkhoŋira bʋ wa mɩɛ bɛgɛ. Mɩ ɓa taa wa nɩpɛ bɩɛ na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ kɩ kãn mɩ!» U deɗ ɓa tɩ̃ kha: «Adɛyɩra ɓa kiti wa ʋ nɩpɩra.»
58010031	Sɩ bʋ wa phĩnkhonmɩyɛ na wa Thakuo Yekila lekira za!
58010032	Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na lɔmɩra za sɩ kha bʋ ĩ heke harɩ khɔ̃ɩra baa ĩ ɓuun Yekila yɛyɛɓɩra ɩra. Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za fɩ na ĩ ɓuun ma vɛnkpakpasɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n tikpo za na khɛ̃ɩgɩ̃n thĩ.
58010033	Pɩ kha kʋsa wa ɩ̃ bʋɔ, kɩ kɩ gbɩ̃ɩ wɩ nɩpɛ wʋɔrɛ za, warɩma tɩ̃, ɩ̃ kha dɛnfɛ wa wɛpɩɛ pɩ kha le mafɩra ɩra.
58010034	Iyo, ɩ̃ vɛnn ma kpuore na wɛpɩɛ kha bʋ kaso za ɩra. Ĩ leke mɩyɩra zɩ̃nn ma na ɩ̃ bɩɩn sɩ na bãanwuoŋo, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ tʋʋn ma kha ɩ̃ bʋ wa na ɓudakɩ̃rɩga wɛkɛ ki zuo kũu waʔ ɩra.
58010035	Hã ɩ̃ zɩɛ ɩ̃ laŋɩra waʔ, naɗɩɛ kɩ ɓa yɩɛ wa ĩ ɓu taakpakpasɛ.
58010036	Sɩɛ za, ɩ̃ kãn ma na kɩ sɔmɩra ki ki le Yekila dĩŋora na ɓu mɩyɩra ʋ hãan nʋʋgɩra ɩra.
58010037	Naɗɩɛ si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Bɛndaaɗɛ dʋɔ kɩrɩ, bɛndaaɗɛ thĩ, wɩɛra kɩ kãn ɓan, ʋɔ ɓa ɓan, ʋ ɓa lɛɩ kɛɩ ɓan waʔ.»
58010038	Yekila deɗ ɓa kha: «Nɩra wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ nɩtelenyemo mɩɛ wʋɔla za, ʋɔ ɓa ɓu wa thakuogo khãamɩra wɔrɩkɩra za, ŋa na u gbũun kpɩ̃ra, mɩ bãanɛ wuo dɩ̃ɩn ʋ waʔ.»
58010039	Aa ʋɔ, wɛpɩɛ ki gbũu kpɩ̃ra na ɓilen, aa bʋ bɩɛ bʋɔ waʔ. Wɛpɩɛ kɩ hɩɗan na khãamɛ na ɓu zɩ̃mɩra, aa bʋ wa bɩ ɛ bʋɔ.
58011001	Na khãa, sɩɛ kɔrɔ kɩ bʋ na lan mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ za, kɩ khãa tɩ za kɛna mʋ yãan nɩ na yiwire yãan waʔ.
58011002	Khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩ nɩpɩra ɓuun ma yɩsɩnʋʋga Yekila heke pɩ khãamɩra kãmara za.
58011003	Baa a khãa Yekila za, sɩɛ yɩɛn na a tʋ kha Yekila liin ma dunuyara na ʋɔ thĩ nʋʋga sɩɛsɛ. Mafɩra, mɩyɩra a yã na yiwiye, a tʋ wa kha ɩɛ kuɗ ɓa mɩkɛɩyãanyɛ za.
58011004	Baa Abɛlɩ na khãan Yekila za na u khonn ma thɔgɔnkɩ̃kɩ̃rɩsɛ na hãan Yekila. Ʋ thɔgɔnsɩra nʋʋn ma Yekila na tann Kayɛ̃ bɛsɩra. Baa ʋ khãan Yekila za, na Yekila kenn u wa nɩtelenyemo kɩ bɩɩn u leke mɩhãanyɩra. Abɛlɩ khãamɩra kãmara za, ʋ mɩyɛ de ɓa harɩ fɩ̃ɩ kɛna u huun ma.
58011005	Baa Enɔkɩ na khãan Yekila za, na ʋ khɩɛn gann ma zaazaara kɛɩ hu. Nɩra sii wɔrɩn yãar ʋ dʋ̃waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila na khɩɛn yuor u wa ʋɔ thĩra heke ni. Yekila sɛwʋwɩra ɓɔgɔ sɩ wa kha Enɔkɩra mɩyɛ nʋʋn ma Yekila, kɩ tʋʋn yɩɛn na Yekila khɩɛn gann ʋ.
58011006	Nɩra sii mɩyɛ wɔrɩ nʋʋ Yekila, kɛna ʋ dɛyɩra khãan Yekila za waʔ. Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ zʋ̃ʋ nan Yekila, ʋ dɛyɩra kãn ma na khãa sɩ za kha Yekila bʋ wa bʋ, dɩ̃ɩna kha Yekila taa wa wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ ʋɔ ɩra.
58011007	Nowe khãan ma Yekila za na Yekila ɓɔgɔn ʋ mɩyɛ wɛʔɛ nɩpɛ kha yã thonn waʔ. Nowe gɔɗ ɓa Yekila sɩɛsɩra sʋɔwɛsɛ za, na liin batoŋo na ɓuun kuoren ʋ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra. Baa u liin sɩɛ na dunuya nɩpɩra diin ma kɩ yɩɛn na Yekila kenn u nɩtelenyemo ʋ khãamɩra kãmara za.
58011008	Abɩrahamʋ khãan ma Yekila za, na thũnn ʋ yɩɗa ki nuuren u. U yuon ma sɩrɩga gʋɔ za wɛkɛ Yekila naa ɓa hã ʋ. U yuon ma kɛɩ tʋ khaala ʋ kha yo.
58011009	Abɩrahamʋra khãan ma Yekila za, mafɩra na u yo hɩɗann ma khɩ̃rɩsɛ za sɩrɩga gʋɔ za wɛkɛ mɩyɛ za Yekila na hãar ʋ nʋʋgɩra. Ɗɔthʋʋsɛ za ʋ kha bʋ na Ɩzakɩ na Zakɔbʋ, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ niin kha bʋ gɩɛ nʋhãaŋɩra za tɩ̃ ɩra. Nʋʋgɩra na hãan ma bɩɛ tɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha Abɩrahamʋra.
58011010	Naɗɩɛ Abɩrahamʋra kha tɩɛ wa gbonkpakpkaka wɛkɛ maɗɛn kɩ̃ranɩ. Yekila makɩ̃nn gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ maɗɛlɔmɩra, dɩ̃ɩna ʋɔ thĩra maɗ kɩ.
58011011	Sara khãan ma Yekila za, na Yekila yɩɛn na ʋ wɔrɩn ɓuun ɓiye. Kɛna Sarara na khãɗ ɓa thĩ, ŋa sɩ na yɛɗ ɓa u heke kha Yekila bʋ wa nʋʋnɛ kpo ʋ nʋhãaŋɩra za.
58011012	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, a sekhãga Abɩrahamʋra na yĩmin ma huume thĩ, kɛna nɩgboko kuɗ ɓa ʋ za. Pɩ gɔn ma mʋ gaga kha khʋsaɓiye warɩma mʋ gaga kha lagagborogeŋe sɩ̃rɩkpɩka, pɩ nʋʋnɛ tʋ waʔ.
58011013	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ bɩɛ kha khãa wa Yekila za ki huuri. Pi ɓuun mɩyɩra Yekila na hãan nʋʋgɩra waʔ, ŋa pɩ yãar ɩ wa legelege kɩ yãgayãgan ɩ mɩyɛ za. Pɩ na ɓɔgɔn sɩ wa kha bɩɛ bʋ wa khɩ̃rɩwɛ na tãradɛwɛ dunuyara za.
58011014	Sɩɛ deɓira za, pɩ ɓɔgɔn sɩ wa na yɛsɩ̃nn kha bɩɛ ɓɩɛ wa segboŋo.
58011015	Pɩ gagasɛ kha bʋ sɩrɩgɩra za pɩ kha kure waʔ, bʋɔtɛ pɩ kha bʋ wa na lɔmɛ na vɩ gbũu.
58011016	Naɗɩɛ, segbonkɩ̃rɩga pɩ kha ɓɩɛ, gɩɛ kɩ bʋ zaazaa segboŋira. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na sɩ bʋ nɩɩsɛ Yekila heke pɩ yɩ ʋ kha pi Yekire waʔ. Naɗɩɛ, ʋ ɔfɔn ma gbonkpakpaka na sann mɩ.
58011017	Abɩrahamʋ khãan ma Yekila za. Yekila zɩɛn kenn ma ʋ za na deɗ u kha u khon u ɓikhiye Ɩzakɩ thɔgɔnsɛ na hã ʋɔ. Mafɩra na Abɩrahamʋra khɩɛn ma u ɓikhiira kpo kpelira kha ʋɔ hã ʋ, kɛna Yekila na hãar ʋ wa nʋʋga zuori.
58011018	Naɗɩɛ Yekila na deɗ u wa kha: «Ɩzakɩra za mʋ ɓa ɓu kpɩ̃raɓiiwira mɩ hãan mʋ nʋʋgɩra ɩra.»
58011019	Ŋa Abɩrahamʋra na yiin si wa ʋ gagasɩra za kha Yekila bʋ wa na wɔrɩkɔ na arɩga nɩra na kuse u huume za. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Yekila vɩɗ hãar ʋ u ɓikhiira mʋ gaga kha ʋ alɩn ma na kuɗ huume za.
58011020	Ɩzakɩ khãan ma Yekila za, mafɩra na ʋ kɩ̃ran Zakɔbʋ na Ezayu na gbũu mɩɓaranyɛ yʋɔ za.
58011021	Zakɔbʋ khãan ma Yekila za, mafɩra, bɛna ʋ na yĩmin huume na ʋ kɩ̃ran Zozɛfʋra ɓiiwira kpo kpo kpo. Ʋ ɓakan ma u kone za na gbɩ̃nɛn Yekila.
58011022	Zozɛfʋ khãan ma Yekila za. Bɛna ʋ na yĩmin huume, na ʋ sɩɛrɛn ma na gbũu Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra kureme mɩyɛ za Eziwiti sɩrɩgɩra za, kɩ ɓɔgɔn lɔmɩra za ʋɔ huwusira naa ɓa le yo ɩra.
58011023	Moyizi hũndɛrɩwɩra khãan ma Yekila za. Mafɩra, baa Moyizira hũnni, na pɩ yãan kha ʋ kha kɩ̃ra wa, na pi guoren u ferewe sãa. Pɩ ãnn ɩtakhuora sɩɛrɛdewensira waʔ.
58011024	Moyizira khãan ma Yekila za. Mafɩra, baa ʋ khãɗɩ, ʋ bɩɩn kha nɩpɛ ki de wɛsɩɛ waʔ, kha: «Moyizi bʋ wa Eziwiti ɩtakhuora ɓihɛyɛ ɓiye.»
58011025	Ʋ khɔrɩn ma na ɓu vɛnsɛ na Yekila nɩpɩra kpuore kɛna ʋ kha wɔrɩ ɗi wa ʋ bɛgɛ bɛnɛ dʋɔ kɩrɩ ʋ dunuya mɩyɩra za.
58011026	Moyizira yãan ma kha na pi zenen ʋɔ mʋ gaga kha Kirisitira, sɩɛ kha bʋ na thaaga na tãra Eziwiti ɓudagɩra, naɗɩɛ ʋ na ɓaɗ ɓa u yiwiyira taasɛ za wɛsɛ kɩ ɓan.
58011027	Moyizi khãan ma Yekila za, mafɩra u kuɗ Eziwitira kɛɩ ãn kha ɩtakhuora ɓa don. Ʋ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ma tikpo za mʋ gaga kha u yiwiyira kha bʋ wa Yekire kɛɩyãamɔra za.
58011028	Moyizira khãan ma Yekila za, u tiin ma Pakɩra kɩ yɩɛn na nɩpɛ ɓʋkɩ̃nn tarɩmɛ tʋ̃ntʋ̃nyɩra za si le thaaga hã ninkhonmɛlɛgɛra ɓa khʋ bɩɛ Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra lʋgʋ ɓikhoyipira waʔ.
58011029	Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra khãan ma Yekila za, mafɩra pɩ sagan lagagborogbʋ̃ɔnmamʋŋɩra mʋ gaga kha fɔlɔnhʋwʋga ɩ. Ŋa baa Eziwitiwira lonn kha bɩɛ saga, na ãmɩra ɗiin mi.
58011030	Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra khãan ma Yekila za. Mafɩra, baa pɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀n na vĩin mirin Zeriko gbemira khɩɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃, na u gbemira waarɩ.
58011031	Zɛrɩhara Arahabʋ khãan ma Yekila za. Mafɩra, baa Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra kha khʋ Yekila bɩ̃ɩrawɩra, na pɩ yɩɛn ma ʋɔ, naɗɩɛ baa ʋ na guoren Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra hegelindɛrɩwɩra ɩra.
58011032	Bɩra mi de tɩ̃? Bɛnɛ bʋ mɩ sɩɛrɛ na gbũu Zedeyɔ̃, na Barakɩ, na Samʋsɔ̃, na Zefute, na Davidi, na Samɩɛlɩ dɩ̃ɩna yãdedɛrɩwɩra mɩyɛ za waʔ.
58011033	Naɗɩɛ baa bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ khãan Yekila za, na pi ɓuun ma wɔrɩkɔ ɩɩwɛ bʋɔ za na zɩ̃n pɩ sɩrɩsɛ, na liin mɩtelenyenye, na ɓuun mɩɩna Yekila na hãan nʋʋgɩra ɩra, kɩ bakan zarawɛ nʋʋsɛ.
58011034	Pi bĩin ma nakpakpasɛ, ki kuon kpere huume. Pɩ kha bʋ wa kpũndɛwɛ ŋa pi ɓuun ma faŋa. Pɩ hɩɗann ma na haɓɛ khɛ̃ɩsɛ bɛnyɩra za, kɩ ɗɛɗ pɩ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra.
58011035	Hapɛ bʋɔ khãan ma Yekila za. Mafɩra, pɩ nɩhuomira arɩgan ma na hãan mɩ. Pɩ gbɩ̃ɩn ma khuowe bʋɔ kɩ ɓɩɛ pɩ khʋʋmɛ, ŋa bɩɛ ɓɩɛn kha bɩɛ zɩ̃n zɩɛ pi thĩ waʔ. Naɗɩɛ pɩ kha ɓɩɛ wa na ɓa vɩ arɩ na kure huumira za na ɓu thakuokɩ̃kɩ̃rɩga.
58011036	Bʋɔ ɓuun ma kʋsaʔɛ na gbʋ̃ʋsɛ, bʋɔ gɔɗ vɔɗ ɓa na zɔrɔgɔsɛ ki yiin kaso za.
58011037	Bʋɔ hĩŋinn ma na bʋrʋsɛ na khʋʋrɩ, bʋɔ kpekĩnn ma gbũnye yɔ̃yɔ̃ warɩma na khʋʋn na kpere. Bʋɔ kha min ma khaayɛ khaayɛ, na yiin zãraɗʋɔsɛ warɩma kpɛɗʋɔsɛ dayiinse. Pɩ kha bʋ wa bʋɔmɛ za dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɛ kha gɔ pɩ wa lɔnbɩ̃ɩwɛ za kɩ kɩ gbɩ̃ɩ wɩ.
58011038	Kɛna dunuyara kha kãn na bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ waʔ. Pɩ kha min ma khaayɛ khaayɛ, gbangbĩrinse za, na ɓɩɛsɛ za, na kɛrɩlose za, dɩ̃ɩna fɔlɔndansɛ za.
58011039	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ bɩɛ khãan ma Yekila za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na pɩ yɩsɩnʋʋgɩra yɩɗɩ. Ŋa pi ɓuun mɩɩna Yekila na hãan nʋʋgɩra waʔ.
58011040	Naɗɩɛ, Yekila na ɔfɔn ma mɩkɩ̃nkpakpaɗɛ dʋɔ na kɩ san aa, gɩɛ yɩɛn na ʋ yɩɛn na pɩ mɩyɛ liin hĩin aa kpɩ̃ ra za waʔ.
58012001	Na aa tɩ̃, sɩɛrɛgɔmɛ zann mirin a wa. Ɩ̃ yɩɛ a kɛɩ mɩyɩra ki le thaaga na barɩ a wʋɔrɛ yuomira. Ɩ̃ yɩɛ a kɛɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ za a lɛɩ wa waʔ ɩra. Laɗa za Yekila yiir a, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a horo dɩɛ na yo nan ti diikhɛla.
58012002	A ɓa yiwiyira Yesura za kũu, khãamɩra gɔ ɓa ʋɔ za na phɩla ʋɔ za. Ʋ bɩɩn ma na huun nɩɓadaɓɔkɔ za, u kenn sɩ nɩɩsɩra dʋɔ waʔ, naɗɩɛ ʋ gagasɩra kha bʋ wa bãanwuoŋira na zɩɛn sann ʋ ɩra. Ɩra wɩɛ ʋ bʋ wa na hɩɗann Yekila leɗĩngɛŋɩra ʋ.
58012003	Iyo, ĩ yii ɩ̃ gagasɩra Yesura za. Mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ kha khɛ̃ɩ ʋ wa, ŋa ʋ baɗ ɓa sɩɛ bɩɛ. Mafɩra, hã ɩ̃ ɓa kpũŋin na yɩɛ ɩ̃ gbɔʔɛ hu ĩ waʔ.
58012004	Iyo, baa ĩ leɗe kɩ khɛ̃ɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira, ĩ leɗen na nann huume thon waʔ.
58012005	Yekila ɓɔɗ ɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha u ɓiiwe, ɩ̃ phaan ma ʋ ɓɔgɔla ba? U deɗ ɓa kha: «Mi ɓiye, hã mʋ kɛɩ Adɛyɩra korimira waʔ, na ʋ kpaŋɩ̃nn mʋ, hã mʋ yɩɛ mʋ gbɔɗɛ hu mu waʔ.
58012006	Naɗɩɛ, Adɛyɩra kori wa nɩra wɩɛ ʋ khɔrɩ, ʋ khɩ ɓa nɩra wɩɛ ʋ bɩɩn kha ʋɔ ɓiye u ɩra.»
58012007	Ɩ̃ ba gbɩ̃rɩsɩra, sɩ thaagɩra kɩ bʋ na kori ĩ. Yekila gɔ ɩ̃ wa mʋ gaga kha u ɓiiwe. Ɓiye ʋ̃na kɩ bʋ na u siye kori u waʔ?
58012008	Yekila kori wa u ɓiiwira bɩɛ. Na u kori ɩ̃ɛ waʔ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha ɩ̃ bʋ u ɓithĩnthĩme waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha zɛrɩɓiiwe.
58012009	A siiwe kha kori a wa na a nu pɩ bɛrɛ. A kãn ma thĩ na nu a zaazaa Siye bɛrɛ na ɓu ɓu thakuogira.
58012010	A siiwe kha kori a wa bɛndaaɗɛ dʋɔ kãma za na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ pɩ gagasɛ hãan mɩ ɩra. Ŋa Yekila kori a wa a kɩ̃ramɛ kãma za, ʋ ɓɩɛ wa a le nɩyɛgɛmɛ mʋ gaga kha ʋɔ.
58012011	Na pi kori a, khaala za fɩ sɩ bʋ wa wɔkpãmɩyɛ, sɩ nʋʋ a waʔ. Ŋa korimira kpɩ̃ra za, ʋ dɛyɩra ɓu wa wɔyĩke na teleme.
58012012	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ arɩga lese, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ ɩ̃ kɔʔɩra hu ĩ waʔ, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ ɩ̃ gbɔʔɛ hu ĩ waʔ.
58012013	Ĩ yii ɩ̃ ɗɩɛsɩra khɩ̃nkɩ̃rɩyɛ za, si le thaaga wɩɛ kɩ kɛkɛtɩ, hã ʋ dʋga waʔ, ŋa ʋ bãa.
58012014	Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na ɓɩɛ wɔyĩke na nɩpɛ bɩɛ, na le nɩyɛgɛmɛ ɩ̃ thakuogira za; naɗɩɛ na sɩɛ bʋ kũu waʔ, ɩ̃ ʋɔ sii ɓa wɔrɩ yã Adɛyɩra waʔ.
58012015	Ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ, hã nɩra sii ɓa kpɛrɩ zɩɛ Yekila khɩ̃na kɩ̃rɩgɩra waʔ. Hã nɩra sii ɓa le mʋ gaga kha dathubɩ̃ɩga wɛkɛ fĩin na kɩ bʋ na waŋa kɩ kɩ pɔsɔ̃nɩ nɩgɔmɛ waʔ.
58012016	Hã ɩ̃ ʋɔ sii le kakarɩledaa waʔ, ha ĩ le nɩpɛ ki zene Yekire mɩyɛ mʋ gaga kha Ezawu waʔ, ʋɔ bɛŋɩnn ma ʋ nɩkhãgasɛ tɔ̃nɩra ɗiime kãma.
58012017	Ɩ̃ tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha sɩ kpɩ̃ra za, ʋ ɓɩɛ ma kha u siira kɩ̃ra ʋɔ mʋ gaga kha ʋ lʋgʋ ɓiye, ŋa na siira kɛɩrɩ. Ʋ ɓɩɛn sɩ wa na yĩthĩnse ŋa sɩ kɩ̃ran yãan waʔ.
58012018	Lɔmɩra za Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra zʋ̃ʋn nann Yekila ɓɩɛgɩra khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ za nɩpɛ kha wɔrɩ pho, ɩ̃ɛ zʋ̃ʋn nann Yekila mafɩra waʔ. Pɩ yãan ma naagɩra kha so ɓɩɛgɩra thaagɩra za ɩra. Pɩ yãan ma dabirigira, pɩ yãan ma saraŋɩra kha vu na faŋɩra ɩra.
58012019	Pi nuun ma tũune kʋ̃mɛ, pi nuun ma sɩɛsɛ na sɩ kʋ̃n. Baa pi nuun sɩɛ, na pi deɗ kha hã Yekila sɩɛrɛ na bɩɛ dʋ̃waʔ.
58012020	Naɗɩɛ pɩ kha wɔrɩ ba sɩɛrɛdewensɩɛ waʔ, kha: «Nindaa tʋɔ nindaa kɩ ɓa pho ɓɩɛgɩra za, harɩ na daɗuoro u, ʋ kãn ma na hĩŋin khʋ na bʋrʋsɛ.»
58012021	Mɩyɩra kha bʋ wa na ãnabirise harɩ na Moyizi deɗ kha: «Mɩ gban ma naɗɩɛ baa mɩ ãnn na tann ɩra!»
58012022	Ŋa ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋn nann ma Siyɔ̃ ɓɩɛgɩra dɩ̃ɩna Thakuo Yekila gbonkpakpakɩra, gɩɛ kɩ bʋ zaazaa Zeruzalɛmʋra, fɩra mɛlɛgɛgɔngɔmɩra bʋ kɩ yãgayãga.
58012023	Wɛpɩɛ lʋgʋn liin Yekila ɓiiwira na pɩ yɩsɩsɛ sɛwɛn arɩgɩnara ʋ ni, ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋn nann ma bɩɛ. Ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋn nann ma Yekila thĩra, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ ɓa kiti nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɩɛ ɩra. Nɩtelenyemira hĩɗen pi liigesira, ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋn nann ma bɩɛ.
58012024	Yesura kɩ bʋ nʋhãanfɛntiiŋira soronadaara, ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋn nann ma ʋɔ, ʋ tarɩmɩra gboɗi, ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋn nann ma bɩɛ. Bɩɛ tarɩmɩra hã a wa mɩkɩ̃nɛ na tãra Abɛlɩ bɛwɩra ɩra.
58012025	Ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ, wɩɛra kɩ sɩɛrɛ ĩ heke, hã ɩ̃ kɛɩ u nuureme waʔ. Fɔlɔŋɩɛ za, pɩ na ɓɔɗ ɓa Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra, ŋa bɩɛ kɛɩn ma u nuurese, pi gbũun kuon wɔgbʋ̃ʋgɩra waʔ. Aa ʋɔ, Yekila bʋ wa zaazaara ni kɩ sɩɛrɛ a heke, na a kɛɩn u nuureme, a wɔgbʋ̃ʋgɩra ɓa tãra khɔ̃ɩ nɩpɩra bɛgɩra waʔ?
58012026	Harɩ khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra ni, ʋ nʋʋgɩra yɩɛn ma na fɔlɔŋɩra gbannɩ. Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ ʋ hã a wa nʋʋga kha: «Mɩ ɓa yɩɛ wa fɔlɔŋɩra gban bãnɩkpo tɩ̃, fɔlɔŋɩra kpora i waʔ, ŋa gɩɛ na zaazaara.»
58012027	Daɓiyɩɛ ki de kha «bãnɩkpo tɩ̃», ɩ kɔla kɩ bʋ kha mɩyɩra Yekila liiri, ɩ ɓa gban ma ki tũri si le thaaga kɛɩgbaranyɩra dola hɩɗan bʋ.
58012028	Aa ɓuun ma ɩɩga wɛkɛ kɩ gban waʔ, ki gbũu arɩ ki boɗa za waʔ. Mafɩra, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a thɩɛ Yekila na a liige kɩ hã ʋ na makɩ̃n na lɔmɩra kɩ nʋʋ ʋ. Ɩ̃ yɩɛ a le si na laŋa na gbɩ̃nɛsɛ.
58012029	Iyo, a Yekila bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha naaga wɛkɛ ki le asɩga ɩra.
58013001	Ĩ yo wʋɔrɛ kɩ kɩ khɔrɩ kamɛ kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe.
58013002	Hã ɩ̃ pha khɩ̃rɩgɔkɩra waʔ. Naɗɩɛ nɩpɛ bʋɔ gɔɗ ɓa mɛlɛgɛwɛ khɩ̃rɩsɛ pɩ khɩ̃rɩgɔkɩra za kɛɩ tʋ sɩ.
58013003	Ɩ̃ kɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n na nɩpɛ wɛpɛ kɩ bʋ kaso za mʋ gaga kha ɩ̃ bʋ wa kasoɓiiwe bʋɔ dɩ̃ɩn mɩ kpuore. Ɩ̃ kɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n na wɛpɩɛ pɩ gbɩ̃ɩ, mʋ gaga kha ɩ̃ɛ thĩra pɩ gbɩ̃ɩ.
58013004	Nɩpɛ bɩɛ kãn ma na gbɩ̃nɛ yaŋɩra. Khuo na hara kãn ma na telen kamɛ kɛɩ le zɛrɩgɛ. Yekila ɓa kiti wa kakarɩledɛrɩwɩra dɩ̃ɩna zɛrɩgɛ ledɛrɩwɩra.
58013005	Hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ tigikhɔrɩbɩ̃ɩga ɓu thaaga ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɛ za waʔ. Ɩ̃ yɩɛ ɩ̃ wʋɔyɩra hĩi na mɩyɩra ɩ̃ bʋ ɩ ɩra, naɗɩɛ Yekila thĩra deɗ ɓa kha: «Mɩ ɓa zɩɛ mʋ waʔ, mɩ ɓa khon leke mʋ za kũu na yã waʔ.»
58013006	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na a wɔrɩ de ɓa wɛsɩɛ na laŋa kha: «Adɛyɩra kɩ bʋ mɩ dɛnfɛdaara, mɩ ɓa ãn mɩɩnɛ sii waʔ. Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye sii wɔrɩ le mi mɩbɩ̃ɩnɛ waʔ.»
58013007	Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na ɩ̃ khɔ̃ɩ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra deɗ ĩ Yekire sɩɛsɩra. Ɩ̃ gaga ken lɔmɩra za pɩ kha nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ dɩ̃ɩna lɔmɩra za pi huun yuon ɩra, ɩ̃ khɛ pɩ khãamɩra lɔmɩra.
58013008	Yesu Kirisitira bʋ wa ʋɔ nɩkpuola, dɩ̃ɩra, fɩ̃ɩra dɩ̃ɩna bãanyɛ bɩɛ kũu kɛɩ gbaa.
58013009	Hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ pɩ kpɛnsɛ ɩ̃ na karɩ̃nfɛnkpasɩwɛ waʔ. Sɩ kɩ̃ra na ɓu haɓɛ na kure Yekila kɩ̃rɩgɩra za, ŋa ɗiime mɩyɛ sɩɛrɛvɔnsɩra kɩ̃ran dʋɔ na hãan wɛpɩɛ ki thuo si waʔ.
58013010	A bʋ wa na thɔgɔnsɛ sokhɛrɛ. Yawutu kperekpiidɛwɩra bʋ na khɩ̃nɛ na ɗi dɩɛ thɔgɔnsɛ sokhɛrɩɛ ɗimɩyɩra waʔ. Naɗɩɛ bɩɛ liige wa Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za.
58013011	Fɩra za Yawutuwe kperekpiidɛkhãgawɛ wʋɔrɛ nɩrara yo na daɗuorowe tarɩmɛ kharɩyɛyɛgɛna za nɩpɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira yafamɛ kãma, kɩ yɩɛ pi yo na daɗuorowira kpɩ̃ɩsɩra hɩɗankhɛla kpɩ̃rara ʋ na so si.
58013012	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na Yesura huun gboŋo kpɩ̃rara ʋ si le thaaga ʋ yɛɗɛ nɩpɩra na ʋɔ thĩ tarɩmɩra.
58013013	Mafɩra, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a yo u heke gboŋo kpɩ̃rara ʋ, kɩ bɩ kʋsaʔɛ mʋ gaga kha ʋɔ.
58013014	Naɗɩɛ a bʋ na segboŋokɛɩkiyeŋe fara waʔ, ŋa a bʋ wa kɩ ɓɩɛ gboŋo wɛkɛ kɩ ɓa tii kpɩ̃ra za.
58013015	Yesura wɔrɩkɩra za, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a hã Yekila gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ a thɔgɔnsɩra. Sɩɛ kɔrɔ kɩ bʋ kha a gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ na a nʋʋsɩra.
58013016	Hã ɩ̃ pha mɩkɩ̃rɩliigira dɩ̃ɩna kamɛ dɛnfɛsɩra waʔ, naɗɩɛ sɩɛ thɔgɔnsɩɛ siira kɩ nʋʋ Yekila.
58013017	Ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã ɩ̃ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra, ki ki nu pɩ bɛrɛ. Iyo, bɩɛ kɩ kɔrɩsɩ̃n ɩ̃ Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za, naɗɩɛ miliinsira pi liiri, bɩɛ kɩ ɓa thuo Yekila sɩ. Mafɩra, na ĩ nu ɩ̃ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra bɛrɛ, Sɩɛ ɓa yɩɛ pi le pi liigesira na bãanwuoŋo. Bʋɔtɛ, pɩ ɓa ki le si wa na pi wũugĩn, ĩ gbũu ɓuume bʋ sɩ za waʔ.
58013018	Ɩ̃ yɩ̃n Yekire na hã aa. A lann ma sɩ za kha a bʋ wa na lɔɓidakɩ̃ra, naɗɩɛ a ɓɩɛ wa a nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra kɩ̃ra mɩyɛ bɩɛ za.
58013019	Mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa thĩ kha ɩ̃ yɩ̃n Yekila si le thaaga mɩ wɔrɩ khʋ̃ɔfɩ̃n thiye ĩ heke.
58013020	Yekila kɩ hã kpolonwuoŋira, ʋɔ arɩgan a Adɛyɛ Yesura kɩ bʋ Zãrakaada kpakpawara na kusen u huumira za. Ʋ khɩɛn ma Yesura tarɩmɩra na tiin ʋ nʋhãankɛɩzuoŋira.
58013021	Yekila hã ɩ̃ faŋa ɩ̃ wɔrɩ le mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra na ki le u dĩŋora. Mɩyɩra kɩ nʋʋ ʋɔ thĩra, u le hã a sɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za. Gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bʋ wa ʋ bɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ. Amiina.
58013022	A kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwe, mɩ yɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa kha ĩ nuure haɓɛ sɩɛsɩɛ na baɓɛ. Naɗɩɛ, mɩ letɩrɩla mɩ dãan hãar ɩ̃, ʋ sʋ̃ran tann waʔ.
58013023	Mɩ ɓɩɛ wa thĩ na de ĩ kha a yaɓiye Timote kuɗ ɓa kasora za. Na ʋ khʋ̃ɔfɩ̃n ɓannɩ, mɩɛ na ʋɔ ɓa yo ken ĩ.
58013024	Ɩ̃ thɩɛ ɩ̃ wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra bɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ. Itali kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃.
58013025	Yekire kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ bɩɛ!
59001001	Mɩɛ Zakɩ, mɩɛ wɩɛra liin Yekila na Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira millinɓiira, mɩɛ kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãan thɩɛɗɛ na hã Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ thĩnye gbune na ɩ̃yɔ̃ra tɩwɩgɩ̃nn dunuyara sɩrɩsɩra bɩɛ za ɩra.
59001002	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, gbɩ̃rɩsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ kɩ nan ɩ̃, ɩ̃ khɛ sɩ si le bãanwuoŋo ĩ heke.
59001003	Naɗɩɛ, ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ sɩɛ, na gbɩ̃rɩsɛ nann ɩ̃ na ɩ̃ wɔrɩn ɓuun khãamɛ na baɗ sɩ, dʋɔ sɩɛ wa ɩ̃ za.
59001004	Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na ba na yo nan si diikhɛla, si le thaaga ĩ le wɔrɩkɔ nɩpɛ na hĩin mɩyɩra bɩɛ za, hã mɩɩnɛ sii kpɩ ɩ̃ waʔ.
59001005	Ɩra wɩɛ, na nɩra ʋɔ bʋ ɩ̃ za, na wʋɔmɛ kpɩɗ ʋ, ʋ yɩ̃n Yekila, ʋ ɓa hã ʋ bɩɛ wʋɔmɩra. Naɗɩɛ Yekila leke gbɩ̃ra waʔ, ʋ hã wa nɩpɛ bɩɛ mʋ gaga kha baa ʋ khɔrɩ. Ʋ hã nɩra mɩɩnɛ na lʋkɩ̃nsɛ waʔ.
59001006	Ŋa, na ʋ kha ʋ yɩ̃n mɩɩnɛ Yekila heke, ʋ kãn ma na yɩ̃n na khãamɛ, hã ʋ dʋ̃nɛ waʔ. Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ bãa kɩ dʋ̃nɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ ɔkɩra sarɩmɛ vu ki ki begĩn gɛnsɛ bɩɛ ɩra.
59001007	Ʋɔ dɛyɩra siira kãn na gaga thĩra kha ʋɔ ɓa ɓu wa mɩɩnɛ sii Adɛyɩra heke waʔ.
59001008	Naɗɩɛ ʋɔ dɛyɩra gagasɩra bʋ mɩɩnɛ kpo za waʔ, na ʋ kha u le mɩɩdɛ bãa u le ri wa na dʋ̃nɛsɛ.
59001009	Kiretɩ̃ɛ wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ bʋɔmɛ nɩra, ʋ hɩɗan bãanwuoŋo za naɗɩɛ Yekila ɓa arɩga ʋ zaa.
59001010	Kiretɩ̃ɛ wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ ɓudanɩra, (na ʋɔ ɓa waarɩ) ʋ kãn ma na hɩɗan na bãanwuoŋo (bɩɛ waamɩra za), naɗɩɛ (ɓudanɩra tãra wa vivi mʋ gaga kha wũumʋŋa) baa Yekila sũne u ɩra. Na mu kenn si ɓudanɩra tũru wa vivi mʋ gaga kha baa wũumʋŋa bʋ ɩra.
59001011	Lɔmɩra za khɩɛra so wũugira vãrɩ mʋŋɩra hʋ̃ʋ kɩ lɔmɩra vɩkɩ̃n, mafɩra ɓudanɩrara waʔ, na laʔ ʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ.
59001012	Na yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩga nannɩ, dɛyɩra kɩ wɔrɩ ba kɩ, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɛgɛ, naɗɩɛ na ʋ wɔrɩn baɗ na yo nann ki diikhɛla, ʋ ɓa ɓu taasɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ thakuokɛɩzuoŋira Yekila na hãan nʋʋgɩra na wɛpɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ ɩra.
59001013	Na yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩga nann nɩra wɩɛ bãa hã ʋ dɛyɩra ɓa de kha: «Yekila yɩɛn na gɩɛ yebɩ̃ɩgɩra lonn mɩɛ za». Naɗɩɛ nɩra sii wɔrɩ yii Yekila gɩɛ yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra za waʔ dɩ̃ɩna Yekila gbũu bɩ yii nɩra yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩga za waʔ.
59001014	Ŋa, nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira bɩɛ kpo kpora yekemɩyɩra kɩ yan ʋ na yii u yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra za.
59001015	Na yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra khɩɛn kpoloŋo ki hũn ma mɩbɩ̃yɛ. Na mɩbɩ̃yɛ ɓa gbɩ̃nn na khãɗɩ, i hũn ma huume.
59001016	Mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, hã ɩ̃ kpɛnsɛ ĩ thĩ waʔ.
59001017	Mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɩra na leke mɩhãankɩ̃nɩnyɩra bɩɛ a ɓu mɩra, ɩ bɩɛ kuɗ ɓa yɛyɛɓɛ Siye Yekila heke. Ʋ vɩkɩ̃n mʋ gaga kha baa khɩɛra vɩkɩ̃n wuomira waʔ.
59001018	Sɩ nʋʋr ʋ wa, na ʋ hãar a thakuofɛŋɛ ʋ tɩ̃ya sɩɛsɩra wɔrɩkɩra za, si le thaaga a hɩɗan wʋɔrɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ za u liin ɩra.
59001019	Mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha ɩ̃ tʋ wɛsɩɛ kɩ̃raŋɩra. Ɩ̃ bɩɛ kãn ma ki nuure vivi, ŋa hã ɩ̃ kʋɔfɩ̃n kɩ sɩɛrɛ vivi waʔ, hã ɩ̃ gbũu don vivi waʔ.
59001020	Naɗɩɛ na nɩra hɩɗann doŋo za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra wɔrɩ le mɩyɩra kɩ nʋʋ Yekila kũu waʔ.
59001021	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ zɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ wɔrɩ teɗe ĩ, dɩ̃ɩna bɩ̃ɩmɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ. Sɩɛsɩra Yekila yiin ɩ̃ gagasɩra za, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na gɔ sɩɛ na kɩ̃ra, sɩɛ kɩ wɔrɩ yɩɛ ĩ ko.
59001022	Hã ɩ̃ zɩɛ nuurese doro kãma za waʔ, ŋa ĩ le wɛsɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deʔ, bʋɔtɛ ɩ̃ kpɛnsɛ wa ĩ thĩ kpasa.
59001023	Naɗɩɛ, wɩɛ ki nuure Yekila sɩɛsɩra dola kɛɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ sɩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha nɩra wɩɛ bãa ki ken u thĩ dʋgalen za na yãan tʋʋn ʋ wʋɔla lɔmɩra.
59001024	Na u kenn u thĩ zuon na tannɩ, ʋ ɗɛ phaʔ lɔmɩra za ʋ kha bʋ ɩra.
59001025	Ŋa dɛyɩra ki nuure sɩɛrɛhãanthĩnthĩnsira sɩɛsɩra kɩ zɩ̃n nɩpɩra na gɔ sɩ na kɩ̃ra kɛɩ pha sɩ, kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ sɩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu kɩ̃rɩga ʋ miliinyira bɩɛ za.
59001026	Na wɩɛ bãa ken u thĩ kha ʋɔ bʋ wa Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀daa, kɛna ʋ wɔrɩ gɔ u thĩ ɗɛlɛŋɩra waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ kpɛnsɛ wa u thĩ. U Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩ̀rà bʋ wa kpasa.
59001027	Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩ̀rà telenn na yɛɗ Siye Yekila wʋɔla za, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ na kʋɔgɩ̃n na marɩɓiwe, na thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃nhapɛ pɩ vɛnsɩra za, dɩ̃ɩna na kɛɩ dunuya wɩɛ kakarɩmɩyɩra liimira.
59002001	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãa a Yekire ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ dɛyɛ Yesu kirisitira na ʋ ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra za, hã ĩ khoŋĩn nɩpɛ, nɩpɛ za waʔ.
59002002	Ɩra wɩɛ na si liin mʋ gaga kha nɩra ukpo yiin dayiinkɩ̃rɩsɛ na sãnɩ legemikhɩ̃ɩɓire na ɓa lonn ĩ bĩŋinkhɛla za, na nɩra ʋɔ ɓa lonn tɩ̃ na dakpɛsɛ doro,
59002003	na ɩ̃ gɔɗ dayiinkɩ̃rɩsɛ dɛyɩra na kɩ̃rann na deɗ u kha: «Kafara, ɓa hɩɗan kharɩkɩ̃rɩdɩɛ za», ki deɗ dakpɛsɛ dɛyɩra kha: «Hei, mʋɔ, nɩ́ɩrɛ́» warɩma «ɓa hɩɗan fɔlɔŋɔ za khaadɩɛ mɩɛ ɗɩɛsɛ lɔkɩra ʋ za»,
59002004	mʋ tʋ wa kha ĩ ken ki khon ma nɩpɛ, nɩpɛ za waʔ? Sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha ĩ khoŋĩn ma nɩpɛ na ɩ̃ gagabɩ̃bɩ̃ɩnsɩra.
59002005	Mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, ĩ nuure mi kɩ̃raŋɩra. Ɩ̃ tʋ kha Yekila kenn khonn ma wɛpɩɛ dunuyara nɩpɩra ken kha bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ kɩ bʋ wɩ, na liin mi khãandɛkpakpapɛ kiretɩ̃ɛsɛ za kɩ yɩɛ pi ɓu Yekila ɩɩgɩra ʋ hãan nʋʋgɩra na wɛpɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ wa?
59002006	Kɛna ɩ̃ɛ, ɩ̃ɛ zene wa bʋɔmɛ nɩrara! Ɓudanɩpɩra ki ɗi ɩɩgɩra ɩ̃ za waʔ? Na pɩ yan ɩ̃ sɩɛrɛɗikhɛyɩra za waʔ?
59002007	Yesu kirisiti yɩsɩnʋʋgɩra pɩ yɩ ɩ̃ za, bɩɛ ɓudanɩpɩra kɩ bʋ gɩɛ yɩsɩgɩra asɩ dɛrɩwɩra waʔ?
59002008	Na ɩ̃ bɩɩn na gɔɗ Yekila ɩɩgɩra sɩɛrɛhãansɩra sɛwɛn Yekila sɛwʋgɩra za kha: «Mʋ kãn ma na khɔrɩ mʋ kãnʋʋna mʋ gaga kha mʋɔ thĩra», na ĩ liin sɩɛ, sɩ kɩ̃ra.
59002009	Ŋa, na ĩ khoŋĩn ma nɩpɛ, nɩpɛ za, ĩ le wa mɩbɩ̃yɛ. Dɩɛ bɛna Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra gɔɗ ɩ̃ wa, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛn sɩ waʔ.
59002010	Na nɩra wɔrɩn gɔɗ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra bɩɛ ki liin ɓilense daɓire tikpo za, sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha u ɓilen ma sʋɔra bɩɛ za.
59002011	Naɗɩɛ, wɩɛra deɗ kha: «Hã mu le zɛrɩgɛ waʔ», ʋɔ kpuora deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Hã mʋ khʋ nɩra waʔ.» Na mu liin zɛrɩgɛ waʔ ki yo khʋʋ nɩra, mu liin ma sɩɛrɛhãansɛ asɩdaa.
59002012	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mi de ĩ kha mɩyɩra bɩɛ ĩ de na mɩyɩra bɩɛ ĩ le, ɩ̃ kãn ma na tʋ kha Yekila ɓa kiti ĩ wa na makɩ̃n na ʋ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra sɩɛsɩra kɩ zɩ̃n nɩpɩra ɩra.
59002013	Naɗɩɛ, na Yekila ɓa ki kiti nɩpɩra, wɩɛ kha bʋ na makarɩ ʋ kãnʋʋna za waʔ, ʋ ɓa hɩɗan na makarɩ ʋɔ za tɩ̃ waʔ. Ŋa wɩɛ kha makarɩ ʋ kãnʋɔna za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn na ãn Yekila kitira dʋ̃waʔ.
59002014	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, bɩra sɩ kɩ̃ra nɩra na de nʋʋga doro za kha: «Kãamɛ bʋ mɩɛ heke», kɛna nɩra yã sɩ u miliinyira za waʔ? Bɩɛ khãamɩra thĩna wɔrɩ kuore u wa ba?
59002015	Ɩra wɩɛ na si liin mʋ gaga kha mʋ yaɓiye ʋɔ bʋ na dayiiŋe foi na yiin waʔ, warɩma ʋ bʋ na mɩɩnɛ sii na ɗi ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga waʔ,
59002016	na ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ deɗ u kha: «Vɩ gbũu yo gbɛkɩ̃n na ɗi na hĩi», kɛna mɩɩna za ʋ kha vɛn, ʋ hãar ʋ dɩɛ waʔ. Wɛsɩɛ u deɗ u, bɩra sɩɛ kɩ̃ra ʋ?
59002017	Mafɩra sɩ bʋ na wɩɛ ki de kha ʋɔ khãa wa, na ʋ khãamɩra yã u miliinyira za waʔ, bɩɛ khãamɩra thĩna huun ma.
59002018	Ŋa, bãanɩ nɩra wɔrɩ de kha: «Mʋɔ bʋ na khãamɛ na mɩɛ bʋ na miliinye. Ɓɔgɔ mɩ mʋ khãamɩra kɛɩ le miliinyira kɩ yɩɛ mɩɛ ɓɔgɔ mʋ mɩ khãamɩra mi milinyira za.»
59002019	Baa mʋ khãa sɩ za kha Yekila bʋ wa ukpo, sɩɛ kɩ̃ranɩ. Mafɩra gĩrimira khãa sɩ za tɩ̃ kɩ gban anabiribɩ̃ɩsɛ kãma.
59002020	Wʋɔnladaa! Mʋ ɓɩɛ wa kha pi de ɓu kha na khãamɛ bʋ kɛɩ le miliinye sɩɛ bʋ wa kpasa ba?
59002021	Mʋsɛ Yekila liin ki ken kha a sekhãgara Abɩrahamʋra bʋ wa nɩtelenyemo? Baa ʋ kha khon u ɓikhiira Ɩzakɩra thɔgɔnsɩra kɩ hã Yekila, fɩ za Yekila kenn si u miliinyira za kha ʋ bʋ wa nɩtelenyemo.
59002022	Sɩ yã wa na tʋ kha ʋ khãamɩra na u miliinyira kha nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ wa kpuor, miliinyira hĩɗen khãamɩra.
59002023	Mafɩra, wɛsɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra na deɗ sɩɛ hĩin mɩra kha: «Abɩrahamʋra na khãan ma Yekila za, na Yekila kenn u nɩtelenyemo ʋ khãamɩra kãmara za», kɩ yɩɛn na Yekila yɩɗ ʋ kha ʋɔ yɛsɛkhuo.
59002024	Ɩ̃ yãan sɩ ɩra kha Yekila ken nɩra nɩtelenyemo ʋ khãamɩra doro kãma za waʔ, ŋa u miliinyira kãma za.
59002025	Si kpuosira ɩ tɩ̃ na zɛrɩhala pɩ kha yɩ kha Arahabʋra ɩra. Mɩyɩra u liiri, ɩɛ yɩɛn na Yekila kenn u nɩtelenyemora, naɗɩɛ ʋ na bɩɩn ma na gɔɗ hegelĩndɛrɩwɩra Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira na dãan ɩra, kɩ tʋʋn yɩɛn na pɩ khɩɛn khɩ̃nkpasɩrɛ na khũnni.
59002026	Lɔmɩra za gbɔɗɛ hu na laʔ yɩ̃ɩfɩnsɛ, mafɩra ʋ tɩ̃, na mʋ bʋ na khãamɛ kɛna mʋ wɔrɩ ɓɔgɔ pɩ mu miliinyira za waʔ, pi huun ma.
59003001	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, hã ɩ̃ bɩɛ le ɓɔgɔdɛwɛ waʔ, naɗɩɛ aa wɛpɩɛ liin ɓɔgɔdɛwɩra, aa kitira kɩ ɓa bɩ̃ɩn na tãra bʋɔra bɩɛ.
59003002	A bɩɛ le le wa ɓilense. Nɩra wɩɛ bãa kɩ sɩɛrɛ kɛɩ le ɓilense, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa nɩtelenyemo, ʋɔ dɛyɩra wɔrɩ gɔ ʋ gbɔɗa bɩɛ.
59003003	Na a yiin khɩ̃ɩɓige zaga nʋʋga za, si le wa thaaga ʋ wɔrɩ nu a bɛrɛ, a wɔrɩ yo u khaarɛ bãa za a ɓɩɛ.
59003004	Ĩ ken batonsira gbɩ̃lɔmɩra za sɩ gbɩ̃n ɩra, harɩ na sarangbʋ̃ɔŋɔ alɩn ki boi batoŋira mʋsɛ, kɛna ki horodaara sʋɔ gɩ wa na thʋ̃raka, ki yo wa gɛŋɩra za ʋ ɓɩɛ gɩ ɩra.
59003005	Mafɩra sɩ bʋ tɩ̃, nɩthɩ̃rɩga ɗɛlɛmire bʋ wa tɩ tɩtɩɩɗɛ ʋ gbɔɗa za, kɛna ti de ɓa yɩsɩɓɩɛsɩɛrɛgbʋ̃ɔnsɛ. Ĩ ken nantɩgɩrɛ zen lɔmɩra ti zen ɩra, kɛna tɩ wɔrɩ ɗɩɛrɛ wa gbaŋɩra bɩɛ.
59003006	Mafɩra ɗɛlɛŋɩra khɩɛgɩ̃nn na naagɩra. Mɩbɩ̃yɩra bɩɛ hʋ̃nkhɛla kɩ bʋ ɗɛlɛŋɩra. Ɗɛlɛŋɩra bʋ wa a gbɔɗa khaarɛ dʋɔ, kɛna dɩɛ kɩ wɔrɩ asɩ gbɔɗa bɩɛ. Kɩ naagɩra kuɗ ɓa harɩ zahanamara ni. Ɗɛlɛŋɩra wɔrɩ asɩ wa a thakuogira bɩɛ.
59003007	Gbandaawɩra bɩɛ, na wurupira bɩɛ, na fɔlɔnɓɛpʋdawɩra bɩɛ, na ãmɛ daawɩra bɩɛ, nɩthɩ̃rɩga wɔrɩ kpɛnsɛ wa bɩɛ bɩɛ na yii wi u thĩ za.
59003008	Ŋa nɩra sii wɔrɩn ɗɛlɛŋɛ yãan waʔ. Kɩ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃ɩnɛ, kɩ wɔrɩ hɩɗan khaarɛ tikpo kũu waʔ, ki hĩin ma na waŋɩra kɩ wɔrɩ khʋ nɩra ɩra.
59003009	Gɩɛ kpuogira a khɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ a Siye Adɛyɩra, gɩɛ kpuogira a gbũu khɛ tɩ̃ na daŋa nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira Yekila liin na pɩ khɩɛgɩ̃nn ʋ ɩra.
59003010	Kɩ̃rɩga sɩɛsɛ na daŋa sɩɛsɛ bɩɛ kure wa gɩɛ nʋkpuogira za. Mɩ yaɓiiwe, sɩ kãn na hɩɗan mafɩra waʔ.
59003011	Ãkɩ̃rɩwɛ na ãharamɛ wɔrɩ kure kɔlɔn ukpo za ba?
59003012	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, taanhaga wɔrɩ sen oliviye ɓise ba? Duvɛ̃nhaga wɔrɩ sen taanhaɓise ba? Kɔlɔn wɩɛ ãmɛ kɩ bʋ na zɔwʋgɔ, ʋɔ ãmɛ wɔrɩ nʋʋ kũu waʔ.
59003013	Ɩ̃ɛ za ãna wʋɔmɛ kɩ gɔn na ʋ tʋ mɩyɛ? Na ʋ bʋ, ʋ ɓɔgɔ sɩ u lelɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra za. Wɩɛ kɩ bɩ na sũne u thĩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ bʋ wʋɔmɛ na tʋʋmɛ nɩrara.
59003014	Ŋa na ɩ̃ gagasɩra hĩin ma na zonbɩ̃ɩnɛ na ĩ bo na kamɛ, hã ɩ̃ lʋɔrɛ ĩ thĩ ki de kha ɩ̃ɛ bʋ na wʋɔmɛ ki kpii tɔŋɔ kɩ baka tɩ̃yara waʔ.
59003015	Bɩɛ wʋɔmɩɛ thĩna kuɗ Yekila heke waʔ. Ŋa dunuya wɩɛ bɛwɛ bɩɛ, nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ na gĩrime bɛwɛ ɩ.
59003016	Naɗɩɛ khaarɛ bãa za zone na boɓe mɩyɛ bʋ, yãwɩgɩ̃ŋa na mɩbɩ̃yɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ bʋ wa fɩ.
59003017	Ŋa wʋɔmɩra ki kure Yekila heke, bɩɛ bʋ wa wʋɔnyɛgɛmɛ zo, dɩ̃ɩna wɔyĩke na makarɩ bʋ wa bɩɛ za, pɩ ɓɩɛ wa bɛmɛ nɩpɛ tɩɛ, pi le wa mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ, pi khoŋĩn nɩpɛ nɩpɛ za waʔ, pɩ tɔn hã nɩra waʔ.
59003018	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ wɔyĩkira pɩ hɩɗankhɛyɩra za, bɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha wɛpɩɛ kɩ tʋɔgɔ wɔyĩke za, ɗiisira pi gbũu ɓa kpɛwʋ bʋ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ tileme.
59004001	Khɛ̃ɩsɛ na bakɩ̃nsɩra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za mɩra, sɩɛ kuɗ ɓa he? Dunuyara yekemɩyɩra hĩin ɩ̃ gagasɩra za, si kuɗ ɓa ni wa?
59004002	Mɩgɔnyɛ yeke bʋ ɩ̃ za, ŋa ĩ gbũu wɔrɩ ɓu i waʔ. Nɩkhʋgagasɛ na zone kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ za. Ɩ̃ wɔrɩ ɓu ɩ̃ mɩɓɩɛnyɩra waʔ, naɗɩɛ baa khɛ̃ɩsɛ na bakɩ̃nsɛ bʋ ɩ̃ za ɩra. Mɩyɩra ɩ̃ ɓɩɛ, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ ɓu i waʔ, sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ kha ɩ̃ yɩ̃n Yekila waʔ.
59004003	Ɩ̃ yɩ̃n, ŋa ĩ ɓu foi waʔ, naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ yɩ̃n ma na gagabɩ̃ɩsɛ na ɓu le ĩ dĩŋo mɩyɛ doro.
59004004	Ɩ̃ bʋ wa tuutuwe! Ɩ̃ tʋ kha wɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ dunuya wɩɛ mɩyɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa Yekila bɩ̃ɩra waʔ?
59004005	Wɛsɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deɗi, ĩ ken ma kha si yuon ma kpasa ba? Si deɗ ɓa kha: «Nina Yekila yiin a za, ʋ khɛ̃ɩ wa zone ʋɔ Nina mɩyɛ za.»
59004006	Ŋa, fɩ̃ɩmɩra Yekila fɩ̃ɩ a za, bɩɛ kɩ gbɩ̃n. Naɗɩɛ Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa kha: «Yekila yãasɩ̃nn ma yɩsɩɓɩɛdɛwɛ, ŋa wɛpɩɛ sũnen pi thĩ, ʋ gɔ ɓa bɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra.»
59004007	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã Yekila, kɩ arɩ Sutana za na khɛ̃ɩ dɩ̃ɩn ʋ, na ĩ liin sɩɛ ʋ ɓa horo yo legelege kɩ zɩɛ ɩ̃.
59004008	Ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋ nan Yekila, kɩ yɩɛ ʋɔ zʋ̃ʋ nan ɩ̃. Ɩ̃ɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɩra, ɩ̃ tɩsɩ ĩ lesira na khon si mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za. Ɩ̃ yɛɗɛ ĩ kpolonsira, ɩ̃ɛ gagasɛ yɔ̃yɔ̃ dɛrɩwɩra!
59004009	Ɩ̃ kpã wʋɔyɛ na fʋʋ na zaaŋarɩ ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɩra kãma, na yɩɛ ɩ̃ mansɩra vɩkɩ̃n na le fʋʋrɛ, kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ bãanwuoŋira vɩkɩ̃n na le wɔkpãka.
59004010	Ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ Adɛyɩra wʋɔla za, na sɩɛ liin ʋ arɩga ɩ̃.
59004011	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, hã ĩ de bɩ̃ɩsɛ na hã kamɛ waʔ. Naɗɩɛ wɩɛ bãa ki de ʋ yaɓiye bɩ̃ɩsɛ, warɩma na kiti u, sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha ʋ dɛyɩra de ɓa bɩ̃ɩsɛ ki kiti Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra. Ŋa na mu kitin Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, mu le sɩ nɩɩrɛdaa dʋ̃waʔ, ŋa mʋ bʋ wa si kitidaa.
59004012	Kɛna Yekila kpora kɩ bʋ sɩɛrɛhãansɛ hãdaara na kitidaara. Ʋɔ kpora kɩ wɔrɩ kuore nɩra, ʋɔ kpora kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɩra na khʋ khon nɩra. Ŋa, mʋɔ wɩɛra ki kiti mʋ yaɓiye, mu ken ma mu thĩ ãnakpuo?
59004013	Ĩ nuure mi ɩra wɩɛ, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ ki de kha: «Fɩ̃ɩra warɩma dɩ̃ɩ, aa ɓa yo wa gbongbʋ̃ɔŋɩɛ za, na yo le ɗɩɩga kpo ni, na le wãgɩrɛ na ɓu tigiye.»
59004014	Kɛna ɩ̃ɛ thĩra tʋ mɩɩna kɩ ɓa nan ɩ̃ dɩ̃ɩra waʔ! Ɩ̃ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha baa bugoŋo kure buloŋo, na khɩɛ kha ʋ gbʋ̃ʋ kɩ tãra.
59004015	Ĩ ken wɛsɩɛ ɩ̃ kãn na de ɩra: «Na Adɛyɩra bɩɩrɩ, na hãar a thakuogo, a ɓa le wɛsɩɛ na wɛsɩɛ.»
59004016	Ŋa sɩɛ ĩ de waʔ, ɩ̃ bʋ wa kɩ lʋɔrɛ ĩ thĩ na ɩ̃ mɩɓɩɛgɛrɛnyɩra. Gɩɛ yɩsɩɓɩɛgɩra thĩna kɩ̃ra waʔ.
59004017	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na nɩra tʋ mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ lelɔmɛ, kɛna ʋ bɩ na le i waʔ, si le wa mɩbɩ̃yɛ ʋɔ dɛyɩra thaaga za.
59005001	Ɩra wɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ ɓudanɩpɩra, ɩ̃ zɩɛ numire na nuure mi! Ɩ̃ fʋʋ gbaangbo naɗɩɛ baa wɔgbʋ̃ʋga ɓa nan ɩ̃ ɩra!
59005002	Ĩ ɓudagɩra dãɗ ɓa, dɩ̃ɩna mʋmɛ khʋɔn ma ɩ̃ dayiinsira bɩɛ.
59005003	Ɩ̃ sãnɩra na ɩ̃ warɩvɩrara bɩɛ sonn ma, ɩ̃ ɓa la ɓa tɩ̃ya ĩ ɓudagɩra somira kãmara za. Gɩɛ somira ɓa khʋɔ wa ɩ̃ gbɔkhaasɩra mʋ gaga kha baa naaga so nɩra na zuo u ɩra. Ɩ̃ɛ tʋ kha dunuyara bu yo wa zuo khɛrɛ waʔ, kɛna ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa ki bĩŋin ɓudaga kɩ san ĩ thĩ?
59005004	Miliinɓiiwira liigen ɩ̃ hʋʋsɩra za, ɩ̃ kɛɩn ma bɩɛ taasɩra hãamɩra, na pɩ kɩ sɔŋɔ, na sɩɛ sɔŋɔsɩra yo lonn harɩ wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Adɛyɩra numila za.
59005005	Na yɩɛ ɩ̃ dunuyara za ĩ ɗiin ma ɩ̃ bɛgɛ, mɩɩdɛ bãa nʋʋr ɩ̃, dɩɛ ĩ liiri. Ĩ ɗiin ma na gbɩ̃nn mʋ gaga kha baa pi ɓeɗe daɗuoro ʋ gbɩ̃n na ɓa ɓu khʋ ʋ ɩra.
59005006	Ɩ̃ zarɩgɩ̃nn ma nɩtelenyeme na khʋʋn mɩ, pɩ khɛ̃ɩn ɩ̃ yãan waʔ.
59005007	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ ba na gɔ ĩ thĩ na hɩɗan na tɩɛ Adɛyɩra Yesu Kirisitira ɓanbɛna. Ĩ ken bonsʋ̃ndɛwɩra, pɩ ba ɓa na tɩɛ lʋgʋ adagawɩra na phɩlɩyamɩra kɩ tʋ wɔrɩ kpɛwʋ pi ɗiisira.
59005008	Ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃, ɩ̃ ba na hʋgan na tɩɛ Adɛyɩra, naɗɩɛ ʋ ɓanɗɩyãgara yĩmin ma zuori.
59005009	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, hã ĩ ki wũugĩn ki de kamɛ mɩyɛ waʔ, bʋɔtɛ Yekila ɓa kiti ĩ wa. Ĩ ken, kitidaara bʋ wa tʋ̃tʋna ʋ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n zuori.
59005010	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na Yekila yãdedɛwɩra sɩɛrɛn Adɛyɩra yɩsɩgɩra za, pɩ baɗ ɓa vɛnsɛ. Ɩ̃ khɛ bɩɛ lelɔmɩra.
59005011	Ĩ ken, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ khʋɔn vɛnsɩra na baɗ sɩ, a de ɓa bɩɛ fɩ̃ɩra kha pɩ bʋ wa bãanwuoŋo za. Wɛɩra pɩ kha yɩ kha Zɔbʋ, ĩ nuun lɔmɩra za ʋ baɗ na khʋɔn yɩgɩrɛ ʋ vɛnsɩra za. Ĩ gbũun tʋʋn taasɩra Adɛyɩra ɓa hãar ʋ sɩ phɩlɩyansɩra za ɩra. Tɩ̃ya ʋ, Yekila hĩin ma na kɩ̃rɩga na makarɩ doro.
59005012	Ŋa mɩ yaɓiiwe, wɛsɩɛ bɩɛ za, mɩ ɓɩɛ wa na de ĩ tɩ̃ kha: Hã ɩ̃ karɩ̃n zaara na fɔlɔŋɩra za waʔ, warɩma na karɩ̃n mɩɩnɛ sii za thĩra waʔ. Mɩɩdɛ kɩ bʋ «iyo», ĩ de kha «iyo». Na wɛtɛ kɩ bʋ «ɩya», ĩ de kha «ɩya». Si le thaaga hã Yekila kitira ɓa waʔ ɩ̃ za waʔ.
59005013	Ɩ̃ ʋɔ bʋ wa vɛnsɛ za ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra yɩ̃n Yekila. Ɩ̃ ʋɔ bʋ wa bãanwuoŋo za ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ tɩ̃nɛ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila.
59005014	Ɩ̃ ʋɔ bʋ wa ɓose za ba? Ʋɔ dɛyɩra yɩ egilizi wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra pɩ tɔgɔ nʋʋmɛ na yii ʋ thaagɩra za kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila na hã ʋ Adɛyɩra Yesu Kirisitira yɩsɩgɩra za.
59005015	Na gɩɛ Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra thĩna liin na khãamɛ, sɩɛ wɔrɩ kuore ɓoɗora u ɓosira za. Adɛyɩra ɓa arɩga ʋ dɛyɩra, mɩbɩ̃yɩra thĩna u na liiri, ʋ ɓa yafa ɩ bɩɛ za.
59005016	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ bɩɛ khɛ ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɩra na kpɔrɩ kamɛ dɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃, kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila na hã kamɛ, si le thaaga ɩ̃ bɩɛ ɓu bãamɛ, naɗɩɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩtelenyemo Yekire yɩ̃ŋa bʋ wa na faŋa gbaangbo.
59005017	Eli kha bʋ wa nɩthɩ̃rɩga tɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha aa. Na ʋ maan na yɩ̃nn Yekila kha hã adaga wa waʔ. Na Yekila nuun ʋ yɩ̃mɩra na adagara kɛɩn waamɛ na ɓuun ɗɩɩsɛ sɩsãa na gbuko.
59005018	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na ʋ yɩ̃nn Yekila tɩ̃, na adagara tʋʋn waarɩ, na ɗiise ɓuuri.
59005019	Mɩ yaɓiiwe, na ɩ̃ ʋɔ zɩɛn Yekila tɩ̃ya khɩ̃na, na ʋɔ wɔrɩn yɩɛn na ʋ vɩɗ ɓann tɩ za,
59005020	ɩ̃ kãn ma na tʋ kha wɩɛra liin thaagɩra na mɩbɩ̃yɛledaara vɩɗ ɓannɩ, ʋɔ kuoren u wa huume za, dɩ̃ɩna Yekila ɓa yafa mɩbɩ̃yɛgɔnyɛ bɩɛ za.
60001001	Mɩɛ Pɩɛrɩ, mɩɛ wɩɛra liin Yesu Kirisiti dãara, mɩɛ kɩ dãa lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na hã ɩ̃ ʋ, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila nɩkenkhoromira na ɩ̃ tɩwɩgɩ̃nn na liin khɩ̃rɩwɛ Pɔ̃, na Galasɩ, na Kapadɔsɩ, na Azi, dɩ̃ɩna Bitini sɩrɩsɩra za ɩra.
60001002	Siye Yekila nisĩnn kenn khonn ĩ na makɩ̃nn na lɔmɩra za ʋ kha ɓɩɛ sɩ, na liir ĩ ʋ bɛwɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔ wɔrɩkɩra za, si le thaaga ĩ nu Yesu Kirisitira bɛrɛ kɩ yɩɛ ʋ tarɩmɩra gboɓira le thaaga ɩ̃ yɛ. Yekire kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ kɩ hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo gbaangbo.
60001003	Thɩɛɗɛ bʋ wa Yekila bɛrɛ, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisiti Siira! Ʋ kɩ̃ran ma a za gbaangbo baa ʋ yɩɛn na a liin mʋ gaga kha a ɔfɔn hũnn ma fɛnsɛ ki ɓuun laŋa kɩ hã thakhuogira Yesu Kirisitira za baa ʋ arɩgan ʋ na kusen u huumira za ɩra,
60001004	kɩ sann a ɓudaga, gɩɛ ɓudagɩra wɔrɩ asɩ waʔ, kɩ wɔrɩ son waʔ, dʋɔ khon kɩ kɩ̃ramɩra za waʔ. Gɩɛ ɓudagɩra zɩɛn sann ma ɩ̃ɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra za ni,
60001005	ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekila tɩɛgɛ naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ khãa ʋ za, si le thaaga ĩ ɓu zɩ̃mɩra kɩ tɩɛ ɩ̃ phɩlɩyanɗɩyãgɩra ɩra.
60001006	Sɩɛ ki le ɩ̃ bãanwuoŋira, harɩ na ɩ̃ kãn ma na ɓu wɔkpãka na kure vɛnthĩngɔnsɛ za bɛnɛ dʋɔ kɩrɩ ʋ.
60001007	Sãnɩ bʋ wa mɩzuone, kɛna pi yii u wa naaga za na ken ʋ lɔmɩra, mafɩra tɩ̃, ɩ̃ khãamɩra ki nugo na tãra sãnɩra, bɩɛ ɓu wa gbɩ̃rɩsɛ pɩ lɔmira ɓu tʋ, si le thaaga Yekila ɓa yɩɛ ĩ ɓu gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, na ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ, na gbʋ̃ɔnsɛ ɗɩyãgɩra Yesu Kirisitira ɓa ɓɔgɔ u thĩ ɩra.
60001008	Ɩ̃ khɔrɩ wa Yesura kɛna ɩ̃ yãar ʋ waʔ, ɩ̃ khãa wa ʋ za kɛɩ yã ʋ, gɩɛ yɩɛn na ĩ hĩin na bãanwuokpakpaka, wɛkɛ thĩna thĩra kɩ tʋ na kpɔrɩ waʔ.
60001009	Ĩ ɓuun ma gɩɛ bãanwuoŋira naɗɩɛ baa ĩ ɓuun zɩ̃mɩra ɩra. Ɩ̃ taasɩra kɩ bʋ zɩ̃mɩra ĩ ɓuun baa ɩ̃ khãan Yesura za.
60001010	Zɩ̃mɩɛ ĩ ɓuuri, Yekila yãdedɛrɩwɩra mʋʋgan ma ɩɛ mɩyɩra kɩ̃raŋɩra, bɩɛ yãdedɛrɩbɩɛ yãan deɗ ɓudagɩra zɩɛn sann ɩ̃ ɩra.
60001011	Naɗɩɛ Kirisitira Nina kha bʋ pɩ za, ʋɔ Nina na nisĩnn ɓɔgɔn mɩ sɩ kha Kirisitira ɓa vɛn ma, na sɩɛ vɛnsɩra tann zuori, ʋ tʋ lon ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra za. Yekila yãdedɛrɩwɩra kha ɓɩɛ wa na tʋ ɩɛ mɩyɩra lebɛna dɩ̃ɩna lɔmɩra za ɩɛ mɩyɩra ɓa le na yo ɩra.
60001012	Yekila ɓɔgɔn ʋ yãdedɛrɩwɩra sɩ kha sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra deɗ hãan bɩɛ waʔ, ŋa kha si de ki hã wa ɩ̃ɛ. Ɩra wɩɛ wɛpɩɛ ki de ĩ Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra, bɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za, ʋɔ wɩɛra kuɗ zaara ni na sũnn pɩ za ɩra. Yekila mɛlɛgɛwɩra thĩra khɔrɩ sɩ wa na tʋ sɩ.
60001013	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ hɩɗan miliinse hɩɗansɛ za, na hɩɗan koʔ. Ĩ yii ɩ̃ laŋɩra bɩɛ ɓudagɩra Yekila ɓa kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ gɩ bɛna Yesu Kirisitira ɓa ɓɔgɔ u thĩ ɩra.
60001014	Ĩ ki nu Yekila bɛla. Ĩ yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra kha bʋ ɩ̃ za khɔ̃ɩra bɛna ɩ̃ na tʋʋn Kirisitira thonn waʔ, hã ĩ thuo gɩɛ dʋ̃waʔ.
60001015	Ŋa, Yekila yɩɗ ɩ̃, lɔmɩra za ʋɔ yɛɗɩ, ɩ̃ɛ yɛ mafɩra tɩ̃ ĩ milewenyira bɩɛ za,
60001016	naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Ĩ le nɩyɛgɛmɛ, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ yɛɗ ɓa.»
60001017	Ĩ Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra za, ɩ̃ yɩ ɓa Yekila kha ɩ̃ɛ Siye. Ʋɔ wɩɛra ki khon nɩra nɩra za waʔ, u kiti wa nɩpɛ bɩɛ kpo kpo na makɩ̃n na pi milewenyira. Na si liin mafɩra, na yɩɛ ɩ̃ dunuyara za, ɩ̃ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra za.
60001018	Ɩ̃ tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha mɩtãrayanyɛ Yekila khɩɛn na ɗonn ĩ na khonn ĩ bɩɛ lɔnbɩ̃ɩwɩra ĩ ɓuun ĩ sekhãgawɩra heke waʔ, mʋ gaga kha warɩvɩra, warɩma sãnɩ.
60001019	Ŋa u ɗonn ĩ wa na Kirisitira taranyɛgɛmɩra, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha thɔgɔnsɛ zãraɓiye wɩɛ kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le dɩ̃ŋakhɛrɛ dɩ̃ɩna tɩ̃ɗɛkhɛrɛ.
60001020	Ʋɔ Yekila nisĩnn kenn khonn na dunuyara thĩra tiin thonn waʔ, kɩ ɓɔgɔn ʋ bɛnphɩlɩyãndɩɛ za ɩ̃ɛ kãma.
60001021	Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra za ɩ̃ khãa Yekila za, ʋɔ wɩɛra arɩgan ʋ na kusen u huumira za kɩ hãar ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra, si le thaaga ɩ̃ khãamɩra na ɩ̃ laŋɩra bɩɛ hɩɗan Yekila za.
60001022	Baa ɩ̃ bɩɩn Yekila tɩ̃ya sɩɛsɩra, sɩɛ yɛɗɛn ɩ̃ gagasɩra, si le thaaga ɩ̃ wɔrɩ kɩ khɔrɩ ɩ̃ kiretɩ̃ɛ kamɩra kɩ̃raŋɩra mʋ gaga kha yaɓiiwe kɛɩ le gagasɛ yɔ̃yɔ̃. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ khɔrɩ kamɛ kɩ̃raŋɩra na ɩ̃ gagasɩra bɩɛ.
60001023	Naɗɩɛ Yekila sɩɛsɩra yɩɛn ma na ɩ̃ ɔfɔn hũnn ma fɛnsɛ. Sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra bʋ mʋ gaga kha ɗiiɓire wɛtɛ ki hu waʔ. Sɩ bʋ wa thakuogo, sɩ hu waʔ, sɩ bʋ wa kɛɩtãrayansɛ.
60001024	Naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra za na deɗ kha: «Nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira bɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha wũugo, pɩ gbʋ̃ɔnsɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha wũumʋŋa; Na wũugo hʋʋrɩ, kɩ mʋŋɩra bɩɛ gbo ɓa.
60001025	Ŋa Adɛyɩra sɩɛsɩra sɩɛ bʋ wa bʋ kũu.» Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra gbũu kɩ bʋ Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra deɗ ĩ ɩra.
60002001	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ zɩɛ bɩ̃ɩmɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ na nɩfirigiŋe thĩnyira bɩɛ, na tɔnsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ, na yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩga, kɩ gbaa nɩdekira.
60002002	Lɔmɩra za ɓiɓone khɔrɩ yɩ̃rɩwɛ, ɩ̃ khɔrɩ Yekila sɩɛsɩra, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha yɩ̃rɩbɛ yɛɗɩ, si le thaaga ɩ̃ khã sɩ za na ɓu zɩ̃mɛ.
60002003	Naɗɩɛ si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Ɩ̃ yãan ma kha Adɛyɩra mɩyɛ nʋʋ.»
60002004	Ɩ̃ zʋ̃ʋ nan Adɛyɛ Yesura. Ʋɔ kɩ bʋ tofaɓila kɩ hã thakuogira. Nɩpɛ kɛɩn nɩ waʔ, ŋa dɩɛ Yekila kenn khonni, dɩ̃ɩna tɩ mɩyɛ gbɩ̃ra wa ʋ za gbaangbo.
60002005	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ hɩɗan mʋ gaga kha tofaɓiyira kɩ hã thakuogira, si le thaaga Yekila khɛ ɩ̃ na maɗɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra thʋʋgɩra, ki le kperekpiidɛwɛ ki khon thɔgɔnkhɩ̃nsɛ kɩ hã ʋ, sɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ Yekila Yesu Kirisitira kãma.
60002006	Naɗɩɛ sɩ sɛwɛn ma Yekila sɛwʋra khaarɛ dʋɔ za kha: «Mɩɛ Yekila thĩra kenn khonn tofaɓire wɛtɛ mɩyɛ kɩ gbɩ̃ra mɩ za gbaangbo, dɩɛ mi tii gboŋira za pɩ yɩ kha Siyɔ̃ na le ri thʋʋga thaanɛ lɔŋɔ tofaɓire. Wɩɛ bãa ki yĩige dɩɛ tofaɓila za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa nɩɩ kũu waʔ.»
60002007	Mafɩra, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ yĩigen dɩɛ tofaɓila za, gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ bɛsɛ. Ŋa wɛpɩɛ yĩigen tɩ za waʔ, sɩ sɛwɛn ma tɩ̃ na deɗ kha: «Tofaɓila thʋmaɗɛdɛrɩwɩra na kɛɩrɩ, dɩɛ tofaɓila ɓa liiri thʋʋga thaanɛ lɔŋɔ tofaɓila.»
60002008	Dɩ̃ɩna sɩ sɛwɛn ma tɩ̃ na deɗ kha: «Dɩɛ kɩ bʋ tofaɓila za nɩpɛ khɩ pɩ ɗɩɛsɛ, dɩɛ tofaɓila yɩɛ pi khon wa.» Pɩ khɩ ɓa pɩ ɗɩɛsɩra tɩ za, naɗɩɛ baa pɩ bɩ na khãa Yekila sɩɛsɩra za waʔ ɩra, sɩɛ gbũu kha kãn na nan mɩ.
60002009	Ŋa na ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, ɩ̃ɛ kɩ bʋ thĩna Yekila kenn khonni, kha ĩ le ɩtakhuo kperekpiidɛwɛ, na thĩnyɛgɛnɛ, dɩ̃ɩna thĩdɛ kɩ bʋ Yekire bɛrɛ. Ʋ yann khonn ĩ wa dabirige za na yiir ĩ ʋɔ thĩ yɛyɛkpakpapɩra za si le thaaga ĩ ki de mɩkɩ̃nkpakpaʔɩra u liin ɩra.
60002010	Khɔ̃ɩra, ɩ̃ kha bʋ Yekila nɩpɛ waʔ, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ ɩ̃ bʋ wa ʋ nɩpɛ. Khɔ̃ɩra Yekila kha makarɩ ɩ̃ za waʔ, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, ʋ makarɩ wa ɩ̃ za.
60002011	Mɩ yɛsɛgbɩ̃rɩwɛ, ɩ̃ɛ bʋ wa tãradɛrɩwɛ dɩ̃ɩna khɩ̃rɩwɛ dunuyara za fara, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ hã ɩ̃ sɩɛsɩɛ kha ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ na dunuya wɩɛ yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra, naɗɩɛ gɩɛ khɛ̃ɩ wa dɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃.
60002012	Ɩ̃ hɩɗan na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔnkɩ̃rɩwɛ Yekire kʋɔdɛrɩwɩra sʋgʋmʋra za, si le thaaga, harɩ na pɩ kha bɩɛ asɩ ɩ̃ yɩsɩga kha ĩ le wa mɩbɩ̃yɛ, ɩ̃ mɩkɩ̃rɩliigira le thaaga pɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila ɗɩyãgɩra ʋ ɓa gbɩ̃ŋɩn mɩ na ɓɔgɔ u thĩ dɩ̃ɩn mɩ.
60002013	Ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã thadɛrɩwɩra bɩɛ Adɛyɩra kãma; ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã sɩrɩgɩra piresidãna, naɗɩɛ sɩrɩgɩra mɩyɛ bɩɛ bʋ wa ʋɔ leke za,
60002014	na gʋvɛrɩnɛrɩwɩra, naɗɩɛ sɩrɩgɩra piresidãna dãa wa bɩɛ pi yo gbʋ̃ʋrɛ kakarɩledɛwɛ wʋɔyɛ, kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ mɩkɩ̃rɩledɛwɛ.
60002015	Naɗɩɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ Yekila, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha ĩ le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ si le thaaga wɛpɩɛ laɗ wʋɔmɩra na pɩ tʋ foi waʔ, ɩ̃ baka bɩɛ nʋʋsɩra.
60002016	Ɩ̃ yɩɛ ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra khɛ nɩhɔrɔmɛ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀lɔmɛ, ŋa hã ɩ̃ khɛ sɩɛ hɔrɔnsɩra na fɛ sɩɛ za ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ, ŋa ĩ le Yekila miliinɓiiwe.
60002017	Ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ nɩpɛ bɩɛ, ɩ̃ khɔrɩ ĩ kiretɩ̃ɛ yaɓiiwira, kɩ ãn Yekila, kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ sɩrɩgɩra piresidãna.
60002018	Miliinɓiiwe, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ gbaangbo na gbɩ̃nɛ ɩ̃ thadɛrɩwɩra na kɩ̃ra, hã ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã thadadɛrɩwɛ wɛpɩɛ lɔmɩra kɩ kɩ̃ra na pɩ na khɔrɩmɛ doro waʔ, ŋa harɩ wɛpɩɛ lɔmɩra kɩ gbɩ̃ra, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã bɩɛ bɩɛ.
60002019	Vɛnsɩra kɩ kãn na nɩra wɩɛ waʔ, na ʋ dɛyɩra wɔrɩ kɩ ba sɩɛ vɛnsɩra naɗɩɛ baa ʋ ãn Yekire, sɩ kɩ̃ra.
60002020	Na mu liin ɓilense na pɩ khɩ ɓʋ na mʋ ba sɩɛ gbʋ̃ʋsɩra, bɩra yɩsɩnʋʋthĩŋe mʋ ɓa ɓu sɩɛ za? Ŋa na mʋ mɩkɩ̃rɩliigira yɩɛn na mu ɓuun gbʋ̃ʋsɛ, kɛna mʋ baɗ sɩɛ gbʋ̃ʋsɩra, sɩ kɩ̃ra.
60002021	Sɩɛ kãmara za Yekila yɩɗ ɩ̃, naɗɩɛ Kirisitira thĩra vɛnn ma ɩ̃ɛ kãmara za, bɩɛ lelɔmɩra ʋ zɩɛn hãar ɩ̃, bɩɛ ɩ̃ kãn na thuo.
60002022	U liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ yãan waʔ, ʋ sɩɛrɛn na firigĩnn nɩra yãan waʔ.
60002023	Pɩ kʋsan ʋ, ŋa ʋ bɩɩn gbũuren nɩra na kʋsaɗɛ yãan waʔ, ʋ vɛnn ma, ŋa ʋ bɩɩn deɗ sɩɛrɛhʋwʋsɛ na hãa nɩra waʔ, ʋ na yɩɛn ma ʋ bɛgɛ na hãan Yekila, ʋɔ wɩɛra ki kiti nɩpɛ na makɩ̃n ɩra.
60002024	U gbonn ma a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira ʋɔ thĩ gbɔɗa za nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za, si le thaaga na a huun a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za, a hɩɗan thakuogo za na telen. Ʋɔ nʋgakhɛyɩra liin thaagɩra na ĩ ɓuun bãamɩra.
60002025	Naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha zãra bɛ ɓilenni, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ ɩ̃ vɩɗ ɓann ma ɩ̃ kaadaara heke, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ tɩɛgɛ ɩ̃ thakuogira ɩra.
60003001	Hapɛ ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã ĩ khuowira, si le thaaga harɩ na bʋɔ kɛɩ wa Yekila sɩɛsɩra, pɩ yã pɩ hapɩra nɩ́ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra na bɩ sɩ harɩ na ɩ̃ sɩɛrɛn pi heke waʔ.
60003002	Naɗɩɛ pɩ ɓa yã kha ɩ̃ɛ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra kɩ̃ra, dɩ̃ɩna kha ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ nɩpɛ.
60003003	Hã ĩ yii ɩ̃ gagasɩra ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra ɔfɔ lɔmɩra doro za waʔ, mʋ gaga kha thalʋgʋrɛ wɛtɛ ɗorise kɩ hʋgan, sãnɩ boɓiye, dɩ̃ɩna dayiinɗorohʋwʋsɛ.
60003004	Ŋa ɩ̃ gbɛkɩ̃nsɩra kãn ma na le ĩ kpolonsira ʋ, kɩ yɩɛ ɩ̃ hɩɗan na gagawuonse, na yɩɛ ɩ̃ lɔmɩra thɔʔ, sɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ Yekila gbaangbo, si gbũu wɔrɩ asɩ waʔ.
60003005	Khɔ̃ɩ hapɩra kha yii pɩ laŋɩra Yekila za, mafɩra pɩ kha ɓɔgɔ pɩ kɩ̃ramɩra, pɩ na sũnen ma pi thĩ na hãan pi khuowira,
60003006	mʋ gaga kha baa Sara na sũnen u thĩ na hãan u khuora Abɩrahamʋra, harɩ kɩ yɩ ʋ kha: «Mɩ thadɛyɛ.» Ɩra wɩɛ na ĩ le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ kɛɩ ãn, ĩ le wa Sarara ɓihɛrɩpɛ thĩ.
60003007	Khuowe, ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃, ɩ̃ gɔ ɩ̃ hapɩra lɔnkɩ̃rɩwɛ za, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ɛ faŋɩra tãra pɩ bɛgɩra. Ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ ɩ̃ hapɩra, naɗɩɛ thakuogira Yekila hã ɩ̃ɛ, gɩɛ kpuogira ʋ hã bɩɛ tɩ̃, si le thaaga hã mɩɩnɛ sii ɓa barɩ ĩ Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra waʔ.
60003008	Mɩɛ sɩɛrɛphɩlɩyansɩra kɩ bʋ wɛsɩɛ na hã ɩ̃ bɩɛ. Ɩ̃ gɔ kamɛ na kɩ̃ra na hɩɗan na gagasɛ kpo, na makarɩ, kɩ khɔrɩ kamɛ mʋ gaga kha yaɓiiwe, na le nɩkɩ̃rɩwɛ, ki sũne ĩ thĩ na hã kamɛ.
60003009	Hã ɩ̃ taa mɩbɩ̃yɛ na mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ, warɩma na gbũure kʋsaʔɩra pɩ kʋsa ɩ̃ waʔ. Ŋa, ɩ̃ yɩ̃n Yekila kha ʋ kɩ̃ra pɩ, naɗɩɛ sɩɛ za ɩ̃ yɩɗɩ, si le thaaga ĩ ɓu kɩ̃rɩga.
60003010	Naɗɩɛ si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Wɩɛ bãa kɩ ɓɩɛ na ɓu thakuosʋ̃rʋga, kɩ hɩɗan kpolonwuoŋo za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na gɔ ʋ ɗɛlɛŋɩra sɩɛrɛbɩ̃ɩsɛ deɓe za, kɩ kɛɩ tɔŋɔ sɩɛsɛ,
60003011	na kɛɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige, ki ki le mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ, na pɛ̃ɩ kɩ ɓɩɛ wɔyĩke ki yo wʋɔrɛ.
60003012	Naɗɩɛ Adɛyɩra ɓaɗ ɓa u yiwiyira nɩtelenyemira za, kɩ zɩɛn u numiyira ki nuure pi Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra na zɩ̃ŋɩn mɩ. Ŋa mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛrɩwɩra bɩɛ ʋɔ, Yekila arɩ wa bɩɛ za.»
60003013	Na ĩ le wa mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ na ɩ̃ gagasɩra bɩɛ, ãna kɩ wɔrɩ le ĩ mɩbɩ̃yɛ?
60003014	Harɩ na ĩ ɓu wa vɛnsɛ ɩ̃ mɩkɩ̃rɩliigira kãmara za, kpolonwuoŋo bʋ wa ɩ̃ bɛgɛ. Hã ɩ̃ ãn nɩra sii waʔ, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ ɩ̃ gagasɩra asɩ waʔ.
60003015	Ŋa ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ Kirisitira kpora ɩ̃ gagasɩra za, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Adɛyɩra. Ɩ̃ hɩɗan sɩ hɩɗansɛ, na nɩra bʋ̃ɗ ɩ̃ na gbũu ɩ̃ laŋɩra mɩyɩra za, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ zɩ̃ŋɩn ʋ na kɩ̃ra.
60003016	Ŋa ɩ̃ zɩ̃ŋɩn ʋ dɛyɩra na gaga wuonse dɩ̃ɩna gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, kɩ hɩɗan na gagayɛgɛnsɛ si le thaaga nɩɩsɛ gɔ wɛpɩɛ kɩ asɩ ɩ̃ yɩsɩnʋʋgɩra kiretɩ̃ɛsɩra za.
60003017	Naɗɩɛ na mu ɓuun vɛnsɛ mʋ mɩkɩ̃rɩliigira kãma za, kɛna sɩɛ bʋ Yekila dĩŋo, sɩɛ kɩ̃ra na tãra baa mʋ vɛn naɗɩɛ baa mu liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ ɩra.
60003018	Naɗɩɛ Kirisitira thĩra huun ma bãnɩkpo kpeli nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãmara za, ʋɔ nɩtelenyemo wɩɛ huun nɩkɛɩtelenyeme kãma, si le thaaga u yo ĩ Yekila wʋɔla za. Gbɔɗa gɛŋɛ gɩɛ ʋɔ, pɩ khʋʋr ʋ wa, ŋa u gbũun alɩn ma Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra za.
60003019	Ʋɔ Nin kpuora wɔrɩkɩra za u yo deɗ Yekire sɩɛsɛ na nimira kha bʋ kasora ɩra,
60003020	bɩɛ na kɛɩn Yekila sɩɛsɩra Nuhũn khɩɛra za. Na Yekila baɗ kɩ tɩɛ wɩ bɛna Nuhũna kha le gbuogira ɩra. Nɩgɔmɛ wɔrɩn ɓuun lonn gɩɛ gbuogira za na kuon waʔ, fɔ nɩpɛ wãnɩsãa kpeli, bɩɛ wɔrɩn kuon na ɔkɩra asɩgɩra
60003021	Gɩɛ ɔkɩra kha ɓɔgɔ wa fɩ̃ɩ khɩɛ ãyikira mɩyɛ; gɩɛ kɩ zɩ̃n zɩɛ ɩ̃. Ãyikira kɔla ɓɔgɔ kha ki khon ma nirige ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra za waʔ, ŋa kɩ ɓɔgɔ wa kha ɩ̃ bɩɩn ma Yekila yɩɗa na lɔɓidayɛgɛmɔ. Ãyikira kuore ĩ wa Yesu Kirisitira hu arɩmɩra wɔrɩkɩra za.
60003022	Ʋɔ gann ma harɩ zaazaara ni na hɩɗann Yekila leɗĩngɛŋɩra za. Mɛlɛgɛwɛ, na mɩyɩra kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ na faŋadɛrɩwɩra kɩ bʋ zaara ni, bɩɛ bɩɛ sũne wa pi thĩ kɩ hã ʋ.
60004001	Baa Kirisitira ɓuun vɛnsɛ ʋ gbɔɗa za, ɩ̃ hɩɗan na sɩɛ vɛnsɩra gagasɩra tɩ̃. Naɗɩɛ na kiretɩ̃ɛ wɩɛ ɓuun vɛnsɛ ʋ gbɔɗɛ za, ʋɔ ɗɩɛgɛ bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za dʋ̃waʔ.
60004002	Na gɔ ɩra wɩɛ, na yɩɛ ɩ̃ dunuyara za fara, ɩ̃ kãn ma na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na makɩ̃n na Yekila dĩŋora, hã ĩ thuo gbɔɗɛ yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra dʋ̃waʔ.
60004003	Naɗɩɛ khɔ̃ɩra, mɩyɩra bɩɛ kha nʋʋ Yekire kʋɔdɛwɩra, sɩɛ doro ɩ̃ kha le. Ɩ̃ kha le wa zɛrɩgɛ, yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩga kha bʋ wa ɩ̃ za, na thayɔ̃bɩ̃ɩga, na lɔwʋgɔ, ɩ̃ kha bʋ wa wɛpɛ kɩ khɔrɩ na yɔ̃ ki hĩi, na sɩ̃mɩyɛ, kɛna Yekila kɛɩn sɩ waʔ.
60004004	Ɩra wɩɛ, bamʋŋa khonn ma bɩɛ Yekire kʋɔdɛbɩɛ, naɗɩɛ baa pɩ yã na ɩ̃ bɩ kɩ dɩɛ na bɩɛ lelɔnbɩ̃ɩwɩra za dʋ̃waʔ, sɩɛ ki le thaaga na pɩ kʋsa ɩ̃.
60004005	Ŋa ɗɩyãga gʋɔ ɓa ɓan, pɩ ɓa nɩ́ɩrɛ́ wa Yekila wʋɔla za na thuo sɩ bɩɛ, ʋɔ wɩɛra hɩɗan sɩ hɩɗansɛ kɩ tɩɛ na ɓa kiti nɩkogolinkowira dɩ̃ɩna nɩhuomira ɩra.
60004006	Sɩɛ yɩɛn na Yekire sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra deɗ harɩ nɩhuomira heke. Yekila kitin mi wa na makɩ̃n na pi milewenyira, mʋ gaga kha nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bʋɔra. Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmʋra wɔrɩkɩra kãma pɩ wɔrɩ hɩɗan thakuogo za na makɩ̃n na Yekila dĩŋora.
60004007	Mɩyɩra bɩɛ zuobɛna nann ma zuori. Ɩ̃ hɩɗan na wʋɔmɛ, kɩ hɩɗan ko kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila.
60004008	Wɛsɩɛ kɩ bʋ wʋɔla sɩ bɩɛ za, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha ɩ̃ khɔrɩ kamɛ na kpoloŋo kpo, naɗɩɛ khɔrɩmɛ yɩɛ wa a yafa mɩbɩ̃yɛlegɔŋɔ za.
60004009	Ɩ̃ gɔ kamɛ khɩ̃rɩsɛ na kɩ̃ra, hã ɩ̃ kpã wʋɔyɛ na kamɛ waʔ.
60004010	Mɩyɩra Yekila yãagɩ̃nn ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpo kpora dɩ̃ɩn ɩ, ɩ̃ khɛ ɩɛ na dɛnfɛ kamɛ. Ĩ le miliindɛkɩ̃rɩwɛ na gɔ Yekila mɩyãagɩ̃ranyɛ thĩnye thĩnyira bɩɛ ʋ hãar ɩ̃ na kɩ̃ra.
60004011	Na Yekire yãagɩ̃nn wɩɛ na sɩɛrɛlɔnkɩ̃rɩwɛ, na ʋ kha ʋ sɩɛrɛ u de Yekire sɩɛsɛ. Na wɩɛ bu liige kɩ hã bʋɔ, faŋɩra Yekila hãar ʋ, ʋ khɛ gɩɛ na liige hã wɩ, si le thaaga Yekila ɓu gbɩ̃nɛkpakpasɛ mɩyɛ bɩɛ za Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za. Gbɩ̃nɛsɛ na wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa Yekila bɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ. Amiina.
60004012	Mɩ yɛsɛgbɩ̃rɩwɛ, gbɩ̃rɩsɩra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ za ni mɩra mʋ gaga kha naaga za ɩ̃ bʋ, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ bamʋŋa khon ĩ sɩɛ za waʔ, hã ɩ̃ khɛ sɩ si le mʋ gaga kha mɩkɛɩliine i waʔ.
60004013	Ŋa ɩ̃ hɩɗan na bãanwuoŋo naɗɩɛ ĩ niin bʋ Kirisitira vɛnsɩra za, na Kirisitira ɓa ɓann na ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra bɛndɛ bãa, ɩ̃ ɓa hɩɗan bãanwuokpakpaka na yãgayãgamɛ za tɩ̃.
60004014	Na nɩpɛ kʋsa ɩ̃ Kirisitira kãma za, bãanwuogo bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ bɛgɛ, naɗɩɛ Yekila Nina kɩ bʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra Nina, ʋɔ ɓa hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩn ɩ̃.
60004015	Hã ɩ̃ ʋɔ sii ɓu vɛnsɛ naɗɩɛ kha ʋ bʋ wa nɩkhʋdaa waʔ, kha ʋ bʋ wa zugbũro waʔ, warɩma kha ʋ bʋ wa kakarɩledaa waʔ, warɩma kha u yii wa ʋ nʋʋga nɩpɛ mɩyɛ za waʔ,
60004016	ŋa na ʋ vɛn ma naɗɩɛ baa u liin kiretɩ̃ɛ, hã nɩɩsɛ gɔ ʋ sɩɛ za waʔ, ʋ kãn ma thĩra na gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila naɗɩɛ baa nɩpɛ yɩ ʋ kha kiretɩ̃ɛ ɩra.
60004017	Kiti gɔbɛna nann ma. Ʋɔ kitira gbũu ɓa gɔ ɓa Yekila nɩpɩra za zo. Na Kitira kãn gɔ ɓa aa za zo, wɛpɩɛ kɛɩn kha bɩɛ khãan Yekila sɩɛrɛnʋʋsɩra za waʔ, mʋsɛ bɩɛ ɓa phɩla na yo?
60004018	Si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Na nɩtelenyemora kuomira hʋgan ma, nɩbɩ̃yara na mɩbɩ̃yɛledaara bɛsɛ ɓa hɩɗan ma mʋsɛ?»
60004019	Mafɩra, wɛpɩɛ vɛnsɩra kɩ makɩ̃n na Yekila dĩŋora, bɩɛ kanɛ pi nimira nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ ledaa Yekila kɩ bʋ nʋʋnɛ kpo Yekila heke, kɩ pɛ̃ɩ ki yo wʋɔrɛ na mɩkɩ̃rɩliigira.
60005001	Egilizi wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za, bɩɛ heke mɩ sɩɛrɛ ɩra. Mɩɛ bʋ wa wʋɔrɛ nɩra ʋɔ tɩ̃, vɛnsɩra thĩna Kirisitira ɓuuri, mɩɛ bʋ wa sɩɛ sɩɛrɛ. Ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra ʋ ɓa ɓan mɩ, mɩɛ ɓa ɓu wa mɩɛ nii bʋ. Wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓɩɛ pi heke sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha:
60005002	Yekila nɩpɩra ʋ hãar ɩ̃, ĩ ki ken bɩɛ kɩ kɩ̃ra mʋ gaga kha baa nɩra ken ʋ zãragboɗe. Hã ĩ le si mʋ gaga kha pi ɓaɗ ɩ̃ wa sɩ faŋa za waʔ, ŋa ĩ le si na kpolonvɩrɩga mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila khɔrɩ sɩ, hã tɔ̃nɩɓɩɛgɛ ɓa hɩɗan bʋ waʔ.
60005003	Wɛpɩɛ Yekila hãar ɩ̃, hã ĩ ɗi faŋa bɩɛ za na tãra waʔ, ŋa ɩ̃ ɓɔgɔ pɩ khɩ̃nkɩ̃nɛ ĩ lelɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra za.
60005004	Mafɩra, na Yekila nɩpɩra kendakpakpawara (ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Kirisitira) ɓa ɓann bɛndɛ bãa, ɩ̃ ɓa ɓu ɩɩgbanfɩla yɩ̃garamɔ wɩɛ kɩ asɩ waʔ.
60005005	Si kpuosira ɩ tɩ̃, ɓikhoyipe na ɓihɛrɩpɛ, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã egilizi wʋɔrɛ nɩpɩra. Ɩ̃ bɩɛ sũne ĩ thĩ na hã kamɛ. Naɗɩɛ si deɗ ɓa Yekila sɛwʋra za kha: «Wɩɛ kɩ lʋɔrɛ u thĩ, Yekila khɛ̃ɩ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra. Ŋa wɩɛ ki sũne u thĩ, ʋ fɩ̃ɩ wa ʋɔ za.»
60005006	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ĩ sũne ĩ thĩ wɔrɩkɔ dɛyɛ Yekila wʋɔla za, na ɩ̃ arɩga bɛnɛ ɓa nann bɛndɛ bãa, ʋ tʋ arɩga ɩ̃.
60005007	Ɩ̃ yɩɛ ĩ wukĩnsira bɩɛ ʋɔ leke za, naɗɩɛ ʋɔ kɩ bʋ ĩ kendaara.
60005008	Ɩ̃ hɩɗan ko na tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ. Naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ bɩ̃ɩra Sutana miŋin ma ɩ̃ lɔsɩra za ki uri mʋ gaga kha zara kɩ ɓɩɛ nɩra kha ʋɔ gɔ khʋɔ.
60005009	Ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ khãamɩra za na kɩ̃ra na khɛ̃ɩ Sutana. Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n kha sɩɛ vɛnsɩra siira kɩ nan kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bʋɔra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ dunuyara za tɩ̃ ɩra.
