60005010	Ŋa sɩɛ vɛnsɩra ɓa lɛɩ tãra waʔ, dɩɛ bɛna, fɩ̃ɩmɛ dɛyɛ Yekila yɩɗ ɩ̃ kha ĩ ɓu ʋɔ ɩɩga yɛyɛkɛɩzuomɩra siira Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za, ʋɔ kɩ ɓa dɛnfɛ ɩ̃, ɩ̃ khãʔ, kɩ hã ɩ̃ faŋa, ɩ̃ wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́ na kɩ̃ra.
60005011	Wɔrɩkɩra bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛgɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ! Amiina.
60005012	Silivɛ̃ mɩ yɩɛn na ʋ sɛwɛ sɩɛrɛɓiyɩɛ mɩ dãa hã ɩ̃ ɩra, mɩɛ heke, ʋ bʋ wa yaɓitelenyemo. Mɩ dãa wa ʋɔ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na hã ɩ̃ ʋ, kha ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ, kɩ ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ sɩ tɩ̃ na yɛ kha bɩɛ fɩ̃ɩbɩɛ mɩyɩra mi de ĩ, pɩ bʋ wa Yekire fɩ̃ɩmɛ. Ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na gɔ pɩ na kɩ̃ra.
60005013	Babilɔnɩ sɩrɩgɩra kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃, Yekila u kenn khonn bɩɛ tɩ̃ mʋ gaga kha baa u kenn khonn ɩ̃ɛ ɩra. Mi ɓikhiye Marɩkɩ bʋ thɩɛ ɩ̃ tɩ̃.
60005014	Ĩ kpen yaɓiiwira bɩɛ na thɩɛ wɩ na kpolonvɩrɩga. Yekire hã ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpolonwuoŋo.
61001001	Mɩɛ Simɔ̃ Pɩɛrɩ liin Yesu Kirisiti miliinɓiye na dãara, mɩɛ kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ ɓuun aa khãasɩwʋwɩra thĩna. Ĩ ɓuun ma bɩɛ khãamɩra a zɩ̃ndaa Yesu Kirisitira kɩ bʋ a Yekila ʋɔ telemira kãmara za.
61001002	Yekila na a Adɛyɛ Yesura kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ kɩ hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo gbaangbo naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ tʋʋn mɩ ɩra.
61001003	Mɩɩdɛ bãa kɩ wɔrɩ yɩɛ a hɩɗan thakuogo za kɩ sɩɛ dʋɔ a telemira za Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za, Yekila hãar a wa sɩɛ bɩɛ ʋ wɔrɩkɩra za. Ʋ yɩɛn ma na a tʋʋn wɩɛra yɩɗ a ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra na ʋ wɔrɩkɩra za ɩra.
61001004	Gɩɛ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra na gɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra kãmara za, mɩkɩ̃rɩkpakpaʔɩra nʋʋgɩra Yekila na hãar a, a ɓuun ma ɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ. Baa a ɓuun ɩɛ mɩyɩra, a wɔrɩ dɩɛ na Yekila na le kpuore, kɩ wɔrɩ ko dunuyara yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra.
61001005	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na sɩɛ lɔnkɩ̃rɩwɛ ɩ̃ khãamɩra za, na sɩɛ Yekire tʋʋmɛ ɩ̃ lɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra za,
61001006	na sɩɛ tʋgɔɓɛ Yekire tʋʋmɛ za, na sɩɛ pɛ̃ɩmɛ tʋgɔɓɛ za, na sɩɛ teleme Yekila wʋɔla ʋ pɛ̃ɩmɛ za,
61001007	na sɩɛ nʋwansɛ telemira ʋ Yekila wʋɔla za, kɩ sɩɛ khɔrɩmɛ nʋwansɩra za.
61001008	Naɗɩɛ na ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ bɩɛ bʋ ɩ̃ gagasɛ za na gɔnnɩ, ɩ̃ gbɔʔɩra hu ĩ dʋ̃waʔ, sɩɛ kɩ ɓa dɛnfɛ ɩ̃ ĩ yo wʋɔrɛ na tʋ a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira na kɩ̃ra.
61001009	Ŋa na ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ bʋ nɩra wɩɛ gagasɛ za waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha ɗarɩga kɩ thãwʋ thãwʋ. Ʋɔ dɛyɩra phaʔ wa kha ʋɔ na yɛɗɛn ma na khonn ʋ khɔ̃ɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za zuori.
61001010	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ yaɓiiwe, baa Yekila kenn khonn ĩ na yɩɗ ɩ̃, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na yii wʋɔrɛ sɩɛ za. Na ɩ̃ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ kɩ makɩ̃n na bɩɛ lɔmɩra, ɩ̃ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za dʋ̃waʔ.
61001011	Na sɩɛ liiri, Yekila ɓa phii zɩɛ wa a Adɛyɛ na a zɩ̃ndaa Yesu Kirisitira ɩɩkɛɩzuoŋira tʋ̃tʋna bɩɛ ĩ lon bʋ.
61001012	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩɛ ɓa kɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa na ɩɛ mɩyɩra bãanyɛ bɩɛ, harɩ na ɩ̃ tʋʋn sɩ wa na gɔɗ tɩ̃ya karɩ̃na sɩɛsɩra ĩ ɓuuri.
61001013	Na yɩɛ mɩɛ thakuogo za, mɩ yãan sɩ kha sɩ kɩ̃ra mɩ kɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n ɩ̃ na ɩɛ mɩyɩra ĩ ɓu hɩɗan ko,
61001014	naɗɩɛ mɩ tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha mi hubɛna yĩmin ma, a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira na ɓɔgɔn mɩ sɩ zuori.
61001015	Ŋa khaala mɩ hu ɗɩyãgɩra kha gɩɛ nan, mɩ ɓa pɛ̃ɩ wa kɩ sɩɛrɛ ĩ heke, si le thaaga na mɩ ɓa huun zuori, wɛsɩɛ mɩ karɩ̃n ɩ̃, sɩɛ hɩɗan ɩ̃ gagasɩra za.
61001016	Baa a ɓɔgɔn ɩ̃ a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira wɔrɩkɩra na ʋ ɓamɩra mɩyɩra, kpɩlɩsɛ a kpɩlɩn ɩ̃ waʔ, ŋa aa yiwiyira yãan ma ʋɔ thĩra ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra za.
61001017	Bɛna a Adɛyɛ Yesura ɓuun gbɩ̃nɛsɛ na gbʋ̃ɔnsɛ na kuɗ Siye Yekila heke, ʋɔ wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekire wɩɛ deɗ ɓa kha: «Wɩɛra bʋ wa mɩɛ ɓikhiye khɔrɩyɔmɔ thĩ, ʋɔ za mi yiin mɩ bãanwuoŋira bɩɛ.»
61001018	Sɩɛ sɩɛsɩɛ, aa thĩra nuun si wa na sɩ kʋ̃n zaazaara ni bɛna a kha bʋ ɓɩɛsɩ̃mɩyaŋɩra thaagɩra za na Yesura.
61001019	Na sɩɛ sɩɛ za tɩ̃, a lann ma Yekila yãdedɛwɩra sɩɛsɩra za. Sɩ bʋ wa sɩɛsɛ ɓakan na kɩ̃ranɩ. Ɩ̃ kãn ma na gɔ sɩ na kɩ̃ra. Sɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha fɩtanɩ kɩ bʋ ki so khaarɛ dʋɔ za ni dabirige za, kɩ tɩɛ ɗɩɩyɛkɩ̃ŋa ɓanu kha ɗɩɩyɛkɩ̃nbɛnɛ khʋsaɓila yɛɗɛn ɩ̃ gagasɩra. (Dɩɛ khʋsaɓila kɩ bʋ Kirisitira.)
61001020	Iyo, ɩ̃ tʋ sɩ na kɩ̃ra kha nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye wɔrɩ tʋ Yekila yãdedɛwɩra sɩɛsɩra kɔrɩwɩra u thĩ za waʔ.
61001021	Naɗɩɛ Yekire yãdedɛwɛ sɩɛsɩra kure nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye dɩ̃ŋo za waʔ, ŋa Ninyɛgɛmɔ yiin si pɩ nʋʋsɩra za na pi de si Yekila yɩsɩgɩra za.
61002001	Khɔ̃ɩra, tɔŋɔ yãdedɛwɛ kha bʋ wa Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ sɩrɩgɩra za. Ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za tɩ̃, tɔŋɔ karɩ̃ndɛwɛ ɓa hɩɗan ma bʋ tɩ̃. Pɩ ɓa ki ɓilen nɩpɛ na pɩ karɩ̃na harɩ na ɓa yo kɛɩ Adɛyɩra thĩra zɩ̃nn mɩ ɩra. Sɩɛ kɩ ɓa yɩɛ pɩ yan wɔgbʋ̃ʋga na yii pi thĩ za vivi na asɩ khon fɩ pere.
61002002	Nɩgɔmɛ ɓa thuo pɩ kakarɩliigira, bɩɛ kɩ ɓa le thaagɩra nɩpɛ asɩ Yekila khɩ̃na yɩsɩgɩra.
61002003	Baa pɩ khɔrɩn tigiyira na yo tannɩ, pɩ ɓa kpii wa tɔnsɛ na kpɛnsɛ ɓilen ĩ. Ŋa pi kitira ɔfɔn zɩɛn ma fɩ zuori kɩ tɩɛ wɩ, Yekila ɓa asɩ khon mi wa fɩ, sɩ ɓa lɛɩ waʔ.
61002004	Naɗɩɛ, harɩ mɛlɛgɛwɩra na liin mɩbɩ̃yɩra harɩ khɔ̃ɩra ni, Yekila makarɩn pɩ za yãan waʔ, ŋa ʋ vɔɗ pɩ wa na zɔrɔgɔsɛ na hĩnn mi dabirigbɛmʋŋa za, kɩ tɩɛ kitiɗɩyãgɩra.
61002005	Khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩ nɩpɩra kha bʋ, Yekila makarɩn pɩ za tɩ̃ waʔ. Ŋa ʋ yɩɛn ma na adaga gbʋ̃ɔŋɔ ɓann na ɓa khʋʋn wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kha ãn ʋ waʔ ɩra, ki kuoren Nuhũn kpo dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ bʋɔ. Nuhũna ʋɔ kha de ɓa nɩpɛ kha pi telen.
61002006	Yekila yɩɛn ma na kiti waan Sodɔmʋ na Gomɔɔrɩ za tɩ̃, ki suon sɩɛ gbonsɩɛ na liin si mɩrɩwɛ, na ɓu ɓɔgɔ kha wɛpɩɛ kɩ ãn ʋɔ waʔ, mafɩra pɩ ɓa so tɩ̃.
61002007	Ŋa u kuoren ma Lɔtɩ, naɗɩɛ ʋɔ kha bʋ wa nɩtelenyemo, mɩbɩ̃ɩnyɩra nɩpɛ kha le, sɩɛ kha asɩ wa ʋ gagasɛ.
61002008	Naɗɩɛ baa ʋɔ nɩtelenyemo wɩɛ kha bʋ bɩɛ nɩbɩ̃ɩbɩɛ sʋgʋmʋra za kɩ yã wɩ na u nu pɩ mɩyɩra ɗɩyãga tʋɔ ɗɩyãga, ʋ gagasɛ kha asɩ wa pi lelɔnbɩ̃ɩwɩra kãmara za.
61002009	Mafɩra tɩ̃, Adɛyɩra thĩra tʋ wa lɔmɩra za ʋɔ wɔrɩ zɩ̃n nɩtelenyemira gbɩ̃rɩsɛ za, kɩ yɩɛ nɩthɩ̃rɩbɩ̃ɩwɩra na ɓa kiti wi ɗɩyãgaphɩlɩyaŋɩra za.
61002010	Ʋ ɓa kiti wa thĩ wɛpɩɛ ki horo horo gbɔɗɛ yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩga kãmara za, pɩ gbɩ̃nɛ wɔrɩkɔ dɛyɛ Yekila waʔ. Bɩɛ tɔŋɔ karɩ̃ndɛbɩɛ khãan pi thĩ za kɩ tãra, pi de ɓa sɩɛrɛ hʋwʋsɛ, dɩ̃ɩna na kʋsa zaazaa wɔrɩkɔ mɩyɛ, sɩɛ bʋ foi pi heke waʔ.
61002011	Harɩ mɛlɛgɛwɩra kɩ bʋ na faŋɩra na wɔrɩkɩra, kɩ tãra bɩɛ tɔŋɔ karɩ̃ndɛbɩɛ bɛgɩra, bɩɛ ha kʋsa zaaza wɔrɩkɔ mɩyɩra Adɛyɩra wʋɔla ʋ waʔ.
61002012	Ŋa bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ laɗ ɓa wʋɔmɛ, pɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha gbangadaabɛ pɩ gɩɗɛ na gɔ pɩ na khʋ wɩ ɩra. Mɩyɩra pɩ tʋ waʔ, ɩɛ pɩ kpãa, gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, pɩ ɓa hu wa mʋ gaga kha gbandaawɩra tɩ̃.
61002013	Vɛnsɛ kɩ ɓa le pɩ taasɩra pɩ kɛɩtelemira kãma. Na le pi yebɩ̃ɩga mɩyɛ khɩɛkpãnkpãŋa za, sɩɛ kɩ nʋʋ bɩ. Na ĩ bĩnn khaarɛ tikpo dɩ̃ɩn mɩ ki ɗi, pi ki kpii wa tɔnsɛ na pi le nɩɩlamɩyɛ.
61002014	Pi yiwiyira bʋ wa hapɛ za bãanyɛ bɩɛ, pi hĩi mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za waʔ. Wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le faŋɩra Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za, pɩ kpɛnsɛ wa bɩɛ na yii wi mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za. Pɩ khɔrɩ tigiye kɩ tãra, Yekila daŋan mɩ wa.
61002015	Pɩ kɛɩn ma khɩ̃ntelenyena na diiri, ki thuon Bozɔrɩ ɓikhiye Balamʋ vɔŋɩra, ʋɔ wɩɛra pɩ na hãan tigiye kha u le mɩbɩ̃yɩra ɩra,
61002016	ŋa wɛsɩɛ u liiri, ʋ yɩɛn kɛɩ ɓuun sɩ kpaŋɩ̃nsɛ waʔ, kãŋun thĩra kɩ bʋ kɛɩsɩɛrɛmʋra, ʋɔ khɩɛn nɩthɩ̃rɩga nʋʋga na sɩɛrɛn Yekire yãdedaa Balamʋra heke na ɓɔgɔn ʋ ʋ wʋɔnlakɩra.
61002017	Bɩɛ tɔŋɔ karɩ̃ndɛbɩɛ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha kɔlɔn wɩɛ kɩ bʋ kɛɩ le ãmɛ. Pɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha dadʋ̃ransɛ wɛsɛ sarangbʋ̃ɔŋɔ khɛ ɩra. Dabirigbɛmʋŋa zɩɛn sann bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ.
61002018	Tɔŋɔ karɩ̃ndɛwɩra de ɓa sɩɛrɛgbʋ̃ɔnsɛ kɛɩ le thaaga, nɩpɛ wɛpɛ pɛ̃ɩn na khɛ̃ɩgɩ̃nn kuɗ ɓilense za, pɩ kpɛnsɛ wa bɩɛ na yan yii wi gbɔɗɛ yekemɩyɛ za.
61002019	Pi de ɓa bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ kha pɩ ɓa ɓu pi thĩ kɛna bɩɛ thĩra liin ma ɗome pi yekemɩyɩra za, ɩɛ wɛʔɩɛ kɩ khʋ wɩ ɩra. (Naɗɩɛ mɩɩdɛ bãa faŋa gbɩ̃nn mʋ za, mu liin ma dɩɛ mɩɩna ɗonron.)
61002020	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ tʋ a Adɛyɛ na a Zɩ̃ndaa Yesu Kirisitira, bɩɛ kɛɩn ma dunuya wɩɛ mɩtegenyɩra, ŋa na pɩ vɩɗ lonn ɩ za na yɩɛn na i ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ pɩ za, bɩɛ nɩpɩra lɔmɩra ɓa ɔfɔ bɩ̃ɩ wa na tãra khɔ̃ɩra.
61002021	Naɗɩɛ na bɩɛ nɩpɩra na tʋʋn teleme khɩ̃na waʔ, sɩɛ kha bãa pɩ za na tãra baa pɩ tʋʋn nɩ kɩ kɛɩn Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra na ɓɔgɔn mɩ ɩra.
61002022	Ɩra wɩɛ, pɩ bɛsɛ liin ma mʋ gaga kha baa sɔkɩɛ de si kha: «Ɓɛrɩwɛ̃ vɩɗ gbũun ʋ sarɩsɩra za» Dɩ̃ɩna kha: «Dɔrɩbɔ̃na wʋrɩmɛ na u vɩ gbũume tɛkpʋla za.»
61003001	Mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, mɩ sɛwɛ yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra wɩɛ mɩ bʋ dãa hã ɩ̃ mɩra. Bɩɛ sɛwʋbɩɛ yɔ̃ra bɩɛ za, mɩ ɔfɔ kʋɔgɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa na mɩyɛ yʋɔ si le thaaga ĩ ɓu gagakɩ̃rɩsɛ.
61003002	Mɩ ɓɩɛ wa kha ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ Yekire yãdedɛyɛgɛmɩra na deɗ ĩ khɔ̃ɩra, dɩ̃ɩna Adɛyɩra kɩ bʋ zɩ̃ndaara, ʋɔ sɩɛrɛdewensɩra dãarawɩra na deɗ ĩ ɩra.
61003003	Ɩ̃ kãn ma na nisĩn tʋ kha phɩlɩyanɗɩyãsɩra za nɩpɛ bʋɔ ɓa ɓan ki le wɛsɩɛ pɩ khɔrɩ, pɩ ɓa kɩ lʋgʋtɩ̃n ɩ̃
61003004	ki de kha: «Yesura na hãan ma nʋʋga kha ʋɔ ɓa ɓan, na he u he na a yã ʋ waʔ. A sekhãgawɩra huun zuon ma, kɛna mɩyɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa ɩ lɔmɩra za bere mʋ gaga kha baa ɩ kha bʋ dunuyara lebɛna ɩra.»
61003005	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ kɩ sɩɛrɛ mafɩra, pɩ kʋɔmɛ bʋ wa sɩ za kha lʋgʋsɩra za, Yekila sɩɛsɩra wɔrɩkɩra za Yekila liin zaazaara na fɔlɔŋɩra harɩ khɔ̃ɩkhɔ̃ɩra. Fɔlɔŋɩra kuɗ ɓa ãmɛ za, na hɩɗan kikpo na ãmɩra.
61003006	Bɩɛ lɔnkpuowira za tɩ̃, Yekila yɩɛ na adagagbʋ̃ɔŋɔ waan na ãmɛ ɗiin fɔlɔŋɩra mɩyɩra bɩɛ.
61003007	Ŋa zaara na fɔlɔŋɩra a yã ɩra wɩɛ mɩra, Yekila sɩɛsɩra gɔɗ sɩ wa kɩ tɩɛ naagɩra ɗɩɛɗɩyãgɩra na so si, gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra, wɛpɩɛ ki nu Yekila bɛrɛ waʔ, bɩɛ ɓa so ɓa na zuo pere.
61003008	Mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, mɩɩnɛ tikpo bʋ, hã nɩra sii pha dɩɛ waʔ. Dɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha Adɛyɩra heke, ɗɩyãga kpo bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha ɗɩɩsɛ kpɩɛkpo (1,000), dɩ̃ɩna ɗɩɩsɛ kpɩɛkpo (1,000) bʋ wa u heke mʋ gaga kha ɗɩyãga kpo.
61003009	Adɛyɩra ɓa lɛɩ kɛɩ hĩɗe ʋ nʋhãaŋɩra waʔ, kɛna bʋɔ gaga wa kha ʋ lɛɩn tannɩ. Ŋa ʋ ba ɓa kɩ hã ɩ̃, sɩɛ yɩɛrɩ. Ʋ khɔrɩ kha bʋɔ dii khɛɩ tʋ Yekila waʔ, ŋa ʋ ɓɩɛ wa kha pɩ bɩɛ tʋ Yekila na ɓu zɩ̃mɛ.
61003010	Adɛyɩra ɓanɗɩyãgɩra ɓa barɩ wa nɩpɛ za mʋ gaga kha zugbũro, gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra zaazaara ɓa tũri na lʋrʋgɩ̃ngbʋ̃ɔnsɛ, mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ zaazaara ni, naaga ɓa so asɩ ɩɛ bɩɛ pere, fɔlɔŋɩra na mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ kɩ za, sɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa tũri.
61003011	Baa ɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ kãn ma na tũri, ɩ̃ tʋʋmɛ bʋ lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ kãn na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na yo ɩra. Ɩ̃ kãn ma na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila khɔrɩ, ki telen mɩyɩra bɩɛ za,
61003012	na ɩ̃ tɩɛ Yekila ɗɩyãgɩra namɩra, kɩ kɩ pɛ̃ɩ gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra ɓu nan vivi. Gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra, naaga ɓa so ɓa zaazaara dɩ̃ɩna daasɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ ni na asɩ sɩ pere.
61003013	Na makɩ̃n na Yekila nʋhãaŋɩra, ʋ ɓa le wa zaazaa fɛnwɛ̃ na fɔlɔnfɛŋɛ. Mɩtelenyenye doro kɩ ɓa le sɩɛ za, sɩɛ a tɩɛ.
61003014	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, na yɩɛ a gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra tɩɛmɩra za, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na hɩɗan wɔyĩke za na Yekila, kɛɩ le ɓilenkhɛrɛ na zarɩgɩ̃nkhɛrɛ.
61003015	Ɩ̃ tʋ wɛsɩɛ na kɩ̃ra. Na ɩ̃ yãan na a Adɛyɩra bʋ ɓan vivi waʔ, ʋ ba ɓa ɩ̃ɛ ɓu ɓu zɩ̃mɛ zo. Ɩɛ mɩyɩra za a yaɓiye na a yɛsɛkhuo Poli hãar ɩ̃ sɛwɛ na makɩ̃nn na wʋɔmɩra Yekila hãar ʋ ɩra.
61003016	Na ʋ kha ʋ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɛwɛ na gbũu ɩɛ mɩyɩra za, sɩɛ sɩɛrɛkpuosira u de bɩɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩra bɩɛ za. Bɩɛ lɛtɩrɩbɩɛ kpoloŋira sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ kɔrɩwɩra tʋʋmɛ hʋgan ma. Sɩɛ ki le thaagɩra, wɛpɩɛ kɩ tʋ foi ɩɛ mɩyɩra za waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna pi ɓuun karɩ̃n waʔ, bɩɛ kɩ vɩkɩ̃n sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra kɔrɩwɩra. Sɩɛ kpuosira pi le na Yekila sɛwɛ yɛgɛmɔra khaayɛ yʋɔ sɩɛsira. Baa pi le sɩɛ, pɩ bʋ wa pi thĩ asɩmɛ za mafɩra.
61003017	Iyo, mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, mɩ sarɩn ma ɩ̃ za na gbũu ɩɛ mɩyɩra za zuori. Ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ na bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ kɩ ãn Yekila waʔ ɩra, hã pɩ ɓa le kpɛnsɛ ɩ̃ na khon ĩ ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛkɩ̃rɩyɩra ʋ Yekila za waʔ.
61003018	Ŋa ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ na yo wʋɔrɛ a Adɛyɛ na a zɩ̃ndaa Yesu Kirisitira kɩ̃rɩgɩra na ʋ tʋʋmɩra za. Gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛsɛ ɩra wɩɛ dɩ̃ɩna bãanyɛ bɩɛ kɛɩ gbaa. Amiina.
62001001	Sɩɛsɩra kha bʋ na dunuyara tiin thonn waʔ, sɩɛ wɛsɩɛ mɩyɛ a nuuri, na yãan sɩ na a yiwiye, na kenn si na kɩ̃ranɩ, ki phoɗ sɩ za na a lese, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ sɩɛsɩra a bu de ĩ na sɩ hã nɩpɛ thakuokɛɩzuoŋira.
62001002	Iyo, gɩɛ thakuogira ɓɔgɔn ma ki thĩ na a yãan ŋɩ. Aa liin ma kɩ sɩɛrɛwɛ ki ki de ĩ gɩɛ thakuokɛɩzuoŋira mɩyɛ, kɩ kha bʋ wa na Siye Yekila kɩ tʋʋn ɓa ɓɔgɔn ki thĩ na aa ɩra wɩɛ.
62001003	Sɩɛsɩra aa nuun kɩ yãarɩ, sɩɛ mɩyɛ aa bu de ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃ si le thaaga aa na ɩ̃ɛ le nʋkpuore. Naɗɩɛ a nʋkpuola bʋ wa na Siira dɩ̃ɩna u Ɓikhiye Yesu Kirisitira.
62001004	A sɛwɛ wa ɩɛ mɩyɩra na hã ɩ̃ ɩ si le thaaga a bãanyɛ wuo na kɩ̃ra.
62001005	Ken, wɛsɩɛ a nuun Yesu Kirisitira heke ki de ĩ, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha Yekila bʋ wa yɛyɛɓɛ, dabirige foi sii bʋ ʋ za waʔ.
62001006	Na a de ɓa kha aa bʋ wa nʋkpuore na Yekila, kɛna a le wa dabirimɩyɛ, a bʋ wa tɔndɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna a nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na tɩ̃yara waʔ.
62001007	Ŋa na a nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ wa yɛyɛɓɛ za mʋ gaga kha baa Yekila bʋ yɛyɛɓɩra za, dɩɛ bɛna a hɩɗan ma nʋkpuore na kamɛ kɩ yɩɛ u Ɓikhiye Yesura tarɩmɩra yɛɗɛ a na khon a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira bɩɛ.
62001008	Na a de ɓa kha aa le mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ, a kpɛnsɛ wa a thĩ, dɩ̃ɩna a tʋ tɩ̃ya waʔ.
62001009	Ŋa na a bɩ na de a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira, Yekila bʋ wa nʋʋnɛ kpo Yekire, u telenn ma, ʋ ɓa yafa a za ki khon a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira bɩɛ.
62001010	Na a de ɓa kha aa bʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ waʔ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha a de ɓa kha Yekila bʋ wa tɔndaa, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ sɩɛsɩra bʋ a gagasɩra za waʔ.
62002001	Mi ɓiiwe, mɩ sɛwɛ hã ɩ̃ wa lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ si le thaaga hã ĩ le mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ. Ŋa, na sɩ nann ma na nɩra ʋɔ liin mɩbɩ̃yɛ, Soronadaa bʋ a heke Siye Yekila wʋɔla ʋ. Ʋɔ liin Yesu Kirisitira ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ nɩthɩ̃rɩtelenyemora.
62002002	Naɗɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira hãan ma u thĩ na liin thɔgɔnsɩra khonn a bɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãmara za. Aa doro mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira ɩ waʔ, ŋa aa na dunuyara nɩpɩra bʋɔra bɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kãmara za.
62002003	Na a gɔ Yekila sɩɛrɛdewensira, sɩɛ za a tʋ kha a tʋ ʋ.
62002004	Nɩra wɩɛ ki de kha ʋɔ tʋ wa Yekila kɛna ʋ gɔ ʋ sɩɛrɛdewensira waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa tɔndaa, tɩ̃ya bʋ ʋɔ dɛyɩra za waʔ.
62002005	Ŋa nɩra wɩɛ kɩ gɔ Yekila sɩɛsɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓɔgɔ wa kha Yekila khɔrɩmɩra bʋ wa ʋɔ za gbaangbo thĩ. Mafɩra a tʋ kha aa na Yekila bʋ wa nʋkpuore.
62002006	Nɩra wɩɛ ki de kha ʋɔ bʋ wa Yekire baa, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kãn ma na khɛ Yesu Kirisitira nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra.
62002007	Mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ Kirisitira za, sɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha sɩɛrɛdewɛnfɛnsɛ mɩ hã ɩ̃ waʔ. Sɩɛrɛdewenɗuguse i, wɛsɛ ĩ ɓuun harɩ bɛna ɩ̃ gɔɗ kiretɩ̃ɛsɩra ɩra. Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛdewenɗugusira kɩ bʋ sɩɛsɩra ĩ nuun ɩra.
62002008	Gɛŋɛ gʋɔ za tɩ̃, sɩɛrɛdewenfɛnsɛ mɩ bʋ sɛwɛ hã ɩ̃. Yesura nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀lɔmɩra dɩ̃ɩna ɩ̃ɛ nɩ̀ɩrɩ̀lɔmɩra kɩ ɓɔgɔ sɩ kha tɩ̃ya ʋ. Naɗɩɛ dabirigira bʋ wa kɩ tãra, na yɛyɛthĩnthĩmira bʋ kɩ yɛɗɛ gɛŋɩra zuori.
62002009	Na nɩra ʋɔ de ɓa kha ʋɔ bʋ wa yɛyɛɓɛ za, kɛna ʋ yãasɩ̃nn ma ʋ yaɓiye, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa dabirige za bere.
62002010	Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ yaɓiye, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa yɛyɛɓɛ za dɩ̃ɩna mɩɩnɛ sii bʋ na wɔrɩ yɩɛ ʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za waʔ.
62002011	Ŋa, nɩra wɩɛ bãa kɩ yãasɩ̃n ʋ yaɓiye, ʋɔ bʋ wa dabirige za. Ʋ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ wa dabirige za kɛɩ tʋ u yogɛŋɛ naɗɩɛ baa dabirigira ɗarɩn ʋ ɩra.
62002012	Mi ɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, mɩ sɛwɛ hã ɩ̃ wa lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira yafan ma ɩ̃ za Yesu Kirisitira kãmara za.
62002013	Mi siiwe, mɩ sɛwɛ wa wɛsɩɛ na hã ɩ̃ sɩ, naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ tʋ wa wɩɛra kha bʋ na dunuyara tiin thonn waʔ ɩra. Mɩ sɛwɛ wa wɛsɩɛ na de ɩ̃ɛ ɓikhoyipe kha ĩ ɓuun ma wɔrɩkɔ Sutana za.
62002014	Mɩ ɔfɔ de ĩ wa sɩ tɩ̃ mi ɓiiwe kha ɩ̃ tʋ wa Siira. Mi siiwe, mɩ sɛwɛn hãr ɩ̃ wa wɛsɩɛ naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ tʋ wa wɩɛra kha bʋ harɩ dunuyara tiibɛna. Ɓikhoyipe, mɩ sɛwɛn hãr ɩ̃ wa tɩ̃ naɗɩɛ ɩ̃ bʋ wa na faŋa, ɩ̃ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ wa na Yekila sɩɛsɩra dɩ̃ɩna ĩ ɓuun ma wɔrɩkɔ Sutana za.
62002015	Hã ɩ̃ khɔrɩ dunuyara waʔ, hã ɩ̃ khɔrɩ dunuyara kpoloŋo mɩyɩra waʔ. Nɩra wɩɛ bãa kɩ khɔrɩ dunuyara, ʋɔ dɛyɩra khɔrɩ Siye Yekila waʔ.
62002016	Naɗɩɛ, dunuya wɩɛ mɩyɩra (Gbɔɗɛ yekemɩyɛ, mɩyɩra mʋ yã, na yɩɛ mʋ wʋɔrɛ kure ɩ za, na wãnso mu ɓudaga za), sɩɛ sʋɔ sii kuɗ Siye Yekila za waʔ, ŋa si kuɗ ɓa dunuyara za.
62002017	Kɛna dunuyara ɓa tãra waʔ, u yekemɩɓɩɛbɩ̃ɩgɩra ɓa tãra wa tɩ̃, ŋa nɩra wɩɛ bãa ki le Yekila dĩŋora, ʋɔ hɩɗan ma thakuogo za kũu kɛɩ hu.
62002018	Mi ɓiiwe, bɛnphɩlɩyana nan ma. Ĩ nuun na si deɗ kha Kirisitira bɩ̃ɩra ɓa ɓan. Kɛna ɩra wɩɛ thĩra Kirisitira bɩ̃ɩragɔmɛ bʋ wa bʋ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na a tʋʋn kha bɛnphɩlɩyana nann ma.
62002019	Bɩɛ Kirisitira bɩ̃ɩrabɩɛ kuɗ ɓa a sʋgʋmʋra za, ŋa tɩ̃yara za pɩ kha bʋ aa yaɓiiwe bʋɔ waʔ. Na pɩ kha bʋ aa bʋɔ, pɩ naa hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩn a. Ɩra wɩɛ sɩ yɛɗ ɓa kha pɩ bʋ aa bʋɔ waʔ.
62002020	Ŋa ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, ĩ ɓuun ma Yekila Ninyɛgɛmɔra na kuɗ Kirisitira heke, na si liin thaaga na ɩ̃ bɩɛ tʋʋn tɩ̃yara.
62002021	Na si liin mafɩra, mɩ sɛwɛ wɛsɩɛ kɩ hã ɩ̃ naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ kʋɔ tɩ̃yara waʔ, ŋa naɗɩɛ baa ɩ̃ tʋ ʋ ɩra. Ĩ gbũu tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha tɔŋɔ sii wɔrɩ kure tɩ̃ya za waʔ.
62002022	Ãna kpuo kɩ bʋ tɔndaara? Nɩra wɩɛ bãa ki de kha Yekila Nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora kɩ bʋ Yesura waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ bʋ tɔndaara. Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ kɛɩ Siye Yekila na Ɓikhiira, Kirisitira bɩ̃ɩrara ʋɔ.
62002023	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ kɛɩ sɩ kha Kirisitira bʋ Yekila Ɓikhiye waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɛɩ wa Siye Yekila tɩ̃. Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ bɩ kha Kirisitira kɩ bʋ Yekila Ɓikhiira, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɩ wa Siira tɩ̃.
62002024	Ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, sɩɛsɩra ĩ nuun harɩ gɔbɛna, ĩ yii si ɩ̃ gagasɩra za. Sɩɛsɩra ĩ nuun harɩ gɔbɛna, na sɩɛ bʋ ɩ̃ gagasɩra za, ɩ̃ɛ tɩ̃, ɩ̃ ɓa hɩɗan ma nʋkpuore dɩ̃ɩna Ɓikhiira na Siira.
62002025	Iyo, nʋʋgɩra Kirisitira thĩra hãar a, gɩɛ kɩ bʋ thakuokɛɩzuoŋira.
62002026	Ken, sɩɛ mɩ kha ɓɩɛ na sɛwɛ hã ɩ̃ na gbũu ɩ̃ kpɛnsɛdɛrɩwɩra mɩyɛ za.
62002027	Na ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, Ninyɛgɛmɔra ĩ ɓuun Kirisitira heke, ʋɔ bʋ wa ɩ̃ za, ɩ̃ vɛn nɩra karɩ̃n ɩ̃ dʋ̃waʔ. Naɗɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra karɩ̃n ɩ̃ wa mɩyɛ bɩɛ. Mɩyɩra ʋ karɩ̃n ɩ̃, ɩ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya, tɔŋɔ sii bʋ ɩ za waʔ. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɩ̃ gɔ Ninyɛgɛmɔra na kɩ̃ra na hɩɗan nʋkpuore za na Kirisitira, mʋ gaga kha baa Ninyɛgɛmɔra karɩ̃n ɩ sɩ ɩra.
62002028	Ɩra wɩɛ, mi ɓiiwe, ɩ̃ hɩɗan nʋkpuore za na Kirisitira si le thaaga na ʋ ɓa ɓannɩ, u ɓu na a bʋ na laŋa, hã a ɓa ɓu nɩɩsɛ ʋ wʋɔla za waʔ.
62002029	Baa ɩ̃ tʋ kha Kirisitira telenn ma, ɩ̃ kãn tʋ wa kha nɩra wɩɛ bãa ki le mɩtelenyenye, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa Yekila ɓiye.
62003001	Ĩ ken khɔrɩkpakpapɩra thĩna Siye Yekila khɔrɩn a harɩ na ʋ yɩ a kha ʋɔ ɓiiwe, tɩ̃yara za gbũu, a bʋ wa u ɓiiwe thĩ. Dunuya nɩpɩra tʋ a waʔ, naɗɩɛ pɩ tʋ Yekila waʔ.
62003002	Mɩ nɩkhɔrɩyɔmɛ Kirisitira za, na gɔ kɩ ɩra wɩɛ a bʋ wa Yekila ɓiiwe. Ŋa mɩɩna a ɓa khɩɛgɩ̃n nɩ, a tʋʋn dɩɛ thonn na yɛsɩ̃nn waʔ. Ŋa a tʋʋn ma kha na Kirisitira ɓa ɓann na ɓɔgɔnn u thĩ, a ɓa khɩɛgɩ̃n ʋ wa, naɗɩɛ a ɓa yã ʋ wa ʋ lɔmɩra za.
62003003	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ bʋ na gɩɛ laŋɩra Kirisitira mɩyɩra za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra yɛɗɛ wa u thĩ mʋ gaga kha baa Kirisitira thĩra yɛɗ ɩra.
62003004	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra asɩ wa Yekila sɩɛrɛhãansɩra, naɗɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira kɩ asɩ sɩɛrɛhãansɩra.
62003005	Kɛna ɩ̃ tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha Yesu Kirisitira ɓann ma na ɓu khon mɩbɩ̃yɛliige nɩpɛ za, mɩbɩ̃yɛ sii bʋ ʋ za waʔ.
62003006	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ bʋ Kirisitira za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra le mɩbɩ̃yɛ dʋ̃waʔ. Ŋa nɩra wɩɛ ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra yãar ʋ waʔ, ʋ gbũun tʋʋr ʋ waʔ.
62003007	Mi ɓiiwe, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ nɩra sii kpɛnsɛ ɩ̃ waʔ. Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra ki le mɩtelenyenye, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa nɩtelenyemo mʋ gaga kha baa Kirisitira bʋ nɩtelenyemo ɩra.
62003008	Nɩra wɩɛ ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa Sutana ɓiye naɗɩɛ, na gɔ kɩ harɩ dunuyara tiibɛna, Sutana bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛledaa. Yekila Ɓikhiira ɓann ma na ɓu asɩ Sutana miliinyira.
62003009	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra liin Yekire ɓiye, ʋɔ dɛyɩra le mɩbɩ̃yɛ dʋ̃waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila sɩɛsɩra hɩɗan ma ʋɔ dɛyɩra za mʋ gaga kha ɗiitʋɔrɛ. Ʋ wɔrɩ le mɩbɩ̃yɛ dʋ̃waʔ, naɗɩɛ u liin ma Yekila ɓiye.
62003010	Ĩ ken lɔmɩra za Yekila ɓiiwira na Sutana bɛwɩra wɔrɩ tʋ na kpɩkɩ̃n ɩra. Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra ki le mɩtelenyenye waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna wɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ yaɓiiwe waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ Yekila baa waʔ.
62003011	Naɗɩɛ harɩ gɔbɛna, ĩ nuun sɩɛsɩra ki de kha a kɩ khɔrɩ kamɛ.
62003012	Hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ a le mʋ gaga kha Kayɛ̃ waʔ. Ʋɔ kha bʋ wa Sutana baa kɩ yɩɛn na ʋ khʋʋn ʋ khɩ̃nɩyɛra. Na be liin na ʋ khʋʋr ʋ? Ʋ khʋʋr ʋ wa naɗɩɛ ʋɔ thĩra milewenyira na bɩ̃ɩn ma, na ʋ khɩ̃nɩyɛra bɛyɩra telenni.
62003013	Mɩ yaɓiiwe Kirisitira za, na dunuyara nɩpɩra yãasɩ̃n ɩ̃, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ bamʋŋa khon ĩ waʔ.
62003014	Na aa ʋɔ, aa tʋ wa kha aa kuɗ ɓa huume za na ɓann thakuogo za naɗɩɛ baa a khɔrɩ kamɛ ɩra. Naɗɩɛ na khɔrɩmɛ bʋ wɩɛ za waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa huume leke za harɩ fɩ̃ɩ.
62003015	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ yãasɩ̃n ʋ kãnʋʋna, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa nɩkhʋdaa. Ĩ gbũu tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha nɩkhʋdaa wɔrɩ hɩɗan na thakuokɛɩzuoŋo u thĩ za waʔ.
62003016	Ken lɔmɩra za a tʋ khɔrɩmɩra yo ɩra. Sɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha Yesu Kirisitira hãan ma ʋ thakuogira aa kãma. Na si liin mafɩra, aa tɩ̃, a kãn ma na hã a thakuogira a yaɓiiwira kãma.
62003017	Na nɩra ʋɔ bʋ na ɓudaga, na ʋ yãan ʋ yaɓiye gbɩ̃rɩsɛ za kɩ baɗ ʋ bãanɛ na kɛɩn ʋ dɛnfɛsɛ, mʋsɛ sii ʋ dɛyɩra le ki de kha ʋɔ khɔrɩ wa Yekila?
62003018	Mi ɓiiwe, hã ɩ̃ yɩɛ a khɔrɩmɩra dii nʋʋga sɩɛsɛ, na sɩɛrɛgbʋ̃ɔndeke doro za waʔ, ŋa a ɓɔgɔ a khɔrɩmɩra mɩkɩ̃rɩliige na tɩ̃ya za.
62003019	Sɩɛ za a tʋ kha a bʋ wa tɩ̃ya za, kɩ yɩɛ a hɩɗan na kpolonwuŋo Yekila wʋɔla za.
62003020	Naɗɩɛ na a lɔɓidaara zarɩgɩ̃n a wa, Yekila gbɩ̃n tãra a lɔɓidaara, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ tʋ wa mɩyɛ bɩɛ.
62003021	Mɩ nɩkhɔrɩyɔmɛ, na a lɔɓidaara zarɩgɩ̃n a waʔ, dɩɛ bɛna a hɩɗan ma na laŋa Yekila wʋɔla za,
62003022	kɩ yɩɛ ʋ hã a mɩɩnɛ tʋɔ mɩɩnɛ a yɩ̃n ʋ, naɗɩɛ baa a nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na ʋ sɩɛrɛdewensira na a le u dĩŋora ɩra.
62003023	Ʋ sɩɛrɛdewensira kɩ bʋ kha a khãa u Ɓikhiye Yesu Kirisitira za, kɩ kɩ khɔrɩ kamɛ mʋ gaga kha baa Yesura hãar a sɩɛrɛdewensira ɩra.
62003024	Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na makɩ̃n na ʋ sɩɛrɛdewensira, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa na Yekila, dɩ̃ɩna Yekila bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za. Sɩɛ za a tʋ kha Yekila bʋ a za, u Ninyɛgɛmɔra ʋ hãar a, ʋɔ kãmara za.
62004001	Mɩ nɩkhɔrɩyɔmɛ, nɩpɩra bɩɛ ki de kha bɩɛ bʋ wa na Ninyɛgɛmɔra hã ɩ̃ khãa pɩ bɩɛ za waʔ. Ŋa ɩ̃ kɔrɩsɩ̃n mɩ na ken mi zo na pɩ bʋ na Yekire Nina. Naɗɩɛ tɔndɛyãdedɛgɔmɛ tɩɩn ma dunuyara za.
62004002	Ĩ ken lɔmɩra za ɩ̃ wɔrɩ tʋ Yekila Nina na yo ɩra: Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra ki de kha Yesu Kirisitira ɓann ma na khɩɛn nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiye lɔmɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa Yekire baa.
62004003	Ŋa nɩra wɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ na bɩ sɩɛ waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ Yekila baa waʔ. Ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa na Kirisitira bɩ̃ɩrara nin, ʋɔ wɩɛra ɓamɛ mɩyɛ ĩ nuun harɩ khɔ̃ɩ ɩra, ɩra wɩɛ thĩra ʋ bʋ wa dunuyara za zuori.
62004004	Mi ɓiiwe, ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ bʋ wa Yekila bɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna ĩ ɓuun ma wɔrɩkɔ tɔŋɔyãdedɛrɩwɩra za. Naɗɩɛ, Yekila Nina kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ za, ʋɔ wɔrɩkɩra tãra Kirisitira bɩ̃ɩrara nina ɓann dunuyara za ɩra.
62004005	Tɔŋɔyãdedɛrɩwɩra bʋ wa dunuyara bɛwɛ, gɩɛ yɩɛn na pɩ sɩɛrɛlɔmɩra khɩɛgɩ̃nn na dunuyara sɩɛrɛlɔmɩra, kɩ yɩɛ na dunuya nɩpɩra nuure wi.
62004006	Ŋa aa ʋɔ, aa bʋ wa Yekila bɛwɛ. Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ tʋ Yekila, ʋɔ nuure a wa, ŋa nɩra wɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekire baa waʔ, ʋɔ kɛɩ wa a nuurese. Mafɩra a tʋ khoŋĩn tɩ̃ya Nina na tɔŋɔ baara kamɛ za.
62004007	Mɩ nɩkhɔrɩyɔmɛ, ɩ̃ yɩɛ a khɔrɩ kamɛ, naɗɩɛ khɔrɩmɩra kure wa Yekila za. Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ kãnʋʋna, ʋɔ bʋ wa Yekila ɓiye dɩ̃ɩna ʋ tʋ wa Yekila.
62004008	Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ ʋ kãnʋʋna waʔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra tʋ Yekila waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila bʋ wa khɔrɩmɛ.
62004009	Ĩ ken lɔmɩra za Yekila ɓɔgɔn a ʋ khɔrɩmɩra na yuon ɩra: Ʋ dãan ma u Ɓikhiira kpo kpelila dunuyara za si le thaaga a ɓu thakuothĩnthĩŋira ʋɔ kãmara za.
62004010	Ĩ ken mɩɩna pɩ kʋ̃n kha khɔrɩmɛ ɩra: Aa lugʋn khɔrɩn Yekila waʔ, ŋa ʋɔ khɔrɩn a kɩ dãan u Ɓikhiira na ʋɔ hãan u thĩ mʋ gaga kha thɔgɔnsɛ daɗuoro a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira yafamɛ kãmara za.
62004011	Mɩ nɩkhɔrɩyɔmɛ, na Yekila khɔrɩn a mafɩra, aa tɩ̃ kãn ma na khɔrɩ kamɛ.
62004012	Nɩra sii yiwire khɩɗ Yekila za yãan waʔ. Ŋa na a khɔrɩ kamɛ, sɩɛ ɓɔgɔ wa kha Yekila bʋ wa dɩ̃ɩn a, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ khɔrɩmɩra kɩ bʋ a za, bɩɛ khɔrɩmɩra hĩin ma.
62004013	Ʋ hãar a wa u Ninyɛgɛmɔra, sɩɛ za a tʋ kha a bʋ ʋ za dɩ̃ɩna ʋɔ bʋ a za.
62004014	Aa yãan sɩ wa ki liin sɩ sɩɛrɛwɛ kha Siye Yekila dãan ma u Ɓikhiira na ʋɔ ɓa liin dunuya nɩpɩra zɩ̃ndaa.
62004015	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ ɓa bɩ na de kha Yesura bʋ wa Yekila Ɓikhiye, Yekila bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za dɩ̃ɩna ʋɔ dɛyɩra hɩɗan ma na Yekila kpuore tɩ̃.
62004016	Na aa ʋɔ, khɔrɩmɩra Yekila khɔrɩn a, a tʋʋn ma bɩɛ kɩ khãan pɩ za. Yekila bʋ wa khɔrɩmɛ. Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ bʋ na khɔrɩmɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa na Yekila kpuore, dɩ̃ɩna Yekila bʋ wa na ʋɔ dɛyɩra kpuore.
62004017	Na khɔrɩmɩra gbɩ̃n a za mafɩra, a ɓa hɩɗan ma na laŋa kitiɗɩyãgɩra, naɗɩɛ a dunuyawɩɛ thakuogira khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na Yesu Kirisitira bɛgɩra.
62004018	Khɔrɩmɛ bʋ na ãnabirise waʔ, ŋa khɔrɩthĩnthĩme ɗɛ ɓa ãnabirisira. Naɗɩɛ ãnabirise ɓɔgɔ wa kha gbʋ̃ʋsɛ bʋ wa bʋ. Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ ãn, khɔrɩthĩnthĩme bʋ ʋɔ dɛyɩra za waʔ.
62004019	Na aa ʋɔ, aa bʋ wa na khɔrɩmɛ naɗɩɛ Yekila ʋ lʋgʋn khɔrɩn a.
62004020	Na nɩra ʋɔ de kha ʋɔ khɔrɩ wa Yekila, kɛna ʋ yãasɩ̃nn ma ʋ yaɓiye, ʋ dɛyɩra bʋ wa tɔndaa. Iyo ʋ yaɓiira ʋ yã, na ʋ khɔrɩ ʋɔ waʔ, mʋsɛ u le kɩ wɔrɩ khɔrɩ Yekila ʋ yã waʔ ɩra?
62004021	Ĩ ken sɩɛrɛdewensira Kirisitira hãar a ɩra: Na nɩra wɩɛ khɔrɩ Yekila, ʋ kãn ma na khɔrɩ ʋ yaɓiira tɩ̃.
62005001	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ khãa sɩ za kha Yesura kɩ bʋ Yekila nɩthɩ̃rɩkhoromora, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa Yekila ɓiye. Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ siye, ʋɔ dɛyɩra khɔrɩ wa u ɓiiwira tɩ̃.
62005002	Na a khɔrɩ Yekila na a nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na ʋ sɩɛrɛdewensira, sɩɛ za a tʋ kha a khɔrɩ Yekila ɓiiwira.
62005003	Naɗɩɛ, na khɔrɩ Yekila, sɩɛ kɩ bʋ na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na ʋ sɩɛrɛdewensira. Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛdewensira nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀sɛ hʋgan waʔ,
62005004	naɗɩɛ nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ bʋ Yekila ɓiye, ʋɔ ɓu wa wɔrɩkɔ dunuyara za. Mɩɩna gbũun liin thaagɩra na gɩɛ wɔrɩkɩɛ ɓu dunuyara za, dɩɛ kɩ bʋ a khãamɩra.
62005005	Ãna kpuo kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ dunuyara za? Fɔ nɩra wɩɛ kɩ khãa sɩ za kha Yesura kɩ bʋ Yekila Ɓikhiira.
62005006	Ʋɔ Yesu Kirisiti wɩɛ ɓann ma na ʋ ãyike ãmɛ, dɩ̃ɩna u huumira tarɩmɩra. Ʋ ɓann na ãmɛ doro waʔ, ŋa ʋ ɓann ma na ãmɛ dɩ̃ɩna tarɩmɛ. Ninyɛgɛmɔra kɩ bʋ sɩ sɩɛrɛra, naɗɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra bʋ wa tɩ̃ya.
62005007	Sɩɛrɛwɛ sãa kɩ bʋ.
62005008	Ninyɛgɛmɔra, na ãmɛ, na tarɩmɛ. Bɩɛ sɩɛrɛbɩɛ de ɓa mɩɩnɛ kpo.
62005009	Na a bɩ wa nɩpɛ sɩɛrɛwɩra pɩ hã, sɩɛrɛra Yekila hãarɩ, ʋɔ gbɩ̃n tãra nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe baara. Sɩɛrɛra Yekila hãarɩ, ʋɔ liin wɩɛra ʋ hãan u ɓikhiira mɩyɩra za.
62005010	Nɩra wɩɛ kɩ khãa Yekila Ɓikhiira za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa na ʋɔ sɩɛrɛwɩɛ u thĩ za. Ŋa nɩra wɩɛ kɩ khãa Yekila za waʔ, ʋɔ le wa Yekila mʋ gaga kha tɔndaa, naɗɩɛ sɩɛrɛra Yekila hã u Ɓikhiira mɩyɩra za, ʋ dɛyɩra khãa ʋɔ za waʔ.
62005011	Ʋɔ sɩɛrɛwɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha Yekila hãar a wa thakuokɛɩzuoŋo, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ ki ɓu u Ɓikhiira za ɩra.
62005012	Nɩra wɩɛ za ʋɔ Ɓikhiiwɩɛ bʋ, gɩɛ thakuogira bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra za. Ŋa nɩra wɩɛ za ʋɔ Ɓikhiiwɩɛ bʋ waʔ, gɩɛ thakuogira bʋ ʋɔ dɛyɩra za waʔ.
62005013	Mɩ sɛwɛn ma wɛsɩɛ na hãar ɩ̃, si le thaaga ɩ̃ tʋ kha ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãa Yekila Ɓikhiira za, thakuokɛɩzuoŋira bʋ wa ĩ heke.
62005014	Laŋɩra kɩ bʋ a heke Yekila wʋɔla ʋ, gɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha na a yɩ̃nn ʋ mɩɩnɛ tʋɔ mɩɩnɛ na makɩ̃n na u dĩŋora, u nuure a wa.
62005015	A tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha Yekila nuure wa a yɩ̃mɩra. Mafɩra, mɩɩnɛ tʋɔ mɩɩnɛ a yɩ̃n ʋ, a yɩɛ kɛɩ ɓu ri waʔ.
62005016	Na nɩra ʋɔ yãan na ʋ yaɓiye ʋɔ le mɩbɩ̃yɛ wɛʔɛ ki yo u huume za waʔ, ʋ dɛyɩra yɩ̃n hã ʋɔ yaɓiiwɩɛ. Yekire ɓa hã ʋ thakuogo. Wɛpɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɛliige ki yii wi huume za, bɩɛ mɩyɛ mi de waʔ. Ŋa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige gʋɔ bʋ, gɩɛ yo wa na nɩra huume za. Gɩɛ mɩbɩ̃yɩɛliigira siira za mi de kha Yekire yɩ̃ŋɩra le hã waʔ.
62005017	Mɩkɛɩtelenyenye bɩɛ bʋ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige, ŋa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige gʋɔ bʋ, gɩɛ yo na nɩra huume za waʔ.
62005018	A tʋ wa kha Yekire ɓiye kɛɩ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige, naɗɩɛ Yekila Ɓikhiira kɩ kanɛ ʋ Sutana wɔrɩ pho ʋ za waʔ.
62005019	A tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha a bʋ wa Yekila bɛwɛ, ŋa dunuya nɩpɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa Sutana leke za.
62005020	A tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za tɩ̃ kha Yekila Ɓikhiira ɓann ma, na hãar a wʋɔmɛ si le thaaga a wɔrɩ tʋ tɩ̃ya Yekila thĩra. Mafɩra, a bʋ wa tɩ̃ya Yekila bɛwɛ, naɗɩɛ baa aa na u Ɓikhiye Yesu Kirisitira bʋ nʋʋnɛ kpo ɩra. Ʋɔ kɩ bʋ tɩ̃ya Yekila dɩ̃ɩna thakuokɛɩzuoŋira.
62005021	Mi ɓiiwe, ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ na sɩ̃nthɔgɔŋɩra.
63001001	Mɩɛ wɩɛra liin nɩkhãgara, mɩɛ kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ. Mɩ dãa hã ʋ wa mʋɔ wɩɛra liin hala Yekila kenn khonn dɩ̃ɩna mu ɓiiwira, ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ mɩ khɔrɩ tɩ̃yara za ɩra. Mɩɛ kpo kɩ khɔrɩ ɩ̃ waʔ, ŋa wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ tʋ tɩ̃yara ɩra.
63001002	Mɩ khɔrɩ ɩ̃ wa naɗɩɛ baa tɩ̃yara bʋ a kpolonsira ɩra, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ ɓa hɩɗan a wa kũu.
63001003	Siye Yekila na u Ɓikhiye Yesu Kirisitira bɩɛ fɩ̃ɩ a za, na makarɩ a za, kɩ hã a kpolonwuoŋo si le thaaga a hɩɗan tɩ̃yara dɩ̃ɩna khɔrɩmɩra za.
63001004	Mɩ yãgayãgan ma gbaangbo baa mi nuun kha mu ɓiiwe bʋɔ nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ wa na tɩ̃yara na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ a Siye Yekila deɗ a kha a le ɩra.
63001005	Ɩra wɩɛ hárà, mɩ yɩ̃n mʋ wa kha a kɩ khɔrɩ kamɛ. Sɩɛ bʋ Sɩɛrɛdewenfɛnsɛ waʔ, ŋa wɛsɩɛ a ɓuun harɩ gɔbɛna, sɩɛ ɩ.
63001006	Khɔrɩmɩra kɔla kɩ bʋ na nɩ̀ɩrɛ̀ na makɩ̃n na Yekila sɩɛrɛdewensira. Sɩɛ sɩɛrɛdewensɩɛ ĩ nuun harɩ gɔbɛna ni, sɩɛ ɩ̃ kãn kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ sɩ.
63001007	Tɔŋɔ karɩ̃ndɛgɔmɛ tɩɩn ma dunuyara za. Bɩɛ bɩ sɩ kha Yesura ɓann na ɓa liin u thĩ nɩthɩ̃rɩga waʔ. Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ bʋ wa tɔndɛwɛ dɩ̃ɩna Kirisiti bɩ̃ɩrawɛ.
63001008	Ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ, hã ĩ ɓa le laʔ a miliinsira tɔ̃nɩna waʔ, ŋa ĩ ɓu sɩ taasɩra.
63001009	Nɩra tʋɔ nɩra ki thuo Kirisitira karɩ̃na waʔ, ŋa kɩ sɩɛ wa dʋɔ ʋ za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ na Yekila waʔ. Nɩra wɩɛ ki thuo Kirisitira karɩ̃na, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa na Siye Yekila mʋ gaga kha baa ʋ bʋ na u Ɓikhiira ɩra.
63001010	Na nɩra ʋɔ thiyen ĩ heke ni kɛna ʋ karɩ̃na na Kirisiti baara liin kpuore waʔ, hã ɩ̃ bɩ ʋɔ dɛyɩra gĩi ĩ heke waʔ, hã ɩ̃ɛ thĩra thɩɛ ʋ waʔ.
63001011	Naɗɩɛ na nɩra wɩɛ thɩɛr ʋ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra nii hɩɗan ma u miliinbɩ̃ɩsɩra za.
63001012	Mɩgɔnyɛ bʋ mi heke na de ĩ, ŋa mɩ ɓɩɛ na de ĩ sɩ lɛtɩrɩ za waʔ, naɗɩɛ mɩ gagasɛ bʋ wa na thiye ĩ heke na yã ɩ̃ yiwire kɩ yɩɛ a sɩɛrɛ na kamɛ nʋʋga na nʋʋga si le thaaga a yãgayãga kpuore na kɩ̃ra.
63001013	Mʋ hakãrana Yekila kenn khonni, ʋɔ ɓiiwira bʋ thɩɛ mʋ.
64001001	Mɩɛ wɩɛrɛ kɩ bʋ Nɩkhãgara, mɩɛ kɩ dãa lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na hã mʋɔ Gayusi ʋ. Mʋ mɩyɛ gbɩ̃ra wa mɩ za thĩ tɩ̃yara za, mɩ khɔrɩ mʋ wa.
64001002	Mɩ yɛsɛkhogbɩ̃ra, mɩ khɔrɩ wa kha mu ɓu thaaga mɩyɛ bɩɛ za. Mɩ khɔrɩ wa tɩ̃ kha mʋ hɩɗan koroŋoronse za, mʋ gaga kha baa mu ɓuun thaaga Yekila khɩ̃na nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za ɩra.
64001003	Mɩ yãgayãgan ma gbaangbo baa a yaɓiiwe bʋɔ kuɗ ni ɓann na deɗ ɓi kha mʋ bʋ tɩ̃yara za, dɩ̃ɩna mu yo wa wʋɔrɛ kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ na tɩ̃yara.
64001004	Mɩɩnɛ sii hã mɩɛ bãanwuoŋo na tãra baa mi nu kha mi ɓiiwira bʋ wa kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ kɩ makɩ̃n na tɩ̃yara waʔ.
64001005	Mɩ yɛsɛkhogbɩ̃ra, mʋ bʋ wa nʋʋnɛ kpo nɩra mu milewenyira bɩɛ mu le kɩ hã yaɓiiwira ɩra, harɩ wɛpɛ kɩ bʋ khɩ̃rɩwɛ mu heke.
64001006	Bɩɛ hãan ma sɩɛrɛwɛ mʋ khɔrɩmɩra mɩyɩra za a egilizi nɩpɩra wʋɔla ʋ. Mɩ ɓɩɛ sɩ wa mu heke kha mʋ dɛnfɛ wɩ pɩ sɩrɩyuogira za na dɛnfɛsɛ bãa makɩ̃nn Yekila wʋɔla ʋ.
64001007	Naɗɩɛ Kirisitira miliinsira kãmara za pi kuɗ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀sɩra za, pɩ bɩɩn zɩ̃nn kɛɩkhãadɛwɛ dɛnfɛsɩra waʔ.
64001008	Aa kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kãn ma tɩ̃ kɩ dɛnfɛ bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ siira na kɩ̃ra si le thaaga a niin hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩn mɩ tɩ̃ya miliinsira za.
64001009	Mɩ sɛwɛn ma lɛtɩrɩ kpekpereɗe dʋɔ na hãan ĩ egilizi nɩpɩra, ŋa Diyotɩrɛfɩ kɩ khɔrɩ na hɩɗan mɩyɛ bɩɛ wʋɔla za, ʋɔ nu a bɛrɛ waʔ.
64001010	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, na mɩ ɓa thiyeri, mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ u lelɔmɩra. Mɩ ɓa yɛsɩ̃n ɩ̃ lɔmɩra za ʋ tɔn na u de sɩɛrɛbɩ̃ɩsɛ kɩ hã a ɩra. Sɩɛ doro u waʔ, ʋ gɔ yaɓiiwe khɩ̃rɩsɛ waʔ, wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ na gɔ pɩ khɩ̃rɩsɛ, ʋ barɩ wa bɩɛ kɩ ɗɛ kuse wi egilizira za.
64001011	Mɩ yɛsɛkhogbɩ̃ra, hã mu thuosĩn mɩbɩ̃yɛ waʔ, ŋa thuosĩn mɩkɩ̃rɩyɛ. Nɩra wɩɛ ki le mɩkɩ̃rɩyɛ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bʋ wa Yekire baa, nɩra wɩɛ ki le mɩbɩ̃yɛ, ʋɔ tʋ Yekila waʔ.
64001012	Demetiriyusira ʋɔ, nɩpɛ bɩɛ yɩ ɓa ʋ yɩsɩnʋʋga, tɩ̃ya bʋ wa ʋ sɩɛrɛ. Aa tɩ̃, aa yɩ ɓa ʋ yɩsɩnʋʋga. Mu gbũu tʋʋmɛ bʋ sɩ za kha a sɩɛrɛra bʋ wa tɩ̃ya.
64001013	Mɩgɔnyɛ bʋ mi heke na de ɓu, ŋa mɩ ɓɩɛ na de ɓu sɩ lɛtɩrɩ za waʔ.
64001014	Mɩ khɔrɩ wa na khʋ̃ɔfɩ̃n yã mʋ, dɩɛ bɛna na a yiwiye liin iyĩi a ɓa kpɔrɩ na kamɛ.
64001015	Yekire hã mʋ kpolonwuoŋo. Mʋ yɛsɛwɩra bɩɛ bʋ thɩɛ mʋ. Mʋɔ tɩ̃, thɩɛ a yɛsɛwɩra bɩɛ kpo kpo kpo.
65001001	Mɩɛ Zudi liin Yesu Kirisiti miliinɓiye dɩ̃ɩna Zakɩ khɩ̃nɩyɛ, mɩɛ kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na hã wɛpɩɛ Siye Yekila yɩɗɩ kha pi le ʋɔ bɛwɛ. Ʋ khɔrɩ pɩ wa, dɩ̃ɩna Yesu Kirisitira kɩ tɩɛgɛ wɩ.
65001002	Yekila makarɩ ɩ̃ za, na hã ɩ̃ kpolonwuoŋo, ki hĩɗe ĩ na ʋ khɔrɩmɩra gbaangbo.
65001003	Mɩ yɛsɛgbɩ̃rɩwɛ, mɩ kha khɔrɩ wa thĩ na sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩ na dãa hã ɩ̃ na gbũu a bɩɛ zɩ̃mɩra mɩyɛ za. Ŋa ɩra wɩɛ, sɩ bʋ wa faŋa mi le si na ɓu hã ɩ̃ haɓɛ ɩ̃ wɔrɩ khɛ̃ɩgɩ̃n khãamɩra kãmara za, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ Yekila hãan ʋ nɩpɩra bãnɩkpo kpelila.
65001004	Naɗɩɛ, wɛpɩɛ kɛɩn Yekila, pi zuun lonn ma ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za. Pɩ wã ɓa Yekila fɩ̃ɩmɩra mɩyɩra na ɓu le kakarɩmɩyɛ kɩ kɛɩ Yesu Kirisitira ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ a Thadɛyɩra na a Adɛyɩra kpo kpelila ɩra. Yekila sɛwʋra deɗ ɓa pi kitira mɩyɛ harɩ khɔ̃ɩ.
65001005	Ɩ̃ yɩɛ mɩ kʋɔgɩ̃n ɩ̃ na mɩyɛ yʋɔ harɩ na ɩ̃ tʋ ɩ wa kɩ̃raŋɩra. Adɛyɩra zɩ̃nn kusen ma ʋ nɩpɛ Ɩsɩrayɛlɩwɩra Eziwiti sɩrɩgɩra ʋ. Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, wɛpɩɛ kha ɓɩɛ na khãa ʋ za waʔ, na ʋ yɩɛn na bɩɛ huuri.
65001006	Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na mɛlɛgɛwɩra na tʋʋn gɔɗ wɔrɩkɩra na hãan mɩ waʔ ɩra, pɩ na zɩɛn ma pɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́khɛyɩra. Mafɩra, Yekila gɔɗ vɔɗ zɩɛn mɩ wa dabirigbɛmʋŋɛ za kũu kɩ kɩ tɩɛ kiti ɗɩyãgagbʋ̃ɔŋɩra.
65001007	Ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na Sodɔmʋ na Gomɔɔrɩra na sɩ lɔsɛ gbonsira mɩyɛ. Sɩ nɩpɩra liin ma mɩbɩ̃yɛ gbaangbo. Pɩ na hãan ma pi thĩ kakarɩliige za, harɩ kɩ kɩ ɓɩɛ daɗuorowe. Yekila yɩɛn mɩ wa na pi so nakɛɩbĩiŋe za si ɓu le mɩɓɔyɔnɛ nɩpɛ bɩɛ heke.
65001008	Ɩ̃ sʋgʋmʋra za, bɩɛ nɩbɩ̃ɩbɩɛ gaga wa tɔŋɔ mɩyɛ na pi le mʋ gaga kha sɩɛ gbonsira nɩpɩra, pi teɗe wa pi thĩ na ɩɛ mɩyɩra, kɩ kɛɩ Yekila thadɛrɩsɛ na pɩ kʋsa ʋ mɛlɛgɛyɛgɛmɩra.
65001009	Harɩ mɛlɛgɛwɛ thadɛyɩra pɩ yɩ kha Misɛlɩra, bɛna ʋɔ na Sutana kha khɛ̃ɩ ki bo Moyizi kpɩ̃ɩgɩra za, ʋ bɩɩn kʋsan Sutana waʔ, ŋa u deɗ u wa doro kha: «Adɛyɩra kɩ ɓa taa mʋ.»
65001010	Ŋa bɩɛ nɩbɩ̃ɩbɩɛ kpãa wa mɩyɩra pɩ tʋ waʔ ɩra. Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ gaga kɩ tʋ le mɩɩnɛ waʔ. Pi le wa mʋ gaga kha gbaŋadaawɛ. Sɩɛ ki yii wi asɩmɛ khɩ̃na za.
65001011	Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa pɩ bɛgɛ naɗɩɛ baa pi liin mʋ gaga kha baa Kayɛ̃ liiri, pi ɓilen ma mʋ gaga kha Balamʋ tigiye kãma, pɩ bɛsɛ asɩn ma, naɗɩɛ baa pɩ paragadãnn mʋ gaga kha Kore ɩra.
65001012	Iyo, bɩɛ kɩ ɓan na yãgamɩŋɩra bɛna ɩ̃ɛ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ hɩɗan kha ɩ̃ɛ ɗi kpuore ɩra. Pɩ nɩɩ ɗiime thaaga za waʔ, pɩ bʋ wa na lɔwʋgɔ, pɩ ɓɩɛ wa bɩɛ doro hĩime. Pɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha dadʋ̃nɩsɛ wɛsɛ sarɩmɛ khɛ kɩ tãra sɩ kɛɩ le adaga ɩra. Pɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha dahasɛ ki sen sɩ bɛnɛ za waʔ, wɛsɩɛ phugĩn na huun pere.
65001013	Pɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ ãnkhowuse, pi kuse wa pɩ nɩɩlaʔmɩyɩra mʋ gaga kha ãnkhʋka. Pɩ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha khʋsaɓiye wɛʔɛ ki ɗen i thĩ za. Yekila zɩɛn san mɩ wa dabirigbɛmʋkpakpaka kũu.
65001014	Adama kpɩ̃raɓiiwe hɩɗankhɛyɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra kɩ bʋ Yekire yãdedaa Enɔkɩ. Ʋɔ Yekire yãdedaa Enɔkɩra sɩɛsɩra na deɗ hãan ma bɩɛ kha: «Ken Adɛyɩra na ʋ ɓan na ʋ mɛlɛgɛ gboko,
65001015	na kiti nɩpɛ bɩɛ. Kɩ yɩɛ kiti wa nɩbɩ̃ɩwɛ za, naɗɩɛ baa pɩ paragadãnn na liin mɩkarɩyɛ ki deɗ sɩɛrɛbɩ̃ɩsɛ na hãan Yekila ɩra.»
65001016	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ wʋɔyɛ wɔrɩ hĩin mɩɩnɛ za kũu waʔ. Pɩ bʋ wa ki wũugĩn kɛɩ gbaa na pi thuo pi yebɩ̃ɩga. Pi de ɓa sɩɛrɛgbʋ̃ɔnsɛ na pɩ fʋ̃n nɩpɛ na ɓu ɓu mɩɩnɛ pi heke.
65001017	Mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, ɩ̃ kʋɔgɩ̃n na Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira dãarawɛ sɩɛsɩra pɩ na deɗ ĩ harɩ khɔ̃ɩra ɩra.
65001018	Pɩ na deɗ ĩ wa kha: «Bɛnphɩlɩyana za, nɩpɛ bʋɔ ɓa arɩ kɩ lʋgʋtɩ̃n, kɩ kɛɩ Yekila, pɩ ɓa ki le wa pɩ mɩyɛ na makɩ̃n na pi yebɩ̃ɩgɩra.»
65001019	Bɩɛ ki yii kpɩkɩ̃ŋɩra kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra tɩɛ, nɩthɩ̃rɩgagasɛ doro kɩ bʋ pɩ za, pɩ bʋ na Yekila Nina waʔ.
65001020	Ŋa mɩ yaɓikhɔrɩyɔmɛ, ɩ̃ɛ ʋɔ, ɩ̃ pɛ̃ɩ kɩ dɛnfɛ kamɛ ki yo wʋɔrɛ ɩ̃ khãayɛgɛmɩra za. Ɩ̃ kɩ yɩ̃n Yekila na Ninyɛgɛmɔra wɔrɩkɩra.
65001021	Ɩ̃ hɩɗan Yekila khɔrɩmɩra za, kɩ lan a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira za. Baa ʋ kɩ̃ra, ʋ ɓa hã ɩ̃ wa thakuokɛɩzuoŋo Yekila heke ni.
65001022	Wɛpɛ khãamɛ kɩ gbɩ̃n waʔ, ɩ̃ makarɩ bɩɛ za.
65001023	Bʋɔra, ɩ̃ zɩ̃n mɩ zahanama naagɩra ʋ. Ɩ̃ makarɩ gbupɩra bʋɔra za tɩ̃, ŋa ɩ̃ tʋ gɔ ĩ thĩ, ɩ̃ yãasɩ̃n pɩ mɩlewenyira teɗ ɩra, mʋ gaga kha pɩ gbɔgɔlɔ̃nsira teɗ pɩ mɩbɩ̃ɩliigira kãmara za ɩra.
65001024	Gbɩ̃nɛsɛ bʋ wa Yekire kpo kpelira bɛsɛ, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ khɛ a Adɛyɛ Yesu Kirisitira na zɩ̃n zɩɛ a ɩra! Ʋɔ kɩ wɔrɩ barɩ ɩ̃ hã ɩ̃ wa mɩbɩ̃yɛliige za waʔ. Na yɩɛ ʋ ʋ ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra za, ʋ wɔrɩ le wa thaaga ɩ̃ hɩɗan kɛɩ le ɓilenkhɛrɛ, kɩ yɩɛ ĩ hĩi na bãanwuoŋo ʋ wʋɔla za. Ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ, na gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, na wɔrɩkɔ, na faŋa bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛsɛ na gɔɗ kɩ harɩ khɔ̃ɩ, na ɩra wɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna bãanyɛ bɩɛ kũu kɛɩ gbaa. Amiina.
66001001	Sɛwʋgɩɛ bʋ wa na tɩ̃ya sɩɛrɛgurense, wɛsɩɛ Yesu Kirisitira yɩɛn na sɩ kɔrɩwɩra bɩɛ tʋʋn na yɛɗ ɩra. Yekila yɩɛn ma na Yesu Kirisitira tʋʋn ɩɛ mɩyɩra, na ɓu ɓɔgɔ u miliinɓiiwira wɛsɩɛ kɩ ɓa nan fara na dɔbɛnɛ dʋɔ. Kirisitira dãan ma ʋ mɛlɛgɛ na u yo yɩɛn na u miliinɓiye Zã tʋʋn ɩɛ mɩyɩra.
66001002	Zãna liin ma ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ sɩɛrɛ na deɗ kha mɩyɩra bɩɛ ʋɔ yãarɩ, ɩ bɩɛ bʋ wa Yekila sɩɛsɛ, dɩ̃ɩna Yesu Kirisitira ki de si kha sɩ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya sɩɛsɛ.
66001003	Wɩɛ bãa kɩ ɓa arɩga u yĩndolon na karɩ̃n sɛwʋgɩɛ sɩɛsɩra Yekila thĩra hãarɩ, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɛgɛ, dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ ki nuure sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra na gɔ sɩ, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa bɩɛ dɛrɩwɩra baa. Iyo bɛna ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ ɓa le, tɩ bɛna yĩminn ma.
66001004	Mɩɛ Zã kɩ sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dã hã egiliziwe wãnɩyɔ̃ra, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Azi sɩrɩgɩra za ɩra. Yekila kɩ bʋ, dɩ̃ɩna ʋɔ kpuola kha bʋ khɔ̃ɩra, dɩ̃ɩna ʋɔ kpuola kɩ ɓan, ʋɔ na ʋ nimira wãnɩyɔ̃ra kɩ bʋ, ʋ ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla za fɩ, ʋɔ fɩ̃ɩmɩra na ʋ wɔyĩkira hɩɗan ɩ̃ za.
66001005	Yesu Kirisitira, ʋɔ wɩɛra liin Yekila sɩɛrɛra ɩɛ mɩyɩɛ za, ʋɔ bʋ hã ɩ̃ dɩɛ thɩɛ kpuola tɩ̃. Yesu Kirisitira liin lʋgʋ nɩrara alɩn na kuɗ huumira za, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ dunuyara nɩpɩra bɩɛ thadɛyɩra, ʋ khɔrɩ a wa, ʋ zɩ̃nn a wa na khonn a mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za ʋ tarɩmɩra gboɓira kãmara za.
66001006	U liin ma aa ʋ nɩpɛ, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ ɩyara. U liir a wa kperekpiidɛwɛ a ɓu liige na hã u Siye Yekila. Gbɩ̃nɛsɛ na wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ! Amiina.
66001007	Ken, Yesura ɓa ɓan ma dadʋ̃nɩsɛ za. Nɩpɛ bɩɛ ɓa yã ʋ na yiwire, harɩ wɛpɩɛ na gbʋ̃ʋn kpɛ̃ɩr ʋ na tamara, pɩ bɩɛ ɓa yã ʋ. Dunuyara thĩnyira bɩɛ ɓa fʋʋ ʋ mɩyɛ kãma za. Iyo, mafɩra si gbũu ɓa le thĩ. Amiina.
66001008	Adɛyɛ Yekila deɗ ɓa kha: «Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ Alifa na Omega, wɩɛra kɩ bʋ, na ʋ kha bʋ, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ ɓa ɓan ɩra. Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ wɔrɩkɔ dɛyɩra.»
66001009	Mɩɛ Zã, kɩ bʋ ɩ̃ yaɓiye ʋɔ, mɩ khʋɔ wa vɛnsɛ na ɩ̃ɛ kpuore. Mɩ bʋ wa Yekila ɩɩga ɓiye na ɩ̃ɛ kpuore, dɩ̃ɩna a pɛ̃ɩ wa ki yo wʋɔrɛ kpuore Yesura za. Mɩ kha bʋ wa khaarɛ dʋɔ za. Dɩɛ khaala vĩin mirin ma na ãmɛ, dɩ̃ɩna pɩ yɩ tɩ wa kha Patɩmɔsɩ. Pɩ khɩɛn yuon mi wa ni naɗɩɛ baa mɩɛ de Yekila sɩɛsɩra, ki liin Yesura tɩ̃ya dedaa ɩra.
66001010	Ɗɩyãgɩra zɩɛn hãa Yekila; gɩɛ ɗiyãgɩra na Ninyɛgɛmɔ sũnn mɩɛ za, na mi nuun nʋʋga gʋɔ na kɩ kʋ̃nn mɩɛ kpɩ̃ra gɛŋɛ na faŋa mʋ gaga kha tũune.
66001011	Nʋʋgɩra kha de ɓa kha: «Mɩyɩra mʋ yã mɩra, sɛwɛ ɩ bɩɛ na dãa hã egiliziwe wãnɩyɔ̃ra ɩ: Efɛzɩ egilizi, na Simirini egilizi, na Pɛrɛgamʋ egilizi, na Tiyatiri egilizi, na Sarɩdɩ egilizi, na Filadɛlifi egilizi, dɩ̃ɩna Lawodise egilizi.»
66001012	Baa mi nuun gɩɛ nʋʋgɩra, na mɩ vɩɗ dãan wʋɔrɛ kha mɩɛ ken dɛyɩra kɩ sɩɛrɛ dɩ̃ɩn mɩ. Baa mɩ vɩɗ dãa wʋɔla, fɩtanɩ tũnkhɛyɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ mɩ yãarɩ, pɩ na liir i wa na sãnɩ doro.
66001013	Na mɩ yãan mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ ɩɛ fɩtanɩ tũnkhɛyɛ wãnɩyɔra sʋgʋmʋra za, tɩ na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na nɩthɩ̃rɩga. U na yiin ma gbɔgɔlɔ̃ngbʋ̃ɔŋɔ ki kpenn ŋi na sãnɩ kagara bãana za.
66001014	Ʋ thayĩnsira kha bʋ wa sɩ vɩrɩsɛ phɩphɩ mʋ gaga kha phumugure, sɩ kha fɩ̃ɩ wa thĩ. U yiwiyira kha so ɓa mʋ gaga kha naɗewire.
66001015	Ʋ ɗɩɛsɩra kha yɩ̃ŋa wa mʋ gaga kha sɛɩkhɩ̃ɩyɩ̃ŋaraŋa, ʋ nʋʋgɩra kʋ̃mɩra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na lagagowure urume.
66001016	Ʋ na gɔɗ ɓa khʋsaɓiye wãnɩyɔ̃ u leɗĩŋira za, dɩ̃ɩna nʋʋnyɛ yɔ̃ sɔrɔna kha kure wa ʋ nʋʋgɩra za. Ʋ wʋɔla kha so ɓa mʋ gaga kha khɩɛkpãngbãŋa.
66001017	Baa mɩ yãar ʋ, na mɩ waan ʋ ɗɩɛsɩra lɔkɩra ʋ fɩ na gbɩrɩnɩ. Ŋa na u phoɗ mɩ za na u leɗĩŋira ki deɗ kha: «Hã mʋ ãn waʔ, mɩɛ kɩ bʋ lʋgʋ nɩrara dɩ̃ɩna phɩlɩyanɩrara.
66001018	Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ thakonɩrara. Mɩ na huun ma, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ mɩ bʋ wa thakuogo za kũu, mi hu dʋ̃waʔ. Mɩ bʋ wa na wɔrɩkɔ huumira za, dɩ̃ɩna khaala za nɩhuomira bʋ ɩra.
66001019	Sɛwɛ wɛsɩɛ mʋ yãan mɩra, mɩyɩra ki le ɩra wɩɛ, na mɩyɩra kɩ ɓa ɓan ɩra.
66001020	Khʋsaɓiye wãnɩyɔ̃ra mʋ yãan mi leɗĩŋira za, dɩ̃ɩna sãnɩ fɩtanɩ tũnkhɛyɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra, ken i gũniwira: Khʋsaɓiye wãnɩyɔ̃ra kɩ bʋ egiliziwe wãnɩyɔ̃ra mɛlɛgɛwɩra, dɩ̃ɩna fɩtanɩ tũnkhɛyɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra kɩ bʋ egiliziwe wãnɩyɔ̃ra.»
66002001	«Sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã mɛlɛgɛra kɩ tɩɛgɛ Efɛzɩ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra ɩra kha u de pi kha: “Wɩɛra kɩ gɔ khʋsaɓiye wãnɩyɔ̃ra u leɗĩŋira za na ʋ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ sãnɩ fɩtanɩmɛ tũnkhɛyɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra sʋgʋmʋra za, ken sɩɛsɩra ki kure ʋ nʋʋgɩra za ɩra.
66002002	Mɩ tʋ mu miliinyira, mɩ tʋ mʋ pɛ̃ɩmɩra na mʋ baɓɩra. Mɩ tʋ wa kha mʋ wɔrɩ ba mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛrɩwɩra mɩyɩra waʔ. Bʋɔ de ɓa kha bɩɛ bʋ wa Yesu dãarawɛ, kɛna Yesu dãarawɛ kɩ bʋ wɩ waʔ. Mʋ kɔrɩsɩ̃nn mɩ wa harɩ na yo yãan tʋʋn kha pɩ bʋ wa tɔndɛwɛ.
66002003	Mʋ baɗ ɓa, mu ɓuun ma vɛnsɛ mɩɛ kãma za, mʋ yɩɛn na mʋ gbɔɗɛ huun mu waʔ.
66002004	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, mɩ ɓa yɩɛ kɛɩ zarɩgɩ̃n mʋ waʔ, naɗɩɛ lɔmɩra za mʋ kha khɔrɩ mɩ lʋgʋsɩra za, mʋ zɩɛn ma bɩɛ khɔrɩmɩra.
66002005	Gaga na ken baa mʋ zɩɛn bɩɛ lɔmɩra na waan ɩra. Vɩkɩ̃n mʋ lɔmɩra kɩ zɩɛ mʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira na vɩkɩ̃n mu kpoloŋira, kɩ khɛ mʋ lʋgʋ lɔnkɩ̃rɩwɩra. Na mʋ kɛɩn sɩɛ, mɩ ɓa ɓan ma mu heke na khɛ mʋ fɩtanɩra tũnkhɛla, u boɗa za.
66002006	Sɩɛ bɩɛ za, kɛna mɩɩnɛ tikpo bʋ mʋ za wɛtɛ kɩ nʋʋn mɩɛ. Mʋ yãasɩ̃nn ma Nikola kpɩ̃ra nɩpɩra mɩlewenyira mʋ gaga kha mɩɛ.”»
66002007	«Wɩɛ bʋ na numiye na nuure, ʋ dɛyɩra nuure wɛsɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra bu de Kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra ɩra! “Na wɩɛ bãa ɓa ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ, thakuodahagɩra kɩ bʋ Yekila dahahʋʋgɩra za, mɩ ɓa hã ʋ gɩɛ ɓigira gʋɔ u ɗi.”»
66002008	«Sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã mɛlɛgɛra kɩ tɩɛgɛ Simirini kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra ɩra kha u de pi kha: “Wɩɛra kɩ bʋ lʋgʋnɩrara na ʋɔ kpuola kɩ bʋ phɩlɩyanɩrara, ʋɔ wɩɛra na huuri, ki gbũu alɩnɩ, ken u sɩɛsɩra.
66002009	Mɩ tʋ mʋ vɛnsɩra na mʋ bʋɔmɩra, (kɛna mʋ bʋ wa ɓudanɩra!) Wɛpɩɛ ki de kha bɩɛ bʋ wa Yawutuwe kɛna pɩ bʋ Yawutuwe waʔ, kʋsabɩ̃ɩyɩra pɩ kʋsa mʋ, mɩ tʋ ɩɛ bɩɛ. Pi bĩŋingboɗa nɩpɩra bʋ wa Sutana bɛrɛ.
66002010	Mʋ ɓa vɛn gbaangbo, ŋa hã mʋ ɓa ãn waʔ. Nuure, Sutana ɓa yɩɛ pɩ gɔ ɩ̃ bʋɔ na yiin ĩ kaso za, na zɩɛ ken na ɩ̃ ɓa bɩ na zɩɛ khãamɩra, pɩ ɓa vɛnɛ ɩ̃ na nan khɩɛwɛ gbũne. Le nʋʋnɛ kpo nɩra harɩ na pɩ khʋ mʋ wa. Na mu liin sɩɛ, mɩ ɓa taa mʋ na thakuokɛɩzuoŋo.”»
66002011	«Wɩɛ bʋ na numiye na nuure, ʋ dɛyɩra nuure wɛsɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra bu de Kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra ɩra! “Wɩɛ bãa kɩ ɓa ɓu wɔrɩkɔ, bãnɩyɔ̃ huumɩra ɓa wɔrɩ le ʋɔ dɛyɩra dʋɔ waʔ.”»
66002012	«Sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã mɛlɛgɛra kɩ tɩɛgɛ Pɛrɩgamʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kha u de pi kha: “Dɛyɩra gɔɗ sɔrɔnara kɩ bʋ na nʋʋnyɛ yɔ̃ra, ken ʋ sɩɛsɩra.
66002013	Mɩ tʋ khaala za mʋ bʋ, khaala za Sutana bʋ na ʋ ɩɩkhokira dɩɛ khaala ɩ. Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, mʋ bʋ wa mɩɛ za kũu, mu khonn mʋ khãamɩra mɩ za waʔ. Baa nɩpɛ na khʋʋn Ãtipasɩ, ʋɔ wɩɛra na liin nʋʋnɛ kpo nɩrara mɩɛ za, harɩ dɩɛ bɛna, mʋ gbaan mi thuomira waʔ, ŋa mʋ pɛ̃ɩn ma kɩ khãa mɩɛ za kũu.
66002014	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za, mɩ ɓa zarɩgɩ̃n mʋ wa kɩrɩ mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ za. Dɩɛ kɩ bʋ kha nɩpɛ bʋɔ bʋ mu heke, bɩɛ thuo wa Balamʋ karɩ̃na ʋɔ wɩɛra na suun yiin Balakɩ Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira za kha ʋ gɩɗɛ wɩ na sɩ̃nkhaasɛ, dɩ̃ɩna zɛrɩgɛ liime.
66002015	Si kpuosira ɩ tɩ̃, nɩpɛ bʋɔ bʋ mu heke bɩɛ thuo wa Nikola kpɩ̃ra nɩpɛ karɩ̃na.
66002016	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, vɩkɩ̃n mu kpoloŋira na zɩɛ mʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira. Bʋɔtɛ mɩ ɓa khʋ̃ɔfɩ̃n thiye wa mu heke na khɛ̃ɩ na bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ na sɔrɔnara ki kure mɩ nʋʋgɩra za ɩra.”»
66002017	«Wɩɛ bʋ na numiye na nuure, ʋɔ dɛyɩra nuure wɛsɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra bu de kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra ɩra!» «Wɩɛ kɩ ɓa ɓu wɔrɩkɩra, mɩ ɓa hã ʋɔ dɛyɩra manɩra guuren ɩra, kɩ hã ʋ bʋrʋvɩlɛ. Yɩsɩfɛŋɛ sɛwɛn dɩɛ bʋla za, nɩra sii tʋ gɩɛ yɩsɩgɩra waʔ, fɔ ki ɓudaara bʋɔtɛ.»
66002018	«Sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã mɛlɛgɛra kɩ tɩɛgɛ Tiyatiri kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kha u de pi kha: “Ken wɛsɩɛ Yekila Ɓikhiira de. U yiwiyira so ɓa mʋ gaga kha naɗewire, dɩ̃ɩna ʋ ɗɩɛsɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha sɛɩkhɩ̃ɩgɛ kɩ hʋga.
66002019	Mɩ tʋ mɩyɩra bɩɛ mu le ɩra, mʋ khɔrɩmɩra, mʋ khãamɩra, mʋ nɩdɛnfɛgɩra, mʋ baɓɩra, dɩ̃ɩna wɛsɩɛ mu le ɩra, sɩɛ gɔn na tãra khɔ̃ɩ bɛsɩra.
66002020	Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za mɩ zarɩgɩ̃n mʋ wa khaarɛ dʋɔ za. Dɩɛ kɩ bʋ baa mʋ yɩɛn Zezabɛlɩra na u le wɛsɩɛ nʋʋr ʋ ɩra. U de ɓa kha ʋɔ bʋ wa Yekire yãdedaa, u ɓilen ma mi miliinɓiiwe, ʋ karɩ̃n mɩ wa kakarɩliige na zɛrɩgɛ, kɩ yɩɛ na pɩ khʋɔ daɗuorowira khaasɩra pɩ thɔgɔnn sɩ̃nsɩra za ɩra.
66002021	Mɩ hãar ʋ wa bɛnɛ si le thaaga u ɓu vɩkɩ̃n ʋ lɔmɩra, kɛna ʋ ɓɩɛ na gbaa ʋ zɛrɩgɩra liimira waʔ.
66002022	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ ɓa zɩɛ ʋ wa ɓose za u dii hʋ̃nkhɛrɛ za kɩ vɛn, ʋɔ dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ liin zɛrɩgɩra kpuore ɩra, fɔ na pɩ vɩkɩ̃nn pi kpolonsira na zɩɛn pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɩra bʋɔtɛ.
66002023	Mɩ ɓa yɩɛ wa u karɩ̃nɓiiwira bɩɛ hu. Na sɩɛ liiri, kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra bɩɛ ɓa tʋ kha mɩɛ kɩ bʋ wɩɛra kɩ tʋ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ gagasɛ na pɩ mɩɓɩɛnyɩra. Mɩ ɓa taa wa ɩ̃ bɩɛ kpo kpora na makɩ̃n na wɛsɩɛ ĩ liiri.”»
66002024	«Ŋa ɩ̃ɛ Tiyatiri kiretɩ̃ɛgbupira bʋɔra, ɩ̃ɛ bɩɩn bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ karɩ̃na waʔ. Ɩ̃ ɓɩɛn na tʋ mɩyɩra pɩ yɩ kha Sutana mɩguurenye waʔ. Gɩɛ yɩɛn na mɩ ɓɩɛ na sɩɛ ɩ̃ dagbolonse sʋɔ dʋ̃waʔ.
66002025	Ŋa lɔmɩra za ĩ yiin ɩ̃ khãamɩra mɩɛ za, ɩ̃ gɔ bɩɛ na kɩ̃ra na yo gbɩɛ mɩ ɓanɗɩyãgɩra za.»
66002026	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓa ɓu wɔrɩkɩra, ki liin mi dĩŋo na yo nann si diikhɛla, wɔrɩkɩra mi ɓuun mi Siira heke, mɩ ɓa hã wɩ gɩɛ. Mɩ ɓa hã wɩ wɔrɩkɔ pi le thadɛrɩwɛ sɩrɩsɛ za. Kɩ yɩɛ pi ɗi thadɛrɩsɛ sɩ za na faŋa. Ki kii si mʋ gaga kha baa pi kii ɓenye na khɩ̃ɩdaɓɔʔɛ ɩra. Mɩ ɓa hã wɩ wa bulonbãrakhʋsaɓire tɩ̃.
66002029	«Na numiye bʋ wɩɛ heke na nuure, ʋ dɛyɩra nuure wɛsɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra bu de kiretĩɛwɩra ɩra.»
66003001	«Sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã mɛlɛgɛra kɩ tɩɛgɛ Sarɩdɩ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra kha u de pi kha: “Wɩɛra kɩ bʋ na Yekila Nimira wãnɩyɔ̃ra dɩ̃ɩna khʋsaɓiye wãnɩyɔ̃ra, ken wɛsɩɛ u de ɩra: Mɩ tʋ ĩ milewenyira bɩɛ. Nɩpɛ ken ma kha mʋ bʋ wa thakuogo za, kɛna mu huun ma.
66003002	Tʋ gɔ mu thĩ! Si le thaaga, faŋɩra yɩɛn mu heke kɩla, hã gɩɛ ɓa le zuo tɩ̃ waʔ. Naɗɩɛ mɩ kɔrɩsɩ̃nn yãan ma kha mu milewenyira bɩɛ za, ɩ yʋɔ sii telenn mi Yekila wʋɔla za waʔ.
66003003	Na mafɩra ʋ, kʋɔgɩ̃n na karɩ̃na mu ɓuuri, kɩ bɩɩr ʋ ɩra. Gɔ ʋɔ karɩ̃na kɩ̃raŋɩra kɩ vɩkɩ̃n mu kpoloŋira na zɩɛ mʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira. Na mʋ hɩɗan ko wa, mɩ ɓa ɓan ma na ɓa barɩ mʋ za mʋ gaga kha zugbũro. Mɩ ɓa barɩ wa mʋ za.
66003004	Kɛna ɩ̃ɛ Sarɩdɩ kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra nɩpɛ bʋɔ bʋ, bɩɛ teɗenn pɩ dayiinsira waʔ. Bɩɛ ɓa thuo wa mɩɛ na davɩrɩsɛ, naɗɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ kãn na sɩɛ.
66003005	Mafɩra, wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓa ɓu wɔrɩkɩra, bɩɛ ɓa yii wa davɩrɩsɛ. Mɩ ɓa dikĩn khon pɩ yɩsɩsɩra thakuosɛwʋgɩra za waʔ. Mɩ ɓa de ɓa mi Siira dɩ̃ɩna ʋ mɛlɛgɛwɩra wʋɔla za, kha bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ bʋ wa mɩɛ bɛwɛ.”»
66003006	«Wɩɛ bʋ na numiye na nuure, ʋɔ dɛyɩra nuure wɛsɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra bu de kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra!»
66003007	«Sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã mɛlɛgɛra kɩ tɩɛgɛ Fɩladɛlɩfi kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra ɩra kha u de pi kha: “Wɩɛra kɩ bʋ nɩyɛgɛmɔra dɩ̃ɩna thĩnthĩnwera, ɩtakhuo Davidi konagaɓila bʋ wa ʋɔ heke, na ʋɔ phii zɩɛ tʋ̃ntʋ̃na, nɩra wɔrɩ baka rɩ waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna na ʋ bakan nɩ, nɩra wɔrɩ phii zɩɛrɩ waʔ, ken wɛsɩɛ u de:
66003008	Mɩ tʋʋmɛ bʋ mu milewenyira bɩɛ za. Ken, mɩ zɩɛn ma tʋ̃tʋnphiizɩɛnɛ mʋ wʋɔla za, nɩra sii gbũu wɔrɩ baka rɩ waʔ. Mʋ bʋ na faŋa gbaangbo waʔ, kɛna mʋ gɔɗ ɓa mɩ sɩɛsɩra, mʋ bɩɩn deɗ kha mʋɔ tʋ mɩɛ waʔ.
66003009	Bĩŋĩgboɗa nɩpɩra kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Sutana, bɩɛ de ɓa kha bɩɛ bʋ wa Yawutuwe, kɛna pɩ bʋ Yawutuwe waʔ, pɩ tɔn ma. Ken wɛsɩɛ mɩ ɓa le wi. Mɩ ɓa karɩwa wɩ wa pɩ ɓan na ɓa huruse mʋ wʋɔla za, sɩɛ za pɩ ɓa tʋ kha mɩ khɔrɩ mʋ.
66003010	Mʋ pɛ̃ɩ ma na gɔɗ mɩ sɩɛsɩra, gɩɛ yɩɛn tɩ̃, mɩ ɓa tɩɛgɛ mʋ wa vɛnsɛ bɛna za hã si ɓu nan mʋ waʔ. Tɩ̃ya ʋ, wɔgbʋ̃ʋga ɓa nan ma dunuyara nɩpɩra bɩɛ na zɩɛ pɩ za na ken.
66003011	Mɩ ɓa lɛɩ ɓan waʔ. Mɩyɩra kɩ bʋ mu heke, gɔ ɩ na kɩ̃ra si le thaaga hã nɩra sii ɓa le zɩ̃n mʋ ɩɩgbanfɩla waʔ.”»
66003012	Na wɩɛ bãa ɓa ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ, mɩ ɓa yɩɛ wa ʋ dɛyɩra hɩɗan mi Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za. Ʋ ɓa le wa bʋ mʋ gaga kha sĩinɓaganɛ. Ʋ ɓa kure bʋ kũu waʔ. Mɩ ɓa sɛwɛ wa mi Yekila yɩsɩgɩra dɩ̃ɩna Yekila gboŋira yɩsɩgɩra ʋɔ dɛyɩra za. Gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ kɩ bʋ Zeruzalɛmʋ fɛnwɛ̃ra kɩ ɓa kure zaazaara ni Yekila heke na sũn. Yɩsɩfɛŋɩra mi ɓuuri, mɩ ɓa sɛwɛ wa gɩɛ ʋ dɛyɩra za tɩ̃.
66003013	«Na wɩɛ bʋ na numiye na nuure, u nuure wɛsɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra bu de kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra!»
66003014	Sɛwɛ lɛtɩrɩwɩɛ na dãa hã mɛlɛgɛra kɩ tɩɛgɛ Lawodise kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra ɩra kha u de pi kha: «Wɩɛra pɩ yɩ kha Amiina, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ sɩɛrɛ telenyemora, dɩ̃ɩna thĩnthĩnwera, ʋɔ wɩɛra za mɩyɩra bɩɛ liiri, ʋɔ ki de wɛsɩɛ kha:
66003015	Mɩ tʋ mu milewenyira. Mu wuon mʋ gaga kha ãwuome waʔ, mu gbũu gbʋ̃ʋ mʋ gaga kha ãgbʋ̃ʋwɛ waʔ. Na mʋ na wuon ma, warɩma na mʋ na gbʋ̃ʋn ma, sɩɛ kha bãa.
66003016	Ŋa mʋ bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha ãmbɔlɩgɔ, mu wuo waʔ, mu gbũu gbʋ̃ʋ waʔ, gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ ɓa sarɩ khon mu wa mɩ nʋʋgɩra za.
66003017	Mu de ɓa mu thĩ kha: “Mɩɛ bʋ wa tigidɛyɛ, mɩɛ liin ma ɓudanɩra, mɩ vɛn mɩɩnɛ sii za dʋ̃waʔ.” Ŋa, mʋ kʋɔmɛ bʋ wa sɩ za kha mʋ bʋ wa vɛnsɛ nɩra, mʋ makarɩ bʋ wa nɩpɛ za, mʋ bʋ wa bʋɔmɛ nɩra, mʋ bʋ wa ɗarɩga, na tãanbole.
66003018	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, mɩ ɓɔ ɓʋ wa kha mʋ ɓa ɗon sãnɩ mi heke, wɩɛ yiin naaga za na liin sãnɩ yɛgɛmɔ, si le thaaga mu le ɓudanɩthĩnthĩnwe. Ɓa ɗon davɩrɩsɛ na yii, mafɩra mʋ ɓa hɩɗan tãanbole dʋ̃waʔ, dɩ̃ɩna nɩɩsɛ ɓa gɔ ɓʋ dʋ̃waʔ. Ɓa ɗon yiwunʋnɓosoŋo, na ɓoso mu thĩ si le thaaga mʋ yã kɩ̃raŋɩra.
66003019	Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ mɩ khɔrɩ, bɩɛ mɩ kpaŋɩ̃n ki kori. Na si liin mafɩra, pɛ̃ɩ na yo wʋɔrɛ, kɩ zɩɛ mʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira!
66003020	Ken! Mɩ bʋ wa tʋ̃tʋ̃na za na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n kɩ khɩɗɛ rɩ; na wɩɛ nuun mɩ nʋʋgɩra na phiin zɩɛn nɩ, mi lon ma ʋɔ dɛyɩra heke na hɩɗan na ɗi dɩ̃ɩn ʋ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɗi dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ tɩ̃.»
66003021	«Na wɛɩ bãa ɓa ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa hɩɗan dɩ̃ɩna mɩɛ mɩ ɩɩkhokira za, mʋ gaga kha baa mɩɛ ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ dunuyara za ki yo hɩɗann dɩ̃ɩn na mi Siira ʋ ɩɩkhokira za ɩra.»
66003022	«Wɩɛ bʋ na numiye na nuure, ʋ dɛyɩra nuure wɛsɩɛ Ninyɛgɛmɔra bu de kiretɩ̃ɛwɩra ɩra!»
66004001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ. Mɩ yãan ma na tʋ̃tʋ̃nɛ dʋɔ phiin zɩɛn zaazaara ni. Nʋʋgɩra mɩ na nisĩnn nuun khɔ̃ɩra, na kɩ na khɩɛgɩ̃nn na tũune kʋ̃mɩra, na gɩɛ nʋʋgɩra deɗ ɓi kha: «Gan ɓan mi heke fara, mɩ ɓɔgɔ mʋ, mɩyɩra kɩ kãn na ɓan kpɩ̃ra za ɩra.»
66004002	Dɩɛ khaala bɩɛ za na Ninyɛgɛmɔra khɩɛn mɩ, na mɩ yãan ɩɩkhoko zaazaara ni, na nɩra ʋɔ hɩɗann kɩ za.
66004003	Dɛyɩra na hɩɗann gɩɛ ɩɩkhokira za, ʋ dɛyɩra kha yɩ̃ŋa wa mʋ gaga kha baa bʋrʋdekɩ̃kɩ̃nɩnyɛ yʋɔ pɩ yɩ kha zasɩpɩ na sarɩdʋwanɩ. Kɩ yɩɛn na Yekire korigo vĩin mirin ɩɩkhokira, gɩɛ Yekire korigɩɛ kha yɩ̃ŋa wa mʋ gaga kha bʋrʋdekɩ̃kɩ̃nɩnyɛ yʋɔ pɩ yɩ kha Emerɔdɩ.
66004004	Ɩɩkhose tigbiire na siyĩi sʋɔ vĩin mirin gɩɛ ɩɩkhokira. Sɩɛ ɩɩkhosira tigbiire na siyĩira za, nɩkhãgawɛ tigbiire na piyĩi na hɩɗann sɩ za. Pɩ bɩɛ na yiin ma davɩrɩsɛ, ki siɗ sãnɩ ɩɩgbanfɩlawɛ.
66004005	Adaga yɩ̃gamɛ na lʋrʋgɩ̃nsɛ na sɩɛsɛ kha kure wa ɩɩkhokira za. Hɛrɩɓenye wãnɩyɔ̃ kha so ɓa na faŋa ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla za fɩ, ɩɛ hɛrɩɓenye wãnɩyɔ̃ra kɩ bʋ Yekila Nimira wãnɩyɔ̃ra.
66004006	Ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla ʋ za, mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ kha bʋ wa fɩ mʋ gaga kha lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ, tɩ kha yɩ̃ŋa wa mʋ kha dʋgalen, tɩ kha yɛ ɓa mʋ gaga kha bʋrʋdekɩ̃kɩ̃nyɩra thĩna pɩ yɩ kha kirisitalɩra ɩra. Nindaawɛ piyĩi bʋɔ kha bʋ ɩɩkhokira lɔkɩra za, pɩ na vĩin mirin ma kɩ bɩɛ, bɩɛ Nindaabɩɛ khayɩra bɩɛ kha bʋ wa yiwiye doro.
66004007	Bɩɛ Nindaabɩɛ lʋgʋbaara na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na gbaŋa zara, yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na nakhoɓoroko. Sãafɩ̃ramɔra wʋɔla na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma mʋ gaga kha nɩthɩ̃rɩga wʋɔrɛ, yĩifiremora na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na yãwa ɗeremo.
66004008	Bɩɛ Nindaabɩɛ piyĩira bɩɛ kpo kpora kha bʋ wa na mɩsɛ wãnɩkpokpo. Pɩ mɩsɩra kpolonsira na sɩ zaara bɩɛ na fɩ̃ɗ ɓa na yiwiye. Khɩɛgɛ na dawogo, pɩ tɩ̃nɛ wa kɛɩ gbaa kha: «Adɛyɛ Yekire, mʋɔ kɩ yɛ, mʋɔ kɩ yɛ, mʋɔ kɩ yɛ, wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa mu heke na tãra mɩyɛ bɩɛ. Mʋɔ kɩ bʋ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ, mʋɔ kpuola kha bʋ khɔ̃ɩra, mʋɔ kpuola kɩ ɓa ɓan tɩ̃.»
66004009	Bɛnɛ tʋɔ bɛnɛ Nindaabɩɛ piyĩira tɩ̃nɛ wa kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ɩɩkhokira hɩɗandaara ki hu waʔ ɩra, na pɩ yɩ ʋ yɩsɩnʋʋgɩra na pɩ thɩɛ ʋ.
66004010	Nindaawɩra tɩ̃nɛ bɛna, nɩkhãgawɩra tigbiire na piyĩira arɩ wa na ɓa huruse ɩɩkhokira hɩɗandaara wʋɔla za, kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ kɛɩ huomora, ki khon pɩ ɩɩgbanfɩlawɩra na hĩn zɩɛ wɩ ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla ʋ fɩ ki ki de kha:
66004011	«Adɛyɛ, dɩ̃ɩna a Yekire, ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra, gbʋ̃ɔnsɛ, dɩ̃ɩna wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa mʋɔ bɛsɛ. Naɗɩɛ mʋɔ liin mɩyɩra bɩɛ, mʋɔ khɔrɩn kha ɩɛ mɩyɩra hɩɗan bʋ, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mu liir i.»
66005001	Dɩɛ bɛna, na mɩ yãan sɛwʋgɛ gʋɔ na pi ɓinn ŋi. Wɩɛra na hɩɗann ɩɩkhokira za, kɩ kha bʋ wa ʋɔ leɗĩŋira za. Sɛwʋgɩra gɛnheʔira yɔ̃ra bɩɛ kha bʋ wa na sɛwʋsɛ kɩ bakan na dɩŋakhɛyɛ wãnɩyɔ̃.
66005002	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan mɛlɛgɛ wɔrɩkɔ dɛyɛ ʋɔ, na ʋ arɩgan yĩndolon na deɗ kha: «Sɛwʋra pɩ bakan ki yiin dɩ̃ŋakhɛyɩra ʋ phiizɩɛkhɛyɩra za, ãna kɩ kãn na fʋgɩ ɩɛ dɩ̃ŋakhɛyɩra ki phii zɩɛ ʋ?»
66005003	Ŋa nɩra sii kha bʋ zaazaara ni warɩma fɔlɔŋɩra za, warɩma fɔlɔŋɩra theɗera ʋ ni, na wɔrɩ phii zɩɛ sɛwʋra na ken mɩɩna kɩ bʋ u kpoloŋira ʋ waʔ.
66005004	Na mɩ hɩɗann kɩ fʋʋ gbaangbo, naɗɩɛ baa nɩra sii na ɓuun wɩɛ kha kãn phii zɩɛ sɛwʋra na ken mɩɩna sɛwɛn u kpoloŋira za waʔ ɩra.
66005005	Fɩ za na nɩkhãgawɩra ʋɔ deɗ ɓi kha: «Hã mʋ fʋʋ waʔ. Ken, Zarala ki kure Zuda thĩna za, ɩtakhuo Davidi kpɩ̃raɓiye u. Ʋɔ kɩ bʋ wɔrɩkɔdɛyɩra. Ʋɔ wɔrɩ fʋgɩ sɛwʋra dɩ̃ŋakhɛyɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra ki phii zɩɛ ʋ.»
66005006	Dɩɛ bɛna na mi kenn yãan Zãraɓiye ʋɔ na ʋ alɩn na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla za, nindaawɩra dɩ̃ɩna nɩkhãgawɩra na vĩin mirin u wa. Ʋɔ Zãraɓiira kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha pɩ na thɔgɔn ʋ wa. Ʋ kha bʋ wa na tʋ̃nyɛ wãnɩyɔ̃, dɩ̃ɩna yiwiye wãnɩyɔ̃, ɩɛ yiwiyira kɩ bʋ Yekila Nimira wãnɩyɔ̃ra pɩ dãan dunuyara khaayɩra bɩɛ za ɩra.
66005007	Na ʋɔ Zãraɓiiwɩɛ zʋ̃ʋn nann na zɩ̃nn sɛwʋra kha bʋ ɩɩkhokira hɩɗandaara leɗĩŋira za ɩra.
66005008	Baa ʋ khɩɛn sɛwʋra, na Nindaawɩra piyĩira dɩ̃ɩna nɩkhãgawɩra tigbiire na piyĩira bɩɛ ɓaɗ huruse Zãraɓiira wʋɔla za fɩ. Pɩ bɩɛ kpo kpora kha bʋ wa na korozowe dɩ̃ɩna sãnɩ kaŋʋɔʔɛ, wusuna nunʋwã na hĩɗen ĩ. Ʋɔ wusuna nunʋwãra kɩ bʋ Yekila nɩpɩra yɩ̃mɩra.
66005009	Pɩ kha tɩ̃nɛ wa tɩ̃nfɛŋɛ ki de kha: «Mʋɔ kɩ kãn na khɛ sɛwʋra na fʋgɩ ʋ dɩ̃ŋakhɛyɩra. Naɗɩɛ pɩ na khonn mu wa thɔgɔnsɛ. Mʋ tarɩmɩra mʋ khɩɛn na ɗonn thĩnyira na sɩɛsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ na nɩpɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna sɩrɩsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ.
66005010	Mu liin mi wa Yekila sɩrɩga nɩpɛ. Mu liin mi wa kperekpiidɛwɛ kɩ yɩɛ pi le ɩɩwɛ na hɩɗan dunuyara bɩɛ za.»
66005011	Baa mɩ kha bʋ ki ken, na mi nuun mɛlɛgɛ gɔngɔmɛ nʋʋsɛ. Pɩ kha gɔn ma thĩ harɩ pɩ nʋʋna kha wɔrɩ tʋ waʔ. Pɩ na vĩin mirin ma ɩɩkhokira dɩ̃ɩna nɩkhãgawɩra.
66005012	Pɩ kha tɩ̃nɛ wa ki de na nʋgbʋ̃ɔŋɔ kha: «Zãraɓiira pi khonn thɔgɔnsɩra, wɔrɩkɔ na ɓudaga, na wʋɔmɛ, na faŋa, na gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, na ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ, na yɩsɩgbɩ̃nɛgɛ bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛsɛ!»
66005013	Na mi nuun zaazaa mɩyɩra, na fɔlɔŋɔ mɩyɩra, na fɔlɔŋɔ theɗera mɩyɩra, na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ, (na mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ dunuyara za,) na ɩ bɩɛ bʋ tɩ̃nɛ ki de kha: «Yɩsɩgbɩ̃nɛgɛ, na gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, na ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ, na wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa ɩɩkhokira hɩɗandaara na Zãraɓiira bɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ kɛɩ gbaa.»
66005014	Na Nindaawɩra piyĩira zɩ̃ŋɩnn kha: « Amiina.» Na nɩkhãgawɩra ɓaɗ huruse na gbɩ̃nɛn mɩ.
66006001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan na Yekila Zãraɓiira khɩɛn dɩ̃ŋakhɛyɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ sɛwʋra na fʋgɩn khonn lʋgʋ dɩ̃ŋakhɛla ʋ za. Dɩɛ bɛna na mi nuun na nindaawɩra piyĩira ʋɔ arɩgan yĩndolon mʋ gaga kha adaga lʋrʋgɩ̃nsɛ na deɗ kha: «Ɓan!»
66006002	Baa mɩ kha mi ken, na mɩ yãan zaga vɩra. Dɛyɩra na gann ʋ za, ʋ na gɔɗ ɓa korigo, kɩ yɩɛn na pɩ hãar ʋ ɩɩgbanfɩla. Ʋ na nisĩnn ɓuun ma wɔrɩkɔ khɛɩ̃gɛ za, u gbũu ɓa yo ɓu wa gʋɔ tɩ̃.
66006003	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃, na Yekila Zãraɓiira fʋgɩn sɛwʋra dɩ̃ŋakhɛyʋ̃ɔfɩrana, na mi nuun na nindayʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra arɩgan yĩndolon na deɗ kha: «Ɓan!»
66006004	Dɩɛ bɛna na zaga ʋɔ kuɗi, ʋ kha bʋ wa ʋ mawã mʋ gaga kha naaga. Wɩɛra na gann ʋɔ zagara za, wɔrɩkɔ na hãan ma ʋɔ kha u khon wɔyĩke fɔlɔŋɩra za pere, si le thaaga dunuyara nɩpɛ kɩ khʋʋrɛ kamɛ. Sɔrɔna kpakpaka na hãan ma ʋɔ zaga gandaawɩɛ.
66006005	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃, na Yekila Zãraɓiira fʋgɩn sɛwʋra dɩ̃ŋakhɛsãafɩrana. Na mi nuun na nindaawɩra sãafɩ̃ramɔra deɗ kha: «Ɓan!» Baa mɩ kha mi ken, na mɩ yãan zaga bire. Wɩɛra na gann ʋ za, kilora kɩ sʋ̃wa daasɩra, ʋɔ kha bʋ u lekira za.
66006006	Na mi nuun kʋ̃mɛ bʋɔ mʋ gaga kha nɩthɩ̃rɩga nʋʋga bɩɛ Nindaabɩɛ piyĩira sʋgʋmʋra za kha: «Sʋgʋyɛ kilo kpo ɗorise kɩ bʋ khɩɛ kpo liigese taasɛ. Damʋsʋ kilowe pɩsãa ɗorise kɩ bʋ khɩɛ kpo liigese taasɛ. Ŋa hã mʋ asɩ nʋʋmɛ na duvɛ̃n waʔ.»
66006007	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃, na Yekila Zãraɓiira fʋgɩn bãnɩyĩi dɩ̃ŋakhɛla, dɩɛ bɛna na mi nuun bãnɩyĩi nindaara na ʋ arɩgan yĩndolon na deɗ kha: «Ɓan!»
66006008	Baa mɩ kha mi ken, na mɩ yãan zaga ʋɔ, ʋ kha bʋ wa u bire thii mʋ gaga kha wũuɓɩka lɔmɛ. Dɛyɩra na gann ʋɔ zagara za, pɩ kha yɩ ʋ wa kha: «Huume», laharala kha thuo u wa. Wɔrɩkɔ na hãan ma bɩɛ nɩhuobɩɛ kha dunuyara heʔe iyĩira za, pɩ asɩ tikpora na khʋ pɩ nɩpɩra bɩɛ na khɛɩ̃sɛ, na khʋ̃mʋŋa, na ɓoɗɩɛgɩ̃ransɛ, na gbandabɩ̃ɩwɛ za.
66006009	Baa Yekila Zãraɓiira ɓa fʋgɩ̃n bãnɩwaa dɩ̃ŋakhɛla, Yekila nɩtelenyemira pɩ khʋʋn naɗɩɛ ʋ sɩɛsɩra deɓira kãmara na baa pɩ kha bʋ Yekila sɩɛrɛwɩra, na mi kenn yãan pi nimira thɔgɔnsɛ khonkhɛrɛ dʋɔ theɗe za.
66006010	Na pi nimira arɩgan yĩndolome na deɗ kha: «Thadɛyɛgɛmɔ, dɩ̃ɩna thĩnthĩnwera, dʋ̃nɛ bɛnɛ mʋɔ ɓa kiti fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra na khon a tarɩmɩra taasɩra pɩ za?»
66006011	Pɩ na hãan ma pɩ bɩɛ gbɔgɔlɔ̃nvɩrɩsʋ̃rʋsɛ, ki deɗ pi kha pɩ ba kɩrɩ ʋ tɩ̃ na sɩɛ, naɗɩɛ pi liigedɛkamɩra na pɩ yaɓiiwira kɩ bʋ fara fɔlɔŋɩra za, bɩɛ kãn ma na hu bɩɛ hulɔnkpuowira za tɩ̃, kɩ ɓan zo.
66006012	Kɩ yɩɛn na mɩ yãan Yekila Zãraɓiira na ʋ fʋgɩ̃n bãnɩwanɩkpo dɩ̃ŋakhɛla, na fɔlɔŋɩra gbann na bɩ̃ɩrɩ, na khɩɛra teɗ u bire thithithi, na feregera sɛ̃ɩrɩ mʋ gaga kha tarɩmɛ;
66006013	na zaazaa khʋsaɓiyira hʋ̃ʋn fɔlɔŋɩra za mʋ gaga kha baa adaga sarangbʋ̃ɔŋɔ vu na hʋ̃ʋ ɗʋgʋbansɛ ɩra.
66006014	Na zaazaara tũrun mʋ gaga kha baa nɩra bi kɛtɛ ɩra. Na ɓɩɛsɛ na fɔlɔnphanyɩra ki ɓu lagagborogbʋ̃ɔnsɛ sʋgʋmʋra za, na sɩɛ khonn sɩ khaayɩra za.
66006015	Dɩɛ bɛna na fɔlɔŋɩra ɩɩwɩra, na nɩgbʋ̃ɔmɩra, na sʋrasiwe wʋɔrɛdɛrɩwɩra, na ɓudanɩpɩra, na faŋadɛrɩwɩra, na ɗome dɩ̃ɩna nɩhɔrɔmɛ bɩɛ horon na yo guuren ɓɩɛlose na kɛrɩdansɛ za.
66006016	Pɩ kha de ɓa ɓɩɛsɩra na kɛrɩsɩra kha: «Ɩ̃ wa na si a, ĩ guore a, hã ɩɩkhokira hɩɗandaara yã a waʔ, kɩ yɩɛ Yekila Zãraɓiira doŋira legen a.
66006017	Iyo, pi doŋira ɗɩyãgagbʋ̃ɔŋɩra nann ma. Ãna kɩ ha tɩɛ gɩ?»
66007001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan na mɛlɛgɛwɛ piyĩi alɩn na nɩ́rɛ́n fɔlɔŋɩra lɔŋɔʔɩra yĩira za. Na pɩ gɔɗ fɔlɔŋɩra lɔŋɔʔɩra yĩira bɩɛ sarɩmɩra na pɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́nɩ. Sarɩmɛ kha wɔrɩ vu fɔlɔŋɩra za waʔ, warɩma lagagborowe za waʔ, warɩma dahasɛ za waʔ.
66007002	Na mɩ yãan mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ tɩ̃ na u kuɗ khɩɛkure gɛŋɛ. Ʋ na gɔɗ ɓa Thakuo Yekila dɩ̃ŋasɛ yii daaga u lekira za. Na ʋ arɩgan yĩndolon na deɗ mɛlɛgɛwɛ piyĩira wɔrɩkɩra na hãan kha pɩ asɩ fɔlɔŋɩra na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra ɩra kha:
66007003	«Hã ɩ̃ asɩ fɔlɔŋɩra na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra, na dahasɩra thon waʔ, naɗɩɛ wɛpɩɛ ki liige kɩ hã a Yekila, a kãn ma na yii dɩ̃ŋasɛ bɩɛ khoʔira za zo.»
66007004	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ naa ɓa ɓu Yekila dɩ̃ŋasɩra pi khoʔira za, na pɩ ɓɔgɔn mɩɛ pɩ nʋʋna. Pɩ kha bʋ wa nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ tiiwãnɩyɔ̃ na piyĩi (144,000) na kure Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwira gbɛ̃ɩnyɩra bɩɛ za.
66007005	Zuda gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. (12,000). Urubɛ̃n gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. Gadɩ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za.
66007006	Asɛrɩ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. Manase gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. Nɛfɩtali gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za.
66007007	Simiyɔ̃ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. Levi gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. Izakarɩ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za.
66007008	Zabulɔ̃ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. Zozɛfʋ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. Bɛ̃zamɛ gbɛ̃ɩnɛ nɩpɩra za, dɩ̃ŋasɩra yiin ma nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ za. Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ bɩɛ kha bʋ wa na Yekila dɩ̃ŋasɩra pi khoʔira za.
66007009	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ kha mɩɛ ken tɩ̃ na yãan nɩgbogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ, nɩra kha wɔrɩ thʋɗɛ na tʋ pɩ nʋʋna waʔ. Sɩrɩsɛ bɩɛ nɩpɛ na thĩnyira bɩɛ nɩpɛ, na nɩthĩme bɩɛ, na sɩɛsɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ nɩpɛ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ma ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla za, dɩ̃ɩna Yekila zãraɓiira wʋɔla za. Pɩ bɩɛ na yiin ma gbɔgɔlɔ̃nvɩrɩsʋ̃rʋsɛ kɩ gɔɗ maanhaɗese pi lesira za.
66007010	Na pɩ arɩgan yĩndolome na deɗ kha: «A Yekila hɩɗann ɩɩkhokira za dɩ̃ɩna Zãraɓiira, a kuon ma bɩɛ wɔrɩkɔ za.»
66007011	Mɛlɛgɛwɩra bɩɛ na vĩin mirin ɩɩkhokira na nɩkhãgawɩra, dɩ̃ɩna Nindaawɩra piyĩira, na bɩɛ ɓaɗ ɓa khoʔe fɔlɔŋɩra za ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla za fɩ na gbɩ̃nɛn Yekila.
66007012	Pɩ kha kʋ̃n ma kha: « Amiina. Iyo, yɩsɩgbɩ̃nɛgɛ na ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɛ, na wʋɔmɛ, na thɩɛɗɛ, na gbɩ̃nɛsɛ, na wɔrɩkɔ, na faŋa bʋ wa a Yekila bɛsɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ! Amiina.»
66007013	Fɩ za na nɩkhãgawɩra ukpo bʋ̃ɗ mɩɛ kha: «Wɛpɩɛ yiin gbɔgɔlɔ̃nvɩrɩsɩra mɩra, bʋ̃nɛwɛ ɩ, na he pi kuɗi?»
66007014	Na mɩ zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ kha: «Mɩ thadɛyɛ, mʋɔ kɩ tʋ sɩɛ.» Na u deɗ ɓi kha: «Wɛpɩɛ na ɓuun vɛnsɩra gbaangbora, bɩɛ ɩ. Pɩ tɩsɩnn ma pɩ gbɔgɔlɔ̃nsɩra Yekila zãraɓiira tarɩmɩra za, gɩɛ yɩɛn na pɩ gbɔgɔlɔ̃nsɩra fɩ̃ɩn mafɩra.
66007015	Gɩɛ yɩɛn na pɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n Yekila ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla za. Pi liige wa kɩ hã Yekila khɩɛgɛ na dawogo ʋ gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za, Iyo, wɩɛra hɩɗann ɩɩkhokira za, ʋɔ kɩ ɓa tɩɛgɛ wɩ.
66007016	Khʋ̃mʋŋa na yʋ̃ɔsɛ ɓa gɔ pɩ kũu dʋ̃waʔ, Khɩɛra ɓa so pi dʋ̃waʔ, dagbʋ̃ʋnɛ sii ɓa khʋ wɩ dʋ̃waʔ.
66007017	Iyo, Yekila Zãraɓiira kɩ bʋ ɩɩkhokira lɔkɩra za, ʋɔ kɩ ɓa le pɩ kaadaara. Ʋɔ kɩ ɓa kaa yo wi thakuo ãmɩra khaayɩra za, Yekila kɩ ɓa dikĩn pi yĩnthĩmisira pɩ wʋɔyɩra za.»
66008001	Baa Yekila Zãraɓiira ɓa fʋgɩn bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ dɩ̃ŋakɛla, na zaazaara bɩɛ wuon tɛ̃tɛ̃tɛ̃ na ɓuun lɩɛrɩ gbugo siira.
66008002	Kɩ yɩɛn na mɩ yãan mɛlɛgɛwɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ na pɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n Yekila wʋɔla za; na pɩ hãan bɩɛ mɛlɛgɛwɩra tũunye wãnɩyɔ̃.
66008003	Na mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ ɓann na ɓa nɩ́ɩrɛ́n dakhoronse sokhɛla liin na sãnɩra, dɩɛ lɔkɩra ʋ fɩ. Sãnɩ wusuna gogoriɗe kha bʋ u lekira za. Na pɩ hãar ʋ wusuna gɔngɔwɔ̃, si le thaaga ʋ dɩɛ ʋ na Yekila nɩpɩra yɩ̃mɩra na hã sɩ dakhoronse sokhɛla za Yekila ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla ʋ.
66008004	Ʋɔ wusuna gɩsɩra kuɗ mɛlɛgɛra lekira za na dɩɛn na Yekila nɩpɩra yɩ̃mɩra na gan Yekila wʋɔla ʋ.
66008005	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɛlɛgɛra khɩɛn wusuna sãnɩgogoriɗa, na khonn naaga dakhoronse sokhɛla za na hĩɗen ni, ki hĩnn gboɗ naagɩra fɔlɔŋɩra za. Na adaga ɗɛ gɔɗ kɩ lʋrʋgɩ̃n, na sɔŋɔgbʋ̃ɔnsɛ, na adaga yɩ̃gaɓɛ, dɩ̃ɩna fɔlɔngbaŋa.
66008006	Mɛlɛgɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra na gɔɗ tũunyira wãnɩyɔ̃ra, bɩɛ kha bʋ wa kɩ ɔfɔ pi thĩ na ɓu tɩɩrɛ ɩ.
66008007	Na lʋgʋ mɛlɛgɛra tɩɩrɛn ʋ tũuna, na adagabanbʋrʋsɛ na naaga, na tarɩmɛ dɩɛn na sũnn fɔlɔŋɩra za. Dɩɛ khaala bɩɛ za fɩ na fɔlɔŋɩra kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ sãara tikpora bɩɛ suori, dɩ̃ɩna dahasɩra kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ sãara tikpora bɩɛ suori, dɩ̃ɩna ki wũugira bɩɛ.
66008008	Na yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra tɩɩrɛn u tũuna. Na daaga gʋɔ kuɗ mʋ gaga kha ɓɩɛgɛ, kɩ bɩɛ na liin ma naaga doro, na ki yo waan lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ za. Na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ sãara tikpora bɩɛ liin tarɩmɛ.
66008009	Na dakuowira bɩɛ kɩ bʋ ãmɩra za, na bɩɛ kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ sãara tikpora bɩɛ huuri, dɩ̃ɩna batonsira kha bʋ ãmɩra za, na sɩɛ kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ sãara tikpora bɩɛ asɩnɩ.
66008010	Na mɛlɛgɛ sãafɩ̃ramɔra tɩɩrɛn ʋ tũuna. Khʋsaɓikpakpaɗa kha so mʋ gaga kha hɛrɩɓena, na dɩɛ waarɩ. Tɩ waan ma lagagborowe kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ sãa tikpora za, dɩ̃ɩna khaayɩra za ãmɩra ɓũn ɩra.
66008011	(Dɩɛ khʋsaɓila yɩsɩgɩra kha bʋ kha hahamɛ.) Na ãmɩra kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɩra sãara tikpora bɩɛ hanɩ. Wɛpɩɛ yʋ̃ɔn bɩɛ ãnharanbɩɛ, pɩ gɔmɛ huun ma, naɗɩɛ waŋa kha bʋ wa bɩɛ ãmɩɛ za.
66008012	Na Bãnɩyĩi mɛlɛgɛra tɩɩrɛn u tũuna. Na khɩɛra na feregera na khʋsaɓiyira kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɩra ɩsãasaara ikporikpora bɩɛ teɗi. Khɩɛra kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ ɩsãara za, tikpo te. Feregera kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ ɩsãara za, tikpo te. Khʋsaɓiyira kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ ɩsãara za, tikpo te. Sɩɛ za, khɩɛra kha bʋ na yɛyɛɓɛ gbaangbo khɩɛga waʔ, na dawogira thuɗ gbaangbo na sɩɛrɩ.
66008013	Baa mɩ kha mɩɛ ken tɩ̃, na mɩ yãan yãwa na u ɗen harɩ zaazaara ni kɩ kʋ̃n na faŋa kha: «Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga! Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga! Be wɔgbʋ̃ʋthĩŋe gɩɛ fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra za mɩra! Gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ kɩ ɓa nan nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra bɛna mɛlɛgɛwɛ pɩsãara bʋɔra tũunyira ɓa tɩɩrɛ!»
66009001	Na bãnɩwãa mɛlɛgɛra tɩɩrɛn u tũuna. Na mɩ yãan na khʋsaɓire dʋɔ kuɗ zaazaara ni na ɓa waan fɔlɔŋɩra za. Na pɩ hãan khʋsaɓila dankokorikira kɛɩ le diikhɛla konagaɓila.
66009002	Na khʋsaɓila yo phiin zɩɛn gɩɛ dankokorokira, na gɩsɛ kuɗ kɩ za mʋ gaga kha baa dagboko so ɩra. Na sɩɛ gɩsɩra bĩin khɩɛra ki teɗen gɛŋɩra bɩɛ.
66009003	Na gbɛsɩwɛ kuɗ sɩɛ gɩsɩra kpoloŋira ʋ na tɩɩn fɔlɔŋɩra bɩɛ za. Wɔrɩkɔ na hãan ma sɩɛ gbɛsɩsɩɛ mʋ gaga kha fɔlɔŋɩra namɩra.
66009004	Sɩɛsɛ na hãan ma sɩɛ gbɛsɩsɩɛ kha hã si pho wũugo na dahawãsɛ sii za waʔ, fɔ nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra laɗ Yekila dɩ̃ŋasɩra pi khoʔira za ɩra.
66009005	Kha hã sɩ khʋ wɩ waʔ, ŋa sɩ vɛnɛ wɩ gbaangbo na yo nan feriwe pɩwãa. Sɩɛ gbɛsɩsɩɛ nʋnʋmɩra bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha baa nawa sʋ̃ʋ nɩra ɩra.
66009006	Dɩɛ bɛndɩɛ za, nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ ɓa ɓɩɛ huume, ŋa pɩ ɓa ɓu huumira waʔ. Pɩ ɓa le mɩyɩra thĩna bɩɛ na ɓu hu, ŋa huumira ɓa horo wa kɩ zɩɛ wɩ.
66009007	Sɩɛ gbɛsɩsɩɛ lɔmɩra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩzagawɛ wɛpɛ ɔfɔn zɩɛn ki yo khɛ̃ɩkhɛrɛ. Daayɛ yʋɔ kha bʋ wa pɩ thaasɩra za mʋ gaga kha sãnɩ ɩɩgbanfɩlawɛ. Sɩ wʋɔyɩra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ wʋɔyɛ.
66009008	Sɩ thayĩnsira na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na hapɛ bɛsɛ, sɩ yɩgɩyɩra kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha zara bɛsɛ.
66009009	Gbɛsɩsɩra bãanyɩra kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha khɩ̃ɩgbɔgɔlɔ̃ŋɔ pi yiiri. Sɩ mɩsɩra kʋ̃mɩra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na zagawɛ pɩ vɔɗ worotose za na pi yo khɛ̃ɩkhɛrɛ.
66009010	Sɩɛ gbɛsɩsɩɛ bʋ wa na ɗɩʔɛ mʋ gaga kha namɛ na wɔrɩ sʋ̃ʋgɩ̃n mʋ gaga kha namɛ tɩ̃. Ɩɛ ɗɩʔɩra sɩ khɛ na vɛnɛ nɩpɛ ɩ na ɓu ferewe pɩ wãara.
66009011	Sɩɛ gbɛsɩsɩɛ kha bʋ wa na ɩya, ʋɔ kha bʋ dankokorikira kɛɩ le diikhɛla mɛlɛgɛra. Ʋɔ mɛlɛgɛra pɩ yɩ Eburusira za kha Abãdɔ̃. Kɩ yɩ ʋ Gɩrɛkɩsɩra za kha Apoliyɔnɩ. (Gɩɛ yɩsɩgɩra kɔla kɩ bʋ kha asɩdaa.)
66009012	Lʋgʋ asɩgɩra tann ma. Ken sɩyɔ̃ sʋɔ bʋ ɓan tɩ̃.
66009013	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na bãnɩwanɩkpo mɛlɛgɛra tɩɩrɛn u tũuna, na mi nuun nʋʋga gʋɔ na kɩ kʋ̃nn sãnɩ sokhɛla kɩ bʋ Yekila wʋɔla za, dɩɛ lɔʔɩra yĩira za.
66009014	Na nʋʋgɩra deɗ bãnɩwãnɩkpo mɛlɛgɛra kha bʋ na tũuna kha: «Vɔrɩ zɩɛ mɛlɛgɛwɩra piyĩira kɩ bʋ vɔkhɛyɩra Efɩratɩ lagagboro kpakpawara za.»
66009015	Bɩɛ mɛlɛgɛwɩra na ɔfɔn zɩɛn ma fɩ ʋɔ lɩɛrɩla za, na gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra, na ʋɔ feregera, dɩ̃ɩna gɩɛ ɗɩɩgɩra kãma, na ɓu khʋ fɔlɔŋɩra heʔira ɩsãara tikpora nɩpɩra bɩɛ.
66009016	Na pɩ ɓɔgɔn mɩɛ pɩ khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdɛrɩwɩra nʋʋna kɩ bʋ na zagawɩra ɩra. Pɩ kha bʋ wa nɩpɛ sʋkhãgawɛ gbalɩga.
66009017	Ken baa mɩ yãan zagawɩra na pɩ gandɛrɩwɩra lɔmɩra ɩra. Pɩ khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdaasɩra pɩ na yiiri, sɩ kha sɛ̃ɩ wa mʋ gaga kha naaga, ki teɗ mʋ gaga kha bʋla, kɩ sɛ̃ɩ mʋ gaga kha nʋmʋsɛ. Zagawɩra thaasɩra kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha zarawɛ bɛsɛ, naaga na gɩsɛ na gĩriwi kha kure wa pɩ nʋʋsɩra za.
66009018	Naagɩra na gɩsɩra na gĩriwira kuɗ bɩɛ zagabɩɛ nʋʋsɩra za, fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ sãara za, tikpora nɩpɩra bɩɛ huun ma gɩɛ asɩkhɛyɛ sãara za.
66009019	Iyo, bɩɛ zagabɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra kha bʋ wa pɩ nʋʋsɩra na pɩ ɗɩʔɩra za. Pɩ ɗɩʔɩra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na sʋwʋsɛ, thaasɛ bʋ wa pɩ ɗɩʔɩra za, sɩɛ pɩ khɛ kɩ vɛnɛ nɩpɩra.
66009020	Fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra bʋɔra na yɩɛn kɛɩ hu sɩɛ vɛnsɩra za, bɩɛ bɩɩn zɩɛn pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira waʔ, pɩ kɛɩn ma kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ gĩrime, na pɩ thɔgɩ̃n sɩ̃nsɛ. Sɩɛ sɩ̃nsɩra na liin ma na sãnɩ, sʋɔ liin na warɩ vɩra, sʋɔ liin na sɛɩkhɩ̃ɩga, sʋɔ liin na bʋrʋsɛ, sʋɔ liin na daɓɔsɛ, kɛna sɩɛ daasɩɛ bɩɛ, gʋɔ sii yã waʔ, si nu waʔ, sɩ wɔrɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ waʔ.
66009021	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ bɩɩn gbaan pɩ nɩkhʋgɩra na pɩ sʋkhʋwʋsɩra, na pɩ kakarɩliigira, na pi zugbũrusira waʔ.
66010001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na mɩ yãan mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ, wɔrɩkɔ kha bʋ wa u heke na u sũn fɔlɔŋɩra za. Na dadʋ̃nɩŋa gʋɔ bakan ʋ mʋ gaga kha gbɔgɔlɔ̃ŋɔ, Yekire korigo na vĩin mirin ʋ thaagɩra, ʋ wɔseɗa kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha khɩɛ, ʋ ɗɩɛsɩra kha bʋ wa mʋ gaga kha naaga.
66010002	Ʋ na gɔɗ ɓa sɛwʋdaaɗɛ dʋɔ u lekira za na ti phiin zɩɛrɩ. Na u tiin u leɗĩnɗɩɛgɩra lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra za, kɩ tiin u lemɩnɩɗɩɛgɩra fɔlɔŋɩra za.
66010003	Kɩ sɩɛrɛn na faŋa mʋ gaga kha baa zara uri ɩra, baa u urin mafɩra, na adaga lʋran bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ na zɩ̃ŋɩnn ʋ.
66010004	Baa adagara lʋran bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ra, mɩ kha ɓɩɛ wa na sɛwɛ wɛsɩɛ ʋ na deɗi, ŋa, na mi nuun nʋʋga gʋɔ na kɩ kʋ̃nn zaazaara ni na deɗ ɓi kha: «Mɩɩna adaga lʋrʋgɩ̃nsɩra deɗi, yɩɛ sɩɛ gũni za, hã mʋ sɛwɛ sɩɛ waʔ.»
66010005	Dɩɛ bɛna, mɛlɛgɛra mɩ na yãan na ʋ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra na fɔlɔŋɩra za, na ʋɔ arɩgan leke zaazaara
66010006	na karɩ̃nn bãanyɛ bɩɛ Thakuo Yekila za, ʋɔ wɩɛra liin zaazaara, na fɔlɔŋɩra, na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra na si kpoloŋo mɩyɩra bɩɛ. Mɛlɛgɛra karɩ̃nn ma na deɗ kha: «Tɩɛmɛ bʋ sɩ za dʋ̃waʔ!
66010007	Ŋa ɗɩyãgɩra ʋɔ bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ mɛlɛgɛra ɓa tɩɩrɛ u tũuna, gɩɛ ɗɩyãgɩra Yekila gũni mɩyɩra ɓa hĩi. Ʋ na nisĩnn deɗ ɓa sɩɛ na u miliindɛrɩwɩra kɩ bʋ yãdedɛrɩwɩra.»
66010008	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, nʋʋgɩra mɩ na nuun na kɩ sɩɛrɛn na mɩɛ zaazaara ni, na mɩ ɔfɔn nuun ŋi tɩ̃ na ki deɗ ɓi kha: «Mɛlɛgɛra nɩ́ɩrɛ́n lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra na fɔlɔŋɩra za, sɛwɛdaaɗa kɩ bʋ u lekira za mɩra, yo zɩ̃n nɩ.»
66010009	Na mi yuon mɛlɛgɛra heke kha ʋ hã mɩ sɛwʋɗa. Na ʋ zɩ̃ŋɩnn mɩ kha: «Zɩ̃n khʋɔ rɩ, tɩ ɓa phʋ̃n ma mʋ nʋʋgɩra za mʋ gaga kha saŋa, ŋa tɩ ɓa hama kpakpakpa mu kpoloŋira za.»
66010010	Na mɩ zɩ̃nn dɩɛ sɛwʋtɩtɩɩɗa mɛlɛgɛra lekira za na khʋɔn nɩ. Tɩ phʋ̃nn ma mɩ nʋʋgɩra za mʋ gaga kha saŋa; ŋa baa mɩ mɩɗ tɩ zuori, na tɩ hann ma mi kpoloŋira za.
66010011	Dɩɛ bɛna na pi deɗ ɓi kha: «Mʋ kãn ma na sɩɛrɛ mʋ gaga kha Yekire yãdedaa na gbũu thĩngɔnyɛ, na sɩrɩgɔnsɛ, dɩ̃ɩna ɩɩgɔmɛ za.»
66011001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na pɩ hãan mɩ daɓɔɗɛ dʋɔ thĩne, tɩ na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na daɓɔsʋ̃wayanɛ, ki deɗ ɓi kha: «Yo sʋ̃wa Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra dɩ̃ɩna sokhɛla, kɩ thʋɗɛ nɩpɩra nʋʋna kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila bʋ ɩra.
66011002	Ŋa yɩɛ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra gbɛ̃ɩgɩra kɛɩ sʋ̃waʔ, naɗɩɛ gɩɛ hãan ma Yekire kʋɔdɛrɩwɛ. Pɩ ɓa asɩ wa mɩyɩra bɩɛ gbonyɛgɛŋɩra za na nan ferewe tigbeyɔ̃ na pɩyɔ̃ (42).
66011003	Mɩ ɓa dãa mɩ sɩɛrɛwɛ pɩyɔ̃, pɩ ɓa yii wa thɩ̃ɩsɩ̃ndaasɛ, pɩ ɓa yã de ɓa Yekila sɩɛsɩra pi ɓuuri na yo nan khɩɛwɛ kpɩɛkpo na gbalɩga na tigbesãa (1,260).»
66011004	Sɩɛrɛwɩra pɩyɔ̃ra kɩ bʋ oliviye hasɛ yɔ̃ra dɩ̃ɩna lamawɩra yɔ̃ra, kɩ bʋ fɔlɔŋɔ Adɛyɛ wʋɔla za ɩra.
66011005	Na nɩra ʋɔ kha ʋɔ ɓɩɛ na le sɩɛrɛwɩra pɩyɔ̃ra mɩbɩ̃yɛ, naaga kure wa pɩ nʋʋsɩra za na so pɩ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra. Iyo, nɩra tʋɔ nɩra kɩ ɓa ɓɩɛ kha ʋɔ le wi bɩ̃ɩsɛ, mafɩra ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa hu.
66011006	Wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa sɩɛrɛwɩra pɩyɔ̃ra heke na baka zaazaara, hã adaga wa waʔ, ɓanu kha pi yãan deɗ Yekila sɩɛsɩra. Wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa pi heke na vɩkɩ̃n ãmɛ na le wi tarɩmɛ, kɩ tɩɩ wɔgbʋ̃ʋ kpakpasɛ thĩnye bɩɛ fɔlɔŋɩra za, bɛnɛ tʋɔ bɛnɛ pɩ ɓɩɛ.
66011007	Na pɩ ɓa zuon Yekila sɩɛsɩra deɓira za bɛndɛ, dakperigira kɩ bʋ dankokorikira kɛɩ le diikhɛla ʋ, gɩɛ ɓa kure na khɛ̃ɩ pɩ. Gɩɛ dakperidaagɩɛ ɓa wɔrɩ pɩ, na khʋ wɩ.
66011008	Pɩ kpɩ̃ɩsɩra ɓa hɩɗan ma gɩɛ gbongbʋ̃ɔŋɩra khɩ̃nthaagɩra za, khaala za pɩ Adɛyɩra ɓaɗ nɩɓadaɓɔkɩra za ɩra. Pɩ yɩ ɓa gɩɛ gboŋira na kɔrɔ kha Sodɔmʋ warɩma Eziwiti.
66011009	Thĩnye bɩɛ nɩpɛ, na gbɛ̃ɩnyɩra bɩɛ nɩpɛ, na sɩɛsɛ thĩnye bɩɛ nɩpɛ, na sɩrɩsɛ bɩɛ nɩpɛ ɓa ki ken ma pɩ kpɩ̃ɩsɩra na nan khɩɛwɛ pɩsãa na gbuko, pɩ ɓa bɩ yɩɛ pɩ kasɩ wɩ waʔ.
66011010	Dunuya nɩpɩra bɩɛ bãanyɛ ɓa wuo wa na pi huumira. Pɩ ɓa yãgayãga wa na le kɛnɛsɛ kɩ kɩ dãa leke mɩyɛ kɩ hã kamɛ bɩɛ Yekire dãarabɩɛ yɔ̃ra huume kãma, naɗɩɛ pɩ vɛnɛn ma dunuyara nɩpɩra gbaangbo.
66011011	Ŋa, baa bɩɛ khɩɛbɩɛ pɩsãa na gbukira tann zuori, na Yekila gbũun yiin nime bɩɛ yãdedɛrɩbɩɛ za na pɩ alɩnɩ. Dɩɛ bɛna wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kha ken mi, na ãnabirise gbũun gɔɗ pɩ gbaangbo.
66011012	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na bɩɛ dãarabɩɛ yɔ̃ra nuun nʋʋga na kɩ kʋ̃nn zaazaara ni na faŋa kha: «Ɩ̃ gan ɓan fara!» Fɩ za na pɩ gann zaazaara ni dadʋ̃nɩsɛ kpoloŋo za pɩ bɩ̃ɩrawɩra wʋɔla za.
66011013	Dɩɛ khaala bɩɛ za fɩ na fɔlɔngbanbɩ̃ɩga liiri. Na gɩɛ gboŋira kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ gbũnera tikpora bɩɛ kiin na khʋʋn nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ (7,000) gɩɛ fɔlɔngbaŋɩra za. Na ãnabirise gɔɗ nɩgbupira gbaangbo na pɩ gbɩ̃nɛn zaazaa Yekila.
66011014	Bãnɩyɔ̃ asɩgɩra tann ma. Ŋa bãnɩsãa bɛgɩra bu thuo gɩɛ yanɩ dɔ bɛnɛ tɩ̃.
66011015	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ mɛlɛgɛra tɩɩrɛn u tũuna. Na nʋʋsɛ sɩyɔ̃ kʋ̃nn na faŋa zaazaara ni na deɗ kha: «Ɩra wɩɛ, fɔlɔŋɩra ɩɩgɩra liin ma a Adɛyɛ Yekila na ʋ Kirisitira bɛgɛ. Ʋɔ kɩ ɓa hɩɗan ɩɩgɩra za bãanyɛ bɩɛ kũu.»
66011016	Na nɩkhãgawɩra tigbiire na piyĩira kɩ bʋ pɩ ɩɩkhosira za Yekila wʋɔla za, na bɩɛ ɓaɗ wʋɔyɛ fɔlɔŋɩra za na gbɩ̃nɛn Yekila
66011017	ki ki de kha: «Adɛyɛ Yekire, wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ, mʋɔ kɩ bʋ, mʋɔ kha bʋ, mʋɔ aa gbɩ̃nɛ naɗɩɛ mʋ ɓɔgɔn ma mʋ wɔrɩkpakpakɩra, ki tiin mʋ ɩɩgɩra na gɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra.
66011018	Sɩrɩsɩra nɩpɩra donse na hĩin ma, ŋa mʋɔ doŋira bɛna nann ɩra, nɩhuomira kiti bɛna nann ma ɩra, bɛna mʋ ɓa taa mu miliinɓiiwira kɩ bʋ mʋ yãdedɛrɩwɩra dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ bʋ mʋ bɛwɛ, dɩ̃ɩna pɩ gbɩ̃nɛ mʋ ɩra nɩgbʋ̃ɔmɩra na tɩtɩɩpɩra. Wɛpɩɛ kɩ asɩ fɔlɔŋɩra, bɩɛ asɩ bɛna nann ɩra.»
66011019	Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra kɩ bʋ zaazaara ni, na gɩɛ phiin zɩɛrɩ. Na Yekila nʋhãakɛsura yãan ʋ gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra kpoloŋira za. Dɩɛ bɛna na adaga yɩ̃gamɛ, na sɔŋɔsɛ, na adaga lʋrʋgɩ̃nsɛ, na fɔlɔngbaŋa liiri, dɩ̃ɩna na adaga banbʋrʋsɛ waan gbaangbo.
66012001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na tagamasi mɩkpakpaɗɛ dʋɔ liin zaazaara ni. Mɩ yãan ma hara ʋɔ na khɩɛra maan ʋ za, ʋ ɗɩɛsɩra na ɗʋkɩ̃nn ma feregera za, dɩ̃ɩna khʋsaɓiye gbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃ maan kamɛ za na liin ɩɩgbanfɩla ʋ thaagɩra za.
66012002	Ʋɔ hara wɩɛ kha kãn ma na hũn ɓiye, lɔwʋla hũmira nʋnʋmɩra kha yɩɛ wa na ʋ fʋʋ gbaangbo.
66012003	Na tagamasi mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ liin zaazaara ni tɩ̃. Gbaŋa dakpere mamʋkpakpaka gʋɔ kha bʋ na thaasɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ dɩ̃ɩna tʋ̃nyɛ gbũne. Thaasɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra bɩɛ kpo kpora na siɗ ɓa na ɩɩgbanfɩlawɛ.
66012004	Na kɩ khɩɛn kɩ ɗɩkɩra na phagan zaazaa khʋsaɓiyira kpɩkɩ̃nkhɛyɛ sãara tikpora na gboɗ i fɔlɔŋɩra za. Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na gɩɛ gbaŋa dakpere mamʋkpakpakɩra yo hɩɗann hala kha kãn na hũn, ʋɔ wʋɔla za kɩ tɩɛ kha ɓiɓona hũn gɩɛ gɔ khʋɔ rɩ.
66012005	Hala kha u hũn, na u hũnn ma ɓikhoyiɗe, dɩɛ ɓikhoyiɗɩɛ ɓa le wa ɩtakhuo na kori sɩrɩsɩra na khɩ̃ɩɓɔɗɛ. Baa ɓiira hũnni, na pɩ khɩɛn yuor u wa Yekila lɔkɩra ʋ ʋ ɩɩkhokira za.
66012006	Na hala ʋɔ alɩn na horon lonn gbaŋa ʋ khaala Yekila na ɔfɔn sann ʋ ɩra. Ʋ hɩɗann ma ni na pɩ kɩ hã ʋ ɗiime ɓanu kha ɗɩyãsɛ kpɩɛkpo na gbalɩga na tigbesãa tannɩ (1,260).
66012007	Dɩɛ bɛna na khɛ̃ɩgɛ gʋɔ alɩn zaazaara ni. Mɛlɛgɛ Misɛlɩ na ʋ mɛlɛgɛkamɩra alɩn kɩ khɛ̃ɩ na gbaŋa dakperege na kɩ mɛlɛgɛwɩra.
66012008	Ŋa ki ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ waʔ, khɩ̃nɛ thĩra ɓuun gɩɛ na kɩ mɛlɛgɛwɩra heke na hɩɗann zaazaara ni dʋ̃waʔ.
66012009	Gɩɛ gbaŋa dakpere kpakpakɩra ɗɛɗ hĩnn ma kʋwʋga ʋ. Gɩɛ gbaŋa dakpere kpakpakɩra pɩ yɩ tɩ̃ kha sʋwʋkhãaga, na gĩrime thadɛyɛ, na Sutana, dɩ̃ɩna dunuya ɓilendaa. Gɩɛ na kɩ mɛlɛgɛwɩra bɩɛ hĩnn ma fɔlɔŋɩra za.
66012010	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mi nuun nʋʋga gʋɔ na kɩ kʋ̃nn na faŋa zaazaara ni kha: «Ɩra zɩ̃mɛ bɛna nannɩ, ɩra a Yekila ɓɔgɔn ʋ wɔrɩkɩra na ʋ ɩɩgɩra! Ɩra thadɛrɩsɛ lonn u Kirisitira lesira za. Naɗɩɛ ɩra pɩ ɗɛɗ a yaɓiiwira zarɩgɩ̃ndaara na kusen u zaazaara ni, ʋɔ kha zarɩgɩ̃n mɩ a Yekila wʋɔla za khɩɛga na dawogo.
66012011	Ŋa a yaɓiiwira ɓuun ma wɔrɩkɔ ʋ za Yekila zãraɓiira tarɩmɩra wɔrɩkɩra za, dɩ̃ɩna baa pi liin Yekila sɩɛsɩra sɩɛrɛwɩra ɩra. Pɩ na kaarɩn ma pi nimira na yiin mi huume leke za.
66012012	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, zaazaa, na ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ zaazaara ni, ɩ̃ yãgayãga. Ŋa fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔnsɛ na si kpoloŋo mɩyɩra ɩɛ ʋɔ, wɔgbʋ̃ʋga bʋ wa ɩ̃ɛ bɛgɛ naɗɩɛ Sutana sũnn ma ɩ̃ɛ za. U gbũun hĩin ma na doŋo thĩ, naɗɩɛ u gbũun tʋʋn ma kha bɛna yɩɛn hãan ʋɔ, tɩ gɔn dʋ̃waʔ.»
66012013	Baa gɩɛ gbaŋa dakpere kpakpakɩɛ ɓa tʋʋn kha pi hĩnn ma gɩɛ fɔlɔŋɩra za, na kɩ alɩn kɩ ɗɛ ki thuo hala na hũnn ɓikhoyiɗa ɩra.
66012014	Ŋa hala na ɓuun ma yãwa kpakpakɩra mɩsɩra yɔ̃ra, na ɓu yɩɩ na yo harɩ gbangbĩriŋira za ni, khaala pɩ na ɔfɔn na hãar ʋ ɩra. Si le thaaga ʋ khaarɛ ɓu legen na sʋwʋgɩra. Pɩ hãar ʋ wa ɗiise u ki ɗi ni na ɓu ɗɩɩsɛ sãa na gbuko.
66012015	Dɩɛ bɛna na sʋwʋgɩra surun ãmɛ mʋ gaga kha lagagboro si le thaaga ãmɩra ɓu ho hala.
66012016	Ŋa na fɔlɔŋɩra dɛnfɛn hala, na phiin zɩɛn nʋʋga na yʋ̃ɔn lagagboro ɔkɩra bɩɛ gbaŋa dakpere kpakpakira na surun ɩra.
66012017	Baa gɩɛ dakpere kpakpakira doŋira na hĩin na hala na tannɩ, na kɩ vɩɗ gbũun kha gɩɛ yo khɛ̃ɩ na hala kpɩ̃raɓiiwira bʋɔra, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ gɔ Yekila sɩɛrɛdewensira, dɩ̃ɩna pi liin Yesura sɩɛrɛwɩra ɩra.
66012018	Gbaŋa dagberegira yo nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ma lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra geŋira za.
66013001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan dakperege gʋɔ na ki kure lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ za. Kɩ kha bʋ wa na tʋ̃nyɛ gbũne, dɩ̃ɩna thaasɛ wãnɩyɔ̃. Tʋ̃nyɩra gbũnera bɩɛ kha bʋ wa na ɩɩgbanfɩlawɛ. Yekire kʋsadaɓiye na sɛwɛn maan ma thaasɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra bɩɛ za.
66013002	Gɩɛ dakperegɩɛ mɩ na yãarɩ, kɩ na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na khiye, kɩ ɗɩɛsɩra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na zãngbo bɛsɛ, dɩ̃ɩna kɩ nʋʋgɩra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na zara nʋʋga. Dakpere kpakpakira khon ma kɩ wɔrɩkɩra za, na kɩ fankpakpakɩra za, kɩ khɩɛn kɩ ɩɩkhokira, na hãan dakperegira gɩ.
66013003	Dakperegira thaagɩra kpora na nʋgann ma harɩ na kɩ ɓɩɛ huume. Ŋa kpɩ̃ra za na kɩ nʋgakhɛla ɓa bãarɩ. Na kɩ bãamɩra khonn fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra bɩɛ bamʋŋa na pi ki thuo gi.
66013004	Pɩ kha gbɩ̃nɛ wa dakpere kpakpakɩra, naɗɩɛ baa kɩ na khon hãan gʋɔra wɔrɩkɔ ɩra. Pɩ kha gbɩ̃nɛ wa tɩ̃ dakperegira ki de kha: «Ãna kɩ bʋ mʋ gaga kha dakperegɩra, ãna kɩ ha nɩ́ɩrɛ́ kɩ wʋɔla za kha ʋɔ khɛ̃ɩ dɩ̃ɩn ŋɩ?»
66013005	Khɩ̃nɛ na hãan ma gɩɛ dakperegɩɛ na ki de yɩsɩɓɩɛsɩɛsɛ, na ki de kʋsaɓiye kɩ hã Yekila. Feriwe tigbeyɔ̃ na pɩyɔ̃ na hãan ŋɩ ki le wɛsɩɛ kɩ kãn le.
66013006	Kɩ gɔɗ ɓa ki de bɩ̃ɩsɛ kɩ hã Yekila, kɩ asɩ ʋ yɩsɩgɩra, dɩ̃ɩna khaala ʋ bʋ, dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ bʋ zaazaara ni ɩra.
66013007	Khɩ̃nɛ hãan ŋɩ wa kɩ khɛ̃ɩ dɩ̃ɩna Yekila nɩpɩra na gbũu ɓu wɔrɩkɔ pɩ za. Kɩ na ɓuun ma wɔrɩkɔ gbɛ̃ɩnyɩra bɩɛ za, na thĩnyira bɩɛ za, na sɩɛrɛthĩnsira bɩɛ za, na sɩrɩsɩra bɩɛ za.
66013008	Fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra bɩɛ ɓa gbɩ̃nɛ gɩ wa, fɔ Yekila nɩpɩra yɩsɩsɩra sɛwɛn harɩ dunuyara gɔbɛna thakosɛwʋgɩra za bʋɔtɛ. Gɩɛ thakosɛwʋgɩra bʋ wa Yekila Zãraɓiira bɛgɛ, ʋ wɩɛra u khonn thɔgɔnsɩra ɩra.
66013009	«Na numiye bʋ wɩɛ heke na nuure, u nuure na kɩ̃ra!
66013010	Wɩɛ bãa liin kaso kãma, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa yii wa kaso za. Wɩɛ bãa kɩ kãn khʋ na sɔrɔna, pɩ ɓa khʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra na sɔrɔna. Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ kiretɩ̃ɛwɛ, pɩ kãn ma na hɩɗan na baɓɛ na khãamɛ.»
66013011	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃ na mɩ yãan dakperege gʋɔ na ki kure fɔlɔŋɩra za. Kɩ kha bʋ wa na tʋ̃nyɛ ɩ̃yɔ̃ mʋ gaga kha zãrakhuo, ŋa kɩ kha sɩɛrɛ wa mʋ gaga kha dakpere kpakpaka.
66013012	Gɩɛ dakperegɩɛ kha liige wa na lʋgʋ dakperegira wɔrɩkɩra kɩ wʋɔla ʋ. Na kɩ karɩwan dunuyara nɩpɩra bɩɛ na pɩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ dakperegira kuɗ lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra ʋ, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ na nʋgann harɩ kɩ ɓɩɛ huumira na ɓa bãan ɩra.
66013013	Dakperegira kuɗ fɔlɔŋɩra, ki liin ma bamʋŋa mɩgɔnyɛ. Kɩ yɩɛn ma na naaga kuɗ zaazaara ni na sũnn nɩpɛ wʋɔla za fɩ.
66013014	Wɔrɩkɩra na hãan gɩɛ dakperegɩɛ, kɩ khɩɛn ma gɩɛ wɔrɩkɩra na liin bamʋŋa mɩyɛ na ɓilenn nɩgɔmɛ lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra dakperegira wʋɔla za. Na fɔlɔŋɩra dakperegira deɗ fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra kha pɩ maɗɛ sɩ̃ŋa kɩ khɩɛgɩ̃n na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra dakperegira sɔrɔnara na nʋgan na kɩ ɓɩɛ huumira na ɓa ɓuun thakuogo ɩra.
66013015	Khɩ̃nɛ na hãan ma dakperegira kuɗ fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ kha ki yii nin sɩ̃ŋɩra pɩ maɗɛn na kɩ khɩɛgɩ̃nn na dakperegɩra kuɗ lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra ɩra, kɩ wɔrɩ kɩ sɩɛrɛ. Na nɩra wɩɛ bãa kɛɩn kha ʋɔ gbɩ̃nɛ gɩɛ sɩ̃ŋɩra wa, kɩ khʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra.
66013016	Fɔlɔŋɩra dakperegɩra karɩwan ma nɩpɛ bɩɛ, nɩkpakpapɛ na tɩtɩɩpɛ, tigidɛrɩwɛ na bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ, ɗome na hɔrɔmɛ na yiin dɩ̃ŋasɛ pi leɗĩnsira za warɩma pi khoʔira za.
66013017	Na nɩra wɩɛ bãa bʋ na sɩɛ dɩ̃ŋasɩra waʔ, khɩ̃nɛ bʋ ʋɔ dɛyɩra heke na ɗoŋi warɩma na ɗon mɩɩnɛ waʔ. Sɩɛ dɩ̃ŋasɩra kɩ bʋ dakperegira kuɗ lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra ʋ, gɩɛ yɩsɩgɩra warɩma numɔrɔla kɩ makɩ̃n na kɩ yɩsɩgɩra.
66013018	Wɛsɩɛ za, fɔ mʋ hɩɗan na wʋɔmɛ. Wɩɛ bʋ na wʋɔmɛ ʋɔ dɛyɩra kɩ wɔrɩ tʋ na kpɩkɩ̃n dakperigira numɔrɔla, naɗɩɛ ʋɔ numɔrɔla makɩ̃nn ma na nɩra ʋɔ yɩsɩga. Ʋɔ numɔrɔla nʋʋna kɩ bʋ gbaasɩsãa na tiiwãnɩkpo na wãnɩkpo (666).
66014001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mi kenn yãan tɩ̃, Yekila zãraɓiira na ʋ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n Siyɔ̃ ɓɩɛgɩra thaagɩra za. Ʋ kha bʋ wa na nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ tiiwãnɩyɔ̃ na piyĩi (144,000). Ʋɔ thĩra yɩsɩgɩra dɩ̃ɩna u Siira yɩsɩgɩra na sɛwɛn ma bɩɛ nɩpɩra bɩɛ khoʔira za.
66014002	Na mi nuun nʋʋga gʋɔ na kɩ kʋ̃nn zaazaara ni mʋ gaga kha baa lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ uri ɩra, warɩma mʋ gaga kha baa adaga lʋrʋgɩ̃n ɩra. Kʋ̃mɩra mi nuuri, sɩ na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na koronzo khɩɗɛdɛwɛ khɩɗɛsɛ kʋ̃mɛ.
66014003	Bɩɛ nɩgɔngɔnbɩɛ bɩɛ kha bʋ wa ɩɩkhokira na Nindaawɩra piyĩira, dɩ̃ɩna nɩkhãgawɩra wʋɔla za, kɩ kɩ tɩ̃nɛ tɩ̃nfɛŋɛ. Nɩkpasa ʋɔ sii kha wɔrɩ mamarɩ gɩɛ tɩ̃ŋɩra waʔ, fɔ nɩpɛ kpɩɛwɛ tiiwãnɩyɔ̃ na piyĩira (144,000) Yekila ɗonn fɔlɔŋɩra za bʋɔtɛ.
66014004	Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ na bɩɩn teɗen pi thĩ na zɛrɩgɛ mɩyɛ waʔ, pɩ bɩɩn maan zɛrɩhapɛ thĩra za waʔ. Pɩ kha thuo wa zãraɓiira khaayɩra bɩɛ za ʋ kha yo. Yekila ɗonn mi wa na khonn mi dunuyara za pi ɓu le ʋɔ na Zãraɓiira lʋgʋ bɛwɛ.
66014005	Pɩ dɛrɩn phiin nʋʋga na tɔnn yãan waʔ. Pɩ bʋ wa kɛɩ le ɓilenkhɛrɛ.
66014006	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ na ʋ yɩɩ harɩ zaazaara ni. Ʋ kha kãn ma na de sɩɛrɛnʋʋkɛɩzuonse na fɔlɔŋɔ nɩpɩra, na sɩrɩsɩra bɩɛ nɩpɩra, na gbɛ̃ɩnyɩra bɩɛ, na sɩɛsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ heke.
66014007	Na ʋɔ mɛlɛgɛwɩɛ arɩgan yĩndolon na deɗ kha: «Ɩ̃ ãn Yekila kɩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ, naɗɩɛ u kitira bɛna nann ma. Iyo, ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ wɩɛra liin zaara, na fɔlɔŋɩra, na lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra, na lagawɩra bɩɛ ɩra.»
66014008	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃, na mɛlɛgɛ yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔ ʋɔ kuɗ na thuon ʋɔra ki ki de kha: «Gbongbʋ̃ɔŋɩra kiin ma, Babilɔnɩ kpakpawara kiin ma! Gɩɛ liin thaagɩra na yiin sɩrɩsɩra bɩɛ kakarɩliigira za.»
66014009	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃, na mɛlɛgɛ sãafɩ̃ramɔ ʋɔ thuon pɩyɔ̃ra bʋɔra na arɩgan yĩdolon ki de kha: «Wɩɛ bãa kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ dakperegira na kɩ sɩ̃ŋɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓu wa dɩ̃ŋasɛ u khoɗa za warɩma u lekira za,
