66014010	ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa yɔ̃ wa Yekila doŋo duvɛ̃n za. Ʋɔ duvɛ̃na ɓa hʋgan ma kɩ yɩɛ Yekila tuu u, u doŋo kaŋʋɔɗa za. Ʋ ɓa vɛn ma gbaangbo thĩ gĩriwi nawuroŋira za, mɛlɛgɛ yɛgɛmɩra dɩ̃ɩna Yekila Zãraɓiira wʋɔla za.
66014011	Wɩɛ bãa kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ dakperegira na kɩ sɩ̃ŋɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓu wa kɩ yɩsɩgɩra dɩ̃ŋasɩra, nakɛɩbĩiŋe gɩsɛ kɩ ɓa vɛnɛ ʋ bãanyɛ bɩɛ. Khɩɛga na dawogo, ʋ bʋ na gbarɩsɛ kũu waʔ sɩɛ vɛnsɩra za.»
66014012	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, wɩɛ bãa kɩ bʋ Yekila baa, na u nu ʋ sɩɛrɛdewensira dɩ̃ɩna ʋ khãa Yesura za, ʋɔ kãn ma kɩ ba gbaangbo.
66014013	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ kʋ̃nn zaazaara ni na deɗ ɓi kha: «Sɛwɛ wɛsɩɛ kha: Wɩɛ bãa kɩ khãa Adɛyɩra za ɩra wɩɛ, harɩ na yo nan huume, bãanwuogo bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛgɛ.» Ninyɛgɛmɔra deɗ ɓa kha: «Ʋ ɓa gbaarɩ wa, naɗɩɛ u liin miliinkɩ̃nsɛ.»
66014014	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mi kenn yãan tɩ̃ dadʋ̃nɩvɩrɩga. Dɛyɩra na hɩɗann kɩ za, ʋ dɛyɩra na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na nɩthɩ̃rɩɓikhiye. Sãnɩ ɩɩgbãnfɩla kha bʋ wa ʋ thaagɩra za, ʋ na gɔɗ ɓa wɔrɩsɔ ɗuɗugomo u lekira za.
66014015	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ kuɗ Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra za, na arɩgan yĩndolon na deɗ wɩɛra na hɩɗann dadʋ̃nɩŋɩra za kha: «Hĩn mʋ wɔrɩsɔra na wɛɩ ɗiisira, naɗɩɛ sɩ hɛɩbɛna nann ma, fɔlɔŋɩra ɗiisira nann ma.»
66014016	Dɩɛ bɛna, wɩɛra na hɩɗann dadʋ̃nɩŋɩra za, na u hĩnn ʋ wɔrɩsɔra fɔlɔŋɩra ʋ, na fɔlɔŋɩra ɗiisira hɛɩrɩ.
66014017	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ kuɗ Yekila gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra kɩ bʋ arɩgɩ̃nara za ɩra. Ʋɔ na gɔɗ ɓa wɔrɩsɔ ɗuɗugomo tɩ̃.
66014018	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ kuɗ dakhoronse sokhɛla za. Ʋɔ kha bʋ wa na wɔrɩkɔ naaga za. Na ʋɔ sɩɛrɛn na faŋa na deɗ wɩɛra na gɔɗ wɔrɩsɔ ɗugomora kha: «Hĩn mʋ wɔrɩsɔ ɗugomora na kpii ɛrɛzɛ̃n tɔsɩra fɔlɔŋɩra za, naɗɩɛ u thuon ma.»
66014019	Na ʋɔ mɛlɛgɛra hĩnn ʋ wɔrɩsɔra fɔlɔŋɩra za na kpiin ɛrɛzɛ̃n tɔsɩra bɩɛ fɔlɔŋɩra za. Kɩ khɩɛr ʋ na yo hĩnn u ɛrɛzɛn pisikhɛkpakpaɗa za. Sɩɛ kɩ ɓɔgɔ Yekila doŋira.
66014020	Na pɩ tawɩn ɛrɛzɛna pisikhɛla za, gboŋo kpɩ̃rara ʋ. Na ʋ ãmɩra liin tarɩmɛ na khãrɩn na yuon kilomɛtɩrɩwɛ gbalɩga na tiwãa siira (300). Baa pɩ kha khãrɩ, na nɩra na lonn bʋ ʋ nan ma hagayɛ.
66015001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan tagamasi mɩkpakpaɗɛ dʋɔ zaazaara ni, wɛtɛ khonn mɩɛ bamʋŋa gbaangbo. Mɛlɛgɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra na gɔɗ ɓa wɔgbʋ̃ʋ kpakpasɛ wãnɩyɔ̃. Wɔgbʋ̃ʋkpakpaphɩlɩyansɩra sɩɛ. Naɗɩɛ Yekila ɓa khon ma u donphɩlɩyaŋɩra nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra za.
66015002	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃, na mɩ yãan mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ mʋ gaga kha lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ, tɩ kha yɩ̃ŋa wa mʋ gaga kha dʋgalen, na naaga yãgamɩnn ʋ za. Wɛpɩɛ na ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ dakperegɩra za, na kɩ sɩ̃ŋɩra za, dɩ̃ɩna dakperigira za wɛkɛ numɔrɔla makɩ̃nn na ʋ yɩsɩgɩra, bɩɛ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n gɩɛ lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra ɔkɩra za, Yekila korozowe kha bʋ wa pi lesira za.
66015003	Pɩ kha tɩ̃nɛ wa Yekila miliinɓiye Moyizi tɩ̃ŋa na Yekila zãraɓiira tɩ̃ŋa kha: «Adɛyɛ, wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekire! Mu miliinyira gbɩ̃n ma dɩ̃ɩna i khon ma nɩpɛ bamʋŋa! Thĩnye bɩɛ ɩya, mʋ mɩyɛ makɩ̃n lɔmɩra bɩɛ telenn ma, dɩ̃ɩna tɩ̃ya bʋ wa ɩ za!
66015004	Ãna kɩ ha kɛɩ kha ʋɔ gbɩ̃nɛ mʋ waʔ, Adɛyɛ? Ãna kɩ ha kɛɩ kha ʋɔ tɩ̃nɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ mʋ waʔ? Iyo, mʋɔ kpora kɩ bʋ yɛgɛmɔra. Sɩrɩsɩra bɩɛ nɩpɩra ɓa ɓan ma na ɓa ɓa huruse mʋ wʋɔla za, naɗɩɛ mu miliintelenyenyira ɓɔgɔn ma nɩpɛ na yɛɗɩ.»
66015005	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za tɩ̃, na mɩ yãan na Yekila ɗɔthʋʋga kharɩyɛgɛna phiin zɩɛn zaazaara ni. Gɩɛ ɗɔthʋʋgɩra kha ɓɔgɔ wa kha Yekila kha bʋ wa pɩ sʋgʋmʋra za.
66015006	Mɛlɛgɛwɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra kha bʋ na wɔgbʋ̃ʋ kpakpasɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra, na bɩɛ kuɗ Yekila kharɩyɛgɛna za. Pɩ na yiin ma davɩrɩyɩ̃ŋaransɛ wɛsɛ na lʋɗɛn na phuru kpɩ̃ntɩtɩɩʔɛ, kɩ vɔɗ pɩ hagayɩra na sãnɩ kagarawɛ.
66015007	Na Nindaawɩra piyĩira ʋɔ hãan mɛlɛgɛwɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra sãnɩ kaŋʋɔʔɛ wãnɩyɔ̃. Ɩ bɩɛ na hĩin ma na Yekire kɛɩhuomora doŋo.
66015008	Dɩɛ bɛna na gɩsɛ sʋɔ hĩɗen Yekila kharɩyɛgɛna, sɩɛ gɩsɩra ɓɔgɔ wa Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra na ʋ wɔrɩkɩra. Nɩra sii kha wɔrɩ lon Yekila kharɩyɛgɛna za waʔ ɓanu kha mɛlɛgɛwɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra wɔgbʋ̃ʋ kpakpasɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra liin zuori.
66016001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na kʋ̃nkpakpapɛ bʋɔ kʋ̃nn Yekila kharɩyɛgɛna za. Bɩɛ kʋ̃mɩra kha de ɓa mɛlɛgɛwɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra kha: «Ĩ yo wusĩn Yekila doŋira kaŋʋɔʔɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra fɔlɔŋɩra za.»
66016002	Na lʋgʋ mɛlɛgɛra yo wusĩn ʋ kaŋʋɔɗa fɔlɔŋɩra za. Nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra kha bʋ na dakperegira kpiisira, na pɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ sɩ̃ŋɩra, na kpolonbãbɩ̃nbɩ̃ɩnyɛ kuɗ bɩɛ bɩɛ za.
66016003	Na mɛlɛgɛ yʋ̃ɔfɩ̃ramɔra wusĩn ʋ kaŋʋɔɗa lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra za. Na ãmɩra bɩɛ vɩkɩ̃nn na liin mʋ gaga kha nɩthɩ̃rɩhuomo tarɩmɛ. Na ãmɩra daawɩra bɩɛ huuri.
66016004	Na mɛlɛgɛ sãafɩ̃ramɔra wusĩn ʋ kaŋʋɔɗa lagagborowe na lagawɛ za. Na pɩ ãmɩra bɩɛ vɩkɩ̃nn na liin tarɩmɛ.
66016005	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mi nuun mɛlɛgɛra kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɩra ãmɩra za na ʋɔ deɗ kha: «Mʋɔ Yekire yɛgɛmɔ, mʋɔ kɩ bʋ, dɩ̃ɩna mʋ kha bʋ, mu telenn ma, naɗɩɛ baa mu kitikpaɓɩra telenn ɩra.
66016006	Naɗɩɛ pi gboɗ ɓa mʋ nɩpɩra dɩ̃ɩna mʋ yãdedɛwɛ tarɩmɩra, gɩɛ yɩɛn na mʋ hãan mɩ tarɩmɛ bɩɛ le pɩ ãnyʋɔmɩra, sɩɛ kɩ makɩ̃n mɩ!»
66016007	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mi nuun na sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ kuɗ dakhoronse sokhɛla za kha: «Tɩ̃ya ʋ, Adɛyɛ Yekire, Wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ, mu kitira bʋ wa tɩ̃ya, u telenn ma!»
66016008	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na bãnɩyĩi mɛlɛgɛra wusĩn ʋ kaŋʋɔɗa khɩɛra za. Na wɔrɩkɔ hãan khɩɛra u ɓu so nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra na u wuroŋira.
66016009	Na khɩɛra wuroŋira suon nɩpɛ gbaangbo. Kɛna sɩɛ bɩɛ za, baa pɩ naa gbũure pi thĩ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila, na pɩ kɩ kʋsa ʋ wa, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ sɩɛ wɔgbʋ̃ʋ kpakpasɩra za ɩra.
66016010	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na bãnɩwãa mɛlɛgɛra wusĩn ʋ kaŋʋɔɗa dakperegira ɩɩkhokira za. Na dabirige zɩ̃nn dakperegɩra ɩɩgɩra bɩɛ. Na nɩpɛ kɩ nʋn pɩ nʋgbɛʔɛ vɛnbɩ̃ɩsɛ kãma.
66016011	Na pɩ hɩɗann kɩ yɩ zaazaa Yekila yɩsɩbɩ̃ɩga pɩ vɛnsɩra na pi kpolonbãʔɩra kãma. Pɩ bɩɩn vɩkɩ̃nn pi kpolonsira na zɩɛn pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira waʔ.
66016012	Na bãnɩwanɩkpo mɛlɛgɛra yo wusĩn ʋ kaŋʋɔɗa lagagborola pɩ yɩ kha Efɩratɩra, ʋɔ za. Na ʋɔ hʋʋrɛn khaala za fɩ kɩ zɩɛn khɩ̃nɛ na hãan khɩɛkuregɛŋɛ ɩɩwɛ.
66016013	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan nĩnbɩ̃ɩwɛ pɩsãa pɩ na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na laga gbokʋ̃nsɛ na pi kure dakpere kpakpakɩra, na dakperegira, dɩ̃ɩna tɔndɛyãdedaara nʋʋsɩra za.
66016014	Sutana dãan bɩɛ ninbɩ̃ɩbɩɛ pi ki le bamʋŋa mɩyɛ. Pɩ ɓa yo bĩŋin ma fɔlɔŋɩra ɩɩwɩra bɩɛ, kɩ tɩɛ wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekila ɗɩyãgagbʋ̃ɔŋɩra khɛ̃ɩgɩra.
66016015	Na Adɛyɩra deɗ kha: «Ken, mɩ ɓa ɓan ma mʋ gaga kha zugbũro. Na wɩɛ hɩɗann ko, kɩ zɩɛn ʋ dayiinsira ʋ lɔkɔ ʋ, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa ʋɔ dɛyɩra bɛgɛ. Mafɩra, ʋ dɛyɩra ɓa nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ taanbole waʔ, na nɩpɛ yãar ʋ, nɩɩsɛ ɓa gɔ ʋ waʔ.»
66016016	Na ninbɩ̃ɩwɩra yo bĩŋinn ɩɩwɩra khaarɛ tikpo. Pɩ yɩ ɓa dɩɛ khaala Eburuse za kha «Aramagedɔ̃.»
66016017	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ mɛlɛgɛra wusĩn ʋ kaŋʋɔɗa sarɩmɛ za. Na sɩɛrɛgbʋɔ̃nsɛ sʋɔ kuɗ ɩɩkhokira khaala za, Yekila kharɩyɛgɛna kpoloŋira za na deɗ kha: «Si liin ma zuori.»
66016018	Dɩɛ bɛna na adaga gɔɗ kɩ yɩ̃ga, na sɩɛsɛ kɩ kʋ̃n, na adaga kɩ lʋrʋgɩ̃n, na fɔlɔŋɔ gbann gbaangbo. Gɩɛ fɔlɔngbaŋɩra thĩna dɛrɩn liin yãan waʔ, harɩ na khɛ bɛna nɩthɩ̃rɩga bʋ fɔlɔŋɩra za.
66016019	Na gbonkpakpakɩra kpɩkɩ̃nn khaayɛ ɩsãa, kɩ yɩɛn na sɩrɩsɩra sʋɔra gbonsira sʋɔra bɩɛ waarɩ. Na Yekila kʋɔgɩ̃nn na Babilɔnɩ kpakpawara. Na ʋ hãan Babilɔnɩ nɩpɩra u donkpakpakɩra duvɛ̃n kaŋʋɔɗa na pɩ yʋ̃ɔrɩ.
66016020	Fɔlɔnkhaarɩphanyɩra bɩɛ kha bʋ ãmɩra sʋgʋmʋwɩra za, na ɩɛ bɩɛ tũruni, ɓɩɛgɛ sii yãan dʋ̃waʔ.
66016021	Na adaga banbʋrʋnunuse kuɗ zaara, kikpo nugomira kha nan ma kilowe tigbeyɔ̃ siira, na waan nɩpɛ za. Sɩɛ adaga banbʋrʋsɩra vɛnsɩra kãma, na nɩthɩ̃rɩpɛ hɩɗann kɩ asɩ Yekila yɩsɩgɩra. Naɗɩɛ, sɩ wɔgbʋ̃ʋgɩra kha gbɩ̃n ma thĩ gbaangbo.
66017001	Dɩɛ bɛna, mɛlɛgɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra kha bʋ na kaŋʋɔʔɩra pi lesira za, na pɩ ʋɔ zʋ̃ʋn nann mɩɛ na deɗ ɓi kha: «Zɛrɩhala yɩsɩgɩra kuɗ gbaangbora kɛna ʋɔ kɩ bʋ lagagborowe sʋgʋmʋwɩra za, lɔmɩra za ʋɔ zɛrɩharɩwɩɛ ɓa vɛn, ɓan mɩ ɓɔgɔ mʋ sɩ.
66017002	Dunuyara ɩɩwɩra liin ma zɛrɩgɛ na ʋɔ hara wɩɛ. Na sɩɛ liin thaaga na dunuyara nɩpɩra liin kakarɩledɛwɛ.
66017003	Dɩɛ bɛna na Ninyɛgɛmɔra sũnn mɩ za, na mɛlɛgɛra khɩɛn yuon mi harɩ gbangbĩriŋe gʋɔ za. Baa mɩ nann ni, na mɩ yãan hara ʋɔ na ʋ hɩɗann gbaŋadamawa ʋɔ za. Gɩɛ gbaŋadaɗuoro gɩɛ kha bʋ wa na thaasɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ dɩ̃ɩna tʋ̃nyɛ gbũne, Yekire kʋsa daɓiye na sɛwɛn na maan ʋ gbɔɗa bɩɛ za.
66017004	Hala na yiin ma lowumamʋkɩ̃kɩ̃nɛ, ʋ gbɛkɩ̃nn ma na sãnɩ, dɩ̃ɩna bʋrʋkɩ̃rɩnyɛ yʋɔ thĩne, na boɓikɩ̃rɩnyɛ. Ʋ na gɔɗ ɓa sãnɩ kaŋʋɔɗɛ, tɩ na hĩin ma na mɩkarɩyɛ doro ʋ kakarɩliigira kãma.
66017005	Yɩsɩga gʋɔ na sɛwɛn u khoɗa za, gɩɛ yɩsɩgɩra kɔla kha bʋ wa na gũni. Gɩɛ yɩsɩgɩra kɩ bʋ kha Babilɔnɩ kpakpawara kɩ bʋ zɛrɩhapɛ na mɩkarɩyɛ thĩna bɩɛ yaara.»
66017006	Mɩ na yãan ma kha hala na yʋ̃ɔn ma Yekila nɩpɩra tarɩmɛ, bɩɛ wɛpɩɛ pɩ na khʋʋn naɗɩɛ baa pɩ kha bʋ Yesura sɩɛrɛwɛ ɩra. Baa mɩ yãar ʋ, na bamʋŋa khonn mi gbaangbo.
66017007	Na mɛlɛgɛra bʋ̃ɗ ɓɩ kha: «Be liin na bamʋŋa khonn mu? Mɩ ɓa de ɓu hara wɩɛ gũnira. Gbaŋadaɗuoro mamʋgɩra za ʋ hɩɗan mɩra, na kɩ na thaasɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra, dɩ̃ɩna tʋ̃nyɛ gbũnera, mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ mʋ sɩɛ kɔla tɩ̃.
66017008	Gbaŋadaɗuoro mamʋgɩra mʋ yãan mɩra, kɩ kha bʋ wa bʋ harɩ khɔ̃ɩ, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ kɩ bʋ dʋ̃waʔ, kɩ ɓa kure wa dankokorikira kɛɩ le diikhɛla ʋ, kɩ yɩɛ kɩ asɩ na khon fɩ pere. Na khɛ dunuyara lebɛna, nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra yɩsɩsɩra kɩ bʋ Yekila thakosɛwʋra za waʔ, bɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa yã gɩɛ gbaŋadaɗuoro mamʋŋɩra, bamʋŋa khon mi na yã kha kɩ bʋ wa thakuogo za bere, naɗɩɛ kɩ kha bʋ wa bʋ harɩ khɔ̃ɩra, ŋa ɩra wɩɛ kɩ bʋ dʋ̃waʔ. Ŋa sɩɛ bɩɛ za kɩ ɓa vɩ ɓan ma tɩ̃.»
66017009	«Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɛlɛgɛra deɗ ɓi kha: Wɛsɩɛ za, fɔ nɩpɛ hɩɗan na wʋɔmɛ na tʋ wɛsɩɛ kɔla. Gbaŋadaɗuoro mamʋgɩra thaasɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra bɩɛ kpo kpora bɩɛ bʋ wa ɓɩɛdise, sɩɛ za hala hɩɗanɩ. Sɩ ɓɔgɔ wa ɩyawɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ mɩyɛ tɩ̃.
66017010	Bɩɛ ɩɩwɩra za, pɩwãa waan ma, bãnɩwanɩkpo baara bʋ wa ʋ ɩɩga za, bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ baara khɩɛn ʋ ɩɩgɩra thonn waʔ. Ŋa na ʋɔ ɓa hɩɗann ʋ ɩɩgɩra za, ʋ ɓa lɛɩ kɩ za waʔ.
66017011	Gbaŋadaɗuorora kha bʋ khɔ̃ɩra kɩ ɓa tũruni, bãnɩwanɩsãa ɩyara ʋɔ, ʋ bʋ wa ɩɩwɩra wãnɩyɔ̃ra ʋɔ. Ʋɔ yo asɩ khon ma fɩ pere tɩ̃.»
66017012	«Tʋ̃nyɩra gbũnera mʋ yãan mɩra, ɩɛ bʋ wa ɩɩɓaramɛ gbũne bʋɔ mɩyɛ. Gbaŋadaɗuorora ɓa hã wɩ wa ɩɩgɩra. Pɩ ɓa ɗi wa ɩɩgɩra bɛnkpekpereɗe doro za na kamɛ.
66017013	Bɩɛ ɩɩwɩra gbũnera gagasɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa kpuore. Pɩ ɓɩɛ wa na dɩɛ pɩ wɔrɩkɩra na pɩ faŋɩra na liige hã gbaŋadaɗuorogira.
66017014	Pɩ khɛ̃ɩ wa na Yekila zãraɓiira, ŋa Yekila zãraɓiira ɓa wɔrɩ pɩ, naɗɩɛ ʋɔ kɩ bʋ adɛrɩwɛ Adɛyɩra dɩ̃ɩna ɩɩwɛ Ɩyara. Yekila zãraɓiira na wɛpɩɛ u yɩɗɩ, na wɛpɩɛ u kenn khonni, na wɛpɩɛ kɩ khãa ʋ za, bɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa ɓu wa wɔrɩkɔ.»
66017015	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɛlɛgɛra deɗ ɓi kha: «Ãmɩra mʋ yãan na zɛrɩhala hɩɗann pɩ za mɩra, bɩɛ kɩ bʋ nɩpɩra, na nɩgbosira, na sɩrɩsɩra, dɩ̃ɩna sɩɛsɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ.
66017016	Gbaŋadaɗuorogira na kɩ tʋ̃nyɩra gbũnera, ɓa arɩ zɛrɩhala za na yãasɩ̃n ʋ. Pɩ ɓa zɩ̃n ma mɩyɩra bɩɛ kɩ bʋ u heke kɩ zɩɛ ʋ tãanbole. Pɩ ɓa khʋɔ wa ʋ gbɔɗa khaasɩra ki so gbusira.
66017017	Iyo, Yekila yiin sɩɛ gagasɩra pɩ za pi ɓu le ʋɔ dĩŋo, na dɩɛ pɩ fansɩra na liige na hã gɩɛ gbaŋadaɗuorogira, si le thaaga Yekila sɩɛrɛdewensira yo hĩi.»
66017018	«Hala mʋ yãan mɩra, fɔlɔŋɩra gbongbʋ̃ɔŋɩra ki ɗi faŋɩra ɩɩwɩra za, ʋɔ ʋ.»
66018001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra na mɩ yãan mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ na u kuɗ zaazaara ni ki sũn. Wɔrɩkpakpaka kha bʋ wa u heke. Ʋ ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra na yɛɗɛn ma fɔlɔŋɩra khaayɩra bɩɛ.
66018002	Na ʋ dʋɗ na faŋa na deɗ kha: «U kiin ma, Babilɔnɩkpakpawara kiin ma. Ɩra wɩɛ, ki liin ma ninbɩ̃ɩwɛ thĩnye bɩɛ, na wurutegenkarɩsɛ hʋ̃nkhɛrɛ.
66018003	Naɗɩɛ dunuyara sɩrɩsɩra bɩɛ mamarɩn ma zɛrɩgɩra liimira Babilɔnɩkpakpawara heke. Fɔlɔŋɩra ɩɩwɩra dɩɛn ma na ʋɔ na liin zɛrɩgɛ. Fɔlɔŋɩra wãkɩ̃ndɛrɩwɩra liin ma ɓudanɩpɛ u ɓudakpakpakɩra kãmara za.»
66018004	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mi nuun sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ na sɩ kʋ̃nn zaazaara ni kha: «Mɩ nɩpɛ, ĩ kure Babilɔnɩra si le thaaga hã ɩ̃ ɓa lon dɩ̃ɩn mɩ pɩ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira za waʔ, hã ɩ̃ ɓa ɓu wɔgbʋ̃ʋ kpakpasɩra kɩ ɓa nan mɩ waʔ.
66018005	Naɗɩɛ ʋ mɩbɩ̃yɛliigira gbɩ̃nn ma na yo nann harɩ zaazaara ni. Yekila phaan ʋ lelɔnbɩ̃ɩwɩra waʔ.
66018006	Ɩ̃ gɔ ʋ mʋ gaga kha baa ʋ gɔɗ bʋɔra, wɛsɩɛ u liiri, ĩ khon sɩ taasɩra ʋ za bãnɩyɔ̃. Kaŋʋɔɗa za u na yiin ʋ thãamɩra, ĩ hĩɗe ri na wɛpɛ kɩ hʋgan bãnɩyɔ̃ na tãra wɛpɩɛ ʋ na yɩɛ na bʋɔra yʋ̃ɔrɩ.
66018007	Baa ʋ khɩɛn mɩkɩ̃nɩnyɛ na ɓudaga na liin u thĩ nɩgbʋ̃ɔmɔ, ĩ yii u vɛnsɛ na gagayãgamɩŋa za mafɩra. Naɗɩɛ ʋ gaga wa kha ʋɔ bʋ wa ɩɩhara, wɩɛ khuo kɩ bʋ thakuogo za. U ken kha ɓɩɩga ɓa kure ʋɔ heke kũu waʔ.
66018008	Gɩɛ yɩɛrɩ, ɗɩyãga kpo, ʋ ɓa ɓu wɔgbʋ̃ʋsɛ, ɓobɩ̃ɩsɛ ɓa gɔ ʋ, ɓɩɩga ɓa hɩɗan u heke, khʋ̃mʋŋa ɓa wa ʋ, naaga ɓa so u. Sɩɛ bɩɛ kɩ ɓa nan ʋ, naɗɩɛ Adɛyɛ Yekila kɩ gbʋ̃ʋrɛ ʋ wʋɔla, wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa u heke.»
66018009	Fɔlɔŋɩɛ ɩɩwɩra liin zɛrɩgɩra ki ɗiin ɓudɛrɩsɛ dɩ̃ɩna hala, na bɩɛ ɓa yãan ki soɓe gɩsɩra na si dũn, pɩ ɓa fʋʋ wa kɩ mɩyɛ za gbaangbo.
66018010	Pɩ ɓa nɩ́ɩrɛ́ wa na legen dɩ̃ɩn ŋɩ ãnabirise kãma, hã gɩɛ wɔgbʋ̃ʋgɩra ɓa nan bɩɛ waʔ. Pɩ ɓa ki de ɓa kha: «Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga! Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga! Be wɔgbʋ̃ʋthĩŋe waan Babilɔnɩkpakpawara! Khohʋwʋwɛ gboŋira wɔrɩn asɩn na khonn lɩɛrɩ ukpo kpoloŋo za fɩ mɩra kɛ!»
66018011	Fɔlɔŋɩra wãkɩ̃ndɛrɩwɩra bʋ fʋʋ wa gbaangbo gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ asɩmɩra kãmara za. Naɗɩɛ nɩra sii bu ɗon pɩ daɗoŋinrensira dʋ̃waʔ.
66018012	Pɩ kha ɗoŋin ma sãnɩ, warɩvɩra, na bʋrʋdekɩ̃kɩ̃nɩyɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ, dɩ̃ɩna boɓiye, na lowuphemamʋnyɛ, na lowupheyɩ̃ŋaranyɛ, na lowuphekɩ̃rɩnyɩra thĩna bɩɛ, na dahasɛ thĩnyira bɩɛ ɗorisira kɩ hʋga, na daasɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ pɩ khɩɛn dʋ̃nʋyɩgɩrɛ na liin ɩra, na mɩyɩra bɩɛ pi liin na dahakɩ̃rɩsɛ wɛsɩɛ ɓuume kɩ hʋgan ɩra, dɩ̃ɩna wɛsɩɛ pi liin na khɩ̃ɩsɛ na bʋrʋkɩ̃rɩnyɛ.
66018013	Pɩ kha ɗoŋin ma dawãsɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ nuugira kɩ nʋʋ ɩra dɩ̃ɩna wusuna nunʋwã thĩnyira bɩɛ, na duvɛ̃n, na nʋʋmɛ, na muume na ɗiise, na naawɛ, na zãrawɛ, na zagawɛ, na zagawotorose, na ɗome, na kasoɓiiwe.
66018014	Na bɩɛ wãkɩ̃ndɛrɩbɩɛ hɩɗann ki wukĩn gɩɛ gboŋira mɩyɩra za kha: «Mɩyɩra kha nʋʋ mʋ, ɩɛ bɩɛ asɩn ma pere. Mu ɓudagɩra na mʋ mɩkɩ̃rɩnyɩra bɩɛ tũrin ma pere, mʋ ɓa wɔrɩ ɓu i dʋ̃waʔ.»
66018015	10 Ɗoŋindɛrɩwɩra liin ɓudadɛrɩwɩra gɩɛ gboŋira za wagala kãmara za, bɩɛ ɓa nɩ́ɩrɛ́ ma na legen dɩ̃ɩna gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ, ãnabirise kãma, hã gɩɛ wɔgbʋ̃ʋgɩra ɓa nan bɩɛ waʔ. Pɩ ɓa kɩ fʋʋ wa gbaangbo,
66018016	ki de kha: «Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga, wɔgbʋ̃ʋga! Mʋɔ gbongbʋ̃ɔgɩɛ kha kɩ̃ra gbaangbora mʋ gaga kha hara wɩɛ kha vɔ lowuphemamʋnyɛ na lowopheyɩ̃ŋaranyɛ. Mʋ kha yii wa boɓiye, wɛʔɛ pi liin na sãnɩ, ki liin yʋɔ na bʋrʋkɩ̃rɩnyɛ.
66018017	Ee! Lɩɛrɩ kpo kpeli kpoloŋo za ɓudagɩɛ bɩɛ wɔrɩn asɩn na zuon pere mɩra kɛ!» Gbuose thadɛrɩwɛ, na si horodɛrɩwɛ, na si londɛrɩwɛ, na sɩ sʋɔdɛrɩwɛ, na wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ ki ɓu pi ɗinʋʋnɛ lagagborola za, bɩɛ bɩɛ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ma kharɩlegene,
66018018	pɩ kha bʋ wa kɩ kaaga na pi ken gboŋira asɩgɩra gɩsɩra na sɩ gan. Pɩ kha de ɓa kha: «Gboŋo gʋɔ sii kɩ̃ramɛ kha wɔrɩ makɩ̃n na gboŋɩɛ waʔ.»
66018019	Pɩ kha fʋʋ wa na pɩ zʋrɩ kɩ khɛ mɩrɩwɛ ki tuu pɩ thaasɛ za ki de kha: «Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga! Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga! Wɔgbʋ̃ʋga doro, gbongbʋ̃ɔŋira liin gbuosedɛrɩwɛ bɩɛ ɓudanɩpɛ, kɛna kɩ asɩmɩra liin lɩɛrɩ ukpo thĩra waʔ!»
66018020	«Arɩgɩ̃na nɩpɛ na nɩyɛgɛmɛ, na Yesu dãarawɛ, dɩ̃ɩna Yekire yãdedɛwɛ, ɩ̃ hɩɗan na bãanwuoŋo gbongɩɛ asɩmɩra kãmara za. Naɗɩɛ Yekila yiin mi wa wɔgbʋ̃ʋga na ɓu khon ĩ doŋira.»
66018021	Dɩɛ bɛna na wɔrɩkɔ mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ khɩɛn bʋrʋga gʋɔ, wɛkɛ khɩɛgɩ̃n na namigbelege na hĩnn ŋi lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra za ki deɗ kha: «Bʋrɩgɩra mi hĩnn na faŋɩra mɩra, mafɩra Babilɔnɩkpakpawara ɓa barɩ tũri bãnɩkpo, ʋ ɓa yã kũu dʋ̃waʔ.
66018022	Koronzo khɩka ɓanu dʋ̃waʔ. Tɩ̃ntɩ̃ndɛbɩ̃ɩwɛ na tɩɩtɩɩdɛwɛ na tũunye tɩɩrɛdɛwɛ sii kʋ̃ra ɓanu Babilɔnɩ sɩrɩgɩra za dʋ̃wa. Lekemiliindɛwɛ kʋ̃ra ɓanu bʋ dʋ̃waʔ. Ɗiise namɛ kʋ̃ra ɓanu bʋ dʋ̃waʔ.
66018023	Fɩtanɩ ɓa ɗɩɛrɛ dʋ̃waʔ, kɔnyɔ̃khuo na ʋ hara mɩyɛ ɓanu dʋ̃waʔ. Naɗɩɛ Babilɔnɩ ɗoŋindɛrɩwɩra kha bʋ ɓudanɩkpakpapɩra. Mu ɓilenn ma sɩrɩsɩra nɩpɩra bɩɛ na mʋ sʋkhʋwʋsɩra.»
66018024	«Yekire dãarawɩra, na nɩyɛgɛmɩra, dɩ̃ɩna nɩpɩra bɩɛ khʋʋn dunuyara za, bɩɛ tarɩmɩra yãan ma gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ za.»
66019001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na mi nuun kʋ̃kpakpapɛ bʋɔ mʋ gaga nɩgbogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ gʋɔ sɩɛsɛ na sɩ kʋ̃nn zaazaara ni kha: «Aleluya! A Yekila kɩ zɩ̃n a, gbɩ̃nɛsɛ na wɔrɩkɔ bʋ wa ʋɔ bɛsɛ!
66019002	U kitira telenn ma dɩ̃ɩna ʋ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya. Hala kha le zɛrɩgɩra, ʋ asɩn ma ʋɔ, naɗɩɛ ʋɔ kha yii nɩpɛ bɩɛ zɛrɩgɛ liimira za fɔlɔŋɩra za. Yekila khonn ma u doŋo ʋ za, naɗɩɛ baa ʋ khʋʋn Yekila miliindɛrɩwɩra ɩra!»
66019003	Na nɩgbogbʋ̃ɔŋɩra gbũun ɔfɔn kʋ̃nn tɩ̃ kha: «Aleluya ɩ̃ tɩ̃nɛ na gbɩ̃nɛ Adɛyɩra! Naɗɩɛ gbongbʋ̃ɔŋɩra suori, ki gɩsɩra bʋ wa kɩ gan kũu kɛɩ gbaa.»
66019004	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na nɩkhãgawɩra tigbiire na piyĩira, dɩ̃ɩna nindaawɩra piyĩira ɓaɗ huruse fɔlɔŋɩra za na gbɩ̃nɛn Yekila, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ ɩɩkhokira za na deɗ kha: « Amiina. Aleluya!»
66019005	Dɩɛ bɛna na sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ kʋ̃nn ɩɩkhokira ʋ kha: «Ɩ̃ɛ wɛpɩɛ kɩ bʋ Yekila miliinɓiiwe na ɩ̃ ãn ʋ, bʋɔmɛ nɩpɛ dɩ̃ɩna ɓudanɩpɛ, ɩ̃ gbɩ̃nɛ a Yekila.»
66019006	Dɩɛ bɛna na mi nuun sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ mʋ gaga kha nɩgbogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ sɩɛsɛ, warɩma ãngɔngɔmɛ khãrɩmɛ kʋ̃mɛ, warɩma adaga lʋrʋgɩ̃ngbʋ̃nsɛ. Sɩɛ sɩɛsɩra na deɗ ɓa kha: «Aleluya! Naɗɩɛ Adɛyɩra, a wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekila hɩɗann ma ʋ ɩɩgɩra za ɩra.
66019007	A yãgayãga, kɩ hɩɗan bãanwuoŋo za! A gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila naɗɩɛ Yekila Zãraɓiira kɔ̃yɔsɩra nann ma. Ʋ kɔ̃yɔhala ɔfɔn zɩɛn ma fɩ zuori.
66019008	Pɩ hãar ʋ wa dayiinse wɛsɩɛ lʋɗɛnn na phurukpɩ̃ntɩtɩʔɛ, ɩ yɩ̃ŋa wa dɩ̃ɩna ɩ yɛɗ ɓa thĩ. Phurukpɩ̃ntɩtɩʔɩra kɩ bʋ nɩyɛgɛmɩra telemɩra.»
66019009	Na mɛlɛgɛra deɗ ɓi kha: «Sɛwɛ wɛsɩɛ na de kha: “Wɛpɩɛ ɓuun yɩɗa na yo ɗi Yekila zãraɓiira kɔ̃yɔɗiiresira za, bãanwuogo bʋ wa bɩɛ bɛgɛ.”» Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na u deɗ mɩɛ kha: «Yekila thĩra sɩɛsɛ sɩra.»
66019010	Baa mi nuun sɩɛ, na mɩ ɓaɗ huruse mɛlɛgɛra wʋɔla za fɩ kha mɩɛ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ, ŋa na u deɗ ɓi kha: «Ɩya! Hã mu le sɩɛ waʔ, naɗɩɛ mɩɛ bʋ wa Yekila miliinɓiye ʋɔ mʋ gaga kha mʋɔ na mʋ bʋɔra wɛpɩɛ gɔɗ Yesura sɩɛsɩra na kɩ̃ranɩ tɩ̃ ɩra. Yekila kpora mʋ kãn na gbɩ̃nɛ.» Tɩ̃yara mɩyɛ Yesu na deɗi, sɩɛ kɩ yɩɛ Yekila yãdedɛrɩwɩra wɔrɩ de Yekila sɩɛsɩra.
66019011	Dɩɛ bɛna na mɩ yãan zaazaara na u phiin zɩɛrɩ, ki kenn yãan na nɩra ʋɔ gann hɩɗann zagavɩra ʋɔ za. Ʋɔ dɛyɩra yɩsɩgɩra kɩ bʋ kha Nɩtelenyemo, dɩ̃ɩna Tɩ̃yadɛrɩyɛ. Ʋɔ ki kiti nɩpɩra, ʋ khɛ̃ɩgɩra telen ma.
66019012	U yiwiyira kha so ɓa mʋ gaga kha naaga, ɩɩgbanfɩlagɔmɛ kha bʋ wa ʋ thaagɩra za. Yɩsɩga gʋɔ na sɛwɛn ʋ za, nɩra sii kha wɔrɩ tʋ gɩɛ na karɩ̃n ŋɩ waʔ, fɔ ʋɔ kpora bʋɔtɛ.
66019013	Gbɔgɔlɔ̃ŋɩra ʋ na yiiri, kɩ bɩɛ na ɓʋkɩ̃nn ma na tarɩmɛ. Ʋ yɩsɩgɩra kha bʋ kha «Yekire sɩɛsɛ».
66019014	Zaazaa khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdɛwɛ na gann ma zagavɩrɩwɛ za ki thuo u. Pɩ bɩɛ na yiin ma gbɔgɔlɔ̃nsɛ wɛsɛ na lʋɗɛnn na phurukpɩ̃tɩtɩʔɛ, sɩ bɩɛ na yɛɗ ɓa kɩ fɩ̃ɩ.
66019015	Sɔrɔna ɗuɗugo ʋɔ kha bʋ wa Zaga gandaara nʋʋgɩra za. Ʋɔ sɔrɔnara kɩ ɓa asɩ fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra. Ʋ ɓa zɩɛ wa fɔlɔŋɩra nɩpɩra wʋɔla ʋ na lɔnhʋwʋwɛ, ʋ ɓa tawʋ pɩ wa mʋ gaga kha baa pɩ tawʋ ɛrɛzɛ̃n u pisikhɛla za na wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekire dongbʋ̃ɔŋɩra.
66019016	Yɩsɩga gʋɔ sɛwɛn ʋ gbɔgɔlɔ̃ŋɩra na u kpũna za kha: «Ɩɩwɛ Ɩya, dɩ̃ɩna adɛyɛwɛ Adɛyɛ.»
66019017	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na mɩ yãan mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ na ʋ nɩ́ɩrɛ́n khɩɛra za. Kɩ yɩɛn na ʋ dʋɗ na deɗ wurupira bɩɛ kɩ yɩɩ harɩ zaazaara ni kha: «Ɩ̃ ɓan bĩŋin na ɗi Yekila ɗiigbʋ̃ɔnsɩra u liin ɩra.
66019018	Ɩ̃ ɓa ɗi ɩɩwɛ na sʋrasiwe na faŋadɛrɩwɛ na zagagandɛrɩwɛ na zagawɛ khaasɩra. Ɩ̃ ɓa ɗi nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira khaasɩra, ɗome na hɔrɔmɛ na kpũndɛrɩwɛ na faŋadɛrɩwɛ bɩɛ bɛsɛ.»
66019019	Dɩɛ bɛna na mɩ yãan gbaŋadakperegira, na fɔlɔŋɩra ɩɩwɩra, dɩ̃ɩna pɩ khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdɛrɩwɩra bɩɛ na pi bĩŋini. Pɩ kha yo wa na yo khɛ̃ɩ na Zagagandaara dɩ̃ɩna ʋ khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdɛrɩwɩra.
66019020	Ŋa na pɩ gɔɗ gɩɛ gbaŋadakperegira na tɔŋɔkarɩ̃ndɛyɩra. Ʋɔ tɔŋɔkarɩ̃ndɛyɩra kha le bamʋŋa mɩyɛ gbaŋadakperigira wʋɔla ʋ, ki ɓilen nɩpɩra kha bʋ na gbaŋadapkerigira dɩ̃ŋasɩra, na pɩ gbɩ̃nɛ kɩ sɩ̃ŋɩra. Pi hĩnn ma gɩɛ gbaŋadakperegira na kɩ tɔŋɔkarɩ̃ndaara kogolinko khaala gĩriwi naagbeleŋe ɗɩɛrɛn ɩra.
66019021	Sɔrɔnara kha bʋ zagagandaara nʋʋgɩra za, na u khonn u na khʋʋn khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdɛrɩwɩra bɩɛ. Na zaazaa wurupira bɩɛ ki ɗi pɩ khaasɩra.
66020001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan mɛlɛgɛ ʋɔ na u kuɗ zaazaara ni ki sũn, dankokorikira kɛɩ le diikhɛla konagaɓila dɩ̃ɩna zɔrɩgɔ kpakpaka kha bʋ wa u lekira za.
66020002	Na mɛlɛgɛra gɔɗ gɩɛ gbaŋa dakperege gɩɛ, gɩɛ wɛkɩɛ kɩ bʋ sʋwʋkhãagɩra, dɩ̃ɩna gɩɛ kpuogira kɩ bʋ gĩrime thadɛyɩra na Sutana tɩ̃. Na ʋ gɔɗ kɩ na vɔɗ kɩ na zɔrɩgɔra. Sutana kãn ma na le ɗɩɩsɛ kpɩɛkpo (1,000) vɔkhɛla za.
66020003	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɛlɛgɛra khɩɛn Sutana na hĩnn u gɩɛ dankokorikira kɛɩ le diikhɛla kpoloŋira ʋ, kɩ bakan kɩ nʋʋna na sɔɗ tɩ, si le thaaga hã ʋ ɓa kure na ɓilen nɩpɛ na ɗɩɩsɛ kpɩɛkpora hĩin waʔ. Na sɩɛ ɗɩɩsɩra ɓa hĩin bɛndɛ bãa, ʋ ɓa kure kasora za na le bɛnɛ dʋɔ kɩrɩ ʋ.
66020004	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan ɩɩkhose sʋɔ. Nɩpɩra na hɩɗann sɩ za, pɩ hãan mɩ wa wɔrɩkɔ pi kiti nɩpɛ. Kɩ yɩɛn na mɩ yãan nɩpɩra thaasɩra pɩ na kpaɗ tɩ̃ ɩra. Pɩ na kpaɗ ɓa pɩ thaasɩra naɗɩɛ baa pɩ na liin Yesura sɩɛrɛwɩra, dɩ̃ɩna baa pɩ kha de Yekila sɩɛsɩra. Bɩɛ na kɛɩn ma dakperigira na kɩ sɩ̃ŋɩra gbɩ̃nɛsɩra. Pɩ na kɛɩn ma tɩ̃ kha dakperigira dɩ̃ŋasɩra yii bɩɛ khoʔe za warɩma bɩɛ lese za waʔ. Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ na alɩn kuɗ ɓa huumira za na hɩɗann na Kirisitiira ʋ ɩɩgɩra za na nan ɗɩɩsɛ kpɩɛkpo.
66020005	Bɩɛ kɩ bʋ lʋgɔ nɩpɩra Yekila arɩgan na kusen huumɩra za. Ŋa nɩhuomira bʋɔra alɩn thonn waʔ, fɔ ɗɩɩsɛ kpɩɛkpora hĩi zo.
66020006	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ ɓa hɩɗan bɩɛ lʋgʋ nɩpɩɛ kɩ ɓa arɩ na kure huumira za, bɩɛ ɓa yɛ ɓa, dɩ̃ɩna bãanwuogo bʋ wa bɩɛ bɛgɛ naɗɩɛ bãnɩyɔ̃ huumira bʋ na wɔrɩkɔ bɩɛ za waʔ. Bɩɛ nɩpɩɛ kɩ ɓa le Yekila dɩ̃ɩna Kirisitira kperekpiidɛwɩra na hɩɗan ɩɩgɩra za dɩ̃ɩn ʋ na nan ɗɩɩsɛ kpɩɛkpora.
66020007	Na ɗɩɩsɛ kpɩɛkpora ɓa tannɩ, pɩ ɓa kuse Sutana kasora za na vɔrɩ zɩɛ ʋ.
66020008	Ʋ ɓa yo kpɛnsɛ thĩnyira nɩpɩra kɩ bʋ fɔlɔŋɩra gɛnheʔira iyĩira za na ɓilen mi. Ɩɛ gɛnheʔira yɩsɩsɩra kɩ bʋ Gɔɔgɩ na Magɔɔgɩ. Ʋ ɓa bĩŋin ma ʋ khɛ̃ɩkhɛ̃ɩdɛwɛ. Pɩ gɔn ma thĩ mʋ gaga lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ sɩ̃rɩkpɩka.
66020009	Pɩ ɓa zɩ̃n ma fɔlɔŋɩra khaayɩra bɩɛ, na vĩimiri Yekila nɩyɛgɛmɩra na u gbonkhɔrɩyɔŋɩra bɩɛ. Ŋa naaga ɓa kure zaazaara ni na ɓa so khʋ pɩ bɩɛ pere.
66020010	Dɩɛ bɛna, Sutanara kha kpɛnsɛ nɩpɩra ki ɓilen mi, na pɩ gɔɗ ʋɔ na hĩnn u nakɛɩbĩyeŋe za, khaadɛ gĩriwi bʋ ɩra. Sutana yo ɓuun ma dakperegira na tɔndɛyãdedaara ni. Pɩ ɓa dii wa sɩɛ vɛnsɩra za kũu kɛɩ gbaa.
66020011	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩ yãan ɩɩkhokpakpavɩrɩga gʋɔ na nɩra ʋɔ hɩɗann kɩ za. Fɩ za na zaara na fɔlɔŋɩra bɩɛ barɩn tũrin khaala za fɩ ʋ wʋɔla za, sɩ yãan dʋ̃waʔ.
66020012	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na mɩ yãan nɩhuome, pɩ nɩgbʋ̃ɔmɛ na pɩ nɩtɩtɩɩpɛ. Pɩ bɩɛ na yo nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ma ɩɩkhokira wʋɔla ʋ fɩ. Dɩɛ bɛna na sɛwʋsɛ sʋɔ phiin zɩɛrɩ. Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na sɛwɛgɛ gʋɔ phiin zɩɛn tɩ̃, gɩɛ kɩ bʋ thakosɛwʋgɩra. Na pi kitin nɩhuomira na makɩ̃nn na baa sɩ sɛwɛn sɛwʋsɩra za ɩra, na makɩ̃n na pi milewenyira.
66020013	Nɩpɩra ãmɩra na ɗiiri, wɛpɛ na kasɩn, wɛpɩɛ kha bʋ laharala ʋ ni, pɩ bɩɛ na kuɗ ɓa. Pi kitin ma pɩ bɩɛ na makɩ̃nn na pi milewenyira.
66020014	Dɩɛ bɛna na pi hĩn huume zahanamara nakɛɩbĩyeŋira za. Gɩɛ nakɛɩbĩyeŋira kɩ bʋ bãnɩyɔ̃ huumira.
66020015	Wɛpɩɛ bɩɛ yɩsɩsɩra yãan Yekila thakosɛwʋgɩra za waʔ, na pi hĩnn bɩɛ bɩɛ nakɛɩbĩyeŋira za.
66021001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɩɛ yãan zaazaa fɛnwɛ̃ na fɔlɔnfɛŋɛ. Naɗɩɛ lʋgʋ zaazaara dɩ̃ɩna lʋgʋfɔlɔŋɩra na tũrin ma. Lagagborogbʋ̃ɔŋɔ kha bʋ dʋ̃waʔ.
66021002	Zeruzalɛmʋ fɛnwɛ̃, ʋɔ wɩɛra kɩ bʋ gbonyɛgɛŋɩra, na mɩ yãan ʋɔ na u kuɗ zaazaara, Yekila heke ki sũn. Ʋ na gbɛkɩ̃nn ma mʋ gaga kha baa pɩ gbɛkɩ̃n kɔnyɔ̃hara ki yo u khogboŋo u ɩra.
66021003	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mi nuun sɩɛsɛ sʋɔ na sɩ kʋ̃nn na faŋa ɩɩkhokira hɩɗankhɛla za kha: «Ɩra wɩɛ, Yekila hɩɗankhɛla bʋ wa nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwe sʋgʋmʋ za. Ʋ ɓa hɩɗan ma pɩ sʋgʋmʋ za, pɩ ɓa le wa ʋ nɩpɛ. Yekila thĩra ɓa hɩɗan ma dɩ̃ɩn mɩ, kɩ yɩɛ ʋɔ le pi Yekire.
66021004	Ʋɔ kɩ ɓa dikĩn pi yĩnthĩmisira bɩɛ. Huume ɓa hɩɗan bʋ dʋ̃waʔ. Ɓɩɩga ɓa hɩɗan bʋ dʋ̃waʔ, nɩra ɓa fʋʋ dʋ̃waʔ, vɛnsɛ ɓa hɩɗan bʋ dʋ̃waʔ, naɗɩɛ dunuya ɗugora na u kpoloŋo mɩyɩra bɩɛ tũrin ma.»
66021005	Dɩɛ bɛna, wɩɛra na hɩɗann ɩɩkhokira za, na ʋɔ deɗ kha: «Ken, mɩ vɩkɩ̃n ma mɩyɩra bɩɛ na le i fɛnyɛ.» Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na u deɗ ɓɩ kha: «Sɛwɛ wɛsɩɛ, naɗɩɛ mɩ sɩɛsɩra bʋ wa tɩ̃ya na laŋa sɩɛsɛ.»
66021006	Ki deɗ tɩ̃ kha: «Si liin ma zuori. Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ Alifa na Omegara. Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ gɔkhɛla na phɩlakhɛla. Na yʋ̃ɔsɛ bʋ wɩɛ bãa za, ãmɩra kɩ hã nɩpɩra thakuokɛɩzuoŋira, mɩ ɓa hã ʋ bɩɛ ãmɩra kpasa.
66021007	Wɩɛ bãa ɓa ɓuun wɔrɩkɔ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɓu wa sɩɛ taasɩra. Mɩɛ kɩ ɓa le u Yekila, kɩ yɩɛ ʋɔ le mɩɛ ɓikhiye.
66021008	Ŋa ãnabiriwira bɩɛ ʋɔ, dɩ̃ɩna kɛɩkhãadɛwɛ, na nɩbɩ̃ɩwɛ, na nɩkhʋdɛwɛ, na kakarɩledɛwɛ, na kanawɛ, na sɩ̃nthɔgɩ̃ndɛwɛ, dɩ̃ɩna tɔndɛwɛ bɩɛ, bɩɛ bɩɛ niin ɓa hɩɗan ma khaala gĩriwi nakɛɩbĩyeŋe bʋ. Bãnɩyɔ huumira bɩɛ.»
66021009	Dɩɛ bɛna, mɛlɛgɛwɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra na gɔɗ kaŋʋɔʔɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra na hĩin na phɩlɩyan wɔgbʋ̃ʋsɛ wãnɩyɔ̃ra, na bɩɛ ʋɔ ɓann na ɓa deɗ ɓi kha: «Ɓan mɩ ɓa ɓɔgɔ mʋ kɔ̃yɔ̃hala, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ Zãraɓiira kɔ̃yɔ̃hala.»
66021010	Na Yekila Nina sũnn mɩ za, na mɛlɛgɛra khɩɛn yuon mi ɓɩɛsʋ̃sʋ̃rʋga gʋɔ thaaga za. Na mɛlɛgɛra ɓɔgɔn mɩ Zeruzalɛmʋ gbonyɛgɛŋɩra, kɩ na kuɗ ɓa zaazaara ni Yekila heke ki sũn.
66021011	Yekila ɩɩga yɛyɛɓɩra kha bʋ wa gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ za. Kɩ kha yɩ̃ŋa wa thĩ mʋ gaga bʋrʋdekɩ̃nkɩ̃nɩnyɛ yʋɔ pɩ yɩ kha zasɩpɩ.
66021012	Gbensʋ̃rʋkonkoŋo gʋɔ na vĩin mirin gboŋira bɩɛ. Gɩɛ gboŋɩra kha bʋ wa na lonkhɛyɛ gbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃, mɛlɛgɛwɛ gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ na nɩ́ɩrɛ́n ma ɩɛ tʋ̃ntʋ̃nyɩra bɩɛ kpo kpora za. Ɩsɩrayɛlɩ ɓiiwe gbɛ̃ɩnyɛ gbune na ɩ̃yɔ̃ yɩsɩsɛ kha bʋ wa ɩɛ tʋ̃tʋ̃nyɩra bɩɛ za, tʋ̃tʋ̃nɛ tʋɔ tʋ̃tʋ̃nɛ na tɩ yɩsɩga.
66021013	Gboŋira tʋ̃tʋ̃nyɛ sãara na dãan ma wʋɔyɛ khɩɛkurogo, na ɩsãa yʋɔ dãan wʋɔyɛ khɩɛwaga, na ɩsãa yʋɔ dãan wʋɔyɛ khɩɛbanabirige gʋɔra, na ɩsãa yʋɔ dãan wʋɔyɛ khɩɛbãnabirige gʋɔra ʋ.
66021014	Gbenwira tiin ma bʋrʋyɛ gbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃ za. Yekila Zãraɓiira dãarawɩra gbũne na pɩyɔ̃ra yɩsɩsɩra sɛwɛn ma ɩɛ bʋrʋyɩra bɩɛ kpo kpora za.
66021015	Mɛlɛgɛra kha sɩɛrɛ na mɩɛ, ʋ na gɔɗ ɓa mɩɩnɛ dʋɔ kɩ sʋ̃wa. Tɩ mɩɩna na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na sãnɩ daɓɔɗɛ. Ʋ kha kãn ma na sʋ̃wa gboŋira, na kɩ tʋ̃tʋ̃nyɩra na kɩ gbenwura.
66021016	Gɩɛ gboŋira kha bʋ wa na lɔŋɔʔɛ iyĩi. Kɩ sʋ̃ramɩra na kɩ phɛrɩmɩra bɩɛ kha bʋ wa kpuore. Mɛlɛgɛra sʋ̃wan ma gboŋira na daɓɔɗa kha bʋ ʋɔ thĩ lekira za. Kɩ sʋ̃ramɩra kha bʋ wa kilomɛtɩrɩwɛ kpɩɛwɛ pɩyɔ̃ na gbaasɩyɔ̃ (2,400), kɩ sʋ̃ramɩra na kɩ phɛrɩmɩra, na ki gongomira bɩɛ kha bʋ wa kpuore.
66021017	Na mɛlɛgɛra khɩɛn nɩthɩ̃rɩɓiiwira dasʋ̃wayankpuogira na sʋ̃wan gbeŋira na mirin ŋi, kɩ bɩɛ gongomira kha bʋ wa mɛtɛrɩwɛ tigbesãa na pɩwãa (65).
66021018	Gbeŋira na vĩin mirin gboŋira, kɩ na maɗɛn ma na bʋrɩyɛ yʋɔ thĩne pɩ yɩ kha zasɩpɩ, ɩ na khɩɛgɩ̃nn ma na wũugo lɔmɛ. Gboŋira na maɗɛn ma na sãnɩ thĩnthĩnwe, gboŋira kha yɩ̃ŋa wa mʋ gaga dʋgalen.
66021019	Gboŋira gbenwura taana na tiin ma na bʋrʋkɩ̃rɩthĩnyira bɩɛ. Lʋgʋ taanbʋla pɩ kha yɩ kha zasɩpʋra, bãnɩyɔ̃ bɛla pɩ kha yɩ kha safiri, bãnɩsãa bɛla pɩ yɩ kha agatɩ. Bãniyĩi bɛla pɩ yɩ kha emerɔdɩ,
66021020	bãnɩwãa bɛla pɩ yɩ kha Onikisi, bãnɩwãnɩkpo bɛla pɩ yɩ kha sarɩdʋwanɩ, bãnɩwãnɩyɔ̃ bɛla pɩ kha yɩ kha kirizoliti, bãnɩwãnɩsãa bɛla pɩ kha yɩ kha berili, bãnɩwãyĩi bɛla pɩ kha yɩ kha topazɩ. Bãnɩgbũne bɛla pɩ kha yɩ kha kirizofazɩ, bãnɩgbũne na tikpo bɛla pɩ kha yɩ kha yasɛ̃tɩ, bãnɩgbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃ bɛla pɩ kha yɩ kha ametisiti.
66021021	Tʋ̃tʋnyɛ gbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃ra kɩ bʋ boɓiye gbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃ra, tʋ̃tʋ̃nyɛ kpo kpora bɩɛ liin ma na boɓithĩkpuoye. Gboŋira gbɛ̃ɩgɩra bɩɛ kha bʋ wa sãnɩ kɩ yɩ̃ŋa mʋ gaga kha dʋgalen.
66021022	Mɩɛ yãan Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋga gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ za waʔ. Naɗɩɛ Adɛyɛ Yekila, wɔrɩkɔdɛyɛ Yekila, ʋɔ na Zãraɓiira kɩ bʋ Yekire gbɩ̃nɛthʋʋgɩra.
66021023	Gɩɛ sɩrɩgɩra nʋʋga bʋ khɩɛ za, warɩma ferege za na yɛɗɛ gɩ waʔ, naɗɩɛ Yekila ɩɩgɩra yɛyɛɓɩra kɩ bʋ kɩ yɛyɛɓɩra, dɩ̃ɩna Zãraɓiira kɩ bʋ lamara.
66021024	Nɩpɛ ɓa kɩ nɩ́ɩrɛ̀ wa ʋ yɛyɛɓɩra za. Fɔlɔŋɩɛ ɩɩwɛ ɓa ɓan ma na pɩ ɓudaga gɩɛ gboŋira za.
66021025	Gboŋira tʋ̃tʋ̃nyɩra bʋ wa phiizɩɛnyɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ, naɗɩɛ dawogo ɓa thu ni dʋ̃waʔ.
66021026	Nineni pɩ ɓa ɓan na nɩthɩ̃rɩpɩra ɓudagɩra thĩnyira bɩɛ.
66021027	Mɩtegene sii lon gɩɛ gboŋira za waʔ. Mɩbɩ̃yɛledɛwɛ, warɩma tɔndɛrɩwɛ lon ni waʔ. Ŋa wɛpɩɛ yɩsɩsɛ dola kɩ bʋ Zãraɓiira thakosɛwʋra za, bɩɛ doro kɩ ɓa lon gɩɛ gboŋɩɛ za.
66022001	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za, na mɛlɛgɛra ɓɔgɔn mɩ lagagboro ãmɩra kɩ hã thakuogira ɩra. Ʋɔ lagagboro wɩɛ kha yɩ̃ŋa wa mʋ gaga kha dʋgalen. Ʋ kha khãrɩ wa ki kure Yekila dɩ̃ɩna Zãraɓiira ɩɩkhokira gɛŋɩra ʋ,
66022002	kɩ khãrɩ Gboŋira gbɛ̃ɩgɩra za. Dahagɩra kɩ hã nɩpɛ thakuogira, gɩɛ na fĩin ma lagagborola lese yɔ̃ra tɩɛra za. Kɩ kha sen ma ɓise bãnɩgbũne na ɩ̃yɔ̃ ɗɩɩgɩra kpoloŋira za, bãnɩkpo feregera za, kɩ wãsɩra bãarɛ wa nɩpɛ ɓose.
66022003	Nɩdaŋaramɔ sii ɓa hɩɗan gɩɛ gboŋira za dʋ̃waʔ. Yekila na Zãraɓiira ɩɩkhokira ɓa hɩɗan ma gboŋira kpoloŋira za, kɩ yɩɛ Yekila miliinɓiiwira kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ.
66022004	Pɩ ɓa yã ʋ wʋɔla, kɩ yɩɛ ʋ yɩsɩgɩra sɛwɛ pi khoʔira za.
66022005	Dawogo ɓa thu dʋ̃waʔ, nɩra sii nʋʋga ɓa hɩɗan lama yɛyɛɓɛ za dʋ̃waʔ, warɩma khɩɛ za kha u so waʔ. Naɗɩɛ Adɛyɛ Yekila ɓa yɩɛ wa ʋ yɛyɛɓɩra nan u miliinɓiiwira bɩɛ, kɩ yɩɛ pi le ɩɩwɛ bãanyɛ bɩɛ kɛɩ gbaa.
66022006	Sɩɛ kpɩ̃ra za na mɛlɛgɛra deɗ ɓi kha: «Sɩɛsɩɛ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya dɩ̃ɩna laŋa sɩɛsɛ. Adɛyɛ Yekila hãan ma u Nina na ʋ yãdedɛrɩwɩra, ʋɔ dãan ʋ mɛlɛgɛra ʋ ɓɔgɔ u miliindɛrɩwɩra mɩyɩra kɩ ɓa nan fara khaadɩɛ na kɩrɩ ʋ.»
66022007	Yesura deɗ ɓa kha: «Nuure, khaadɩɛ na kɩrʋ ʋ, mɩ ɓa ɓan, wɩɛ bãa kɩ gɔ Yekila yãdedɛwɩra sɩɛsɩra sɛwɛn sɛwʋwɩɛ za, ʋɔ dɛyɩra bãanɛ ɓa wuo.»
66022008	Dɛyɩra nuun ɩɛ mɩyɩra, na yãar ɩ, ʋɔ kɩ bʋ mɩɛ Zã. Baa mi nuun si na yãan sɩ, mɛlɛgɛra kha ɓɔgɔ mɩ ɩɛ mɩyɩra, na mɩ ɓaɗ huruse ʋ wʋɔla ʋ fɩ kha mɩɛ gbɩ̃nɛ ʋ.
66022009	Ŋa na u deɗ ɓi kha: «Hã mu le sɩɛ waʔ, mɩɛ bʋ wa mu miliindakarãn mʋ gaga kha mʋɔ dɩ̃ɩna mʋ yaɓiiwira kɩ bʋ Yekire yãdedɛrɩwɩra dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ kɩ gɔ Yekila sɩɛsɩra kɩ bʋ ʋ sɛwʋwɩɛ kpoloŋira ʋ ɩra. Mʋ kãn ma na gbɩ̃nɛ Yekila.»
66022010	Kɩ yɩɛn na ʋ ɔfɔn deɗ ɓi tɩ̃ kha: «Yekila yãdedɛrɩwɩra sɩɛsɩra sɛwɛn sɛwʋgɩɛ za mɩra, hã mʋ ɓa guure si waʔ. Naɗɩɛ ɩɛ mɩyɩra lebɛna yĩmin ma zuori.
66022011	Wɩɛ bãa lɔmɛ bɩ̃ɩrɩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ ki le bɩ̃ɩsɛ doro ki yo wʋɔrɛ; wɩɛ bãa kɩ khɔrɩ mɩtegenye, ʋɔ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ ki le mɩtegenyira; dɩ̃ɩna wɩɛ bãa teleni, ʋɔ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ ki yo wʋɔrɛ na telemira; wɩɛ bãa yɛɗɩ, ʋɔ dɛyɩra pɛ̃ɩ kɩ yɛɗɛ u thĩ ki yo wʋɔrɛ.»
66022012	«Na Yesura deɗ tɩ̃ kha: Nuure, khaadɩɛ na dʋɔ bɛnɛ kɩrɩ ʋ, mɩ ɓa ɓan. Mɩ ɓan ma na taasɛ, mɩ ɓa taa wa nɩra tʋɔ nɩra na makɩ̃n na u miliinyira.
66022013	Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ Alifa na Omegara, lʋgʋ nɩra na phɩlɩyãnɩrara, gɔkhɛrɛ na phɩlakhɛrɛ.»
66022014	Wɛpɩɛ kɩ tɩsɩ pɩ daayiinsira, bãanwuoŋo bʋ wa bɩɛ bɛgɛ si le thaaga pi ɓu khɩ̃nɛ na ɗi dahagɩra ɓigira kɩ hã thakuogira ɩra. Bɩɛ ɓa ɓu khɩ̃nɛ na tãra gboŋira tʋ̃tʋnyɩra za na lon gboŋira za.
66022015	Ŋa mɩkarɩyɛledɛwɛ, na taliwirise ledɛwɛ, na kakarɩsɛ ledɛwɛ, na nɩkhʋdɛwɛ, na wɛpɩɛ kɩ gbɩ̃nɛ sɩ̃mɛ, dɩ̃ɩna wɛpɩɛ kɩ khɔrɩ tɔŋɔ, dɩ̃ɩna pɩ tɔn ɩra, bɩɛ bɩɛ ɓa dii wa kʋwʋga ʋ.
66022016	«Mɩɛ Yesu dãan ma mɩ mɛlɛgɛ u yo ɓɔgɔ ɩ̃ ɩɛ mɩyɩra egiliziwira bɩɛ za. Mɩɛ kɩ bʋ Davidi kpɩ̃raɓiira, dɩ̃ɩna bulonbãraga khʋsaɓila.»
66022017	Ninyɛgɛmɔra na kɔ̃yɔhala de kha: «Ɓan!» Mʋɔ wɩɛ bãa nuun sɩɛ mu de tɩ̃ kha: «Ɓan!» Na yʋ̃ɔsɛ khʋ wɩɛ ʋ ɓan; wɩɛ kɩ ɓɩɛ thakuo ãmɛ ʋ ɓa zɩ̃n mɩ kpasa.
66022018	Mɩɛ Zã kɩ hã sɩɛsɩɛ na gbɩ̃ra, kha sɩɛsɩɛ Yekila yãdedɛwɩra yãagɩ̃nn mɩ sɩ na mɩ sɛwɛn sɩ sɛwʋwɩɛ za mɩra kha: Na wɩɛ bãa sɩɛn dʋɔ Yekila sɩɛsɩra za, wɔgbʋ̃ʋmɩyɩra bɩɛ deɗ sɛwʋwɩɛ za, Yekila ɓa yɩɛ wa ɩɛ bɩɛ nan ʋ dɛyɩra.
66022019	Na wɩɛ bãa gbũun khonn dʋɔ sɩɛsɩɛ Yekila yãdedɛwɩra yãagɩ̃nn mɩ sɩ na mɩ sɛwɛn sɩ mɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa lon gbonyɛgɛŋɩɛ za waʔ, thakuodahaɓisira mɩyɛ deɗ sɛwʋwɩɛ za mɩra, ʋɔ dɛyɩra ɓa ɗɩɛ ken sɩ za waʔ.
66022020	Dɛyɩra kɩ ɓɔgɔ sɩ kha ɩɛ mɩyɩra bɩɛ bʋ wa tɩ̃ya, ʋɔ dɛyɩra deɗ kha: «Iyo, mɩ ɓa ɓan khaadɩɛ na kɩrɩ ʋ!» Amiina Adɛyɛ Yesu, yɩɛ si le mafɩra, ɓan.
66022021	Adɛyɛ Yesura kɩ̃ra ɩ̃ bɩɛ!
